original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>You are blessed to walk the foundations of Pharloom.<br>Humble yourself before the shells of those who gave their lives to hold our kingdom’s weight.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>行走于纺络根基是你的殊荣。<br>在这些为王国献出生命者的躯壳前，应保持谦卑。
translated_text: about pilots.<br>You 're lucky to be in Mac.<br>We are humbled before the bodies of those who gave their lives to bear the burden of our kingdom.

original_en_text: <hpage>You are wrong, Lady...<hpage>I knew the wish, and the price to achieve it. And now, across these many ages, I have only come to know it better...<hpage>Strength... in mind, in care, in claw. Strength enough that I may live to see a world better than our own, or to craft a world as I desire. <hpage>That was the wish, of my mother, of my mentor, and of you...<page>...Indeed, spider... So much pain you must have passed to speak our hope so simply...<page>For her you become... who knows clear our desire, and has seen full the darkness beneath our house, I would show you the gift...
original_zh_text: <hpage>您错了，夫人……<hpage>我知道您寄望于我，也知道达成这期愿的代价。历经岁月后，如今的我的看法愈发透彻……<hpage>心志、仁念、爪牙——皆需刚强。强大到能让我亲眼见证美好世界之降临，强大到能助我亲手创造一个理想世界。<hpage>此乃生母、恩师与您的共期之愿……<page>……诚然，小蜘蛛……你一定历经了不可估量之苦痛，才得此彻悟……<page>既然你已经成长……明晰我们的期愿，也见识过我们家园下深藏的黑暗……我这便将礼物赠予你……
translated_text: <hpage>- You're wrong, lady. "<hpage>I know this aspiration and the cost of achieving it. Now, many years later, I understand it more deeply.<hpage>Power is ... The ability to live, to see the world better than yours, or to create the world you want.<hpage>My will, my will, and your will.<page>... In fact, in order to just express our hope, you have to experience a lot of pain.<page>He knows our desires well, He sees the darkness under our house, and I will show you the gift.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>- 아가씨, 틀렸습니다. "<hpage>나는 그 열망과 그것을 달성하는 데 드는 비용을 알고 있으며, 이제, 여러 해가 지난 지금, 나는 그것을 더 깊이 이해합니다.<hpage>파워는...삶을 살 수 있는 능력, 세상을 당신보다 더 잘 보거나, 원하는 세상을 창조할 수 있는 능력.<hpage>나의 뜻, 나의 뜻, 그리고 너의 뜻.<page>...사실, 우리의 희망을 표현하기 위해, 당신은 많은 고통을 경험해야합니다.<page>그는 우리의 욕망을 잘 알고, 그는 우리 집 아래의 어둠을 보며, 나는 당신에게 선물을 보여 줄 것입니다.

original_en_text: Coral sways,<br>Clear water flows,<br>Upon our river free of time.
original_zh_text: 珊瑚轻摇，<br>净水长流，<br>河流超脱时光之外。
translated_text: The corals were trembling.<br>the flow of water,<br>The river had no time.
secondary_translated_text: 산호가 떨고 있었다.<br>물의 흐름을,<br>강에는 시간이 없었다.

... The Silk.

original_en_text: Witness, the first light. The only means we possess to resist that void with which our family is forever linked.<page>Reach forth, child grown strong. Wrest it from this remembrance. Burn yourself free from our sad fate...
original_zh_text: 来吧，见证这道最初的光芒。这是我们抵御虚空的唯一手段。而那虚空，却与我们的族群永世相连。<page>伸出手来，我的孩子，你已通过历练变得强大。在这忆境中夺取那光芒，焚尽我们悲惨宿命的枷锁……
translated_text: The testimony of the first light is the only way to confront the emptiness that leads to family and eternity.<page>As you grow up, your child will become stronger. Erased from memory. They are freed from their tragic fate.
secondary_translated_text: 첫 번째 빛의 간증은 가족과 영원으로 이어지는 공허함에 직면하는 유일한 방법입니다.<page>어른이 되면, 아이는 더욱 강해진다.기억에서 지워버렸다.그들은 그들의 비극적인 운명에서 해방되었다.

original_en_text: ...Ignore them, daughter... their whispers...<page>...Greater, grander... Weaver, guardian, queen... Those are their desires... not your own. Certainly not mine...<page>...Only if you resist them, you might see it, another hope... beyond...<page>...But to recall these words, in time so far... Will you even remember me, child? Could you?...<page>...A mother... before the mask... before I lay forever in duty...
original_zh_text: ……莫听，女儿……她们的絮语……<page>……伟大……崇高……织者、守护者、女王……皆为他们所欲……非你所求，更非我所愿……<page>……唯有抵抗，方可见……另一线希望……<page>……但时过境迁，这些话……你可会记得？你可会记得我？...<page>……作为母亲，在戴上面甲之前……在因责任而永眠之前……

Only by rebelling against them can we see transcendence, another hope, and that is the only hope we have.<page>... But when I look back on these words, do you remember me now, my son? secondary_translated_text: ...소녀들과 그들의 속삭임을 무시하십시오.<page>...더, 더, 더.웨이버, 가디언, 여왕, 이것이 당신의 소원입니다.나 - 아니, 나 아니야.<page>...그들에게 반역함으로써만 우리는 초월성, 또 다른 희망을 볼 수 있으며, 그것이 우리가 가진 유일한 희망입니다.<page>...그러나 내가 이 말을 되돌아 볼 때, 너는 지금 나를 기억하니, 내 아들아? "만약 당신이...<page>...엄마가 마스크를 착용하기 전, 내가 영원히 책임을 지기 전.

original_en_text: We speak the wish of the Master Herald,<br>he who signs an Age’s end.<br><page>Under chapel fallen to the monarch’s might,<br>Over camp collapsed to the black thread plight,<page>Scorched field on edge, shells black and burned,<br>Up towers spinning, near the surgeon spurned,<page>Cage of one who raged against the silken lie,<br>Fell heart of frost, who soars on high,<page>Past cradle’s peak, last test of fitness,<br>That the age may pass, this shroom its witness.
original_zh_text: 此乃使者大人祈愿，<br>宣告纪元终结到来。<page>圣堂倾颓君威下，<br>骸营覆灭黑丝劫。<page>焦土边际髓骨灼，<br>纺塔孤医灰沼别。<page>囚笼首罪逆丝客，<br>霜心振翼费岳阙。 <page>摇篮极顶终试炼，<br>菌主临鉴纪元歇。
translated_text: The wishes of the ancients,<br>Who will sign at the end of the century?<br><page>When the kingdom came into the hands of the Church,<br>The field is covered with black lines.<page>The red of the earth burned, the shell burned black,<br>The tower collapsed, and a nearby surgeon was rejected.<page>The man in the cage was angry at the silk.<br>Fall from the center of the ice and rise high.<page>After the final cradle-top test and final preparation,<br>Time is running out, that 's proof.

original_en_text: Have you met her yet? Our burly new companion, Vog! Fresh returned from a long time spent tracking.<hpage>We have met, Fleamaster. It gladdens me that so strong a flea exists as her.<hpage>Yours was a caravan sorely lacking for protection, and I am too bound by my own tasks to provide it for you.<page>Why, we would never impose so! And now, no matter! Her scent may be strong, and her taste for brew bottomless, but her skill is sharp.<page>If predators draw close, her talents will provide much confidence to our caravan.
original_zh_text: 见过我们的新成员沃葛了吗？她的追踪术很是了得！<hpage>见过了。有这般强力的跳蚤存在，我也轻松一些。<hpage>毕竟你们旅团缺少护卫，而我又有要务在身。<page>怎么敢劳烦您！放心吧，虽然沃葛经常臭烘烘的，又嗜酒，但本事过硬。<page>如果有掠食者靠近，她的本领能安大伙的心。
translated_text: Have you ever seen him? Our partner is Vogue. He 's back from a long trip.<hpage>I 've seen this before, Freemaster. I 'm glad I have a chip as strong as you.<hpage>I can't protect you because I'm being attacked for my mission.<page>Well, we would never force such a thing! Now I'm ok! The aroma is strong and the taste of the beer is immeasurable, but the technique is sharp.<page>If the predator comes closer, his talent will give the team more confidence.
secondary_translated_text: 그를 본 적 있어?파트너는 Vogue 입니다.그는 긴 여행에서 돌아왔다.<hpage>나는 이것을 전에 본 적이 있다, 프리마스터.너만큼 강한 칩을 가지고 있어서 다행이야.<hpage>내가 임무를 위해 공격을 받고 있기 때문에 널 보호할 수 없어.<page>글쎄, 우리는 결코 그런 일을 강요하지 않을거야!이제 나는 괜찮아!맥주의 향기는 강하고 맛은 헤아릴 수 없지만 기법은 날카롭다.<page>포식자가 더 가까이 오면 그의 재능은 팀에 더 많은 자신감을 줄 것입니다.

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? Would you seek service of me, ehh? Mine is knowledge much, the places of the lost little ones, heard and smelt across the caves.<page>You could help find! And bring! For all to come together now that times turn dark...<page>But no map you hold! If learnings are wanted, a map must be owned. Until then, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？要我帮忙吗？我知道那些迷途小辈的踪迹，各处洞穴都有。<page>你来寻找！把它们带来！最好齐聚于此，全体跳蚤……趁黑暗未临......<page>但你没有地图！想要情报，先准备地图。在此之前无可奉告。
translated_text: If you stay, are insects not fleas? We need our services, don't we? What? I have learned a lot about places in the lost caves where I hear and smell small things.<page>We can help you find it again. Times have changed and we are united.<page>And even a letter. If you want to know, you need a map. At the moment we can do nothing.
secondary_translated_text: 만약 당신이 머물면, 곤충은 벼룩이 아니죠?우리는 우리의 서비스가 필요해요, 그렇지 않나요?뭐야?나는 작은 것들을 듣고 냄새 맡는 잃어버린 동굴의 장소에 대해 많은 것을 배웠습니다.<page>우리는 당신이 그것을 다시 찾을 수 있도록 도와줄 수 있습니다.시대는 바뀌었고 우리는 연합되어 있다.<page>심지어 편지도 하나.알고 싶다면 지도가 필요하다.현재 우리는 아무것도 할 수 없다.

original_en_text: Our travels have end, and now soon the world will also have end! At such bitter of times, brew with friends is most sweet.
original_zh_text: 旅途结束，世界也要完蛋了！这种苦涩的时候，跟朋友一起喝药酿最甜。
translated_text: Our journey is over, and the world is nearing its end. On this difficult day, drinking beer with friends is the sweetest thing you can do.
secondary_translated_text: 우리의 여행은 끝났고, 세상은 끝이 다가오고 있다.이 힘든 날에 친구들과 맥주를 마시는 것은 당신이 할 수있는 가장 달콤한 일입니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, sir flea. I see you were able to unite safely with this caravan.<page>Oh yes! All thanks to you! Dear, sweet you! Heh heh!<page>The Fleamaster, that old bore, tells me to call you Miss Hornet. But such a prickly name ill befits such a delicate beauty! Shall I call you something prettier, like ‘Nectarsweet’, my dear?<hpage>You shall not. Address me by my name or not at all.<page>Gradak! Of course. Of course! Heh heh. And now, I shall let you in on my little secret. My carriage doubles as a soothing spa, you see. It’s most ingenious.<page>The water inside is piping hot, and purer than a psalm! Heh heh! I’d gladly let you soak inside, for a modest fee!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，跳蚤先生。看来你顺利加入旅团了。<page>是啊！全托你的福！亲爱的小甜心！嘿嘿！<page>跳蚤首领那老古板让我称呼你为大黄蜂小姐。但这带刺的名字配不上娇花！叫你"蜜糖甜心"如何？<hpage>当然不行。要么称呼我的本名，要么闭嘴。<page>咳！是是是！嘿嘿，透露个小秘密——其实我的车厢兼作温泉疗愈所！<page>水温滚烫，而且比圣诗还纯净！付点小钱就能泡个痛快！
translated_text: <hpage>Fly again. You can safely take part in this escort.<page>Oh! Oh! Ah, yes! Thank you for your comments, dear, what is it? !<page>The Flea King, the annoying old man, called me Miss Bumble, but such a charming name is not suitable for such a beautiful woman.<hpage>Call us by a name you don't call them or call them at all.<page>Now, let me tell you my little secret: my machine works like a healing spa that is the smartest.<page>The water in it is purer than poetry. !¡I am happy to use it, it is not expensive!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>다시 날아가다.이 에스코트에 안전하게 참여할 수 있습니다.<page>오! 오!오! 오!아, 네!댓글 감사합니다, 얘야, 뭐야? !<page>벼룩 왕, 짜증나는 노인은 나를 미스 번블이라고 불렀지만, 그런 매력적인 이름은 아름다운 여성에게는 적합하지 않습니다.<hpage>당신이 그들을 부르지 않거나 전혀 부르지 않는 이름으로 우리를 부르세요.<page>자, 제 작은 비밀을 말씀드리겠습니다. 제 기계는 가장 똑똑한 치유 스파처럼 작동합니다.<page>그 안에 있는 물은 시보다 순수하다. !¡나는 그것을 사용하는 것을 기쁘게 생각합니다, 그것은 비싸지 않습니다!

original_en_text: Dear one, how shameful for the world to end while poor Kratt still has so much living left in him!<page>But how sweet of you to join me here! Will you play the Flea Bounce game, that I may appreciate the beauty of your agile form while I await my doom?<page>To play is simple. Leap up and keep bouncing on the fleas who fly past for as long as you are able!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，可惜末日来得太早，可怜的克拉特还没活够呢！<page>但有甜心你在就好！要玩这跳蚤蹦蹦的游戏吗？我想欣赏你美丽灵巧的身姿呢！<page>规则很简单，跳起来踩飞过的跳蚤，持续越久越好！
translated_text: How shameful the end of the world will be when poor Krat will have so many lives!<page>I 'm glad I was able to participate! Do you need a rebalanced flea? So can you admire their dexterity and wait for their fate?<page>The game is very simple. Download and jump on the chip for as long as you can!
secondary_translated_text: 불쌍한 크레이트가 이렇게 많은 생명을 가질 때, 세상의 종말은 얼마나 부끄러운가!<page>나는 내가 참여할 수 있어서 기쁘다!재조정된 벼룩이 필요하십니까?그러면 그들의 재능을 감탄하고 그들의 운명을 기다릴 수 있습니까?<page>게임은 매우 간단합니다.다운로드 하 고 당신이 할 수있는 한 칩에 점프!

original_en_text: Strange beasts prowl these grey lands. I hear them roar and shriek outside camp. Is best to stay inside and make quiet.
original_zh_text: 这片灰地时常能听见怪物吼叫，最好待在营地里别出声。
translated_text: A strange beast roamed the gray ground. I could hear their screams from behind the camp. Come in and be calm.
secondary_translated_text: 이상한 짐승이 회색 땅을 돌아다녔다.나는 캠프 뒤에서 그들의 비명을 들을 수 있었다.들어와 진정해.

translated_text: Who are the Dodgers?

original_en_text: At longest last, have our flea roamings ended! Every sandy grain and stinky squelchy maggot was worth to endure, to claim such a home!<page>Is time for rest and celebrate, and none have earned such more than you, Miss Hornet! Raise your flask and drink most heartily with us!
original_zh_text: 终于不用流浪了！这一路上吃沙喝风忍蛆虫都值了！<page>是时候庆祝了！大黄蜂小姐，和我们一起举杯吧！
translated_text: Our journey with the flea is over! All the gravel and all the worms of the smelling mites are worth to endure, just like this house!<page>It 's time to rest and celebrate. No one can make more money than you, ma ' am. Let 's get a bottle and drink it together.
secondary_translated_text: 벼룩과 함께 하는 우리의 여행은 끝났다!모든 자갈과 냄새가 나는 진드기의 모든 벌레는 이 집처럼 견딜 가치가 있습니다!<page>휴식하고 축하할 시간이다.아무도 당신보다 더 많은 돈을 벌 수 없습니다, 부인.한 병을 가져와 함께 마시다.

original_en_text: We will camp here in these grey lands until more fleas find their way to the caravan. Please lend your aid to any of our fellows you find lost out on the roads!
original_zh_text: 我们会在这灰地扎营，直到更多同胞归队。请继续帮助寻找迷途的跳蚤！
translated_text: While other fleas do not meet the caravan, we take on this gray ground.Help those who got lost on the way.
secondary_translated_text: 다른 벼룩이 캐러밴을 만나지 않는 동안, 우리는이 회색 바닥을 취합니다. 도중에 길을 잃은 사람들을 돕습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>I am travelling these lands for my own reasons, Fleamaster. However, if I happen upon any fleas on my travels, I will aid them as best I can.<page>Oh, oh, I could ask for nothing more! They must all be hiding or stuck in dangerous places, but if you rouse them they are sure to find their way here to us.<page>May the kingdom bless your travels and keep you safe, stranger! You are welcome to rest here with us whenever the roads bring you back!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我的旅途有自己的目的，但若路遇跳蚤，会尽力相助。<page>那就足够了！他们肯定是困在各处险地，只要脱困就会自己寻路归来。<page>愿王国庇佑您旅途平安！也随时欢迎您回来歇息！
translated_text: <hpage>"I traveled to this country for my own reasons.However, if you encounter fleas while traveling, do what you can.<page>"Oh, we can't ask for more! Everyone should be hiding or locked in dangerous places, but if you wake them up, they will surely find our way. "<page>May the Kingdom bless your journey and keep you safe.Every time you return, we invite you to rest with us.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"나는 내 자신의 이유로 이 나라에 여행했다. 하지만 여행 중에 벼룩을 만나면, 할 수 있는 일을 해라.<page>"오, 우리는 더 많은 것을 요청할 수 없습니다!모든 사람들은 위험한 장소에 숨어 있거나 갇혀 있어야하지만, 당신이 그들을 깨우면, 그들은 확실히 우리의 길을 찾을 것입니다. "<page>왕국이 여러분의 여행에 축복을 주시고 안전하게 지키기를 기원합니다. 여러분이 돌아올 때마다, 우리는 여러분과 함께 휴식을 취할 것을 권합니다.

original_en_text: The journey here was long, but we didn’t lose a single flea! I’m told it’s good luck to bring a guest along when travelling, so we must have you to thank!<page>I trust the trip was agreeable for you. A pleasure perhaps? Nestled in with our dear little ones...<hpage>They certainly make for energetic travel companions. I’ve not often had opportunity to socialise with such spirited sorts.<page>Splendid! And now, you must go and see Grishkin, sitting there by the bubbling cauldron. After long travel, we drink to revive our spirits!
original_zh_text: 这趟旅途虽长，但没丢一只跳蚤！听说带贵客同行能带来好运，肯定是您的功劳！<page>旅途可还舒适？和小家伙们挤在一起挺开心吧？<hpage>他们确实精力旺盛，我很少和这么活泼的旅伴打交道。<page>那就好！现在去找格里什琴吧，她在冒泡的大锅旁。长途劳顿后该喝点提神！
translated_text: We 've come a long way to get here, but we haven't lost our chip! I have heard that accepting guests on a trip brings good luck, So thank you!<page>This trip will make you happy.With our precious children, it can be fun.<hpage>Ideal for energy travelers. I rarely have the opportunity to communicate with such an active person.<page>This is fantastic! I have to go look at Grisikin, who is sitting next to the boiler.After a long journey, Glass!
secondary_translated_text: 우리는 여기까지 먼 길을 왔지만, 우리는 우리의 칩을 잃지 않았다!여행 중에 손님을 맞이하면 행운을 가져다 준다고 들었는데, 감사합니다!<page>이 여행은 당신을 행복하게 할 것입니다. 우리의 소중한 아이들과 함께, 그것은 재미있을 수 있습니다.<hpage>에너지 여행자에게 이상적입니다.이렇게 활동적인 사람과 소통할 수 있는 기회는 거의 없다.<page>이것은 환상적이다!나는 보일러 옆에 앉아있는 Grisikin 을 보러 가야합니다. 긴 여행 후, 유리!

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, your bottle is full of Flea Brew. You know what such means! You must have drink! Har har!<page>When you have finish drinking, return and we will fill flask again! I’m is always brewing!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，你身上的药酿还满着呢，得先喝光！<page>喝完了就回来找我！我这儿药酿管够！
translated_text: Sra. "Chersh, your bottle is full of beer, you know what I mean, we have to drink! Ha-ha.<page>When I finish drinking, I will drink again. I have been planning all the time!
secondary_translated_text: 부인. "Chersh, 당신의 병은 맥주가 가득 차 있습니다, 당신은 내가 무슨 말인지 알고 있습니다, 우리는 마셔야합니다! "하하하<page>술을 마시면 다시 마셔요.나는 항상 계획하고 있었다!

original_en_text: My fellows give much worry for the other fleas, but I’m not give at all. They will find their way to us, and if not, who keep count of them anyway? Har har!
original_zh_text: 大伙总爱担心那些迷途的同胞，我才不愁！该来的自会找来，没来谁又数得清？哈哈！
translated_text: My partner is worried about other fleas, but I don't care at all.Will they know us or remember us? Ha ha ha!
secondary_translated_text: 제 파트너는 다른 벼룩에 대해 걱정하고 있지만 저는 전혀 신경쓰지 않습니다. 그들은 우리를 알 수 있습니까, 우리를 기억합니까?하하!

original_en_text: Ahh, and before the road steals you away from us again, allow me to offer you a humble gift!<page>One of the little ones found a pale artefact while digging about in the sands. A spiny, cold sort of thing.<page>I see no use in it for we fleas, so of course we are all too pleased, eager even, to bestow it upon our dear friend!
original_zh_text: 趁您还没走，请收下这份薄礼！<page>有个小家伙在沙地里挖到件苍白古物，冷冰冰带尖刺。<page>对我们没用，正好赠予挚友！
translated_text: Oh, before this road takes you far from us, I will give you a modest gift.<page>One of the little men found a pale relic digging in the sand.<page>I do not think that this will be useful for us flea, so naturally we are pleased and want to give it to a dear friend!
secondary_translated_text: 오, 이 길이 당신을 우리로부터 멀어지게 하기 전에, 나는 당신에게 겸손한 선물을 줄 것이다.<page>작은 남자들 중 한 명이 모래를 파고 있는 창백한 유물을 발견했다.<page>나는 이것이 우리에게 유용 할 것이라고 생각하지 않습니다 벼룩, 그래서 자연스럽게 우리는 기쁘게 생각하고 사랑하는 친구에게 그것을주고 싶습니다!

original_en_text: For your hard efforts and eternal friendship, please accept these meagre rosaries as reward.<page>Think of we fleas when you find chance to trade them!
original_zh_text: 为了酬谢您的辛劳，请收下这些念珠。<page>旅途上别忘了我们跳蚤，朋友！
translated_text: Accept this humble Rosary as a reward for your hard work and eternal friendship.<page>If you have the opportunity to trade fleas, think about our fleas!
secondary_translated_text: 여러분의 노력과 영원한 우정에 대한 보상으로 이 겸손한 묵주기도를 받아 주십시오.<page>벼룩을 거래 할 기회가 있다면, 우리의 벼룩을 생각해보십시오!

original_en_text: Dear one, my lone light amongst the darkness! Will you bathe in Kratt’s spa-carriage and let the warm waters wash away your worries?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的！黑暗中的明灯！可愿光临克拉特的温泉车厢，让暖流洗去烦忧？
translated_text: My love, my only light in the darkness. Why not take a dip in the Clutter Car Spa and wash your problems off with hot water?
secondary_translated_text: 내 사랑, 어둠 속의 유일한 빛Clutter Car Spa 에서 목욕하고 뜨거운 물로 문제를 씻어주는 것이 어때요?

original_en_text: Please, my dear, step inside! I will stand guard here while you bathe... Right on this very spot!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，请进吧！我就在这为你站岗……寸步不离！
translated_text: "Honey, come in, please. When you swim, I 'm here to see you.
secondary_translated_text: "여보, 들어오세요.네가 수영할 때, 나는 너를 보러 왔어.

original_en_text: Dodeshna. Want for shelter from the thick, grey air? Is heavy, and wet. I’m worry for the little flea’s health in this land.<page>And they make play in the filthy water. I say them stop, but they just laugh and splash on me. They are lack respect!<hpage>Most bugs instinctively obey those with strength and will. Speak with authority, or your commands may go unheeded.<page>Ugh... really, is Fleamaster’s job to teach the fleas such. I will just have rest here until is time to move on.
original_zh_text: 多德什纳。要来避一避吗？这的空气又闷又湿，小跳蚤们要生病了。<page>他们还玩脏水，说了也不听，反而溅我一身！没大没小！<hpage>虫类大多听从强者，你得用权威口吻。<page>唉……这本是首领该做的。我还是好好休息等旅团出发吧。
translated_text: Mr. Doddishner. Want to avoid the gray air? It is heavy and wet. I am concerned about the health of small fleas in this area.<page>Playing in dirty water. I told them to stop, but they just fell and threw the water. Respect is not enough.<hpage>Most insects instinctively follow those who have strength and willpower.If you do not consult with the authorities, your orders will be ignored.<page>Ugh, uh, uh... In fact, the job of a flamemaster is to train fleas. I will rest here until I move.
secondary_translated_text: 도디쉬너 씨회색 공기를 피하고 싶으십니까?그것은 무겁고 젖었다.나는 이 지역에 있는 작은 벼룩의 건강에 대해 걱정한다.<page>더러운 물에서 노는 것.나는 그들에게 멈추라고 말했지만, 그들은 그냥 쓰러져 물을 던졌다.존중만으로는 충분하지 않습니다.<hpage>대부분의 곤충은 본능적으로 힘과 의지력을 가진 사람들을 따릅니다. 당국과 상담하지 않으면 명령은 무시됩니다.<page>어, 어, 어..사실, 불꽃 마스터의 임무는 벼룩을 훈련시키는 것입니다.나는 움직일 때까지 여기서 쉬게 될 것이다.

original_en_text: Away then, bug. Await challenger, shall I.
original_zh_text: 那就走吧。我会等下一个挑战者。
translated_text: Come on, babe! Looking for a rival.

original_en_text: Vikna! Our little game has ended. But I trust, after a short rest, you will play with us again?
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束。不过你应该还没尽全力吧，休息会儿再战？
translated_text: Our little game is over. But after a short break, I think we will play with them again.
secondary_translated_text: 우리의 작은 게임은 끝났습니다.그러나 짧은 휴식을 취한 후, 나는 우리가 다시 그들과 놀 것이라고 생각한다.

translated_text: "The Giuggler.

original_en_text: Ahh! Do I understand you rightly, stranger? You will help gather the lonely fleas to our caravan? Truly?
original_zh_text: 啊！我没听错吧？您愿意帮忙召集流落各处的跳蚤？当真？
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! Strange, I understand what you mean? Would you like to help us raise the lonely fleas in our caravan? - Really?
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!오, 네!이상해, 무슨 뜻인지 알아?우리 캐러밴에서 외로운 벼룩을 키우는 것을 돕고 싶습니까? - 진짜?

original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！跳蚤的救星！我们等候您很久了！<page>看看这块宝地！远离外面的危险，跳蚤们肯定能在这茁壮成长！<page>这里就是我们旅团的终点站了，纺络再找不到比这更好的归宿了！<hpage>合你们的心意就好。能有这么多跳蚤幸存，我也感到高兴。其他虫类大多没那么幸运。<page>没错！未来充满希望，这全仰赖您的帮助。为纪念乔迁之喜，请收下这份纪念品。<page>我最近学了缝纫，小家伙们也帮我收集材料。想给你的工具袋加个口袋，让旅途轻松些。<page>区区薄礼不足挂齿，希望您别失望！
translated_text: Sra. Horned! Our Saviour! "Please come and visit us.<page>Except for the darkness and death of the nearby land, this is a wonderful place that you have given us, safe. A place where fleas become wise and strong.<page>The journey ends here as there will be no further colonization on the farm.<hpage>I'm glad that this is the right place, master Nami.It's good to know that fleas will survive.Most hawkish insects seem to have a more tragic fate.<page>It's really so. The future, full of hope, awaits us only for you and your efforts.To celebrate our arrival, I am pleased to offer you a small service.<page>I learned to sew, and fleas collected materials for me.You can add an extra pocket to the luggage to make your trip easier.<page>It 's a little bit of a job that 's far less than it deserves, but I want you to be satisfied anyway.
secondary_translated_text: 부인. Horned!우리의 구원자! "오셔서 우리를 방문해 주세요.<page>"이곳은 가까운 땅의 어둠과 죽음을 제외하고는, 당신께서 우리에게 주신 아름다운 곳이며, 안전합니다.벼룩이 현명하고 강해지는 곳.<page>농장에 더 이상의 식민지가 없기 때문에 여정은 여기서 끝납니다.<hpage>여기가 딱 맞는 곳이라서 다행입니다, 나미 선생님. 벼룩이 살아남을 수 있다는 걸 알게 되어서 다행입니다. 매벌레들 대부분은 더 비극적인 운명을 가지고 있는 것 같습니다.<page>정말 그렇군요.희망으로 가득 찬 미래는 여러분과 여러분의 노력에 의해서만 우리를 기다리고 있습니다. 우리의 도착을 축하하기 위해, 저는 여러분에게 작은 봉사를 제공하게 되어 기쁩니다.<page>나는 바느질을 배웠고, 벼룩은 나를 위해 재료를 수집했습니다. 여행이 더 쉬워지도록 가방에 추가 주머니를 추가 할 수 있습니다.<page>이 일은 마땅히 받아야 할 것보다 훨씬 적은 일이지만, 어쨌든 당신이 만족하기를 바랍니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>I know not what you plan, Fleamaster, and at this time I cannot participate.<page>Ahhhh. Ahhhhhhh! Wretches, wretches, all of us! How can we begin without you, dear friend?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不知您作何打算，跳蚤首领，但此刻我无法参与庆典。<page>啊啊啊！可惜啊，这太令我们难过了！没有您这位挚友，庆典如何开始？
translated_text: <hpage>I don't know what your plans are, but I can't attend right now.<page>¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! Poor things, poor things, all of us! Dear friends, where to start?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>무슨 계획이 있는지 모르겠지만 지금은 참석할 수 없다.<page>오, 그래!오, 네!불쌍한 것, 불쌍한 것, 우리 모두!친애하는 여러분, 어디서부터 시작해야 합니까?

original_en_text: Gathered here we are, to honour the grand champion of this very final of all festivals!<page>Now, Miss Hornet! Strike the great effigy with all your might!
original_zh_text: 我们相聚于此，为这末日庆典的总冠军加冕！<page>大黄蜂小姐，现在请全力击打巨像！
translated_text: Thank you to the last champions of all the festivals!<page>"Mrs. Bumblebee." Do your best to throw the statue!
secondary_translated_text: 모든 축제의 마지막 챔피언에게 감사드립니다!<page>"Bumblebee 부인. "최고로 동상을 던지세요! "

original_en_text: The little fleas like this place most of all. They are as much happy as I ever hear them!
original_zh_text: 小家伙们非常喜欢这地方！我从没听他们这么欢腾过！
translated_text: Small fleas like this place are the best. I have never heard you are so happy.
secondary_translated_text: 이 같은 작은 벼룩이 가장 좋습니다.나는 네가 이렇게 행복하다고 들어본 적이 없다.

original_en_text: Oh, dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at our marvellous troupe! Their numbers full. Their spirits bright. All thanks to your heroic efforts!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐快看，我们壮盛的队伍！跳蚤们无一遗漏，个个精神饱满，全仰赖您的英勇相助！
translated_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Hornett, look at our wonderful company! The room is full. Their souls are brilliant. Thank you all for your courageous efforts!
secondary_translated_text: 오, 나의 친애하는 친구, 미스 호넷, 우리의 멋진 회사를 보세요!방은 가득 차 있다.그들의 영혼은 밝습니다.여러분들의 용감한 노력에 감사드립니다!

translated_text: A jump from a flea?

original_en_text: Another journey complete! And a new, high spot for our rest, upon the doorstep of that mighty Citadel, no less!<hpage>It is fortunate that all of your companions survived the trek, Fleamaster. The howling rise beside, and the tangled wood before it, have both claimed the lives of countless bugs.<page>Indeed! A perilous ascent! Maybe it was your company that brought us luck, Miss Hornet? It surely put us fleas at ease to have you and your weapon riding close.
original_zh_text: 又一趟旅程结束了！这次竟然停在了圣堡门廊这样的高处！<hpage>你们能平安抵达这里实属万幸。旁边的峭壁和前边的丛林都葬送过无数旅行者。<page>确实凶险！或许是您带来的好运？有您持械护卫，大伙安心不少。
translated_text: The journey is back! This is the new plateau where we rest.Enter your mighty castle!<hpage>Fortunately, all your companions survived this long journey, Flymaster.The neighboring side and the intertwined trees in front of him cost the lives of countless insects.<page>It's really so. Danger is growing! Perhaps your company has brought you luck, miss. Hornet.We and your friends. "
secondary_translated_text: 여행이 돌아왔다!이것은 우리가 휴식을 취하는 새로운 고원입니다. 당신의 강력한 성으로 들어가십시오!<hpage>다행히도, 당신의 모든 동반자는이 긴 여정을 살아남았다, Flymaster. The 이웃 측과 그의 앞에 얽혀 나무는 수많은 곤충의 목숨을 잃었다.<page>정말 그렇군요.위험은 커지고 있습니다!아마 당신의 회사가 당신에게 행운을 가져다주었을 것입니다, 아가씨. Hornet. We and your friends. "

original_en_text: Oh, and look, Miss Hornet, look at how many lost fleas have come! It seems even the last few stragglers are now with us.
original_zh_text: 噢对了，大黄蜂小姐快看！如此多的跳蚤同胞，连最后几个掉队的都回来了！
translated_text: "Look, Miss Bumblebee, and see how many fleas there are! The last one seems to be with us.
secondary_translated_text: "이봐, 버블비 양, 벼룩이 얼마나 많은지 봐!마지막은 우리와 함께 있는 것 같다.

original_en_text: Ah! Aha! A native of these fiery lowlands approaches! Have no fear, my friend, we fleas are but humble travellers!<hpage>Well met, sir, though like you I am not of these lands. I am merely journeying through.<page>Oh. Oho! A kindred spirit! It’s good luck for wanderers to meet on an unfamiliar path.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！是这片灼热低地的原住民！别怕朋友，我们跳蚤都是卑微的旅者！<hpage>幸会，不过我和你一样只是途经此地。<page>噢！原来也是流浪旅者！听说路遇同道是好兆头呢！
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! Oh, oh, oh, oh! The inhabitants of this warm plain are approaching! Do not worry, my friend, fleas are humble travelers.<hpage>I'm from this country, just like you, but I'm very happy.<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! For a drifter, this is a good opportunity to meet him on an unfamiliar road.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!오, 네!오, 오, 오, 오!이 따뜻한 평원의 주민들이 다가오고 있다!걱정하지 마세요, 친구, 벼룩은 겸손한 여행자입니다.<hpage>나도 너처럼 이 나라에서 왔지만, 나는 매우 행복하다.<page>오! 오!오! 오!오! 오!오! 오!방랑자에게는 낯선 길에서 그를 만날 수있는 좋은 기회입니다.

original_en_text: Dodeshna, dear one, dodeshna! Heh heh! Have you returned to use Kratt’s luxurious spa-carriage? I’ve kept it roastily warm for you...
original_zh_text: 多德什纳亲爱的！要来泡克拉特的豪华车厢温泉吗？泉水一直为你温着呢！
translated_text: Dodechner, dear, Dodechner! What is it? ! I burned for you, I burned for you.
secondary_translated_text: Dodechner, 사랑하는 Dodechner!뭐야? !당신을 위해 불타고, 당신을 위해 불타고.

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is now ended, and the Flea Juggle champion has set an even higher score! Tremble in awe, dear fleas, at the might of our dear Miss Hornet!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，耍耍记录刷新！颤抖吧跳蚤们，见证大黄蜂小姐的实力！
translated_text: The competition is over, and the freeboard champion created a higher score! My dear flea, trembling with fear, our dear Miss Bumble Power!
secondary_translated_text: 대회가 끝났고 프리보드 챔피언이 더 높은 점수를 얻었습니다!나의 사랑하는 벼룩, 두려움으로 떨며, 우리의 사랑하는 미스 번블 파워!

original_en_text: There are many lost and lonely fleas still scattered across this kingdom. If only some more of them joined us, the caravan could continue its journey.<page>You’ll find the little dears in all sorts of strange places, for they love to peek and pry and play, but if you rouse them they are sure to find their way here!
original_zh_text: 还有太多同胞流落四方。如果能多召集些，旅团就能继续前行。<page>那些小家伙总爱躲在古怪角落玩耍，但被发现就会自己寻路回来！
translated_text: The empire is always interrupted by a multitude of lonely lost fleas.As more people join, the team moves forward.<page>They love to watch, watch, and play here, so they will find these little ones in various strange places, but once you wake them up, they will find their way!
secondary_translated_text: 제국은 항상 외로운 벼룩에 의해 중단됩니다. 더 많은 사람들이 합류함에 따라 팀은 앞으로 나아갑니다.<page>그들은 보고, 보고, 놀기를 좋아하기 때문에 다양한 이상한 장소에서이 작은 아이들을 찾을 수 있지만, 일단 당신이 그들을 깨우면, 그들은 길을 찾을 것입니다!

original_en_text: Those great rumbles from beneath, they have sound similar to giant beast. Such beast is much sorrowful though, I am think.<page>Fleas and monsters alike have their troubles...
original_zh_text: 下面传来的轰隆声，像巨兽哀嚎。或许长得越大，悲伤也就越大吧。<page>跳蚤和怪物各有各的苦……
translated_text: A huge roar, like a huge beast, was heard from below.<page>Monsters and monsters are in trouble.
secondary_translated_text: 아래에서 거대한 짐승 같은 큰 웅성 소리가 들렸다.<page>괴물과 괴물은 곤경에 처해 있습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>The Fleamaster and his caravan sought for caves offering space and safety. This calm lake and shore may prove suitable.
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤旅团在寻找宽敞又安全的驻地，这片湖岸看着很合适。
translated_text: <hpage>The Flexmaster and his caravan are looking for caves that offer space and safety. This serene lake and coastline fit in.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>플렉스마스터와 그의 캐러밴은 공간과 안전을 제공하는 동굴을 찾고 있습니다.이 평온한 호수와 해안선이 잘 어울립니다.

original_en_text: Oh, Miss Hornet! Wonder at how large our caravan has grown! So bold and boisterous! This gilded chamber can barely contain us all!<page>The many fleas are itching to journey once more, to find a space to stretch their wings. But from here, as their leader, I am hesitant to order us so swiftly away.<page>These heights hold too much danger to set forth without a safe goal held clear in mind.<page>What of you, Miss Hornet? Your tasks carry you throughout this kingdom. Have you ever encountered a place appropriate?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！看旅团现在多热闹！这金色大厅都快装不下了！<page>大伙急着再次启程找个宽敞的地方，但身为领袖，我不敢贸然行动。<page>高地危机四伏，没有明确目标不能冒险。<page>您有什么看法？您走遍了纺络，可曾遇见过合适的去处？
translated_text: I'm very sorry, miss.Hot.I'd like to know how much the team has grown.Brave and active! This golden room can't hold us all!<page>Many fleas move backward and look for space to spread their wings.But from there, as a leader, I hesitated and ordered them to leave immediately.<page>Without a clear security goal, these heights are very dangerous.<page>You are Miss Hornet and your mission is to travel the kingdom. Have you found the right place?
secondary_translated_text: 죄송합니다. 미스. 핫. 팀의 성장이 얼마나 됐는지 궁금합니다. 용감하고 적극적이세요!이 황금 방은 우리 모두를 수용할 수 없다!<page>많은 벼룩은 뒤로 움직이고 날개를 펼칠 공간을 찾습니다. 하지만 거기서부터, 리더로서, 나는 망설이고 즉시 떠나라고 명령했습니다.<page>명확한 보안 목표가 없다면 이 고도는 매우 위험합니다.<page>당신은 미스 호넷이고, 당신의 임무는 왕국을 여행하는 것입니다.올바른 장소를 찾았습니까?

original_en_text: We will camp here a time before moving onward. These moments of safety and calm must be treasured, rare as they are.
original_zh_text: 我们会在这里暂驻。安宁时光难得，要好好珍惜。
translated_text: We will be here for a while and then move on. Such moments of security and tranquility are rare, but cherish them.
secondary_translated_text: 우리는 잠시 동안 여기에 머물고 나서 계속 나아갈 것입니다. 그러한 안전과 평온의 순간은 드물지만, 그것을 소중히 여깁니다.

original_en_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at how many of the lost fleas have come! It seems even the last few stragglers are now with us.
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐快看！如此多的跳蚤同胞，连最后几个掉队的都回来了！
translated_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Hornett, look at the number of fleas lost! The latter seems to be with us.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 나의 친애하는 친구, 미스 호넷, 잃어버린 벼룩의 수를 보라!후자는 우리와 함께 있는 것 같다.

original_en_text: And now that we have met, know that I am Fleamaster Mooshka, leader of this caravan!<page>Our own journey has barely begun, but you are most welcome to tarry here a while, stranger. Where ways are dark and winding, good bugs must stay close together!
original_zh_text: 既然相遇，容我介绍——我是跳蚤首领穆什卡，旅团领袖！<page>我们刚启程不久，但欢迎您在此歇息。现在外面混乱得很，好虫子们应抱团取暖！
translated_text: Now we are the Flying Master, captain of this team!<page>We are just beginning the journey, but please stay here for a while. In the dark and winding place good insects need to kiss!
secondary_translated_text: 이제 우리는 비행 마스터, 이 팀의 주장입니다!<page>우리는 이제 막 여행을 시작했지만, 잠시 동안 여기에 머물러주세요.어둡고 구불구불한 장소에서 좋은 곤충은 키스해야합니다!

original_en_text: The bellowing sandy land was full of much danger. We was almost lost poor Varga to hungry worms as we travel up!<page>Sadly, he is finding way here after all. Har! Is only jest. Grishkin and Varga is great friends, just like all fleas is being.
original_zh_text: 这片沙地凶险得很！来的路上瓦尔加差点就进了蠕虫的肚子！<page>可惜最后他找到路回来了！哈哈开玩笑，格里什琴和瓦尔加关系好着呢！
translated_text: The arena is full of dangers.When we climbed up, poor Varga became almost obsessed with hungry worms.<page>He finally found a way out. - Ooooh! Griskin and Varga were just as good friends as any other flea.
secondary_translated_text: 경기장은 위험으로 가득 차 있습니다. 우리가 올라갈 때, 불쌍한 바르가는 굶주린 벌레에 거의 집착했습니다.<page>그는 마침내 탈출구를 찾았다. - 오오오!그리스킨과 바르가는 다른 벼룩들만큼이나 좋은 친구였다.

translated_text: Shall we go back to beer?

original_en_text: You have brought them all, bug not flea. My work is done! No more searching needed. Ours is a caravan full!<page>Now my duty must change. To watch. To protect. This new task I am looking much to liking.
original_zh_text: 你把他们全找齐了，外族虫。我也不用再四处搜寻了！旅团满员！<page>现在改当护卫，这新差事合我胃口。
translated_text: I brought them all. Insects are not fleas. Work done! No further research is required.My car is full!<page>My responsibility will change. Attention to protection. I appreciate this new mission.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 그들 모두를 가져왔다.곤충은 벼룩이 아닙니다.작업 완료!더 이상의 조사가 필요하지 않습니다. 내 차는 가득 차 있습니다!<page>나의 책임은 바뀔 것이다.보호에 주의하십시오.나는 이 새로운 임무에 감사한다.

original_en_text: Is warm here, you agree? Is very... what is say, cosy?<page>The Fleamaster though, is always want to move on. We will be drag away somewhere much worse soon, I think.
original_zh_text: 这儿暖和，对吧？很……温馨？<page>但首领总想挪窝，我猜迟早会搬去更糟的地方。
translated_text: It's hot, right? Really? Many... Very... What do you think Connor?<page>But Flackmaster always wanted to move forward. I think we'll be in a worse situation soon.
secondary_translated_text: 날씨가 더워요?진짜?많은...정말...코너, 어떻게 생각하니?<page>그러나 플래크마스터는 항상 앞으로 나아가고 싶었다.나는 우리가 곧 더 나쁜 상황에 처하게 될 것이라고 생각한다.

original_en_text: Oh... what a shame. Heh heh! I think you’d find the waters inside delectably soothing, if you’d only reconsider!
original_zh_text: 噢……真遗憾。这泉水能舒服到骨头里哦！要不再考虑考虑？
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! What a disgrace! What is it? ! If you think about it, you 'll see that water is very comfortable!
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!얼마나 부끄러운 일인가!뭐야? !생각하면 물은 아주 편안하다는 것을 알 수 있습니다!

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I bring a delivery, supplies from the couriers of Bellhart to aid your settlement.<page>Such dedication you continue to show us, Miss Hornet!<page>While we may seem safe out here at range from danger, we cannot go far to forage, and the many fleas need much nurture!<page>Food and provisions, such as you bring, are crucial in these desperate times.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我从钟心镇带了补给来。<page>大黄蜂小姐，您总是这么关照我们！<page>这里看似安全，但难以远行觅食，这么多张嘴要喂呢！<page>你带来的食物和物资真是雪中送炭！
translated_text: <hpage>Flightmaster, I brought a package of supplies from Envoy Belhart to help you prepare.<page>- "She 's engaged, Miss Hottie. "<page>It seems that we are out of danger, but we cannot get far. Many fleas need more food!<page>Food and supplies (such as what you bring with you) are needed during this desperate time.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>비행장님, 준비할 수 있도록 벨하트 대사로부터 물품 한 팩을 가져왔습니다<page>- "그녀는 약혼했습니다, 미스 핫티. "<page>우리는 위험에서 벗어난 것 같지만, 우리는 멀리 갈 수 없다.많은 벼룩들은 더 많은 음식이 필요하다!<page>이 절박한 시간 동안 음식과 보급품 (예를 들어, 당신이 가지고 오는 것) 이 필요합니다.

original_en_text: This trial is Flea Dodge. Stay upon platforms, avoid attacks. Longer stay gives bigger score.
original_zh_text: 这试炼是跳蚤溜溜。站住平台，躲开攻击。坚持越久分越高。
translated_text: This test is designed to prevent fleas.Stay on the field to avoid attacks.The longer you stay, the higher your score.
secondary_translated_text: 이 테스트는 벼룩을 방지하기 위해 설계되었습니다. 공격으로부터 피하기 위해 필드에 머물러 있습니다. 오래 머물수록 점수가 높아집니다.

original_en_text: Dodeshna, dodeshna! I am saying, welcome to our caravan, stranger!<page>You are a very funny, very strange flea, isn’t it? No fur at all, and your wings fall off!<page>Har, har har har! Is just jest, of course. Us fleas famous for giving jokes!
original_zh_text: 多德什纳，多德什纳！我的意思是，欢迎来到旅团！<page>你真是个滑稽的跳蚤，没长毛还掉翅膀！哈哈！<page>开个玩笑啦！我们跳蚤最爱逗乐子！
translated_text: Sorry, sorry, sorry. Welcome to the trailer, strangers!<page>You are a very funny, very strange flea, right? Really? Without the skin, the wings fall out.<page>Ha ha ha! It 's a joke, and we 're famous for our jokes.
secondary_translated_text: 미안, 미안, 미안.트레일러에 오신 것을 환영합니다, 낯선 사람들!<page>넌 정말 재미있고 이상한 벼룩이야, 그렇지?진짜?가죽이 없으면 날개가 떨어진다.<page>하하!그것은 농담이고, 우리는 우리의 농담으로 유명합니다.

original_en_text: Some beasts here, I see them eat through the bony ground. Is very smart! Bone is everywhere much abundant! If only I had such stomach, har har!
original_zh_text: 这有些野兽会啃地上的骨头，真聪明！这到处都是骨头，我要有这胃口多好！哈哈！
translated_text: Here is a bone-changing beast, very smart! There are bones everywhere! I wish I had a stomach like this.
secondary_translated_text: 여기 뼈를 바꾸는 짐승이 있어, 아주 똑똑해!곳곳에 뼈가 있다!나는 이런 배가 있었으면 좋겠다.

original_en_text: Drink to full, Miss Hornet! Why waste? Be merry with us fleas before it all ends!
original_zh_text: 喝个痛快，大黄蜂小姐！浪费？都要完蛋了，只管开心就好了！
translated_text: "Mrs. Hornett, drink! Why spend it? Be happy with our fleas until it 's all over!
secondary_translated_text: "호넷 부인, 마셔라!왜 써?모든 것이 끝날 때까지 우리의 벼룩과 함께 행복하십시오!

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended, and you have bested your old score. Rishkiz, champion!
original_zh_text: 维克纳，试炼结束。你超越了自己，里什基兹，祝贺你，冠军！
translated_text: The test is over, and you have violated the original score. "Great, champion!
secondary_translated_text: 시험이 끝났고, 당신은 원래 점수를 위반했습니다. "좋아, 챔피언아!

original_en_text: Normally I would never burden a visitor with the caravan’s worries. But! Isn’t it the custom of this kingdom to share your deepest wishes with strangers?<page>Well, my wish is for the poor lost fleas of these lands to find their way to our caravan! Stranger, could you not help us?
original_zh_text: 本不该让客人操心旅团的琐事，但据说倾诉愿望是纺络的风俗？<page>我的愿望就是迷途跳蚤能回归旅团！能请您帮助我吗？
translated_text: As a rule, it does not scare tourists with caravan problems.More! Is it not the custom of this kingdom to share the desires of the deepest heart with strangers?<page>I wish the poor wandering fleas of this land could find our caravan! Funny, can you help me?
secondary_translated_text: 규칙적으로, 그것은 캐러밴 문제와 관광객을 두려워하지 않습니다. 더!이 나라의 풍습은 낯선 사람과 가장 깊은 마음의 욕망을 나누는 것이 아닌가?<page>이 땅의 불쌍한 방랑 벼룩들이 우리 캐러밴을 발견했으면 좋겠어!재밌어, 도와줄 수 있어?

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, if your troupe is still prepared to travel, I have discovered a cave beyond the Citadel, at the edge of some ancient aqueducts. That place may well suit your needs for safety.<hpage>The trek would be long, but once reached, you will find a sandy shore, free of predators, beside a wide clear lake. It is as peaceful a place as I’ve seen throughout these fraught lands.<page>That’s it! It must be! Our destination has at last been set. Our journey can continue!<page>True friend of fleas you are, Miss Hornet. That place shall welcome us, no doubt. Will you be joining for this new journey?
original_zh_text: <hpage>要是旅团已经准备妥当，我发现圣堡外的古渠尽头有处洞穴或许适合你们。<hpage>路途虽远，但抵达后有沙滩湖泊，没有掠食者。是我在这里见过最安宁的地方。<page>就是那里了！终于找到目标了，旅团可以启程了！<page>真不愧是跳蚤挚友！那地方肯定很适合我们。愿意与我们一起同行吗？
translated_text: <hpage>Forrest, if your company is still planning a trip, I found a cave outside the castle at the end of the old canal.<hpage>The excursion can take a long time, but once you arrive, next to the large pristine lake are sandy beaches that are free of predators.<page>That's only! That's true! Finally, fate has been decided.The journey can continue!<page>Miss Bumblebee, you are a good friend of the flea.We will certainly be here to welcome you.Do you want to take part in this new journey?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>포레스트, 만약 당신 회사가 아직 여행을 계획하고 있다면, 나는 오래된 운하 끝에 성 밖에 동굴을 발견했다.<hpage>여행은 오래 걸릴 수 있지만 일단 도착하면 큰 깨끗한 호수 옆에는 포식자가없는 모래 해변이 있습니다.<page>그게 다야!그래요!드디어 운명이 결정되었으니, 여행은 계속될 수 있다!<page>버블비 양, 당신은 벼룩의 좋은 친구입니다. 우리는 확실히 당신을 환영하기 위해 여기에있을 것입니다. 이 새로운 여행에 참여하고 싶습니까?

original_en_text: My treasured guest... what need have I of rosaries, now that all is ending? Please, use my spa-carriage, free of charge! Dear Kratt is only too happy to provide!
original_zh_text: 尊贵的客人……如今万物都将终结，我还要念珠何用？请随意使用温泉车厢吧，分文不取！亲爱的克拉特乐意为您效劳！
translated_text: Dear guest, now that it 's all over, what should I do? Use the car spa for free. Sher Cratt is happy to serve you!
secondary_translated_text: 손님, 이제 다 끝났으니 어떻게 해야 하나요?자동차 스파를 무료로 이용하세요. Sher Cratt 는 당신을 위해 기꺼이 봉사합니다!

original_en_text: So many lost fleas have made it here... Truly, I’d never dared to hope we could gather such a grand company!<page>But still there may be more out there in this wide world... What a wonder it would be if they too found their way to our fresh paradise!
original_zh_text: 这么多迷途同胞都回来了……真是做梦都不敢想！<page>但或许还有其他流落者……要是他们也能找到这新乐园该多好！
translated_text: Many lost fleas come here. I did not expect such a large team to come together!<page>But in this great world there can be more. How wonderful it would be if they found a way to our new paradise!
secondary_translated_text: 많은 잃어버린 벼룩들이 이곳으로 온다.이렇게 큰 팀이 모일 줄은 몰랐어요!<page>그러나 이 위대한 세상에는 더 많은 것이 있을 수 있다.그들이 우리의 새 낙원으로 가는 길을 발견한다면 얼마나 기뻤을지!

original_en_text: Auugghhh... the pain! Such fury, over a mistake! Poor little Kratt did not mean to steal a look!<page>This old carriage needs constant care. I was only doing repairs! I had no intent to intrude! And I barely saw a thing!<hpage>Lie no more to me, flea, and be grateful you still live. Know that if you peer again, you will die.<page>Of course! Kratt would never! Let’s consider the matter forgotten, and you shall forever be my treasured guest!
original_zh_text: 啊嗷！好痛！发这么大火干嘛！克拉特不是故意偷看的！<page>车厢需要养护，我只是在修补！这是无心之过，而且我基本什么也没看见！<hpage>不必编故事了，这次没死算你走运。下次再偷看，你必死无疑。<page>不敢不敢！这事就这么翻篇吧！您永远是贵宾！
translated_text: If she were against evil, the poor cat would not have broken!<page>This car needs constant maintenance.They just fix! I didn't want to disturb you! I saw almost nothing!<hpage>Don't lie, Blokha, thank you for keeping me alive. If I see you again, I'll die.<page>Yes, no! It can be twisted. You are always my guest!
secondary_translated_text: 만약 그녀가 악에 반대했다면, 불쌍한 고양이는 깨지지 않았을 것이다!<page>이 차는 계속 유지보수가 필요해요. 그들은 그냥 고쳐요!난 당신을 방해하고 싶지 않았어!나는 거의 아무것도 보지 못했다!<hpage>거짓말하지 마 블로카 날 살아있게 해줘서 고마워너만 다시 만나면 죽을 거야.<page>그래, 안돼!그것은 비틀릴 수 있습니다.당신은 항상 내 손님입니다!

original_en_text: Dodeshna! Miss Hornet, is it? Welcome to our new camp! The travelling is done, and so we drink! <page>Is no better way to revive spirit than to drink the famous Flea Brew! I’m have just finished a batch, bubbling and warm!<page>You are friend, finder of lost, little fleas, hmm? Here, take bottle of Flea Brew with you! Will keep you warm while you travel.<page>I am always brewing here, so have no fear to drink plenty, and return whenever you are wanting more!
original_zh_text: 多德什纳！是大黄蜂小姐吗？欢迎来新营地！旅途结束，该喝点啦！<page>来点提神的跳蚤秘酿！我刚熬好一锅，热乎着呢！<page>是你帮忙找回流落在外的同胞对吧？那这瓶药酿送你！路上暖暖身子。<page>我整天都在熬制药酿，喝完了随时来取！
translated_text: Д о д е з н е р! She is Miss Hornett. Welcome to our new camp! The journey is over, let 's drink!<page>It is impossible to be reborn without drinking the famous Nami beer! I just finished a party, spicy and fragrant!<page>You are a friend and a seeker of lost fleas. - Give me a beer, please. It will keep you warm while you travel.<page>I always drink here, so drink a lot and come back when you want to see more!
secondary_translated_text: 도데즈네르!그녀는 미스 호넷입니다.우리의 새로운 캠프에 오신 것을 환영합니다!여행이 끝났으니, 술 한잔 하자!<page>유명한 나미맥주를 마시지 않으면 다시 태어날 수 없다!나는 방금 파티를 마쳤고, 매운 향기!<page>당신은 친구이자 잃어버린 벼룩을 찾는 사람입니다. - 맥주 한 잔 주세요.그것은 당신이 여행하는 동안 따뜻하게 유지합니다.<page>나는 항상 여기에서 술을 마시고, 그래서 당신은 더 많은 것을보고 싶을 때 다시 많이 마시기 바랍니다!

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? If service is you here seeking, none is left for me to provide. All fleas are here, collected close.<page>Much better it is now for fleas to be together, ready to face whatever end will come.
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？如果是要找我帮忙，那我帮不了什么了，跳蚤们都回来了。<page>现在大家都聚在一起，只剩等待最后的终局了。
translated_text: If you stay, are insects not fleas? If you come to the service, I can do nothing. All fleas are here, and they are well collected.<page>Everything is much better now that the fleas have gathered and are ready to give results.
secondary_translated_text: 만약 당신이 머물면, 곤충은 벼룩이 아니죠?봉사하러 오시면 제가 할 수 없습니다.모든 벼룩이 여기에 있고 잘 수집됩니다.<page>벼룩이 모이고 결과를 제공 할 준비가되어 있기 때문에 모든 것이 훨씬 좋아졌습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Of your many companions, I had little worry you would survive to find this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Mine is to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together and grow them strong.<hpage>If you have sensed the locations of other lost fleas, would you share them with me? I may be able to send them safe to the caravan.<page>The locations! For price they could be shared, but you hold no map to mark! If learnings are wanted, a map must be owned. Until then, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。就知道你能活着找到这里。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<hpage>若是探知迷途跳蚤下落，就告诉我，或许能送他们归队。<page>位置，拿念珠换！但你连地图都没有！想要交易，先弄张地图来！
translated_text: <hpage>Toast to the flies.Among his many companions I am not afraid that he will survive to find this caravan.<hpage>Tell me what tasks are required to remove you from your peers in such a frightening way.<page>Follow my footprints, smells and sharp feelings.Find our fleas friend, the youngest fleas, and pick them up to make them stronger.<hpage>If you knew where the chip was, would you share it with me? "Maybe we can safely deliver them to the caravan.<page>Mesto! As for the price, you can share. No paper stamp! If you want to know, you need a map. At the moment we can do nothing.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>파리에 건배. 그의 많은 동반자들 중에서 나는 그가 살아남아 이 캐러밴을 찾을 수 있다는 것을 두려워하지 않는다.<hpage>그런 무서운 방식으로 동료들로부터 당신을 제거하기 위해 필요한 작업은 무엇입니까?<page>내 발자국, 냄새와 날카로운 감정을 따르십시오. 우리의 벼룩 친구, 가장 어린 벼룩을 찾아서 그들을 더 강하게 만들기 위해 그들을 집어 들어요.<hpage>칩이 어디에 있는지 알았다면 나랑 공유해줄래? "아마도 무사히 카라반으로 보낼 수 있을 것 같다.<page>메스토!가격에 관해서는, 당신은 공유 할 수 있습니다.종이 스탬프 없음!알고 싶다면 지도가 필요하다.현재 우리는 아무것도 할 수 없다.

original_en_text: Bug. World is ending. Nothing left but to test ourselves.<page>This trial is Flea Dodge. Stay upon the platforms. Avoid attacks. Longer stay gives bigger score.<page>To score most is to become champion. This is only thing left to strive for.
original_zh_text: 虫子，世界就要毁灭，除了试炼也没别的事可做。<page>这试炼是跳蚤溜溜。站住平台，躲开攻击。坚持越久分越高。<page>分最高的就是冠军，而夺冠是最后的意义。
translated_text: The world is ruined. You have no choice but to prove it to yourself.<page>This test is designed to prevent fleas.Remains on the platform, avoids attack.The longer you stay, the higher your score.<page>The most important thing is to be a champion, that is the only thing we have to fight for.
secondary_translated_text: 세상은 망가져 있다.당신은 그것을 스스로에게 증명하는 것 외에는 선택의 여지가 없습니다.<page>이 테스트는 벼룩을 방지하기 위해 설계되었습니다. 플랫폼에 머물러 있으면 공격을 피할 수 있습니다. 오래 머물수록 점수가 높아집니다.<page>가장 중요한 것은 챔피언이 되는 것이고, 그것이 우리가 싸워야 할 유일한 것이다. "

original_en_text: Bug, you are champion of Flea Dodge, but trial is still open to you. Can you defeat your own score?
original_zh_text: 虫子，跳蚤溜溜的冠军归你了。但挑战还将继续，你能突破自己的成绩吗？
translated_text: Bug, you're the Dodgers champion, Nomi, but the process is still open for you. Can you score your own score?
secondary_translated_text: 버그, 넌 다저스 챔피언이야, 노미, 하지만 그 과정은 여전히 열려 있어.자신의 점수를 득점할 수 있나요?

original_en_text: So bug not flea, you return. World is ruined. Final end comes soon, says Fleamaster.<hpage>This land is gravely wounded, but death need not follow. It is now my task to free this kingdom from its dark fall.<page>Grrr... such words are just fancy. Nothing left now, except to protect what little we have.
original_zh_text: 外族虫，你回来了。首领说，世界要完蛋了。<hpage>纺络遭受重创，但未必没有转机。我会帮王国摆脱黑暗。<page>吼……漂亮话谁都会说，现在我们也只能死守这点家当了。
translated_text: The worms are back, not fleas, and the world will be destroyed, according to Flemmer, the final results will be published soon.<hpage>The Earth was badly wounded, but death did not necessarily follow.Now my mission is to free this kingdom from the collapse of darkness.<page>Ugh, uh, uh... This is very flake. "We have nothing but to protect the little things we have.
secondary_translated_text: 벌레가 돌아왔고 벼룩이 아니라 세계가 파괴될 것이며, 플레머에 따르면 최종 결과는 곧 발표될 것입니다.<hpage>지구는 심하게 상처를 입었지만 죽음은 반드시 따르지 않았다. 이제 내 임무는 어둠의 붕괴에서이 왕국을 해방시키는 것입니다.<page>어, 어, 어..이것은 매우 얇다. "우리는 우리가 가진 작은 것들을 보호하는 것 외에는 아무것도 없다.

original_en_text: Come, you revellers! Try the Flea Juggle game! Keep striking fleas upwards. Keep them airborne for as long as possible!
original_zh_text: 来啊狂欢者！玩跳蚤耍耍！把跳蚤打飞，滞空越久越好！
translated_text: Come on, Fans! Try juggling with fleas! The fight against fleas continues. Stay in the air for as long as possible.
secondary_translated_text: 어서 가자, 팬들!벼룩을 가지고 저글링을 시도해 보세요!벼룩과의 싸움은 계속되고 있다.가능한 한 오랫동안 공중에 머물러 있으십시오.

original_en_text: <hpage>I have seen a place, Fleamaster, a cave beyond the Citadel, at the edge of some ancient ducts. That place may well suit your needs for safety.<hpage>The trek would be long, but once reached, you will find a sandy shore, free of predators, beside a wide clear lake. It is as peaceful a place as I’ve seen throughout these fraught lands.<page>That’s it! It must be! Our destination has been set. Our journey can continue!<page>True friend of fleas you are, Miss Hornet. That place shall welcome us, no doubt. Will you be joining the caravan on this journey?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我见过一处地方，在圣堡外的古渠尽头，或许符合你们的需求。<hpage>路途虽远，但抵达后有沙滩湖泊，没有掠食者。是我在这里见过最安宁的地方。<page>就是那里了！目标已定，旅团可以启程了！<page>真不愧是跳蚤挚友！那地方肯定很适合我们。愿意与我们一起同行吗？
translated_text: <hpage>I saw a place called the Flammaster, a cave behind the castle, at the end of the old pipe.<hpage>The excursion can take a long time, but once you arrive, next to the large pristine lake are sandy beaches that are free of predators.<page>That's only! That's true! Fate is decided, the journey can go on!<page>Miss Bumblebee, you are a good friend of the flea. We will certainly be here to welcome you. Want to participate in this day?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 성 뒤의 동굴인 플라임마스터라고 불리는 곳을 보았습니다. 오래된 파이프의 끝에서.<hpage>여행은 오래 걸릴 수 있지만 일단 도착하면 큰 깨끗한 호수 옆에는 포식자가없는 모래 해변이 있습니다.<page>그게 다야!그래요!운명은 결정되었고, 여행은 계속될 수 있습니다!<page>버블비 양, 넌 벼룩의 좋은 친구야.우리는 확실히 당신을 환영하기 위해 여기에있을 것입니다.이 날에 참여하고 싶으십니까?

original_en_text: All are here now, bug not flea. For your seeking, ours is a caravan full.<page>Much better it is now for fleas to be together, ready to face whatever end will come.
original_zh_text: 跳蚤全齐了，外族虫。托你的福，旅团满员了。<page>世界就要完蛋了，抱团总比落单好。
translated_text: All here Insects - not fleas For your search our fleet is full.<page>Everything is much better now that the fleas have gathered and are ready to give results.
secondary_translated_text: 여기에 모든 곤충 - 벼룩이 아닙니다. 귀하의 검색을 위해 우리의 함대가 가득 차 있습니다.<page>벼룩이 모이고 결과를 제공 할 준비가되어 있기 때문에 모든 것이 훨씬 좋아졌습니다.

original_en_text: Ooh, heh heh heh! What a turn, for dear Kratt to be strung up in such a dank little cave!<hpage>Cursed threads stretch throughout this land, set to ensnare the unwary. You seem no worse for it now, at least.<hpage>That metal carriage... It is yours, I assume?<page>Ooh, yes, yes! I’m setting out to join the nearest flea caravan, aren’t I? Safety in numbers, yes? I’ve had more than enough of venturing alone.<page>And you... I trust I will see you there? My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly share with you when next we meet! Heh heh!
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿！没想到克拉特会在这阴暗的洞窟里翻船！<hpage>丝咒遍地，一不留神被缠住。你看起来倒是不担心？<hpage>那金属车厢……是你的吧？<page>对对！我正要投奔跳蚤旅团呢！独行太危险了！<page>你……也会去旅团吧？那我们旅团再见，车厢里有惊喜等着你哟！
translated_text: Ah, eh! Dear Crater, it is good to play in such a wet cave!<hpage>A curse thread runs down the ground and is designed to stop the careless. At least for the moment, it doesn't look so bad.<hpage>This metal machine, I think, is yours.<page>¡Oh yeah, yeah! I recently joined the fleet of fleas, right? Really? Safety, right? I 'm tired of risking alone.<page>And then you ... Do you think we could meet there? The car hides a secret. I 'd like to share it with you the next time we see them. !
secondary_translated_text: 아, 어!친애하는 크레이터, 이렇게 젖은 동굴에서 놀 수 있어서 좋다!<hpage>저주의 실은 바닥을 따라 흘러내리고 부주의한 사람들을 막기 위해 설계되었습니다.적어도 당분간은 그렇게 나쁘지 않아 보인다.<hpage>이 금속 기계는, 내 생각엔, 너의 것이다.<page>오, 그래, 그래!제가 최근에 벼룩함대에 합류했어요, 그렇죠?진짜?안전이죠, 그렇죠?나는 혼자 위험을 감수하는 것에 지쳤다.<page>And then you ...우리가 거기서 만날 수 있다고 생각하니?자동차는 비밀을 숨기고 있다.다음에 그들을 볼 때 당신과 공유하고 싶습니다. !

original_en_text: And now, with our caravan bursting, we’ve rested here long enough. We fleas must head higher!<page>Oh, but stranger, how remiss of me! First, please, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing it is! All of us together.<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan prepares to depart toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 如今旅团拥挤不堪，我们也休整已久。跳蚤们必须向更高处进发！<page>哎呀，我真是失礼！还没请教您的姓名？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴见你和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<page>哈哈！能与同胞团聚，还结交了新朋友，真是太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: The fleet was already full, so I could rest here. The chips should rise. '<page>I wonder how lazy I am! First of all, what do you call it?<hpage>"Call us Bumblebee, Master Frey! " It 's nice to see that your bad friends are safe in your fleet.Traveling alone is a very dangerous country.<page>They were going! In other words, I cannot believe it! How beautiful it is! We're all together. "<page>My dear friends, Miss Bumblebee, our train is going into a great swamp and height.
secondary_translated_text: 함대가 이미 꽉 차서 나는 여기서 휴식을 취할 수 있었다.칩이 올라야 한다. '<page>내가 얼마나 게으른지 궁금하다!우선, 당신은 그것을 뭐라고 부르는가?<hpage>"불블비라고 부르세요, 프레이 마스터! "당신의 나쁜 친구가 당신의 함대에 안전하게 있다는 것을 보는 것은 좋은 일입니다. 혼자 여행하는 것은 매우 위험한 나라입니다.<page>그들이 가고 있었다!다른 말로하면, 나는 그것을 믿을 수 없다!얼마나 아름다운지!우리는 모두 함께 있다. "<page>친애하는 친구들, 험블비 양, 우리 열차는 큰 늪과 높이로 진입하고 있습니다.

original_en_text: I have marked your map, bug. See the learnings of fleas lost across the lands.<page>If you are as brave as told by fellow fleas, seek them. Save them. For a caravan whole.
original_zh_text: 外族虫，地图标好了。上面有流落同胞的位置。<page>如果你真如传言般勇敢，就去救他们吧。凑满我们的旅团。
translated_text: I've crossed your map, bob. I know the fleas have disappeared everywhere.<page>If you 're brave, as your fleas colleagues say, find them. "Everyone in the team.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 네 지도를 가로질렀어, 밥.나는 벼룩이 곳곳에서 사라졌다는 것을 안다.<page>당신이 용감하다면, 벼룩 동료들이 말하는 것처럼, 그들을 찾으십시오. "팀에 있는 모든 사람들.

original_en_text: You are welcome here always, Miss Hornet, true friend of fleas!<page>Stay as long as you care. Rest and restore. We many fleas do so enjoy your company.
original_zh_text: 随时欢迎您回来，跳蚤的挚友！<page>想留多久都可以。好好休息，我们都喜欢与您相伴。
translated_text: You are always happy, Miss Bumblebee, my friend of the fleas!<page>Stay there as long as you take care of yourself.Rest and recovery.Many fleas love their company.
secondary_translated_text: 당신은 항상 행복해요, 버블비 양, 벼룩의 나의 친구!<page>당신이 자신을 돌보는 한 거기에 머물러 있습니다. 휴식과 회복. 많은 벼룩은 그들의 회사를 사랑합니다.

original_en_text: Dear friend of fleas, please! If ever you come upon a cave both wide and free, return with haste and tell us.<page>The fleas are oh so eager to journey, and I’m eager to see them to a destination safe!
original_zh_text: 跳蚤之友啊！如果发现宽敞安全的洞穴，请速来告知！<page>大伙迫不及待地要启程，我也盼着带他们去安全的归宿！
translated_text: Flowers, please. If you come across a big empty cave, tell me again.<page>The bugs are eager to travel and want to see you arrive safely at your destination!
secondary_translated_text: 꽃을 주세요.빈 동굴을 만나면 다시 말해줘.<page>벌레들은 여행하기를 열망하며 목적지에 안전하게 도착하는 것을보고 싶어합니다!

original_en_text: <hpage>That is well, Fleamaster. My travels through this land have been far and deep, and yet at almost every reach I met the friendly, inquisitive presence of your kind.<hpage>You fleas have an uncommon desire for adventure which I find admirable, even if it is seldom matched by capability.<hpage>Though I am long accustomed to travelling alone, following your journey, and sharing some part in its progress has been a warm thing.<page>And so happy have you made we fleas! Even as the darkness comes to claim us, we would be honoured to bestow one final gift, a treasure from fleakind’s glorious past.<page>May it mark you in Pharloom’s final moment as a friend to us all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>那就好，我走遍纺络，处处都能遇见你们好奇的同胞。<hpage>你们对冒险的热忱令我钦佩，虽然常常力有不逮。<hpage>我素来喜好独行，但与你们相遇确是暖心之事。见你们团聚也很是欣慰。<page>哈哈！我们跳蚤也欢喜得很！因此在这黑暗将至的时刻，请让我为您送上最后的赠礼，这是跳蚤一族昔日的珍宝。<page>愿它永远守护在您身边，铭记您为我族挚友。
translated_text: <hpage>I have walked far and deep on this earth, and wherever I go, I find good and curious people like you.<hpage>Fleas have an unusual appetite for adventure, and their skills rarely match, but it 's amazing.<hpage>I 've long been used to traveling alone, but I 'm happy to follow your journey and share my progress.<page>I 'm glad you made me fly! Even when darkness falls upon us, we are honored to offer you a final gift, a treasure from a flea 's glorious past.<page>We have spent the last few days as friends. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 이 지구를 깊숙이 걸어왔고, 어디를 가든, 너 같은 선하고 호기심 많은 사람들을 찾는다.<hpage>벼룩은 모험에 대한 특이한 식욕을 가지고 있으며, 그들의 기술은 거의 일치하지 않지만 놀랍습니다.<hpage>나는 오랫동안 혼자 여행하는 데 익숙해졌지만, 나는 당신의 여행을 따르고 나의 진전을 공유하게되어 기쁩니다.<page>날 날 날게 해줘서 다행이야!어둠이 우리에게 닥칠 때에도, 벼룩의 영광스러운 과거로부터의 보물을 마지막 선물로 드릴 수 있게 되어 영광입니다.<page>우리는 지난 며칠을 친구로 보냈습니다. "

original_en_text: You are have luck, Miss Hornet, to lack the fur of we fleas. All the blowy sand of that place is getting very stuck inside!
original_zh_text: 你真幸运，大黄蜂小姐。不像我们长着毛，这破地方的沙子全钻进了毛里！
translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, you're lucky you don't have flea hair. All the dust in this place is laid.
secondary_translated_text: 버블비 양, 벼룩 털이 없어서 다행이야.이곳의 먼지는 모두 다 깔려 있다.

original_en_text: The beasts here are... much frightful, hm? Scary?<page>But if give them space, they leave alone. You respect beast, beast respect you.
original_zh_text: 这里的野兽……挺吓人？<page>保持距离就没事。你对它们敬而远之，它们也一样。
translated_text: The beast is here, it 's horrible, isn't it? Isn't that so? The terrorists?<page>If you give them space, they will come out on their own. You are the beast and the beast is you.
secondary_translated_text: 짐승이 여기 있잖아, 끔찍해, 그렇지?그렇죠?테러리스트들은?<page>만약 당신이 그들에게 공간을 주면, 그들은 스스로 나올 것이다.당신은 짐승이고 짐승은 당신입니다.

original_en_text: Grand Champion... bug called Hornet. Will you once again challenge the Flea Dodge trial?
original_zh_text: 名为大黄蜂的虫……总冠军。你要再次挑战跳蚤溜溜吗？
translated_text: In the tournament there was an insect called the "shershes ". Want to experience the mysterious process of the Blow Road again?
secondary_translated_text: 토너먼트에는 "shershes" 라고 불리는 곤충이 있었습니다.다시 한번 불길의 신비한 과정을 경험하고 싶으십니까?

original_en_text: Fierce one, my dear Grand Champion! Will you dance and fly with us above the water?
original_zh_text: 小辣椒，亲爱的总冠军！和我们一起在水面上共舞吧！
translated_text: Dear champions, dear champions! Do you want to dance with us or fly over the water?
secondary_translated_text: 친애하는 챔피언 여러분, 친애하는 챔피언 여러분!우리랑 춤추고 싶니, 아니면 물 위로 날고 싶니?

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I bring a delivery, supplies from the couriers of Bellhart to aid your settlement.<page>Ahh, such a kindly gesture adds much warmth to our celebration!<page>These poor little fleas will never grow to roam the world as we have, so let us give them what happiness we can before the end.
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤首领，我带来了钟心镇的支援物资。<page>啊，这份善意让庆典更添暖意！<page>这些可怜的小跳蚤注定无法像我们一样游历世界，就让我们在终结前尽力给予他们欢愉吧。
translated_text: <hpage>Flightmaster, I brought a package of supplies from Envoy Belhart to help you prepare.<page>Oh, such a heartfelt gesture adds so much warmth to our celebration!<page>Let 's do everything in our power to make them happy before it 's all over, because this poor flea won't grow up and wander the world like we do.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>비행장님, 준비할 수 있도록 벨하트 대사로부터 물품 한 팩을 가져왔습니다<page>오, 그러한 진심 어린 제스처는 우리의 축하 행사에 너무 많은 따뜻함을 더해 줍니다!<page>모든 것이 끝나기 전에 그들을 행복하게 해 줄 수 있는 모든 것을 다 하자. 이 불쌍한 벼룩은 우리처럼 자라서 세상을 돌아다니지 않을 것이기 때문이다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, sir flea. I see you were able to unite safely with this caravan.<page>Oh yes! Heh heh. All thanks to you! Dear, sweet you! Pray tell, what does one call such a delicate beauty? Surely yours is a name most sweet and soothing. Are you Fairgrace? Or Nectarsweet?<hpage>I am Hornet, sir. Address me by that name or not at all.<page>Gradak! Of course. Of course. My dear, Hornet! I shall let you in on my little secret. My carriage doubles as a soothing spa, you see. It’s most ingenious.<page>The water inside is piping hot, and purer than a psalm! Heh heh! I’d gladly let you soak inside, for a modest fee!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，跳蚤先生。看来你顺利加入旅团了。<page>是啊！嘿嘿，全托你的福！敢问美女芳名？定是甜美如"香露仙子"？<hpage>我名为大黄蜂，要么称我本名，要么闭嘴。<page>咳！是是是！亲爱的大黄蜂小姐！嘿嘿，透露个小秘密——其实我的车厢兼作温泉疗愈所！<page>水温滚烫，而且比圣诗还纯净！付点小钱就能泡个痛快！
translated_text: <hpage>Fly again. You can safely take part in this escort.<page>Oh! Oh! Ah, yes! Oh, thanks, thanks! Dear, dear, what is the name of this beautiful woman? His name is the sweetest and most comforting name.Are you a precious grace? Nectalone?<hpage>Do you call them by their names or do you not call them at all?<page>"Yes, of course, my dear Bumblebee. Let me tell you my little secret: my car becomes a healing spa, and it 's the smartest.<page>The water in it is purer than poetry. !¡I am happy to use it, it is not expensive!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>다시 날아가다.이 에스코트에 안전하게 참여할 수 있습니다.<page>오! 오!오! 오!아, 네!오, 감사합니다, 감사합니다! "여보여, 이 아름다운 여자의 이름은 무엇입니까? "그의 이름은 가장 달콤하고 위로가 되는 이름입니다. 당신은 소중한 은혜입니까?넥탈론?<hpage>당신은 그들을 그들의 이름으로 부르는가, 아니면 전혀 부르지 않는가?<page>"네, 물론이죠, 친애하는 버블비야.내 작은 비밀을 알려드리겠습니다. 내 차는 치유 스파가 되었고, 가장 똑똑한 차입니다.<page>그 안에 있는 물은 시보다 순수하다. !¡나는 그것을 사용하는 것을 기쁘게 생각합니다, 그것은 비싸지 않습니다!

original_en_text: Mamashka. The trial begins. Flea Dodge!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡。跳蚤溜溜，试炼开始！
translated_text: Mommy, the process has begun. - Nomi Dodge is!
secondary_translated_text: "엄마, 그 과정이 시작되었습니다. - Nomi Dodge 는!

original_en_text: <hpage>I saw your plea posted at Bellhart, sir flea, and accept your request.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我在钟心镇看到了你的祈愿，跳蚤先生，我接受。
translated_text: <hpage>I have seen your address to Berhart and have accepted it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 버하트에게 보낸 당신의 주소를 보았고 그것을 받아들였다.

original_en_text: The dirge I sing is for the end of our old lives...<page>Here at the end of times, our paradise crumbles beneath us. Flea and friend alike, all will soon be consumed...
original_zh_text: 我唱这首哀歌，祭奠旧日终结……<page>末日将至，乐园崩塌。跳蚤与挚友，终将湮灭……
translated_text: The elegy I sing is the end of our old life.<page>At the end of the world, the sky will fall on us. Chip is like a friend and everything will be consumed quickly.
secondary_translated_text: 내가 노래하는 찬송가는 우리의 옛 삶의 끝이다.<page>세상이 끝날 때, 하늘이 우리에게 떨어질 것입니다.칩은 친구와 같고 모든 것이 빨리 소비됩니다.

original_en_text: Ahh, look! The poor fleas are starting to make their way to us! What a precious thing!<page>We have much to thank you for already! And I hope we will have even more to be thankful for very soon! Please, keep seeking out our lost fellows!
original_zh_text: 快看！迷途的同胞开始回归了！多么珍贵的情谊！<page>我们对您感激不尽！还请您继续帮忙寻找失散的同胞！
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! Look at me! Poor fleas are approaching! What precious thing!<page>We already have so much to be thankful for! First of all, I would like to thank you. Continue searching for your lost friends!
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!나를 봐!불쌍한 벼룩들이 다가오고 있다!얼마나 소중한 물건인가!<page>우리는 이미 감사해야 할 것이 너무 많습니다!우선, 저는 여러분께 감사드리고 싶습니다.잃어버린 친구들을 찾아라!

original_en_text: Grrr.. bug, not flea. Why you must bother me? This spot is mine, fair fought and earned.<hpage>I won’t stay long, madam. Nor would I contest your right to this cave. I only ask what task causes you to perch alone atop these dank ducts?<page>Task? Mine is a work most important, but not for talking of here, where danger waits close. Soon, I depart to seek fleas, my fellows, and join them.<page>Now... Grrr. You leave me! I go soon to seek other fleas. A flea alone is good, but fleas together is best! Till then, rest I need! Off, bug!
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，干嘛烦我？这地盘是我打下来的！<hpage>我无意久留，跳蚤，也不打算抢你山洞。就是好奇你独自在这做什么？<hpage>做什么？当然是重要的事，但没空多说，附近有危险。我马上就要离开，去找我的同胞。<page>唔……你走吧！跳蚤还是聚在一起更合适，我待会就去找他们！现在要先休息！
translated_text: The Gollum. These are insects, not fleas. Why are you interrupting? It's my fair game to win.<hpage>- "It won't be long, lady. I doubt your right to this cave. I want to be alone: What's the mission of being alone in this wet tube?<page>What is a mission? My job is one of the most important, but instead of talking about it here, the danger is here. Immediately I began to look for my fellow blockers and joined them.<page>Currently, this is... Oh ~! "Leave him in the world! I will have another flower. Chips are great, but together the chips are the best! In the meantime, you should rest! Closed the bug.
secondary_translated_text: 골럼 The Gollum이것은 벼룩이 아니라 곤충이다.왜 방해하는 거야?이기는 게 내 공정한 경기야.<hpage>- "오래도 안되요, 아가씨.이 동굴에 대한 당신의 권리를 의심합니다.나는 혼자 있고 싶다 : 이 젖은 튜브에서 혼자있는 임무는 무엇입니까?<page>미션이란 무엇입니까?내 직업은 가장 중요한 것 중 하나지만, 여기서 그것에 대해 이야기하는 대신, 위험은 여기에 있습니다.즉시 나는 동료 차단자들을 찾기 시작했고 그들과 합류했습니다.<page>현재, 이것은 ...오 ~! "그를 세상에 내버려 두세요!나는 또 다른 꽃을 가질 것이다.칩은 훌륭하지만 함께 칩은 최고입니다!그 동안, 당신은 휴식을 취해야합니다!버그를 닫았습니다.

original_en_text: Dear friend... Miss Hornet! Forgive us, but we beg one more favour from you. Will you accompany us in our final act...?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂女士！请原谅，但我们恳求您最后再帮一次忙。您可愿陪我们完成旅途的终幕……？
translated_text: Dear friends, Miss Hornett. Sorry, but I'd like another one. Want to finish the last show?
secondary_translated_text: 친애하는 친구들, 미스 호넷.죄송하지만, 다른 걸로 주세요.마지막 쇼를 끝내고 싶으세요?

original_en_text: It is time for the Festival of the Flea! One last, grand celebration before the black quakes pull us all down into the darkness!<page>Rouse yourself fleas, one last time! Let the games begin!
original_zh_text: 跳蚤庆典就要开始了！在黑暗将我们拖入深渊前，最后一场盛大狂欢！<page>跳蚤们，最后一次振作起来！游戏开始！
translated_text: It was Frey 's day! The last mass celebration before the Great Earthquake has plunged us into darkness!<page>Finally, take the fluids yourself! Let 's start with the game lessons.
secondary_translated_text: 오늘은 프레이의 날!대지진이 일어나기 전의 마지막 대규모 축제가 우리를 어둠 속으로 몰아 넣었습니다!<page>마지막으로, 스스로 유체를 가져가십시오!게임 수업부터 시작하겠습니다.

original_en_text: Ahhh! Alas. Then we shall pray your own path remains safe.<page>And now, our new home is calling. We venture again!<hpage>Good travels, Fleamaster. May your journey ahead be safe and smooth.
original_zh_text: 啊哈哈，唉，那就祝您前路平安。<page>好了，新家在召唤，我们又要启程了！<hpage>一路顺风，跳蚤首领。
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! - ¡Oh, yeah! We are praying that your journey is safe.<page>It 's called a new home, you 're at risk again!<hpage>Have a good trip, Freemaster. May your future journey be safe and successful.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!오, 네! - 오, 그래!여러분의 여행이 안전하시길 기도합니다.<page>그것은 새로운 집이라고 불리는데, 당신은 다시 위험에 처해 있습니다!<hpage>좋은 여행 되세요, 프리마스터.미래의 여행이 안전하고 성공적이길 바랍니다.

original_en_text: But stranger! While you’re with us, you must hear of the miracle that has occurred!<page>See all these fleas gathered to our troupe? It seems so many! An impossible number, yet here they are, safely joined together. Our most cherished wishes answered!<hpage>If you were seeking fleas to join your caravan, I have found and freed many throughout my travels.<page>Oh! Can it be? Then you here are our saviour, our dear fleafriend! For all have made their way right, straight to us!<page>And now, with our caravan full to bursting, we’ve rested long enough. We fleas must head higher!<page>Oh, but saviour, how remiss of me! First, please tell, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing it is! All of us together.<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan prepares to depart toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 这位朋友！既然与我们同行，您可要听听旅团发生的奇迹！<page>看见归队的跳蚤们了吗？数量超乎想象！原以为这不可能，但它们已然齐聚于此。我们的祈愿实现了！<hpage>如果你是在寻找跳蚤，我在旅途中解救了许多。<page>噢！难道是您？那您便是我们的救星了，亲爱的跳蚤挚友！所有伙伴都因您重聚于此！<page>如今商队拥挤不堪，休整也已足够久。跳蚤们必须向更高处进发！<page>噢，救星阁下，原谅我失礼了！请问该如何称呼您？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴你能和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<page>哈哈！能与同胞团聚，还结交了新朋友，真是太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: But a foreigner! When you are with us, you can hear the miracles that have already happened!<page>Have you ever seen the fleas that are gathering in our theater? Seems like there are so many! It 's an impossible number, but it 's combined with safety. My greatest wish has come true!<hpage>If you 're looking for fleas to join your fleet, I 've found and released a lot of fleas during my trip.<page>Oh my god! Are you all right? You are our Savior, our dear friend from the fleas, for they have all come to me.<page>The team is already full, and she has enough rest. The chips should rise. '<page>"Savior, how lazy I am! First, tell me, what to call it? "<hpage>"Call us Bumblebee, Master Frey! " It 's nice to see that your bad friends are safe in your fleet.Traveling alone is a very dangerous country.<page>They were going! In other words, I cannot believe it! How beautiful it is! We're all together. "<page>My dear friends, Miss Bumblebee, our train is going into a great swamp and height.
secondary_translated_text: 하지만 외국인!당신이 우리와 함께 있을 때, 당신은 이미 일어난 기적을 들을 수 있습니다!<page>우리 극장에 모이는 벼룩을 본 적 있나요?너무 많은 것 같아!불가능한 숫자이지만 안전과 결합되어 있다.나의 가장 큰 소원이 이루어졌다!<hpage>당신이 당신의 함대에 합류 할 벼룩을 찾고 있다면, 나는 여행 중에 많은 벼룩을 발견하고 방출했습니다.<page>오, 세상에!괜찮아?당신은 우리의 구세주이며 벼룩으로부터 우리의 사랑하는 친구입니다. 그들은 모두 내게로 왔기 때문입니다.<page>팀은 이미 꽉 차서 그녀는 충분한 휴식을 취했다.칩이 올라야 한다. '<page>"구주여, 내가 얼마나 게으른가!먼저, 말해봐, 뭐라고 부를래? "<hpage>"불블비라고 부르세요, 프레이 마스터! "당신의 나쁜 친구가 당신의 함대에 안전하게 있다는 것을 보는 것은 좋은 일입니다. 혼자 여행하는 것은 매우 위험한 나라입니다.<page>그들이 가고 있었다!다른 말로하면, 나는 그것을 믿을 수 없다!얼마나 아름다운지!우리는 모두 함께 있다. "<page>친애하는 친구들, 험블비 양, 우리 열차는 큰 늪과 높이로 진입하고 있습니다.

original_en_text: Welcome back, my fierce one. Dodeshna! Heh heh! I’m sure your travels have wearied you.<page>Oh no, I wouldn’t dare take rosaries from such a treasured guest! Please, use my spa-carriage, free of charge! Dear Kratt is only too happy to provide!
original_zh_text: 欢迎回来小辣椒！嘿嘿，旅途累了吧？<page>哦不，我哪敢收您钱！随便泡！克拉特乐意为您效劳！
translated_text: Welcome home, my good friend, Doshner! What is it? ! Your trip will be very boring.<page>Oh, I would not have dared to bring the Rosary such a precious guest! Use the car spa for free. Sher Cratt is happy to serve you!
secondary_translated_text: 집에 오신 것을 환영합니다, 나의 좋은 친구, 도슈너!뭐야? !당신의 여행은 매우 지루할 것입니다.<page>오, 나는 감히 이렇게 소중한 손님을 위해 로자리를 가져오지 않았을 것이다!자동차 스파를 무료로 이용하세요. Sher Cratt 는 당신을 위해 기꺼이 봉사합니다!

original_en_text: Miss Hornet! You have proven yourself the champion at each of our flea games!<page>I am confident now that the grand champion of our festival has emerged. It is none other than yourself, of course!<page>And thusly, must our final ceremony begin. Fleas, prepare yourselves!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，您包揽了所有跳蚤游戏的冠军！<page>我宣布，您是当之无愧的庆典总冠军！<page>最终仪式现在开始！跳蚤们，做好准备！
translated_text: Sra. Horned! You have been the champion of every flea competition we have won!<page>The winner of the festival has come out, of course you are!<page>The closing ceremony has begun.Blocks, ready to go.
secondary_translated_text: 부인. Horned!당신은 우리가 이겼던 모든 벼룩 대회에서 챔피언이었습니다!<page>축제의 우승자가 나왔고, 물론 당신은!<page>폐막식이 시작되었습니다. 블록, 준비되어 있습니다.

original_en_text: Good friend of fleas is you, Miss Hornet. Now must join and drink much. Be merry before all ends. Brew is made, enough for all!<page>No charge for you if needing more. Why waste when future is final?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，我们跳蚤的挚友，快来喝！末日临头该及时行乐！药酿管够！<page>尽管喝吧！都要完蛋了还留着干嘛？
translated_text: The best friend of fleas is you, Miss Bumblebee. Now you must go and drink more wine. You will be happy until it is over. Beer is for everyone.<page>If you need more, you won't have to pay for it.Why spend time on the future when the future is certain?
secondary_translated_text: 벼룩의 가장 친한 친구는 바로 너야, 버블비 양.이제 가서 와인을 더 마셔야 합니다.당신은 그것이 끝날 때까지 행복 할 것입니다.맥주는 모두를위한 것입니다.<page>더 많은 것이 필요하면 돈을 지불할 필요가 없다. 미래가 확실할 때 왜 미래를 위해 시간을 낭비하는가?

original_en_text: A strange flea has joined our troupe. All are welcome, but something about this one sets my fur to raise.<page>His carriage offers a steaming service, but the charge in rosaries is stiff, especially for us fleas who carry few.<page>For the companionship we provide, and the safety of our numbers, surely some discount is deserved?
original_zh_text: 有个怪跳蚤入伙了。虽然我们来者不拒，但这家伙让我寒毛直竖。<page>他提供蒸疗服务，但要价高昂，我们跳蚤哪有这么多念珠？<page>看在我们提供庇护的份上，总该打个折吧？
translated_text: The flower comes in the group. It 's good, but it will make my jacket worse.<page>His car provided steam services, but the cost of the rosary was high, especially for those of us who wore small fleas.<page>For the friendliness we offer and the security of our rooms, we have to make discounts. "
secondary_translated_text: 꽃은 그룹에 들어온다.그것은 좋지만, 그것은 내 재킷을 더 악화시킬 것이다.<page>그의 차는 증기 서비스를 제공했지만, 특히 작은 벼룩을 착용하는 우리 중 사람들에게는 묵주기도의 비용이 높았습니다.<page>우리가 제공하는 친절함과 우리 방의 보안을 위해, 우리는 할인을해야합니다. "

original_en_text: Vikna! Dear one, you outdo yourself! To beat your previous high score is a marvel indeed!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！亲爱的，你又破了自己的记录！太神奇了！
translated_text: vicarán.You are higher than yourself.Beating the previous count is a real miracle!
secondary_translated_text: vicarán. 당신은 당신 자신보다 높습니다. 이전 카운트를 이길 수있는 것은 진정한 기적입니다!

original_en_text: You still here, bug not flea? Is rest I need before I leave for caravan. Not chat. You feel trouble-type. Make my shell tense.<hpage>I shall take my leave, madam. Stay strong on your own journey. May we meet again at the caravan, amongst your fellows.
original_zh_text: 你怎么还在？我休息够了就去找旅团。别啰嗦，感觉你身上麻烦事不少，让我甲壳发紧。<hpage>那就告辞了，女士。祝你路上顺利，我们旅团再见。
translated_text: Are you still there? Are Insects Not Just Fleas? You should rest before going to the caravan. No cat. They think they have a problem. He cut the shell.<hpage>- Now - I have to go, ma 'am. Be strong on the journey. I hope to see you in the car.
secondary_translated_text: 아직도 거기 있니?곤충은 단지 벼룩이 아니다?캐러밴에 가기 전에 쉬어야 한다.고양이는 없어. 그들은 문제가 있다고 생각한다.그는 껍질을 잘랐다.<hpage>- 지금 - 저는 가야해요, 부인.여행 중에 강해지십시오.차 안에서 만나길 바래요.

original_en_text: Ah, of course. Perhaps you will be trying one of the other games?
original_zh_text: 啊，好的，想玩其他游戏吗？
translated_text: Why not try some other games?

original_en_text: Grrr... bug not flea. Still wishing for knowings of my work? But you hold no map to mark! Until a map is owned, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，还惦记我的情报？但你连地图都没有！先弄到地图再来。
translated_text: Ugh, uh, uh... Insects are not fleas. Do you want to know what I do? No papers to note! There was very little to do before the map was created.
secondary_translated_text: 어, 어, 어..곤충은 벼룩이 아닙니다.내가 뭘 하는지 알고 싶니?메모할 서류가 없어!지도가 만들어지기 전에는 할 일이 거의 없었습니다.

original_en_text: Thank you. Thank you! I’ll treasure these sweet-smelling rosaries dearly! Now, don’t be shy. Step inside!
original_zh_text: 多谢惠顾！这些香香的念珠我会珍藏的！别害羞，快请进！
translated_text: Thank you so much! I'm very interested in these perfumes. Don't be ashamed. Come in.
secondary_translated_text: 정말 감사합니다!나는 이 향수에 매우 관심이 있다.부끄러워하지 마라.들어와.

original_en_text: Vikna! My dear one, my dancer, the game has ended and you have proven yourself the champion!<page>None can best your score. You have shamed us all with your fearsome grace! But you will keep playing for me, yes?<page>The end of the world need not be a lonely thing... eheh heh...
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，我的亲爱的舞王！你已加冕冠军！<page>无法超越的优雅身姿！但你还会继续玩吧？<page>末日狂欢可不该独自度过，嘿嘿……
translated_text: Dear Danciano, the competition is over, and you have proved that you are a champion!<page>No one is better than you. You have offended us all with a terrible grace! "You 're going to work for me, right? Really?<page>The end of the world is not a single thing. - ¡Oh, yeah!
secondary_translated_text: 친애하는 댄치아노, 경쟁이 끝났고, 당신은 당신이 챔피언임을 증명했습니다!<page>너보다 더 좋은 사람은 아무도 없다.당신은 끔찍한 은혜로 우리 모두를 불쾌하게 했습니다! "너는 나를 위해 일하겠지, 그렇지? "진짜?<page>세상의 종말은 단 하나의 일이 아니다. - 오, 그래!

original_en_text: Excellent, excellent! Let us make preparations and be off without delay! Rouse yourself fleas, for the caravan roams once more!
original_zh_text: 太好了！即刻整装出发！跳蚤们动起来，旅团要再度启程啦！
translated_text: Bravo! Bravo! Bravo! Bravo! Bravo! Bravo! Get ready and go now! Relax and get your car on the track!
secondary_translated_text: Bravo! Bravo! Bravo! Bravo! Bravo! Bravo! Bravo!준비하고 지금 가자!휴식을 취하고 트랙에 당신의 차를 넣어!

original_en_text: My dear, will you play Flea Bounce for me once more? Leap up and bounce on the fleas who fly past for as long as you are able!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，再玩一次蹦蹦游戏嘛！只需跳起来踩飞过的跳蚤，持续越久越好！
translated_text: Dear, Can you make a bounce off the flea again? Download for as long as you can and jump on the flying fleas!
secondary_translated_text: 자기야, 벼룩에서 다시 튀어 올릴 수 있니?당신이 할 수있는 한 다운로드하고 비행 벼룩에 점프!

original_en_text: Say you dodeshna to the new flea sitting there? Is quiet one, but is very good at games!<page>Have no worry for him, Grishkin will look after. Will fill him with brew and meet him to all the other fleas.
original_zh_text: 看见新来的安静跳蚤没？他玩游戏可厉害了！<page>别担心，格里什琴会照顾他的。先灌他药酿再介绍给大家！
translated_text: Let 's assume you 're right about the new Dodeshna chip. Quiet game, but very good!<page>Don't worry, Glycine will take care of you. He filled it with beer and looked at all the other fleas.
secondary_translated_text: 새로운 Dodeshna 칩에 대해 당신이 옳다고 가정합시다.조용한 게임, 하지만 아주 좋은!<page>걱정하지 마세요, Glycine 이 당신을 돌볼 것입니다.그는 맥주를 가득 채우고 다른 벼룩들을 모두 보았다.

original_en_text: Here we shall remain, for a time, Miss Hornet, and pray that more lost fleas find their way to us.<hpage>What others I encounter, I shall send your way, Fleamaster.
original_zh_text: 我们会暂驻此地，祈祷更多迷途同胞能够找来。<hpage>如果在路上遇到跳蚤，我会让他们来找你。
translated_text: Sra. Hornet, we pray that we will be here for a while and that other lost fleas will find their way.<hpage>When I see the others, I will send them to you, Master Numi. "
secondary_translated_text: 부인. Hornet, 우리는 우리가 잠시 동안 여기에 머물고 다른 잃어버린 벼룩이 길을 찾을 수 있기를 기도합니다.<hpage>내가 다른 사람들을 만나면, 너한테 보낼게, 누미 사장님. "

translated_text: Do you want a beer from a flea?
The Bounceback

original_en_text: <hpage>That is well, Fleamaster. My travels through this land have been far and deep, and yet at almost every reach I met the friendly, inquisitive presence of your kind.<hpage>You fleas have an uncommon desire for adventure, which I find admirable, even if it is seldom matched by capability.<hpage>Though I am long accustomed to travelling alone, following your journey, and sharing some part in its progress has been a warm thing.<page>Ahh, and so happy too have you made we fleas!<page>I would be honoured to bestow one final gift unto you, Miss Hornet, a treasure from fleakind’s glorious past. May it mark you forever as a friend to us all.
