original_zh_text: <hpage>那就好，我走遍纺络，处处都能遇见你们好奇的同胞。<hpage>你们对冒险的热忱令我钦佩，虽然常常力有不逮。<hpage>我向来独来独往，但与你们相遇也令我感到暖心。<page>哈哈！我们跳蚤也高兴得很！<page>请允许我献上最后的赠礼，这是跳蚤一族昔日的珍宝。愿它永远守护在您身边，铭记您为我族挚友。
translated_text: <hpage>It's all right, folks! I have walked far and deep in this earth, and wherever I go, I find good and curious people like you.<hpage>Fleas have an unusual desire for adventure, and even if this desire does not coincide, it is delightful.<hpage>I 've long been used to traveling alone, but I 'm happy to follow your journey and share my progress.<page>I 'm so glad you gave me a flower.<page>"Mrs. Hornett, it is my great honor to present you with my last gift.The treasure of the flea of the glorious past.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>괜찮아, 여러분!나는 이 땅에서 멀리서 깊은 곳을 걸었고, 어디를 가든 당신과 같은 선하고 호기심 많은 사람들을 찾았습니다.<hpage>벼룩은 모험에 대한 특이한 욕망을 가지고 있으며, 이 욕망이 일치하지 않더라도, 그것은 즐겁습니다.<hpage>나는 오랫동안 혼자 여행하는 데 익숙해졌지만, 나는 당신의 여행을 따르고 나의 진전을 공유하게되어 기쁩니다.<page>네가 나에게 꽃을 선물해줘서 정말 기쁘다.<page>"호넷 부인, 영광스러운 과거의 벼룩의 보물을 마지막 선물하게 되어 영광입니다. "

original_en_text: The spa is yours, dear guest! And always open for one so considerate and kindly as yourself... eheh heh...
original_zh_text: 请享受温泉吧，亲爱的顾客！这里随时向您这样贴心又善良的客人开放，嘿嘿嘿……
translated_text: Customers, the spa is yours! Always open your heart to a caring and kind person like you. - ¡Oh, yeah!
secondary_translated_text: 고객님, 스파는 당신입니다!항상 당신처럼 돌보고 친절한 사람에게 마음을 열어보십시오. - 오, 그래!

original_en_text: With luck, my dear, we will meet again when I have joined the flea caravan.<page>My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly to share with you when next we meet!
original_zh_text: 运气好的话，我们在旅团再见。<page>我的车厢里给你留了一份惊喜呢，下次见面再为你揭晓！
translated_text: If you 're lucky, you 'll see me again when you join the flea caravan.<page>The car hides a secret. I want to share it with you the next time we see them.
secondary_translated_text: 운이 좋으면 벼룩 캐러밴에 합류할 때 다시 만날 수 있을 것이다.<page>자동차는 비밀을 숨기고 있다.다음번에 볼 때 공유하고 싶습니다.

original_en_text: The pact is made then. Fellows! Steel yourself! It is time, it is time!
original_zh_text: 那么契约达成！伙计们！打起精神！时候到了，时候到了！
translated_text: The deal is done, guys! Please be strong! It is time to be alone.
secondary_translated_text: 거래는 끝났어, 얘들아!제발 강해지세요!이제 혼자 있을 때입니다.

original_en_text: This long lake... Space is much more big here. Finally I have some quiet from the little fleas.
original_zh_text: 这片湖……真宽敞。终于能躲开小跳蚤们清净会儿了。
translated_text: It is a long lake - much more space. Finally I managed to calm down.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 긴 호수 - 훨씬 더 많은 공간입니다.마침내 진정할 수 있었다.

original_en_text: Ahh, that is a shame, but I understand. I’m sure our roads will cross each other soon enough.<page>And now, we must be off! Rouse yourself, fleas. The caravan roams once more!
original_zh_text: 唉，虽然遗憾，但能理解。相信我们很快会重逢的。<page>现在，我们该出发了！跳蚤们动起来，旅团要再度启程啦！
translated_text: "I 'm sorry, I know, our paths will soon cross. "<page>I must go back and recover, Floy. The caravan is running again!
secondary_translated_text: "미안해, 우리 길이 곧 교차될 것이다. "<page>나는 돌아가서 회복해야 해, 플로이.캐러밴이 다시 달리고 있다!

original_en_text: The grand ceremony has ended, but still we play! Will you honour us with a display of Flea Juggle, Miss Grand Champion Hornet?
original_zh_text: 庆典虽已落幕，但游戏不止！冠军大人愿意赏脸继续玩跳蚤耍耍吗？
translated_text: The game is over, but we continue to play. Will she show me the flea toilet, the Miss Bumblebee champion?
secondary_translated_text: 경기는 끝났지만 우리는 계속 놀았다.미스 범블비 우승자 벼룩 화장실을 보여 줄래?

original_en_text: Wonderful! Wonderful! The fleas will be overjoyed to share this next journey with our favoured companion! Let us away!
original_zh_text: 太好了！跳蚤们肯定会因为有贵客同行而欢欣雀跃！我们这就出发！
translated_text: That's fantastic! It's fantastic! We look forward to sharing our next trip with our beloved companions! Let's go! There is!
secondary_translated_text: 환상적이에요!환상적이에요!우리는 우리의 사랑하는 동반자와 우리의 다음 여행을 공유하기를 기대합니다!어서 가자!거기 있어요!

original_en_text: Mamashka! Let our beautiful game begin! Flea Bounce!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡！蹦蹦游戏开始！
translated_text: Mother, congratulations! Let's start a good game! Flea Bounce!
secondary_translated_text: 어머니, 축하합니다!좋은 게임을 시작하자! Flea Bounce!

original_en_text: <hpage>Unfortunately not, Fleamaster. I have visited many of this kingdom’s caves, and none would offer the safety and space you require.<hpage>If ever I come upon such a place, I will let you know.
original_zh_text: <hpage>很遗憾，并没有。我去过的洞窟都不符合你们的需求。<hpage>但若将来遇到，肯定前来告诉你们。
translated_text: <hpage>The pilot! I have visited many caves in the kingdom, and none of them offer you the safety and space you need.<hpage>If you come to a place like that, I will tell you.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>파일럿!나는 왕국에 있는 많은 동굴들을 방문했지만, 그 중 어느 것도 너희에게 필요한 안전과 공간을 제공하지 못한다.<hpage>만약 당신이 그런 장소에 오면, 나는 당신에게 말할 것입니다.

translated_text: About the Arrows.

original_en_text: How do you like our festival, Miss Hornet? While the world crumbles around us, we will laugh and dance and frolick!<page>Make merry with us, and play some of the games of old!<hpage>My time is slim, Fleamaster. If I am to join your games, know it will be only to hone my skills for the greater trial I must soon face below.<page>Of course! Of course! Joy or learnings! Any reason is fine by us, Miss Hornet!<page>And look here, we have Flea Juggle, where the challenge is to strike fleas upwards and keep them airborne for as long as possible.<page>To have our treasured guest challenge this humble game would be an honour for us, truly!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐觉得我们的庆典如何？就算外面世界崩塌，我们照样欢欣起舞！<page>开心点，来陪我们玩玩老游戏吧！<hpage>我时间紧迫。参加游戏只是为了磨练技艺，应对接下来的恶战。<page>都行都行！不管是玩乐或修行都可以！<page>看这里，这是跳蚤耍耍——把跳蚤打上天，滞空越久越好！<page>贵客肯赏脸挑战，我们荣幸之至！
translated_text: "Mrs. Hornett, what? What do you think about our vacation? When the world is crumbling around us, we laugh, dance and play!<page>Have fun with us and play an old game!<hpage>If I am part of your game, it is simply to hone my skills to cope with the biggest challenges you will face.<page>Obviously! Obviously! Happiness is learning! - "At any rate, Mrs. Hornet. "<page>Look here, here is a flea playing, and the task is to make it fly in the air as long as possible on one flea.<page>It is a great honor to welcome our precious guests to this humble contest.
secondary_translated_text: "호네트 부인, 뭐야?우리 휴가에 대해 어떻게 생각하니?세상이 우리 주위에서 무너지고 있을 때, 우리는 웃고 춤추고 놀고 있습니다!<page>우리와 함께 재미있게 놀고 오래된 게임을하십시오!<hpage>내가 당신의 게임의 일부라면, 그것은 단순히 당신이 직면 할 가장 큰 도전에 대처하기 위해 내 기술을 연마하는 것입니다.<page>분명히!당연히!행복은 배우는 것이다! - "어차피, 호넷 부인. "<page>여기 보세요, 여기 벼룩이 놀고 있으며, 임무는 한 벼룩에서 가능한 한 오랫동안 공중에서 날게하는 것입니다.<page>이 겸손한 대회에 귀한 손님들을 환영하게 되어 큰 영광입니다.

original_en_text: A mistake, treasured guest! Never again! Ohhh. Never again!
original_zh_text: 一场误会啊贵客！绝不再犯！我保证！
translated_text: This is an error, dear visitor. Not anymore!
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 실수입니다, 친애하는 방문객.더 이상 안!

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Amongst all of your troupe, I had little doubt you would survive to reach this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Bug not flea! Mine is to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together and grow them strong.<hpage>If you have sensed the locations of other lost fleas, share them with me. I may be able to send them safe to the caravan.<page>My learnings? Not free for you, bug not flea. Rosaries! Give those and I shall say of what I have sensed. Work like mine... much long, and hard. For that, I deserve some riches held.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。你能平安到达这里倒是不令我意外。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<hpage>若是探知迷途跳蚤下落，就告诉我，或许能送他们归队。<page>我的发现？外族虫，不白给，拿念珠来！我这行当又苦又累，理应拿点报酬。
translated_text: <hpage>Toast to the flies.In your team, there is no doubt that you will reach this team.<hpage>Tell me what tasks are required to remove you from your peers in such a frightening way.<page>The Gollum.Insects are not fleas.Behind the mines are tracks, smells and sharp sensations.Find our flea friend, the youngest fleas, and pick them up to make them stronger.<hpage>If you find other places for fleas, please share with me.Perhaps you can safely deliver them to the caravan.<page>My research? It 's not free for you, and the error is not a chip. Rosary! With this in mind, I will share my feelings with you.Like me, so much.That is why we need wealth.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>파리에 건배. 당신의 팀에서, 당신은이 팀에 도달 할 것이라는 의심의 여지가 없습니다.<hpage>그런 무서운 방식으로 동료들로부터 당신을 제거하기 위해 필요한 작업은 무엇입니까?<page>곤충은 벼룩이 아닙니다. 광산 뒤에는 트랙, 냄새 및 날카로운 감각이 있습니다. 우리의 벼룩 친구, 가장 어린 벼룩을 찾아서 그들을 더 강하게 만들기 위해 그들을 집어 들어요.<hpage>벼룩을위한 다른 장소를 찾으면 나와 함께 공유하십시오. 아마도 캐러밴에 안전하게 배달 할 수 있습니다.<page>내 연구?그것은 당신에게 무료가 아니며 오류는 칩이 아닙니다.로저리!이 점을 염두에두고, 나는 당신과 나의 감정을 공유 할 것입니다. 나처럼, 그렇게 많이. 그것이 우리가 부를 필요로하는 이유입니다.

original_en_text: So many lost fleas have made it here... Truly, I’d never dared to hope we could gather such a grand company.<page>But, oh! The world has grown so dangerous, and there may be more lost fleas out there. I do so hope they can find their way to us!
original_zh_text: 这么多迷途同胞都回来了……真是做梦都不敢想！<page>如今外面更凶险了，可能还有其他流落的同胞。真希望他们能找到我们！
translated_text: Many lost fleas come here. I didn't expect such a big company to join.<page>Ma, o, o. The world can be dangerous, and more fleas can disappear. We hope you find our way!
secondary_translated_text: 많은 잃어버린 벼룩들이 이곳으로 온다.이렇게 큰 회사가 가입할 줄은 몰랐다.<page>엄마, 오, 오.세상은 위험할 수 있고, 더 많은 벼룩이 사라질 수 있다.우리는 당신이 우리의 길을 찾을 수 있기를 바랍니다!

original_en_text: We fleas are all gathered, but now the world has loudly marked its ending! As great as our numbers grew, it seems our caravan will be the last.<page>There is only one thing left to do... but the preparations require time. If your travels wind their way back to us, dear friend, you yourself are welcome to participate...
original_zh_text: 跳蚤们虽已团聚，但世界即将毁灭！恐怕我们是最后的旅团了…….<page>只剩最后一事可做……但需时间准备。亲爱的朋友，如果再来，欢迎参与……
translated_text: The bugs have gathered, but now the world is loudly announcing its end.The number of our teams continues to grow, but our team seems to be the last.<page>There is only one thing to do, but preparation takes time.Dear friends, when your journey returns home, we invite you to join us in person.
secondary_translated_text: 벌레들이 모였지만 이제 세상은 큰 소리로 끝을 알리고 있다. 우리 팀의 수는 계속 증가하고 있지만 우리 팀이 마지막인 것 같다.<page>할 일은 하나뿐이지만 준비에는 시간이 걸립니다. 친애하는 친구 여러분, 여행이 집으로 돌아 왔을 때, 우리는 개인적으로 우리와 함께 할 것을 초대합니다.

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, I must tell, we’ve seen evidence nearby of a hunter of our tribe, a flea that seeks fleas!<page>As pungent and gruff as their sort often are, they’re still useful to have around a caravan.<page>A flea of their rare skill, settled among us, could offer defence and more.<page>If you’re still to be helping grow our town, search them out, up atop the muck choked ducts.
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！附近有我们族群的猎手出没的迹象，那是位专逮跳蚤的跳蚤！<page>虽然那家伙臭烘烘的又粗鲁，但对旅团很有用。<page>这样的好手要是能入伙，既能当护卫又有大用。<page>如果您还愿意帮忙壮大我们的旅团，就去腐殖渠上面找找吧！
translated_text: Miss Bumbleby, I must say we have seen evidence of hunters of our tribe in the vicinity looking for fleas, Pulgas!<page>They 're usually spicy and thick, but they 're still very useful around the caravan.<page>Chips with rare abilities will be installed among us, providing defense and much more.<page>However, if you want to help our city grow, look at the pipes that are clogged with mud.
secondary_translated_text: Bumbleby 양, 우리 부족의 사냥꾼들이 벼룩을 찾고 있는 증거를 보았습니다. Pulgas!<page>그들은 일반적으로 매운, 두꺼운, 하지만 그들은 여전히 캐러밴 주위에 매우 유용합니다.<page>희귀한 능력을 가진 칩이 우리 사이에 설치되어 방어와 더 많은 것을 제공합니다.<page>그러나 우리 도시의 성장을 돕고 싶다면, 진흙으로 막힌 파이프를 보세요.

original_en_text: A cauldron full of Flea Brew.
translated_text: A bottle of beer.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Of your many companions, I had little worry you would survive safe to find this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Mine was to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together so strong they could grow.<page>A task once important, mine! But not now. All fleas are here, safe. A rare many! Time for toasts, and brew to fill our bellies!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。就知道你能活着找到这里。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我以前负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<page>这差事曾经很重要，但不需要了！现在大伙都齐了！该喝酒庆祝！
translated_text: <hpage>Toast to the flies.Among many of your comrades, I am not afraid you will find this train safe.<hpage>Tell me what tasks are required to remove you from your peers in such a frightening way.<page>My goal was to track him down by footprints, smells and acute sensations.Let 's find our flea friend, the youngest flea, and get together to be stronger.<page>This is my great job! But now not. All the flies are here and safe. More unusual! It 's time to raise a glass and fill your stomach with wine!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>파리에게 건배. 많은 동지들 중에서, 나는 당신이 이 기차를 안전하게 찾을 수 있다는 것을 두려워하지 않습니다.<hpage>그런 무서운 방식으로 동료들로부터 당신을 제거하기 위해 필요한 작업은 무엇입니까?<page>발자국, 냄새, 예민한 감각으로 그를 추적하는 것이 나의 목표였다. 우리의 벼룩 친구, 가장 어린 벼룩을 찾아서 함께 더 강해지자.<page>이것은 나의 위대한 일이다!하지만 지금은 그렇지 않다.모든 파리는 여기에 있고 안전합니다.더 특이하다!이제 술 한 잔을 들고 배에 와인을 가득 채울 시간입니다!

original_en_text: Look here! All these lively fleas flocked to our caravan. Thanks to you and your hunting, our numbers grow grand. Mayhap, in time, we could grow to match even those caravans of our fabled past?<hpage>To see so many safe is a welcome sight, Fleamaster. Their playful cheer suggests you are a fine steward for the swelling troupe.<page>Such kind words, Miss Hornet! How lucky we are to have found a friend so fair!<page>But now, we must away! These moors have been our host long enough. It is time to climb and hoist towards drier caves!<page>Good friend to fleas, would you join us on this next journey?
original_zh_text: 看！这么多活蹦乱跳的同胞加入！多亏您帮忙，队伍越来越壮大。或许能重现当年先祖们的盛况？<hpage>看见这么多跳蚤平安无事，我也很欣慰。他们的欢声笑语也证明了你是个称职的领队。<page>大黄蜂小姐过奖了！能结交您这样的朋友才是旅团的幸运！<page>但现在该启程了！沼地虽好，但不应久留，该向更干燥的洞窟进发了！<page>跳蚤之友，愿意与我们一起出发吗？
translated_text: Look here! "All these active fleas have invaded our fleet.Thanks to you and your hunt, our numbers are growing.In time, it can become comparable to the caravans of the legendary past.<hpage>It 's a nice thing that a lot of people seem safe, Fleckmaster.Your funny applause proves that you 're a great manager for a growing company.<page>- You are beautiful, miss. Horny! I 'm so lucky to have a good friend!<page>But you must go now! This land has been our master for a long time. It's time to climb to the dry caves!<page>A good friend of the fly, isn't it? Would you like to join us on our next trip?
secondary_translated_text: 여기 봐! "이 모든 활동적인 벼룩이 우리 함대를 침략했습니다. 당신과 당신의 사냥 덕분에 우리의 숫자가 증가하고 있습니다. 시간이 지나면 전설적인 과거의 캐러밴과 비교할 수 있습니다.<hpage>많은 사람들이 안전해 보이는 것은 좋은 일이다, 플렉마스터. 너의 재미있는 박수는 네가 성장하는 회사를 위한 훌륭한 매니저라는 것을 증명한다.<page>- 미스, 당신은 아름답습니다.뿔이!나는 좋은 친구가 있어서 정말 운이 좋았다!<page>하지만 넌 지금 가야 해!이 땅은 오랫동안 우리의 주인이었다.마른 동굴으로 올라갈 시간입니다!<page>파리의 좋은 친구야, 그렇지?다음 여행에 우리와 함께 할 수 있습니까?

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended.<page>Bug not flea... impressive was your performance. Your score exceeds even my own.<page>To see skill so much, moments before everything ends, gives me unexpected joy.<page>Rishkiz... I congratulate you, champion.
original_zh_text: 维克纳，试炼结束。<page>虫子，你超越了我，没想到外族也有这种身手。<page>末日临近还能见识这般技艺，着实是意料之外的惊喜。<page>里什基兹……祝贺你，冠军。
translated_text: Wicker: The process is over.<page>Insects are not fleas. His performance is impressive. "His score is higher than mine. "<page>Seeing so many techniques in minutes before it was all over gave me unexpected joy.<page>Congratulations, Champion!
secondary_translated_text: Wicker: 절차가 끝났습니다.<page>곤충은 벼룩이 아닙니다.그의 연기는 매우 인상적이다. "그의 점수는 내 점수보다 높다. "<page>모든 것이 끝나기 전에 몇 분 안에 많은 기술을 본 것은 나에게 예상치 못한 기쁨을 주었다.<page>축하해요, 챔피언님!

translated_text: Dodge says that

original_en_text: Ahh, Miss Hornet! Greetings, and well met, once again!<page>The journey here was long, but we didn’t lose a single flea! And now fate has brought us back together again... what a marvel!<hpage>It is good to see you safe, Fleamaster. The journey to this moor from the caverns below is long and dangerous.<page>Dangerous, certainly, but we fleas are born to roam!<page>And now, you must go and see Grishkin, sitting there by the bubbling cauldron. After long travel, we drink to revive our spirits!
original_zh_text: 啊！大黄蜂小姐！又见面真是太好了！<page>长途跋涉到这但没丢一只跳蚤！命运也让我们重逢……真是奇迹！<hpage>旅团平安就好，从下方洞窟到这沼地，路上肯定充满危险。<page>确实有不少危险，但跳蚤天生爱流浪！<page>现在，您去找格里什琴吧，她在冒泡的大锅旁。长途劳顿后该喝点提神！
translated_text: I'm very sorry, miss. Horny! Hi, I'll see you again!<page>We 've come a long way to get here, but we haven't lost our chip! It was a magical destiny that brought us together.<hpage>Good to see you safe, Master Pulse, the journey from the cave to the swamp has been long and dangerous.<page>Of course, this is dangerous, but fleas were born to walk.<page>I have to go look at Grisikin, who is sitting next to the boiler.After a long journey, Glass!
secondary_translated_text: 죄송합니다, 아가씨.뿔이!안녕하세요, 다시 볼게요!<page>우리는 여기까지 먼 길을 왔지만, 우리는 우리의 칩을 잃지 않았다!그것은 우리를 하나로 모으는 마법의 운명이었다.<hpage>안전하다는 걸 보니 반갑습니다, 마스터 펄스, 동굴에서 습지까지의 여정은 길고 위험했습니다.<page>물론 이것은 위험하지만 벼룩은 걷기 위해 태어났습니다.<page>나는 보일러 옆에 앉아있는 Grisikin 을 보러 가야합니다. 긴 여행 후, 유리!

original_en_text: Grrr.. bug not flea. Why you must bother me? This spot is mine, fair fought and earned.<hpage>I won’t stay long, madam. Nor would I contest your right to this cave.<hpage>I have encountered several of your fellow fleas, united in a caravan. Perhaps you would consider joining with them?<hpage>Yours seems a hardy hide, and I fear alone they lack the strength to survive long in this land.<page>Caravan? Grrr. Felt it in my fur... Time for change. If caravan is close, then my task, these lands, may near be complete.<page>Now... Grrr. Much talk I gave. You leave me! Meet again at caravan, amongst good fellows. There I share my learnings of fleas and Pharloom. Till then, rest I need! Off, bug!
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，干嘛烦我？这地盘是我打下来的！<hpage>我无意久留，跳蚤。也不打算抢你山洞。<hpage>我在一个旅团见过你的同胞。为何不加入他们？<hpage>你看着有些本事，他们也缺少护卫。<page>旅团？吼……感觉到了……是时候了。旅团出发，我在这的活也要结束了。<page>唔……不废话了。你走吧！在旅团再见，到时告诉你跳蚤位置的情报。现在我要休息！
translated_text: The Gollum. Insects are not fleas. Why are you interrupting? It's my fair game to win.<hpage>- "It won't be long, lady. I doubt your right to this cave.<hpage>I met his block comrades who had gathered in the caravan. Are you thinking of joining?<hpage>Her skin looks strong, but she herself does not have the strength to survive long on this earth.<page>- Caravaggio? Oh ~! "I feel it on my skin.The time for change has come.If the caravan is approaching, my mission, this land, may be almost complete.<page>Currently it is... The Gollum. We talked a lot. Let it be in the world! I was in a friend 's caravan. So I 've shared what I know about fleas and pharaohs, so far, you need to rest! Closed the bug.
secondary_translated_text: 골럼 The Gollum곤충은 벼룩이 아닙니다.왜 방해하는 거야?이기는 게 내 공정한 경기야.<hpage>- "오래도 안되요, 아가씨.이 동굴에 대한 당신의 권리를 의심합니다.<hpage>나는 캐러밴에 모인 그의 블록 동지들을 만났다.가입할 생각 있으세요?<hpage>그녀의 피부는 튼튼해 보이지만, 그녀 자신은 이 땅에서 오래 살 수 있는 힘이 없다.<page>- 카라바초?오 ~! "내 피부에 느껴져, 변화의 시간이 왔다. 캐러밴이 다가오고 있다면, 나의 임무, 이 땅은 거의 완성될 수 있다.<page>현재는 ...골럼 The Gollum우리는 많은 이야기를 했다.이 세상에 있게 해줘!나는 친구의 캐러밴에 있었다.그래서 벼룩과 파라오에 대해 아는 것을 공유했습니다. 지금까지, 당신은 휴식을 취해야합니다!버그를 닫았습니다.

original_en_text: Ohhhh! What other choice do we poor wretches have?! Cruel fate leaves us with only one last task...<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet! Forgive us, but we beg one more favour from you. Will you accompany us in our final act...?
original_zh_text: 唉！我们这些可怜虫别无选择！残酷的命运只留下这一最后任务……<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂女士！请原谅，但我们恳求您最后再帮一次忙。您可愿陪我们完成旅途的终幕……？
translated_text: Oh my god! What choices do the poor make? The hard life leaves us the last.<page>Dear friends, Miss Hornett. Sorry, but I'd like another one. Want to finish the last show?
secondary_translated_text: 오, 세상에!가난한 사람들은 어떤 선택을 할까?힘든 삶은 우리를 마지막에 남겨 두었다.<page>친애하는 친구들, 미스 호넷.죄송하지만, 다른 걸로 주세요.마지막 쇼를 끝내고 싶으세요?

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is ended, and we have a new Flea Juggle champion! Incredible!<page>Miss Hornet, with your skill, I’m certain you could best all three of our games and become the grandest champion of them all!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束！新的耍耍冠军诞生了！太强了！<page>以大黄蜂小姐的本事绝对能包揽我们三种游戏的冠军！
translated_text: The game is over, and a new ship has appeared! That's incredible!<page>"Miss Hornet, I am sure that with your talents you will become the best of our three races and the best champion of all races!
secondary_translated_text: 게임은 끝났고 새로운 배가 나타났습니다!정말 신기해요!<page>"미스 호넷, 나는 당신의 재능으로 당신은 우리 세 종족 중 최고이자 모든 종족 중 최고의 챔피언이 될 것이라고 확신합니다!

original_en_text: My, what a sweet face now emerges from the darkness! Poor Kratt has been hiding here from those blackened beasts for too long, all alone!<hpage>The beasts and bugs ensnared by the black thread are dangerous indeed. You have done right to hide yourself from them, sir.<hpage>That metal carriage... It is yours, I assume?<page>Ooh, yes, yes! I’m setting out to join the nearest flea caravan, aren’t I? Safety in numbers, yes? I’ve had more than enough of venturing alone.<page>And you... I trust I will see you there? My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly share with you when next we meet! Heh heh!
original_zh_text: 哇，没想到黑暗中竟出现这样一张美丽的脸！可怜的克拉特独自在这躲避黑丝好久了。<hpage>受丝咒侵蚀的虫兽确实危险，你躲起来是对的。<hpage>那金属车厢……是你的吧？<page>对对！我正要投奔跳蚤旅团呢！独行太危险了！<page>你……也会去旅团吧？那我们旅团再见，车厢里有惊喜等着你哟！
translated_text: The poor rat has long been hiding here, alone, far from the black beast!<hpage>Animals and insects trapped in the black line are very dangerous.<hpage>This metal machine, I think, is yours.<page>¡Oh yeah, yeah! I recently joined the fleet of fleas, right? Really? Safety, right? I 'm tired of risking alone.<page>And then you ... Do you think we could meet there? The car hides a secret. I 'd like to share it with you the next time we see them. !
secondary_translated_text: 불쌍한 쥐는 오랫동안 여기 숨어 있었고, 검은 짐승과는 멀리 떨어져 혼자 있었다!<hpage>검은 라인에 갇힌 동물과 곤충은 매우 위험합니다.<hpage>이 금속 기계는, 내 생각엔, 너의 것이다.<page>오, 그래, 그래!제가 최근에 벼룩함대에 합류했어요, 그렇죠?진짜?안전이죠, 그렇죠?나는 혼자 위험을 감수하는 것에 지쳤다.<page>And then you ...우리가 거기서 만날 수 있다고 생각하니?자동차는 비밀을 숨기고 있다.다음에 그들을 볼 때 당신과 공유하고 싶습니다. !

original_en_text: There are still many fleas for us to be united with though, and we’ve rested long enough. The caravan must head higher!<page>Oh, but stranger, how remiss of me! I introduced myself earlier without ever asking for your own name. Forgive me! Please, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<hpage>I still have a long journey ahead of me. If I come across any more fleas, I will assist where I am able.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing for me to hear!<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan must be away now, toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 虽然还有许多同胞未归，但我们休整太久了。旅团该向高处进发了！<page>哎呀我真是失礼！之前只顾自报家门，还没请教您的姓名？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴见你和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<hpage>我的旅途尚未结束，如果再遇见跳蚤，会尽力帮助他们的。<page>哎呀！这可太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: However, we still have a lot of chips that we have to gather together and we have a good rest.<page>I wonder how lazy I am! I introduced myself earlier, but didn't ask her name. What should I call it?<hpage>"Call us Bumblebee, Master Frey! " It 's nice to see that your bad friends are safe in your fleet.Traveling alone is a very dangerous country.<hpage>I still have a long way to go, and if I find more fleas, I will do my best.<page>They were going! In other words, I cannot believe it! How good to hear that news! "<page>"My dear friends, Miss Bumbleby, our caravan must now depart for the vast plains of the Highlands.
secondary_translated_text: 그러나, 우리는 여전히 우리가 함께 모아야 할 많은 칩을 가지고 있으며, 우리는 좋은 휴식을 취합니다.<page>내가 얼마나 게으른지 궁금하다!나는 이전에 자신을 소개했지만 그녀의 이름을 묻지 않았다.뭐라고 불러야 하나요?<hpage>"불블비라고 부르세요, 프레이 마스터! "당신의 나쁜 친구가 당신의 함대에 안전하게 있다는 것을 보는 것은 좋은 일입니다. 혼자 여행하는 것은 매우 위험한 나라입니다.<hpage>나는 아직 갈 길이 멀고, 벼룩을 더 찾으면 최선을 다할 것이다.<page>그들이 가고 있었다!다른 말로하면, 나는 그것을 믿을 수 없다!그 소식을 듣게 되어 얼마나 기뻤는가! "<page>"친애하는 친구들, 험블비 양, 우리 캐러밴은 이제 광대한 고지대 평원을 향해 출발해야 합니다.

original_en_text: So many awful places have us fleas travelled. Many times I almost die. But here is seems safe enough.<page>You will have rest too? Is space enough for us all now... friend.
original_zh_text: 旅团闯过了多少险地，好几回我都差点死了。但这里似乎很安全。<page>你也留下休息吧，朋友？现在地方够大。
translated_text: The flea got into a terrible place and several times almost died. But here it is quite safe.<page>Do you want to relax too? Is there enough space for all of us? We're friends.
secondary_translated_text: 벼룩은 끔찍한 장소에 들어갔고 몇 번 거의 죽을 뻔했습니다.하지만 이곳은 꽤 안전합니다.<page>당신도 휴식을 취하고 싶으세요?우리 모두를위한 충분한 공간이 있습니까?우리는 친구야.

original_en_text: Welcome again, Miss Hornet! See how high our caravan has climbed, resting right on the doorstep of that mighty Citadel!<hpage>It is fortunate that all of your companions survived the trek, Fleamaster. The howling rise beside, and the tangled wood before it, have both claimed the lives of countless bugs.<page>Indeed! A perilous ascent! We have seen the many husks in passing. A mighty luck must shine on us, to journey with such success.
original_zh_text: 欢迎您，大黄蜂小姐！看我们攀得多高啊，就在圣堡大门旁！<hpage>你们能平安抵达这里实属万幸。旁边的峭壁和前边的丛林都葬送过无数旅行者。<page>确实凶险！沿途见到了无数空壳。我们定是受命运庇佑。
translated_text: Welcome, Mrs. Hornett. Look how high our caravan has risen and stopped at the gate of the mighty castle!<hpage>Fortunately, all your companions survived this long journey, Flymaster.The neighboring side and the intertwined trees in front of him cost the lives of countless insects.<page>It's really so. Danger is growing! I 've seen a lot of shellfish in the past. We 're lucky to have had such success.
secondary_translated_text: 안녕하세요, 호넷 부인우리 캐러밴이 얼마나 높이 올라서 강력한 성의 문에서 멈췄는지 보라!<hpage>다행히도, 당신의 모든 동반자는이 긴 여정을 살아남았다, Flymaster. The 이웃 측과 그의 앞에 얽혀 나무는 수많은 곤충의 목숨을 잃었다.<page>정말 그렇군요.위험은 커지고 있습니다!나는 과거에 조개류를 많이 보았다.우리는 이런 성공을 거둔 것이 행운이다.

original_en_text: Look, look! So many fleas have joined the caravan! What a miracle! We can not thank you enough for honouring our humble wish!
original_zh_text: 看呐！这么多跳蚤加入了旅团！真是奇迹！真不知该如何感激您实现愿望！
translated_text: ¡Look at me! Look at me! We have a lot of people on the team! What a miracle! Thank you for fulfilling our little wishes!
secondary_translated_text: 나를 봐!나를 봐!우리 팀에는 많은 사람들이 있습니다!정말 기적이군요!우리의 작은 소원을 충족시켜 주셔서 감사합니다!

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? Would you seek service of me, ehh? Mine is knowledge much, the places of the lost little ones, heard and smelt across the caves.<page>You help find! And bring! Best we come together, we fleas all... now that times turn dark...
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？要我帮忙吗？我知道那些迷途小辈的踪迹，各处洞穴都有。<page>你来寻找！把它们带来！最好齐聚于此，全体跳蚤……趁黑暗未临......
translated_text: If you stay, are insects not fleas? We need our services, don't we? What? I have learned a lot about places in the lost caves where I hear and smell small things.<page>Help us find them! You better take them and kill them all. Time creates new holes.
secondary_translated_text: 만약 당신이 머물면, 곤충은 벼룩이 아니죠?우리는 우리의 서비스가 필요해요, 그렇지 않나요?뭐야?나는 작은 것들을 듣고 냄새 맡는 잃어버린 동굴의 장소에 대해 많은 것을 배웠습니다.<page>그들을 찾을 수 있도록 도와주세요!당신은 그들을 데려 가서 그들을 모두 죽이는 것이 좋습니다.시간은 새로운 구멍을 만들어낸다.

original_en_text: As you wish, sweet one. Shall we just rest here together on the shore of eternity instead?
original_zh_text: 如你所愿，甜心。要不就和我在这岸边静静地守望末日？
translated_text: Will we ever see each other at the end of eternity?
secondary_translated_text: 영원한 끝에 다시 만날 수 있을까?

translated_text: Access to the spa?

original_en_text: Mamashka! I am saying, let the game begin! Flea Juggle!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡！我是说，游戏开始！跳蚤耍耍！
translated_text: Mother, congratulations! So, let's start the game! Flies' Traps!

original_en_text: What a beautiful spot you’ve gifted us, Miss Hornet! Safe apart from the dark and death of the lands beside. A place for fleas to grow smart and strong.<page>Here we shall see our travels end, for in Pharloom there could be no finer place to settle.<hpage>I am glad the location suits, Fleamaster. It is a calming thing to know these many fleas may survive. Most bugs of Pharloom seem destined for far bleaker fates.<page>Indeed! A hopeful future awaits! And only because of yourself and your efforts. To commemorate our arrival, it would be my pleasure to perform a small service for you.<page>I have been learning to sew, and the little fleas have been gathering materials for me. I thought I could add an extra pocket to your tool pouch, to make your travels just a little easier.<page>A trifling favour, much less than you deserve, but still I hope it meets to your satisfaction!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐选的地方太好了！远离外面的危险，跳蚤们肯定能在这茁壮成长！<page>这里就是我们旅团的终点站了，纺络再找不到比这更好的归宿了！<hpage>合你们的心意就好。能有这么多跳蚤幸存，我也感到高兴。其他虫类大多没那么幸运。<page>没错！未来充满希望，这全仰赖您的帮助。为纪念乔迁之喜，请收下这份纪念品。<page>我最近学了缝纫，小家伙们也帮我收集材料。想给你的工具袋加个口袋，让旅途轻松些。<page>区区薄礼不足挂齿，希望您别失望！
translated_text: Mrs. Gornett, you have given us a precious place! A place where fleas become wiser and stronger, away from darkness and death.<page>The journey ends here as there will be no further colonization on the farm.<hpage>I'm glad that this is the right place, master Nami.It's good to know that fleas will survive.Most hawkish insects seem to have a more tragic fate.<page>It's really so. The future, full of hope, awaits us only for you and your efforts.To celebrate our arrival, I am pleased to offer you a small service.<page>I learned to sew, and fleas collected materials for me.You can add an extra pocket to the luggage to make your trip easier.<page>It 's a little bit of a job that 's far less than it deserves, but I want you to be satisfied anyway.
secondary_translated_text: Gornett 부인, 당신은 우리에게 귀중한 장소를 제공했습니다!벼룩이 더 현명하고 강해지고 어둠과 죽음에서 멀리 떨어져 있는 곳.<page>농장에 더 이상의 식민지가 없기 때문에 여정은 여기서 끝납니다.<hpage>여기가 딱 맞는 곳이라서 다행입니다, 나미 선생님. 벼룩이 살아남을 수 있다는 걸 알게 되어서 다행입니다. 매벌레들 대부분은 더 비극적인 운명을 가지고 있는 것 같습니다.<page>정말 그렇군요.희망으로 가득 찬 미래는 여러분과 여러분의 노력에 의해서만 우리를 기다리고 있습니다. 우리의 도착을 축하하기 위해, 저는 여러분에게 작은 봉사를 제공하게 되어 기쁩니다.<page>나는 바느질을 배웠고, 벼룩은 나를 위해 재료를 수집했습니다. 여행이 더 쉬워지도록 가방에 추가 주머니를 추가 할 수 있습니다.<page>이 일은 마땅히 받아야 할 것보다 훨씬 적은 일이지만, 어쨌든 당신이 만족하기를 바랍니다.

original_en_text: My dear Flea Bounce champion, will you play with us again? Let us dance and fly above the waters until the world itself falls away!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的蹦蹦冠军，要再玩一次吗？在水面上飞舞直至世界崩塌吧！
translated_text: My dear rebound champion, want to keep playing with us? Let 's dance and fly over the water until the world disappears.
secondary_translated_text: 친애하는 리바운드 챔피언님, 계속 같이 놀고 싶으세요?세상이 사라질 때까지 춤추고 물 위로 날자.

original_en_text: Sweet one! What a delight to see you emerge from the horrible darkness now enveloping the world!<page>Poor Kratt feared he would have only his mangy fellow fleas for company at the end of everything. How kind of you to spend your last moments here with me!
original_zh_text: 甜心！没想到世界末日还能和你见面，真高兴！<page>可怜的克拉特本以为最后只能和脏跳蚤们作伴，多谢你在这最后时刻陪着我！
translated_text: Oh my God, dear! I 'm glad I 've come out of the terrible darkness that covers the whole world!<page>The poor mouse was afraid that in the end she would become only a companion of the dirty fleas. I am so glad that we spent the last minutes together!
secondary_translated_text: 오 세상에, 자기야!전 세계를 뒤덮고 있는 끔찍한 어둠에서 벗어난 것이 기쁘다!<page>불쌍한 쥐는 결국 더러운 벼룩의 동반자일 뿐이 될 것을 두려워했다.우리는 함께 마지막 순간을 보냈다는 것을 매우 기쁘게 생각합니다!

translated_text: The Wasp

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I took your request from the wishwall in the pilgrim camp. You are seeking fleas to join your caravan? I have found and freed many throughout my travels.<page>Oh yes, indeed! And look here, they all have made their way to us! So many gathered, it seems a miracle. Our wishes granted before even your promise was known!
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤首领，我在朝圣营地祈愿墙接下你的委托。你在召集跳蚤加入旅团？我在旅途中已经解救了许多跳蚤。<page>没错！看啊，它们全都归队了！我们的祈愿尚未传达，就已然实现，真是个奇迹！
translated_text: <hpage>Flammaster, I have received your request on the wish wall in Pilgrim Field. Are you looking for a fleet to join your fleet? I have met and liberated many people on my journey.<page>Yes, yes! Look, everyone is coming here! It is a miracle that so many people are united.Before His promise was known, our desire was fulfilled!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>플람 마스터, 순례 필드의 소원 벽에 대한 요청을 받았습니다.당신은 당신의 함대에 합류하기 위해 함대를 찾고 있습니까?나는 내 여행에서 많은 사람들을 만났고 해방시켰다.<page>그래, 그래!봐, 모두가 여기 오고 있어!이렇게 많은 사람들이 연합되어 있는 것은 기적이다. 그분의 약속이 알려지기 전에 우리의 소망이 성취되었다!

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is now ended, but you can play again, as much you wish... until the end of the world comes for us all!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！我是说，游戏结束，但随时可以重玩……直到世界末日！
translated_text: The game is over, but you can play it again if you want. Until the end of the world!
secondary_translated_text: 게임은 끝났지만 원하면 다시 재생할 수 있습니다.세상의 끝까지!

original_en_text: Stranger, will you hear my worry? The time has come for us fleas to find each other and travel together, as has happened through generations before.<page>The many fleas of this kingdom should be flocking to our caravan, but times have become dangerous. You feel it too, yes? Our poor cousins, out there, in hiding!<page>Would you, could you, help us find these poor, lost fleas? We daren’t continue our journey until some of the poor dears have found their way here to us!
original_zh_text: 旅者，愿意跟我聊聊么？我们跳蚤的祖辈曾相聚同行，现在我想是时候召集同胞了。<page>本该有无数同胞来投奔旅团，可如今危机四伏，您也感受到了吧？可怜的同胞们还在外躲藏！<page>您……愿意帮忙寻找迷途的跳蚤们吗？同胞没有到齐我们不敢上路啊！
translated_text: Strange, can you hear my concerns? Now it 's time for fleas to look for each other and travel together, just like in previous generations.<page>Many fleas in the kingdom surround our caravans, but times are getting dangerous.You can feel it too, right? Really? My brother hides. "<page>Would you like to help me find the missing chip? They don't have the courage to continue their journey until they are found by poor relatives.
secondary_translated_text: 이상한데, 내 걱정거리가 들리시나요?이제 벼룩들이 이전 세대와 마찬가지로 서로를 찾고 함께 여행 할 때입니다.<page>왕국의 벼룩이 우리 캐러밴을 둘러싸고 있지만, 시대가 점점 위험해지고 있습니다. 당신도 그것을 느낄 수 있습니다, 그렇죠?진짜?동생은 숨어 있다. "<page>잃어버린 칩을 찾는 데 도움이 되시겠습니까?그들은 가난한 친척들에게 발견될 때까지 여행을 계속할 용기가 없다.

translated_text: What is a Flea Caravan?

original_en_text: Alas, Miss Hornet! Until our paths cross again, our dearest wishes go with you.<hpage>Safe travels to you and your troupe, Fleamaster.
original_zh_text: 那好吧，大黄蜂小姐！愿好运常伴您左右，下次再见！<hpage>也祝你们一路平安。
translated_text: I 'd like to be with you more than our hearts before our paths meet again.<hpage>We wish you and your crew a happy journey.
secondary_translated_text: 우리의 길이 다시 만나기 전에 우리 마음보다 당신과 함께 있기를 바랍니다.<hpage>우리는 당신과 당신의 승무원이 행복한 여행기를 바랍니다.

original_en_text: And so the great ceremony has reached its climax and its grand champion has emerged!<page>Thank you for spending your last moments with us here, Miss Hornet.<page>Though the world will soon end, and our paradise will crumble, the memories of friendship we all shared shall surely echo through the oncoming void for all eternity!<hpage>Fleamaster, your sentiment is kind, but this world will not end.<page>Oh? How good of you to speak words of hope for our benefit, but we have accepted our fate. Come, let us forget the past and revel together!<hpage>It is not merely hope that I offer you, sir, but a promise. This kingdom’s suffering has a singular cause, and by my own claw will it be cleansed.<hpage>Perhaps not every flea will survive what is coming... but the world will not die, and your settlement may still see chance to prosper.<page>Ahh? You speak... with such conviction. But I cannot bring myself to hope such, I am sorry.<page>Come what may, we fleas will be here until the end. And the games will continue, of course! Celebrate with us for as long as you wish, dear friend.
original_zh_text: 加冕仪式结束，庆典高潮已过，总冠军诞生！<page>大黄蜂小姐，感谢您与我们共度最后的时光。<page>纵使世界即将毁灭，乐园即将倒塌，我们的友谊也会永存于虚空之间！<hpage>谢谢你，跳蚤首领。但世界不会终结的。<page>感谢您在这最后关头还给我们希望，但我们认命了。还是及时行乐吧！<hpage>我给的并非虚无缥缈的希望，而是承诺。纺络的苦难都有源头，而我一定会亲手将其终结。<hpage>或许不是所有跳蚤都能幸存……但只要世界不毁灭，旅团终将再次启程。<page>啊哈哈，您这话……信念坚定。但我已不敢奢望。<page>无论如何，跳蚤们会坚持到最后。游戏永不停止！您想在这里玩多久都行，朋友！
translated_text: The festival has reached its peak, and the great champion has arrived!<page>Thank you for spending the last hour here, lady. Hornet.<page>Even if the world perishes and the sky collapses, the memory of our friendship will ring out forever in the emptiness that awaits us.<hpage>"Flammaster, your relationship is fantastic, but the world is not going to end.<page>What's it? - - Yeah? It is wonderful that we are told words of hope, but we accept our destiny. Let's forget the past and have fun together!<hpage>I not only give hope, but also promises.The sufferings of this kingdom have only one cause, and I cleanse them with My claws.<hpage>However, the world will not die, and your colony may still have a chance to thrive.<page>What's it? What is it? Say it with such faith. I am very sorry that I have no hope for myself.<page>No matter what happens, we will be there until the end. Of course, the game will continue! Dear friends, if you want, you can celebrate with us.
secondary_translated_text: 축제가 절정에 달했고, 위대한 챔피언이 도착했습니다!<page>마지막 시간을 보내주셔서 감사합니다, 아가씨호넷.<page>세상이 멸망하고 하늘이 무너지더라도 우정의 기억은 우리를 기다리는 공허함 속에서 영원히 울릴 것이다.<hpage>"불꽃 마스터, 당신의 관계는 환상적이지만 세상은 끝나지 않을 것입니다.<page>뭐예요? - - 그래요?우리는 희망의 말을 듣지만, 우리는 우리의 운명을 받아들입니다.과거를 잊고 함께 재미있게 놀자!<hpage>나는 희망을 줄 뿐만 아니라 약속도 준다. 이 나라의 고통은 오직 하나의 원인을 가지고 있으며, 나는 나의 발톱으로 그것을 깨끗하게 한다.<hpage>그러나 세계는 죽지 않을 것이며, 식민지는 여전히 번성 할 수있는 기회를 가질 수 있습니다.<page>뭐예요?뭐야?그런 믿음을 가지고 말하라.나는 나 자신에게 희망이 없다는 것을 매우 유감스럽게 생각한다.<page>무슨 일이 일어나든 우리는 끝까지 거기에 있을 것이다.물론, 게임은 계속됩니다!사랑하는 여러분, 원하신다면 저희와 함께 축하할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is ended, and we have a new Flea Juggle champion! Incredible!<page>You have proven yourself the champion at each of our flea games!<page>I am confident now that the grand champion of our festival has emerged. It is none other than yourself, of course!<page>And thusly, must our final ceremony begin. Fleas, prepare yourselves!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，新的耍耍冠军诞生！太强了！<page>您已称霸所有跳蚤游戏！<page>是当之无愧的庆典总冠军！<page>最终仪式现在开始！跳蚤们，做好准备！
translated_text: The game is over, and a new ship has appeared! That's incredible!<page>¡You have been the champion of every flea competition that we have won!<page>The winner of the festival has come out, of course you are!<page>The closing ceremony has begun.Blocks, ready to go.
secondary_translated_text: 게임은 끝났고 새로운 배가 나타났습니다!정말 신기해요!<page>당신은 우리가 이겼던 모든 벼룩 대회에서 챔피언이었습니다!<page>축제의 우승자가 나왔고, 물론 당신은!<page>폐막식이 시작되었습니다. 블록, 준비되어 있습니다.

original_en_text: You not want my learnings, bug not flea? Rare it is we share such things with ones outside our own.
original_zh_text: 不想要我情报？我们可很少愿意和外族分享这些。
translated_text: Did you know that insects are not fleas? We rarely share it with others.
secondary_translated_text: 곤충이 벼룩이 아니라는 것을 알고 계셨나요?우리는 그것을 다른 사람들과 거의 공유하지 않습니다.

translated_text: A juggling competition?

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, you are the greatest of us all in the Flea Juggle! But will you challenge yourself to ever higher achievements?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐是耍耍之王！要挑战更高记录吗？
translated_text: Miss Hornett, you are the best of fleas! Are you trying to achieve better results?
secondary_translated_text: 호넷 양, 넌 벼룩들 중 최고야!더 나은 결과를 얻기 위해 노력하십니까?

original_en_text: Dodeshna, stranger. You are looking a little... tired, is it? Unhealthy?<page>You can rest with us here, if wish. Is nice and dark, and warmth from below brings good health.<page>Still, you should make care not to stay much long. You are not flea, after all.
original_zh_text: 多德什纳，旅者。你看着……有点累？<page>想休息可以留下。这儿又暗又暖，很适合休养。<page>但别待太久，毕竟你终究不是跳蚤。
translated_text: The Stranger: Are You Tired? - Malsaina?<page>If you want to do this, relax here. The climate is clear and dark, and the deep warmth brings health.<page>But be careful not to stay too long. After all, you are not a flea.
secondary_translated_text: 낯선 사람: 피곤하니? - 말사이나?<page>이 일을 하고 싶다면, 여기서 휴식을 취하세요.날씨가 맑고 어두워서 따뜻한 날씨가 건강하게 해준다.<page>그러나 너무 오래 머무르지 않도록 조심하십시오.결국, 당신은 벼룩이 아닙니다.

original_en_text: You still here, bug? Is rest I need before I travel. Not chat. You is trouble-type. Make my shell tense.<hpage>I shall take my leave, madam. Stay strong on your own journey. May we meet again in more hospitable surrounds.
original_zh_text: 你怎么还在？我休息够了就走。别啰嗦，感觉你身上麻烦事不少，让我甲壳发紧。<hpage>那就告辞了，女士。祝你路上顺利，我们下次再见。
translated_text: "Are you there, Dad? Before the trip, you need to rest.No cat.Pull out of the shell, which is in trouble.<hpage>- Now - I have to go, ma 'am. Be strong in the journey. We live in a wonderful environment
secondary_translated_text: "아빠 거기 계세요? "여행하기 전에, 당신은 휴식을 취해야합니다. 고양이. 곤경에 처한 껍질에서 꺼내십시오.<hpage>- 지금 - 저는 가야해요, 부인.여행 중에 강해지세요.우리는 멋진 환경에서 살고 있습니다.

original_en_text: Look, Miss Hornet! See the many lively fleas that form our caravan. Thanks to you and your hunting, so many are here! And all are eager again to travel!<page>We had once wished to match the numbers of our fabled past, yet now, we may even have exceeded them!<hpage>It is a welcome sight, Fleamaster, and the playful cheer about the caravan suggests you are a fine steward to the troupe.<page>Such kind words, Miss Hornet! How lucky we are to have found a friend so fair!<page>But now, we must away! These moors have been our host long enough. It is time to climb and hoist towards drier caves!<page>Good friend to fleas, would you join us on this next journey?
original_zh_text: 请看，大黄蜂小姐！这么多活蹦乱跳的同胞加入！多亏您帮忙，队伍越来越壮大。大家都盼着再度启程！<page>我们曾奢望恢复传说中的旅团规模，而现在或许已经超越了传说！<hpage>看见这么多跳蚤平安无事，我也很欣慰。他们的欢声笑语也证明了你是个称职的领队。<page>大黄蜂小姐过奖了！能结交您这样的朋友才是旅团的幸运！<page>但现在该启程了！沼地虽好，但不应久留，该向更干燥的洞窟进发了！<page>跳蚤之友，愿意与我们一起出发吗？
translated_text: "Look at this, Mrs. Hornett.Look at the many active fleas that make up our fleet.Thank you very much to the people! There are so many people! Everyone wants to travel again!<page>We were hoping to catch up with the legendary heroes of the past, but now we can defeat them.<hpage>Fleetmaster is a popular show, and the playful applause of the caravan proves that you 're an excellent management of the corpses.<page>- You are beautiful, miss. Horny! I 'm so lucky to have a good friend!<page>But you must go now! This land has been our master for a long time. It's time to climb to the dry caves!<page>A good friend of the fly, isn't it? Would you like to join us on our next trip?
secondary_translated_text: "여기를 보세요, 호넷 부인. 우리 함대를 구성하는 많은 활발한 벼룩을 보세요. 여러분께 감사드립니다!사람들이 너무 많아요!모두가 다시 여행하고 싶어합니다!<page>우리는 과거의 전설적인 영웅들을 따라잡기를 원했지만, 이제 우리는 그들을 이길 수 있습니다.<hpage>Fleetmaster 는 인기있는 쇼이며, 캐러밴의 장난스러운 박수는 당신이 시체 관리에 능숙하다는 것을 증명합니다.<page>- 미스, 당신은 아름답습니다.뿔이!나는 좋은 친구가 있어서 정말 운이 좋았다!<page>하지만 넌 지금 가야 해!이 땅은 오랫동안 우리의 주인이었다.마른 동굴으로 올라갈 시간입니다!<page>파리의 좋은 친구야, 그렇지?다음 여행에 우리와 함께 할 수 있습니까?

original_en_text: Marvellous! We fleas shall be overjoyed to have your company on the road.<page>Now! Our new home is calling. We must travel!
original_zh_text: 太好了！跳蚤们肯定会为与你同行而欢呼！<page>现在！该向着新家进发了！
translated_text: This is fantastic! Our club is pleased to be with you.<page>Now! It 's called a new home, you need to travel!
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 환상적이다!우리 클럽은 당신과 함께하게 되어 기쁩니다.<page>지금!그것은 새로운 집이라고 불리는데, 당신은 여행해야합니다!

original_en_text: I’m wonder at this land... Something heavy hangs above, like shadow. I’m hope the little fleas have not much danger here...
original_zh_text: 这地方不对劲……总觉得天上有黑影压着。但愿小家伙们别出事……
translated_text: I am very interested in this land. Something heavy, like a shadow, hangs. Let's hope that the small fleas are not in danger.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 이 땅에 매우 관심이 있다.그림자처럼 무거운 무언가가 매달려 있다.작은 벼룩이 위험에 빠지지 않기를 바랍니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I took your request from the wishwall in the pilgrim camp. You are seeking fleas to join your caravan?<page>Oh, yes! The time has come for us fleas to find each other and travel together, as has happened through generations before.<page>The many fleas of this kingdom should be flocking to our caravan, but times have become dangerous. You feel it too, yes? Our poor cousins, out there, in hiding!<page>But... do I understand you rightly, stranger? You will help find the poor, lost fleas? Truly?
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤首领，我在朝圣营地看到了你的祈愿。你要召集跳蚤加入旅团？<page>正是！跳蚤们该像祖辈那样聚首同行了。<page>本该有无数同胞来投奔旅团，可如今危机四伏，您也感受到了吧？可怜的同胞们还在外躲藏！<page>但……您真的愿帮忙寻找我们迷途的同胞？当真？
translated_text: <hpage>Flammaster, I have received your request on the wish wall in Pilgrim Field. Are you looking for a fleet to join your fleet?<page>Oh! Oh! Ah, yes! Now it 's time for fleas to look for each other and travel together, just like in previous generations.<page>Many fleas in the kingdom surround our caravans, but times are getting dangerous.You can feel it too, right? Really? My brother hides. "<page>More... Strange, I understand what you mean? Do you want to help me find the missing chip? - Really?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>플람 마스터, 순례 필드의 소원 벽에 대한 요청을 받았습니다.당신은 당신의 함대에 합류하기 위해 함대를 찾고 있습니까?<page>오! 오!오! 오!아, 네!이제 벼룩들이 이전 세대와 마찬가지로 서로를 찾고 함께 여행 할 때입니다.<page>왕국의 벼룩이 우리 캐러밴을 둘러싸고 있지만, 시대가 점점 위험해지고 있습니다. 당신도 그것을 느낄 수 있습니다, 그렇죠?진짜?동생은 숨어 있다. "<page>더 많은...이상해, 무슨 뜻인지 알아?내가 잃어버린 칩을 찾는 것을 도와줄래? - 진짜?

original_en_text: That great vein of bells there... some of the fleas wanted to shelter inside, but I was not so sure. The whole creaking mass seems unstable! It makes me tremble!<hpage>You were wise not to head inside, Fleamaster. A silken curse has taken hold of the settlement within. Advise your fellows to avoid that place.<page>A curse, you say?! W-well then! Our thanks are owed again. I shall let all fleas know they must not venture closer.
original_zh_text: 那串巨钟……有些跳蚤想躲进去，但我总觉得不牢靠！看着就发颤！<hpage>不在里面扎营是明智之举。那里已被丝咒侵蚀，告诫同胞远离为妙。<page>丝咒？！那……那可要多谢提醒！我这就通知大伙别靠近。
translated_text: Pulsating clock.Some fleas tried to hide inside, but I did not do it very well.The sound is very unstable.They tremble!<hpage>Master Frymaster, you better not enter. The curse of Silk has taken control of the city. I advise my friends to avoid this place.<page>You call it a curse? All right, all right! All right, all right! All right! Thanks again for your help. I warn you not to approach all fleas.
secondary_translated_text: 펄럭이는 시계. 일부 벼룩은 내부에 숨으려고했지만 나는 그것을 잘하지 못했습니다. 소리가 매우 불안정합니다. 그들은 떨고 있습니다!<hpage>프라이머스 마스터, 들어오지 않는 게 좋겠다.실크의 저주가 도시를 지배했다.나는 내 친구들에게이 장소를 피하라고 조언한다.<page>넌 그걸 저주라고 부르니?좋아요, 좋아요!좋아요, 좋아요!좋아요!다시 한번 당신의 도움에 감사드립니다.나는 모든 벼룩에 접근하지 말라고 경고한다.

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended. Your score can be seen on the board beside me.
original_zh_text: 维克纳，试炼结束。成绩在我身旁的榜上。
translated_text: The process is over, and your account is on the board next to me.
secondary_translated_text: 절차가 끝났고, 당신의 계정은 내 옆에 보드에 있습니다.

original_en_text: Ah, miss! Course you’d be one to survive through all this! Capable as you seem and all. <page>It’s a sad thing, but I can’t say most folk down here’ve fared so fortunate. And our once fine camp below ain’t no longer safe for any bug, all crushed and consumed by this black calamity.<hpage>Nowhere is safe, sir, but I am glad you few remain. Know I shall work to fix this, as best I’m able.<page>Calming our raging world? That’s a lofty goal, miss. I’m not thinkin’ any one bug’d be able to stop these happenings, but it’s heartenin’ knowing you’ve still got fire enough to feel different.<page>Rest here with us, long as you like. A little company’s about the best thing we few’re wishin’ for now.
original_zh_text: 啊！小姐。就知道您能挺过来！看着就靠谱。<page>可惜底下多数虫没这运气。咱们的好营地也被黑灾碾碎吞没了，没一处安全。<hpage>无处安全，先生，但各位幸存值得庆幸。我必会竭力修补这残局。<page>平息这混乱世道？志向够远大的，小姐。我不信单凭一虫能办到，但您有这份心总是好的。<page>您想歇多久都行，眼下能期盼的也就是有个陪伴。
translated_text: Oh my lady! You are the only one who can overcome it! You 're very competent, I know.<page>The camp below us is no longer worm-friendly, and all the worms have been crushed and swallowed up by this black catastrophe.<hpage>There is no safe place there, but I am glad that you are okay. I will do my best to solve this problem. "<page>A calm, angry world. - I don't think we can avoid mistakes, but I 'm glad to know that you 're still excited enough to change the situation.<page>If you want to relax here, small business is the best we can't expect right now.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 내 아가씨!당신은 그것을 극복 할 수있는 유일한 사람입니다!나는 당신이 매우 유능하다는 것을 알고 있습니다.<page>우리 아래의 캠프는 더 이상 벌레가 친화적이지 않으며, 모든 벌레는이 검은 재앙에 의해 분쇄되고 삼켰습니다.<hpage>그곳에는 안전한 곳이 없지만, 당신이 괜찮다는 것을 기뻐요.나는 이 문제를 해결하기 위해 최선을 다할 것이다. "<page>평온하고 화난 세상. - 나는 우리가 실수를 피할 수 있다고 생각하지 않지만, 당신이 여전히 상황을 바꿀만큼 흥분하고 있다는 것을 알게되어 기쁩니다.<page>당신이 여기에서 휴식을 취하고 싶다면, 소규모 사업은 우리가 지금 기대할 수 없는 최고입니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I bring supplies from the town of bells up above, to aid your camp and its residents.<page>Ah! Mighty thankful these folks’ll be. Most arrive here with nothin’ but their shell. Your delivery there’ll make things a little easier on ‘em.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我从钟心镇带来物资支援此营地和住民。<page>啊！大伙会感激不尽的。多数虫来到这时就剩个空壳，你这趟可算解了燃眉之急。
translated_text: <hpage>I brought supplies from Upper Bell to help your camp and its inhabitants.<page>¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! Many thanks. Most people come here with only shells. The fact that you get them here will make things easier.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 당신의 캠프와 그 주민들을 돕기 위해 Upper Bell 에서 물품을 가져 왔습니다.<page>오, 그래!오, 네!정말 감사합니다.대부분의 사람들은 껍질만 가지고 여기에 온다.당신이 그들을 여기에 가져 오는 사실은 일을 더 쉽게 만들 것입니다.

original_en_text: Mm. Mmm! Who is it? An intruder! Terrible! To interrupt a humble druid as they work!<hpage>I meant no intrusion, druid. The sound of your laughter drew me to investigate.<page>What? Laughter? No idea what you mean. Nonsense!
original_zh_text: 嗯。嗯嗯！谁在那儿？入侵者！可恶！竟敢打扰德鲁伊修行！<hpage>无心冒犯，德鲁伊。你的笑声引我前来探查。<page>什么？笑声？不知所云！荒唐！
translated_text: Oh ~! Yes! "Who are you? Invasion! That's terrible! The work of the humble droid has been interrupted!<hpage>I don't want to interrupt you, droid. His laughter prompted me to investigate.<page>What's it? Getting rid of? I don't know what you mean, idiot.
secondary_translated_text: 오 ~!네! "너는 누구니?침략!정말 끔찍하군요!겸손한 드로이드의 작업이 중단되었습니다!<hpage>방해하고 싶지 않아, 드로이드.그의 웃음소리가 나를 조사하게 했다.<page>뭐예요?제거하는 것?무슨 뜻인지 모르겠어, 바보야.

original_en_text: May your travels bring you fortune, hunter. And may the Citadel come to fear your freedom in our land.
original_zh_text: 祝你一路顺风，猎手。愿圣堡因你在这片土地上行走而战栗。
translated_text: May your journey bring you wealth, Hunter. The fortress fears its freedom on our land.
secondary_translated_text: 당신의 여행이 당신에게 부를 가져다 줄 수 있기를, 헌터.요새는 우리 땅에 있는 자유를 두려워한다.

original_en_text: Hrm? Oh, it’s you again. Please, no more talk of bells or travel. I’m trying to stay hidden.<hpage>I mean no intrusion, ma’am. Are you composing yourself here before you leave on your own journey?<page>Like all the others, my brothers and sisters who trudged off to die? No, I think I’ll linger here a little longer with my thoughts...
original_zh_text: 什……又是你啊。别提钟啊路啊的了，我正躲清净呢。<hpage>无意打扰，女士。是在为启程做准备？<page>像其他送死的兄弟姐妹一样？我看还是在这多琢磨会儿……
translated_text: What's it? What is it? You again. Stop talking about travels and trips. She tried to hide.<hpage>"Don't worry about that, miss. Are you ready before you begin your journey?<page>Like everyone else, my brothers and sisters died horribly. No, I think I 'll be here a little longer.
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요?뭐야?또 너.여행과 여행에 대해 이야기하는 것을 멈추십시오.그녀는 숨기려고 했다.<hpage>"그것에 대해 걱정하지 마세요, 아가씨.여행을 시작하기 전에 준비되었습니까?<page>다른 사람들처럼, 나의 형제 자매들은 끔찍하게 죽었다.아니, 나는 여기에 조금 더 있을 것 같아.

original_en_text: Must be terrifying out there, beyond the settlement. Nothing but monsters and madness lurking in the darkness.<page>I’ve heard tales of a safe place, though. Just up above here, where the moss paints the stones green, there’s an old village. Bit of a holy place, apparently, well protected.<hpage>I’ve visited the settlement you speak of. It was built around a burial spire, corpse-home to an ancient Weaver.<hpage>It is hardly safe though. The terrain is treacherous, and predators prowl its commons. I advise you avoid that place.<page>Oh... I see. Of course. Nowhere is really free of danger, is it? That’s just the way for us pilgrims...
original_zh_text: 外面肯定很可怕，黑暗里潜伏着怪物与疯狂。<page>不过听说上面有安身所。青苔覆石的地方有古村，据说是受庇护的圣地。<hpage>我到过那村落。它围着一座葬仪尖塔而建，是古代织者的安息之所。<hpage>那里并不安全。地势险恶，又有掠食者出没，劝你最好避开。<page>唉……果然。没有真正安全之处。朝圣者命该如此。
translated_text: There must be terrifying monsters or madmen lurking in the darkness.<page>I heard it from a safe place. A little up, moss stains the green stones, and there is an ancient village. "<hpage>I visited the building you mentioned. It was built around the spire of the cemetery, where the corpse of an old cloth was.<hpage>But this is not safe: the terrain is grown, and predators enter public places. We advise you to avoid this place.<page>¡Oh, yeah! Danger is everywhere, right? Really? for pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: 어둠 속에는 무서운 괴물이나 미치광이가 숨어 있을 것이다.<page>나는 안전한 곳에서 그것을 들었다.조금 올라가서 이끼가 녹색 돌에 얼룩을 띠고 있는 고대의 마을이 있다. "<hpage>나는 당신이 언급한 건물을 방문했다.그것은 오래된 천의 시체가있는 묘지의 첨탑 주위에 지어졌습니다.<hpage>그러나 이것은 안전하지 않습니다 : 지형이 성장하고 포식자가 공공 장소에 들어갑니다.우리는이 장소를 피하는 것을 추천합니다.<page>오, 그래!위험은 곳곳에 있다, 그렇죠?진짜? Pilgrims 를 위한

original_en_text: For though, as pilgrims, we aim our sights high and never waver from our path, the loss of a brother or sister still stops our trembling limbs in place.
original_zh_text: 纵然身为朝圣者需心志坚定，但手足殒命仍令我等颤足难行。
translated_text: As pilgrims, our goals are high and our paths are unshakable, but the loss of our brothers and sisters makes us tremble.
secondary_translated_text: 순례자로서 우리의 목표는 높고 우리의 길은 흔들리지 않지만, 형제 자매를 잃는 것은 우리를 떨게합니다.

original_en_text: Few are as foreign as you, hunter dear. Visit me when you care.<page>I’ll look forward to hearing how your steps might shake our world. Oho. Yes!
original_zh_text: 鲜少有虫如你这般，俏丽的异乡猎手。有空的话不妨再来。<page>我期待听到你的针刃撼动这片土地的那天。嚯，定会如此！
translated_text: There are very few foreigners like you. Come to me whenever you want.<page>I can't wait to see how your steps shake our world.
secondary_translated_text: 너 같은 외국인은 거의 없다.네가 원할 때마다 내게 오.<page>당신의 발걸음이 어떻게 우리 세계를 흔들고 있는지 기다릴 수 없습니다.

original_en_text: Ohh, the world trembles! But we can hear it... beating steady... beating free...
original_zh_text: 噢，大地战栗！但我们听见了……平稳的搏动……自由的搏动……
translated_text: The world is horrible! You can feel that time is steady. They danced freely.
secondary_translated_text: 세상은 끔찍해요!시간이 안정적이라는 것을 느낄 수 있습니다.그들은 자유롭게 춤을 췄다.

original_en_text: Granter refuses! I understand. Granter is petty, evil. Misguided! When your mind clears, return here. Return here and grant my wish!
original_zh_text: 授愿者拒绝！我懂。授愿者小气，邪恶。误入歧途！待你清醒，再来此地。应我祈愿！
translated_text: Grant refused. I think Grant is wrong. I misunderstood you! When you have a clear conscience, come back here. I am here to fulfill your wish!
secondary_translated_text: 그랜트가 거절했다.나는 그랜트가 틀렸다고 생각한다.내가 널 오해했어!맑은 양심이 있으면 여기로 돌아오세요.나는 당신의 소원을 성취하기 위해 여기에 있습니다!

original_en_text: Oh... you’ve come to hide down here too, then? ‘Tis a fearful world out there. If you can keep quiet, I don’t mind you joining me.<hpage>You’ve chosen a curious place to rest, ma’am. This pit of bells and the structure around it... they suggest a station for travel, though one long abandoned.<page>Aye. Rumours in the camp say these bells run throughout the lands, great veins of them, forged by our ancient kin.<page>And some even say bugs used to travel through them, in gilded carriages no less!<page>Surely such fanciful travel would be a sin for us pilgrims. We must walk and climb and crawl using only our own meagre claws... Only thus can we prove our devotion.
original_zh_text: 哦……这位小姐也来躲难？外头真是可怕。你不出声的话，可以一起躲藏。<hpage>女士，你选了个怪地方歇脚。这钟坑与周遭构造……似是废弃驿站。<page>是啊。营地传言说古虫铸就钟脉贯穿大地。<page>还有虫说以前能乘镀金车厢穿行其间！<page>这般奢靡行径对朝圣者可是大不敬！我们该用卑微虫爪攀爬跋涉……唯有如此方能证虔心。
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! Are you there to hide? The outside world is a terrible place. If you will be silent, then you will be well if you join me.<hpage>¡You have chosen a strange place.The clock tower and the adjacent buildings.They proposed to build a passenger station, although it has long been abandoned.<page>Yes, in the countryside they say that these clocks are scattered all over the earth, and that their huge lines were laid by our ancient relatives.<page>Some people said that the insects passed by, or that they walked in a golden chariot.<page>For us pilgrims, this capricious journey is undoubtedly a sin. We must walk, climb and crawl only on our claws, and only then can we demonstrate our devotion.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!너 숨어있니?바깥 세상은 끔찍한 곳이다.만일 네가 조용히 있으면, 나와 함께하면 너는 잘 될 것이다.<hpage>당신은 이상한 장소를 선택했다. 시계탑과 인접한 건물. 그들은 오랫동안 버려졌지만 여객 터미널을 건설 할 것을 제안했다.<page>예, 시골에서는 이 시계가 지구 곳곳에 흩어져 있으며, 그 거대한 선은 고대 친척들에 의해 세워졌다고 말합니다.<page>어떤 사람들은 곤충들이 지나가거나 황금 마차를 타고 걸어갔다고 말했다.<page>우리 순례자들에게는 이 변덕스러운 여행은 의심할 여지없이 죄입니다.우리는 발톱으로만 걷고, 등반하고, 기어올려야 하며, 그때만이 우리의 헌신을 보여줄 수 있다.

original_en_text: Did you take a look at the wishwall? You might’ve noticed I added a cheeky little wish of my own.<page>Fair’s fair, I did build the thing. Seems like the kingdom should be granting my wish before anyone else’s.
original_zh_text: 看过许愿墙了？应该注意到我加的小私心了吧。<page>公平嘛，墙是我造的，圣堡该先实现我的愿望才对。
translated_text: Have you seen the Wall of Desires? You may have noticed that I have added my little bad wish.<page>To be honest, I created it. The kingdom seems to satisfy my wishes.
secondary_translated_text: 욕망의 벽을 본 적이 있습니까?내가 작은 나쁜 소원을 추가했다는 것을 눈치 챘을지도 모른다.<page>솔직히 내가 만든 것 같아. 왕국은 내 소원을 만족시키는 것 같아.

original_en_text: You keep the berries to yourself? All for you? Mmm. Promise breaker! Promise breaker!
original_zh_text: 私藏莓果？全归你？嗯。背信者！背信者！
translated_text: Do you have a berry for you? For you, huh? Oh ~! The traitor! The traitor!

original_en_text: Never shared my name with you, did I? Awfully remiss of me.<page>It’s Pilby. Been nice spending time with you, miss.<hpage>Likewise, sir. It’s been some time since I had such ample opportunity for friendly conversation.<hpage>My name is Hornet. It is good to be properly acquainted at last.<page>Hornet, eh? Strong name, that. It certainly suits you, miss. Heh heh...
original_zh_text: 我还未说过姓名吧？真是失礼。<page>我叫皮尔比。和你相处很愉快，小姐。<hpage>我也是，先生。很久没有过友善交谈了。<hpage>我名为大黄蜂。幸会。<page>大黄蜂？好气魄的名字，和你很相配，哈哈……
translated_text: I have never shared my name with you, have I? I was negligent.<page>It 's a pleasure spending time with you, dear.<hpage>Besides, sir, I haven't had a chance to have a friendly conversation in a long time.<hpage>It's called Bomb. "I 'm so glad we finally officially met.<page>The Hornet? Really? That's a beautiful name, you're all right, girl. - ¡Oh, yeah!
secondary_translated_text: 나는 내 이름을 당신과 공유 한 적이 없습니다, 그렇죠?나는 부주의했다.<page>당신과 함께 시간을 보내서 반가워요, 자기야.<hpage>게다가, 선생님, 저는 오랜만에 친근한 대화를 할 수 없었습니다.<hpage>그것은 폭탄이라고 불립니다. "마침내 공식적으로 만나게 되어 매우 기쁘다.<page>호넷 (The Hornet)진짜?아름다운 이름이야, 넌 괜찮아, 아가씨. - 오, 그래!

original_en_text: The Mossberries. Do you still hunt them, little you? My wish was granted, but clear now that more are needed! More!<page>Bring more Mossberries here. Mmm. Yes, we will trade. Precious rosaries for fresh berries!
original_zh_text: 苔莓。仍在猎取吗，小小虫？我祈愿已实现，但需要更多！更多！<page>带更多苔莓来。嗯。以念珠换鲜果！
translated_text: Moss: Are you still following me, son? My wishes have been fulfilled, but now I need more! MIGHT!<page>Bring me some mousse, please. Yes, let's make a deal. Beautiful rosary of fresh berries!
secondary_translated_text: "아들아, 아직도 나를 따라오느냐? "나의 소원은 이미 이루어졌지만, 이제는 더 많은 것이 필요하다!가능!<page>무스 좀 가져다주세요.네, 합의를 합시다.신선한 베리의 아름다운 로자리!

original_en_text: <hpage>As promised, druid, I have your berries. What is your need for such common fruits?<page>Common!? No. No... Special. Cherished. Only a druid knows it! The berries bright! For my wish. My wish so dear!
original_zh_text: <hpage>如约而至，德鲁伊。莓果在此。要这寻常果实有何用？<page>寻常！？不，不……特别。珍贵。只有德鲁伊知晓！莓果明艳！为我祈愿。珍贵祈愿！
translated_text: <hpage>I promise you droid, I have your bay. "What do you want from this fruit?<page>What's normal? No, no, especially. It worries me. Only droids know this. Berry is brilliant. My wishes for my wishes are precious!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>드로이드에게 약속해, 난 네 걸음을 잡았어"이 과일에서 무엇을 원하는가? "<page>무엇이 정상인가?아니, 아니, 특히.걱정이 되네요. 드로이드들만 이걸 알고 있어요.베리는 훌륭합니다.나의 소원을 위한 나의 소원은 소중하다!

original_en_text: I’ll soon be making my way up to the great Citadel. As holy as I am with rosaries, I’m sure my path will not be an arduous one...
original_zh_text: 很快要上圣堡了。揣着这么多念珠，肯定能一路顺畅……
translated_text: I am a saint of the Rosary, but I am convinced that my journey will not be difficult.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 묵주기도의 성자이지만, 나의 여정은 어렵지 않을 것이라고 확신한다.

original_en_text: Oh! And you can’t be leavin’ without some reward for your work. Take these beads for labour.<page>Rosaries ain’t provin’ much use to us lot anymore, but hopefully you in all your journeyin’ can still put ‘em to use.
original_zh_text: 噢！您可不能白忙活。这些念珠当工钱收下吧。<page>念珠对我们这群家伙早没用了，但您四处奔波说不定还用得上。
translated_text: Oh my god! If your work is not profitable, you can not leave. I will take these pearls to the delivery point.<page>We no longer use roses, but we hope you can use them during your travels.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 세상에!당신의 직업이 수익이 없다면, 당신은 떠날 수 없습니다.나는 이 진주를 배달 지점으로 가져갈 것이다.<page>우리는 더 이상 장미를 사용하지 않지만 여행 중에 사용할 수 있기를 바랍니다.

original_en_text: You’re here, in here, so why did you send you? Hm? Did you hear my wish? Granter of wishes? You?<hpage>Granter of wishes?<page>Wishes, yes! My wish! I need fruits of the world, three little darlings. I need them, so I wish! Does the kingdom not send you, little you, to grant my desire?
original_zh_text: 你在此处，在此处，为何派你来？嗯？听到我的祈愿了？授愿者？是你？<hpage>授愿者？<page>祈愿，对！我的祈愿！我要这世间的三枚果实，小宝贝果实。我需要，所以祈愿！小小虫，王国没派你来满足我的祈愿？
translated_text: Let 's move forward, let 's move forward, right? Why did you send him? What is it? What is it? Do you feel my desire? Will your wish be fulfilled? Who are you? Who are you?<hpage>Will your desire be fulfilled?<page>Hope, yes, my wishes. I need the fruits of the world, three children. I want them, therefore I want them. Did the king send you to fulfill my wishes?
secondary_translated_text: 앞으로 나아가자, 앞으로 나아가자, 그렇죠?왜 그를 보냈니?뭐야?뭐야?내 욕망을 느껴?당신의 소원이 이루어질 것인가?넌 누구야?넌 누구야?<hpage>당신의 소원이 이루어질 것인가?<page>희망, 예, 나의 소원.나는 세 명의 아이들이 세상의 열매를 필요로 한다.나는 그들을 원한다, 그래서 나는 그들을 원한다.왕이 내 소원을 이루기 위해 당신을 보냈습니까?

original_en_text: Your travels have taken you far, haven’t they? While I’m yet to even start my journey. Shameful behaviour for a pilgrim, really, to tarry here so long.<hpage>I see no shame in it, sir. Your life is your own, and need not be squandered at the ghostly call of the Citadel. Journey out for your own sake, or not at all.<page>Heh... you truly aren’t a pilgrim, that’s for certain. That’s blasphemy, spoken with friendly intentions or not.<page>And yet... I don’t recoil from what you say. Perhaps I’m not much of a pilgrim either.
original_zh_text: 你已去过许多地方，而我尚未启程。作为朝圣者却在此踌躇不前，实在可耻。<hpage>先生，我未见可耻之处。生命属于你，不必为了圣堡幽灵般的召唤虚掷。你可以为己而行，也可以就此止步。<page>呵……你确实不是朝圣者，这种亵渎之言，无论善意与否都不能说。<page>但……我不抗拒这话。或许我也不是合格的朝圣者。
translated_text: It was a long journey, right? What? My journey has not yet begun. It is a pity that the pilgrim can stay here for so long.<hpage>Your life is yours, and you shouldn't spend it calling the ghosts of the castle.Travel alone or don't travel.<page>Hey, hey, hey. Hey, I! You are not a pilgrim, but you are a pilgrim. Whether this is true or not, it is blasphemy.<page>At the same time, or ... I'm not afraid of what you're saying. I'm not a pilgrim either.
secondary_translated_text: 긴 여행이었죠, 그렇죠?뭐야?나의 여정은 아직 시작되지 않았다.순례자들이 이렇게 오래 머물 수 있다는 것은 아쉽다.<hpage>당신의 삶은 당신의 것이며, 성의 유령을 부르면서 그것을 보내서는 안 된다. 혼자 여행하거나 여행하지 마십시오.<page>이봐 이봐 이봐이봐, 나!당신은 순례자가 아니지만 순례자입니다.이것이 사실이든 아니든 그것은 신성모독이다.<page>하지만 동시에, 또는 ...나는 네가 말하는 것을 두려워하지 않는다.나도 순례자가 아니야.

original_en_text: This stone’s a beauty, isn’t it? They say it’ll help you gather up rosaries on the road ahead. You’ll come back and share some with me, won’t you?
original_zh_text: 这石头美极了吧？据说能助你在路上收集念珠。等你回来可要分我一些！
translated_text: This stone is beautiful, isn't it? What? It is said that it helps to collect the Rosary on the way to the future. Will you come back and share this with me? Really?
secondary_translated_text: 이 돌이 예쁘죠?뭐야?미래로 가는 길에 묵주기도를 모으는 데 도움이 된다고 한다.다시 와서 저와 함께 나눠 주시겠습니까?진짜?

original_en_text: Ah, thank you for sharing, sister. For the honourable and steadfast Pilby, we will sing.
original_zh_text: 啊，多谢相告，姐妹。我们将为坚定可敬的皮尔比歌唱。
translated_text: Thank you for sharing, sister. Let's sing to the glorious and strong Bilby.
secondary_translated_text: 공유해 주셔서 감사합니다, 언니.영광스럽고 강한 빌비에게 노래합시다.

original_en_text: Mmm. You can hear it, yes? Listen close. Weak, but precious. A pulse, a beat! Faint... Our very own...
original_zh_text: 嗯。听见了吗？……细听。微弱，但珍贵。搏动，节拍！但渐弱……吾等独有的……
translated_text: Oh ~! "You hear me, don't you? Really? It looks weak, but valuable. Pulse, heartbeat! We lost consciousness too.
secondary_translated_text: 오 ~! "내 말을 들었어, 안그래?진짜?그것은 약해 보이지만 가치있다.맥박, 심박!우리는 또한 의식을 잃었다.

original_en_text: Loose rosaries filling your pockets? I can string ‘em up safe, so you won’t go losing them. Might seem a simple art, but it takes some talent to keep ‘em properly secure.
original_zh_text: 兜里念珠装满了？我可将其编织成串以防遗失。这手艺看着简单，没点天赋可编不牢靠。
translated_text: Do you have a rose in your pocket? I can keep them safe so that you never lose them. It may seem like an easy art, but it takes talent to keep them safe.
secondary_translated_text: 주머니에 장미 한 송이가 있어요?내가 그들을 안전하게 지키면 당신이 그들을 결코 잃지 않을 수 있습니다.그것은 쉬운 예술처럼 보일 수 있지만, 그들을 안전하게 유지하기 위해서는 재능이 필요합니다.

original_en_text: Hm? I recognise you. You’ve returned to the camp, then? Are you a pilgrim, or just a wanderer?<hpage>I am no pilgrim, sir, though I have travelled their paths.<page>Not a pilgrim? Well, it makes no difference, I suppose. We all must walk the roads, up and up, though most of us will fall long before we see the grand gates.<page>If you’re wise, you’ll stop here and rest a while before heading back out into that dangerous world...
original_zh_text: 嗯？我认得你。重返营地了？是朝圣者还是流浪者？<hpage>我并非朝圣者，先生，但走过他们路途。<page>不是？也罢。众生皆须行路攀爬，但大多未睹圣门便殒命。<page>你若明智，再入险地前应该在此休整……
translated_text: What's it? What is it? I know you, I know you. "Have you returned to the camp? Are you a pilgrim or a stranger?<hpage>I am not a pilgrim, but I am on his way.<page>You are not a pilgrim, right? We all had to go down the road, but most of us fell before we saw the beautiful gate.<page>If you were smart, you would stop here, rest for a while, and return to this dangerous world.
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요?뭐야?널 알아, 널 알아. "캠프로 돌아왔나? "당신은 순례자입니까, 아니면 낯선 사람입니까?<hpage>나는 순례자가 아니지만 그의 길을 가고 있다.<page>넌 순례자가 아니야, 그렇지?우리는 모두 길을 내려야 했지만, 우리 대부분은 아름다운 문을 보기 전에 넘어졌다.<page>만약 네가 똑똑하다면, 너는 여기서 멈추고 잠시 쉬고 이 위험한 세계로 돌아갈 것이다.

original_en_text: Mmm, the precious fruit! Yes, fragrant and round. So round! For you, you who finds berries, a nice reward of rosaries!
original_zh_text: 嗯，珍果！芬芳饱满，如此圆润！给你，寻果者，念珠回报！
translated_text: It is a beautiful and round fruit, fragrant. This round! For those who find the fruit, the great reward of the Rosary!
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 아름답고 둥근 과일이며 향기가 있습니다.이 라운드!그 열매를 찾는 자에게는, 로자리의 큰 상이 있습니다!

original_en_text: O-oh! Traveller! Destined for the Citadel, yes? Well, before you embark, won’t you stop and make trade with an old pilgrim?<hpage>I’d see your wares, madam, though I fear I may have nothing worthy to offer in return.<page>Oh, worry not! If you lack fine goods to trade, we can barter still. In this devout land, we deal in the currency of faith!<page>Rosaries! Those finely carved beads of prayer! If you will only share some with me, I will trade you something fair.
original_zh_text: 噢！旅者！要上圣堡吧？启程前不如和我这个老朝圣者做笔生意？<hpage>我确实想看看货品，女士，但恐怕没有等价之物。<page>没事！没有等价货物，仍可交易。虔信之地，信仰就是通货！<page>我是说念珠！为祈祷精雕细琢的念珠！要是愿意分享，我肯定给与公道的报酬。
translated_text: Oh my god! Travellers! It's a castle, right? What? - Now, before you go, why didn't they make a pact with the ancient pilgrims?<hpage>I would love to see your product, but I might have nothing to return.<page>Don't worry! The market for high-quality products, which you do not have, the market is always.In this country of religion we exchange a coin of faith!<page>The Rosary! Beautifully sculpted Rosary.If you want to share with me, then I will give you what is right. "
secondary_translated_text: 오, 세상에!여행자들!성이죠, 그렇죠?뭐야? - 자, 당신이 가기 전에, 왜 그들은 고대 순례자들과 계약을 맺지 않았습니까?<hpage>나는 당신의 제품을보고 싶지만, 나는 반환 할 것이 없을 수도 있습니다.<page>걱정 마!당신이 가지고 있지 않은 고품질 제품을위한 시장은 항상 있습니다. 종교의이 나라에서 우리는 믿음의 동전을 교환!<page>로저리 The Rosary!아름답게 조각 된 Rosary. 당신이 나와 함께 공유하고 싶다면, 나는 당신에게 옳은 것을 줄 것입니다. "

original_en_text: Seems like just a key, but who knows what it’ll unlock? I reckon it’s come from the Citadel, so it must open the way to something holy!
original_zh_text: 看着是把普通钥匙，说不定能打开什么？这东西肯定是来自圣堡的，所以肯定也能开启通往圣物的道路！
translated_text: It may seem like a simple key, but you don't know what it will open. I think I came from the castle, so I had to make my way to the sacred!
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 간단한 열쇠처럼 보일 수 있지만, 당신은 그것이 무엇을 열지 모릅니다.나는 성에서 온 것 같아, 그래서 나는 신성한 곳으로 가야했다!

original_en_text: A rare find, this. Shinier than faith and harder than a Craggler’s hide. A skilled craftsbug could fashion something nice out of it, if they’ve got the knowledge.
original_zh_text: 这可是稀罕物。比信仰耀眼，比岩甲坚硬。要是有个懂得门道的巧匠，就能将其打造成宝物。
translated_text: This is a rare discovery.Lighter than faith, harder than the skin of a tracker.With this knowledge, an experienced astronaut can do wonderful things with it.
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 희귀한 발견이다. 믿음보다 가볍고, 추적기의 피부보다 단단하다. 이 지식으로, 숙련된 우주 비행사는 그것을 사용하여 놀라운 일을 할 수 있다.

original_en_text: For comin’ all this way, take a few beads. You’ve well earned ‘em.
original_zh_text: 大老远跑来，拿几颗念珠走吧，这是你应得的。
translated_text: Bring some pearls along the way. You deserve it.
secondary_translated_text: 길을 따라 진주 몇 개를 가져 오세요.넌 그럴 자격이 있어.

original_en_text: <hpage>Druid, I require a pitcher of your Mossberry Stew to satiate a gourmand of the Citadel. Will you pass some to me?<page>Mmmm! A bug who’ll consume my berry brew? Strong they’d be to bear a taste so sharp!<page>Here is a flavour so ripe! Searing! Flavour of pleasure and pain! They too may see the visions if they taste it strong. The visions, could they see?<page>Grant the stew! For your bug, mmmm... to share the visions. Yes! We shall pass it!
original_zh_text: <hpage>德鲁伊，我需要一些苔莓浓汤满足圣堡饕客。可否分享？<page>嗯嗯！有虫愿意喝我的莓酿？肯定是强者才能接受这等烈味！<page>这风味！炽烈！痛楚与愉悦交织！多喝可见幻象。他们能见得到吗？<page>拿好！给你那虫……分享幻象。对！应当分享！
translated_text: <hpage>Dry, I need your pigeon pot to meet the needs of the castle.Can you give me anything?<page>Ooo! Do insects drink my berries? You have to be strong enough to withstand such a strong smell!<page>The taste is so rich. It burned! The aroma of happiness and sadness.If you like a strong taste, you can also check out these places.Do you see the vision?<page>A toast to the carcasses. To the BOP, yes. We share our vision. Ah, yes! Ah, yes! We are passing!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>마른, 성에 필요한 비둘기 냄비 필요해요. 뭐라도 줄 수 있어요?<page>오오!곤충이 내 열매를 마신다?이렇게 강한 냄새를 견딜 수 있을 만큼 강해져야 한다!<page>맛이 너무 풍요롭다.불타버렸어!행복과 슬픔의 향기. 강렬한 맛을 좋아한다면 이 곳들도 체크 아웃해 보세요. 비전 보이시나요?<page>시체들에게 건배를 드린다. BOP, 예.우리는 우리의 비전을 공유합니다.아, 네!아, 네!우리는 지나가고 있다!

original_en_text: Ahhh! Ahhh-ohhhh! The smell again! Stronger, stronger now! But still young yet! Listen to your sisters, little one, and grow! Oh, grow!
original_zh_text: 啊啊！啊——噢！气息再现！浓烈！但仍稚嫩！聆听你的姐妹之声，小家伙，生长吧！啊，生长！
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! The smell again! Stronger, stronger! And they are still young! Listen, sisters, little man, grow up! "Growing!
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!오, 네!오, 네!오, 네!또 냄새가 나!강해, 강해!그리고 그들은 아직 젊다!들어봐, 자매들아, 꼬마야, 자라! ' 성장!

original_en_text: Oh... mmm. Do they hurt you also, the visions? The stink? Nasty, horrible fruits. The pain!<page>Enough berries. We need no more. For you though, my one and only friend. My beloved. A reward!<page>Your amulet. Let me... transfuse. Yes. Your amulet’s tears will flow stronger still!
original_zh_text: 噢……嗯。幻象可有伤你？腐臭味？是秽果，可憎。痛楚！<page>莓果已足够，无需更多。但为你，我唯一挚友。馈赠！<page>你的护符。让我……灌注。嗯，护符的眼泪将更加汹涌！
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! Oh ~! "Did you hurt that vision? A bad smell? Unpleasant and terrible fruit. But it hurts!<page>Berry is good. I don't need more than you, my friend. Precious prize!<page>They are your advocates. let me... Blood transfusion Yes, your defender will shed more tears!
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!오 ~! "그 시각을 다치게 했습니까?나쁜 냄새?불쾌하고 끔찍한 과일.하지만 그것은 아프다!<page>베리는 좋은.나는 너보다 더 많은 것을 필요로 하지 않는다, 내 친구.소중한 상!<page>그들은 당신의 옹호자입니다.제가...수혈 예, 당신의 수비수는 더 많은 눈물을 흘릴 것입니다!

original_en_text: Mmm, the precious fruit! So precious! And perhaps now, we have enough. Enough, enough! For our work often begins, but never ends!
original_zh_text: 嗯，珍果！如此珍稀！或许……已足够。足够，够了！大业常启，但无终时！
translated_text: and precious fruits, they are so precious! Maybe that 's enough, that 's enough! Enough - that's enough! Our work often begins, but never ends!
secondary_translated_text: 과일이 너무 귀합니다.아마도 그것으로 충분할거야, 그것으로 충분할거야! Enough - 그것으로 충분하다!우리의 일은 종종 시작되지만 결코 끝나지 않습니다!

original_en_text: Ah, hello again! What a blessing to see a familiar face on this treacherous climb.<hpage>Greetings, sir. I see you have begun your pilgrimage, or else set out for your own sake. Either way, I am glad to see you here unharmed.<page>Not quite unharmed... I’ve suffered my share of scrapes and burns. That’s just the nature of the journey, I suppose.<page>But I’ve seen so much! Great metal structures and vast scorched fields! The grandeur of it all is humbling indeed, even for one like me who was so humble to begin with.<page>I’ll rest here just a little longer before resuming my climb.
original_zh_text: 啊，又见面了！能在这险途中看到熟面孔，感谢圣堡庇佑。<hpage>幸会，先生。见你安然无恙，无论为了朝圣，抑或是为了自己，我都感到欣慰。<page>倒也不是安然无恙。多少有些小伤，攀登之路上难免擦碰。<page>但这一路真是大开眼界！巨型造物、焦黑旷野，宏伟又令人敬畏！<page>我打算休息片刻就继续攀登。
translated_text: Ah, we met! "I was lucky to see familiar faces on this dangerous ascent.<hpage>Good morning, sir, I have seen you go on pilgrimage or you go alone. In any case, I am glad that you are safe.<page>He 's not entirely innocent. He also had burns and burns. I think that 's the essence of traveling.<page>I've seen so much! Huge metal structures and huge clay! Even for a person like me, who was humble from the beginning, all this greatness is really humble.<page>I 'm going to rest a bit here and continue to climb.
secondary_translated_text: 아, 우리가 만났어! "이 위험한 등반에서 익숙한 얼굴을 볼 수 있어서 운이 좋았습니다.<hpage>안녕하세요, 선생님, 저는 당신이 순례하러 가거나 혼자 가는 것을 보았습니다.어쨌든, 나는 네가 안전하다는 것을 기쁘게 생각한다.<page>그는 완전히 무죄가 아니다.그는 또한 화상과 화상을 입었다.나는 그것이 여행의 본질이라고 생각한다.<page>나는 너무 많은 것을 보았다!거대한 금속 구조와 거대한 진흙!처음부터 겸손한 나 같은 사람에게도 이 모든 위대함은 참으로 겸손한 것이다.<page>나는 여기서 잠깐 쉬고 계속 등반할 것이다.

original_en_text: Mmm! Mmm! This is them, the precious, promised fruits!<page>Drop them in, there they go, and now at last we can begin!
original_zh_text: 嗯嗯！嗯嗯！就是它们，许诺的珍果！<page>投入其中，终于……可以开始！
translated_text: Ooo! Ooooo! Thus, his promise was fulfilled.<page>Put them in their place, and now we can finally get started!
secondary_translated_text: 오오!오오오!그리하여 그의 약속은 성취되었다.<page>그들을 그들의 장소에 넣어, 이제 우리는 마침내 시작할 수 있습니다!

original_en_text: Just a piece of something greater, but finely crafted. You should take it with you, traveller, for luck.
original_zh_text: 虽然只剩残片，却很精巧。带上吧旅者，图个吉利。
translated_text: It 's a wonderful thing, but it 's well done. Luckily, travelers take them with them.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 훌륭한 일이지만, 잘 수행되었습니다.다행히도, 여행자들은 그들과 함께 가지고 간다.

original_en_text: Farewell, little pilgrim. May your shell harden the path for others to tread.
original_zh_text: 安息吧，小朝圣者。愿你的甲壳为后来者铺路。
translated_text: Farewell, Pilgrim! Your body is paving the way for others.
secondary_translated_text: 안녕히 계세요, Pilgrim!당신의 몸은 다른 사람들을위한 길을 열어줍니다.

original_en_text: Times like this, all we can do is put our heads down and try to rebuild.
original_zh_text: 这种时候，除了埋头重建还能干啥？
translated_text: All we can do in times like this is to put our heads down and recover.
secondary_translated_text: 이런 상황에서 우리가 할 수 있는 일은 머리를 숙이고 회복하는 것뿐입니다.

original_en_text: <page>Mmmm! Is it time? Our lands shake their sorrow! For the new beat, yes? Demanding! For a new rhythm...<hpage>These quakes you feel, they are not your land’s sadness, they are its collapse, one bound to happen if their source cannot be quelled.<page>What? No, no no... the beat... It is the beat our land wishes! Calls for it! Needs one new!
original_zh_text: <page>嗯嗯！！时候到了？？大地震颤，哀鸣！是为新的搏动？……如此迫切！为新的韵律……<hpage>你感知的震颤并非大地哀鸣，而是其崩解前兆。若源头不稳，终将倾覆。<page>什么？不，不不……那搏动……是大地所求！大地呼唤！亟需换新！
translated_text: <page>Ooo! Has the time come? Our country is shaking with pain! A new rhythm? Really? Highly requested! In a new rhythm<hpage>The earthquake that you are experiencing is not the pain of your land, but its destruction, and if its roots do not melt, it must happen.<page>What's it? No, no, no, no. I need a new!
secondary_translated_text: <page>오오!때가 왔나?우리 나라가 고통으로 흔들리고 있다!새로운 리듬?진짜?매우 요청!새로운 리듬으로<hpage>너희가 겪고 있는 지진은 너희 땅의 고통이 아니라 그 파괴이며, 그 뿌리가 녹지 않으면 반드시 일어날 것이다.<page>뭐예요?아니, 아니, 아니, 아니, 나는 새 것이 필요하다!

original_en_text: Head quick for that vein of bells, and find my uncle hidden there. If anyone’s able to point you to a cure for that thing twisting within your shell, it’ll be him.
original_zh_text: 速速前往钟脉，寻我叔父踪迹。要说有谁能解你甲壳内的扭曲之物，非他莫属。
translated_text: We quickly approached the sound of the bell, and the uncle disappeared.If there is one person who can show you a cure for body distortion, it is he.
secondary_translated_text: 우리는 빨리 종소리에 접근했고, 아저씨가 사라졌다. 몸이 왜곡되는 치료법을 가르쳐 줄 사람이 있다면, 바로 그 사람이었다.

original_en_text: Mmm! Mmm. Who are you, little you? Not a wish granter. For you haven’t enough fruits. Three we need, three I need! Find them, find them!
original_zh_text: 嗯嗯！嗯。你是谁，小小你？不是授愿者。苔莓不够。要三颗，我要三颗！去找，快去找！
translated_text: Ooo! Oh ~! "Who are you, child? This is not a wishfulfillment. Because fruit is not enough. We need three! You need three! I found it, I found it!
secondary_translated_text: 오오!오 ~! "너는 누구야, 꼬마야?이것은 소원 성취가 아니다.왜냐하면 과일이 충분하지 않기 때문이다.우리는 3 개가 필요하다! 3 개가 필요해요!찾았다, 찾았다!

original_en_text: Ah! Here she is, safe after all! I was worried your battle with that enormous beast had left you badly wounded.<page>Shames me to have left you in danger there, missy, but I’m no warrior, and my tools ain’t no match for a creature like that.<hpage>It is well that you kept yourself safe. This settlement needs a fixer now, not a warrior.<page>Heh, maybe that’s true. Times like these all we can do is put our heads down and try to rebuild.
original_zh_text: 啊！你还活着！我还担心你和那头巨兽搏斗会受重伤。<page>让你独自涉险真是惭愧，但我不是战士，工具也对付不了那种怪物。<hpage>你保全自身是对的。这里需要的是维修师，不是战士。<page>嘿，或许吧。这种时候，埋头干活才是正理。
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! You are here, you are safe. You were seriously wounded in the battle with the beast.<page>- Madam, I am ashamed to endanger you, but I am not a soldier, and my tools do not resist this creature. "<hpage>Guaranteeing your own safety is great, and this decision requires a mediator, not a warrior. "<page>All we can do in times like this is to put our heads down and recover.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!오, 네!당신은 여기에 있고, 당신은 안전합니다.너는 짐승과의 싸움에서 심하게 부상을 입었다.<page>- 부인, 당신을 위험에 빠뜨리는 것은 부끄럽지만, 저는 군인이 아니며, 제 도구는 이 생물에 저항하지 않습니다. "<hpage>자신의 안전을 보장하는 것은 훌륭하며, 이 결정은 전사가 아닌 중재자가 필요합니다. "<page>이런 상황에서 우리가 할 수 있는 일은 머리를 숙이고 회복하는 것뿐입니다.

original_en_text: Rest here with us, long as you like. Mightn’t be much time left, but at least we few won’t have to face that fate alone.
original_zh_text: 您想歇多久都行。虽然时日无多，但至少不必孤零零面对。
translated_text: Time may be short, but at least some of us don't have to face this fate alone.
secondary_translated_text: 시간이 짧을 수도 있지만 적어도 우리 중 일부는 혼자 이 운명에 직면 할 필요가 없습니다.

original_en_text: Ah! Glad I caught you for a moment, miss. You’ve done a fair service to this camp, given much more’n most.<page>I’d been thinkin’ on all your efforts, and set to making a little something to repay ‘em.<page>S’only a token, really! But I’ve put all me talent into it, much as I’ve got! Something to keep you company on the lonely roads above.<page>Hold onto it on your travels, and remember that you’re always welcome down here with us.
