SmartNuu 는 당신이 어디에 있는지 추적 할 수 있습니다. 칼을보고 냄새를 맡으십시오.<page>그것은 당신이 당신의 아름다운 누드를 얻었다는 곳입니다.그 둥지 안에는 어둠 속에서 코를 콧구멍을 콧구멍을 부는 거대한 악어가 살고 있었다.<page>돌들은 여전히 쓴맛으로 가득 차 있고, 환자 누이가 그것을 집어 들고 있습니다!<hpage>노의 하드 코어 환경에서는 배울 것이 많지만 위험도 많다.필요에 따라 호기심을 채워주고 어둠 속에서 감각을 훈련하십시오.

original_en_text: Don’t let defeat weigh on you, nimble bug! If strength remains, simply step again to the challenge. Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 别灰心！还有力气就再比一次！
translated_text: Don't let yourself be overwhelmed by failures, flexible mistakes.If we stay, we will fight again.Let 's go together!
secondary_translated_text: 실패에 사로잡히지 말고, 유연한 실수에 사로잡히지 말고, 우리가 머무르면 다시 싸워야 한다. 함께 가자!

original_en_text: Oh! Those horrible beasty-beasts are gone! Much and many thanks for you, mighty warrior!<hpage>It was a simple thing, small bug. I assume you are Tipp, the courier?<hpage>Frey, the Bellhart trader, seemed concerned for your safety... and for the cargo you carry.<page>She sent you?! Bah! She needs to learny-learn a little patience! I’m is barely been away! But still... is lucky-lucky for me you came.
original_zh_text: 哇！那些丑、丑八怪全被干掉了！多谢勇士！<hpage>举手之劳。你是蒂普？<hpage>钟心镇的芙蕾很担心你……还有你带的货。<page>她找的你？切！让她学、学着点耐心！我才离开一会儿！
translated_text: Oh! Oh! The beast is gone! Thank you, great soldier.<hpage>You are a broker, right? Really?<hpage>Frey, Berhart 's merchant, seems concerned about his safety and the cargo he has.<page>Did she send it to you? Ooh! You have to learn to be patient! I hardly ever went out! However, even then... You are lucky to be here.
secondary_translated_text: 오! 오!오! 오!짐승이 사라졌다!감사합니다, 위대한 군인님.<hpage>당신은 중개인 맞죠?진짜?<hpage>베르하트의 상인 프레이는 그의 안전과 그가 가지고 있는 화물을 걱정하는 것 같다.<page>그녀가 당신에게 보냈습니까?오, 오!참을성 있는 법을 배워야 한다!나는 거의 밖에 나가지 않았다!하지만, 그 때에도...당신은 여기에 있는 것이 행운입니다.

translated_text: Map of the Beach Car

original_en_text: Well, I’m is be off now. That old grubly-grub in the bell will come after me herself if she not get her goods!
original_zh_text: 好吧，我这就送货去。再不回去那个老、老财迷要亲自追来了！
translated_text: If the old stubborn bell does nothing, it will come to me.
secondary_translated_text: 고집이 든 종이 아무것도 하지 않으면, 그것은 나에게 올 것이다.

original_en_text: Now I must train, and strive, further and faster by your example. Your skill upon these tracks has roused my spirit, nimble bug. You shall forever have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 现在，我要以你为榜样加倍训练！你点燃了我的斗志！我会永远感谢你的！
translated_text: Now I have to train, follow his example and move further and faster.Your skills in these tracks have awakened my mind, Bug Agile.Always thank you for your support.
secondary_translated_text: 이제 나는 훈련해야, 그의 모범을 따르고 더 빨리 이동. 이 트랙에서 당신의 기술은 내 마음을 깨웠다, 버그 민첩한. 항상 당신의 지원에 감사드립니다.

original_en_text: A town built within the thick vein of bells that runs through Pharloom’s core. One wonders who would craft so many, and for what purpose?
original_zh_text: 建在钟脉上的小镇。谁造的这么多钟？图什么？
translated_text: A city surrounded by a vein of deep bells that runs through the heart of Faro. I want to know who did this for what.
secondary_translated_text: 파로의 중심부를 가로질러 흐르는 깊은 종맥으로 둘러싸인 도시.나는 누가 무엇을 위해 이것을 했는지 알고 싶다.

original_en_text: Hornet Wielding Needle! With my master’s passing, I have resolved to improve my skills that, in time, I may match her prime.<page>Much work I must do to achieve that goal. I have found this wide bare stone fine ground on which to train.<page>Would you spar with me now? Raise that blade and test my rings! You may prove my greatest challenge yet.
original_zh_text: "使针的小姑娘！导师不在了，我决定要练到她巅峰水平。<page>这块裸岩地正适合特训。<page>来比划比划？亮兵器吧！你或许是我最大的挑战。"
translated_text: After the death of the Master, I was determined to improve my skills and eventually reach the top of the Master.<page>It takes a lot of work to achieve this goal. I could find this wide place as a bare stone and crawl to it. "<page>Do you want to compete with me? Lifting the sheet and checking the ring is probably the biggest challenge I have ever faced.
secondary_translated_text: 스승이 돌아가신 후, 나는 나의 기술을 향상시키고 결국 스승의 정상에 도달하기로 결심했다.<page>이 목표를 달성하기 위해서는 많은 노력이 필요하다.나는 이 넓은 곳을 벌거벗은 돌처럼 찾아서 기어갈 수 있었다. "<page>나랑 경쟁하고 싶니?시트를 들어 올리고 반지를 확인하는 것은 아마도 내가 직면 한 가장 큰 도전일 것입니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your charts and tools show fine skill, Shakra. I’ve met few who’d match your talent.<page>Cartography! Peh. Bakallo! It is a craft-skill common amongst my tribe. Most important to keep one’s mind sharp when on a journey.<page>The charting of caverns, the memory of travel, the knowing of one’s place within the kingdom, an engaging task for a warrior’s mind.<page>An unfortunate thing that my great mentor never learnt the skill. Her talent at getting lost... I should almost be impressed...
original_zh_text: <hpage>你的图纸工具很专业，很少见过这般手艺。<page>测绘？呵！吧咔咯！这是我们部落必学的手艺，最重要的是能在旅途中保持专注。<page>记山洞、画路线、辨方位，最适合战士动脑子的活计。<page>可惜我得导师没这本事。她迷路的本事……反而令我佩服……
translated_text: <hpage>Shakla, her cards and tools demonstrate great skills. Few people can compare with their talent. "<page>Create a Map! PepperCaro! This is a common skill of our tribe.It is very important to clear your head while traveling.<page>Mapping caves, traveling through memories, and knowing your place in the kingdom is a fascinating job for the warrior spirit.<page>Unfortunately, my senior master did not learn this skill.Loss of talents that I am almost impressed with.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakla, 그녀의 카드와 도구는 훌륭한 기술을 보여줍니다.자신의 재능과 비교할 수 있는 사람은 거의 없다. "<page>지도를 만드세요! PepperCaro!이것은 우리 부족의 공통 기술입니다. 여행 중에 머리를 맑게하는 것이 매우 중요합니다.<page>동굴을 지도화하고, 기억을 통해 여행하며, 왕국에서 자신의 위치를 아는 것은 전사 정신에 대한 매혹적인 직업입니다.<page>안타깝게도, 나의 선배는 이 기술을 배우지 않았다. 내가 거의 감명을 받았던 재능의 손실.

original_en_text: Lots of good stuff tucked away in this old prison... lovely place to bring a lucky little snitchbug like Grindle! What a favour those lugs did us! O-hoho!
original_zh_text: 这破监狱藏着不少好货呀……格林德尔就爱关在这种地方！哦嚯嚯！
translated_text: There are a lot of good things about this old prison, what a wonderful place to house a happy informer like Grindell! How helpful is this ear! - Oh, oh!
secondary_translated_text: 이 오래된 감옥에는 좋은 점이 많이 있으며, 그린델 같은 행복한 정보원을 수용 할 수있는 멋진 장소입니다!이 귀는 얼마나 도움이 되나! - 오, 오!

original_en_text: Oooh, ma. Miss grown-up, you deny poor Nuu? So sour!<hpage>I am sorry, Nuu. Though I recognise the value in your wish, my own task is too pressing.
original_zh_text: 呜呜，天啊。大姐姐，你拒绝可怜的努努？好伤心！<hpage>抱歉，努努。我知道你这份祈愿的价值，但我的使命更为紧迫。
translated_text: Oh, mother! Do you reject the poor? Too much acid.<hpage>- I understand the importance of your wishes, but my mission is very urgent.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 어머니!당신은 가난한 사람을 거부합니까?너무 많은 산성.<hpage>- 나는 당신의 소원의 중요성을 이해하지만, 나의 임무는 매우 긴급하다.

original_en_text: Come to rest here, miss grown-up? Then let Nuu see our journal, for she is eager to see your cuts!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐来这休息？那快让努努看看记录册，等不及要看你的战果啦！
translated_text: Sir, aren't you here to rest? You want to watch your video, so Nui, take a look at our newspaper!
secondary_translated_text: 선생님, 여기서 쉬는 게 아닌가요?영상을 보고 싶어서 누이, 우리 신문을 봐!

original_en_text: This great structure... It would have taken the lifetimes of so many bugs to build it. Now its wounds run deep, and I can hear the groaning of its final breaths.<page>Everything that grows must pass, I suppose. Still, to witness even its current state is a privilege I’ll not squander.<page>And what of you, friend Hornet? Where are your travels taking you?<hpage>They have taken me deep, and will take me yet deeper still. I have a responsibility to cut this land free of its dark fate.<hpage>That is no concern of yours though, sir. You should continue your own journey, albeit with a claw on your weapon at all times.
original_zh_text: 这宏伟建筑……不知耗费了多少代虫的心血。如今却只能发出垂死呻吟。<page>盛极必衰吧，大概。不过能见证这最后的余晖也是荣幸。<page>你呢？你的旅途通向哪里？<hpage>我要往更深处去，我有责任斩断这片土地的诅咒。<hpage>但这与你无关。继续你的旅程吧，但要记得握紧武器。
translated_text: It takes a lifetime to make a lot of mistakes, the wound was coming down, and I could feel the sighs of my last breath.<page>The opportunity to see it this way is a privilege not to be missed.<page>What about you, Bumblebee? Where will your journey lead you?<hpage>They love me deeply, and they love me deeply. My duty is to free this land from its dark fate.<hpage>Even if the weapons still have points, you will have to continue the journey.
secondary_translated_text: 수많은 실수를 저지르는 데 평생 걸렸는데, 상처가 내려가고 있었고, 나는 마지막 숨을 쉬는 한숨을 느낄 수 있었다.<page>이런 식으로 그것을 볼 수있는 기회는 놓칠 수 없는 특권입니다.<page>너 어때, 범블비야?당신의 여행은 당신을 어디로 데려 갈 것입니까?<hpage>그들은 나를 깊이 사랑했고, 그들은 나를 깊이 사랑했다.나의 임무는 이 땅을 그 어두운 운명에서 해방시키는 것이다.<hpage>무기가 여전히 포인트를 가지고 있더라도, 당신은 여행을 계속해야합니다.

original_en_text: To our safe haven? Our home... This is what’s left of it after the great breaking began.<page>There was that terrible noise from above. Everything shook and fell apart, and the black threads sprung up from beneath. Many a poor pilgrim has already been lost to the destruction.<page>You might have been too, if not for some fleeing pilgrims who found you fallen and carried you back to us.<hpage>The black threads... I may understand their source.<hpage>I must speak with the old Caretaker. Do you know what has become of him? I see he has left you his garb.<page>Oh, yes. He charged me with looking after those remaining here, said he had to confer with his family down below.<hpage>Down below... Then they have slunk away to hide in their ruined chapel.<hpage>I must pay them a visit. Thank you, Sherma. Stay safe, and take care of your fellow pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 这里原本是我们的避难所……大崩塌之后就变成这样了。<page>头顶传来可怕的巨响，天花板塌了，地下还冒出黑丝，好多同袍都被卷走了。<page>要不是几个逃难的同袍发现你昏倒在路边，恐怕你也……<hpage>那些黑丝……我大概知晓其源头。<hpage>我得去找老看守者。你可知道他去哪了？你穿着他的衣服。<page>他让我照顾留下的人，说要去下面和家人商量事情。<hpage>下面……肯定是躲到破教堂里了。<hpage>我得去找他们。你多保重，照顾好大家。
translated_text: A safe haven? Our house was left after the Pride collapse.<page>There was a terrible noise from above.Everything trembles and collapses, and a black line comes out from the bottom.Many poor pilgrims died during the destruction.<page>If it weren't for some fugitives who found him and brought us back, you could be the same person.<hpage>The black line, we see its origin.<hpage>I need to talk to the old guard. Do you know what happened to him? These are his clothes. "<page>Oh, yes, I told him that I had to take care of those who stayed here and consult with the family downstairs.<hpage>He then entered the destroyed church.<hpage>They must be visited. Thank you very much, Shaman. Be safe and take care of your pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: 안전한 피난처가?우리 집은 프라이드가 무너진 후에 버려졌다.<page>위쪽에서 끔찍한 소음이 들렸다. 모든 것이 떨리고 무너지고, 바닥에서 검은 선이 나오고, 파괴 중에 많은 가난한 순례자들이 죽었다.<page>그를 찾아 우리를 데려온 도망자가 아니었다면, 당신은 아마 같은 사람이었을 것입니다.<hpage>검은 선, 우리는 그것의 기원을 볼 수 있습니다.<hpage>나는 늙은 경비원과 이야기해야 한다.그에게 무슨 일이 있었는지 아세요?이것은 그의 옷이다. "<page>아, 네, 저는 여기 머무는 사람들을 돌보고 아래층의 가족들과 상담해야 한다고 말했습니다.<hpage>그는 파괴된 교회 안으로 들어갔다.<hpage>그들은 반드시 방문해야 한다.정말 감사합니다, 샤먼.안전하고 순례자를 돌봐라.

original_en_text: Bakkana! A battle well won! The haunted bugs have been defeated and the way forward is yours. Let us meet again soon, away from this dreadful Citadel.
original_zh_text: 啵咔呐！赢得漂亮！迷途虫都被消灭了，你可以继续前行了。后会有期，离这鬼圣堡远点。
translated_text: A victorious battle in Bacan. The ghost worm has been defeated, and the way forward is yours. Choose from this terrible castle, and soon you will see it.
secondary_translated_text: 바칸에서 승리한 전투유령 벌레는 패배했고, 앞으로의 길은 당신의 것입니다.이 끔찍한 성에서 선택, 곧 당신은 그것을 볼 것입니다.

original_en_text: Huge caves ascending to Pharloom’s Citadel. The roads are slowly being devoured by sand and howling wind.
original_zh_text: 通向圣堡的巨洞，风沙正在逐渐吞噬这里的道路。
translated_text: A huge cave that extends over the castle of Phalem.The road was absorbed in the sand and roar.
secondary_translated_text: 파렘 성 위로 뻗어 있는 거대한 동굴. 도로가 모래와 포효에 흡수되었다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Farewell, tall bug, until we cross again.<page>Or until death calmly claims us both...
original_zh_text: <hpage>再会，下次碰面……<page>或许就是我们的死期……
translated_text: <hpage>Goodbye, until we get back.<page>Until death passes in peace,
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>안녕, 우리가 돌아올 때까지.<page>죽음이 평화롭게 지나갈 때까지,

original_en_text: Again and again you prove your mastery, nimble bug, yet still I never tire of the challenge!<page>As reward for such an impressive feat of endurance, I have only this small trophy, a memento given by my own speed teacher, now fairly passed to you.
original_zh_text: 你一次又一次证明了自己！但我永不厌倦挑战！<page>对这份惊人耐力的奖励，我只有这小奖杯了，是我师父给我的，现在传给你了！
translated_text: You have proven your skills many times, your agility, but I love this challenge!<page>As a reward for such an impressive feat of endurance, I have this little trophy. In memory of my master of speed, I hand it over only now.
secondary_translated_text: 당신은 당신의 기술을 여러 번 증명했습니다, 당신의 민첩성, 하지만 나는이 도전을 사랑!<page>이렇게 인상적인 인내의 업적에 대한 보상으로, 나는 이 작은 트로피를 가지고 있다.스피드 마스터를 기억하기 위해, 나는 지금만 그것을 넘겨주었다.

original_en_text: <page=S>Bring us the hearts, Old One. Make’em beat, fierce and final. See for yourself the forgotten strength of this land of bugs before we burn those memories in its saving.
original_zh_text: <page=M>把心带来，古老者。通过它们的搏动，见证这片虫族土地被遗忘的伟力，再焚尽这些记忆换取救赎。
translated_text: <page=S>Dear friend, give me a heart.In the end, she failed.Before you save these memories, look at the strength of this forgotten land of insects.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>사랑하는 친구, 나에게 마음을 줘. 결국 그녀는 실패했다. 이 기억들을 저장하기 전에, 곤충의 잊혀진 땅의 힘을 보라.

original_en_text: Tch... Hahahaa. Marvelous! So the spider knows something of fathomless beings, and still it hopes to stand against one, a god... <page>Where do you hide this boundless strength you claim, spider? I’ve watched your struggle towards us. Yours was a painful, broken trek. One needs grace to stand before the divine.<hpage>Then best you keep watching, child. I’ve found those who claim themselves a god can rarely match the title.<hpage>And experience tells me, even gods can fall.
original_zh_text: 哈！有意思！明知对手是神还妄想反抗？<page>你的底气在哪？爬得又慢又狼狈，谒见神明要优雅！<hpage>那你就继续看好了。自封为神的存在往往名不副实。<hpage>何况经验告诉我，即使是神也会陨落。
translated_text: His name is Hail, that 's great. Spiders know something about unconscious beings, but they still want to fight with God.<page>Where is the Infinite Power? I have seen the struggle with you. The journey is a painful and broken journey. Man needs grace to stand before God.<hpage>You better see children, I don't think someone who claims to be God deserves that title.<hpage>Experience shows us that even God can fall.
secondary_translated_text: 그의 이름은 헤일이고, 그것은 훌륭합니다.거미는 무의식적인 존재에 대해 뭔가를 알고 있지만, 그들은 여전히 하나님과 싸우고 싶어합니다.<page>무한한 힘은 어디에 있는가?나는 당신과 함께 싸운 것을 보았다.이 여행은 고통스럽고 깨진 여행입니다.인간은 하나님 앞에 서기 위해 은혜가 필요하다.<hpage>아이들을 보는 게 좋을 것 같은데, 신이라고 주장하는 사람은 그런 칭호를 받을 자격이 없다고 생각합니다.<hpage>경험은 심지어 하나님도 넘어질 수 있다는 것을 보여준다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you look well at home in these wilds.<page>Poshanka! These scorched fields offer many paths and much combat. To leap from vantage upon the red-shells or to meet them face-front with rings ready? These are decisions to live for!<page>I am much surprised those soft pilgrims ever safely climbed this scorched and savage place.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，我看你在这荒野中自在的很。<page>啵尚咔！这片荒野多的是战斗机会。是从高处突袭红壳怪？还是正面对决？这才是战士的生活！<page>那些软脚的朝圣者能爬上这鬼地方，倒是让我吃惊。
translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, you feel at peace in this desert.<page>Boshanka! BOSHANKA! These burned fields have provided many roads and many battles.Should I jump into the red shell or put on a ring and greet it from the forehead? This is the choice we are living!<page>I was amazed that the pilgrims of the tongues were saved in this burnt and barbaric place.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>샤크라, 당신은 이 사막에서 평화를 느낀다.<page>보선카! BOSHANKA!이 불타는 들판은 많은 길과 많은 전투를 제공했습니다. 붉은 껍질에 뛰어 들어서야합니까, 아니면 반지를 착용하여 이마에서 인사를해야합니까?이것이 우리가 살고 있는 선택입니다!<page>나는 방언의 순례자들이 이 불타고 야만적인 곳에서 구원받았다는 것에 놀랐다.

original_en_text: Here, the proof of our majesty... mark of our divine right...
original_zh_text: 这是王权之证……神授之印……
translated_text: It is part of our greatness, the symbol of the sacred law.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 우리의 위대함의 일부이며, 신성한 율법의 상징입니다.

original_en_text: Hoi hoi! A nimble opponent appears. At last! At last!<hpage>If you are seeking challengers, sir, you should choose a location less far afield. It is rare chance I, or any bug, would come upon this distant cavern.<page>True! Though once discovered, could there be a more perfect spot? This giant, boney body, so distant from Pharloom’s ails.<page>Here, freely, we can test our speed and our sleek shells. Here we may race!<page>You must be eager to step to the task, challenger? Fulfil my wish! Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！终于来个能跑的！<hpage>先生，若想找虫比试，不该待在如此偏远之地。<page>有道理，但最棒的赛道就在这！还远离纺络的破事。<page>这里能尽情展现速度与甲壳之美！来赛一场吧！<page>你也等不及了吧？快来满足我的愿望，一起测试极限！
translated_text: What's it? ! Flexible opponent, finally! Infinitely!<hpage>If you are looking for a rival, choose a place that is not too far away. There was little chance that I or the insects could get into this distant cave.<page>П р о д а л а. ! ! But once you find it, what is perfect? This huge bony corpse is far from the state farm.<page>Here you can freely test your speed and agility. Here you can compete.<page>Challenger? Do you want to do this? May my wish be fulfilled! Explore the boundaries together!
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요? !유연한 상대, 마침내! Infinity!<hpage>경쟁자를 찾고 있다면, 너무 멀지 않은 곳을 선택하십시오.나나 곤충들이 이 먼 동굴에 들어갈 가능성은 거의 없었다.<page>프로달라. ! !하지만 일단 당신이 그것을 발견하면, 무엇이 완벽합니까?이 거대한 뼈로 된 시체는 주 농장에서 멀리 떨어져 있습니다.<page>여기에서 당신은 자유롭게 당신의 속도와 민첩성을 테스트 할 수 있습니다.여기서 당신은 경쟁 할 수 있습니다.<page>챌린저?이거 하고 싶니?나의 소원이 이루어지기를 바랍니다!함께 경계를 탐구하라!

original_en_text: Our capital, built grand... The seat of our sovereignty... slipped from my mind...<page>Why does it fade? Why can I not recall that sacred place?
original_zh_text: 我的宏伟的都城……我的王座……为什么记不清了……<page>为什么消失了……为什么想不起圣地模样……
translated_text: Our capital is excellent, where is the sovereignty? She disappeared from my head.<page>Why would they disappear? Why do you not remember the holy place?
secondary_translated_text: 우리 자본은 훌륭하다. 주권은 어디 있느냐?그녀는 내 머리속에서 사라졌다.<page>왜 그들은 사라졌을까?왜 거룩한 곳을 기억하지 않는가?

original_en_text: Zaza and I will tarry here a little longer... These pilgrims need watching over, and we are committed to the task.
original_zh_text: 我和扎扎会在这多待一会……这些朝圣者需要照看。
translated_text: Zaza and I will stay here a little longer, these pilgrims need to be taken care of, and we are dedicated to this mission.
secondary_translated_text: 자자와 나는 여기서 조금 더 머물 것입니다, 이 순례자들은 돌볼 필요가 있으며, 우리는이 임무에 전념합니다.

original_en_text: Delicious! I like you already!<page>But what a bore it would be to cut you down now, when you’re so achingly close to our grand Citadel...<page>Climb higher, little spider. I want to savour your struggle just a little longer!
original_zh_text: 有意思！我开始喜欢你了！<page>但现在杀你太无聊了，离圣堡就差一步……<page>继续爬吧小蜘蛛！让我想多看看你挣扎的样子！
translated_text: delightful! I love him already!<page>But it would be boring to cut it off now that you 're near our beautiful castle. "<page>"Wake up, little spider! I want to fight again.
secondary_translated_text: 맛있는!나는 이미 그를 사랑한다!<page>그러나 지금 당신이 우리 아름다운 성 근처에 있기 때문에 그것을 끊는 것은 지루할 것입니다. "<page>"일어나, 작은 거미야!나는 다시 싸우고 싶다.

original_en_text: But Nuu is sensible, she understands. Miss grown-up has purpose, she must be away.<page>The cleaning can wait for another time. Nuu is patient... always patient.
original_zh_text: 但努努很懂事，知道大姐姐有正事要忙。<page>清洁可以等下次，努努很耐心……最有耐心了……
translated_text: Danny is smart and understanding. This woman has a purpose, and she has to go.<page>I will wait for next time to clean up. You are very patient. Always be patient.
secondary_translated_text: 대니는 영리하고 이해력이 있다.이 여자는 목적이 있고, 가야 한다.<page>다음번에는 청소를 위해 기다릴게요.넌 참을성이 많구나.항상 인내심을 가져라.

original_en_text: <hpage>You seem to have some familiarity with this prison and its guards. Do you know a path to escape?<page>Escape! A little jailbug like you ain’t ever escapin’ anything! Get out of here, will you? Stop bothering us! You got nothing to steal, so we got nothing to talk about!
original_zh_text: <hpage>你看起来对这里很熟，知道越狱路线吗？<page>想逃？就你？下辈子吧！别烦我们了，身上什么也没有，没资格跟爷说话！
translated_text: <hpage>He knows the prisons and the guards. Do you know how to escape?<page>RUN! A prisoner like you will never escape! "Get out of here and don't bother me anymore, there 's nothing to steal, there 's no quarrel!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>그는 교도소와 경비원들을 알고 있다.어떻게 탈출하는지 아십니까?<page>달아나!너 같은 죄수는 결코 탈출하지 못할거야! "이곳에서 나가서 더 이상 나를 귀찮게 하지마, 훔칠 것도 없고, 다툼도 하지마! "

original_en_text: Though the dust has not yet settled over our battle here, Zaza and I must soon be away. The memory of our village calls us ever onward. Farewell, brave sister!
original_zh_text: 虽然战斗激起的尘埃还没落定，但我们该走啦。村里的大伙催着我们前进呢，保重，姐妹！
translated_text: The struggle here is not over yet, but Zaza and I must get out as soon as possible. The memory of the people is leading us forward. Farewell, good brother.
secondary_translated_text: 여기의 투쟁은 아직 끝나지 않았지만, 자자와 나는 가능한 한 빨리 나가야 한다.국민의 기억은 우리를 앞으로 이끌고 있다.안녕히 계세요, 좋은 형님.

original_en_text: <page>You would challenge again, nimble bug? You have proven yourself time and again.<hpage>Your course can still provide understanding, sir. Upon it, I see my own limits clearer and learn to push them further. <page>Of course! Of course! And I can learn much following behind your fair form.<page>I’d need only a moment, and the track would again be ready.
original_zh_text: <page>还要比？你已经证明实力了。<hpage>还需练习，你的赛道让我能看清自己的极限。<page>那当然好！跟在你这矫健身姿后面也能学到很多！<page>稍等，马上就能布置好新赛道！
translated_text: <page>The challenge is Mrs. Again. You 've tried yourself many times.<hpage>Teacher, your path still brings insight.Since then, I have learned to see my limits more clearly and push them even further.<page>Obviously! Yes, no! There is so much to learn from this beauty.<page>It will take some time and the course will be ready again.
secondary_translated_text: <page>도전은 다시 한 번 미스입니다.당신은 여러 번 자신을 시도했습니다.<hpage>스승님, 당신의 길은 여전히 통찰력을 가져다줍니다. 그 이후로, 저는 제 한계를 더 명확하게보고 그들을 더 밀어 넣는 법을 배웠습니다.<page>당연히!그래, 안돼!이 아름다움에서 배울 것이 많습니다.<page>시간이 좀 걸릴 것이고, 코스가 다시 준비될 것이다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your threats are worthless, child. If you are my foe, stay your voice and raise your blade.
original_zh_text: <hpage>不必多费口舌，孩子，要打的话，就亮兵器吧。
translated_text: <hpage>If you are my enemy, lift up your voice and raise your sword. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>만일 네가 나의 적이라면, 네 목소리를 높이고 네 칼을 들어라. "

original_en_text: I can save you, little spider. All the trouble you’d face above. All the suffering. It’s so simple.<page>I’ll just skewer you here and now, pluck that flickering life right out of you.
original_zh_text: 我能救你哦~小蜘蛛。只要现在刺穿你，把那点小火星掐灭……<page>所有的苦痛，所有的折磨，就都能解脱了。
translated_text: "I can help you, Spider. All the problems they face. Any suffering is very simple.<page>I am joining you now and bringing with me the life that shines within you.
secondary_translated_text: "내가 도와줄 수 있어, 스파이더.그들이 직면한 모든 문제.모든 고통은 매우 간단하다.<page>나는 지금 너희와 합류하고 너희 안에 빛나는 생명을 가져오고 있다.

original_en_text: How sad. A little spider has fallen from its cage. So lost. So weak. Poor little morsel.
original_zh_text: 可怜的小蜘蛛从笼中跌落。多迷茫，多脆弱，真是令人心疼。
translated_text: It is sad that the little spider fell out of the cage, so I lost it. I was very weak. Poor child.
secondary_translated_text: 작은 거미가 우리에서 떨어졌기 때문에 슬프게도, 나는 그것을 잃었다. 나는 매우 약했다.불쌍한 아이.

original_en_text: Ooooh ma, is well-begun. Many creatures have been recorded, but many many more still to be learned of!<page>Miss grown-up, you should rest quick and venture out to hunt again soon, thinks Nuu!
original_zh_text: 哇哇，开了个好头！记了好多生物，但还有更多等着发现！<page>大姐姐赶紧休息完再去打猎呀！
translated_text: Many organisms have already been documented, but we need to know more about them.<page>Wake up early and go hunting as soon as possible.
secondary_translated_text: 많은 유기체들이 이미 문서화되었지만, 우리는 그들에 대해 더 많은 것을 알아야 한다.<page>일찍 일어나서 가능한 빨리 사냥하러 가세요.

original_en_text: Well fought sister, well fought! Though terrible and tenacious, the beast was no match for us.<page>Be proud! The bugs of this land will sing of our victory to their offspring, and their offspring’s offspring, forever more!
original_zh_text: 打得漂亮！这畜生虽然强悍，但不是我们的对手！<page>等着听这儿的虫子们传唱咱们的战绩吧！
translated_text: This beast is terrible and frightening, but it is not our enemy.<page>I am proud! The worms will sing our victory forever to their descendants.
secondary_translated_text: 이 짐승은 끔찍하고 무서운 것이지만, 우리의 적은 아닙니다.<page>나는 자랑스럽다!벌레들은 그들의 후손들에게 영원히 우리의 승리를 노래할 것이다.

original_en_text: Hah... aha ha ha ha ha!<page>Congratulations, spider. Finally, I felt your sting, and you’ve bared the truth of my pathetic empty shell.<hpage>You always had the scent, child. You are no bug. Yours is a life born entirely from thread.<page>Life? You’re too generous! This weak, wasting existence. This was not life, just a husk shaped to act as a child.<hpage>Yours was life, pale one. Do not confuse your unique creation with its absence. I have seen others make the same mistake.<page>Platitudes, spider? From you? Don’t be gross.<page>Head on. Climb up, up and away. You’ve earned your audience with the divine.<page>Face the holy mother who would fashion so cruel and crude a daughter as me.
original_zh_text: 哈……哈哈哈哈！<page>恭喜啊小蜘蛛，你终于刺痛了我……也知道了我是具可悲的空壳。<hpage>我早察觉到了，孩子。你根本不是虫类，纯粹是丝线捏造的生命。<page>生命？你还真是心善！这种虚弱、日渐腐朽的身躯……这算什么生命，就是具空壳罢了。<hpage>你确实活着，苍白之子。我见过与你类似的存在……即便内里空无一物，你也是独一无二的生命。<page>少说漂亮话了，我只觉得恶心。<page>上去吧，你赢得觐见神明的资格了。<page>去面见那位造出我这般残次品的'圣母'吧……
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh!<page>Congratulations to the Spider! Finally, I felt your pain, and you discovered the truth of my pain shell.<hpage>You 've always been, my daughter. You 're not a worm, your life was born offline.<page>What about life? You are so generous! It is not a life, but a body that functions like a child.<hpage>His white life, his white life Don't confuse your unique creation with your absence.<page>The old spider? De te? Don't hurt.<page>Get up, get up, and go. You deserve the holy audience!<page>If you confront the Virgin Mary, she will turn you into a cruel and violent child, just like me.
secondary_translated_text: 오! 오!오! 오!오! 오!오! 오!<page>거미에게 축하드립니다!마침내 나는 당신의 고통을 느꼈고 당신은 내 고통의 껍질을 발견했습니다.<hpage>너는 항상 그랬어, 내 딸아.당신은 벌레가 아니라 당신의 삶은 오프라인으로 태어났습니다.<page>인생은 어떻게 되죠?당신은 너무 관대합니다!그것은 생명이 아니라 아이처럼 기능하는 몸이다.<hpage>그의 하얀 삶, 그의 하얀 삶 당신의 독특한 창조를 당신의 부재와 혼동하지 마십시오.<page>오래된 거미?데 티?다치게 하지 마.<page>일어나, 일어나, 가.당신은 거룩한 청중을 받을 자격이 있습니다!<page>만약 당신이 동정녀 마리아와 대면한다면, 그녀는 당신을 나처럼 잔인하고 폭력적인 아이로 만들 것입니다.

original_en_text: Conversing is a pleasure, but I must return to my observance. Try not to leave too much of a trail when you leave, please.
original_zh_text: 和你聊天很愉快，但我得继续去观察了。离开时注意别留太多痕迹。
translated_text: It 's interesting to talk about this, but I have to get back to the ritual. Try not to leave any traces when you leave.
secondary_translated_text: 이것에 대해 이야기하는 것은 재미있지만, 나는 의식으로 돌아가야 한다.떠날 때 흔적을 남기지 않도록 노력하십시오.

original_en_text: <page=M>Enough chatting, Old One. Best you get heading below. Whatever action you’re planning, time is against you.
original_zh_text: <page=M>那么闲话少叙，古老者。赶紧下去吧，您的计划可拖不起。
translated_text: <page=M>Stop, old man, please do this, whatever action you take, time will fight against you.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>그만해, 노인아, 제발 이걸 해줘, 네가 어떤 행동을 취하든, 시간은 너를 대적할 거야.

original_en_text: For sharing this moment I shall have you accept a gift, one I had believed I would never pass. <page>You would take these rings, and the learnings to make more.<page>They are built of a clever method devised by my master and will crush hard this kingdom’s toughest shell. Use them, and she is remembered!<hpage>My thanks, Shakra. To gain a tool so defined by its owner, I am much grateful. They shall prove a great aid on my own journey.
original_zh_text: 谢谢你陪我度过这一时刻，这些东西我本想永远留着……你当作谢礼收下吧。<page>这些环刃和制法都传给你。<page>它们是按我导师的巧思打造的，能击碎最硬的壳。希望你用得上，以此纪念她！<hpage>感激不尽，沙克拉。能继承如此珍贵的武器，对我的旅程大有帮助。
translated_text: To share this moment, accept a gift that I think I 'll never give you.<page>Get the rings and find out all the details.<page>It was brilliantly constructed, devised by my master, to break the hardest shells of the kingdom.<hpage>Thank you very much.We are grateful to the owner for the opportunity to use the described tools.It will help me a lot in my journey.
secondary_translated_text: 이 순간을 공유하기 위해, 내가 결코 줄 수 없다고 생각했던 선물을 받아 들일 수 있습니다.<page>반지를 가져와 모든 세부 사항을 알아보십시오.<page>그것은 훌륭하게 지어졌으며, 내 주인이 고안한 것은 왕국에서 가장 단단한 껍질을 깨뜨리기 위해서였다.<hpage>매우 감사합니다. 우리는 설명 된 tools. It 를 사용할 수있는 기회를 소유자에게 감사드립니다. 그것은 내 여행에서 나에게 많은 도움이 될 것입니다.

original_en_text: The warmth of these caverns keeps many smells alive! Is good for Nuu, who is always searching carefully for learnings!
original_zh_text: 洞窟里的余温保留着气味！正适合努努慢慢探索！
translated_text: The heat of this cave gives a pleasant smell! This is great news for Noo, who is always looking for knowledge! "
secondary_translated_text: 이 동굴의 열은 즐거운 냄새를 내줍니다!이것은 항상 지식을 찾는 Noo 에게 좋은 소식입니다! "

original_en_text: <hpage>Little pilgrim, these baths provide some respite from the dangers without, but even so you should not let down your guard.<hpage>You must have seen now that the bugs of this Citadel are long fallen to the Haunting.<page>Ahh... some of my brothers and sisters have seemed... lost somehow, yes. But to be lost is to be sometime found, is it not sung?<page>Yes... The Citadel will provide for them. It is a holy place indeed, that holds wonders such as this lovely warm bath!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，别因为泡澡放松警惕。<hpage>你也看到了，此地的虫民多半被丝咒侵蚀。<page>有些同袍确实……看着不太对劲。但迷途终有归时，对吧？<page>圣堡自会庇佑他们。能有这么舒服的暖泉，肯定是圣地没错！
translated_text: <hpage>Small tubes, these baths will temporarily mitigate the dangers from the outside, but even then you will not be able to relax your vigilance.<hpage>As you can see, the insects of this castle have already fallen into the hands of the ghosts.<page>¡Oh, yeah! Like my brothers and sisters. Why did they lose, really? You 'll find what you once lost, really?<page>It is truly a sacred place, and there are such wonders as this beautiful hot tub!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>작은 튜브, 이러한 목욕은 일시적으로 외부로부터의 위험을 완화하지만, 심지어는 경계심을 완화 할 수 없습니다.<hpage>보시다시피, 이 성의 곤충은 이미 유령의 손에 떨어졌습니다.<page>오, 그래!나의 형제 자매들처럼.그들은 왜 졌을까, 정말로?당신이 잃어버린 것을 찾을 수 있습니다, 정말?<page>그것은 정말 신성한 장소이며, 이 아름다운 온수욕과 같은 경이들이 있습니다!

original_en_text: Hoi! Let our mighty contest of shells commence again!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！再战一轮！<page>我马上布置新的赛道！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. We also started a race for powerful seafood!
secondary_translated_text: 이봐 이봐 이봐우리는 또한 강력한 해산물을위한 경주를 시작했습니다!

original_en_text: Hoy! We thought one of them buzzing bullies was sneakin’ up on us, but it’s just a mangy jailbug!<page>Why you in here, then? Caught thievin’ were you? Greedy, greedy!<hpage>I’ve stolen nothing. Rather, I suspect the wardens are servants of the Citadel. The cage used in my capture bore similar runes to the one that first brought me to this land.<hpage>Bound in that cage, I’d have proved a fine gift were they to deliver me to their masters.<page>Pah, there ain’t nothin’ fine about you, jailbug. We recognised a fellow thief soon as we saw you!<page>Now, don’t be lingerin’ around here. Those guards’ll be wanting to pop you back in your cage quick quick!<hpage>They’ll not get the chance. I will reclaim my belongings and leave this grim place with haste.
original_zh_text: 还当是狱卒呢，结果是只脏老鼠！<page>你是因为偷什么进来的？贪心鬼！<hpage>我没偷东西。这儿的狱卒应该侍奉于圣堡，抓我的笼子和最初那个有相同印记。<hpage>如此执着于我，看来它们真的认为我是一份献给主人的好礼物。<page>呸，你身上有什么好的！少装蒜，我一看你就一脸贼相！<page>快走快走！别在附近瞎晃悠，小心又被关回笼子！<hpage>他们没机会的，我取回自己的东西就走。
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey, hey! I thought the crowd was approaching, but it was just a dirty escape!<page>Why did you come here? Did you catch a thief? The greed. The greed.<hpage>I have not stolen anything. Suppose that the keeper is a servant of the castle. The cage in which I am imprisoned is carved with a runic letter, similar to the cage that brought me to this earth.<hpage>If I were handed over to my masters and locked up in a cage, it would be a wonderful gift.<page>You have no good, Mr. Chief. When I saw this, I recognized a thief. "<page>Please don't stay here. The guards want you back in the cage. RUNNING!<hpage>I want to get my things back and get out of this dark place as soon as possible.
secondary_translated_text: 이봐, 이봐, 이봐!나는 군중들이 다가오고 있다고 생각했지만, 그것은 단지 더러운 탈출이었다!<page>왜 여기 왔니?도둑을 잡았어요?탐욕이 있습니다.탐욕이 있습니다.<hpage>나는 아무것도 훔친 적이 없다.경비원이 성의 하인이라고 가정해 봅시다.내가 갇혀 있는 우리에는 나를 이 땅에 데려온 새장과 비슷한 루니 글자가 새겨져 있다.<hpage>만약 내가 주인에게 넘겨지고 새장에 갇혀 있다면, 그것은 훌륭한 선물이 될 것이다.<page>당신은 좋은 것이 없습니다, 장관.이걸 봤을 때, 나는 도둑을 알아봤다. "<page>제발 여기에 머무르지 마세요.경비원은 당신을 다시 새장에 넣기를 원합니다.달리기!<hpage>나는 내 물건을 되찾고 가능한 한 빨리 이 어두운 곳에서 벗어나고 싶다.

original_en_text: You recover quickly. Already, my ring-marks have faded from your shell. If you are prepared, let us duel again.
original_zh_text: 你恢复真快，我留下的环印都消了。准备好了我们就再战。
translated_text: Her recovery is fast, my ring fingerprint has disappeared from her shell.If we are ready, we will fight again.
secondary_translated_text: 그녀의 회복이 빨라지고 내 반지 지문은 그녀의 껍질에서 사라졌다. 우리가 준비되면 다시 싸울 것이다.

original_en_text: ...Yes, communication is the heart of it. The grandest boasts and the tiniest murmurings all have their meanings...<page>...Your point is well made. Even the flowers have their stories to tell. Light can be cast anywhere...<hpage>I’ve no desire to interrupt your meditations, Herald, but I am eager to speak with you, if you would listen...<page>...Take note of it all, render it in line, you’ll be glad that you did. You can take the journey home with you...
original_zh_text: ……沟通至关重要。无论豪言壮语还是呢喃低语皆有深意……<page>……此言甚是。野花亦在诉说故事。光明无处不在...<hpage>使者大人，无意打扰冥思，但我急盼能与您交谈，您……<page>……记录所见所闻，他日必将受用。故乡之路存于心……
translated_text: ... Communication is the heart. There is a reason for a bigger whistle and a smaller whistle.<page>... Flowers also have their own history.Light can be projected anywhere.<hpage>I don't want to interrupt your thoughts, Pioneer, but I would like to talk to you if you would listen.<page>... If you 've written it all down and submitted it in order, you 'll be glad you did it.
secondary_translated_text: ...커뮤니케이션은 마음입니다.더 큰 휘파람과 더 작은 휘파람의 이유가 있다.<page>...꽃은 또한 자신의 역사를 가지고 있습니다. 빛은 어디서나 투사 될 수 있습니다.<hpage>파이오니아님, 저는 여러분의 생각을 방해하고 싶지 않지만, 여러분의 말을 들어주시면 말씀드리고 싶습니다.<page>...모든 것을 적어서 순서대로 제출했다면, 그렇게 했다면 기뻐할 것이다.

original_en_text: Oooh, but the scroll is so heavy with beautiful beasts! Could it be that the works is almost complete? Miss grown-up, you must keep your preyings up. No time for rest!
original_zh_text: 哎呀，记录册都快写满了！是不是快完成了？大姐姐不能偷懒哦！
translated_text: There are so many beautiful animals in the movie! Is the project nearly completed? Ladies and gentlemen, let 's continue the hunt. Now is not the time to rest!
secondary_translated_text: 영화 속에는 아름다운 동물들이 너무 많아요!프로젝트가 거의 완료되었습니까?신사 숙녀 여러분, 사냥을 계속합시다.지금은 휴식할 때가 아니다!

original_en_text: The myth we made... by grace... by blade...<page>All bowed before we princes green...
original_zh_text: 我们缔造的传说……凭恩泽……凭利刃……<page>万虫皆向绿王臣服……
translated_text: Myths that we create. I thank You for Your grace. Use the blade.<page>And all of you will worship our green prince.
secondary_translated_text: 우리가 만든 신화.당신의 은혜에 감사해요.블레이드를 사용하세요.<page>그리고 너희 모두는 우리의 녹색 왕자를 경배할 것이다.

original_en_text: So many moments spent simple... joyful... free...
original_zh_text: 那些简单……快乐……自由的时光……
translated_text: They are often simple: freedom and joy.

original_en_text: Do you see? How crass and frail that Citadel’s machines! This one groans in pain at its very existence.<hpage>Its mechanism is likely jammed. If the gears were unstuck its clamorous complaints would soon cease, and it could become a useful place to rest.<page>A place to rest or no, I desire only for the noise to stop!
original_zh_text: 瞧见没？圣堡的破机器嘎吱乱叫，活着都费劲。<hpage>齿轮卡住了。修好应该能当个歇息的好地方，噪音也能停。<page>歇不歇息无所谓，我只想赶紧让这破响动停下来！
translated_text: Did you see that? How simple and fragile fortress machines! Man moans, suffers in his presence.<hpage>When the equipment is removed, the noise stops immediately, making it a comfortable place to rest.<page>Whether you have a break or not, you just want to stop the noise.
secondary_translated_text: 그거 봤어?얼마나 단순하고 연약한 요새 기계인가!사람은 신음하고, 그의 앞에서 고통을 겪는다.<hpage>장비를 제거하면 소음이 즉시 멈추고 편안한 휴식 장소가됩니다.<page>휴식이 있든 없든, 당신은 단지 소음을 멈추고 싶어합니다.

original_en_text: These root-woven roads show evidence of my master’s passage. A thrice-crushed bug, gouged wood, score-prints of sharp claws passing. Small signs that only I can read.<page>Though the trail is cold, it eases me to know she is still within this land.
original_zh_text: 这附近有导师踪迹：尖锐的爪痕、凿开的树木、压扁的虫尸……只有我看得懂。<page>虽然痕迹都挺久了，但知道她还在纺络我就安心了。
translated_text: The paths lost from these roots are the path the Master has traveled. The worm has been crushed three times, the tree has been broken, and the claws have sharp marks.<page>The road was cold, but he was relieved to learn that it was still on the ground.
secondary_translated_text: 이 뿌리에서 잃어버린 길은 마스터가 걸어온 길입니다.벌레는 세 번이나 부러졌고 나무는 부러졌고 발톱에는 날카로운 흔적이 있었다.<page>도로가 춥지만, 그는 아직도 땅에 있다는 것을 알게 되어 안심했다.

original_en_text: <hpage>These are dangerous fields, young one, not for casual wandering. What task sees you brave them?<page>A treacherous quest! But a crucial one! Upon the last wish of my father, I’ve taken up the study of these wild caves.<page>These fields still display life and growth, even as the lands around erode to dust.<page>There is a hot harmony here that eludes the grey wastes above and the dry Marrow beside. With time and study, I shall uncover why.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小虫子，这片荒野很危险，你怎么有胆子进来闲逛？<page>虽然危险，但很重要！我是继承父亲遗志在研究这些洞穴！<page>即便到处都是腐蚀和灰烬，这片荒野却还显露着生机。<page>这里肯定有特殊热源维系，我要找出原因！
translated_text: <hpage>Young people, this is dangerous territory, and we cannot just sit around. What courage do you have to face it?<page>This is a very dangerous mission! However, this is necessary! With my father 's hope, I began to explore wild caves.<page>Despite the fact that the surrounding lands are being destroyed and turned to dust, the fields are still dynamic and growing.<page>There is a warm harmony, avoiding gray debris on top and dry bone marrow next to it.With time and research you will understand why.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>젊은이 여러분, 이곳은 위험한 지역이며, 우리는 그냥 가만히 앉아 있을 수 없습니다.당신은 그것을 직면 할 용기가 있습니까?<page>이것은 매우 위험한 임무입니다!하지만, 이것은 필수적이다!아버지의 희망으로, 나는 야생 동굴을 탐험하기 시작했다.<page>주변 땅이 파괴되고 먼지로 변하고 있음에도 불구하고, 그 들판은 여전히 활발하고 성장하고 있습니다.<page>따뜻한 조화가 있으며, 맨 위에 회색 파편과 건조한 골수 옆에서 피할 수 있습니다. 시간과 연구를 통해 이유를 이해할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Track your location throughout these winding lands with a bone compass. Each member of our tribe can craft them. I would pass you mine, for a small price.
original_zh_text: 这个骨制罗盘能让你分辨自己的位置。我们部落都会做，付点小钱就给你。
translated_text: Use the bony compass to track the position of the deformed earth. Any one of our tribe can do it, I will give you only my little money.
secondary_translated_text: 골격 나침반을 사용하여 변형된 지구의 위치를 추적합니다.우리 부족 중 누구도 그것을 할 수 있습니다, 나는 당신에게 나의 작은 돈만 줄 것입니다.

original_en_text: Ooooh, ma ma! Even young Nuu never guessed that Pharloom held so many fascinating creatures! Soft ones, hard ones, small ones, big ones! Nuu is greedy to see what remains!
original_zh_text: 哇！连努努都没想到纺络有这么多神奇生物！软的硬的大的小的！好贪心，好想看剩下的！
translated_text: ¡Oh, mom.Even the young Nu did not think that on Faro Island there were so many fascinating creatures.Soft, hard, small, big! I want to see what is left.
secondary_translated_text: 어머님, 심지어 어린 누도 페로 섬에 이렇게 많은 매혹적인 생물들이 있다는 것을 몰랐습니다. 부드럽고 단단하고 작고 큰!남은 것이 무엇인지 보고 싶다.

original_en_text: You see this idol before us, red maiden? I have passed its like before. They mark our pilgrimage well.<page>If we sing to it, a miraculous shrine will rise from the ground, and we will have a place to rest! Such a wonder!<hpage>It is not song that rouses this shrine, but payment in rosaries.<hpage>Without rosaries, the shrine remains hidden. I have encountered similar constructs on Pharloom’s paths. This kingdom does not grant rest lightly.
original_zh_text: 看见这圣像了吗？沿途都有标记。<page>对着它歌唱，圣椅就会升起供我们歇息！多神奇！<hpage>唤醒长椅的不是歌声，谢尔玛，而是念珠。<hpage>无念珠者不得休憩，纺络从不轻易施恩。
translated_text: Can you see the red woman standing in front of me? I have experienced this before. I remember this pilgrimage very well.<page>If you sing it, the magical temple will rise and become a place of rest.<hpage>It is not the song that awakens the temple, but the prize of the rosary.<hpage>The Rosary does not exist, and the sanctuary is hidden. I found similar buildings on the way to Pharam. The kingdom did not rest easily.
secondary_translated_text: 내 앞에 서 있는 붉은 여자가 보이시나요?나는 전에 이것을 경험했다.나는 이 순례가 아주 잘 기억된다.<page>노래하면 마법의 사원이 일어나 휴식지가 될 것입니다.<hpage>성전을 깨우는 것은 노래가 아니라, 묵주주의 상입니다.<hpage>로자리는 존재하지 않으며, 성소는 숨겨져 있습니다.나는 파람으로 가는 길에서 비슷한 건물을 발견했다.왕국은 쉬지 않았다.

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>These I have fashioned from the husks of old bells. A hard task to make, so the cost reflects the extra effort.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>用古钟的壳打磨成的，可费劲了。
translated_text: It can be used to mark important places and reminders on a map.<br><br>I did this on the old watches. It 's a difficult task, so the cost reflects the extra effort.
secondary_translated_text: 지도에서 중요한 장소와 추억을 표시하는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.<br><br>나는 오래된 시계에서 이것을했다.어려운 작업이므로 비용은 추가적인 노력을 반영합니다.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Here we meet, high atop this twisted steel structure. I can sense fierce enemies ahead.<page>It seems you too draw closer to your trail’s end. With my own task now resolved, my rings call for combat.<page>Hornet Wielding Needle, shall we fight forward together?
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！你好啊，又见面了。我能感受到前面有强大的敌人在呢。<page>看来你的旅途也走了很远了。现在我的任务也完成了，正手痒呢。<page>使针的小姑娘，怎么说，我们一起上吧？
translated_text: Boshanka! BOSHANKA! Here we are, right above this twisted steel structure, you can feel a fierce enemy in front of you.<page>It seems you are nearing the end of the road.Now that my mission is over, my ring must fight.<page>Do the bees turn their needles and fight together?
secondary_translated_text: 보선카! BOSHANKA!여기 우리가 있습니다, 이 비틀린 강철 구조물 바로 위에, 당신은 당신의 앞에 맹렬한 적을 느낄 수 있습니다.<page>이제 내 임무가 끝났으니 내 반지는 싸워야 한다.<page>벌들은 바늘을 돌리고 함께 싸우나요?

original_en_text: All of these marvellous healing supplies... Surely they, at least, are some proof of the Citadel’s holy nature?
original_zh_text: 这么多神奇药品……至少说明圣堡还是灵验的吧？
translated_text: Are they, at least, proof of the sacred nature of the castle?
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 적어도 성의 성스러운 성격을 증명하는 증거입니까?

original_en_text: H-hoy red m-maiden! Have no f-fear, ‘tis only I, Sherma!<page>I found healing supplies, b-but then the way back collapsed... and I heard moaning from the dark... oh, how thankful I am to see you!
original_zh_text: 红、红衣姑娘！是我是我！<page>我找到药，可是路塌了……又听见黑暗里有怪声……见到你太好了！
translated_text: My little red girl. Don't be afraid, it's me, Xaman.<page>How grateful I was to have seen it, to have found the healing materials, and to have heard the groans in the approaching darkness on the way back!
secondary_translated_text: 나의 작은 붉은 소녀.겁내지 마, 나야, 샤먼.<page>나는 그것을 보았고, 치유 물질을 찾았으며, 돌아오는 길에 어둠이 다가오는 속음 소리를 들었기에 얼마나 감사했습니까!

translated_text: Map of Worms
Are we going to fight together?

original_en_text: The great Citadel is so close, I can hear the voices of our brother and sister pilgrims calling out to us!
original_zh_text: 圣堡近在咫尺！兄弟姐妹的呼唤已传到我耳中了！
translated_text: A large castle was nearby, and the call of the pilgrims could be heard.
secondary_translated_text: 큰 성이 근처에 있었고 순례자들의 부르짖음을 들을 수 있었다.

original_en_text: What a battle, brave warrior! You’re the first I’ve seen who could match the red-shells and emerge victorious.<hpage>They are deadly foes indeed, and seemingly keen hunters. You did well to keep yourself hidden from them, young bug.<page>I did, didn’t I? Disguise and subterfuge are skills I’ve honed keenly, all in aid of my most important work!
original_zh_text: 打得太漂亮了！我还是头回见有虫能干掉红壳怪！<hpage>它们确实是狠角色，狩猎本能很强。你躲得挺好。<page>是吧？伪装潜行可是我的绝活，都是为了伟大研究！
translated_text: What a struggle, brave soldiers! You are the first to compete with a red envelope and win.<hpage>They are truly deadly enemies and look like greedy hunters. You are good at staying away from them, little insect.<page>You did that, didn't you? Really? Costumes and stunts are skills that I 've carefully honed to help me do the most important job!
secondary_translated_text: 얼마나 용감한 군인들이여, 얼마나 용감한 투쟁인가!당신은 빨간 봉투를 가지고 경쟁하고 우승하는 첫 번째 사람입니다.<hpage>그들은 정말 치명적인 적이며 탐욕스러운 사냥꾼처럼 보입니다.너는 그들에게서 멀리 떨어져 있는 것이 좋다, 작은 곤충아.<page>네가 그랬지, 그렇지?진짜?의상과 스턴트는 내가 가장 중요한 일을하는 데 도움이되기 위해 조심스럽게 연마 한 기술입니다!

original_en_text: Mind yourself while you travel this grim land. A great winged beast has been stalking the heights, swooping without warning and tearing the life out of unwary travellers!<hpage>I believe I have seen the creature you speak of. It may have marked me as prey, and followed me down onto the lower roads of the moor.<page>What what! Gurrrooo! The beast has been spotted! Once Zaza has fully rested, we’ll set to tracking it down!
original_zh_text: 当心天上，有只长翅膀的畜生专抓路人！<hpage>我见过它，多半是盯上我了，还跟到了沼泽这边。<page>你说什么！嘎噜！那畜生就在附近！等扎扎歇够了就去宰了它！
translated_text: Be careful when traveling to this difficult-to - reach country. A giant, predatory beast roams the sky, hiding without warning and taking the lives of reckless travelers!<hpage>I see what kind of creature you are. He designates me as a prey and goes into the desert.<page>What's it? What do you do? GORAM! The beast was found! When Zaza is fully rested, let 's start the hunt!
secondary_translated_text: 이 여행이 어려운 나라로 여행할 때는 조심해야 한다.거대하고 포식적인 짐승이 하늘을 돌아다니며, 경고없이 숨어 무모한 여행자들의 생명을 빼앗습니다!<hpage>나는 네가 어떤 생물인지 안다.그는 나를 먹이로 삼아 사막으로 갔다.<page>뭐예요?뭐하는 거야?고럼!짐승이 발견되었다!자자가 완전히 휴식을 취하면 사냥을 시작하자!

original_en_text: Welcome back red maiden, and thank you again for coming to my aid.<page>I’m no healer, but with the supplies we found in the ward below even my unlearned claws can ease the suffering of our brothers and sisters.<page>That such darkness could creep into this most holy of places, even though we pilgrims kept our promise to ascend...<page>I confess, I wonder at the meaning of it all. But enlightenment does not come easily, or all at once... I should just continue my task in the meantime.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘回来啦！再次感谢你帮忙。<page>我本来不懂医术，不过从下面拿来了药，简单包扎也能止痛。<page>我们千辛万苦爬上来，黑暗还是钻进了圣地……<page>实在想不通！但悟道要慢慢来……先做好手头的事吧！
translated_text: Welcome home, red girl, thank you for your help.<page>I am not a therapist, but with the materials I have found in the room below, even nails that I have not learned can ease my brothers ' suffering.<page>We, the pilgrims, keep our promises to ascend the mountain, but darkness is creeping into this most sacred place.<page>But enlightenment is not easy, or it comes suddenly, and, at the same time, I must continue my mission.
secondary_translated_text: 집에 오신 것을 환영합니다, 붉은 소녀, 도움 주셔서 감사합니다.<page>나는 치료사가 아니지만, 아래 방에서 찾은 재료로, 내가 배우지 않은 손톱조차도 형제들의 고통을 덜어 줄 수 있습니다.<page>우리 순례자들은 산에 오르겠다는 약속을 지키지만, 어둠이 이 가장 거룩한 곳으로 기어오르고 있다.<page>그러나 계몽은 쉽지 않거나 갑자기 오기도 하며, 동시에 나는 나의 사명을 계속해야 한다.

original_en_text: Hrm...? Oh, hoy there! I was hoping we would meet here, red maiden.<page>Rising at last to the heights of the Citadel and being amongst so many of my brothers and sisters... it is a blessing indeed. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice belies some hesitation in that belief, little pilgrim. You have seen now the reality of this broken place. What do you make of it, truly?
original_zh_text: 嗯？红衣姑娘！没想到在这儿碰上了！<page>能登上圣堡和这么多同袍团聚……真是恩赐……嗯，是恩赐。<hpage>你听起来有些犹豫？想必你已看清此地的破败真相，有什么感想？
translated_text: What's it? What is it? Ah, there he is! See you soon, Red.<page>In the end, I rose to the height in the castle and became a mediator for many brothers and sisters. And it is truly a blessing. Yes, it is a blessing.<hpage>You, little pilgrim, hide this fear from faith.Now we have seen the reality of this ruined place.What do you think about it?
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요?뭐야?아, 여기 있네!곧 보자 레드<page>결국 나는 성에서 높은 지위를 차지하여 많은 형제 자매들을 위한 중재자가 되었습니다.그것은 실로 축복이다.네, 그것은 축복입니다.<hpage>어린 순례자여, 이 두려움을 믿음에서 숨기세요. 이제 우리는 이 황폐한 곳의 현실을 보았는데, 당신은 그것에 대해 어떻게 생각하십니까?

original_en_text: Safely-saved is Pill! But who is this rare carer for the shell of another? Name yourself, good bug!<hpage>I am Hornet, Pill. Your brother wished for your return to Bellhart, where he waits now. I’m sure he will be eager to see you alive.<page>Young Tipp! How he worries always. Blessed I am for the care, him and you Miss Hornet! A lucky bug is me!
original_zh_text: 皮尔安、安全了！这位好心女士怎么称呼？<hpage>我叫大黄蜂。你的兄弟蒂普在钟心镇等你，快回去吧。<page>小蒂普！总是瞎操心。多谢你啦大黄蜂小姐！我运气真好！
translated_text: The pills are safe! But who is such an unusual person who deals with other people 's shells? - Tell me your name, kid.<hpage>- Your brother says he wants you to come back alive to Berhart and would like to meet you there. "<page>I've always been worried about her, and I'm lucky enough to take care of him and you, Miss Shornet.
secondary_translated_text: 약은 안전합니다!그런데 다른 사람의 껍질을 다룰 수 있는 그런 특이한 사람은 누구일까? - 네 이름을 말해봐, 꼬마야.<hpage>- 네 형은 네가 살아서 버하트에 돌아오길 원하고 거기서 만나고 싶어한다고 말했다. "<page>나는 항상 그녀를 걱정했고, 그와 당신을 돌볼 수 있어서 운이 좋았습니다, 미스 쇼넷.

original_en_text: I pray my dice bring you luck on your final climb, sister. And I pray that by parting with them, my own ascent shall be made lighter.
original_zh_text: 愿骰子保佑你登顶，姐妹。送走它们，我身上的负担也轻了。
translated_text: Sister, I pray that my data will bring you good luck in your final Ascension. I pray that when I am distracted from them, my Ascension will be easier.
secondary_translated_text: 자매님, 제 데이터가 마지막 승천에서 행운을 가져다주기를 기도합니다.내가 그것으로부터 산만해질 때, 나의 승천이 더 쉬워질 것을 기도한다.

original_en_text: See here, this old statue. I’ve been thinking long on it, what clues it might hold.<page>The claw-work seems beyond the other structures throughout these caves. Who was she I wonder, to deserve such refined remembrance?<hpage>Hers is the form of a dancer, and the craft is indeed exquisite. There must once have been more to these ants, before the Haunting snared their shells and minds.
original_zh_text: 看这尊古雕像！我盯着它看了好久。<page>工艺比周围建筑精细多了。她到底是谁呢，值得被这样铭记？<hpage>看样子是名舞者，造型确实精美。看来蚁族被丝咒控制前肯定辉煌过。
translated_text: Look at the old statue. For a long time I wondered what that meant.<page>The claw seems to outperform the other structures in these caves. And who deserves such a reminder?<hpage>Her style is the form of a dancer, and the skill is truly magnificent.Before the ghosts can close their shells and hearts, the ants must have a lot more.
secondary_translated_text: 오래된 동상을 보세요.오랫동안 나는 그것이 무엇을 의미하는지 궁금해했다.<page>이 발톱은 이 동굴의 다른 구조물들을 능가하는 것 같다.누가 이런 추억을 받을 자격이 있을까?<hpage>그녀의 스타일은 춤추는 형태이며, 기술은 정말 웅장합니다. 유령이 껍질과 마음을 닫기 전에 개미는 더 많은 것을해야합니다.

translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! The smell of prohibition.

original_en_text: Holy water, nice and hot,<br>Makes a perfect swimming spot,<br>Heals your worries in a flash,<br>So jump on in... splash splash splash! Ha ha ha!
original_zh_text: 圣水暖又清，<br>泡澡好舒心，<page>烦恼顷刻散，<br>扑通跳进来！哈哈哈！
translated_text: The holy water is hot.<br>The best place to swim.<br>Express your concerns immediately.<br>Jump in. Splash. Ha ha ha!
secondary_translated_text: 거룩한 물이 뜨겁다.<br>수영하기에 가장 좋은 장소.<br>즉시 우려를 표명하십시오.<br>뛰어들다.스플래시.하하!

original_en_text: Very, very lucky little trinket we got ‘ere! Pulls ‘em little clickie-clackies right into yer waitin’ claws!
original_zh_text: 超级幸运的招财符！把叮当响都吸过来！
translated_text: These are the happy little things! Put them on their feet!
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 행복한 작은 것들입니다!그들을 그들의 발에 올려!

original_en_text: Gurrroo! A fellow warrior braves this blighted place! Know you stand before the honoured knight Garmond, and brave companion Zaza.<page>Together, Zaza and I are wish bound to scale this Citadel, and vanquish the horrors at its heart!<hpage>Then good luck to you, sir bug. It is heartening to meet another of sound mind and fortitude enough to fight back against the many haunted husks.<page>Aye! Never-ending, these unnatural opponents! This Citadel seems its twisted source, and honour decrees we must fight on, until we rend the heart of its decay!
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！又来个勇士！我乃荣耀骑士加蒙德，这位是忠仆扎扎！<page>我们要杀上圣堡，端了诅咒的老巢！<hpage>那祝你好运。难得能遇见敢反抗丝咒傀儡的清醒者。<page>是啊，这些傀儡，杀都杀不完！圣堡似乎就藏着祸根，必须捣毁！
translated_text: Go! The comrades bravely stood up in this deserted place! You know you 've come face to face with the revered knight Gamon and his brave companion Zaza.<page>Zaza and I want to climb to the castle together and dispel the terror!<hpage>Good luck with that, Mr. Bug. It 's fascinating to see how others are smart, determined, and shed a lot of ghostly shells.<page>Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! Forever, those unnatural enemies! This castle seems to be the root of this agitation, and we must respect the Medal of Chest until we pluck out a rotten heart from it!
secondary_translated_text: 빨리 가!동지들은 이 황량한 곳에서 용감하게 일어섰다!존경받는 기사 가몬과 그의 용감한 동반자 자자와 대면했다는 것을 알고 있습니다.<page>자자와 나는 함께 성으로 올라가 공포를 없애고 싶다!<hpage>행운을 빌어, 버그 씨.다른 사람들이 얼마나 영리하고, 결단력 있고, 유령 같은 껍질을 많이 흘리는지 보는 것은 매혹적입니다.<page>아, 그래!아, 네!영원히, 이 부자연스러운 적들!이 성이 이 소동의 근원인 것 같아서, 우리는 그 안에서 썩은 심장을 뽑을 때까지 가슴의 메달을 존중해야 한다!

original_en_text: <hpage>I found the well in the hidden chambers beyond. The power that remained at its base I have taken for myself.<page=S>Bound yourself a new nature, aye? And from the shells of our ancestors, no less, all those many who’ve called these lands their own.<page=S>You make it seem so simple-like. All o’that learning, all o’that strength... sucked up in a whirl of Silk.<page=M>We’d call you a thief, Old One, and cruel for the taking, but its all coming down soon if you can’t stop it.<page=M>If there’s advantage in your act that might see these caves safe, then it’s better you make your claim.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我在密室深处找到了那口井。已将其底部的力量纳为己用。<page=S>给自己添了一种新本源，嗯？用的还是我们先祖的躯壳——那些曾以此地为家的无数先祖。<page=S>你说得轻巧。所有学识，所有力量……都被灵丝漩涡吸走了。<page=M>我们本该骂你是小偷，古老者，如此残忍夺取……但若你阻止不了黑暗，一切马上都要崩塌了。<page=M>若你真能保全这些洞窟，那还是由你取走为好。
translated_text: <hpage>I found a well in a hidden room in the distance. I took the rest of the power on the basis of that.<page=S>In the same way, from the shell of our ancestors, all the nations that claim these lands were born from the shell of our ancestors.<page=S>All knowledge, all strength, was absorbed in the silk whirlwind.<page=M>I 'll call you a thief. "Theft is brutal, but if it 's not stopped, it happens fast.<page=M>If your actions have an advantage in protecting these caves, it is better to make your claim.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 먼 곳에 숨겨진 방에서 우물을 발견했다.나는 그것을 바탕으로 나머지 권력을 잡았다.<page=S>마찬가지로, 우리 조상의 껍질에서, 이 땅을 주장하는 모든 국가는 우리 조상의 껍질에서 태어났습니다.<page=S>모든 지식, 모든 힘은 실크의 회오리바람에 흡수되었다.<page=M>나는 당신을 도둑이라고 부를 것입니다. "도둑질은 잔인하지만, 막지 않으면 빨리 발생한다.<page=M>만약 당신의 행동이 이 동굴들을 보호하는 데 이점이 있다면, 당신의 주장을 하는 것이 낫다.

original_en_text: Best keep your visits brief, Hornet Wielding Needle. Without swift action taken, our world’s ruin seems certain.<page>If you cannot calm Pharloom’s tortured throes, then certainly no other bug could face the task. <hpage>As you say, Shakra. I shall do what I must.
original_zh_text: 别逗留太久，小姑娘。不快点解决，世界就要完蛋了。<page>如果你都搞不定，更没虫能行。<hpage>我会尽力而为。
translated_text: The conversation was short, and Bumblebee maneuvered with a needle.Without a quick response, the world will undoubtedly be destroyed.<page>If you can't relieve the pain from the pharaohs, then other insects will undoubtedly not be able to do the job.<hpage>Like I said before, I 'm doing what I have to do.
secondary_translated_text: 대화는 짧았고, 험블비는 바늘으로 기동했다. 빠른 반응이 없다면, 세계는 의심 할 여지없이 파괴 될 것이다.<page>파라오의 고통을 덜어 줄 수 없다면, 다른 곤충들은 의심 할 여지없이 그 일을 할 수 없습니다.<hpage>내가 전에 말했듯이, 나는 내가해야 할 일을 하고 있다.

original_en_text: Near the edge of those lands swept by wind and sand, Nuu has seen it, a single bug, watching, waiting.<page> Too scared was Nuu to crawl close, for fear it would wake, and its big blade might mark this perfect shell.<page>For the journal’s sake, you should seek the bug, up on edge, through a tall tunnel hidden by crust.<page>A hard find, that one, but Nuu is not worried! She knows your adult cunning will see you there quick!
original_zh_text: 在风沙之地的边缘，努努曾看见一只虫子在守望等待。<page> 努努怕它醒来，怕它的巨刃划破我的漂亮甲壳，所以不敢靠近。<page> 但为了使记录册完整，大姐姐去找它吧——就在高处边缘，穿过一段硬壳掩藏的高耸隧道就到了。<page> 虽然难找，但努努不担心！以成年虫的机灵劲儿肯定能很快找到！
translated_text: At the edge of the wind and the sand that covered the earth, Nu saw an insect waiting to see it.<page>Well is scared and can not approach, afraid to wake up, and its large leaf marks the perfect shell.<page>To keep a diary, you have to go through a high tunnel hidden in the bark and look for insects at the end.<page>It was a difficult discovery. No, but I wasn't worried! We know that your adult cunning will be here soon!
secondary_translated_text: 바람과 모래가 땅을 덮고 있는 가장자리에서 누는 곤충이 그것을 보기를 기다리고 있는 것을 보았다.<page>우물은 겁에 질려 접근 할 수 없으며, 깨어나는 것을 두려워하며, 그 큰 잎은 완벽한 껍질을 표시합니다.<page>일기를 쓰려면 껍질 속에 숨겨진 높은 터널을 통과하고 끝에 곤충을 찾아야 한다.<page>어려운 발견이었다.아니, 하지만 난 걱정하지 않았어!우리는 당신의 성인의 교활함이 곧 여기에 올 것이라는 것을 알고 있습니다!

original_en_text: For my mapping stock, we have traded all the charts and tools I can provide. While this new threat remains, I shall not make more.<page>My cartography may be a simple sort, but I hope that my craft shared has made your travels easier.
original_zh_text: 我的存货都卖光了。危机不解除，我也没法做新的。<page>我绘制的图纸可能有些简略，但希望能帮上你的忙。
translated_text: In my stock of maps, I exchanged all the maps and tools I could offer. As long as this new threat exists, I will no longer believe in it.<page>My drawings may be simple, but I hope the crafts I share will make your journey easier.
secondary_translated_text: 내 지도 재고에서, 나는 내가 제공 할 수있는 모든 지도와 도구를 교환했다.이 새로운 위협이 존재하는 한, 나는 더 이상 그것을 믿지 않을 것이다.<page>내 그림은 간단 할 수 있지만, 내가 공유하는 공예품이 당신의 여행을 더 쉽게 할 수 있기를 바랍니다.

original_en_text: Lead on, sister! Zaza and I will be close behind!
original_zh_text: 带路吧姐妹！我和扎扎自会跟上！
translated_text: Sister, guide us! We pay taxes and we watch it.
secondary_translated_text: 자매님, 우리를 인도해 주십시오!우리는 세금을 내고 그것을 지켜보고 있습니다.

original_en_text: Hoy! Did you see it, red maiden? The great gate heard my song and, in its infinite and ancient kindness, has opened the way forward for us!
original_zh_text: 瞧见没？骨门听到歌声，为我们让路了！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey, hey! Did you see that? The ancient red woman, the great gate, heard my song, opened the way for us with infinite mercy!
secondary_translated_text: 이봐, 이봐, 이봐!그거 봤어?고대 붉은 여인, 위대한 문, 내 노래를 듣고, 무한한 자비로 우리를 위해 길을 열어!

original_en_text: <hpage>Must you not press on, sirs?<page>Oh, yes! We will be off at once. Very soon. I fear though, that Zaza must rest a little longer...
original_zh_text: <hpage>二位还不出发么？<page>马上！这就出发！我就是觉得，扎扎可能要多休息一会……
translated_text: <hpage>Guys, can we go on?<page>Oh! Oh! Ah, yes! Soon, but I'm afraid Zaza will rest for a while.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>얘들아, 계속할 수 있니?<page>오! 오!오! 오!아, 네!곧, 하지만 나는 자자가 잠시 쉬게 될 것 같아.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Edges sharp and senses keen!
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！握紧兵刃，保持警惕！
translated_text: ¡Boshanka, Boshanka! Enough sharpness and sharp sensation!

original_en_text: <page=M>Even knowing her motivation, it is a shock the monarch can resist so long. We’d thought none could survive that void.<hpage>She will have retreated within her protective form, that cocoon of thread. Even as the dark eats its outer, she will spin its Silk anew.<hpage>The effort would be immense and it will strain her soul thin, but what other choice remains?<hpage>This is the desperate act of a dying god. A defiance that, left unchallenged, will bring your kingdom’s ruin.
original_zh_text: <page=M>就算清楚她的动机，君主能撑这么久也是令我们惊讶。本以为生物不可能在虚空中存活。<hpage>她必是缩进了护体茧壳。这样即便外层被黑暗啃噬，也能重织新丝。<hpage>但这样耗力巨大，魂魄都将稀薄，但还有得选吗？<hpage>这是垂死神明的困兽之斗。若不阻止，必会让王国化为废墟。
translated_text: <page=M>It was a shock that the monarch was able to endure for a long time despite knowing his motives.<hpage>He will return to his form of protection - the tube.Despite the fact that the darkness shrouds her appearance, she is silky again.<hpage>The effort is immeasurable and absorbs your soul, but what is it? What other options does he have?<hpage>This is a despair before God 's death. This resistance, if not rejected, will lead to the destruction of his kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>군주가 자신의 동기를 알고 있음에도 불구하고 오랫동안 견딜 수 있었던 것은 충격이었습니다.<hpage>그는 자신의 보호 형태 - 튜브로 돌아갈 것입니다. 어둠이 그녀의 외모를 덮고 있음에도 불구하고, 그녀는 다시 실크입니다.<hpage>그 노력은 헤아릴 수 없고 당신의 영혼을 흡수하지만, 그것은 무엇입니까?그는 다른 어떤 선택권이 있습니까?<hpage>이것은 하나님의 죽음 앞에서 절망입니다.이 저항은 거절되지 않으면 그의 왕국이 파멸될 것이다.

original_en_text: <page=M>The quakes... This collapse will take Pharloom all.<hpage>If the void doesn’t claim it first. Surely you’ve seen them, the black threads that wrack your lands? The dark leeches up, possessed upon the fallen monarch’s Silk.<hpage>Pharloom’s roads were not safe before. Now they’ll prove impassable. Those pilgrims still alive in your lands best huddle and hope. <hpage>If there can be another end to this, it is up to us to discover it.
original_zh_text: <page=M>这震颤……纺络要全塌了。<hpage>怕不是会被虚空先吞了去。没见那些撕裂大地的黑丝么？黑暗正顺着坠落君王的灵丝涌上来。<hpage>纺络的道途本就不安稳，如今更是绝路，残存的朝圣者只能抱团等死。<hpage>但若还有转机，唯有靠我们能寻得。
translated_text: <page=M>The earthquake and the collapse are all to blame.<hpage>Have you ever seen the black lines that destroyed your country? A dark vampire associated with the silk of the fallen monarch.<hpage>The streets of Faro were not safe. They are insurmountable. Pilgrims still living in their own country, it is better to unite and hope.<hpage>If it has another end, we have to find it.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>지진과 붕괴는 모두 탓이다.<hpage>당신 나라를 파괴한 검은 선을 본 적이 있습니까?타락한 군주의 실크와 관련된 어두운 뱀파이어.<hpage>파로의 거리는 안전하지 않았다.그들은 극복할 수 없다.순례자들은 여전히 자신의 나라에 살고 있으며, 단결하고 희망하는 것이 낫습니다.<hpage>만약 다른 끝이 있다면, 우리는 그것을 찾아야 한다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Why do you sing, little one? This bony gate seems like a poor audience.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，为何对着骨门歌唱？这可不是什么知音。
translated_text: <hpage>My son, why do you sing? The narrow door looked like a crowd of poor spectators.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>아들아, 왜 노래를 부르니?좁은 문은 불쌍한 관객들의 군중처럼 보였다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Can you safely make your way back to the settlement, little one? I could escort you if need be.<page>Oh no, I’ll lay no more of my troubles upon you, red maiden. With the way cleared I can return under my own guidance.<page>After all, what’s another pilgrimage, eh? Ha ha!<page>Oh! And I have something for you as well. I found it buried amongst the broken relics down here in the darkness, glowing with a pale light.<page>’Tis an odd-looking thing... not exactly holy-seeming... but I would be honoured if you accepted it all the same!
original_zh_text: <hpage>需要我护送你回去吗？<page>不能再给你添麻烦了！路通了我就自己走。<page>就当再朝圣一回呗！哈哈！<page>对了，这个送你。在黑乎乎的地方挖到的，会发光。<page>虽然看着不像圣物……但请你收下吧！
translated_text: <hpage>Will we be able to safely return to the village? If you want, we can show you.<page>I will no longer accuse you, my red daughter.When the road is cleared, I can return under my guidance. "<page>After all,? What is a Pilgrimage? Ha ha ha!<page>Oh! Oh! I also have something that I want to give you. I saw him buried in the darkness, and a pale light shone among the broken relics.<page>It's incredible... He is not holy, and I hope he will receive it again.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>우리는 안전하게 마을로 돌아갈 수 있을까?당신이 원한다면, 우리는 당신에게 보여줄 수 있습니다.<page>나의 붉은 딸아, 나는 더 이상 너를 고소하지 않을 것이다. 길을 닦으면 나의 인도하에 돌아올 수 있을 것이다. "<page>결국,? Pilgrimage 란 무엇인가?하하!<page>오! 오!오! 오!나도 너에게 주고 싶은 것이 있다.나는 그가 어둠 속에 묻혀 있는 것을 보았고, 파손된 유물들 사이에는 창백한 빛이 비쳤다.<page>정말 믿을 수 없는...그는 거룩하지 않으며, 나는 그가 그것을 다시 받기를 바랍니다.

original_en_text: The challenge! The course! It shall be improved. Yes! Yes! The truest test is still to come. We shall fly fast together once more!
original_zh_text: 赛道还要改良！没错，真正的考验在后头！
translated_text: Challenge! Yes, no! It will get better, yeah. Ah, yes! Ah, yes! Ah, yes! The real test has not yet come. She wants to get back together!
secondary_translated_text: 도전해!그래, 안돼!더 좋아질 거야, yeah.아, 네!아, 네!아, 네!진짜 시험은 아직 오지 않았다.그녀는 다시 함께하고 싶어!

original_en_text: I’ve learnt too that travelling is not without its dangers... but I find myself wielding my weapon quite adeptly.<page>It’s curious, the way our instincts can guide us with such precision.
original_zh_text: 我现在知道旅途中总伴有危险……不过我武器用得倒挺顺手。<page>本能的指引竟如此精准，真奇妙。
translated_text: I also learned that the journey was risk-free. But I managed to manage a weapon very skillfully.<page>It 's amazing how our intuition can lead us so accurately.
secondary_translated_text: 또한 여행은 위험없는 것으로 알려졌다.하지만 난 무기를 아주 능숙하게 관리할 수 있었다.<page>우리의 직감이 우리를 그렇게 정확하게 인도할 수 있다는 것은 놀랍습니다.

translated_text: Letter from Berhart

original_en_text: Un-Daak... well struck. To face the fury of your weapon in a true battle would be an experience indeed. I would gladly duel again, if you have the time for it.
original_zh_text: 唔-嗒克……打得好。跟你打一架真是受益匪浅，等你有空我们再练。
translated_text: "Winduk" played well. Anger in the face of weapons during combat, certainly, experience. If I had time, I would fight.
secondary_translated_text: ' 윈독 ' 은 잘 연주했다.전투 중에 무기에 직면하여 분노, 확실히 경험.시간이 있었다면, 나는 싸웠을 것이다.

original_en_text: Hoho sister, my whiskers are still quivering! That’s how you know you had a rousing battle!<page>You go on ahead. Zaza and I will keep guard here and catch any stragglers.
original_zh_text: 嚯嚯，真是一场酣畅淋漓的战斗！我的胡子都还在颤抖呢！<page>你先前进吧，我和扎扎在这守着一会，看看有没有漏网之虫。
translated_text: The beard continues to smoke. This is how you will know that you are in an exciting battle!<page>Zaza and I will be here to protect and stop those who stand behind us.
secondary_translated_text: 수염은 계속 담배를 피웠다.이렇게 하면 여러분이 흥미진진한 전투에 있다는 것을 알게 될 것입니다!<page>자자와 나는 우리 뒤에 서있는 사람들을 보호하고 막기 위해 여기에있을 것입니다.

original_en_text: Hoy, red maiden. ‘Tis a prayer answered to see you safely wake.<hpage>Little Sherma? What has happened here?
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘！圣堡庇佑，你醒了！<hpage>小谢尔玛，此处发生了什么？
translated_text: Good morning, red girl, this is a prayer that you wake up safe.<hpage>Little Shaman, what's going on?
secondary_translated_text: 좋은 아침, 붉은 소녀, 이것은 당신이 안전하게 깨어나기를 기도합니다.<hpage>리틀 샤먼, 무슨 일이야?

original_en_text: Poshanka! So you found my calling ring, Child Wielding Needle. I recognised the sound of your weapon’s foreign metal against it.<page>On the hunt for my master, I am often away, but I still use this place as camp. Use the ring to call me whenever you wish to make trade.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！发现我的传讯了？听到你武器发出的那异域的金属声就知道是你。<page>我把这当作据点，但常外出寻找导师。想找我交易就摇铃。
translated_text: Boshanka! BOSHANKA! The guy who found my ring wears a needle and knows how foreign objects and metals can affect the weapon.<page>Usually I am looking for owners, but still use them as campsites.If you want to negotiate, please call us using your mobile phone.
secondary_translated_text: 보선카! BOSHANKA!내 반지를 찾은 남자는 바늘을 쓰고 있으며 이물질과 금속이 무기에 어떻게 영향을 미칠 수 있는지 알고 있습니다.<page>보통 나는 소유자를 찾고 있지만 여전히 campsites. If 협상을 원하면 휴대 전화를 사용하여 우리에게 전화하십시오.

translated_text: Map of Remote areas

original_en_text: <hpage>Gladly I will accept your aid Shakra. Let us cut closer to this Citadel’s haunted heart.<page>Garrok! Hornet Wielding Needle. Beside you, I will gladly raise my rings!
original_zh_text: <hpage>求之不得。一起杀进圣堡里去吧。<page>嘎咯克！使针的姑娘。能和你并肩作战，我的战环乐意至极！
translated_text: <hpage>I thank you for your help in bringing Shakra closer to the ghostly heart of this castle.<page>"No, no, no, no. Bumblebee moves on the needle. Next to you I want to raise the ring.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>샤크라를 이 성의 유령 중심부에 더 가까이 데려오도록 도와주셔서 감사합니다.<page>"아니, 아니, 아니, 아니, 버블비는 바늘에 움직인다.너 옆에 반지를 들고 싶다.

original_en_text: I’d hoped to never step these hateful halls, yet here I stand, as all those hapless bugs before.<hpage>You’ve journeyed far from that damp cell, tall bug. If you would oppose the minions of this Citadel, you have my respect.<page>Hmph. Then we share a rare stance, warrior. Few others seem possessed of will enough to resist.<page>So many weak minds, drawn up and strung, in love with the great golden leech atop their lands.
original_zh_text: 我本不想踏入这憎恶之地，却还是步了前虫的后尘。<hpage>你既然从潮湿牢笼走到这里，若是想反抗圣堡，我愿助一臂之力。<page>哼，倒是难得。鲜少有虫能生出抵抗之心。<page>大多数都意志薄弱，沉溺受缚，被上头那黄金监牢所蛊惑。
translated_text: I didn't want to go into this room full of hate, but I 'm here before me like an unhappy worm.<hpage>I came out of the wet chamber the size of a worm.If you are against this piece of castle, I respect you. "<page>And then we shared an unusual place, soldier. Few people have the will to resist.<page>Many weak and nervous people have fallen in love with the giant Incas of their land.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 증오로 가득 찬 이 방으로 들어가고 싶지 않았지만, 불행한 벌레처럼 내 앞에있다.<hpage>나는 벌레 크기의 젖은 방에서 나왔다. 만약 당신이 이 성에 반대한다면, 나는 당신을 존경합니다. "<page>그리고 나서 우리는 특이한 장소를 공유했습니다, 군인.저항할 의지가 있는 사람은 거의 없다.<page>많은 약하고 긴장된 사람들은 그들의 땅의 거인 인카와 사랑에 빠졌습니다.

original_en_text: Ho there, brave sister! What poetry has fate writ, that we should meet here at the peak of this ghastly Citadel!<page>Beasts and fiends, all here are lost to that horrid Haunting! And out from this golden corpse it seeps to plague the good bugs of the land below. Well, no more we say!<hpage>You should beware brave sirs, the creature that commands this curse is a foe far beyond bug. I would not see your lives given in vain.<page>Pah! We beware nothing! We would give our lives a hundred times over to finally cut away the evil that clutches our kingdom!
original_zh_text: 哟，勇敢的姐妹！真有缘，能在这鬼圣堡顶上见面！<page>那些被邪丝牵着走的虫兽，就是从这金色死城跑出去祸害纺络的，但到此为止了！<hpage>当心，萦绕于圣堡之上的存在远非虫类能敌，不要白白丢了性命。<page>呸！我们才不怕！只要能斩断缠住这破地方的丝线，死一百回都值！
translated_text: What is poetry about destiny? See you at the top of this castle.<page>Animals and demons, all disappeared in a terrifying ghost! He escaped from this golden corpse, a good earthly insect under the plague.<hpage>Attention, brave gentlemen, the creature that cast this curse is far superior to the enemy worm. I do not see that they sacrifice their lives in vain.<page>О о у! I paid no attention to anything! To eradicate the evil that surrounds our kingdom, we will give our lives a hundred times over.
secondary_translated_text: 운명에 관한 시는 무엇인가?이 성 꼭대기에서 만나요.<page>동물과 악마, 모두 무서운 유령으로 사라졌다!그는 전염병 아래의 착한 지상의 곤충인 이 황금 시체에서 탈출했다.<hpage>조심하세요, 용감한 신사 여러분, 이 저주를 던지는 생물은 적의 벌레보다 훨씬 우월합니다.나는 그들이 헛되이 목숨을 희생하는 것을 보지 않는다.<page>오오오오!나는 아무 것도 신경쓰지 않았다!우리 왕국을 둘러싼 악을 근절하기 위해, 우리는 우리의 생명을 백 배로 바칠 것입니다.

original_en_text: Goodness! This is just too embarrassing! Detected even through my perfect cover! What tell? What error? Surely something gave me away!<hpage>It was no one thing, young bug. Your disguise is near faultless. I’ve merely spent a long life being watchful.<page>Gah! Then I’ll just have to hope the beasts about don’t share such keen sight. It’ll be so much harder to accomplish my work if I’m detected, or eaten!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！太丢脸了！完美伪装都被识破！哪里露馅了？<hpage>你没露出破绽，小虫子。只是我活得够久，眼神也比较好。<page>好吧！但愿怪物们没这么眼尖。万一被发现或被吃掉都会耽误我工作！
translated_text: Oh my god! This is heat! Perfect cover, what did I say? What error? Something has shown me!<hpage>- The costumes are almost perfect. I have been in a state of readiness for a long time.<page>¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! I wish the animals around me didn't have such sharp eyes.If you swallowed or swallowed, It will be difficult to do the job!
secondary_translated_text: 오, 세상에!이것은 뜨거운!완벽한 커버, 내가 뭐라고 말했어?무슨 실수가?뭔가가 내게 보여주었다!<hpage>- 의상은 거의 완벽합니다.나는 오랫동안 준비 상태였다.<page>오, 그래!오, 네!내 주변 동물들이 그렇게 예리한 눈을 가지고 있지 않았으면 좋겠다. 삼키거나 삼키면 일을 하기 어려워질 거야!

original_en_text: <hpage>The battle ahead may indeed be arduous. I accept your offer of aid, sirs.<page>Gurrrro! Yes! No force in the kingdom can withstand our might! Lead on, sister! Zaza and I will be close behind!
original_zh_text: <hpage>前方战斗凶险，有劳二位了。<page>嘎噜！咱们联手肯定所向披靡！带路吧姐妹！我和扎扎自会跟上！
translated_text: <hpage>The battle will be very difficult from now on. Ladies and gentlemen, I accept your offer of help.<page>Go! Ah, yes! Ah, yes! The kingdom cannot resist our authority! Sister, guide us! We pay taxes and we watch it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>이제부터는 전투가 매우 어려워질 것입니다. 신사 숙녀 여러분, 저는 여러분들의 도움을 받아들입니다.<page>빨리 가!아, 네!아, 네!왕국은 우리의 권위에 저항할 수 없다!자매님, 우리를 인도해 주십시오!우리는 세금을 내고 그것을 지켜보고 있습니다.

original_en_text: Sister, sister, tired and glum,<br>We will sing, and you can hum,<br>Together we shall overcome!
original_zh_text: 姐妹同袍，圣途相聚，<br>齐声歌唱，忘却忧伤，<br>同心协力，共度难关！
translated_text: Sisters, sisters, tired and depressed.<br>You can sing and smoke.<br>We have failed together!
secondary_translated_text: 언니, 언니, 피곤하고 우울하다.<br>노래하고 담배를 피울 수 있다.<br>우리는 함께 실패했습니다!

original_en_text: <page=M>Oh ho! Back from the depths with nary a scratch! Is it as you feared?<hpage>It is, and worse. Your snare has sunk the monarch deep, deeper than I can safely descend.<hpage>To cut Pharloom free, I must plunge below the surface of that lake of liquid nothing.<page=B> No shell survives submersion in that void, Old One, not even yours.<hpage>Not without aid, certainly. Though aid may exist. The flower that resists the dark. Do you know of it?<page=M>The Everbloom?... We’ve heard the tale, but had thought it a myth. If ever it sprouted in our lands we would surely have known?<hpage>I would not seek it in these lands. I need its power full, and it is too fragile to sustain here long. I would seek it in my memory.<page=S> Oh ho ho! So you’d have us wrench open your soul, to retrieve the fabled bloom? Can such a thing be done?<hpage>For another bug, no, but I am Weaver enough to attempt it.<hpage>In the distant past, I knew the flower. My thread still holds its faint memory. If the Everbloom was grasped strongly enough within my Silk, it could be made to manifest.<page=M>Ah! So you’re asking another spell of us? To reveal the flower clear?... But to illuminate one of your kind’s old memories, so acutely... This is no easy thing, even for us...<page=M>Old One, you must give us a moment to confer...
original_zh_text: <page=M>哦嚯！毫发无损从深渊归来！情况果真如您所料？<hpage>比预料的更糟。你们的陷阱将君主沉得极深，深过我安全下潜的极限。<hpage>要斩断纺络的枷锁，须要直入虚无之湖深处。<page=B>古老者，没有躯壳能在虚空浸泡中幸存，您也不例外。<hpage>单凭自己当然不成，但若有助力……那朵抗暗之花，你们知道吗？<page=M>永绽花？……听说过，但只当是传说。如果曾在此地绽放过，我们怎会不知？<hpage>此地当然找不到，我需要完全盛放的花，此地养不活。得去我的记忆中找。<page=S>哦嚯嚯！是要我们撕开您魂魄，取出那朵神花？这真能成功？<hpage>其他虫不行，但我有织者血脉，可以一试。<hpage>在遥远过去，我记得此花，灵丝中尚存其残影。若能在记忆中紧紧抓住，或许能使其显形。<page=M>啊！所以又要我们施法？让花影清晰？……可要照彻您这一族的古老回忆……就算是我们也……<page=M>古老者，请让我们商议一下……
translated_text: <page=M>Oh, I screamed! I'm down, sorry, as if I'm really worried.<hpage>Your trap has fallen into the king 's hand, deeper than I have fallen to safety.<hpage>In order to free Faro, I had to dive into a lake where there was nothing.<page=B>The raccoon cannot survive in this old emptiness, not even yours.<hpage>This is true even without help.Do you know how to resist the color of darkness that can help you?<page=M>The eternal color? I 've heard this story before, but I think it 's a myth. If they grow up in our country, then we 'll find out.<hpage>I do not seek it on earth. I need it, but I am too weak to stay here for long. I seek it in my memories.<page=S>- Oh, oh, oh! Do you want to open your soul and claim the flower of legend? Can you do that? "<hpage>As for the other mistake, no, but I 'm good enough fabric to try it.<hpage>I have known this flower for a long time.My memory has always been weak.If my silk is strong enough to cling to the eternal flower, it will appear.<page=M>¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! Do you want me to use my magic? Do the flowers have to be bright? However, he is able to clearly illuminate old memories about his race. And this is not an easy task for us either.<page=M>Father, we need to take the time to discuss this.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>오, 내가 비명을 지르다!정말 걱정이 된 것 같아서, 미안해.<hpage>네 덫이 왕의 손에 떨어졌으니 내가 안전에 빠졌던 것보다 더 깊도다. #<hpage>파로를 해방시키기 위해, 나는 아무것도 없는 호수로 다이빙해야 했습니다.<page=B>너구리는 이 오래된 공허함 속에서 살아남을 수 없다. 심지어 너의 것도 아니다.<hpage>이것은 도움없이도 사실입니다. 당신을 도울 수있는 어둠의 색을 저항하는 방법을 알고 있습니까?<page=M>영원한 색?나는 이 이야기를 들어본 적이 있지만, 나는 그것이 신화라고 생각한다.만약 그들이 우리나라에서 자라면, 우리는 그것을 알게 될 것이다.<hpage>나는 지구에서 그것을 찾지 않는다.나는 그것을 필요로하지만, 나는 여기에 오래 머물기에는 너무 약하다.나는 그것을 내 기억 속에서 찾는다.<page=S>- 오 오, 오, 오!당신은 당신의 영혼을 열고 전설의 꽃을 주장하고 싶습니까?할 수 있어요? "<hpage>다른 실수에 관해서는, 아니, 하지만 나는 그것을 시도하기에 충분한 직물이다.<hpage>이 꽃을 오래 전부터 알고 있었는데, 기억력이 항상 약해졌는데, 내 실크가 영원의 꽃에 붙어 있을 만큼 강하다면, 그것은 나타날 것이다.<page=M>오, 그래!오, 네!내가 내 마법을 사용하길 원하니?꽃은 밝아야 하는가?그러나 그는 자신의 인종에 대한 오래된 기억을 명확하게 밝힐 수 있습니다.그리고 이것은 우리에게도 쉬운 일이 아니다.<page=M>아버지, 우리는 이것을 논의할 시간을 가져야 합니다.

translated_text: The Hunter's Map.

original_en_text: My wish is granted... and now everything I love is lost...
original_zh_text: 愿望实现了……可我珍视的一切都消失了……
translated_text: My wishes have been fulfilled... Everything I loved was lost.
secondary_translated_text: 나의 소원이 이루어졌다.내가 사랑하는 모든 것이 사라졌다.

original_en_text: Gara Takana! What has happened to you, Child Wielding Needle, to cause you such brutal weakening?<hpage>You are seeing the effects of a parasite, Shakra, a writhing entity implanted by force. It will not kill me, not quickly at least, but its presence wears greatly on my shell.<page>It is a horrid state you suffer. Fight yourself free, or find help with haste. I would not wish to see you defeated by such deceitful strength.
original_zh_text: 加拉塔卡纳！使针的小姑娘，你怎么了？竟变成这副惨状？<hpage>是寄生物的影响，沙克拉。它被强行植入了我的躯壳。虽不会立刻致命，但持续侵蚀着我。<page>这状态太可怕了。要么挣脱它，要么快去寻求援助。我可不愿见你败给如此诡诈的力量。
translated_text: High to France! What made you so weak?<hpage>What you see are the effects of a parasitic chakra, deformed, integrated by force of being that cannot kill me, at least not immediately, but its presence causes a great abrasion on my shell.<page>This is a terrible condition they suffer from.Seek help as soon as possible! I don't want you to lose to such a deceptive force.
secondary_translated_text: 프랑스에 높이!무엇이 당신을 그렇게 약하게 만들었나요?<hpage>당신이 보는 것은 기생체 차크라의 효과입니다, 변형, 존재의 힘에 의해 통합, 적어도 즉시 나를 죽일 수는 없지만, 그것의 존재는 내 껍질에 큰 마모를 유발합니다.<page>이것은 그들이 고통 받고있는 끔찍한 상태입니다. 가능한 빨리 도움을 요청하십시오!나는 네가 그런 기만적인 힘에 패배하기를 원하지 않는다.

original_en_text: Hoi! Let our mighty contest of shells commence again!
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. We also started a race for powerful seafood!
secondary_translated_text: 이봐 이봐 이봐우리는 또한 강력한 해산물을위한 경주를 시작했습니다!

original_en_text: You’re in the habit of craftin’ all kinds’a nasty tools’n traps, aint’cha? This kit’ll let you build ‘em even nastier, heh heh...
original_zh_text: 你这家伙成天捣鼓些工具跟陷阱，是吧？这匣子能帮你更进一步，嘿嘿……
translated_text: You 're used to using all sorts of boring tools and traps, right? Really? Will they make it worse?
secondary_translated_text: 넌 모든 종류의 지루한 도구와 함정을 사용하는 데 익숙해지잖아, 그렇지?진짜?그들은 그것을 더 악화시킬 것인가?

original_en_text: Poshanka, Child Wielding Needle. This heart-home is cut free of its curse.<page>Tell me, was it your blade that brought its saving? My shock would be great if another here managed the feat.<hpage>I slew a tall creature above the town, a Weaver I suspect, though one twisted in purpose.<hpage>By voice and claw it aided, perhaps guided, the thread that strung the town. <page>Weaver? Those vicious old things! To our young we tell the tales, but had thought them long dead, only corpses bound in spires. <hpage>This one still lived, though if it was a Weaver, it was broken in a savage way.<hpage>Its own Silk was bound, pinned deep within its shell. A cruel punishment I’ve not before witnessed. <page>Even broken, my envy remains. A Weaver’s fabled skills... To meet one in combat means great challenge, and great pride in victory.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔，使针的小姑娘。这镇子的诅咒解除了？<page>是你干的？别的虫可没这本事。<hpage>我斩了镇子上头的高个怪物，像是个变异的织者。<page>是它用声音和利爪操控缠绕镇子的丝线。<page>织者？那群老毒物！还以为早死绝了，只剩塔里的干尸。<hpage>这只还活着，但被折磨得不成样。<hpage>灵丝被钉在壳里，残忍的刑罚。<page>就算残了我也羡慕。织者的本事……能交手是幸运，能得胜更是荣耀。
translated_text: Bosnian children shake needles.This shower house has been freed from the curse.<page>Did the sword bring salvation? If someone else did that, I would be surprised.<hpage>I killed a large creature in the sky above the city, which I suspected was a tear, though it was intentionally distorted.<hpage>It helps with sounds and claws, and may help control the electrical wires that connect the city.<page>Theater? We used to tell these stories to young people, but they were long dead, and we thought there were only corpses in the arrow.<hpage>He 's still alive, but if it were a tear, he would be badly damaged.<hpage>His silk was tied and fixed deep into the shell. It was a cruel punishment that I had never seen.<page>Even if it breaks, my jealousy will remain.Develops legendary skills.Fighting in battle is to be proud of victory.
