secondary_translated_text: 보스니아 어린이들이 바늘을 흔들고 있습니다. 이 샤워 시설은 저주에서 해방되었습니다.<page>검이 구원을 가져오는가?만약 다른 사람이 그랬다면, 나는 놀라게 될 것이다.<hpage>나는 도시 상공에서 큰 생물을 죽였는데, 그것은 의도적으로 왜곡되었지만 눈물이라는 것을 의심했다.<hpage>그것은 소리와 발톱에 도움이되며, 도시를 연결하는 전선을 제어하는 데 도움이 될 수 있습니다.<page>극장?우리는 젊은이들에게 이런 이야기를 들려주곤 했는데, 그들은 오래 전에 죽었고, 화살에는 시체만 있다고 생각했다.<hpage>그는 아직 살아있지만, 만약 눈물이었다면, 그는 심하게 손상되었을 것이다.<hpage>그의 실크는 껍질 깊숙이 묶여 고정되어 있다.그것은 내가 본 적이 없는 잔인한 형벌이었다.<page>부러져도 질투는 남는다. 전설적인 기술을 개발한다. 전투에서 싸우는 것은 승리에 대한 자랑이다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings, Shakra. You are a welcome sight amidst the sodden gloom of these caverns. <page>Child Wielding Needle, your aspect is still sharp. My respect remains. Heed a warning, many fierce bugs roost nearby.<page>On the lake beyond this cave nest a ragged horde atop an old watermound. Their mastery of flight makes them dangerous. My shell will forever carry the score of their pins.<page>If you’re seeking a safer path, head back, towards this land’s core.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。能在这阴湿洞穴里见到你真好。<page>使针的小姑娘，身手还是那么利索。提醒你，附近猛虫可不少。<page>前面湖心住着群飞虫，我壳上被它们的针弄得全是伤。<page>想走安全点的路就就回头，往这地方的中心走。
translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, Shakira. In these wet caves you are a welcome.<page>His appearance is always strong.Respect is maintained.If you pay attention to the warnings, then there are many ferocious insects in the vicinity.<page>Behind the cave is a group of ancient tribes located in the hills of ancient waters in the lake.The ability to fly puts them in danger.My shell always has the tip of my emblem.<page>If you are looking for a safer route, return to the center of the Earth.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>좋은 아침, 샤키라이 젖은 동굴에서 당신은 환영합니다.<page>그의 외모는 항상 강하다. 존경심을 유지한다. 경고에 주의를 기울이면 근처에 많은 사나운 곤충이 있습니다.<page>동굴 뒤에는 호수 안의 고대 물의 언덕에 위치한 고대 부족들이 있다. 비행 능력은 그들을 위험에 빠뜨린다. 내 껍질은 항상 내 상징의 끝을 가지고 있다.<page>더 안전한 경로를 찾고 있다면, 지구 중심으로 돌아 가십시오.

original_en_text: Nuu is a long way from her safe lodging... perhaps she will stay in this nice, dark little squeezy place a little longer.
original_zh_text: 努努离家好远……暂时在这个黑暗小缝里窝会儿吧。
translated_text: You may stay a little longer in this beautiful, dark, crowded place.
secondary_translated_text: 이 아름답고 어둡고 붐비는 곳에서 조금 더 머물 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sherma, I bring supplies from the town of bells below. Since you are now caretaker here, I entrust them to you.<page>Oh, what a blessing! This will surely raise the hopes of our poor brothers and sisters.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小谢尔玛，我从下面镇子带了补给。既然现在你是看守者，就交给你了。<page>真是雪中送炭！兄弟姐妹们肯定会振作起来的！
translated_text: <hpage>Xaman, you brought supplies from Beltown, and now you're the custodian of this place, so I left it all to you.<page>Oh, what a chance! This gives hope to our poor brothers and sisters.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Xaman, 벨타운에서 물품을 가져왔는데 이제 당신은 이곳의 수호자가 되어서 모든 것을 당신에게 맡겼습니다.<page>오, 정말 좋은 기회야!이것은 우리의 가난한 형제 자매들에게 희망을 줍니다.

original_en_text: Red maiden, you have some great task ahead of you, do you not? If so, then I fear the time of our final parting draws near.<hpage>You sense it true, Sherma. I shall soon descend to the darkness below the kingdom and quell the source of Pharloom’s rending.<hpage>If that task is achieved, my future may take me far from Pharloom, but know I have faith that you will hold these bugs together, and see them prosper.<page>Ah! In truth, I’m still only a fool, but I’ll hold dearly to your faith in me. That warmth will help me to endure whatever challenges lie ahead!<page>Now let me pray for you, dear friend, and may my hopes follow you into the deepest darkness and beyond!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，您身负重大使命，对吧？若是如此，恐怕我们分别的时刻临近了。<hpage>你的直觉得没错，谢尔玛。我即将深入王国底部的黑暗，平息撕裂纺络的源头。<hpage>若使命达成，我或许会远行。但我坚信你能团结这些虫子，带领他们重建繁荣。<page>哈！说得对，说得对！毕竟我虽然攀登至此，但终究只是个愚者，而看护这些虫民同胞的生涯才刚开始。<page>现在我要为您祈祷，亲爱的红衣姑娘，静待我们齐声歌颂您凯旋的时刻！
translated_text: There 's still a lot of work to be done, really? If this is the case, then I fear that the time will come for the final disengagement.<hpage>You are right, Xaman. Soon I will penetrate the darkness of the kingdom and suppress the cause of the destruction of the House.<hpage>If this task is accomplished, my future may take me away from Farham, but I believe you can put these mistakes together and see how I thrive. "<page>¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! In fact, I am still crazy, but I deeply believe in your trust, and this warmth will help me withstand all the difficulties in the future!<page>My dear friend, allow me to pray that my hope will continue in the deep darkness and beyond.
secondary_translated_text: 아직 해야 할 일이 많아요, 정말요?만약 그렇다면, 나는 최종 탈퇴의 시간이 올 것이라고 두려워한다.<hpage>네 말이 맞아, Xaman.곧 내가 왕국의 어둠을 뚫고 그 집의 파괴의 원인을 억압할 것이다.<hpage>이 임무가 완수되면 내 미래가 나를 Farham 에서 멀리 데려 갈 수 있지만, 나는 당신이 이러한 실수를 함께 넣어 내가 어떻게 번성하는지 볼 수 있다고 믿는다. "<page>오, 그래!오, 네!사실, 나는 여전히 미쳤지만, 나는 당신의 신뢰를 깊이 믿습니다. 이 따뜻함은 앞으로 모든 어려움을 극복하는 데 도움이 될 것입니다!<page>사랑하는 친구여, 깊은 어둠 속에서 그리고 그 너머에서도 나의 희망이 지속될 수 있도록 기도해 주십시오.

translated_text: PIN of the seller

original_en_text: The way forward is yours. Let us meet again soon.
translated_text: The road ahead is yours. I will see you soon.
secondary_translated_text: 앞으로의 길은 당신의 것이다.나는 곧 너를 볼 것이다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you pit yourself against the black-threaded bugs? They are dangerous foes, even for a hardened warrior.<page>I relish such danger, and have little choice besides. These creatures besiege the town within. They are relentless, and empowered. <hpage>...It is the void, stretched up into this world and its husks. I know it well, this force, its nature. If it senses soul within, it will drive voracious towards it.<page>As you say! Many bugs now huddle within the bells. Nowhere else is safe with this black threat rising.<page>Some luck, at least, that I chose to remain, and can offer my rings’ defence.<hpage>Shakra, I seek to end this new disaster, for in it I share much blame, but know, I shall need time to complete my task.<hpage>I ask you hold fast till then. This town and its bugs need a guardian, and I can think of none better.<page>Very well, Hornet Wielding Needle. A pact made strong. If you are working towards the venom’s end, I shall fight with faith renewed.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，你在独自抵挡黑灾虫群？再强悍的战士面对它们也很危险。<page>我享受这份危险，但也没得选择。它们在围攻小镇，没完没了，还有邪力加持。<hpage>……是虚空，侵入现世操纵躯壳。我很了解这东西，它的力量，和本质。它只要嗅到灵魂就会想要吞噬。<page>话是这么说，现在虫民都躲钟里……但别处更危险。<page>我选择留下已经算他们走运，至少还能挡一阵。<hpage>沙克拉，我会想办法终结这场灾难，毕竟我也有责任。但我需要时间，请你坚守下去。<hpage>小镇需要守卫，没有虫比你更合适。<page>好吧，使针的小姑娘。我答应你，只要你能解决源头，我会死守到底。
translated_text: <hpage>Chakra, do you allow yourself to fight the mistakes of the black line? They are dangerous enemies, even to powerful soldiers.<page>I love danger, and I have no choice but to do it.These creatures surround the city.They are cold and powerful.<hpage>... It is the emptiness that spreads into the world and into its shell. I know very well its power, its nature. If you feel the soul in it, you will be greedy for it.<page>as you say! The clock is full of mistakes.As this black threat grows, all else is true.<page>At least, fortunately, I decided to stay and was able to offer a defense in the ring.<hpage>Shakra, I am trying to put an end to this new catastrophe because I have a great responsibility, but I know that it will take time to fulfill my mission.<hpage>This time, please work hard.This city and its insects need a caretaker, and I can't think of anything better.<page>Orneto waves a needle.This is a strong agreement.If you want to put an end to this poison, I will fight with a new conviction. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>차크라, 당신은 검은 선의 실수와 싸울 수 있습니까?그들은 강력한 군인들에게도 위험한 적이다.<page>나는 위험을 좋아하고, 나는 그것을하는 것 외에는 선택의 여지가 없습니다. 이 생물들은 도시를 둘러싸고 있습니다. 그들은 차갑고 강력합니다.<hpage>...그것은 세계와 그 껍질으로 퍼지는 공허함입니다.나는 그것의 힘, 그것의 본질을 아주 잘 알고 있다.만약 당신이 그 안에 있는 영혼을 느낀다면, 당신은 그것을 탐욕하게 될 것이다.<page>당신이 말한대로!시계는 실수로 가득 차 있습니다. 이 검은 위협이 커지면서, 다른 모든 것은 사실입니다.<page>다행히도, 나는 머물기로 결정했고 링에서 수비를 제공 할 수있었습니다.<hpage>샤크라, 나는 큰 책임이 있기 때문에 이 새로운 재앙을 끝내려고 노력하고 있지만, 내 임무를 완수하는 데 시간이 걸릴 것이라는 것을 알고 있다.<hpage>이번에는 열심히 노력해 주세요. 이 도시와 그 곤충은 돌보는 사람이 필요해요. 더 좋은 건 생각 나지 않아요.<page>오르네토는 바늘을 흔들었다. 이것은 강한 합의이다. 당신이 이 독을 없애고 싶다면, 나는 새로운 신념으로 싸울 것이다. "

original_en_text: Let us charge on. My rings shall sing loud on the shells of our enemies.
original_zh_text: 冲吧！让我用战环在敌人的壳上奏响战歌！
translated_text: My ring will sing loudly to the enemy 's shells.
secondary_translated_text: 내 반지는 적의 포탄에 크게 노래할 것이다.

original_en_text: And now, miss grown-up, the task is done! Nuu must be away.<page>But do not be sour! Just think! Pharloom is only one land. So many more must hide out there, filled full with beasts and scents and tastes, all waiting to be discovered.<page>For Nuu, her journey is only at its start. And for you, miss grown-up, Nuu wishes too your happy hunting, much and more!
original_zh_text: 任务完成了！那么大姐姐，努努要出发了。<page>别难过！纺络只是开始！外面还有无数大地等着探索呢！<page>努努的旅程刚开始，祝大姐姐也狩猎愉快！
translated_text: Your Majesty, Madam, the mission is complete, and the sister must leave.<page>Stop the acid, think about it! The Faroe Islands is a country. There must be something else hidden in it. The beast, the smell, everything is waiting to be discovered.<page>The journey has just begun, enjoy your neck!
secondary_translated_text: 전하, 숙녀님, 임무를 완수하셨으니 누나는 떠나야 합니다.<page>산을 멈추고, 그것에 대해 생각해보십시오!페로 제도 (Faroe Islands) 는 한 나라입니다.그 안에 숨겨진 무언가가 있어야 한다. 짐승, 냄새, 모든 것이 발견되기를 기다리고 있다.<page>여행은 이제 막 시작되었습니다, 당신의 목을 즐기십시오!

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, what has happened here? For these masses to huddle so amongst such destruction?<page>The dark-spun bugs, they besiege the town, relentless. I have defended against each wave anew, but they are empowered in foul ways, and I am much fatigued.<hpage>...It is the void, stretched up into this world and its husks. I know it well, that force, its nature. If it senses soul, it will drive voracious towards it.<page>As you say! All these bugs, gathered close within the bells... but nowhere else is safe with this black threat rising.<hpage>Shakra, I seek to end this new disaster, for in it I share much blame, but know, I shall need time to complete my task. I would ask you hold fast till then.<hpage>This town and its bugs needs a guardian, and I can think of none better.<page>Very well, Hornet Wielding Needle. A pact made strong. If you are working towards the venom’s end, I shall fight with faith renewed.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，这是怎么回事？废墟里挤着这么多虫？<page>黑虫围攻小镇，击退一波又来一波。它们有邪力加持，我快顶不住了。<hpage>……是虚空，侵入现世操纵躯壳。我很了解这东西，它的力量，和本质。它只要嗅到灵魂就会想要吞噬。<page>话是这么说，现在虫民都躲钟里……但别处更危险。<hpage>沙克拉，我会想办法终结这场灾难，毕竟我也有责任。但我需要时间，请你坚守下去。<hpage>小镇需要守卫，没有虫比你更合适。<page>好吧，使针的小姑娘。我答应你，只要你能解决源头，我会死守到底。
translated_text: <hpage>What happened to Shakur that we got involved in such a disaster?<page>I defended every wave, but they were poorly fed and I was very tired.<hpage>... It is the emptiness that spreads into the world and into its shell. I know it, its power, its nature. "When you feel the soul, you approach it with anxiety.<page>as you say! All these insects gather at the sound of the bells, but as this black threat grows, other places are not safe.<hpage>Shakra, I am trying to put an end to this new disaster because I have a great responsibility, but I know that it will take time to fulfill my mission.<hpage>This city and its insects need a caretaker, and I can't think of a better one.<page>Orneto waves a needle.This is a strong agreement.If you want to put an end to this poison, I will fight with a new conviction. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>샤쿠르에게 무슨 일이 있었을까? 우리가 이런 재앙에 연루되었을까?<page>나는 모든 파도를 방어했지만, 그들은 먹이가 좋지 않아서 나는 매우 피곤했다.<hpage>...그것은 세계와 그 껍질으로 퍼지는 공허함입니다.나는 그것의 힘, 그것의 본질을 안다. "영혼을 느낄 때, 당신은 불안으로 그것에 접근합니다.<page>당신이 말한대로!이 모든 곤충들은 종소리에 모이지만, 이 검은 위협이 커지면서 다른 장소는 안전하지 않습니다.<hpage>샤크라, 나는 큰 책임이 있기 때문에 이 새로운 재앙을 끝내려고 노력하고 있지만, 내 임무를 완수하는 데는 시간이 걸릴 것이라는 것을 알고 있다.<hpage>이 도시와 그 곤충들은 돌보는 사람이 필요해요. 더 좋은 사람은 생각할 수 없어요.<page>오르네토는 바늘을 흔들었다. 이것은 강한 합의이다. 당신이 이 독을 없애고 싶다면, 나는 새로운 신념으로 싸울 것이다. "

original_en_text: Eugh. Is it gettin’ hotter down here? Mustier? Grindle’s been down here too long. Reckon it’s time to climb back up soon, to where all the serious treasures is!
original_zh_text: 呃。这底下是不是越来越热了？格林德尔在这底下待太久了，该上去淘真宝贝了！
translated_text: Is it hot here? Musketers? "Grindel has been here for so long, I thought it was time to come back and find all the important treasures as soon as possible!
secondary_translated_text: 여기는 더워요?무총사? "그린델이 오랫동안 이곳에 왔기 때문에, 나는 가능한 한 빨리 다시 와서 모든 중요한 보물을 찾아야 할 때라고 생각했다!

translated_text: The dark market

original_en_text: So this is... defeat? Can it be? Huu... A shell so fast! Wonder of Pharloom! A bug whose pace could match my own.<page>Though I set a simple course, you have proven its match and more. Take this small reward, nimble bug, and remember well our grand contest!
original_zh_text: 居然……输了？怎么可能？呼……太快了！真是神奇！<page>虽然这条赛道不难，但你证明了自己！收下这个奖励，纪念我们的巅峰对决！
translated_text: Is that all, a failure? Are you all right? But the gun was fast. "The Pharaoh 's Miracle ": He is a worm at the same speed as I am.<page>I installed a simple path, but it turned out to be compatible and so on.Earn this little reward, be careful of mistakes and remember the great game!
secondary_translated_text: 그게 다야, 실패야?괜찮아?하지만 총은 빠르다.파라오의 기적 (The Pharaoh 's Miracle) : 그는 나만큼 빠른 벌레입니다.<page>간단한 경로를 설치했지만 호환되는 것으로 밝혀졌습니다. 이 작은 보상, 실수를 조심하고 위대한 게임을 기억하십시오!

original_en_text: Oh, hoy there! Why, I must have dropped off to sleep as soon as I arrived!<page>Certainly, the pilgrim’s way is exhausting, but a good rest is a reward unto itself!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！刚到这地方就睡着了！<page>朝圣虽累，但一场美梦就是最好的犒赏！
translated_text: Here it is! Why not? When I got dressed, I slept.<page>Of course, the pilgrimage is exhausting, but a good rest in itself is a reward!
secondary_translated_text: 여기 있네요!왜 안 돼요?옷을 입었을 때 나는 잠을 잤다.<page>물론, 순례는 피곤하지만, 좋은 휴식은 그 자체로 보상입니다!

original_en_text: That was a battle well-fought, Child Wielding Needle. Your master would be proud of you.<hpage>The one who trained me long ago... I never called her master. Whether she would be proud of what has become of me, I cannot say.<page>Nu-Hakkata! Whether she is dead or alive, have faith! Nothing a pupil does escapes their master’s sight!
original_zh_text: 打得好！你的导师肯定很骄傲。<hpage>教导我的……我从没叫过她导师。她会不会以我为荣……我不知道。<page>努-哈咔嗒！不管她是死是活，你都要自信！徒弟干的事，师傅都看在眼里！
translated_text: It was a good fight, and the kids waved needles. Your guests will be proud of you!<hpage>People who have trained me for a long time. I don't call him Master. I don't know if she 's proud of what happened to me.<page>The Empty Side! Whether you live or die, you need faith.What a student does cannot escape the attention of the teacher.
secondary_translated_text: 좋은 싸움이 있었고, 아이들은 바늘을 흔들었다.당신의 손님들은 당신을 자랑스러워 할 것입니다!<hpage>오랫동안 나를 훈련시킨 사람들.나는 그를 스승이라고 부르지 않는다.나는 그녀가 나에게 일어난 일을 자랑스러워하는지 모르겠다.<page>텅 비어있는 측면!생하든 죽든 믿음은 필요하다. 학생이 하는 일은 선생님의 관심을 피할 수 없다.

original_en_text: Wide, dim hollows, choked by rag and dust. The bugs who once tended these lands have clearly lost their way.
original_zh_text: 昏暗广袤的洞窟塞满破布灰尘，原本照料这里的虫早已迷失了方向。
translated_text: The vast, dark void was clogged with dirt and dust. The insects that once cared for this land, of course, lost their way.
secondary_translated_text: 광대하고 어두운 공허는 먼지와 먼지로 막혀 있었다.한때 이 땅을 돌보았던 곤충들은 당연히 길을 잃었습니다.

original_en_text: Red maiden! Dear sister! At last, our great pilgrimage is at its end!<page>Our faith never wavered, and now here awaits our glorious reward, the shining Citadel! Where all sing as one!<hpage>I will not tell you to turn back, for I know you will not, but I urge you at least to be cautious. Terrible things lurk within this Citadel, little pilgrim.<page>Oh, sister! There is no need for caution, and no need for fear. Let us step forward under guidance of our faith!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘！好姐妹！我们终于到了！<page>守住信念不容易，现在终于看到圣堡了！大家齐声歌颂的地方！<hpage>我知道劝不动你回头，但千万小心。这里头藏着可怕的东西。<page>用不着小心！跟着信仰往前走就对了！
translated_text: The red girl! Dear sister! The great pilgrimage is finally over!<page>Our faith will not prevail, and our glorious reward awaits us here and now.<hpage>I won't tell you to come back because I know you won't come back, but at least be careful.Little pilgrim, there 's something terrible hiding in this castle.<page>sister! There is no need to fear or be afraid. The way of faith is the way of faith.
secondary_translated_text: 빨간 소녀!친애하는 자매님!위대한 순례가 마침내 끝났습니다!<page>우리의 믿음은 승리하지 않을 것이며, 우리의 영광스러운 상은 지금 여기 우리를 기다리고 있습니다.<hpage>돌아오지 않을 줄 알았으니까 돌아오라고 말하지 않겠지만, 적어도 조심해라. 어린 순례자여, 이 성에는 무서운 무언가가 숨어 있다.<page>언니!두려워하거나 두려워할 필요가 없습니다.신앙의 길은 신앙의 길이다.

original_en_text: This vein of gilded bells creates an effectively defended settlement. I can see it once gave a long time of peace to its bugs.<page>And yet, look at their numbers now. Stricken by cursed thread. Only a few have survived.<page>We must learn from them, Child Wielding Needle. Peace is a slow poison that would wither even the hardiest bug.
original_zh_text: 这金钟钟脉易守难攻，以前肯定十分安全。<page>看看现在，大半被丝咒侵蚀了，虫民也所剩寥寥。<page>要从这镇子上吸取教训，使针的小姑娘。安逸最腐蚀虫心。
translated_text: These golden bells are an effective defensive solution. I see that this has given this mistake some peace of mind for a long time.<page>Look at the current numbers. Trapped in the damned line? "Only a few survived.<page>We must teach our children that the world is a slow poison that spreads to even the most stubborn insects.
secondary_translated_text: 이 황금 종은 효과적인 방어 솔루션입니다.나는 이것이 오랫동안 이 실수에 약간의 마음의 평화를 주었다는 것을 본다.<page>현재 숫자를 살펴보자.망할 줄에 갇혀있나요? "몇 명만 살아남았다.<page>우리는 우리 아이들에게 세상이 가장 완고한 곤충에게도 퍼지는 느린 독이라는 것을 가르쳐야 한다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your camp here looks comfortably set, Shakra. Are you planning to stay a time?<page>Perhaps, yes. This heart-home makes a fine base for now and later if needed.<page>Still! I must take care not to rest overlong. My shell would soften and my senses dull.<page>
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，我瞧你营地布置得不错，打算长住？<page>或许吧，这镇子看来能暂时当个据点。<page> 但不能久待，会钝了爪子和脑子。
translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, your camp seems comfortable. Do you plan to stay for some time?<page>If necessary, this heart house will always be a good base.<page>REST! It is necessary to be careful not to rest too much. My shell is softening, and my feelings are missing.<page>
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>샤크라, 네 캠프는 편안해 보인다.잠시 머물 계획입니까?<page>필요한 경우, 이 심장 집은 항상 좋은 기초가 될 것입니다.<page>쉬어라!너무 많은 휴식을 취하지 않도록 주의해야 한다.내 껍질이 부드러워지고 내 감정이 사라지고 있다.<page>

original_en_text: Oh, hullo again! This time, I most certainly do recognise you! ‘Tis a pleasure to bump into you here, deep in this serene wood.<page>Do you have a name, like I do? Would you share it with me?<hpage>Certainly, sir. I am Hornet.<hpage>I notice you gazing at the buds above us... are they familiar to you, perhaps?<page>Hm? No, not at all. Very beautiful though! Perhaps I should gather some up before venturing on...
original_zh_text: 又见面了！这次绝对认得你！能在这林中深处偶遇也是缘分。<page>能告诉我你的名字吗？<hpage>我名为大黄蜂。<hpage>你在看那些苍白花苞……莫非曾经见过？<page>那倒没有，但它们很美！出发前或许该采些带着……
translated_text: Ah, here they are back! This time, I fully admit it! "It is a great honor to meet you in the depths of this quiet forest. "<page>Do you have the same name as mine? Would you like to share this with me?<hpage>¡Я - Bumblebee!<hpage>He realized he was looking at the shots in the head. You can tell it<page>What's it? What is it? Not all, but very beautiful.You may want to take some before you venture out.
secondary_translated_text: 아, 여기 그들이 돌아왔다!이번에, 나는 그것을 완전히 인정한다! "이 조용한 숲 깊은 곳에서 당신을 만나게 되어 영광입니다. "<page>내 이름과 같은 이름이 있니?이걸 나랑 공유해 주시겠어요?<hpage>' 나는 - Bumblebee!<hpage>그는 자신이 머리에 있는 총알을 보고 있다는 것을 깨달았다.당신은 그것을 말할 수 있습니다.<page>뭐예요?뭐야?전부는 아니지만 아주 아름답습니다. 모험을 하기 전에 몇 가지 가져 가기를 원할 수도 있습니다.

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>These markers I have modelled after the sheen of my own shell. Perhaps you will think of me when you use them.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>按我的壳抛光做的，用的时候会想起我吧？
translated_text: It can be used to mark important places and reminders on a map.<br><br>I made a marker that imitated the glow of my shell. Think of me when you use it.
secondary_translated_text: 지도에서 중요한 장소와 추억을 표시하는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.<br><br>나는 내 껍질의 빛을 모방하는 표지판을 만들었다.당신이 그것을 사용할 때 나를 생각해보십시오.

original_en_text: There are signs that pilgrims once travelled even these crumbling paths, long ago. Now only the voracious worms nest here.
original_zh_text: 这破路早年也有朝圣者走，现在只剩贪吃蠕虫。
translated_text: There are signs that in the past pilgrims walked along these unsustainable routes. Now only gourmet insects build their nests.
secondary_translated_text: 과거에는 순례자들이 지속 불가능한 경로를 걸었다는 징후가 있습니다.이제 오직 미식 곤충만이 둥지를 짓는다.

original_en_text: Hoi! Nimble bug! Surely you have reconsidered? Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 嘿！改变主意没？来一起突破极限！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. That's a smart mistake! Have you really reviewed this? Explore the boundaries together!
secondary_translated_text: 이봐 이봐 이봐그건 현명한 실수야!이거 진짜 검토해봤어요?함께 경계를 탐구하라!

original_en_text: You have purchased the last of my mapping stock, for now. Stay alive on your journey, and when our paths next cross we may trade again.
original_zh_text: 你把我的货买光啦，小姑娘。多保重，下次碰面再做交易。
translated_text: You can keep yourself in a good mood while traveling and sell it back the next time you see them.
secondary_translated_text: 여행하는 동안 좋은 기분을 유지하고 다음 번에 그들을 볼 때 다시 판매 할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Don’t be lingerin’ here too long! We got snitchin’ to do and we ain’t keen on company!
original_zh_text: 别在这儿磨蹭太久！我们还要干活呢，不欢迎围观！
translated_text: Don't stay here too long. I'd like to report, but my colleagues don't do that.
secondary_translated_text: 여기서 오래 머무르지 마세요.보고하고 싶지만 동료들은 그렇게 하지 않는다.

original_en_text: If you venture further and higher into these caverns, beware. The sickly air only grows thicker.
original_zh_text: 如果你要往高处的话，走小心，那儿的瘴气更浓。
translated_text: Be careful when you enter the cave. It will only worsen the painful air.
secondary_translated_text: 동굴에 들어갈 때는 조심해야 한다.그것은 단지 고통스러운 공기를 악화시킬 뿐이다.

original_en_text: I’ll be off soon, once I’m good and rested. Beyond the wood lies the final climb, and then at last we shall reach the Citadel!<page>Which of us will reach the Grand Gate first? If it’s me, I shall wait for you so we can enter together!
original_zh_text: 歇够了我就出发，穿过甲木林就是最后攀登，圣堡就在眼前！<page>看我们谁先到巨门？要是我先到，肯定会等你一起进去！
translated_text: As soon as I felt better, I walked up the trees and, on the last ascent, we finally arrived at the Castle!<page>Who will be the first to enter the Stargate? If it were me, I would wait and come with you.
secondary_translated_text: 기분이 좋아지자마자 나는 나무를 올라 갔고, 마지막 등반에서 우리는 마침내 성에 도착했습니다!<page>누가 스타게이트에 처음 들어올까?만약 내가 있다면, 나는 기다리고 당신과 함께 올 것이다.

original_en_text: If you would fight alone, I will say nothing more.
original_zh_text: 你要自己上的话，我也没意见。
translated_text: If you 're willing to fight alone, I won't talk anymore.
secondary_translated_text: 네가 혼자 싸우려고 한다면, 나는 더 이상 말하지 않을 것이다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair meeting again, sir knight. I see this bell has drawn you too towards its safety.<page>Who would have guessed, sister! A safe corner, hidden so high atop Pharloom’s cursed crown!<page>Our fair village may have fallen, but for these fellows... these scared few, our honour charges us to keep them safe. Our hornlance shall raise for them! After some rest, of course.<hpage>Hold fast to your new charge, Garmond. See these bugs survive, and know I aim, in time near, to cut down this curse at its core.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，骑士。看来这钟也把你吸引过来了。<page>谁能想到呢，圣堡顶上还有避难所！<page>村子没了，但这些吓坏了的……为了荣耀，我会拿起长枪保护好他们！不过得先歇会。<hpage>守好他们，加蒙德。我会斩断诅咒的核心，不会让你等太久的。
translated_text: <hpage>Another great quote, my friend.The watch also pays attention to its safety.<page>Who could guess? A safe corner, hidden above the cursed crown of a beacon!<page>Our wonderful people may have fallen, but it is for them. Our honor requires that we take care of the safety of these terrible minorities. Our horns will sound for them. After a short rest, of course.<hpage>Defend your new attack, Gammon! As long as we see these errors survive, my goal is to eradicate the curse in the near future.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>또 다른 좋은 인용, 내 친구. 시계는 또한 그것의 안전에주의를 기울입니다.<page>누가 추측할 수 있겠는가?안전한 모퉁이, 저주받은 비콘의 왕관 위에 숨겨져!<page>우리의 훌륭한 사람들이 쓰러졌을지도 모르지만, 그것은 그들을 위한 것이다.우리의 명예는 우리가 이 끔찍한 소수민족의 안전을 돌보는 것을 요구한다.우리의 뿔은 그들을 위해 울릴 것이다.짧은 휴식 후에, 물론.<hpage>당신의 새로운 공격을 방어하십시오, Gammon!우리가 이러한 오류가 살아남는 것을 보는 한, 나의 목표는 가까운 장래에 저주를 근절하는 것입니다.

translated_text: The Book of Sinners
secondary_translated_text: 죄인의 책 The Book of Sinners

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>Beneath here and further on, the burly bellheads have a big, hot, gleaming hive! Full of all sorts of tasty snitchables!<page>But there’s this big gate they got down in its belly... shut tight, locked up. If you could wriggle through, you’d get your claws on all kindsa goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>底下更深的地方，那些钟头怪物有个又大又亮的宝库！全是好东西！<page>但最底下有道大门被锁死了。要是能溜进去就发啦！
translated_text: - Oh, oh! Carman Grindel, For those who remember our secrets.<page>Here and elsewhere, in this noisy hour, there are large, warm, glowing gorges! There are a lot of good journalists.<page>But they put a door in his stomach, shut it and shut it.If you manage to get through it, your nails will lift it all up!
secondary_translated_text: - 오, 오!카먼 그린델, 우리의 비밀을 기억하는 사람들을 위해.<page>이 시끄러운 시간에 이곳과 다른 곳에는 크고 따뜻하고 빛나는 협곡이 있습니다!좋은 기자가 많이 있습니다.<page>그러나 그들은 그의 뱃속에 문을 넣고 그것을 닫고 닫습니다. 만약 당신이 그것을 통과 할 수 있다면, 당신의 손톱은 그것을 모두 들어 올릴 것입니다!

original_en_text: You see this idol before us, red maiden? I have passed its like before, they mark our pilgrimage well.<page>If we sing to it, a miraculous shrine will rise from the ground, and we will have a place to rest! Such a wonder!<hpage>I suspect it is not song that rouses this shrine, but payment in rosaries.<hpage>I have encountered similar constructs on Pharloom’s paths. It seems this kingdom does not grant rest lightly.
original_zh_text: 看见这圣像了吗？沿途都有标记。<page>对着它歌唱，圣椅就会升起供我们歇息！多神奇！<hpage>我认为唤醒长椅的不是歌声，谢尔玛，而是念珠。<hpage>我在路上曾遇到过此类长椅，看来纺络从不轻易施恩。
translated_text: Can you see the red woman standing in front of me? I experienced it as before, and they gave us a good signal for our pilgrimage.<page>If you sing it, the magical temple will rise and become a place of rest.<hpage>I believe that it was not the singing that awakened the temple, but the award of the Rosary.<hpage>I found similar buildings on my way to Pharaam. The kingdom does not sleep in peace.
secondary_translated_text: 내 앞에 서 있는 붉은 여자가 보이시나요?나는 이전처럼 그것을 경험했고, 그들은 우리의 순례에 대한 좋은 신호를 주었다.<page>노래하면 마법의 사원이 일어나 휴식지가 될 것입니다.<hpage>저는 성전을 깨운 것은 노래가 아니라, 묵주기도를 수여하는 것이라고 믿습니다.<hpage>나는 파라오암으로 가는 길에 비슷한 건물을 발견했다.왕국은 평화롭게 잠을 자지 않는다.

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>There’s lots of pickings round here, right? Well, it’s all nothing compared to what they got hidden up, up above us. The great big Sitty-del they calls it!<page>A golden place, groaning with goodies! Could never steal it all in a thousand snitch-bug lifetimes they reckon!<page>Oh yes, that’s where ol’ Grindle is headin’. Don’t you dare follow us, though! We want it all for us-selves!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>这附近好东西不少对吧？但跟上边的圣堡比，什么都不是！<page>听说那是金山银山，几辈子都掏不完！<page>格林德尔这就去捞个够！你可别跟来抢！
translated_text: - Oh, oh! Carman Grindel, For those who remember our secrets.<page>There are lots of pickups, right? It is nothing compared to what is hidden above our heads. It is called the Great Citadel.<page>A golden place full of stunning scenery! They believe that whistleblowers can't steal all of a thousand lives.<page>Such is the fate of the "witnesses ". "Please follow us! We are doing everything ours!
secondary_translated_text: - 오, 오!카먼 그린델, 우리의 비밀을 기억하는 사람들을 위해.<page>픽업이 많죠, 그렇죠?그것은 우리 머리 위에 숨겨진 것과 비교할 때 아무것도 아닙니다.이곳은 대성 (Great Citadel) 이라고 불린다.<page>아름다운 풍경이 가득한 황금의 장소!그들은 고발자가 천 명의 생명을 모두 훔칠 수 없다고 믿는다.<page>이것이 바로 ' 증인들 ' 의 운명이다. "우리를 따라오세요!우리는 우리의 모든 것을 하고 있습니다!

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>You know where all them dreary raggedies are camping? Back near the ol’ chapel? Well, beyond that chapel is a dirty great grave!<page>Not much in there but husks, right? But but! My sniffer tells me there’s something worth the trouble buried down at the bottom!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>你知道那处破破烂烂的朝圣者营地吧？那附近的破教堂后头有个大坟场！<page>那乍一看都是尸壳对吧？但是但是！我能嗅到底下埋着值钱货，我鼻子灵得很！
translated_text: - Oh, oh! It was in Grindell 's pocket. For those who remember our secrets.<page>Do you know where the garbage is? A return to the old church? Behind the church is an unclean grave.<page>It 's just a cover, right? Really? Mom, Mom, Mom! My smell told me there was something to be afraid of.
secondary_translated_text: - 오, 오!그것은 그린델의 주머니에 있었다.우리의 비밀을 기억하는 사람들을 위해.<page>쓰레기가 어디 있는지 아세요?옛 교회로 돌아가는 것인가?교회 뒤에는 불결한 무덤이 있다.<page>그냥 덮개일 뿐이지?진짜?엄마, 엄마, 엄마!내 냄새는 내가 두려워할 것이 있다는 것을 알려줬다.

original_en_text: <hpage>The groaning docks, beyond the caverns of bone. There I have seen a vessel able to pass below, a heavy bell built for descent.<hpage>I need only gain access, and an operator to assist. I will investigate the docks, and uncover the means.<page=M>You’d be the first in an age to dive so deep, Old One. That space below remains long unseen, even to our family. <hpage>For those depths, I am more prepared than most. I will reach the base of this land, and know the truth of the new disaster we, together have wrought.
original_zh_text: <hpage>穿越骸骨洞窟，那锈蚀的深坞中停着一口沉钟，专为下潜打造。<hpage>只需寻得入口与操钟人。我会探查深坞，找出通路。<page=M>古老者，您是数个纪元以来第一个敢下潜的。那片黑暗连我们家族都未曾窥见。<hpage>对于深渊，我早有准备。我会抵达此地根基，看清你我共酿的新灾祸。
translated_text: <hpage>There was a boat that could pass beneath it, and a heavy watch made for falling.<hpage>All you need is access and an operator. I will look for the port and find a way.<page=M>Old man, you will be the first to study deeply at this time. Even for our family, the space beneath it has always been unknown.<hpage>I 'm going to go deep into the earth and learn the truth about the new catastrophe we 've caused together.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>그 밑으로 지나갈 수 있는 배가 있었고, 떨어질 수 있도록 만든 무거운 시계가 있었다.<hpage>당신이 필요로하는 것은 접근과 운영자입니다.나는 항구를 찾아서 길을 찾을 것이다.<page=M>노인, 이 때 제일 먼저 공부를 깊게 하는 사람이 될 것이다.우리 가족에게도 그 아래의 공간은 항상 알려지지 않았습니다.<hpage>나는 우리가 함께 일으킨 새로운 재앙에 대한 진실을 알아내기 위해 지구 깊은 곳으로 갈 것이다.

original_en_text: Why does it fade? Why can I not recall that sacred place?
original_zh_text: 为什么消失了……为什么想不起圣地模样……
translated_text: Why would they disappear? Why do you not remember the holy place?
secondary_translated_text: 왜 그들은 사라졌을까?왜 거룩한 곳을 기억하지 않는가?

original_en_text: <hpage>Here you lie, monarch. Sunk so deep, yet still you cling to life. <hpage>Would you let your lands be choked black... to protect just her?
original_zh_text: <hpage>苍白之主，沉沦至此也要苟活么？<hpage>你宁愿让纺络被黑暗吞噬……只为护着她？
translated_text: <hpage>My God, you are lying. Even if you sink deep, you are still alive.<hpage>Will you destroy your land to protect it?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>맙소사, 넌 거짓말이야.깊은 곳에 가라앉더라도, 당신은 여전히 살아 있습니다.<hpage>당신은 그것을 보호하기 위해 당신의 땅을 파괴 할 것입니까?

original_en_text: <hpage>Take care, Garmond. Whatever dangers these lands present, I’m sure what waits in that Citadel will be worse.<page>Aye, sister! Until that Citadel is reached and justice is served, Zaza and I shall not fall.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，加蒙德。圣堡必然比外面更加危险。<page>你也保重，姐妹！不跟圣堡之主讨个公道，我和扎扎不会倒下的！
translated_text: <hpage>Be careful, son. Whatever the dangers in these lands, I believe that what awaits us in the castle is even worse.<page>Zaza and I will not fall until we reach the fortress and restore justice.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>조심해라, 아들아.이 땅에서 어떤 위험이 있든 성에서 우리를 기다리고 있는 것은 더 나쁜 것이라고 믿습니다.<page>자자와 나는 요새에 도착해서 정의를 회복할 때까지 쓰러지지 않을 것이다.

original_en_text: Letting you live was my rebellion, spider. I’ve denied my mother your silken strength. I’ve won.<page>She can thrash, and waste, and know her pathetic, broken child caused the mortal wound.<page>Rejoice! And let it all come down.<hpage>I will not. I have already stood the sentinel for one dying land. That role... I will never play again.<hpage>While I live, and possess the strength to resist, this kingdom, and the bugs within it, shall not fall.
original_zh_text: 留着你的性命就是我的反叛。母亲得不到你的灵丝，是我赢了。<page>让她抓狂吧！知道是我这残次品带给她致命伤！<page>欢呼吧！一切都将崩塌！<hpage>恕难从命。我曾守望过一个将死的国度，同样的角色……我不想再扮第二次。<hpage>只要我还活着，还有力气反抗，这个王国与其子民就不会陨落。
translated_text: It's my resistance to keep him alive. I didn't give the powers to Spider-Mother. I won.<page>He knows that the whip can be wasted, the pain can break, the child has been wounded to death.<page>To be happy! Put it all down.<hpage>I will not be the keeper of the place of death. This document. I will never touch it again.<hpage>As long as he is alive and has the strength to resist, the kingdom and the insects that are there will not fall.
secondary_translated_text: 그를 살아있게 하는 것은 내 저항이다.나는 스파이더마더에게 힘을 주지 않았다.내가 이겼다.<page>그는 채찍이 낭비될 수 있고, 고통이 깨질 수 있으며, 아이가 다치게 될 수 있다는 것을 알고 있다.<page>행복해지기 위해서!다 내려놓다.<hpage>나는 죽음의 장소의 수호자가 되지 않을 것이다.이 문서입니다.나는 다시는 그것을 만지지 않을 것이다.<hpage>그가 살아 있고 저항할 힘이 있는 한, 왕국과 그 안에 있는 곤충들은 무너지지 않을 것이다.

original_en_text: Hahahhaa! Spider. Spider. What a marvellous specimen you are! You fight and fight, heedless as the world crumbles around you.<page>Pharloom and her bugs will be crushed to dust, and still you’ll be vainly swinging your blade.<hpage>...There may still be a way to prevent that fate. I will claim the hidden power, the bloom that repels the dark.<hpage>Those snails share some fault in the snare, and their callous use of the void. They shall help me now to seek its counter.<hpage>I will return, child, when I bear the strength to dive below, and cut this land finally free of your mother’s grasp.
original_zh_text: 哈哈哈哈！顽固的小蜘蛛！即便你继续挣扎，这个世界一样会崩塌！<page>一切都将化为尘埃，继续挥舞那针刃还有什么用<hpage>……或许还有转机。我会取得驱散黑暗的永绽花。<hpage>蜗牛一族滥用虚空难辞其咎，现在它们得帮我找到破局之法。<hpage>等我取得力量，就来斩断你母亲的掌控。
translated_text: Ha ha ha! Ha ha ha! When the world around us is falling apart, we fight and fight without even realizing it.<page>Discharges, and your worms are crushed to pieces, and you are still wielding your blades in vain.<hpage>... There are ways to avoid such a fate. I have a hidden power and I reject the flowers of darkness.<hpage>These snail traps also have drawbacks and relentlessly exploit the voids.They will help me find my counter-attack.<hpage>My son, when I sink into the sea and finally have the strength to free this land from your mother, I will come back.
secondary_translated_text: 하하!하하!우리 주변의 세계가 무너지고 있을 때, 우리는 그것을 깨닫지 못하고 싸우고 싸웁니다.<page>방출, 그리고 당신의 벌레는 조각으로 부서지고, 당신은 여전히 헛되이 당신의 칼을 휘두르고 있습니다.<hpage>...그런 운명을 피할 수 있는 방법이 있다.나는 숨겨진 힘을 가지고 있으며 어둠의 꽃을 거부합니다.<hpage>이 달팽이 덫은 또한 단점이 있으며 빈틈을 끊임없이 착취합니다. 그들은 내가 내 반공격을 찾는 데 도움이 될 것입니다.<hpage>내 아들아, 내가 바다에 가라앉고 마침내 네 어머니에게서 이 땅을 해방시킬 힘을 갖게 되면, 나는 돌아올 것이다.

original_en_text: After some tasty goodies? We never say no to a fair trade, heh heh! Take a look at what we’s got...
original_zh_text: 想要宝贝？只接受公平交易！随便看看吧……
translated_text: After good food? I 'm not saying no to fair trade. Let 's see what we have.
secondary_translated_text: 맛있는 음식 후에?나는 공정무역에 반대하는 것이 아니다.우리가 가지고 있는 것을 보자.

original_en_text: We could add a little pocket to yer tool pouch for you. You could pack even more goodies in there! All your shards’n sharp things!
original_zh_text: 给你工具包加个兜，能多装点好宝贝。
translated_text: You can put a small pocket in the toolbox.They could wear something better! All of your parts are very sharp!
secondary_translated_text: 당신은 도구 상자에 작은 주머니를 넣을 수 있습니다. 그들은 더 나은 것을 입을 수 있습니다!당신의 모든 부분은 매우 예리합니다!

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, if I may, I’d ask a small task of your carving talents.<hpage>Within the halls of the Citadel, I encountered a means of travel new to me, a network of pipes traversed in vessels propelled by steam and air.<hpage>That Citadel is a labyrinth, and pins to mark each station would prove useful to me.<page>What you describe sounds as hideous and unnatural as anything in that place. Still, if it will aid you, I shall craft the pins.<page>Seek me at a moment not long from now. The pins will be carved, and we may trade.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，方便的话，借你的手艺办件小事。<hpage>圣堡里有种我没见过的蒸汽管道交通网。<hpage>但那跟一座迷宫一样，因此我需要标记站点的图钉。<page>圣堡里都是这种难看又不自然的玩意。但你要就给你做吧。<page>过阵子再来找我，图钉做好了才能交易。
translated_text: <hpage>"Shakra, I 'd like to let my sculptural talent do some work if you want.<hpage>In the large halls of the castle I found a strange way of traveling: a network of pipes through which steamships and airplanes pass.<hpage>The castle was like a labyrinth, and the pine trees marked in each season were very useful.<page>What you described sounds as horrible and unnatural as anything else in this place. But if it helps, I 'll make a pineapple.<page>Find them as soon as you can. The spins are sculpted and can be replaced.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"Shakra, 나는 당신이 원한다면 조각의 재능을 가지고 약간의 일을 할 수 있기를 바랍니다.<hpage>성의 큰 홀에서 나는 이상한 여행 방법을 발견했다 : 증기선과 비행기가 통과하는 파이프의 네트워크.<hpage>성은 미로와 같았고, 매 계절마다 표시된 소나무는 매우 유용했습니다.<page>당신이 묘사한 것은 이 장소의 다른 어떤 것만큼 끔찍하고 부자연적으로 들린다.하지만 도움이 된다면 파인애플을 만들게요.<page>가능한 한 빨리 그들을 찾으십시오.스핀은 조각되어 있으며 교체할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: These overgrown caves offer little challenge to a skilled warrior. A place for reflection, perhaps.
original_zh_text: 这长满苔藓的洞穴对高手没挑战性，适合发呆。
translated_text: These lush caves pose little problem for the experienced soldier.This can be a place for reflection.
secondary_translated_text: 이 무성한 동굴들은 숙련된 군인에게 거의 문제가 되지 않는다. 이곳은 숙고할 수 있는 장소가 될 수 있다.

original_en_text: Fear not, red maiden! This shrine will surely rise for us, we only need to patiently wish for it!
original_zh_text: 别担心！只要诚心祈愿，圣椅定会为我们显现！
translated_text: Fear not, red girl. This sacred place remains with us. All we need to do is pray patiently.
secondary_translated_text: 두려워하지 마, 붉은 아가씨이 거룩한 장소는 우리와 함께 있습니다.우리가 해야 할 일은 참을성 있게 기도하는 것뿐입니다.

original_en_text: <page=M>In the heights of the great wood, nestled deep in its roots, vines and branches, find the one who sowed the first seed.<page=S>They’re the very essence of the place, the nub of it all. Ain’t really a bug, to be told, but a powerful presence nonetheless.<page=M>We’d heard the Citadel once made grudging accord with that creature, sent their servants in reverence, even built a shrine up there somewhere. Maybe it’s worth you searching for it?
original_zh_text: <page=M>甲木林最深处，根枝藤蔓之间，埋着最初播种者。<page=S>那是纺络的精华所在，虽算不得虫子，但也十分强大。<page=M>听说圣堡曾与之立约，建造圣所供奉，还派遣仆从侍奉。或许值得一探？
translated_text: <page=M>High in the woods, deep among the roots and branches, he finds the one who sowed the first seed.<page=S>They are the essence of this place, and they are at the center of everything. I mean, it 's not a real mistake, but nonetheless it 's a powerful being.<page=M>I heard that the castle made a pact against its will with this creature, sent a servant to mourn, and built a temple somewhere.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>나무 깊은 곳, 뿌리와 나뭇가지들 사이에서, 그는 첫 번째 씨앗을 뿌린 분을 찾습니다.<page=S>그들은 이 장소의 본질이며, 모든 것의 중심에 있습니다.내 말은, 그건 진짜 실수는 아니지만, 그럼에도 불구하고 그것은 강력한 존재라는 거야.<page=M>나는 성이 이 생물과 자신의 의지에 반하여 조약을 맺고 애도를 위해 하인을 보내고 어딘가에 사원을 지었다고 들었다.

original_en_text: Old roads and passages overrun by roaches and their keepers. The ways are covered thick with filth.
original_zh_text: 被蟑螂及其饲主侵占的古道，路面上覆满污秽。
translated_text: Roads and passages are occupied by beetles and their guards.The road was dirty.
secondary_translated_text: 도로와 통로는 딱정벌레와 그들의 경비원들로 가득 차 있었고, 길은 더러워졌다.

original_en_text: In this moment, I have no more items to trade. Perhaps, if we meet again on the roads ahead, I shall have crafted new goods to sell.
original_zh_text: 暂时没货了，小姑娘。下次碰面会准备好新玩意的，保重。
translated_text: Currently there are no products for exchange.If we are on the road, we can create a new product and sell it.
secondary_translated_text: 현재 교환할 상품이 없습니다. 우리가 여행 중이라면, 우리는 새로운 제품을 만들고 판매 할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: You like this gleaming spinner I snitched from the big Sitty-dell? There’s a way to make it sing to you, or so they says!
original_zh_text: 从圣堡顺来的转轮！据说用某种方法能让它唱歌呢！
translated_text: Do you like this shiny spinner I brought to Citadel Cathedral? There is a way to sing, at least to speak.
secondary_translated_text: 내가 성당에 가져온 이 반짝이는 스핀너 좋아?노래할 수 있는 방법이 있고, 적어도 말을 할 수 있다.

translated_text: The Bone Marrow Map

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>This dark-shell material is cold to the touch, and more resilient than it looks.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>黑壳材质冷冰冰的，比看着结实。
translated_text: It can be used to mark important places and reminders on a map.<br><br>The material in this deep layer feels cooler and more elastic than it seems.
secondary_translated_text: 지도에서 중요한 장소와 추억을 표시하는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.<br><br>이 깊은 층의 재료는 보이는 것보다 더 시원하고 탄력적 인 느낌을줍니다.

original_en_text: Crumbling roads built upon the shells of ancient bugs. All of Pharloom rests upon these fragile foundations.
original_zh_text: 建在古虫壳上的破路，整个纺络都靠这些脆架子撑着。
translated_text: This precarious road was built on ancient insect shells, and the entire lighthouse is built on this fragile foundation.
secondary_translated_text: 이 불안정한 길은 고대 곤충 껍질 위에 세워졌고, 등대 전체가 이 취약한 기초 위에 세워졌습니다.

original_en_text: Crusted heights above those howling steps. Signs suggest great warriors once ruled this winding place, though the sand has eroded much of their mark.
original_zh_text: 风蚀台阶上的矿脉高地。迹象表明曾有强族统治，现已被沙尘掩埋。
translated_text: There are signs that once great warriors ruled this winding place, but the sand will destroy most of its remnants.
secondary_translated_text: 한때 위대한 전사들이 이 구불구불한 장소를 통치했다는 징후가 있지만 모래는 그 잔재의 대부분을 파괴 할 것입니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>To search these lands so thoroughly, Shakra... I wonder, who is it you hope to find?<page>Okklu-Din... a perceptive question. I travel in search of my mentor, the greatest of my tribe. I have followed her trail throughout this kingdom, but have so far failed to catch her.<page>She will have travelled much farther by now, but if I keep moving and stay vigilant, we shall reunite.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了。我看你把这片地区都找遍了……你到底在找谁？<page>唉……问得好。我在找导师，我们部落的最强者。我追着她的踪迹跑遍了王国，还是没找到。<page>她肯定走得更远了，但只要保持警惕总能重逢。
translated_text: <hpage>Study this land carefully, Shakur. Do you know who you want to meet?<page>He went to meet my master, the greatest master of the tribe. I pursued him in this kingdom, but I have not yet taken him.<page>Now it goes on, but if I go on and stay vigilant, we can be together again. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>이 땅을 자세히 살펴봐, 샤쿠르.누구를 만나고 싶은지 아세요?<page>그는 부족에서 가장 위대한 주인인 내 주인을 만나러 갔다.내가 이 왕국에서 그를 쫓았으나 아직 그를 잡지 못하였다.<page>지금은 계속되고 있지만, 내가 계속하고 경계한다면, 우리는 다시 함께 할 수 있습니다. "

original_en_text: The stone structures of this place suggest clear waters once ran throughout.<page>What fantasy that now seems! Even this swamp’s inhabitants seem spawned of its noxious nature.
original_zh_text: 这里的石制结构说明以前有清水流过。<page>现在呢？连原本栖居在这里的虫都像是从毒瘴里孕育出来的。
translated_text: The rocks in this place indicate that the water has already dried up.<page>How fantastic it is now! Even the inhabitants of this bog seem to be increasing due to its toxicity.
secondary_translated_text: 이 곳의 바위들은 물이 이미 말랐음을 나타낸다.<page>지금은 얼마나 환상적이냐!이 습지의 주민들조차도 그 독성 때문에 증가하고 있는 것 같다.

original_en_text: But look here! As soon as our sacred journey begins, we are tested. This huge gate stands between us and the way forward.<page>Only holy prayer and song will open the way! In this kingdom, even mighty bone is moved by music!
original_zh_text: 可你看看！朝圣之路刚启程就遇到考验，被这道巨大骨门拦住了去路。<page>唯有圣歌能够撼动它！在纺络，最顽固的骨头都会为旋律让道！
translated_text: But look at it! When the Holy Day begins, we experience. The big door has blocked us and blocked our way.<page>Only God 's prayer and singing will open the way! In this world even strong bones can play music.
secondary_translated_text: 하지만 봐봐!거룩한 날이 시작될 때, 우리는 그것을 경험합니다.큰 문이 우리를 막고 길을 막았다.<page>오직 하나님의 기도와 노래만이 길을 열어줄 것입니다!이 세상에서 강한 뼈조차도 음악을 연주 할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: You win again! Never have I met a luckier pilgrim...<hpage>You mistake, sir. It was skill that won me this game. One must be careful not to rely merely on luck.<page>Hmph. Fairly said, sister.<page>I must confess something though. Truth is, I already lost the last of my rosaries. I can’t pay our last wager.<page>I do have something small for you, at least. These dice. They certainly seem to have taken a liking to you. Take them, in memory of our meeting.
original_zh_text: 你又赢了！没见过运气这么好的朝圣者……<hpage>错了，我是靠技术赢的，别光指望运气。<page>哼，倒也说得在理。<page>其实……我已经输光家底了。最后这把的赌注我给不起。<page>但我可以把这些小玩意送你。这对骰子跟你有缘，收下当纪念吧。
translated_text: We will win! I've never seen such a happy pilgrim.<hpage>Technology is what has led me to this career, not to rely solely on luck.<page>Well said Sister.<page>But I have to confess that I lost my last Rosary book.<page>At least I have a little for you. "You seem to like these cards. "
secondary_translated_text: 우리가 이길거야!나는 이렇게 행복한 순례자를 본 적이 없다.<hpage>기술은 내가 행운에만 의존하지 않고이 직업으로 이끌었습니다.<page>언니가 잘 말했어.<page>하지만 나는 마지막 로자리를 잃어버렸다는 것을 고백해야 한다.<page>적어도 나는 당신을 위해 약간의 것을 가지고있다. "이 카드들이 마음에 들어요. " "

original_en_text: <page>Who are you hoping you’ll find down there, spider? An ailing child and a Silk starved beast? <page>If so, I’m afraid we may sorely disappoint. What waits below is me no longer.
original_zh_text: <page>小蜘蛛，你指望能在下面见到谁？虚弱的傀儡还是饥渴的空壳？<page>要让你失望了，在下面等着的早已不是我。
translated_text: <page>Spider, who are you looking for? A sick child and a hungry animal.<page>If that is the case, then we may be very disappointed. I am not waiting there anymore.
secondary_translated_text: <page>스파이더야, 누구를 찾고 있니?아픈 아이와 배고픈 동물.<page>만약 그렇다면, 우리는 매우 실망할 것이다.나는 더 이상 거기서 기다리지 않는다.

original_en_text: Hoy, you’re still hanging around then? Quiet in here. Good for hidin’ out.<page>You gots the li’l clicky-clackies on you then, eh? The rolly-roundies? What the shops like to swap for?
original_zh_text: 哟，还在附近晃悠呢？这很安静，适合躲藏。<page>带叮当响了没？就是商店爱换的那种小圆珠？
translated_text: - Are you still moving? He is quiet here, good to hide.<page>That 's why the forest exists, right? Really? What would you like to change in the store?
secondary_translated_text: - 아직도 움직이세요?그는 이곳은 조용해서 숨길 수 있다.<page>그래서 숲이 존재하는 거죠?진짜?가게에서 뭘 바꿔보고 싶으세요?

translated_text: Sign of the Cup

original_en_text: You... So, it is done... My wish granted before ever I arrived...<hpage>The bronze pair that danced this chamber, it is clear, tall bug, how closely they mimicked your shell. Was it you who provided their inspiration?<page>Not I, warrior. For this place, my heart holds only loathing...<page>The dancers... they were the last free act of my partner... Always hopeful. Always naive.<page>His whole he gave, in desperate trade to see our own caves left safe. His shell and soul became the mould.<page>So long, I dared not visit... Even as our lands fell to thread and ruin... Instead I wasted, a coward caged, too weak to witness his grace bound in parody so cruel.<hpage>Take some solace, tall bug. His soul is now free from that shell of iron, and the fate that befell your lands, this Citadel too has been claimed full by it.<page>Aye... Slim consolation, warrior, now that everything I loved is lost...
original_zh_text: 你……这样啊……竟然在我抵达前就完成了……<hpage>厅里那对铜像，分明是照着你的模样铸的。是你给的灵感？<page>与我无关。对这地方……我只剩恶心……<page>舞者……是我伴侣最后的自由创作……他总是满怀天真与希望。<page>为保我们故土平安，他献出了全部。躯壳和灵魂都成了铸模。<page>这么久以来，我不敢来看……哪怕故土被丝咒吞噬……懦弱地困在牢里，不敢面对他的优雅被如此践踏……<hpage>宽心吧，至少现在他的灵魂挣脱铁壳了。你们故土遭受的厄运，圣堡也逃不过。<page>是啊……但这不过是无力的安慰……如今我爱的一切都化为乌有……
translated_text: You are a... That 's what we decided. Our wishes were fulfilled even before we arrived.<hpage>The bronze companion dances in the room, so clear, so big, imitating how close the sink is, doesn't it? Inspiring them?<page>- It's not me, soldier. I hate this place.<page>Dancers.This is the last free show of our partner.Always full of hope.Always naive.<page>He did everything he could to ensure the safety of our cave. His body and soul became one.<page>Despite the fact that our land is desolate and in ruins, Truss in the cage was too weak to directly see his grace for such a cruel imitation.<hpage>Relax, tall insects, your soul is now freed from the iron shell, and your fate falls on your land, and the castle has been occupied by it.<page>Yes, a little consolation, soldier, everything I loved was lost.
secondary_translated_text: 넌...그게 우리가 결정한 거야.우리가 도착하기 전에도 우리의 소원이 이루어졌습니다.<hpage>방에서 춤추는 청동 동반자, 너무 맑고, 너무 크고, 싱크대가 얼마나 가까이 있는지 모방하는 것, 그렇지?그들에게 영감을 주는가?<page>- 그건 내가 아니야, 병사나는 이 곳이 싫다.<page>댄서 여러분. 저희 파트너의 마지막 무료 공연입니다. 항상 희망이 가득합니다. 항상 순진합니다.<page>그는 우리 동굴의 안전을 보장하기 위해 할 수 있는 모든 일을 했다.그의 몸과 영혼은 하나가 되었다.<page>우리 땅이 황폐하고 폐허가 된 사실에도 불구하고, 새장에있는 트러스는 너무 약하여 그러한 잔인한 모방에 대한 그의 은혜를 직접 볼 수 없었습니다.<hpage>긴장을 풀고, 키 큰 곤충, 당신의 영혼은 이제 철의 껍질에서 해방되고, 당신의 운명은 당신의 땅에 떨어지고, 성은 그것에 의해 점령되었습니다.<page>그래, 약간의 위로, 군인, 내가 사랑했던 모든 것이 사라졌어.

original_en_text: <page=M>What’s this? That’s an unexpected heart you’re holding, Old One...<page=M>We can guess to its source, though we’d believed it long gone from these lands. <hpage>The heart of a graceful lord. In its taking I was able to witness his caves and kingdom as once they flourished.<hpage>A stunning sight. Unique. All gone... Lost to the pale monarch... and the system to keep her caged.
original_zh_text: <page=M>咦？这颗心出乎意料啊，古老者……<hpage>一位优雅领主的心。取心时我见到了其洞窟王国昔日繁盛景象。<hpage>真是瑰丽无双。但都消逝了……毁于苍白君主……以及囚困她的体系。
translated_text: <page=M>What's it? You have an unexpected heart in your hand.<page=M>It is possible to guess about its origin, but it is believed that this land has existed for a long time.<hpage>The heart of God 's mercy.During filming, I saw the prosperity of his cave and his kingdom.<hpage>Unique, they are all determined to defeat the Pale Monarch and the system that has locked him in a cage.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>뭐예요?당신은 당신의 손에 예상치 못한 마음을 가지고 있습니다.<page=M>그것의 기원에 대해 추측 할 수 있지만, 이 땅은 오랫동안 존재했다고 믿어지고 있습니다.<hpage>하나님의 자비의 마음. 촬영 중 나는 그의 동굴과 그의 왕국이 번영하는 것을 보았다.<hpage>독특하게, 그들은 모두 창백한 군주와 그를 새장에 가두는 시스템을 물리 치기로 결심했습니다.

original_en_text: A beat of rosaries is our wager. Once you find enough, I’d be happy to play.
original_zh_text: 赌注是一奏念珠。等你攒够了，我很乐意再陪你玩。
translated_text: Our bet is a rosary, and when we find enough, we will be happy to play.
secondary_translated_text: 우리의 내기는 로자리이며, 우리가 충분한 것을 찾으면, 우리는 행복하게 플레이 할 것입니다.

original_en_text: Nimble bug, you return refreshed! And so perfectly timed, for I have a new challenge prepared.<page>The course shall remain the same as last, but length, the laps, will greatly extend.<hpage>You propose a test of endurance? I have undertaken many in my time.<page>Excellent! Excellent! Though know, for this race, I can only provide slight reward for victory.<page>What say you, nimble bug? Let us stride fast forth!
original_zh_text: 你看起来状态绝佳！正好我准备了新的挑战！<page>赛道和上次一样，但长度、圈数大幅增加！<hpage>要比耐力？我平时可没少锻炼。<page>那太好了！不过这次如果你赢了，奖励价值或许不高。<page>怎么说？一起冲刺吧！
translated_text: Smart Insects, you are back in good health! Now is the best time, because we are ready for new challenges.<page>The race is the same as the previous one, but the duration (count of laps) is significantly increased.<hpage>Do you recommend checking the resistance? I 've done so much in my life.<page>That's fantastic! That's fantastic! I know that in this game you can only be rewarded with a small reward for winning.<page>What are we talking about, speed errors? "Let's go, let's go, let's go.
secondary_translated_text: 똑똑한 곤충, 당신은 건강하게 돌아 왔습니다!지금이 가장 좋은 시기인데, 왜냐하면 우리는 새로운 도전을 준비하고 있기 때문이다.<page>이 경주는 이전 경주와 동일하지만 기간 (랩 수) 이 크게 증가했습니다.<hpage>저항을 확인하는 것이 좋습니다?나는 내 인생에서 너무 많은 일을 했다.<page>환상적이에요!환상적이에요!이 게임에서 당신은 단지 작은 상으로 보상을받을 수 있다는 것을 알고 있습니다.<page>속도 오류는 무슨 소리야? "가자, 가자, 가자. "

original_en_text: <hpage>Another time, Shakra. I am always eager to learn, but for now my tasks call me away. <page>Bakelo! Answer to your tasks, then. My rings shall await your return.
original_zh_text: <hpage>改天吧。虽然想锻炼技艺，但要事在身。<page>吧咔咯！那忙你的去吧！我的战环随时恭候。
translated_text: <hpage>"Next time, Sakura, I 've always wanted to learn, but now I don't need it.<page>OK, do your work! I hope the ring is back.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"다음에는 사쿠라야, 나는 항상 배우고 싶었지만 지금은 필요하지 않아. "<page>좋아, 너의 일을 해!반지가 돌아왔으면 좋겠어요.

original_en_text: Gurrroo! Fellow warrior, if you are wishing to lock blades, know you stand before the honoured knight Garmond, and brave companion Zaza. Together we will face bold to any challenge!<hpage>I have no wish to fight you, sir bug. It is heartening to meet another on these roads of sound mind, and with fortitude enough to fight back against the haunted husks.<page>Aye! Too many, these unnatural opponents! We did hope Pharloom’s vast expanse would still possess some place free of that tainted thread. <page>Alas, so far we’ve encountered only violence and decay. We greatly fear the Haunting afflicts this kingdom all.
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！想打架？先报上名来！我乃荣耀骑士加蒙德，这位是忠仆扎扎！<hpage>没兴趣比武。只是难得能遇见敢反抗丝咒傀儡的清醒者。<page>是啊！到处都是被操控的傀儡！还以为纺络如此广袤，说不定能有片净土……<page>唉，结果走到哪都是腐烂和杀戮！这诅咒怕是蔓延全境了！
translated_text: Go! Comrades, if you want to close your sword, you know that you are faced with the noble knight Gamon and his brave companion Zaza.<hpage>I don't want to fight you, Mr. Bag. It 's exciting to meet another person on these wise paths who has enough patience to neutralize the ghostly shells.<page>Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! Enough, enough of these unnatural enemies. I hope that in the vast landscape of Faram there is still a part that does not have lines of pollution.<page>So far, we have only seen corruption and violence. We fear that this obsession will affect everyone in the Kingdom. "
secondary_translated_text: 빨리 가!동지 여러분, 검을 닫고 싶다면 귀한 기사 가몬과 그의 용감한 동반자 자자와 마주하고 있다는 것을 알고 있습니다.<hpage>나는 당신과 싸우고 싶지 않습니다, 백 씨.유령의 껍질을 중화시킬 수있는 충분한 인내심을 가진이 현명한 길에서 다른 사람을 만나는 것은 흥미 롭습니다.<page>아, 그래!아, 네!이 부자연적인 적들은 충분하다.나는 파람의 광대한 풍경에 여전히 오염 라인이없는 부분이 있기를 바랍니다.<page>지금까지 우리는 부패와 폭력만 보았다.우리는 그러한 집착이 왕국에 있는 모든 사람에게 영향을 미칠까 염려합니다. "

original_en_text: Poshanka! Edges sharp and senses keen!<page>In my land, that is the way warriors greet each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.<page>I am a navigator amongst my tribe, and have been making maps of these lands. I can trade them with you, and supplies, if you wish.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！握紧兵刃，保持警惕！<page>在我们部落，战士们都这么打招呼。虽然你看着像个刚破卵的娃娃，但架势、武器、动作都像个战士。<page>我是部落的测绘师，一直在画这里的地图。想要可以拿物资来换。
translated_text: ¡Boshanka, Boshanka! Enough sharpness and sharp sensation!<page>The soldiers of my country greeted me like this. You are a newborn child, but you are also a soldier.<page>I was a pilot of a tribe that mapped this land and if you want you can trade goods and merchandise.
secondary_translated_text: 보산카, 보산카!충분한 선명함과 날카로운 감각!<page>우리 나라의 군인들은 이렇게 나에게 인사했다.당신은 신생아이지만, 당신은 또한 군인입니다.<page>나는 이 땅을 지도로 만든 부족의 조종사였는데, 원한다면 상품과 상품을 거래할 수 있다.

original_en_text: Rest below while you can. In the lands beyond these bells, it is rare to see such safety.
translated_text: Rest as much as you can. In the countries behind these bells, such security is rare.
secondary_translated_text: 가능한 한 많이 휴식을 취하십시오.이러한 종 뒤에있는 국가에서는 그러한 보안이 드물다.

translated_text: Map of Gremoire

original_en_text: <hpage>Child, if your wish is to gain learning of this land’s creatures, why not hunt them yourself?<page>Ma? Nuu, herself to hunt? No, no! Is not Nuu’s nature to hunt, is hers to come later and learn. Such is the way of things!<page>But you... a predator! Know it from your smells can clever Nuu! So Nuu asks you to cut and record, so we both may learn!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小丫头，想了解生物怎么不自己去抓？<page>啊？努努自己去？不行不行！努努的天职是研究，这是规矩！<page>但你……是掠食者！努努闻得出来！所以拜托你砍怪记录，我们一起学习！
translated_text: <hpage>My child, if you want to know the creatures of this earth, why don't you hunt for yourself?<page>Mother, do you want to persecute yourself? No, no, no! !¡No, no, no! !¡No, no! ! Nature was not about hunting, but about learning later.<page>You're a predator! By its smell you can tell it will be smart.Please let me edit it and save it so that everyone can learn.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>내 딸아, 네가 이 땅의 생물들을 알고 싶다면, 왜 너 자신을 위해 사냥하지 않는가?<page>엄마, 너 자신을 박해하고 싶니?안돼, 안돼, 안돼! !¡안돼, 안돼, 안돼! !¡안돼, 안돼! !자연은 사냥에 관한 것이 아니라 나중에 배우는 것에 관한 것이었다.<page>넌 포식자야!냄새를 보면 똑똑할 줄 알 수 있습니다. 편집해 보시고 여러분도 배울 수 있도록 저장해 주세요.

original_en_text: <hpage>Little pilgrim, these baths provide some respite from the dangers without, but there is a still safer place high on the other side of the Citadel.<hpage>A settlement has formed around the old shrine there. The bell housed within seems to provide some sanctuary from the dangers of the Haunting.<hpage>Your brother and sister pilgrims who now huddle around it would be glad of your company, I am sure.<page>Oh, how wonderful! Yes, I will make my way over there with haste... after I have bathed a little longer. I want to arrive fresh and clean to such a holy place!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，温泉虽然舒服，但圣堡另一边更安全。<hpage>老钟殿旁边有个新聚落，那里的钟声能抵御丝咒。<page>逃到那边的同伴肯定欢迎你。<page>太好了！等我泡舒服了就过去……拜见圣地前得收拾体面！
translated_text: <hpage>As a small pilgrim, these baths provide an opportunity to mitigate the dangers outside, but on the other side of the castle there is a safer place.<hpage>Around the old sanctuary a colony was formed.The internal clock seemed to have avoided the danger of violation.<hpage>The brothers and sisters of the pilgrims gathered here will be very happy to be with you.<page>Oh, that's incredible! Yes, I will be there.After receiving the soul.I want to get to such a holy place.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>작은 순례자로서, 이 목욕은 외부의 위험을 완화 할 수있는 기회를 제공하지만 성의 반대편에는 더 안전한 장소가 있습니다.<hpage>옛 성역 주변에는 식민지가 형성되어 있었고 내부 시계는 침범의 위험을 피할 수 있었던 것처럼 보였습니다.<hpage>이곳에 모인 순례자들의 형제 자매들은 여러분과 함께 있게 되어 매우 기뻐할 것입니다.<page>오, 정말 신기하다!네, 제가 거기 있을게요. 영혼을 받은 후에 그런 거룩한 곳에 가고 싶어요.

original_en_text: You hold many charts, Child Wielding Needle. You should consider trading for a quill.<page>With a quill in claw, your maps can be further extended from your own travels. Record enough and you may, in time, come to know this kingdom all.
original_zh_text: 你身上的图纸不少，使针的小姑娘，该买支笔了。<page>带着笔就能边走边画。画够多了，迟早能摸清纺络的全貌。
translated_text: There are plenty of charts where kids juggle with needles, and think about using a pencil to trade.<page>With the handle attached to your feet, the map can be expanded beyond your travels. If you have enough documents, you will learn about the Kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: 아이들이 바늘을 가지고 저글링하고 거래에 연필을 사용하는 것에 대해 생각하는 차트가 많이 있습니다.<page>손잡이가 발에 부착되어 있으면, 지도를 여행하는 것 이상으로 확장할 수 있습니다.충분한 서류를 가지고 있다면 왕국에 대해 배울 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Child Wielding Needle. You too have discovered this haven of bells.<page>For a long time, I avoided this place for sense of something strange. Now arrived, I find it free, and its few remaining residents offering trade and welcome.<hpage>I slew a tall creature above the town, a Weaver I suspect, though one twisted in purpose.<hpage>It was her you may have sensed. A formidable force, even aged. By voice and claw she aided, perhaps guided, the haunted thread that grasps these lands. <page>Weaver? Those vicious things. To our young we tell the tales, but had thought them long dead, only corpses bound in spires. <hpage>This one still lived, though if it was a Weaver, it was broken in a savage way.<hpage>Its own Silk was bound, pinned deep within its shell. A cruel punishment I’ve not before witnessed. <page>Even broken, my envy remains. A Weaver’s fabled skills... To meet one in combat means great challenge, and great pride in victory.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！使针的小姑娘。你也找到这镇子了？<page>之前总能察觉到这儿的古怪，就一直避开。现在诅咒没了，剩下的住民还挺热情。<hpage>我斩了镇子上头的高个怪物，像是个变异的织者。<page>你此前察觉到的应该就是它。是它用声音和利爪操控缠绕镇子的丝线，很难对付。<page>织者？那群老毒物！还以为早死绝了，只剩塔里的干尸。<hpage>这只还活着，但被折磨得不成样。<hpage>灵丝被钉在壳里，残忍的刑罚。<page>就算残了我也羡慕。织者的本事……能交手是幸运，能得胜更是荣耀。
translated_text: Boshanka! BOSHANKA! Children shake the needles.There is also a safe shelter for this bell.<page>Now that I have arrived, I have discovered that this place is free and that the few remaining residents also offer trade and hospitality.<hpage>I killed a large creature in the sky above the city, which I suspected was a tear, though it was intentionally distorted.<hpage>You can feel it, but you don't. Even in the elderly, they show great strength. With his voice and claws, he helped them and possibly guided them to gather clues about the ghosts of these lands.<page>Theater? We used to tell these stories to young people, but they were long dead, and we thought there were just corpses in the arrow.<hpage>He 's still alive, but if it were a tear, he would be badly damaged.<hpage>His silk was tied and fixed deep into the shell. It was a cruel punishment that I had never seen.<page>Even if it breaks, my jealousy will remain.Develops legendary skills.Fighting in battle is to be proud of victory.
secondary_translated_text: 보선카! BOSHANKA!아이들은 바늘을 흔들고, 이 종을 위한 안전한 피난처도 있다.<page>이제 내가 도착했을 때, 나는이 장소가 무료이며, 남아있는 몇 명의 주민들도 무역과 환대를 제공한다는 것을 발견했습니다.<hpage>나는 도시 상공에서 큰 생물을 죽였는데, 그것은 의도적으로 왜곡되었지만 눈물이라는 것을 의심했다.<hpage>당신은 그것을 느낄 수 있지만 당신은 그것을 느끼지 않습니다.심지어 노인들도 큰 힘을 보여준다.그의 목소리와 발톱으로, 그는 그들을 도왔고 아마도 이 땅의 유령에 대한 단서를 수집하도록 인도했을 것입니다.<page>극장?우리는 젊은이들에게 이런 이야기를 들려주곤 했는데, 그들은 오래 전에 죽었고, 우리는 화살 안에 있는 시체들만 있다고 생각했다.<hpage>그는 아직 살아있지만, 만약 눈물이었다면, 그는 심하게 손상되었을 것이다.<hpage>그의 실크는 껍질 깊숙이 묶여 고정되어 있다.그것은 내가 본 적이 없는 잔인한 형벌이었다.<page>부러져도 질투는 남는다. 전설적인 기술을 개발한다. 전투에서 싸우는 것은 승리에 대한 자랑이다.

original_en_text: This outpost that the shambling pilgrim-bugs have built for themselves... Dondakku!<page>Where are the armaments? The watch-poles? Never have I seen such a poorly defended encampment!<hpage>The pilgrims here seem to have no mind for war, Shakra. I suspect most depart for the Citadel soon after their arrival.<page>Hmph. If they persist in their carelessness, they will find only death in these harsh lands.
original_zh_text: 朝圣虫建的这破营地……东达库！<page>防御工事呢？瞭望塔呢？没见过这么不设防的营地！<hpage>朝圣者们不懂争斗，估计刚到就奔着圣堡去了。<page>哼！继续这么马虎，迟早死在纺络的险地里。
translated_text: This unstable post was built by pilgrims. This side is there!<page>Where is the weapon? And what about Paul? I've never seen such a weak field!<hpage>Pilgrims here seem to have no concept of war. Most people come to the castle as soon as they arrive.<page>If they are not careful, they will only die on this barren land.
secondary_translated_text: 이 불안정한 기지는 순례자들에 의해 지어졌습니다.이 쪽은 거기에 있다!<page>무기는 어디 있어요?그리고 폴은 어때요?이렇게 약한 필드를 본적이 없어!<hpage>이곳의 순례자들은 전쟁에 대한 개념이 없는 것 같다.대부분의 사람들은 도착하자마자 성에 도착한다.<page>만일 그들이 주의를 기울이지 않으면, 그들은 이 황무한 땅에서 죽을 수밖에 없다.

original_en_text: What’s this? The little spider climbs so high, here to stand aquiver at our startling Citadel.<hpage>Pale child, you return only to mock? Neither you nor your land have proven my match. This sleeping Citadel shall be no different.<page>Spider, dear. Why must you remain so distressingly... optimistic? The power that waits above, you cannot conceive, her who would snuff that hope with barely a glance.<hpage>Fool child. You still think me blind to the form of your liege? Having come this far?<hpage>This land’s grandeur, the devotion of its bugs, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is in the thrall of a creature beyond bug, one of that higher caste.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my Silk and my shell, it shall find I’m quite attached to both.
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧？小蜘蛛抖抖索索爬到圣堡脚下了。<hpage>苍白之子，你只是来废话的么？纺络没有虫能阻挡我，圣堡也不例外。<page>亲爱的，你怎么还傻乐呢？上面那位吹口气就能灭了你那点希望。<hpage>傻孩子，真以为我现在还看不出你主子的真身吗？<hpage>这地方的辉煌、虫民的虔诚、还有他们的诅咒……线索太明显了。<hpage>这个王国被超脱虫类的存在掌控，属于更高阶的存在。<hpage>但无论它多想要我的灵丝和躯壳，我都不会给。
translated_text: What's it? This little spider rises very high and sits in a beautiful castle.<hpage>"A pale boy, right? Are you laughing again? "You and your country have not made me an enemy, Sleeping Castle is no different.<page>"Spider, dear, why do you want to be so optimistic and optimistic? I don't think there is any power there. It can very quickly dispel that hope.<hpage>You foolish child, do you think I will not see your king? Is it so?<hpage>The beauty of the earth, the loyalty of the insects, and the curse that encompasses them.<hpage>His kingdom is united by beings beyond worms, one of the highest castes.<hpage>No matter how longing I may be for my silk and shell, I can see that I have a great attachment to both.
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요?이 작은 거미는 매우 높이 올라 아름다운 성에 앉아있다.<hpage>"하늘색 소년, 맞죠?너 또 웃는 거야? "당신과 당신 조국은 나를 적으로 만들지 않았는데, 잠자는 성도 다르지 않다.<page>"거미야, 자기야, 왜 그렇게 낙관적이고 낙관적인가?나는 거기에 어떤 힘도 있다고 생각하지 않는다.그것은 그 희망을 매우 빨리 없애 버릴 수 있다.<hpage>이 멍청한 아이여, 내가 네 왕을 보지 못하리라 생각하느냐?그렇죠?<hpage>지구의 아름다움, 곤충의 충성심, 그리고 그들을 둘러싼 저주가.<hpage>그의 왕국은 가장 높은 카스트 중 하나 인 벌레를 초월한 존재들에 의해 연합되어 있습니다.<hpage>내가 얼마나 나의 실크와 껍질에 대한 갈망을 가질지라도, 나는 둘 다에 대한 강한 애착을 가지고 있음을 알 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Aren’t those solemn judge-bugs nice? They do not speak or sing, but I sense great wisdom behind their gleaming gazes!<hpage>Beware them, little one. Wise or not, their judgements are often followed by violence. Many of your fellow pilgrims have fallen to them on these great steps.<page>Oh...? But even the fallen will sometimes stand again, and all pilgrimages will be completed, yes? That’s how I’ve heard it!
original_zh_text: 看那些肃穆的判官虫多亲切！虽然他们不言语也不歌唱，但眼中却闪着智慧！<hpage>要小心，小家伙。他们的判决常伴暴力，不知多少朝圣者倒在这些石阶上。<page>可是……倒下者终会再起，朝圣终将完成，不是吗？
translated_text: Are judges' mistakes good? They did not speak, they did not sing, but they felt the great wisdom hidden behind their bright eyes.<hpage>Attention, little ones. Whether wise or not, their judgments are accompanied by violence. Many pilgrims fall on this great scale.<page>- No, no? But even the fallen sometimes rise up, and the pilgrimage is over, right? Really? I heard it.
secondary_translated_text: 판사의 실수는 좋은가?그들은 말하지 않았고, 노래하지도 않았지만, 밝은 눈 뒤에 숨겨진 위대한 지혜를 느꼈다.<hpage>조심해, 꼬마들아.현명한 것이든 그렇지 않든, 그들의 판단은 폭력과 함께합니다.많은 순례자들이 이 큰 규모에 떨어집니다.<page>- 아니, 아니야?그러나 타락한 사람도 때때로 일어나서 순례는 끝납니다. 그렇죠?진짜?들었어.

original_en_text: These twisting tunnels hide many worthy opponents, but many traps as well. Watch your footing closely.
original_zh_text: 这些弯道里藏着不少好对手，但陷阱也多。走路看着点。
translated_text: These winding tunnels not only hide many precious enemies, but also a lot of traps.
secondary_translated_text: 이 구불구불한 터널은 많은 귀중한 적뿐만 아니라 많은 함정을 숨깁니다.

original_en_text: As you requested, these pins will mark the travel stations within that hideous structure of steel and steam.
original_zh_text: 按你要求的，这些图钉能标记那些铁皮蒸汽管的站点。
translated_text: On request, these pins designate the station within the formidable steel and steam structure.
secondary_translated_text: 요청에 따라, 이 핀은 강렬한 강철 및 증기 구조 내에서 스테이션을 지정합니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Head fast for Bellhart, Pill. These lands are not for travelling without a sharp blade in claw.<page>Aye! Yes! To Bellhart, and my brother, I shall fly quickly-quick. If you pass that way again, stop and give greeting!
original_zh_text: <hpage>回钟心镇吧，这地方没武器别乱跑。<page>这就回！我飞得可、可快了！你要是经过钟心镇记得和我打招呼！
translated_text: <hpage>Quick access to Berhard and Pil.These lands are not suitable for travel without claws.<page>Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! Ah, yes! Ah, yes! I am flying very fast to Berhart and the brothers. If you cross the street again, stop and say hello.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Berhard 와 Pil. These 땅은 발톱없이 여행하기에 적합하지 않습니다.<page>아, 그래!아, 네!아, 네!아, 네!나는 버하트와 형제들에게 아주 빨리 날아가고 있다.다시 길을 건너면 멈추고 인사를 하세요.

original_en_text: <hpage>Who are you calling for, Shakra? Your voice echoes through the caverns.<page>I came deeper into Pharloom in search of my mentor, the greatest of my tribe. I could not keep pace though, and her trail grew cold.<page>She will have travelled much farther by now, but if I keep moving and stay vigilant I will reunite with her.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，你在喊谁？整个山洞都是你回声。<page>我来纺络深处寻找导师，我们部落的最强者。可惜跟丢了。<page>她肯定走得更远了，但只要保持警惕总能重逢。
translated_text: <hpage>In other words, ... Who's calling? His voice was echoed through the caves.<page>I went to the lighthouse to find my master, the greatest of my tribe. But he could not go any further, and his steps became cold.<page>Now she has gone beyond, but if I keep on and stay vigilant, I will see her again.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>다른 말로하면, ...누가 전화해요?그의 목소리가 동굴을 통해 울려 퍼졌다.<page>나는 내 부족에서 가장 위대한 주인, 나의 주인을 찾기 위해 등대에 갔다.그러나 그는 더 나아갈 수 없었고, 그의 발걸음은 차갑게 변했습니다.<page>이제 그녀는 그 이상으로 갔지만, 내가 계속 깨어 있다면, 나는 그녀를 다시 볼 것입니다.

original_en_text: We must never let our shells soften, or Pharloom’s sharp teeth will sink in quick.<page>Would you duel with me, Hornet Wielding Needle? Together we shall sharpen one another’s skill.
original_zh_text: 战士不能养尊处优，纺络到处藏着危险。<page>来切磋吧？我们互相磨练技艺。
translated_text: Do not allow the shell to soften. Otherwise, sharp teeth of the hawk will soon come.<page>Marcel Niddle, You Want to Catch Me? They work together to improve each other 's skills.
secondary_translated_text: 껍질이 부드러워지지 마십시오.그렇지 않으면 매의 날카로운 이빨이 곧 올 것입니다.<page>마르셀 니들 (Marcel Niddle) - 나를 잡으려고 하는가?그들은 서로의 기술을 향상시키기 위해 함께 일한다.

original_en_text: I’ll wish you success in your grand task, miss, but forgive me my sadness for knowing the cruel cost...
original_zh_text: 我希望你能成功，女士。但一想到代价这么沉重，还是很难过。
translated_text: I hope you are satisfied with your great mission, but forgive me for my pain. "I know the price. "
secondary_translated_text: 나는 당신이 당신의 위대한 임무에 만족하기를 바랍니다, 하지만 내 고통을 용서하십시오. "나는 가격을 안다. "

original_en_text: Hurry it up, let us out quickly then! We got places to go, bugs to see, trinkets to pilfer!
original_zh_text: 快点放人！我们还要去捞宝贝呢！
translated_text: Go ahead, go ahead! There are places to visit, insects to see, scenes to fly in!
secondary_translated_text: 어서, 어서!방문할 곳, 볼 곤충, 날아갈 장면이 있습니다!

original_en_text: Warrior... I heard your approach. Why do you come? Surely you’ve no desire to see these long collapsed caves?<hpage>The way was open, sir. I merely followed the path through. Am I correct to guess you were once a resident of these borderlands?<page>Aye... and glorious they were, in their time. Pharloom’s end approaches, but my caves, these caves, fell to fate long before. <page>Of that fair land, I am the last... Now to remain till the end, and remember the splendour that was...
original_zh_text: 战士……我听见你的脚步了。来这废墟做什么？<hpage>道路通畅，我只是顺路而来。你曾是边境之民？<page>曾是……昔日辉煌……不复存在。如今纺络快完了，但我的家园……早就覆灭了。<page>我是故土最后的遗民……要守到末日，铭记曾经的荣光……
translated_text: I could hear him approaching. Why did you come here? You don't want to see that long hole, do you? Really?<hpage>The road is open. I just went down this road. Are you a resident of the border area?<page>The end of the fall is near, but my caves, these caves have long fallen into the hands of fate.<page>In this wonderful world, I am the last. You must work hard to the end and forget about the glory.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 그가 접근하는 소리를 들을 수 있었다.왜 여기 왔니?너 그 긴 구멍을 보고 싶지 않아, 그렇지?진짜?<hpage>도로가 열려 있다.나는 방금 이 길을 따라 갔다.당신은 국경지역의 거주자입니까?<page>가을의 끝이 가까웠지만, 나의 동굴, 이 동굴들은 오래 전에 운명의 손에 떨어졌다.<page>이 아름다운 세상에서 나는 마지막이다.너는 끝까지 열심히 일해야 하며, 영광을 잊어야 한다.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up, you have hunted long with little rest, thinks Nuu.<page>Perhaps you are covered in too many juices, weighed down by beastly filth? Let sweet Nuu clean you, make you fresh!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐，你一直狩猎，好久没休息了吧？<page>是不是浑身都沾满了黏液和血液？让努努帮你清洁吧！
translated_text: Your Excellency, Miss, has been hunting for a long time and can hardly rest.<page>Are you an animal covered with too much juice and mucus? Sweet Noo will cleanse you and refresh you!
secondary_translated_text: 숙녀님, 전하께서는 오랫동안 사냥을 하셔서 거의 쉬지 않으셨습니다.<page>당신은 너무 많은 주스와 점액으로 덮여있는 동물입니까? Sweet Noo 는 당신을 깨끗하게하고 신선하게 할 것입니다!

original_zh_text: 有意思！我开始喜欢你了！
translated_text: delightful! I love him already!

original_en_text: <page=M>We could do it. The spell can be cast, with enough power, enormous power, equal maybe to that monarch...<hpage>I cannot grant you mine, if it even were enough. My strength is still needed to face her below. Where else do you propose we seek a source?<page=M>From Pharloom! Ho ho ho! Remember, ours is a kingdom of wishes granted.<page=B>Pharloom was not born of that monarch, Old One. Power existed in these lands even before she bound them beneath her.<page=B>Grnk. Seek the old hearts of our kingdom and the last successors to bear their strength.<page=M>They’re still out there, hidden away, much faded by the pale one’s long dominion. You must make them stir.<page=M>We will teach you how, in the way befitting a Weaver, a sombre song to reach down into their memories and enliven them a final time.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们或许能够施咒，但要有足够力量，堪比那君主的力量。<hpage>我给不了这份力，即便有也要留着对付她。还能从哪里获取？<page=M>纺络！嚯嚯！别忘了，我们的王国最擅长实现愿望。<page=B>纺络并非君主创造，古老者。在她到来之前，这片土地就存在着力量。<page=B>您该去寻找古老的纺络之心，与其最后的传承者。<page=M>虽然几乎被苍白统治消磨殆尽，他们仍在某处苟存。必须唤醒他们。<page=M>我们会教你织者的方法。用挽歌深入他们的记忆，激醒他们的力量。
translated_text: <page=M>This is a spell we can cast, feasible and strong enough. Is this equivalent to a monarch?<hpage>Just for that, I 'm not going to give you mine. It takes strength to cope with this, right? Where else do you think the informants can be found?<page=M>"Pharlooom. - Oh, oh! A kingdom is a kingdom where wishes are fulfilled.<page=B>This is not the fault of the monarch.The power existed before these lands were bound under its authority.<page=B>The borders! He finds the last elders and heirs of our kingdom and takes power.<page=M>They were still there, hidden and disappeared from the long reign of paleness. You need to move it.<page=M>We 'll teach you how to activate yourself at the end of a melancholy song that suits your tissue.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>이것은 우리가 할 수있는 주문이며, 실행 가능하고 충분히 강력합니다.이것은 군주와 동등한 것인가?<hpage>그것만으로도, 나는 너에게 내 것을 주지 않을 것이다.이 일에 대처하려면 힘이 필요하죠?다른 곳에서는 정보원을 찾을 수 있다고 생각하십니까?<page=M>"Pharlooom " - 오, 오!왕국은 소원이 이루어지는 왕국입니다.<page=B>이것은 군주의 잘못이 아니다. 그 권력은 이 땅들이 그 권위 아래 묶여지기 전에 존재했다.<page=B>국경을!그는 마지막 장로들과 우리 왕국의 상속자들을 찾아서 권력을 잡는다.<page=M>그들은 여전히 그곳에 있었고, 창백한 오랜 통치에서 숨겨져 사라졌다.당신은 그것을 움직여야 한다.<page=M>우리는 당신에게 당신의 조직에 맞는 우울한 노래의 끝에서 자신을 활성화하는 방법을 가르쳐 줄 것입니다.

original_en_text: Owoww, what a rotten turn! Keep your nasty junk to yourself, then!
original_zh_text: 哎哟！真倒霉！你就自个儿留着这些破烂货吧！
translated_text: Wow, what a change! Leave the garbage to yourself.
secondary_translated_text: 와, 무슨 변화!쓰레기는 너 자신에게 맡겨라.

original_en_text: O-hoho! Share some of your little clicky-clackies with us, help us fill our pockets. If you do, we’ll share a sneaky secret with you!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！分点叮当响给我们，就告诉你个秘密！
translated_text: - Oh, oh! Share your songs to help you fill your pockets.If so, then we will share a secret with you.
secondary_translated_text: - 오, 오!당신의 주머니를 채우기 위해 당신의 노래를 공유하십시오. 만약 그렇다면 우리는 당신과 비밀을 공유 할 것입니다.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up, for your continued huntings you should climb up, up above here, above the tallest spinning towers!<page>Hidden in the dark thickets are strange bugs who call up dancing flames. So pretty! So warm!<page>But when Nuu tried to crawl near, the flames became angry and swooped all around! Poor Nuu was half roasted!<page>Nuu leaves it to you, miss grown-up, to climb up there and cut those flames apart. For our journal, such must be done.
original_zh_text: 大姐姐，要继续狩猎的话，你得往上爬，越过最高的纺塔！<page> 暗蕨丛里藏着会召唤舞焰的怪虫。好漂亮！好暖和！<page> 可努努刚靠近，火焰就发怒冲了上来！差点把努努烤焦啦！<page> 这事就交给你啦，大姐姐，上去把那些火焰斩碎吧。为了填满记录册，必须这么做！
translated_text: Sir, to continue the hunt, you must climb to the top of the tallest revolving tower.<page>A strange insect hides in a dark jungle, which he calls a pulsating flame.<page>But when Noo tried to get closer, the flames were fierce and bounced here and there. Nonooooooo<page>She has given her responsibility.Rise and put out the fire.It is necessary in the magazine.
secondary_translated_text: 선생님, 사냥을 계속하려면 가장 높은 회전탑 꼭대기로 올라가야 합니다.<page>이상한 곤충이 어둠의 정글에 숨어 있으며, 그는 그것을 펄럭이는 불꽃이라고 부른다.<page>그러나 누이가 더 가까이 다가오려고 했을 때, 불꽃은 격렬하고 여기저기 튀어 나왔다. Nonooooooooo<page>그녀는 자신의 책임을 맡겼다. 일어나서 불을 끄다. 잡지에서는 필수적이다.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Child Wielding Needle, have you seen trace of my master nearby? I feel she was here only recently!<hpage>I cannot say for certain, Shakra, though if she travels seeking skilled opponents, these steps would serve her well. The warriors watching over them are formidable.<page>True! Impressive guardians they are, fighting defensively and loath to leave their stations. They swing their weapons with a cold brutality that should not be underestimated.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！见过我导师的踪迹吗？感觉她刚来过！<hpage>我不确定。但她若是想找高手过招，这台阶的守卫正合适。<page>没错！这些守卫死守岗位，出手狠辣，不能小瞧。
translated_text: Boshanka! BOSHANKA! The Pinboy.Do you see the Master's footprints nearby? It seemed like he had just arrived.<hpage>Shakra, I 'm not sure, but if you 're looking for an experienced opponent, then these stages are for you.<page>П р о д а л а. ! ! They are impressive goalkeepers, they struggle in defense and do not want to leave the position.The severity and brutality of their weapons cannot be underestimated.
secondary_translated_text: 보선카! BOSHANKA!핀보이. 근처에 스승의 발자국 보이시나요?마치 그가 막 도착한 것 같았다.<hpage>샤크라, 잘 모르겠지만, 경험이 많은 상대방을 찾고 있다면, 이 단계는 당신을위한 것입니다.<page>프로달라. ! !그들은 인상적인 골키퍼이며, 수비에서 어려움을 겪고 있으며, 포지션을 떠나고 싶지 않습니다. 그들의 무기의 심각성과 잔인성은 과소평가 할 수 없습니다.

original_en_text: Poshanka, Hornet Wielding Needle. For that is your name, is it not? I have heard it spoken in this land with reverence.<page>I had hoped you would accept my summons. In these moments one is good, but two is best.<hpage>I would not deny the wish, Shakra. A sombre ceremony seemed likely at this trail’s end, and I am sadly proved correct. This then is your master?<page>The fiercest of my tribe, here she lies. I called her master, true, but she was mother just as much, more by far than the bug who bore me.<hpage>Among the many marvels of this kingdom, she found a fine place to meet her end.<page>Ended by age... My tribe would call that shame, but I see only strength unbeaten.<page>Even as her shell betrayed her, she walked this kingdom’s breadth. It was her trail followed that allowed me to share witness to its dignity.<page>Hornet Wielding Needle, you too have journeyed these many paths, as my master before us. Join me now for her song-sending.<page>It is time for her soul to walk beyond her shell...
original_zh_text: 你来啦，使针的小姑娘！你叫大黄蜂，对吧？最近可名气不小呢。<page>希望你别推辞我的请求，现在的情况，需要你搭把手，我自己一个不够。<hpage>我不会推辞的，沙克拉。看这情景，要是我没猜错……这是你的导师吧？<page>这里躺着的是我们部落的最强者。我叫她导师，但她其实更像我母亲。<hpage>她挑了个好地方长眠呢……<page>她是老死的……部落会觉得这很丢脸吧，但我只看到不败的强者。<page>拖着老旧的甲壳丈量大地，是跟着她的足迹我才能见证许多。<page>使针的小姑娘，你也走过这些路。陪我给她唱首送魂曲吧。<page>该送她的灵魂离壳了……
translated_text: The spine was shaken by a needle, wasn't it? I heard it in this country and said it with respect.<page>I hope you understand my quote. For now, one is good, but two are better.<hpage>It happened that at the end of the road there was a dark ceremony, but, unfortunately, I found that he was right.<page>I call her the Teacher, but she is also the Mother, and she is much better than my worm.<hpage>Among the many wonders of the Kingdom, he found a good place to end his life.<page>My tribe will call it a disgrace, but I see only invincible strength. "<page>His body betrayed her, but he went to the kingdom. His deeds showed me his worth. "<page>Bumblebee was injecting a needle, and as a teacher before us, you have been here a lot. Send me this song right now!<page>It was time for the soul to leave the body.
secondary_translated_text: 척추가 바늘에 흔들렸죠?나는 이 나라에서 그것을 들었고 존경심을 가지고 말했다.<page>나는 당신이 나의 인용을 이해하기를 바랍니다.지금은 하나면 좋지만 둘은 더 낫다.<hpage>길 끝에서 어두운 의식이 있었지만, 불행히도, 나는 그가 옳다는 것을 발견했습니다.<page>나는 그녀를 선생이라고 부르지만, 그녀는 또한 어머니이며, 그녀는 나의 벌레보다 훨씬 낫습니다.<hpage>왕국의 많은 경이들 중에서 그는 자신의 삶을 끝낼 좋은 장소를 찾았습니다.<page>내 부족은 그것을 불명예라고 부를 것이지만, 나는 무적의 힘만을 본다. "<page>그의 몸은 그녀를 배반했지만, 그는 왕국으로 갔다.그의 행위는 나에게 그의 가치를 보여주었다. "<page>범블비는 바늘을 주사하고 있었고, 우리보다 앞서 선생님이셨던 것처럼, 당신은 여기 많이 왔습니다.이 곡은 지금 당장 보내주세요!<page>이제 영혼이 몸을 떠날 때가 되었다.

original_en_text: From this safe vantage, I can keep watch for threats while I work. These lowlands are brittle and dangerous. Keep your weapon close.
original_zh_text: 这位置安全，能边干活边警戒。低处危险易碎，注意武器别离手。
