translated_text: From a security point of view, you can recognize threats in the workplace.The lowlands are fragile and dangerous.Keep your weapons closed.
secondary_translated_text: 보안의 관점에서, 당신은 직장에서 위협을 인식 할 수 있습니다. 저지대는 취약하고 위험합니다. 무기를 닫으십시오.

original_en_text: Have you tried your claw at the games? Rollicking good fun, don’t you think?<page>I wonder if I could score a little higher if I tried again...
original_zh_text: 你玩过游戏没？超有意思！<page>不知道我再试几次能不能刷新记录……
translated_text: Have you ever tried your fingernails while playing? Don't you think that's funny?<page>If I try again my score will be higher.
secondary_translated_text: 놀 때 손톱을 해본 적 있나요?재밌다고 생각하지 않아?<page>다시 시도하면 점수가 더 높아질 것이다.

original_en_text: After all... it’s you that she wants... is it not?
original_zh_text: 毕竟……她要的是你……不是吗？
translated_text: And finally, ... She wants you, really?

original_en_text: Hoi! Magnificent! May our mighty contest of shells commence.<page>But a final note, nimble bug! If ever you run off course or desire a quick convene, simply play what music you’re able and my companion shall whisk you back to our starting line.<page>Now! The track calls us. Allow me a moment to assemble a course worthy to test our skill.<page>
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！太棒了！史诗对决即将开始！<page>最后提醒一下，要是跑岔道了或想集合，就随便来点音乐，我的跟班会带你回起点。<page>好了，等我布置条配得上咱们实力的赛道就开始！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Very good make-up! The great racing race of the rabbits begins.<page>If you want to get off the ground or settle down quickly, just play the music you can play and my friends will get you back to the starting line.<page>Now! We will take time to organize a useful course that will test our skills.<page>
secondary_translated_text: 이봐 이봐 이봐아주 좋은 메이크업!토끼의 위대한 경주 경주가 시작됩니다.<page>당신이 땅에서 벗어나거나 빨리 정착하고 싶다면, 당신이 연주 할 수있는 음악을 연주하면 내 친구들이 당신을 다시 출발 라인으로 데려 갈 것입니다.<page>지금!우리는 우리의 기술을 테스트 할 유용한 코스를 조직하는 데 시간을 할애 할 것입니다.<page>

original_en_text: <hpage>Hold your gratitude, little one. The dead are stirring.
translated_text: <hpage>Play with gratitude, little man who died of fever.

original_en_text: <hpage>It is time, shamans. I have the hearts, enough as requested. Enough to build your spell, yes?<page=B>Aye. We’re ready. Still, it’s a sad set you’re holding there, strength such as few shall ever know... and all about to burn for Pharloom’s saving.<page=S>I’ll warn ya, Old One, this first part might not be pleasant, but we’ll get you in there, deep as needed.<page=M>Now you’ve only to ready yourself for what comes after. Lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.
original_zh_text: <hpage>时候到了，萨满们。三颗心已集齐，够施咒了吧？<page=B>足够了。唉，这几颗残心曾经承载何等伟力……如今却要为了救世燃尽。<page=S>我得提醒你，古老者。这法咒一开始可能不太舒服，但一定能把您送进记忆深处。<page=M>接下来就看你造化了。做好准备，躺在祭坛上，就可以开始了。
translated_text: <hpage>"The time has come, Shaman. I have this intention, and I am enough to ask. That is enough to cast a spell, right? Really?<page=B>Yes, we are ready, but what you have is a sad scene. A power that few know about. For the redemption of guilt, everything is about to burn.<page=S>The first part may be uncomfortable, but please allow them to participate if necessary.<page=M>We have to be ready for what happens next. I sat on stage and started.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"때가 왔어, 샤먼.나는 그런 의도를 가지고 있고, 나는 물어볼만큼 충분하다.그것은 주문을 던지기 위해 충분합니다, 그렇지?진짜?<page=B>네, 우리는 준비되어 있지만, 당신이 가지고있는 것은 슬픈 장면입니다.거의 모르는 힘.죄의 속죄를 위해, 모든 것이 불타고 있다.<page=S>첫 번째 부분은 불편할 수도 있지만 필요한 경우 참여를 허용하십시오.<page=M>우리는 다음에 일어날 일에 대비해야 한다.나는 무대에 올라서 시작했다.

original_en_text: Charting the heights of this great mount would prove a mighty challenge. For now, I have seen only its base.<page>Once I have completed the search for my master, I would like to return and attempt the climb in full.
original_zh_text: 测绘这大山是个不小的挑战。现在我只探了山脚。<page>等找到导师，一定要回来爬个痛快。
translated_text: The height of the mountain is a difficult task. Now we can only see the base.<page>When the search for the owners is over, I want to go back and make a full-fledged hike.
secondary_translated_text: 산의 높이는 어려운 일이다.이제 우리는 단지 기초를 볼 수 있다.<page>주인을 찾다가 끝나면 돌아와 본격적인 하이킹을 하고 싶다.

original_en_text: Worm-ridden caverns, shaking and unstable. There remain faint signs that pilgrims once travelled these tight paths.
original_zh_text: 被蠕虫所蛀的摇晃洞穴。隐约能看出朝圣者曾走过这窄路。
translated_text: The insect-infected cave is huge.There is a small trail of pilgrims who walk along this narrow road.
secondary_translated_text: 곤충에 감염된 동굴은 거대하며, 좁은 길을 따라 순례자들의 작은 산책길이 있습니다.

original_en_text: Hooof... let us stop the duel there.<page>I... hoof... I hope in my excitement I did not... hoof... bring down my lance too heavy upon you, sister.<hpage>It was combat honourably conducted, sirs. But now, we should all of us keep moving. It will not remain quiet here for long.<page>Y-yes, of course. Our good works are never done, and we must press ever on. There is no time to waste!
original_zh_text: 呼……点到为止。<page>我……呼……希望我没……呼……下手太重。<hpage>二位打得很好，但此地不宜久留，我们该上路了。<page>对、对，正事要紧，不能浪费时间，该走了！
translated_text: Calling. Let's finish the duel.<page>I'm not... Feeling. I don't want you to get excited. Feeling. Sister, it's too hard to raise my spear against you.<hpage>Ladies and gentlemen, this is a battle of glory. But now we need to look to the future. This place is not very quiet for long.<page>Of course, our good deeds never stop, so keep doing it. No time to waste!
secondary_translated_text: 전화가 왔어요.결투를 끝내자.<page>난...느낌.나는 네가 흥분하는 것을 원하지 않아.느낌.언니, 내 창을 들고 너를 겨누는 게 너무 어려워요.<hpage>신사 숙녀 여러분, 이것은 영광의 전투입니다.하지만 지금 우리는 미래를 바라볼 필요가 있다.이곳은 오래동안 조용하지 않다.<page>물론 우리의 선행은 결코 멈추지 않으므로 계속하십시오. 낭비할 시간이 없습니다!

original_en_text: Don’t let defeat weigh on you, nimble bug! Simply step to the challenge. Let us soar swift together again!
original_zh_text: 别灰心，输一次不算什么！振作起来再战！
translated_text: Don't let yourself be hit by failures, flexible mistakes.Collision is a challenge.She wants to get back together!
secondary_translated_text: 실패에 맞지 않도록, 유연한 실수. 충돌은 도전입니다. 그녀는 다시 함께하고 싶어!

original_en_text: <hpage>What cause saw you first ascend to this Citadel, Garmond?<page>Mine is only the most sacred quest, sister! One shared with my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>We sought this Citadel, to stand before its rulers, and demand their answer! By force if necessary! All for our dear village to whom we pledge our shells. <page>The fearsome haunting of thread, it overcame our fair folk.... We are all that remain, left to carry their memory, and the hope to see some justice paid.
original_zh_text: <hpage>加蒙德，你们最初来圣堡要做什么？<page>我和扎扎肩负着神圣使命！<page>我们要为了村子，向圣堡的君主讨个公道！<page>该死的丝咒毁了村子，就剩下我们俩……带着大伙的记忆。无论如何我们都要找到答案！
translated_text: <hpage>Why did you visit the castle for first time?<page>Sister, my search is the most sacred search. I shared one of them with my most loyal companion, my dear Zaza.<page>We will survey the castle, meet its ruler and ask for answers. Use force if necessary. Beloved of our city! We offer a silk.<page>The terrible problems of the thread conquered by our beautiful people - we want to leave behind the people, their memory, and see somehow justice done.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>왜 처음으로 성을 방문하셨습니까?<page>자매님, 저의 검색은 가장 거룩한 검색입니다.나는 그 중 하나를 나의 가장 충성스러운 동반자, 나의 사랑하는 자자와 공유했다.<page>우리는 성을 조사하고, 그 통치자를 만나 답을 요청할 것입니다.필요하다면 힘을 사용하십시오.사랑하는 우리 도시!우리는 실크를 제공합니다.<page>우리의 아름다운 사람들에 의해 정복 된 실의 끔찍한 문제 - 우리는 사람들, 그들의 기억을 뒤에 두고, 어떻게든 정의가 이루어지는 것을보고 싶습니다.

original_en_text: Ahh, a fellow pilgrim. I’ve been praying alone here too long, with only the wind’s voice to join mine.<page>We’re so close. Our pilgrimage is almost over. Just one final, brutal climb, hm?<hpage>The Citadel is near, pilgrim. You must have had some strength in you. Few of your fellows seem to reach these heights.<page>Aye, the roads become lonelier the longer they’re travelled and the higher we climb.<page>It takes a lot of luck and a lot of faith to make it this far, though I’m sure I don’t need to tell you that.
original_zh_text: 啊，又一个朝圣者。我在这独自祈祷太久了，只有风声作伴。<page>快到终点了。朝圣之旅即将结束，只剩最后这段险途了对吧？<hpage>圣堡就在眼前。你本事不错，能走到这的朝圣者没几个。<page>是啊，这路越走越长，越往上爬同伴越少。<page>走到这需要运气和信念，不过你肯定懂。
translated_text: "My fellow pilgrims, I have been praying here alone for a long time, but only the noise of the wind has joined my voice.<page>The pilgrimage is nearing its end. This is the last step, right? Really?<hpage>There must be a strength, it seems that very few of his peers can reach such a level.<page>Yes, the longer the road, the higher you climb, the lonely the road becomes.<page>It takes a lot of luck and a lot of confidence to come here, but I don't think I should say that.
secondary_translated_text: "나의 동료 순례자들아, 나는 오랫동안 여기서 혼자 기도해 왔지만, 바람의 소음만 내 목소리에 합류했다.<page>그 순례는 끝이 가까워지고 있다.이게 마지막 단계죠?진짜?<hpage>그런 수준에 도달할 수 있는 사람은 거의 없는 것 같다.<page>네, 길이가 길수록, 올라갈수록, 길은 더 외로워집니다.<page>여기 오기 위해서는 많은 행운과 자신감이 필요하지만, 나는 그것을 말해야한다고 생각하지 않는다.

original_en_text: Huu... You have done it... Huu. Huu... Hoof.<page>Never would I have believed, a shell so fast in all of Pharloom! Wonder of wonders!<page>You have proven it, nimble bug, fulfilled my wish, seen my pace matched and beaten, my limits broken wide.
original_zh_text: 呼……你赢了……呼……呼……<page>难以置信！纺络还存在这般疾速！简直是奇迹！<page>你做到了！实现了我的夙愿，突破了我的极限！
translated_text: Calling. you did that, calls. Calling.Feels.<page>It is impossible that the Fulham ball can go so fast! A miracle of miracles.<page>You have tried it, cunning insect, you have seen my wishes come true, my footprints connect again, and my boundaries are broken.
secondary_translated_text: 전화가 왔어요.당신은 그것을했고, 전화했습니다. Calling.Feels.<page>풀햄의 공이 이렇게 빨리 갈 수 있는 것은 불가능하다!기적들 중의 기적.<page>너는 그것을 시도했다, 교활한 곤충, 너는 나의 소원이 이루어지는 것을 보았고, 나의 발자국이 다시 연결되고, 나의 경계가 깨지는 것을 보았다.

original_en_text: Gurro! I have a notion for you, sister. What say we cross our weapons here before we move on? Engage in some rollicking combat together? Have no fear, I will not strike a mortal blow!
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！我有个提议，走之前要不要切磋切磋，来场友谊赛热热身？别担心，保证不打死你！
translated_text: Go! I have an idea for you, sister. Why don't we unite and move forward? Are we going to fight together? Don't worry, I won't give you a blow.
secondary_translated_text: 빨리 가!나는 당신을 위해 아이디어가 있습니다, 자매.우리 함께 모여 앞으로 나아갈까요?우리는 함께 싸워야 하나요?걱정마, 내가 너를 때리지 않을거야.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir knight, I am sorry... This was the only means to free you from the cursed threads.<page>Hohhhh... fret not.... little one...<page>Be proud... you’ve grown so strong!<page>Zaza... let us just rest a little... and then we’ll be away...
original_zh_text: <hpage>骑士先生，对不起……只有这样才能斩断你身上的黑丝诅咒……<hpage>咳……别难过……小姑娘……<page>你很强大……应该骄傲……<page>扎扎……可以休息了……
translated_text: <hpage>Mr. Knight, I'm sorry, it's the only way to get rid of the damned thread.<page>¡Oh, yeah! Don't worry about this man.<page>Take pride, you have become very strong!<page>This is Zaza! Let 's rest a bit and go.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나이트 씨, 죄송합니다. 이 망할 실을 없애는 유일한 방법이에요.<page>오, 그래!이 남자에 대해 걱정하지 마세요.<page>자부심을 가져라, 너는 매우 강해졌다!<page>저 자자야!우리 잠깐 쉬고 가자.

original_en_text: Nuu’s wish, it is granted. But miss grown-up will continue cutting creatures and adding them to our journal, of course?<hpage>I will. Knowing a creature’s form and habits is an advantage that can decide the outcome of a battle. Recording these details is worth the effort.<page>Oh yes! Is very much worth it! Nuu hopes you will share your new learnings with her often!<page>And take a gift to help with your huntings, miss grown-up! Nuu will add a pocket to your tool pouch, for the bringing of many tools on your hunts!<page>
original_zh_text: 努努的愿望达成了，但大姐姐会继续砍怪记录对吧？<hpage>会的。了解生物习性对战斗有帮助，值得记录。<page>超值得！要经常和努努分享新发现哦！<page>送你个狩猎礼物！给你的工具包加个口袋，多装点装备！
translated_text: Noah 's wish has been fulfilled, but will women continue to cut off creatures and add them to their newspapers?<hpage>We know that the knowledge of the forms and habits of living beings is an advantage that determines the outcome of the battle.<page>О д а! Very worthy! Share your new knowledge with her often.<page>We offer you gifts to help you in the hunt! La Neta adds pockets to your kit so you can carry plenty of tools while hunting!<page>
secondary_translated_text: 노아의 소원이 이루어졌지만, 여자들은 계속해서 생물을 자르고 신문에 추가할 것인가?<hpage>우리는 살아있는 존재의 형태와 습관에 대한 지식이 전투의 결과를 결정하는 장점이라는 것을 알고 있습니다.<page>오다!매우 합당하다!그녀의 새로운 지식을 자주 공유하십시오.<page>우리는 사냥에서 당신을 돕기 위해 선물을 제공합니다! La Neta 는 사냥하는 동안 많은 도구를 휴대 할 수 있도록 키트에 주머니를 추가합니다!<page>

original_en_text: Just a piece of a mask, innit? Don’t ask us where the other bits are... you’ll have to sniff ‘em out for yourself!
original_zh_text: 只是一块面甲碎片。不知道剩下的在哪……自己找去！
translated_text: It 's just a mask, isn't it? What? Don't ask anyone where you are, listen to it yourself.
secondary_translated_text: 그냥 마스크일 뿐이지, 그렇지?뭐야?네가 어디 있는지 아무에게도 묻지 말고, 직접 들어라.

translated_text: Map of Mount Fey.

original_en_text: <hpage>Nuu, I have completed your request, recording many creatures of Pharloom in the journal.<page>Oooh, ooh! Ma ma ma! Look here at the marvelous beasts and bugs, all listed so beautifully!<page>Miss grown-up, so many creatures now you have cut and beat and smashed! Their essences linger on you, their scents mixing with your own!<page>Oooh, ma... Nuu simply must sample it for herself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>努努，你要的生态记录完成了。<page>哇！快看这些奇虫异兽，记录得好详细！<page>大姐姐砍了好多生物！它们的精华都沾在你身上，味道混在一起了！<page>啧啧……努努好想尝一口！
translated_text: <hpage>No, I have answered your request and recorded many beings in my diary.<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Mama! Mama! Look at the monsters and insects!<page>Adults and women, you have already killed many creatures and killed many.Your essence amazes you and your smell mixes with yours!<page>Oh, mother! Well, try it for yourself.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>아니요, 저는 당신의 요청에 응답했고, 제 일기에 많은 존재들을 기록했습니다.<page>오! 오!오! 오!오! 오!엄마!엄마!괴물과 곤충들을 보세요!<page>어른들과 여자들아, 너희는 이미 많은 생물들을 죽이고, 많은 사람을 죽였어. 너희의 본질은 너희를 놀라게 하고, 너희의 향기는 너희의 향기와 혼합된다!<page>오, 어머니!글쎄, 너 스스로 해봐.

original_en_text: You go on ahead. Zaza and I will keep guard here and catch any stragglers.
original_zh_text: 你先前进吧，我和扎扎在这守着一会，看看有没有漏网之虫。
translated_text: Zaza and I will be here to protect and stop those who stand behind us.
secondary_translated_text: 자자와 나는 우리 뒤에 서있는 사람들을 보호하고 막기 위해 여기에있을 것입니다.

original_en_text: Nuu understands, ma. To sup on such a fierce predator’s juices would be divine... but is not right to do. Such behaviour is unfriendly.<page>Nuu’s wish to see many fine beasts, though... miss grown-up, you have surely granted it! All of Nuu’s thanks goes to you!
original_zh_text: 对不起嘛……虽然掠食者的汁液很诱人……但这样不礼貌。<page>不过见识了这么多神奇生物……太感谢大姐姐了！
translated_text: I don't know, Mom, you'd better enjoy the juice of such a cruel predator. But that's a lie. "This behavior is not friendly.<page>I 'd love to see a lot of beautiful animals, but... Teacher, you agree! Thank you for what you did for me!
secondary_translated_text: 모르겠어, 엄마, 그런 잔인한 포식자의 주스를 즐기는 게 좋겠어.하지만 그건 거짓말이에요. "이 행동은 우호적이지 않습니다.<page>아름다운 동물들을 많이 보고 싶지만...교수님, 동의합니다!당신이 나를 위해 한 일에 대해 감사해요!

original_en_text: I will soon leave these crumbling roads, but if you stop by the settlement below we may meet again. I pass there often to trade with the pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 我马上要离开这段破路了，但我常去下面的聚落交易，或许还会碰面。
translated_text: I will leave these unstable streets immediately, but if you stop in the colony below, we may meet again.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 이 불안정한 거리를 즉시 떠날 것이지만, 당신이 아래의 식민지에서 멈추면, 우리는 다시 만날 것입니다.

original_en_text: Here, the trail of the stag touched pale... We hunted her, felled her, as none before were able...<page>Proof it became, of our majesty... mark of our divine right...
original_zh_text: 这里留有苍白苜鹿的痕迹……我们猎杀了无虫能及的传说……<page>这是王权之证……神授之印……
translated_text: Here the tracks of the reindeer have become pale. We will hunt it and cut it. Because no one has ever been able to do that.<page>It is our dignity. "Symbol of the sacred law.
secondary_translated_text: 여기서 순록의 발자국은 창백해졌다.우리는 그것을 사냥하고 절단할 것이다. 아무도 그것을 할 수 없었기 때문이다.<page>그것은 우리의 존엄성이다. "신성한 율법의 상징.

original_en_text: Beautiful this, a glowy little piece of somethin’. Stinks of them horrid crawling whisperers a bit, so might be dangerous. You should take it! Give us your rosaries and lighten my claws of it!
original_zh_text: 亮晶晶的，漂亮的很！就是带着点难闻的织者味儿。危险货，快买走！
translated_text: It's so beautiful, it's a shiny little thing. They smell a little awful shaking, so they're dangerous. You have to accept it! Give me your rosary and light my nails. "
secondary_translated_text: 너무 아름다워서 반짝이는 작은 물건이에요.그들은 약간 끔찍한 흔들림 냄새를 맡아, 그래서 그들은 위험합니다.당신은 그것을 받아 들여야합니다!네 묵주기도를 내게 주시고 내 손톱을 켜주세요. "

original_en_text: Ho, sister! A grand victory achieved, again. The haunted might of this place cannot stand against our pure hearts!
original_zh_text: 哈！又赢一场！圣堡的空壳子挡不住我们的正义之心！
translated_text: Oh, my sister. The ghostly power of this place cannot stop our pure hearts!
secondary_translated_text: 오, 언니.이 곳의 유령의 힘은 우리의 순수한 마음을 막을 수 없습니다!

original_en_text: <page=M>This task before you... This is mortal power you would claim, the hearts of bugs. It will cost their last strength to save this land.<page=M>Even we have some hesitation in this. Despite our desire to touch their power, we’d never wished to see it expended so utterly.<hpage>Better to leave your land weak in wonder, if it means your shells, and those of your fellows, stay intact.
original_zh_text: <page=M>您需要明白……这方法需要夺取凡虫之心，也会耗尽它们最后一丝力气。<page=M>即便是我们也心有不忍。虽然渴望见识这份力量，但并不希望看到它燃尽。<hpage>让这片土地虚弱而存，总好过让虫族壳裂身死。
translated_text: <page=M>This is called the human strength, the spirit of the insect.We need the last strength to save the world.<page=M>We want to use his power, but we don't want it to be completely depleted, " he said.<hpage>It 's best to make the soil vulnerable, as this means that you and your partner 's shells are untouched.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>이것은 인간의 힘, 곤충의 정신이라고 불립니다. 우리는 세상을 구하기 위해 마지막 힘이 필요합니다.<page=M>우리는 그의 힘을 사용하기를 원하지만, 그것이 완전히 고갈되는 것을 원하지 않는다 " 고 말했다.<hpage>토양을 취약하게 만드는 것이 가장 좋습니다. 이것은 당신과 파트너의 껍질이 손대지 않는다는 것을 의미합니다.

original_en_text: Gurrrooooo! Gallantly answered, sister! Prepare your weapon!
translated_text: Go! Be brave, sister. Prepare your weapons!
secondary_translated_text: 빨리 가!용기 있게 해줘 누나.무기를 준비하세요!

original_en_text: Uaahhhhh! Miss grown-up... your journal is bursting with every sort of creature! Overflowing! Surely, we can call this complete!<page>To think, that such a task could even be done! So clever is Nuu, to have set such a fierce predator onto the work!<hpage>These vast lands hold so much life, and to catalogue it all has taught me greatly. It is an effort worth continuing even after I leave this kingdom.<page>Ooh ma, such a hunger is worthy indeed! You and I are of accord, miss grown-up, hunters both. Our methods are different but our appetites have become very similar!<page>Nuu has for you this token, a symbol of all your efforts, and a marker of your true nature. It carries with it her sweet, sweet smell!
original_zh_text: 啊啊啊！记录册要满出来了！绝对算完成了吧！<page>没想到真能做完！努努真聪明，找对帮手了！<hpage>这片大地生机勃勃，记录它们让我受益匪浅。以后我会保留这个习惯。<page>哇！这才是真正的饥渴！大姐姐和我都是合格的猎手！方法不同但胃口一样大！<page>送你一个象征努力的标记，沾着努努的体香哦！
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! Your Excellency, your newspaper is full of biological leaks! I can call it complete.<page>If you think about it, then I can do this job. We are smart enough to work with such a vicious predator!<hpage>This vast land was inhabited by a large number of life, and it was very useful to catalog them.Even if you are leaving the kingdom, it is worth following.<page>We are the same adult women, and we are both hunters. The method is different, but the appetite is very similar.<page>"We have created this symbol to symbolize his efforts and his nature.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!오, 네!전하, 신문은 생물학 유출으로 가득 차 있습니다!나는 그것을 완전하다고 부를 수 있습니다.<page>당신이 그것에 대해 생각한다면, 나는 이 일을 할 수 있을 것이다.우리는 그런 사악한 포식자와 함께 일할 수 있을 만큼 똑똑합니다!<hpage>이 광대한 땅에는 수많은 생명체가 거주하고 있으며, 카탈로그를 작성하는 것이 매우 유용했습니다. 왕국을 떠나고 있더라도, 따라갈 가치가 있습니다.<page>우리는 같은 성인 여성이고, 둘 다 사냥꾼입니다.방법은 다르지만 식욕은 매우 비슷합니다.<page>"우리는 그의 노력과 그의 본성을 상징하기 위해 이 상징을 만들었다.

original_en_text: All bowed before we princes green...
translated_text: And all of you will worship our green prince.
secondary_translated_text: 그리고 너희 모두는 우리의 녹색 왕자를 경배할 것이다.

original_en_text: <hpage>What cause sees you travelling these blighted lands, Garmond? Do you also seek the Citadel above?<page>Aye! But do not mistake a valorous adventurer for a mere pilgrim. Mine is a sacred quest, shared with my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>We seek that Citadel not for its gifts. Nay, sister! We seek its rulers, to demand their answer! By force if necessary! For our dear village to whom we pledge our shells. <page>The fearsome haunting of thread, it overcame our fair folk... We are all that remain, left to carry their memory, and the hope to see some justice paid.
original_zh_text: <hpage>加蒙德，你们因何来到这里，莫非也是要去圣堡？<page>对，但我们可不是来朝圣的！我和扎扎肩负着神圣使命！<page>我们去那圣堡，是想为村子讨个公道！<page>该死的丝咒毁了村子，就剩下我们俩……带着大伙的记忆。无论如何我们都要找到答案！
translated_text: <hpage>"Hamond, do you know why you came to this desert country? Are you looking for a castle above?<page>Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! But let us not confuse the brave adventurer with the pure pilgrim.My mission is a sacred mission, and it will be carried out by my most faithful companion, dear Zaza.<page>Finding the castle is not a gift. Not my sister! We are looking for their leaders and seeking answers! "Use force if necessary.In the name of our beloved people, we make a cover.<page>The terrible problems of the thread conquered by our beautiful people - we want to leave behind the people, their memory, and see somehow justice done.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"해몬드, 왜 이 사막에 왔는지 아세요?위에 있는 성을 찾고 계신가요?<page>아, 그래!아, 네!그러나 용감한 모험가와 순수한 순례자를 혼동하지 말자. 나의 임무는 신성한 임무이며, 나의 가장 충실한 동반자, 친애하는 자자 (Zaza) 가 수행 할 것입니다.<page>성을 찾는 것은 선물이 아닙니다.내 여동생이 아니다!우리는 그들의 지도자를 찾고 답을 찾고 있습니다! "필요한 경우 무력을 사용하십시오. 사랑하는 사람들의 이름으로 우리는 위장을 만듭니다."<page>우리의 아름다운 사람들에 의해 정복 된 실의 끔찍한 문제 - 우리는 사람들, 그들의 기억을 뒤에 두고, 어떻게든 정의가 이루어지는 것을보고 싶습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. It was a welcome surprise to hear your call echo through these crumbling tunnels. How goes the search for your master?<page>Poshanka! It is a difficult task to track anything in these caverns while the worms ceaselessly churn the rock.<page>Still, I can see that my master has travelled here. Her path within this land winds strangely... I wonder at her intent.<page>It is no matter though. She can enlighten me when again we meet. Until then, I will continue in her shadow.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。听到你喊声从塌方隧道传来很是惊喜。寻找导师有进展吗？<page>啵尚咔！虫子拱得这附近摇来晃去，追踪太难。<page>但她肯定来过这里，行踪诡异……猜不透意图。<page>无所谓。跟她重逢时自然就明白了。在此之前，先继续追。
translated_text: <hpage>It 's amazing to hear your voice echoing through the swaying tunnels.<page>Boshanka! BOSHANKA! As long as the worms continue to shake the rocks, following something in these caves can be a daunting task.<page>You can see the Master coming here. He was walking through the streets of Earth. I want to know their intentions.<page>Maybe when we see you again, you will be glad. So far I am hiding in his shadow.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>흔들리는 터널을 통해 메아리나는 당신의 목소리를 듣는 것은 놀랍습니다.<page>보선카! BOSHANKA!벌레가 바위를 계속 흔들고 있는 한, 이 동굴에서 무언가를 따라가는 것은 어려운 일이 될 수 있습니다.<page>선생님이 오시는 것을 보실 수 있습니다.그는 지구의 거리를 걷고 있었다.나는 그들의 의도를 알고 싶다.<page>다시 만나면 기뻐할 것 같네요.지금까지 나는 그의 그림자 속에 숨어 있다.

original_en_text: Lockin’ us up in a place like this... what a shameful act!
original_zh_text: 把我们关在这种地方……太缺德了！
translated_text: It is a pity that we are staying in this place.
secondary_translated_text: 우리가 이 곳에 머무는 것은 유감스럽다.

original_en_text: Come now beast, let us hear your voice! Sing with me, sing with me, sing sing sing! Make caverns echo and great roads ring!
original_zh_text: 来吧大块头，亮开嗓子，与我同唱！让洞窟共鸣，让圣道震颤！
translated_text: Come, fool, and let your voice be heard. Sing together, sing together. Let the caves unite and overturn the prospectus!
secondary_translated_text: 어서, 어리석은 자여, 네 목소리가 들리도록 하라.같이 노래해요, 같이 노래해요.동굴들이 단결하여 안내서를 뒤집어라!

original_en_text: Very well, sister. Perhaps it is better that we all just rest here a little longer.
original_zh_text: 好吧，姐妹。就在这歇会儿也行。
translated_text: Well, sister, maybe you should rest a little here.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You forfeited the race? It is true that sometimes a reset is needed, for the health of mind and shell.<page>But what say you now? Surely you are eager to return to the track. Let us soar swift together again!
original_zh_text: 怎么中途退赛了？确实，有时为了身心健康，重头再来是必要的。<page>现在怎么说？你肯定渴望重返赛道，那就让我们再次一同飞驰吧！
translated_text: That's a smart mistake! Have you lost the game? In fact, rebooting is sometimes necessary for the health of the heart and shell.<page>But, what are you saying now? I would love to get back in the race. She wants to get back together!
secondary_translated_text: 그건 현명한 실수야!당신은 게임을 잃었습니까?사실, 재부팅은 때때로 심장과 껍질의 건강을 위해 필요합니다.<page>근데 지금 무슨 말을 하는 거야?나는 다시 경주에 복귀하고 싶다.그녀는 다시 함께하고 싶어!

original_en_text: These black threads... they reach upwards with such a powerful longing. No wonder they can force themselves through even mighty stone!
original_zh_text: 这些黑色丝线……向上的渴求如此强烈，难怪能穿透坚岩！
translated_text: Black line.With this desire I extended my hand.No wonder you can walk on rocks.
secondary_translated_text: 검은 라인. 이 욕망으로 나는 손을 내밀었다. 바위 위를 걸을 수 있다는 것은 놀랄 일이 아니다.

original_en_text: Us snitchbugs can wriggle into any place we want, but with this key even a big oafy bug like you can get through a locked door!
original_zh_text: 我们虽然能钻进任何地方，但有了这把钥匙，像你这样的大块头也能开锁！
translated_text: The whistleblower can go anywhere, but with this key, even a stupid idiot like you can go through a locked door!
secondary_translated_text: 내부 고발자는 어디든 갈 수 있지만, 이 열쇠를 가지고, 너 같은 바보라도 잠겨있는 문을 통과 할 수 있습니다!

original_en_text: <page=M>Through their march, at the far border of these lowlands, seek the last queen of the ant hunters. We can sense her still... just.<page=B>In youth, her voice united the wild tribes. Gave them the strength to resist the pale monarch’s will... longer than most at least.
original_zh_text: <page=M>穿越低地边境，寻找蚂蚁猎群最后的蚁后。虽然气息微弱，但我们仍能感知到……<page=B>年轻时她一声令下，野外部落群起反抗苍白君主……虽终究不敌。
translated_text: <page=M>They cross the borders of these plains in search of the last queen of the ant hunt.But I can still feel it.Lonely, alone ...<page=B>When he was young, his voice united the wild tribe. For longer than most, it at least gives them the strength to resist the will of a pale monarch.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>그들은 개미 사냥의 마지막 여왕을 찾기 위해이 평원의 국경을 가로 질러. 하지만 나는 여전히 그것을 느낄 수 있습니다. 외롭고, 혼자 ...<page=B>그가 어렸을 때, 그의 목소리는 야생 부족을 단합시켰다.대부분의 경우보다 더 오래, 그것은 적어도 그들에게 창백한 군주의 의지에 저항 할 수있는 힘을줍니다.

original_en_text: Let us head on, sister! Together we shall step forward under guidance of our faith!
original_zh_text: 走吧姐妹！咱们一起跟着信仰进圣城！
translated_text: Sisters, go forward! We will be led by faith.
secondary_translated_text: 자매 여러분, 앞으로 가세요!우리는 믿음으로 인도될 것이다.

original_en_text: Needle Child. Hakk! I encountered a settlement near here, at the core of a vein of old bells. The bugs there were snared silent on a web of Silk.<page>It seemed the pernicious trap of some unseen predator. I left quickly, making sure to avoid the glimmering threads.<hpage>I passed the town myself. The thread sickness, I’ve seen its like upon the roads, but there it does not discriminate.<hpage>The curse that strikes the town, it is driven, focused. A cold use of Silk at a concerning scale.<hpage>If the path permits, I will investigate its source.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘！哈克！附近钟心镇被邪丝罩着，居民全中招了。<page>像是某种没见过的掠食者设的陷阱，我躲着丝溜走了。<hpage>我也路过了那里。路上丝咒多是个例，但那镇子上的邪丝却不挑目标。<hpage>这等规模和冷血手段，显然受到操纵。<hpage>我会顺路追查其源头。
translated_text: It's a needle, my son. Let's do it! I found a property nearby, in the heart of an old bell tower. Insects get trapped in their nets.<page>It's like a death trap for an invisible predator, I run to avoid the spark wire.<hpage>I walked around this small town. I saw it on the street, but there was no discrimination.<hpage>The curse that attacks the city advances and concentrates. Silk of these sizes is used for cooling.<hpage>If the road permits, I checked the source.
secondary_translated_text: 그건 바늘이야, 아들아.해보자!나는 근처에 오래된 종탑의 중심부에 있는 부동산을 발견했다.곤충들은 그물에 갇혀 있다.<page>보이지 않는 포식자를 위한 죽음의 함정처럼, 나는 불꽃 전선을 피하기 위해 달려간다.<hpage>나는 이 작은 마을을 돌아다녔다.길거리에서 봤지만 차별은 없었다.<hpage>도시를 공격하는 저주가 전진하고 집중합니다.이러한 크기의 실크는 냉각에 사용됩니다.<hpage>도로가 허락한다면, 나는 출처를 확인했다.

original_en_text: What say you, nimble bug? Though no reward remains to give, I would delight to soar together with you again!
original_zh_text: 意下如何？虽然没有奖励可以赠予，但能再次与您一同疾驰，我仍乐意至极！
translated_text: What are we talking about, speed errors? There are no prizes, but I 'm happy to be flying with you again!
secondary_translated_text: 속도 오류는 무슨 소리야?상은 없지만, 다시 당신과 함께 비행하게 되어 기쁩니다!

original_en_text: Snnnrk... Zaza... Snnnrnrrk... Look sharp my lad...
original_zh_text: 呼噜噜……扎扎……呼噜噜……盯紧点……
translated_text: The M. M. S. A.SNRK. Snnnrnrrrk. you look beautiful, my son.
secondary_translated_text: The M. M. S. A.SNRK. Snnnrnrrrk.내 아들아, 넌 예쁘게 보이네.

original_en_text: You haven’t enough rosaries for trading? The mad pilgrims in the overgrown village near here always carry some with them.<page>Will you take what you need from them? Leaving them to wander their path endlessly is a false mercy.
original_zh_text: 带的念珠不够？附近那些疯癫朝圣者身上多的是。<page>去抢点？让他们继续这么晃悠才是真残忍。
translated_text: Do we have enough retailers to exchange? The enthusiastic pilgrims of the lush neighboring village always have something to offer.<page>Do you want to bring what you need? It is the false good will that causes them to wander endlessly.
secondary_translated_text: 교환할 수 있는 소매업자가 많습니까?무성한 이웃 마을의 열렬한 순례자들은 항상 무언가를 제공 할 것입니다.<page>필요한 것을 가져오시겠어요?거짓된 선의가 그들을 끝없이 방황하게 한다.

original_en_text: Ho, what clever traps the red-shells lay out in defence of their lands!<page>Impressive that you managed to survive such a brutal blow. Your shell must be mighty thick!<hpage>Thick enough, though I’d rather have avoided the trap altogether.<hpage>I’ll let it be a reminder to remain wary, even when no foes are nearby.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪的陷阱真是防不胜防！<page>你真厉害，挨了这么重的一击还能活，壳一定很厚！<hpage>厚归厚，但还是别中招为好。<hpage>吃一堑长一智，以后没敌人也得保持警惕。
translated_text: Oh, what a genius trap the red shells have laid to defend their land!<page>It is amazing to survive such a fierce battle.Your shells should be frequent.<hpage>I want to avoid the trap altogether, but it 's pretty thick.<hpage>Even if there are no enemies around, be careful.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 붉은 조개들이 그들의 땅을 지키기 위해 놓은 천재적인 함정이란 무엇인가!<page>이렇게 치열한 전투에서 살아남는 것은 놀랍습니다. 당신의 껍질은 빈번해야합니다.<hpage>덫을 완전히 피하고 싶지만 꽤 두껍다.<hpage>주변에 적들이 없어도 조심해라.

translated_text: ... Excuse me, sir.

original_en_text: Well, what a pleasure. The road has carried you back to me.<page>Care for a few games of dice, while we’re here? For the same wager, a beat of rosaries? Just sit here beside me and we’ll begin.
original_zh_text: 真是有缘，又见面了。<page>既然如此，再玩几局骰子？还是老规矩，一奏念珠？想玩的话就坐我旁边吧。
translated_text: Oh what an honor, the path has brought you back to me.<page>Would you like to play the game of bones here? Winning the Rosary with the same bet? Sit next to me and let 's get started.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 얼마나 영광스러운지, 그 길은 당신을 내게로 데려왔다.<page>여기서 뼈 게임을 하고 싶으세요?똑같은 베팅으로 로자리를 이길 수 있습니까?내 옆에 앉으세요. 이제 시작합시다.

original_en_text: These docks, I thought them small when first I passed. Now I feel the structure’s true bulk hides below the molten lake.
original_zh_text: 原以为码头很小，结果熔岩湖下还藏着大家伙。
translated_text: When I visited this port, it seemed to me that it was small. I could feel the real volume of the structure hidden under the lava lake.
secondary_translated_text: 내가 이 항구를 방문했을 때, 나는 그것이 작은 것 같았다.나는 용암 호수 아래에 숨겨진 구조물의 실제 볼륨을 느낄 수있었습니다.

original_en_text: The bellways, gilded veins that run throughout the lands. Supposedly, they were once used for travel?<br><br>These pins will mark stations on your map.
original_zh_text: 遍布各地的鎏金钟道，据说以前是交通线路？<br><br>这些图钉能够标记钟脉站点。
translated_text: The clock tower, the golden dwelling of the earth. Have you ever used it for travel?<br><br>These pines denote the station on the map.
secondary_translated_text: 시계탑, 지구의 황금 거처.여행에 사용하신 적 있으신가요?<br><br>이 소나무는 지도에 있는 역을 나타냅니다.

original_en_text: Again... to see... this land abandoned... betrayed...<page>...And a throne I could not sit alone...<hpage>You were mortal bugs, caught beneath a being pale... Devotion or destruction... these are the only fates my kind allow.
original_zh_text: 再次见证……故土荒废……王座空悬……独坐无味……<hpage>你们只是凡虫，屈身于苍白存在脚下……臣服或毁灭……是我的族群唯二的“恩赐”。
translated_text: Once again... Behold, the land is desolate, it is betrayed.<page>... A throne that cannot stand alone.<hpage>Daroger is the only fate that our people can endure.
secondary_translated_text: 다시 한번...보라, 그 땅은 황폐하고, 배반당하고 있다.<page>...혼자 설 수 없는 왕좌.<hpage>다로거는 우리 국민이 견딜 수 있는 유일한 운명이다.

original_en_text: The world has grown much dangerous, but still we must learn! Cut through the black threads, miss grown-up, and hunt down every beast of Pharloom!
original_zh_text: 世界变危险了，但研究不能停！大姐姐快斩断黑灾诅咒，把纺络的野兽全砍遍！
translated_text: The world is getting more dangerous, but we must learn! Fight the black line, worship the gods and hunt all the beasts of Pharaoh!
secondary_translated_text: 세상은 점점 더 위험해지고 있지만, 우리는 배워야 한다!검은 라인을 싸우고, 신들을 숭배하고 파라오의 모든 짐승을 사냥하십시오!

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you too brave these bogs? The heights of Pharloom offer harsh welcome.<page>So winds my master’s path, and so I follow. Yet true you speak! This is no place for me.<page>That Citadel’s shadow falls heavy here. I can sense its horrid bulk besides.<page>It is no surprise to see it choke these caverns dank and stagnant. That monstrosity of metal and stone cares not for the lands it consumes.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉也来闯沼泽？圣堡脚下可没好地方。<page>导师走过这，我只能跟上。但你说得对，这破地真不适合我。<page>圣堡的阴影笼罩着这里，走在路上都能感觉到它的存在。<page>把洞穴都憋得发霉了，但那堆又大又丑的石头可不会管脚下这片土地。
translated_text: <hpage>Shakur, are you very brave in this sickness? The Highlands were very warmly received.<page>My lord's way is perverse, therefore I follow him. This is not my place.<page>I could see the castle. You can feel their size.<page>No wonder you will suffocate a damp, stagnant cave. Metal or stone monster does not care about the earth it absorbs.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>샤쿠르, 당신은 이 병 속에서 용감합니까?고지대는 매우 따뜻한 환영을 받았다.<page>내 주님의 길은 비방이므로 내가 그분을 따른다.이곳은 내 집이 아니야.<page>나는 성을 볼 수 있었다.당신은 그들의 크기를 느낄 수 있습니다.<page>당신이 습하고 침체된 동굴에 질식하게 될 것은 놀랄 일이 아닙니다.금속이나 돌 괴물은 흡수하는 지구에 대해 신경 쓰지 않습니다.

translated_text: Quill said that

original_en_text: My master would have found her way to these wilds, I am sure. Her warrior’s sense has no equal. Surely, I must be drawing closer to her!
original_zh_text: 导师肯定来过这片荒野。她战斗直觉无虫能及，我快追上她了！
translated_text: The Lord has found his way through this desert. His warrior consciousness is incomparable. I should have been closer to her.
secondary_translated_text: 주님께서 이 사막을 통해 길을 찾아주셨다.그의 전사 의식은 비교할 수 없다.나는 그녀에게 더 가까이 있었어야 했다.

original_en_text: Leave us to our noble hunt, sister! The Citadel’s twisted bugs still infest these gilded halls. Many are their numbers, but we shall see their life’s thread severed.
original_zh_text: 姐妹不必管我们！即便圣堡余孽众多，但来多少我们也能杀多少！
translated_text: Let 's go on the noble hunt! Insects of the castle still live in the golden room.There are many, but we will see that the thread of their life is cut.
secondary_translated_text: 고귀한 사냥을 시작하자!성의 곤충은 여전히 황금 방에 살고 있습니다. 많은, 하지만 우리는 그들의 삶의 실이 잘린 것을 볼 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>The shell of the red-hunters makes for a vivid marker indeed.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>用红猎手的壳做的标记，足够醒目。
translated_text: It can be used to mark important places and reminders on a map.<br><br>The shell of the red hunter is a living symbol.
secondary_translated_text: 지도에서 중요한 장소와 추억을 표시하는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.<br><br>붉은 사냥꾼의 껍질은 살아있는 상징입니다.

original_en_text: How dank and fetid are these ancient roads, sister! My delicate whiskers are nearly overcome by the stench of evil in the air.<page>Woe betide those with delicate senses, such as poor Zaza here. The shadow of that ghastly Citadel falls heavily upon this place!<hpage>I’ve seen many mighty structures fall to decay in my time. Such places often become home to predators. Keep your sights trained on what lurks in the fog, sirs.
original_zh_text: 这破路又暗又臭！我的漂亮胡子都沾上味了！<page>像扎扎这样鼻子灵的，都快被熏坏了！<hpage>我见过不少腐朽崩塌的宏伟建筑，常沦为掠食者巢穴。当心雾里藏着的东西。
translated_text: Sister, how wet and smelly these streets! My tender beard was almost scratched by the unpleasant smell in the air.<page>Unfortunately, people who are sensitive to feelings like poor Zaza are here.The shadow of this horrible castle has fallen here!<hpage>In my time I have seen the decay of many beautiful buildings.These areas are often home to predators.Be careful of what is hiding in the fog
secondary_translated_text: 언니, 이 거리는 얼마나 젖고 냄새가 난가!내 부드러운 수염은 공기의 불쾌한 냄새로 거의 긁힐 뻔했다.<page>불쌍한 자자 같은 감정에 민감한 사람들이 여기에 있습니다. 이 끔찍한 성의 그림자가 여기에 떨어졌습니다!<hpage>제 시대에는 많은 아름다운 건물들이 썩어지는 것을 보았습니다. 이 지역들은 종종 포식 동물의 고향입니다. 안개 속에 숨어있는 것을 조심하십시오.

original_en_text: Hoy, you been creepin’ around this dusty old place for while then, eh? You must be carryin’ a lot of goodies with you! Let a poor old snitchfly ‘ave a quick look!
original_zh_text: 哟，你在这附近转悠了半天，捞到不少好东西吧？让我瞧瞧！
translated_text: Have you been in this dusty old place for a long time? You must have lots of good things! Let 's look at the journalists.
secondary_translated_text: 너는 이 먼지가 많은 오래된 곳에 오래 머물렀니?당신은 좋은 것들을 많이 가지고 있어야한다!저널리스트들을 살펴보자.

original_en_text: I’m Sherma, by the way. Just another humble pilgrim like yourself. If you ever need assistance on the road ahead, sing out my name and I’ll be sure to find you. Me and my lucky chime are at your service!
original_zh_text: 我叫谢尔玛，和你一样是朝圣者。路上需要帮忙就喊我！我和幸运铃铛随叫随到！
translated_text: I am also a shaman.A humble person like you.If you need help on your way, sing my name.I and my wonderful work for you!
secondary_translated_text: 나는 또한 샤먼입니다. A humble person like you. If you need help on your way, sing my name. I and my wonderful work for you!

original_en_text: We ain’t leavin’ ‘til we’re done pilfering! You be off, if you’re so scared!
original_zh_text: 我才不走，还没偷够呢！怕死就自己跑！
translated_text: Escape from the escape! "If you 're afraid, run.

original_en_text: Please take some rosaries in exchange, red maiden!<page>Though in these dark times their promise of holy reward may never be met, still they carry with them our fondest well-wishes.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，请收下这些念珠吧！<page>虽然现在形势不好，但这些念珠装着我们最真诚的祝福！
translated_text: Mr. Hong, Change the rosary.<page>His promises of a divine reward may never be fulfilled in this dark age, but they bring our best wishes.
secondary_translated_text: 홍 씨, 묵주기도 바꿉니다.<page>하느님의 보상에 대한 그분의 약속은 이 어두운 시대에 결코 성취되지 않을 수도 있지만, 그러한 약속은 우리의 최선의 소원을 가져다 줍니다.

original_en_text: Gate, gate, gate! Nicest gate I’ve met!<br>Gate, gate, gate! Greatest miracle yet! Ha ha ha!
original_zh_text: 骨门骨门最贴心！<br>骨门骨门真神迹！哈哈哈！
translated_text: Drink it! Come on! The door! The best door I have ever seen!<br>Door! The door! The door! The greatest miracle of all time, ya-ja!
secondary_translated_text: 마셔!어서!문이!내가 본 최고의 문!<br>문이!문이!문이!모든 시간의 가장 위대한 기적, 야 야!

original_en_text: <page=M>Those docks, atop the lake of flame, they still possess the means to pass below, though you’d be the first in an age to dare the descent.<hpage>Then my path is clear. Remain in your sanctuary and await my return. If this land can be saved, you may have a part to play yet.
original_zh_text: <page=M>熔岩湖上的深坞仍保有通往下层的手段，但长久以来无虫敢试。<hpage>前路已明，你们就守着圣所等我归来吧。若此地尚存生机，或许还用得上各位。
translated_text: <page=M>These shores are at the top of Lake Flemish, and below them there are still structures to be crossed, but you will be the first challenge of this era.<hpage>My path is clear.Stay in your coat and wait for him to return.If we can preserve this land, we can still use it a little.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>이 해안은 플랑미스 호수의 꼭대기에 있으며, 그 아래에는 여전히 건널 구조물이 있지만, 당신은이 시대의 첫 번째 도전이 될 것입니다.<hpage>내 길은 분명하다. 외투를 입고 그가 돌아올 때까지 기다리세요. 우리가 이 땅을 보존할 수 있다면, 우리는 여전히 그것을 조금 사용할 수 있습니다.

original_zh_text: 要挑战飞毛腿斯威夫特吗？
translated_text: Master of fast sprints.

original_en_text: Ho, what clever traps the red-shells lay in defence of their lands!<page>I’ve narrowly avoided a few nasty ends myself. It certainly adds a thrill to my investigations...
original_zh_text: 呀！红壳怪的陷阱真阴险！<page>我好几次都差点中招。调查工作有点刺激过头了……
translated_text: Oh, what a genius trap the red shells have laid to defend their land!<page>I almost died, and it gave me enthusiasm in my research.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 붉은 조개들이 그들의 땅을 지키기 위해 놓은 천재적인 함정이란 무엇인가!<page>거의 죽을 뻔했고, 그것은 나의 연구에 대한 열정을 주었다.

original_en_text: Well now! How brilliant! In all these fine games you have matched my scores and more!<page>What wonder to be here, and able to witness a display of such profound talent.<hpage>Besting your scores proved an immense challenge, Seth, and yet you seem to have achieved them yourself with relative ease.<page>You flatter me! But yes, my own aptitude continues to surprise me. So many skills I cannot recall learning... <page>But do not underplay your own achievements, for they too are significant, inspiring even!<page>In fact, for my deep respect I insist you take this small medallion. I found it within my belongings, and know not where I came upon it, but it has a most pleasant sense.<page>Let it serve as marker of a friendship I feel has only just begun.<hpage>Thank you, Seth. I shall keep it close.
original_zh_text: 太精彩了！所有游戏你都破了我的记录！<page>能在这见证这么惊艳的表演，真是幸运。<hpage>破你纪录可不容易，但你达成记录时却挺轻松？<page>我自己都惊讶！很多技巧根本不记得学过……<page>但你的成就更能激励我！<page>为表敬意，请收下这枚勋章。不知从哪来的，但带着令人安心。<page>就当我们友谊的信物吧。<hpage>多谢，我会珍藏。
translated_text: Everything is okay, everything is okay! All right, all right! All right! What a wonderful thing! In all these big games, your score is equal to mine or better!<page>It 's amazing to see such talent.<hpage>Seth, breaking the count was a big challenge, but it seems I was able to get the results on my own with relative ease.<page>They will adore me! I was amazed by my talent. I don't remember how much I learned about the skills.<page>Don't underestimate your results.<page>In fact, out of respect I ask you to keep this little medal. I found it in my article. I don't know where I found it, but it gave me the best feeling.<page>As a sign of friendship, I think this is only the beginning.<hpage>Thank you, Seth, I will continue.
secondary_translated_text: 모든 게 괜찮아, 모든 게 괜찮아!좋아요, 좋아요!좋아요!정말 멋진 일이군요!이 모든 큰 게임에서, 당신의 점수는 내 점수와 같거나 더 좋습니다!<page>그런 재능을 보는 것은 정말 놀랍습니다.<hpage>세스, 카운트를 깨는 것은 큰 도전이었지만, 상대적으로 쉽게 결과를 얻을 수 있었던 것 같습니다.<page>그들은 나를 사랑할 것이다!나는 내 재능에 놀랐다.나는 내가 그 기술에 대해 얼마나 배웠는지 기억이 나지 않는다.<page>당신의 결과를 과소평가하지 마십시오.<page>사실, 존경심 때문에 이 작은 메달을 보관해 달라고 부탁드립니다.나는 내 기사에서 그것을 발견했다.어디서 찾았는지 모르겠지만 가장 좋은 느낌이었습니다.<page>우정의 표시로, 나는 이것이 단지 시작일 뿐이라고 생각한다.<hpage>감사합니다, 세스, 계속할게요.

original_en_text: While we rest for the journey ahead, care to test your luck with a game of dice? You know how to play, I trust?<hpage>I’m sure I can grasp the rules quickly enough, sir. What is the wager?<page>A beat of rosaries on each roll. What say you? Sound fair? Let our worries roll away with the dice!
original_zh_text: 休息时要来玩玩骰子吗？你应该知道规则吧？<hpage>我学得快，要赌什么？<page>每次押一奏念珠。公平吧？让骰子带走烦恼！
translated_text: Why not try your luck shaking your bones during the break? You know how to play, right? Really?<hpage>I 'm sure I 'll be able to learn the rules soon. What to bet on?<page>There are a few pearls in each column. What did I say? Sounds good? Let 's take care of the data!
secondary_translated_text: 휴식 중에 뼈를 흔들면서 행운을 시험해보는 게 어때요?당신은 어떻게 연주하는지 알고 있습니까?진짜?<hpage>나는 곧 그 규칙을 배울 수 있을 것이라고 확신한다.무엇을 내기해야합니까?<page>각 기둥에는 몇 개의 진주가 있습니다.내가 뭐라고 했지?잘 들리나요?자료를 돌봐주세요!

original_en_text: Hrm...? Oh, hoy there! ‘Tis a pleasure to meet you here at the end of our long journey, sister.<page>I am Sherma, a simple pilgrim like yourself. What a wonder to find ourselves finally here, eh?<page>Rising at last to the heights of the Citadel and being amongst so many of our brothers and sisters... it is a blessing indeed. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice belies some hesitation in that belief, little pilgrim. To have travelled this far is to have seen the reality of this broken place. What do you make of it, truly?
original_zh_text: 哎呀！姐妹！走了这么远终于碰面了！<page>我是谢尔玛，和你一样的朝圣者。能走到这儿太不容易了！<page>和这么多同袍登上圣堡……真是恩赐……嗯，是恩赐。<hpage>你听起来有些犹豫？既已走到这里，想必你也看清了此地的破败真相，有什么感想？
translated_text: What's it? What is it? Ah, there he is! "It is a great honor to meet you at the end of a long journey.<page>I am a shaman, a simple pilgrim, just like you. Isn't it surprising that we finally got there?<page>Over time, I went up to the castle and became one of many brothers and sisters. And that is a blessing indeed. Yes, it is a blessing.<hpage>You, little pilgrim, hide this fear from faith.When I went up so far, I could see the reality of this ruined place.What do you think about it?
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요?뭐야?아, 여기 있네! "장한 여정의 끝에 여러분을 만나게 되어 영광입니다.<page>나는 샤먼, 당신처럼 단순한 순례자입니다.우리가 마침내 거기에 도착했다는 것은 놀라지 않나요?<page>시간이 흐르면서 나는 성으로 올라갔고, 많은 형제 자매들 중 하나가 되었습니다.그것은 실로 축복이다.네, 그것은 축복입니다.<hpage>어린 순례자여, 이 두려움을 신앙에서 숨기세요. 내가 이렇게 멀리 올라갔을 때, 이 황폐한 곳의 현실을 볼 수 있었습니다. 당신은 그것에 대해 어떻게 생각하십니까?

original_en_text: Hoy! You again? This place used to be nice and quiet, but now we can’t get a moment’s peace!
original_zh_text: 喂！又是你？这地方本来安安静静的，现在连喘口气都难！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey, hey! Again you? It used to be very peaceful, but now there is no peace.
secondary_translated_text: 이봐, 이봐, 이봐!또 너?예전에는 매우 평화로운 곳이었지만 지금은 평화가 없다.

original_en_text: Ahh, sister! You have awoken. I hope that our powerful strikes did not leave you in too weak a condition.<page>We would even be willing to duel again, if you still have the strength!
original_zh_text: 啊哈哈，姐妹，你醒啦？没打疼你吧？<page>你要还有力气想再打一轮，我们随时奉陪！
translated_text: Oh, sister! I woke up hoping that our powerful attacks would not weaken them.<page>If you are strong, we will fight again.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 누나!나는 우리의 강력한 공격이 그들을 약화시키지 않기를 바라고 깨어났다.<page>네가 강하면 우리는 다시 싸울 것이다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir Guardian... I scarcely thought we would meet again after our encounter.<page>Hm? Apologies friend, I fear I don’t recognise you. And I’m sure I would remember such a striking figure!<hpage>...Pay no heed, sir. It seems I mistook you for another.<hpage>You are... a traveller through these quaking lands, I take it?<page>I suppose I am indeed! I was born into this world not long ago, waking beside a lake with only this weapon laying beside me.<page>Seth is my name, though I know not who gave it to me.<page>The custom of the newly-born is to explore the world, is it not? So that is what I have set out to do! I will rest here a moment, then continue my journey.
original_zh_text: <hpage>守卫者先生……没想到能再见。<page>抱歉朋友，我们见过吗？像你这样的虫我肯定忘不掉。<hpage>……抱歉，是我认错了。<hpage>你是……旅行者？<page>算是吧！我刚降生不久，就在湖边，身边还有这些武器。<page>我叫赛斯，但不知谁取的名。<page>新生儿就该探索世界对吧？我休息一会儿就继续上路。
translated_text: <hpage>Ever since we met, I have never thought of seeing you again.<page>What's it? What is it? Sorry, I don't know you. I remember such a great man. "<hpage>... - Ignore this, sir. I see you as someone else.<hpage>You are a... I believe that you are a traveler who travels on earth that trembles.<page>I think it is! Shortly before I was born into this world, I woke up on the shore of a lake with this gun.<page>I don't know who gave it to me, but Seth is my name.<page>Children have a habit of exploring the world, do they? And this is where I started! I will rest a bit and continue my journey.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>우리가 만난 이후로, 나는 당신을 다시 만날 생각도 없었다.<page>뭐예요?뭐야?미안해, 난 널 몰라. "나는 이렇게 위대한 사람을 기억한다. "<hpage>... - 이건 무시해, 선생님.나는 당신을 다른 사람처럼 본다.<hpage>넌...나는 당신이 떨리는 지구를 여행하는 여행자라고 믿습니다.<page>나는 그것이라고 생각한다!내가 이 세상에 태어나기 얼마 전에, 나는 이 총을 들고 호수둑에서 깨어났다.<page>누가 준 건지 모르겠지만 세스는 내 이름이야.<page>아이들은 세상을 탐험하는 습관이 있습니다, 그렇죠?그리고 이것은 내가 시작한 곳이다!나는 잠시 쉬고 여행을 계속할 것이다.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up! What sweet surprise for Nuu! The world rumbles and the black threads stretch. Not safe now to wander.<page>But you! You are adult yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt, no matter the darkness?<hpage>Certainly I am no child, young one.<page>Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.<page>Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!<page>Would you help Nuu? Before it all ends? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！努努好惊喜！世界在震颤，黑灾在蔓延。现在独自游荡可不安全。<page>但你！你是成虫对吧？完全长大了？准备好狩猎了，无惧黑暗？<hpage>我显然不是个小孩子，小家伙。<page>太好啦！努努有个愿望！帮我去砍纺络的各种神奇虫子吧！<page>用你的刀砍！用长大的力气砍！用成熟的狂野之心砍！<page>帮帮努努好不好？趁着一切还没有终结，收下这本册子，用打架心得写满它！
translated_text: Your Majesty, Madame! What a wonderful surprise for us! In a world where the black line is stretched, it is now dangerous to walk.<page>But you have! Are you an adult? Fully grown? Are you ready for the hunt or for the dark?<hpage>Of course, I am not a child.<page>Ideal! You must make a wish! For it, you will find a lot of wonderful insects in the beacon and cut them.<page>Cut him with a knife! Destroy them with your mature mind. Try your wild adult mind.<page>Would you like to help Nancy? To the end? Can you bring your scrolls to fill the page of your editing knowledge?
secondary_translated_text: 폐하, 마담!우리를 위해 얼마나 놀라운 놀라움!검은 선이 뻗어 있는 세상에서, 이제 걷는 것은 위험하다.<page>하지만 넌 그랬잖아!어른이신가요?완전히 자란?당신은 사냥을 위해 준비되었습니까, 아니면 어둠을 위해 준비되었습니까?<hpage>물론 나는 어린이가 아니다.<page>이상!당신은 소원을 만들어야 한다!그것을 위해, 당신은 등대에서 멋진 곤충을 많이 찾을 수 있으며 그들을 잘라.<page>칼로 그를 잘라!당신의 성숙한 정신으로 그들을 파괴하십시오.어른들의 정신을 시험해 보세요.<page>낸시를 도와줄래?끝까지?당신은 당신의 편집 지식의 페이지를 채우기 위해 두루마리를 가져와 주시겠습니까?

original_en_text: ...Great strides move the world, but small steps shouldn’t be overlooked...<page>...One mystery leads to another. Scrutinising the belly of the thing will prove useful...<hpage>The meaning behind your musings is as opaque as ever. Would you converse with me directly, sir?<page>...Trust yourself. And each other. The solution is always within grasp...
original_zh_text: ……大变革撼动天地，但小细节亦不容忽视……<page>……谜题环环相扣。剖开事物本质方能解惑……<hpage>先生高论依旧晦涩，能否直言相告？<page>……信己信人。答案触手可及……
translated_text: ... With big steps you touch the world, but you cannot ignore it with small steps.<page>... One mystery leads to another. It is desirable to carefully examine the stomach of something.<hpage>The meaning behind meditation is opaque, as always. Can you talk to me directly?<page>... Believe in yourself, and the other person 's reaction is always under your control.
secondary_translated_text: ...큰 발걸음으로 세상을 만질 수 있지만 작은 발걸음으로 세상을 무시할 수는 없습니다.<page>...하나의 미스터리는 다른 미스터리로 이어진다.어떤 것의 위를 조심스럽게 검사하는 것이 바람직합니다.<hpage>명상 뒤에있는 의미는 항상 그렇듯이 불투명합니다.나랑 직접 얘기해 줄 수 있니?<page>...자신을 믿으면 다른 사람의 반응은 항상 당신의 통제하에 있습니다.

original_en_text: The creatures of this wood can disguise themselves amongst the many branches. Watch for unexpected movement and be prepared to strike.
original_zh_text: 林子里虫子会伪装成树枝。注意周围动静，随时准备出手。
translated_text: This forest creature can hide in many branches.Beware of unexpected steps and be prepared for attack.
secondary_translated_text: 이 숲의 생물은 많은 가지에 숨어있을 수 있습니다. 예기치 않은 단계를 조심하고 공격에 대비하십시오.

original_en_text: Spider dear, what a delight to have you visit! It is oh so lonely here at the bottom of the world.<hpage>I cannot share your mirth, child. Your small rebellion above now causes this kingdom’s collapse.
original_zh_text: 小蜘蛛，你来啦！真高兴，独自在这世界之底，好寂寞呢~<hpage>我可高兴不起来，孩子。你那点小小的反叛就要毁灭上方的王国了。
translated_text: Mr. Spider, I 'm glad you came. At the end of the world, you 're alone.<hpage>I cannot share your happiness, it is a small rebellion against you that led to the collapse of the kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: 스파이더 씨, 오셔서 기뻐요.세상 끝에서, 당신은 혼자입니다.<hpage>나는 당신의 행복을 공유 할 수 없습니다, 그것은 왕국이 붕괴 된 작은 반역으로 이어졌습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. I had a sense I would find you in these winding tunnels, filled as they are with the marks of combat.<page>Poshanka! You trust your instincts rightly. The red-shelled warriors who carved out these roads make for excellent opponents indeed.<page>I would gladly spend much time here, testing myself against their blades and cunning traps, but I must keep to my task. As should you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。看到那些打斗痕迹，我就知道能在附近碰上你。<page>啵尚咔！你直觉真准。那些红壳战士真够厉害，打得痛快！<page>真想多待会儿练练手，但任务要紧。你也别耽搁！
translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, Shakira. I feel I can find him because the remnants of the battle are accumulating in winding tunnels.<page>Boshanka! BOSHANKA! The Red Cross is the only organization that can go through these routes.<page>I am happy to spend a lot of time here and test myself against their blades and cunning traps, but I must continue my mission. "You should do it too.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>좋은 아침, 샤키라전투의 잔재가 구불구불의 터널에 쌓여 있기 때문에 내가 그를 찾을 수 있다고 생각한다.<page>보선카! BOSHANKA!적십자는 이 경로를 통과할 수 있는 유일한 조직이다.<page>나는 여기서 많은 시간을 보내고 그들의 칼날과 교활한 함정에 대항하여 나 자신을 시험하는 것을 기쁘게 생각하지만, 나는 내 임무를 계속해야한다. "너도 그렇게 해야지.

original_en_text: Hahhh... hahhh... oh, sister. What a toll it exacts on us... this endless combat! Certainly when peace finally comes, we will be in the right mind to appreciate it...<hpage>You place too much burden upon yourself, sir.<hpage>Though I share your ambition to free this land from its curse, I counsel you to rest, even if only for a short while.<page>Us, rest? While you, my dear sister, fight on so gallantly? Hahhhh... we cannot.<page>What would our old village think of us, were we to quit our charge? No, regardless of what you may believe, there’s strength enough still in these old shells!
original_zh_text: 哈……哈……噢，姐妹。这架打得骨头都快散架了……等太平了可得好好睡一觉……<hpage>别把担子全压自己身上。<hpage>我也想终结诅咒，但该休息还是得休息。<page>休息？你也还在拼命，我们哪能躺下？<page>要是半途而废，村里的大伙会怎么想！别看我们一身旧壳，里头可有劲呢！
translated_text: Ja! Ha ha ha! My sister. This has caused us a great loss. Of course, when peace comes, we thank it with a righteous heart.<hpage>You are putting too much burden on yourself.<hpage>I am as ambitious as you, and I want to free this country from its curse, but I advise you to rest, at least for a short period of time.<page>Do we have to take a break? Why did you fight so boldly? Ha ha ha! No, no.<page>What will the ancient village think if we give up the attack? No, believe it or not, these old shells still have enough power!
secondary_translated_text: 야!하하!내 여동생.이것은 우리에게 큰 손실을 초래했습니다.물론, 평화가 올 때 우리는 의로운 마음으로 감사합니다.<hpage>당신은 자신에게 너무 많은 부담을 가하고 있습니다.<hpage>나는 당신만큼이나 야심적이며, 이 나라를 저주에서 해방시키고 싶지만, 적어도 짧은 기간 동안은 휴식을 취하라고 조언합니다.<page>우리 잠깐 쉬어야 할까?너는 왜 그렇게 용감하게 싸웠니?하하!아니, 아니.<page>만약 우리가 공격을 포기한다면 고대 마을은 어떻게 생각할 것인가?아니, 믿거나 말거나, 이 오래된 껍질은 여전히 충분한 힘을 가지고 있습니다!

original_en_text: <hpage>Child, I hold the means to descend. Let us meet one final time, and quell this black ruin of our making.
original_zh_text: <hpage>孩子，我有办法下潜。我们再最后见一面，终结这黑暗吧。
translated_text: <hpage>My son, I have a road to go. Let 's meet one last time and silence the black ruins we have created.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>내 아들아, 나는 가야 할 길이 있다.마지막으로 만나서 우리가 만든 검은 폐허를 침묵시키자.

original_en_text: <hpage>Learning about a land’s inhabitants is a worthwhile undertaking. Perhaps you are more grown than you realise, Nuu.<page>Ma! Such delicious praise will make Nuu shrivel! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!
original_zh_text: <hpage>研究生态是好事，努努。或许你比看起来要成熟。<page>呀！这么夸人家要害羞啦！快去打猎，开始我们的研究！
translated_text: <hpage>Getting acquainted with the inhabitants of this country is a very rewarding job.You can be more mature than you think.<page>М а м а! That compliment is killing me. Hunting, hunting and learning.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>이 나라의 주민들을 알게 되는 것은 매우 보람 있는 일이다. 생각보다 더 성숙해질 수 있다.<page>엄마!그 칭찬은 나를 죽이고 있다. 사냥, 사냥, 그리고 배움.

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle. What do you make of this huge, groaning structure?<hpage>The scale of it all impresses me. If this is merely an outpost of the Citadel above, then their capital must be grand beyond measure.<page>Yokkala... Perhaps so. They must have prized indeed the work done here, to build something so vast in such a dangerous place.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，你怎么看这吱呀乱响的大家伙？<hpage>规模惊人。若这仅是圣堡的一处前哨，那主城的宏伟难以想象。<page>哟咔啦……或许吧。在这种险地修这么大工程，肯定费了不少劲。
translated_text: Children shake the needles.What do you think of this huge structure?<hpage>If it were the outpost of the upper castle, then its capital must have been extremely large.<page>Yokara, sir! Perhaps he appreciated the fact that he had done such a great thing in such a dangerous place.
secondary_translated_text: 어린이가 바늘을 흔들고 있는데, 이 거대한 구조물에 대해 어떻게 생각하십니까?<hpage>만약 그것이 상부 성의 전초지라면, 그 수도는 극도로 커졌을 것이다.<page>요카라, 선생님!아마도 그는 자신이 위험한 곳에서 그렇게 위대한 일을 한 것에 감사했을 것입니다.

translated_text: Signs of hunting

original_en_text: Seek swift to calm our crying land, Hornet Wielding Needle. And know that I shall remain here, to stand against these husks gone dark.
original_zh_text: 快去平息纺络的哀嚎，使针的小姑娘。我会保护这里的虫民。
translated_text: The bee waved a needle and tried to quickly soothe our tears. I knew I would stay here and fight this black shell.
secondary_translated_text: 벌은 바늘을 흔들며 우리의 눈물을 빨리 달래려고 노력했습니다.나는 여기에 머물고 이 검은 껍질과 싸울 줄 알았어.

original_en_text: I’ll bring the healing supplies to the settlement with all haste, red maiden.<page>Fear not on my behalf. My fellow pilgrims are all praying for me, and thereby no harm will befall me!
original_zh_text: 我这就把药送回去。<page>别担心我！大伙都在为我祈祷，不会有事的！
translated_text: Lady Red, bring the healing materials as soon as possible.<page>Don't worry, my pilgrims are praying that I will not be hurt.
secondary_translated_text: 레드 레이디, 가능한 한 빨리 치유 재료를 가져오세요.<page>걱정마, 나의 순례자들은 내가 다치지 않도록 기도하고 있다.

original_en_text: ‘Tis now my charge to care for those who stay here, including yourself. If I can aid you in any way, please let me know!
original_zh_text: 现在我负责照顾大伙，包括你在内。有什么需要尽管说！
translated_text: "My job now is to take care of the people who have stayed here, including you. "If there 's anything I can do to help you, let me know!
secondary_translated_text: "지금 내 임무는 당신들을 포함하여 이곳에 머물렀던 사람들을 돌보는 것입니다. "만약 내가 당신을 도울 수 있는 것이 있다면, 저에게 알려주세요! "

original_en_text: Oh, what a shock! Discovered again so easily! Like a hapless little hatchling!<page>If you’re going to make a sport of tracking me, I’ll have to redouble my efforts at camouflage!
original_zh_text: 吓我一跳！又被发现了！跟刚破壳的小虫似的！<page>你要是想拿我当猎物练手，我可要升级伪装术了！
translated_text: Oh, this is a shock! Re-open it easily! Like an unhappy child.<page>If you want to watch me as a sport, I have to work harder to mask it! "
secondary_translated_text: 오, 이건 충격이야!쉽게 다시 열 수 있습니다!불행한 아이 처럼.<page>당신이 나를 스포츠로 보고 싶다면, 나는 그것을 숨기기 위해 더 열심히 일해야합니다! "

original_en_text: The jagged crest looming over all of Pharloom. Its whipping winds and bitter cold would pierce the strongest shell.
original_zh_text: 俯瞰纺络的尖峰，寒风能刺穿最坚硬的外壳。
translated_text: The rocky mountains cover the entire island of Faroe. Its strong winds and severe cold have pierced the strongest basins.
secondary_translated_text: 바위산은 페로 섬 전체를 덮고 있다.강풍과 극한 추위가 가장 강한 분지를 뚫었다.

original_en_text: Ahh, the shining bench has risen for us! Pharloom’s kindness to we pilgrims is inexhaustible!<page>Please rest, red maiden, and fear not. Our kingdom watches over us all!
original_zh_text: 看！圣椅为我们升起了！纺络永远眷顾朝圣者！<page>安心歇息吧，王国在庇护我们呢！
translated_text: Oh, a bank of light for us! We, the pharaohs, cannot be innocent of anything.<page>Rest in peace, Red Girl, do not be afraid, our kingdom will protect us all.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 우리를 위한 빛의 은행!우리는 파라오의 무죄가 될 수 없습니다.<page>평화롭게 쉬세요, 붉은 소녀, 두려워하지 마십시오, 우리 왕국은 우리 모두를 보호 할 것입니다.

original_en_text: Join your voice with mine, red maiden! You, me, and my lucky chime will sing together until the great gate opens!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，快加入合唱！你我加上幸运铃铛，肯定能用歌声叩开大门！
translated_text: Join me and my voice, red girl! You and I and my bells of happiness will sing together until the door opens.
secondary_translated_text: 나와 내 목소리에 합류해, 붉은 소녀!너와 나 그리고 나의 행복의 종들은 문을 열 때까지 함께 노래할 것이다.

original_en_text: Hrm? Hoy there! I was looking for somewhere to rest my weary shell and found this cosy station!<hpage>These lands are dangerous. I had thought perhaps some harm had come to you.<page>Harm? O red maiden, have faith! No harm can come to us on this holy ascent! We only need to keep our gaze upwards.<page>Isn’t this all so terribly grand? The great stone steps, the winds lifting us up like the voices of a choir, and just beyond it all is our pilgrimage’s end. The great Citadel at last!
original_zh_text: 嗯？红衣姑娘！我正在找地方歇脚，这驿站多舒适啊！<hpage>此处很凶险，我担心你遭遇不测。<page>不测？要对圣途有信心！只要仰望圣堡，灾祸自会远离！<page>这景象多壮丽啊！巨大石阶，乘着风声，宛如圣歌，终点就在眼前了！
translated_text: What's it? What is it? Hello, I am looking for a place to rest a tired body, and found this comfortable resort!<hpage>This land is dangerous. I thought it could hurt. "<page>Accuse me? My red son, believe me! In this sacred Ascension, we will do nothing! We should be vigilant.<page>Isn't that too big? After a huge stone step, which the wind lifts us up like the sound of a bell, our pilgrimage is over.
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요?뭐야?안녕하세요, 나는 피곤한 몸을 휴식 할 장소를 찾고 있으며이 편안한 리조트를 찾았습니다!<hpage>이 땅은 위험하다.나는 그것이 상처를 줄 수 있다고 생각했다. "<page>날 비난해? "내 붉은 아들아, 날 믿어!이 거룩한 승천에서 우리는 아무것도하지 않을 것입니다!우리는 조심해야 한다.<page>그건 너무 크지 않니?바람이 종소리처럼 우리를 들어 올리는 거대한 돌 계단을 지나 우리의 순례는 끝났습니다.

translated_text: <hpage>A small pilgrim? Are you asleep?

original_en_text: She and her like have red-rocky shells to protect their softnesses. Inside is very sweet! Very hard to crack them open though, so is best to wait. Is always best to wait!
original_zh_text: 它们用红岩壳保护内部的软肉。里面超甜！但壳太难撬，最好等自然腐烂！
translated_text: She and her companions had a red rocky shell to protect the sweetness.The inside is sweet.But it is better to wait, because they are difficult to break.
secondary_translated_text: 그녀와 그녀의 동반자는 달콤함을 보호하기 위해 붉은 바위 껍질을 가지고있다. 내부는 달콤하다. 그러나 그것은 깨지기 어렵기 때문에 기다리는 것이 낫다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Gladly, Shakra. Upon this stone, let us test our shells.
original_zh_text: <hpage>求之不得。就在此石台上一较高下吧。
translated_text: <hpage>I'm very happy for you, Shakira. With this stone, let's try the shell.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 당신을 위해 매우 행복합니다, 샤키라.이 돌로, 껍질을 한번 해보자.

original_en_text: Well met, sister. Though the beastly Citadel has finally been slain, still the lands caught beneath it suffer!<page>The evils long done by that cursed place have sunk into the kingdom’s very foundations, and now they rise up as a black sickness.<hpage>This darkness, it is a curse deadlier than the Haunting... a force from far below that will consume all if given the opportunity.<page>Hmm... Just so! And while wickedness still stalks these lands, our hornlance shall not rest!
original_zh_text: 又见面了，姐妹。圣堡祸根虽除，但下面的土地还在遭罪！<page>诅咒早已根植在纺络的各处，现在化作黑暗冒了出来。<hpage>这黑暗远比丝咒致命……来自最深的邪恶，一有机会就会吞噬一切。<page>哼……果然！只要邪恶还没除净，我们的长枪就放不下！
translated_text: The beast 's castle has finally fallen, but the earth below is still suffering!<page>The evil of this cursed land, long buried in the foundations of the kingdom, spreads like a black disease.<hpage>This darkness is a more deadly curse than a ghost, a force that comes from below and encompasses everything if you have the chance.<page>Uh, uh, uh, uh... Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! Our evil will not end until evil covers this earth.
secondary_translated_text: 짐승의 성은 마침내 무너졌지만, 땅은 여전히 고통을 겪고 있습니다!<page>이 저주받은 땅의 악은 오랫동안 왕국의 기초에 묻혀 있었고, 검은 질병처럼 퍼졌습니다.<hpage>이 어둠은 유령보다 더 치명적인 저주이며, 아래에서 와서 기회가 있다면 모든 것을 포괄하는 힘입니다.<page>어, 어, 어, 어...아, 그래!아, 네!우리의 악은 이 땅을 덮을 때까지 끝나지 않을 것이다.

original_en_text: Sturdy gaaaaa-aaate, I don’t ask you break or beee-eeend,<br>Just open a little for me, and my tall maiden frieeee-eeend!
original_zh_text: 骨门呀骨门，不求你折断，<br>只要开条缝让咱过，我和高个姑娘谢你恩典！
translated_text: I don't want to break you, I don't want to beat you.<br>Open it for me and my great virgin friend!
secondary_translated_text: 난 널 부러뜨리고 싶지 않아, 널 때리고 싶지 않아.<br>나와 나의 위대한 처녀 친구를 위해 그것을 열어!

original_en_text: These waters, at land’s edge... and the shrine atop... our furtive escape... our brief retreat from rule...<page>So many moments spent simple... joyful... free...
original_zh_text: 这片水岸……我们暂时远离王权的休憩……<page>那些简单……快乐……自由的时光……
translated_text: These waters are at the ends of the earth. There is also a priest. And we went a little further, we went a little further than the rules.<page>They are often simple: freedom and joy.
secondary_translated_text: 이 물들은 지구 끝에 있다.목사님도 있습니다.그리고 우리는 조금 더 나아가서, 규칙보다 조금 더 나아가서<page>그들은 종종 간단합니다 : 자유와 기쁨.

original_en_text: What say you, sister? Shall we join together in valiant combat?
translated_text: Sister, what did I say? Should we fight courageously?
secondary_translated_text: 언니, 내가 뭐라고 했지?우리는 용감하게 싸워야 하는가?

original_en_text: Oh red maiden, sorry to have lured you into such danger!<page>And those poor bugs, bewitched by the thread. No sin could possibly warrant such a fate...<hpage>Your pity is not misplaced, but better suited for another time. For now, you should look to your own care.<page>Ah... yes. I should get these healing supplies back to the pilgrims’ settlement above. My brothers and sisters have waited long enough.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，对不起把你卷进来！<page>那些被丝线控制的同伴……他们犯了什么错……<hpage>有怜悯之心固然好，但要先顾好自己。<page>对……我得把药送回聚落。他们等太久了。
translated_text: "Oh, red girl, I 'm so sorry that I put you in a dangerous situation.<page>People obsessed with a criminal thread do not guarantee such a fate.<hpage>His mercy is not bad, but next time it will be better.Now he needs to take care of himself.<page>¡Oh, yeah! Yes, the healing materials must be delivered back to the pilgrim colony above.My brothers and sisters have been waiting for a long time.
secondary_translated_text: "오, 붉은 아가씨, 당신을 위험한 상황에 빠뜨리게 해서 정말 죄송합니다.<page>범죄에 집착하는 사람들은 그런 운명을 보장하지 않는다.<hpage>그의 자비는 나쁘지 않지만 다음 번에는 더 좋을 것이다. 이제 그는 자신을 돌봐야 한다.<page>오, 그래!네, 치유 재료는 꼭 위의 순례 식민지에 돌려 보내야 합니다. 형제 자매들이 오랫동안 기다려왔습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>The parasite writhing within my shell has a violent aversion to the void. <hpage>Despite the protection granted by the Everbloom, even now I can feel those wretched roots preventing my descent.<hpage>If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我壳里的寄生物极度抗拒虚空。<hpage>虽然有永绽花保护，但那些根须还是在阻止我下潜。<hpage>要斩断诅咒，得先除掉体内这玩意。
translated_text: <hpage>Parasites walked my shell, and I had a strong aversion to vacuum.<hpage>Despite the protection of the eternal color, I still feel the poor roots that are preventing my decline. "<hpage>If I am going to jump and cut this land off from the curse of the black line, then first I must find a way to drive out the invaders.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>기생충이 내 껍질을 걸어 다니고, 나는 진공을 싫어했다.<hpage>영원한 색의 보호에도 불구하고, 나는 여전히 내 쇠퇴를 막고있는 가난한 뿌리를 느낍니다. "<hpage>만약 내가 뛰어넘어 이 땅을 검은 선의 저주로부터 차단하려 한다면, 먼저 침략자들을 쫓아내는 방법을 찾아야 한다.

original_en_text: Many foes await us. Shall we duel with one another before moving on?
original_zh_text: 前方有不少恶战等着，先来场热身赛？
translated_text: There are many enemies waiting for us, should we fight and move forward?
secondary_translated_text: 많은 적들이 우리를 기다리고 있는데, 우리는 싸우고 앞으로 나아가야 하는가?

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Nuu. You have travelled far from your lodgings, I was not expecting to meet you in these lowlands.<page>Oh, hello again miss grown-up! Yes, Nuu is not the fastest, but she goes great distances to follow the scent of learnings.<page>And look what Nuu has found! A great big beast, cracked open and broken apart! There is much to learn from him, so Nuu will savour it all slowly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，努努。你跑得真远，没想到在低地遇见你。<page>大姐姐！努努虽然腿短，但跟着知识气味能走超远！<page>看努努发现了什么！这个被肢解的大家伙！慢慢研究肯定能学到好多！
translated_text: <hpage>You are far from where you live, and I did not expect to meet you in this low land.<page>- Yes, Well is not the fastest, but she has come a long way not to keep up with the breath of learning.<page>The giant beast is dismembered. She has so much to learn that Nu will slowly taste it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>너는 네가 사는 곳에서 멀리 떨어져 있어 이 낮은 땅에서 너를 만날 줄은 몰랐다.<page>- 네, 웰은 가장 빠르지는 않지만, 그녀는 학습의 호흡을 따라 잡지 못하기 위해 먼 길을 왔습니다.<page>거대한 짐승이 썩어 버렸다.그녀는 배울 것이 너무 많아서 Nu 는 천천히 그것을 맛볼 것입니다.

original_en_text: With this quill, you can add any new areas you discover to the maps that you own. We pluck these quills from Golpeni hunted by my tribe. Their hollowed shafts make the perfect charting tool.
original_zh_text: 用这羽毛笔能把新发现的区域补到地图上。羽毛是从我们部落猎的高尔佩尼鸟身上拔的，中空的羽管最适合拿来绘图。
translated_text: With this pen, you can add a new zone to the map, which you will discover it belongs to. I took a pen from the Herpanics who hunted in my tribe. The cable wire is a great drawing tool.
secondary_translated_text: 이 펜을 사용하여 지도에 새 구역을 추가할 수 있으며, 이 구역이 속한 구역을 발견할 수 있습니다.내 부족에서 사냥을 하던 헤르파닉족에게서 펜을 가져왔다.케이블 와이어는 훌륭한 그리기 도구입니다.

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle, how far our wanderings take us! The cold air here bites through our shells as true as any blade. Warm yourself by my lantern while I call. <hpage>Pharloom is a land of harsh extremes. Perhaps that is, in part, why the pilgrims have a culture of testing themselves against it so fervently.<page>Perhaps. When I first encountered them, I had little respect for the weak, rag-bundled bugs. Too cowardly to even carry a weapon!<page>But... Dondakku. Sometimes we judge too quickly. There is a subtle strength to them, though it is difficult for me to truly understand it.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，咱们跑得真远！这里寒气刺骨，来灯笼边暖暖。<hpage>纺络环境真是极端，或许这也是朝圣者们测试信仰的一部分。<page>也许吧。当初觉得他们是群软蛋，连武器都不敢带！<page>但……咚嗒库！也算是我看走眼吧，他们有种我说不清的韧劲。
translated_text: How much our wanders have brought us, you needle-carrying children! Cold air passes through our sinks When we call, we warm ourselves with flashlights.<hpage>The Faroe Islands are a country of cruelty, which is perhaps one reason why pilgrims are eager to experience this culture.<page>Maybe when I first saw it, I didn't respect this weak, crawling insect.<page>More... Sometimes, judgments are too fast. He has subtle powers, but it is difficult to understand.
secondary_translated_text: 우리의 방랑이 우리에게 얼마나 많은 것을 가져왔는가, 바늘을 들고 다니는 아이들!차가운 공기가 우리의 싱크대를 통과합니다. 우리가 전화 할 때, 우리는 손전등으로 자신을 따뜻하게합니다.<hpage>페로 제도 (Faroe Islands) 는 잔인한 나라이며, 아마도 순례자들이 이 문화를 경험하기를 열망하는 한 가지 이유일 것입니다.<page>아마도 내가 처음 봤을 때, 나는 이 약하고 기어 다니는 곤충을 존경하지 않았을 것이다.<page>더 많은...때로는 판단이 너무 빠르기도 한다.그는 미묘한 힘을 가지고 있지만 이해하기가 어렵다.

original_en_text: Ahh, the caress of this warm water on my weary limbs is welcome indeed. As soothing as a psalm, haha!<page>Will you splishy-splash in the holy bath with me, red maiden? We can sing together to aid in our rejuvenation!
original_zh_text: 泡着热水澡真舒服！比唱圣歌还解乏，哈哈！<page>要和我一起泡吗？边泡边唱歌更解乏！
translated_text: This hot water touched my tired limbs. It 's very popular. Relax like a poem. "<page>A red girl, right? Do you want to take a holy bath with me? "Let 's sing together and help him recover!
secondary_translated_text: 이 뜨거운 물이 나의 지친 팔다리를 만졌다.매우 인기가 있다.시처럼 쉬어라. "<page>빨간 소녀, 그렇죠?나와 함께 거룩한 목욕을 하고 싶니? "우리 함께 노래를 부르고 회복을 돕자! "

original_en_text: Want yer clicky-clackies threaded nice and tight? Old Grindle will do it gladly, if you let ‘im snitch a few for hisself...
original_zh_text: 要把叮当响串稳当？格林德尔来帮你！抽点佣金就行！
translated_text: Do you want your relationship to be good and lasting? If you let him report directly to Old Grindel, he will be happy.
secondary_translated_text: 당신은 당신의 관계가 좋고 지속되기를 원합니까?만약 그가 올드 그린델에게 직접 보고하게 한다면, 그는 행복할 것이다.

original_en_text: D-do not judge me a doubter! The Citadel is a holy place indeed, resplendent and vast beyond my wildest hopes!<page>But yet... the grand halls ache with silence, and I see suffering in the shadows wherever I peer too deeply.<page>Fear, and pain... why were these things allowed into our paradise? Have my brothers and sisters not yet earned their holy reward?
original_zh_text: 别当我是叛信者！圣堡确实是圣地，比我想的还壮观！<page>可是……大殿里死气沉沉，角落里到处都藏着苦痛。<page>恐惧啊伤痛啊……为什么让这些脏东西进圣地？我们还不够虔诚吗？
translated_text: Don't think I'm a skeptic! This castle is truly a sacred place, magnificent and vast beyond my wild hopes!<page>More... The majestic hall suffered from silence, and no matter how far he looked, he could see the pain in the shadow.<page>Fear and sadness? Why is it allowed in our paradise? Have my brothers and sisters not received God 's reward yet?
secondary_translated_text: 내가 회의론자라고 생각하지 마라!이 성은 진정으로 신성한 장소, 웅장하고 광대 한 나의 야생 희망을 넘어!<page>더 많은...웅장한 홀은 침묵으로 고통받았고, 그가 아무리 멀리 보더라도 그림자 속에서 고통을 볼 수 있었다.<page>두려움과 슬픔?왜 낙원에서 허용되는가?나의 형제 자매들은 하나님의 상을 아직 받지 못했습니까?

original_en_text: ...Crossed weapons, sleeping of course, but shaped unlike any you’ve seen before...<page>...To travel underneath is one thing, but travelling up above may require a different sort of sight...<hpage>Sir Herald... It seems rare coincidence for us to meet in this distant land. Unless, perhaps, you followed me here?<page>...A path that meets itself is an ill portent indeed. Those who peer sideways know well enough...<page>
original_zh_text: ……崇山深谷，却非你所熟知的形态……<page>……穿行地底是一回事，但翱翔天际需另种眼界……<hpage>使者大人……在这偏远之地重逢，是巧合还是您尾随而来？<page>……道途相逢并非吉兆。小家伙还是别多嘴了……
translated_text: ... Sure, the crossover is designed for sleeping, but the shape is different from one you 've never seen before.<page>... Getting up is one thing, getting up is another.<hpage>Their meeting in a distant country seems an unusual coincidence, unless they come after me.<page>... Your path is a bad sign.Anyone who has seen it on the side knows it.<page>
secondary_translated_text: ...물론, 크로스오버는 잠을 잘 수 있도록 설계되었지만, 모양은 전에 본 적이없는 것과 다릅니다.<page>...일어서는 것은 한 가지이고, 일어서는 것은 또 다른 것이다.<hpage>먼 나라에서 만나는 것은 특이한 우연의 일치로 보인다. 그들이 나를 따라오지 않는 한 말이다.<page>...당신의 길은 나쁜 징조입니다. 옆에서 그것을 본 사람은 누구나 그것을 알고 있습니다.<page>

original_en_text: Nice little pair of rolly-rollies we got ‘ere. Sure to bring luck to any snitchin’ expedition...
translated_text: There is a small pleasant trailer. This will bring good luck in the adventures of the whistleblower.
secondary_translated_text: 작은 유쾌한 트레일러가 있습니다.이것은 고발자의 모험에 행운을 가져다 줄 것입니다.

original_en_text: ...The elements do not conspire against you. They have their own desires...<page>...When one spies a great peak, the natural inclination is to begin climbing...<page>...The little left-behind... you’ve decided, then? A companion for the journey...
original_zh_text: ……万物并非与你为敌，它们自有渴求……<page>……望见高峰，攀爬便是本能……<page>……那个被遗弃的小家伙……你决定带他同行了？……
translated_text: ... These things do not conspirate against you; they have their desires.<page>... When a person encounters a mountain, the tendency of nature is to start climbing.<page>...¿So what did you decide? The tourist company.
secondary_translated_text: ...이 모든 것들이 너희를 대적하여 음모를 꾸미지 아니하니, 그들은 그들의 욕망을 가지고 있다.<page>...사람이 산을 만나면 자연의 경향은 등반을 시작하는 것이다.<page>...¿그래서 당신은 무엇을 결정했나요?관광 회사.

original_en_text: <hpage>Feel guilt at your absence, sir, but know the end was inexorable, the outcome set, whether you remained or not.<page>Do not seek to console me, warrior... This memory is mine alone... I’ll not brook your brutish intrusion...<page>You who dare trespass this sacred chamber, ready yourself... to see us, and know us, Verdania’s rulers, together in our finest form...
original_zh_text: <hpage>无需为自己的缺席感到愧疚，结局早已注定，无关你的去留。<page>少来安慰我……战士……这是我的回忆……容不得莽夫插嘴……<page>擅闯圣殿者……准备见证翠庭国双王的最强形态吧！
translated_text: <hpage>I feel guilty for your absence, but whether you stay or not, the consequences are inevitable and fatal.<page>Don't comfort me, soldier. "These memories belong only to me, I cannot stand your barbaric aggression.<page>Be prepared for any intrusion into this sacred room.Look at us and get to know us, the leaders of Verdania with us in our best form.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>네가 결석한 것에 대해 죄책감을 느낀다. 하지만 네가 머물지 않든 그 결과는 불가피하고 치명적이다.<page>나를 위로하지 마라, 병사. "이 기억들은 오직 나만의 것이오, 나는 너의 야만적인 침략을 견딜 수 없다.<page>Be prepared for any intrusion into this sacred room. Look at us and get to know us, 베르다니아의 지도자들은 우리의 최고의 형태로 우리와 함께합니다.

original_en_text: If you choose to rest here, I will watch over you, Child Wielding Needle. These charts require long attention, and my own sleep is far off yet.
original_zh_text: 想休息的话，我给你放哨。我暂时不睡，还得多琢磨琢磨图纸。
translated_text: If you decide to rest here, I will take care of you.These pictures require a long attention, and my dream is still far away.
secondary_translated_text: 당신이 여기서 휴식을 취하기로 결정한다면, 나는 당신을 돌볼 것입니다. 이 사진들은 오랜주의를 기울여야하며, 내 꿈은 아직 멀다.

original_en_text: Beasty, beastly, big fat beast! Strong as a boulder, or a rock at least! Let’s sing together ‘til you’re released!<page>Oh! Look here red maiden, this poor creature is all tangled up in white bindings! Surely you know a song for unsticking such stickiness?<hpage>It will take a power greater than song to break these bindings, little one. In my current diminished state even I can not cut through them.<page>Well, worry not! If something is needed, the road will bring it to us!
original_zh_text: 大块头啊大块头，壮如磐石力无穷！与我合唱放你走！<page>红衣姑娘快看！这可怜家伙被白丝缠住了！你会解缚之歌吗？<hpage>这束缚并非歌唱能解。凭我现在的气力，也斩不断这些丝线。<page>不必担心！所需之物肯定就在圣途之上！
translated_text: The beast, the beast, the big, the big! Strong as a stone, or at least as strong as a stone. We will sing together until we are free.<page>Oh! Oh! Look, red girl, this poor creature is tied to a white rope. Do you know you can play this song?<hpage>It takes more strength than singing to break this slavery. Because of my weakness, I can't even cut them off.<page>It's okay, don't worry! If you need something, the road will give it to you.
secondary_translated_text: 야수, 야수, 큰, 큰!돌처럼 강하거나, 적어도 돌처럼 강하다.우리는 자유로울 때까지 함께 노래할 것이다.<page>오! 오!오! 오!보라, 붉은 소녀, 이 불쌍한 생물은 흰 줄에 묶여있다.이 노래를 연주할 수 있다는 것을 아십니까?<hpage>이 노예제도를 깨뜨리기 위해서는 노래보다 더 많은 힘이 필요하다.내 약점 때문에, 나는 그들을 잘라내지 못한다.<page>괜찮아, 걱정마!어떤 것이 필요하다면, 길은 당신에게 그것을 줄 것입니다.

translated_text: The clock in hand

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You abandoned the race? Surely it was only an error?<page>In the pursuit of speed all reason can ofttimes be lost, left in the wind as it were.<page>At least you seem recovered of your lapse. And surely you are eager now?<page>We must sprint on! Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 怎么中途退赛？肯定是失误了对吧？<page>专注追求速度经常会忘记思考。<page>看来你已经调整好了，继续吧？<page>让我们一起继续冲刺！
translated_text: That's a smart mistake! Did you give up the game? Isn't that just a mistake?<page>In the pursuit of speed, the whole mind tends to disappear, as if it were thrown into the wind.<page>At least he has recovered from his mistake. Do you really want it now?<page>You need to have a sprint. Let 's go together!
secondary_translated_text: 그건 현명한 실수야!당신은 게임을 포기했습니까?그건 그냥 실수였지?<page>속도를 추구하는 동안, 정신 전체가 바람에 던져진 것처럼 사라지는 경향이 있습니다.<page>적어도 그는 자신의 실수로부터 회복했다.지금 정말 원하는 거야?<page>당신은 스프린트를 해야 한다.우리 같이 가자!

translated_text: Sales of gasoline

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle. These are stale roads, ill-fitted for warriors such as ourselves.<page>There is fair combat here against the roach-beasts and their keepers, but the air is sickly and the water writhes with parasites.<hpage>This environment is harsh indeed, though life seems to adapt itself to many hardships. Do you believe your master travelled these roads?<page>I had thought not at first, but upon closer search I found the fragments of a trail winding through these fetid ruins.<page>Perhaps she saw something here that I did not? Her senses are often keen where mine are clouded.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘。这路太安稳了，配不上咱们战士。<page>打打蟑螂和饲者还行，但空气污浊，水里全是寄生虫。<hpage>环境糟糕，但生命总能适应。你觉得你的导师来过这儿？<page>本来觉得不会，结果在废墟里找到了些许踪迹。<page>难道她发现了什么我没注意到的东西？她的眼光总是比我毒辣。
translated_text: The streets are old and unfit for soldiers like us.<page>The fight with beetles and their guardians is fair, but the air is painful, and the water is full of parasites.<hpage>The environment is very harsh, but life seems to have adapted to many hardships.Do you think your teacher went down this path?<page>At first I didn't believe it, but when I looked carefully, I found a piece of road that winding through the smell of ruins.<page>Maybe I saw something I didn't see. Where my feelings are blind, yours are often sharp.
