secondary_translated_text: 거리는 낡아서 우리 같은 병사들에게는 적합하지 않다.<page>딱정벌레와 그들의 수호자와의 싸움은 공정하지만 공기는 고통스럽고 물은 기생충으로 가득합니다.<hpage>환경은 매우 가혹하지만, 생활은 많은 고난에 적응한 것 같다. 선생님이 이런 길을 가셨다고 생각하십니까?<page>처음에는 믿지도 못했지만, 자세히 살펴보니 폐허 냄새를 뚫고 구불구불한 길을 발견했다.<page>어쩌면 내가 보지 못한 것을 보았을지도 몰라.내 감정이 장님이라면, 네 감정은 종종 날카롭다.

original_en_text: Hold there, sister! A great beast stalks this land, swooping and screeching like an ill-mannered tyrant!<page>Zaza has been following the creature’s scent, and now I’m sure we’re almost upon it! We’re so close my whiskers are bristling!<page>Such a beast is worthy quarry for the valiant, aye? What say you, shall we hunt the creature together?
original_zh_text: 姐妹留步！附近藏着一只大家伙，俯冲尖啸，不好对付！<page>扎扎一路闻着它的味道呢，肯定就在附近！我的胡子都翘起来了！<page>那是个难得的好对手。怎么说，要不要联手干掉它？
translated_text: - "Stop doing this, sister. The giant beast ran down the ground, descending like a roaring and screaming tyrant!<page>Zaza is chasing the smell of this creature and of course there will be soon! We 're so close, I 'm growing a beard!<page>Such a beast is worth killing by a brave man, isn't it? Isn't that so? What do you think of hunting these animals?
secondary_translated_text: - "그건 그만해, 언니.그 거대한 짐승은 땅으로 뛰어내리고, 으르렁거리고 비명을 지르는 폭군처럼 내려갔다!<page>Zaza 는이 생물의 냄새를 쫓고 있으며 물론 곧있을 것입니다!우리는 너무 가까워서, 나는 수염을 자르고있다!<page>그런 짐승은 용감한 사람이 죽일 만한 가치가 있지 않나요?그렇죠?이 동물들을 사냥하는 것에 대해 어떻게 생각하는가?

original_en_text: Many of Pharloom’s bugs have useful equipment and items to trade. It would do you well to keep track of their locations with this pin.<br><br>These pins will mark vendors on your map.
original_zh_text: 达罗穆有很多虫带着好货，最好记下他们的位置。<br><br>这些图钉能够标记商贩位置。
translated_text: Many of the Farlomer insects have useful equipment and items.It is good to keep track of the situation with the help of this irine.<br><br>These spines indicate the sellers on the map.
secondary_translated_text: 많은 Farlomer 곤충은 유용한 장비와 항목을 가지고 있습니다. 이 아이린의 도움으로 상황을 추적하는 것이 좋습니다.<br><br>이 가시가 지도에 있는 판매자를 나타냅니다.

original_en_text: Basic tool’o the job, here. Throw your big needle and scratch shinies straight off your target’s shell!
original_zh_text: 干我们这行的基础道具，直接从目标身上把宝贝钩下来！
translated_text: Shoot your big needle and capture the light that shines directly from the lens shell!
secondary_translated_text: 큰 바늘을 쏘고 렌즈 쉘에서 직접 빛나는 빛을 캡처하십시오!

translated_text: Map of Mos

original_en_text: ...Oh. Wyrm child. No surprise it’s you who meets me here.<page>Following me are you? Or calling me? It is true I would not have sought the lands below if not for your grand actions within them.<page>But now, having journeyed their breadth, what singular sights I beheld... Flaming lakes, tangled woods, caves consumed by sand and frost...<page>Remarkable things all, though given their void claimed state it seems you and I may be the last to hold those memories.<hpage>I cannot allow that outcome, Herald. I act now to save that place, both for myself and for those bugs still alive within.<hpage>As one who has seen so much, tell me simply, do you believe my efforts in vain?<page>Me? Certainly you can ask, but I cannot provide good answer. I’ve no mind for outcomes. Always my vision is too clouded by the present.<page>Only the journey... the now. For myself, that is the purpose, and as far as my sight can see.<page>If any other could come to understand that state, Wyrm child, I suspect it may be you... <page>Though maybe not yet, not this present, hmmm? Maybe in a future far, when your actions might hail me so again?<page>Alas, from these quaking caves it is past time I made my swift exit. Ours each may be long and winding roads, but I hope you too come to know the many joys upon the path...
original_zh_text: ……哦。沃姆后裔。在此相遇倒也不意外。<page>尾随还是召唤？若非你在地底闹出大动静，我本不会来此。<page>如今游历四方，得见何等奇景……熔岩湖、缠藤林、冰封沙穴……<page>叹为观止，然虚空侵蚀之下，唯你我留存此间记忆。<hpage>我无法坐视，使者大人。此刻行动既为自救，也为庇佑残存生灵。<hpage>作为见证者，请您直言相告，我等努力是否为徒劳？<page>问我？答不上来。未来迷雾重重，我目光唯见当下。<page>唯有旅程……此时此刻。于我而言，此即意义，也即我目之能视。<page>沃姆之女，或许唯你能懂此心境……<page>也许尚非此时？待你功成之日再唤我来？<page>唉，该离开这震颤洞穴。前路漫漫，愿你亦能领略沿途风光……
translated_text: ...¡Oh, the Devil! No wonder we are here.<page>Are you following me? Or you call me? If it were not for your wonders on earth, I would not seek the earth.<page>But now, when I walk through its vast world, I see strange landscapes: warm lakes, intertwined forests, caves, wrapped in sand and ice.<page>All of these amazing things, despite your claim to be in a state of emptiness, it seems to me that you and I are probably the last people to have such memories.<hpage>I 'm doing this now to save this place, for me and for the insects that still live there.<hpage>Do you think that my efforts as a man of knowledge have been in vain?<page>What am I doing? You can ask questions, but you can't give a good answer.No matter what the outcome is.Since then my vision has always been wrong.<page>Just one trip, as far as I know, that 's the goal.<page>If anyone can understand this condition, son of Veron, I suspect it is you.<page>Maybe not yet, but it 's not a gift, right? Really? Perhaps in the distant future, his actions will honor me again. "<page>It 's time for a quick run out of these terrifying caves.The path can be long and winding, but I hope you 'll appreciate the fun.
secondary_translated_text: ...¡오, 악마!우리가 여기에 있는 것은 놀랄 일이 아니다.<page>날 따라오세요?아니면 날 부르니?만일 지상에 있는 당신들의 기적이 아니었다면, 내가 땅을 찾지 않았을 것이다.<page>하지만 이제, 그 광대한 세계를 걸을 때, 나는 이상한 풍경을 본다: 따뜻한 호수, 얽혀있는 숲, 동굴, 모래와 얼음으로 둘러싸여.<page>이 모든 놀라운 일들에도 불구하고, 당신이 공허한 상태에 있다고 주장하는 것에도 불구하고, 당신과 나는 아마도 그러한 추억을 가진 마지막 사람들 인 것 같습니다.<hpage>저는 지금 이 곳을 구하기 위해 하고 있습니다. 저를 위해서요. 그리고 아직도 그곳에 살고 있는 곤충들을 위해서요.<hpage>너는 내가 지식인으로서의 노력이 헛된 것이라고 생각하느냐?<page>내가 뭐하는거야?질문을 해도 좋은 답은 못해. 결과가 어떻든 간에 그 이후로 내 비전은 항상 틀렸다.<page>단 한 번의 여행, 내가 아는 한, 그게 목표다.<page>베론의 아들아, 이 상태를 이해할 수 있는 사람이 있다면, 나는 그 사람이 너라고 의심한다.<page>아직은 아닐 수도 있지만, 선물은 아니죠?진짜?어쩌면 먼 미래에 그의 행동이 다시 나를 존경할 것이다. "<page>이 무서운 동굴에서 빠른 달리기를 할 시간입니다. 길고 구불구불이 될 수 있지만 재미를 즐기기를 바랍니다.

original_en_text: You would fight alone, sister? You would be undefeatable with me by your side! And Zaza also! You need only ask, and our hornlance would be yours.
original_zh_text: 你想单打独斗？有我和扎扎助阵肯定能百战百胜！需要帮忙就开口，我们的长枪自会跟上！
translated_text: Sister, are you lonely? If I 'm with you, you 'll be invincible. Zaza. Our hatred is yours, and our hatred is yours.
secondary_translated_text: 언니, 외롭니?내가 너와 함께 있다면 너는 무적일 것이다.자자자우리의 미움은 당신의 것이고, 우리의 미움은 당신의 것이다.

original_en_text: ...Do they realise it would only be the beginning? If they cleave themselves free, they would need to find their way anew...
original_zh_text: ……他们可知这只是开端？即使能得解脱，众生仍需寻觅新途……
translated_text: ...¿Do you realize that this is just the beginning? If they have been freed from slavery, they must find their way back.
secondary_translated_text: ...¿이것이 단지 시작일 뿐이라는 것을 깨닫는가?그들이 노예제도에서 해방되었다면, 그들은 반드시 돌아갈 길을 찾아야 한다.

original_en_text: My hopes go with you, red maiden. They will follow you into the deepest darkness, and beyond!
original_zh_text: 我的希望与您同在，红衣姑娘。它将随您深入至暗，直至彼岸！
translated_text: "My hope is with you, red girl, they will follow you into the depths of darkness, even more.
secondary_translated_text: "내 희망은 너와 함께 있어, 붉은 소녀여, 그들은 너를 따라 어둠의 깊은 곳으로 갈 것이다.

original_en_text: Fierce red-shells nest across these wide caverns. Battle with them is most intense. Impressive are the warriors of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪占满荒野洞穴，它们是个好对手。这里的生物也比髓骨地更凶残。
translated_text: The fire-red shells make their nests in wide caves. The fight with them is fierce. The soldiers of Pharaoh were impressive.
secondary_translated_text: 불빛 껍질은 넓은 동굴에 둥지를 낸다.그들과의 싸움은 치열하다.파라오의 군인들은 매우 인상적이었습니다.

translated_text: Map of the Deep Dock.

original_en_text: <hpage>Even if only your shadow remains, to release your mother’s grip my blade would see it slain.<page>Then why hold, even this moment? Surely terror hasn’t suddenly claimed your hardened heart?<page>Take the final plunge, spider. Join us in my drowning palace, and let oblivion swallow us all.<hpage>Oblivion may take you, child. My own life, I shall not sacrifice.<hpage>I have survived the fury of your land. I have borne its barbs and its blades, and I have seen wonder behind its dangers.<hpage>But always, child, I remain a daughter of Hallownest. And the void below all things, that darkness I will fear no longer...
original_zh_text: <hpage>就算你只剩一道暗影，我也会斩断你母亲的丝线。<page>那还犹豫什么？难道你害怕了？<page>跳下来啊，小蜘蛛！和我一同沉溺，让虚无吞噬我们！<hpage>虚无或许能吞噬你，但我绝不献祭自己。<hpage>我熬过了纺络的无数荆棘，也在危机中见证过奇迹。<hpage>但我永远是圣巢之女。对万物之底的虚空……再无畏惧！
translated_text: <hpage>Even if the shadow remains, my sword will slay it and free my mother 's slavery.<page>Why insist now? Can fear suddenly remove your cold heart?<page>Join me in my sunken palace so that oblivion may engulf us.<hpage>My son, you may forget my life, I will not sacrifice it. "<hpage>I have endured the wrath of your people; I have endured their thorns and their blades, and I have seen the wonder behind their dangers.<hpage>But forever, my son, I am the daughter of Kenneth. Emptiness under all things, I will no longer be afraid of the dark.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>그림자가 남아있더라도 내 칼은 그것을 죽이고 내 어머니의 노예를 해방시킬 것이다.<page>왜 지금 고집하는가?두려움은 갑자기 차가운 마음을 제거 할 수 있습니까?<page>내 침몰한 궁전에서 나와 함께 하여 잊혀질 수 있도록.<hpage>"내 아들아, 너는 내 생명을 잊어도, 내가 희생하지 않을 것이다. "<hpage>내가 주의 백성의 진노를 견디며 그들의 가시와 칼을 견디며 그들의 위험 뒤에 있는 기이한 것을 보았나이다. #<hpage>그러나 영원히 내 아들아, 나는 케네스의 딸이다.모든 것 아래의 공허함, 나는 더 이상 어둠을 두려워하지 않을 것이다.

original_en_text: Oooh! Greedy are you? Mean to poor li’l snitchbugs like us? Won’t survive out there without our secrets, oh no no!
original_zh_text: 小气鬼！欺负老实虫？没我们的秘密帮衬你在外头活不过三天！
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Are you a guru? Is that bad for a journalist like me? I cannot live without a secret.
secondary_translated_text: 오! 오!오! 오!당신은 구루입니까?저 같은 기자에게는 그런 게 나쁜가?나는 비밀 없이 살 수 없다.

original_en_text: Our last race was grand, yes? But I see now I set too mild a challenge for one as spritely as yourself!<page>I prepared only to race, but you arrived bringing destiny! In you my wish may finally be granted, the barriers of speed broken wide!<page>Are you prepared nimble bug? The time is upon us. The final test for the swift and spry!
original_zh_text: 上回比赛还不错吧？但我还是低估你了！<page>原本只想跑个痛快，但你说不定能实现我突破速度极限的愿望！<page>灵巧的虫子，时候到了！准备好突破速度的桎梏了吗？
translated_text: The last game was fantastic, right? Is that not true? However, I found that the challenge I proposed was too modest for an energetic person like you.<page>I was preparing for the race, but they brought me their fate! In you my wish was fulfilled, and the wall of speed was broken.<page>Are You Ready? It was time for the final test.
secondary_translated_text: 마지막 경기 정말 멋지죠?그게 사실이 아니야?하지만, 내가 제안한 도전은 당신처럼 활기찬 사람에게는 너무 겸손하다는 것을 알게되었습니다.<page>나는 경주를 준비하고 있었는데, 그들은 나에게 그들의 운명을 가져왔다!당신 안에서 나의 소원이 이루어졌고, 속도의 벽이 깨졌다.<page>준비됐어요?이제 마지막 시험을 볼 시간이었다.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up has hunted much, so soon is time for Nuu to venture out, she thinks. Keep your sights keen, for to meet in the wilds would be a delight!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐这么能干，努努也该出门探险了！期待在荒野偶遇哦！
translated_text: He believes that both adults and young women are already hunting a lot, so now it's time to go on an adventure.Keep your eyes open, it'll be fun to find him in the wild!
secondary_translated_text: 그는 성인과 젊은 여성 모두 이미 많은 사냥을 믿고, 그래서 지금은 모험에 갈 시간입니다. 눈을 뜨고, 야생에서 그를 발견하는 재미있을 것입니다!

original_en_text: O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!<hpage>Are you too a prisoner here, small bug? If we ally our efforts, escape could be made that much easier.<page>Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! Just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！锁住了吧？真可怜！<hpage>又见面了，小毛贼。你也被关起来了？我们联手的话，越狱容易得多。<page>哦嚯嚯！想得美，监狱哪有盟友！你撞墙玩去吧，我找宝贝去咯！
translated_text: - Oh, oh! They seem to be a bit stuck. What a shame!<hpage>"Bug, you know? - Are you a prisoner here? Together, they make it easier to escape.<page>What's it? Are you kidding with me? We have no allies in prison. When I went to smell, you hit the wall!
secondary_translated_text: - 오, 오!그들은 조금 얽힌 것 같다.얼마나 부끄러운 일인가!<hpage>"버그, 아시죠? - 당신은 여기서 죄수입니까?함께, 그들은 탈출을 더 쉽게 만듭니다.<page>뭐예요?농담하는 거야?우리는 감옥에서 동맹국이 없다.내가 냄새를 맡으러 갔을 때, 넌 벽에 부딪혔어!

original_en_text: A scroll detailing the scents and tastes of Pharloom’s various bugs and beasts.
original_zh_text: 这本册子记录着纺络虫兽的气味与口感。
translated_text: A scroll describing the smell and taste of various insects and animals in the autumn.
secondary_translated_text: 가을에 다양한 곤충과 동물의 냄새와 맛을 묘사하는 두루마리.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up! Nuu had fear that the awful rumblings of the world or sticky black threads had snatched you away from her!<hpage>I have survived, Nuu, and shall fight on while my strength remains.<hpage>The kingdom has grown darkly dangerous, but this hearth-home seems to still provide some safety. I suggest you remain here for now.<page>Of course! Nuu shall stay inside. The sickening sense of those twisted threads has spoilt the joy of my venturings.<page>You though, miss grown-up... is now not the perfect time to fully complete our journal?<page>The world-rumblings will surely have scared up many creatures from their hiding places! So go and hunt, and show sweet Nuu what you learn!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！还以为你被地震或黑灾吃掉啦！<hpage>就差一点，不过我没事。<hpage>外面愈发混乱，但这还算安全。你暂时别出去。<page>努努才不出去！那些扭曲的丝线太讨厌了，毁了探险的兴致！<page>但大姐姐……现在不正是完善记录的好时机？<page>地震肯定把怪物都吓出洞了！快去打猎给努努开眼界吧！
translated_text: Your Majesty, Madame! He 's afraid that the terrible noise of the world and the black lines on his collar will push him away from her!<hpage>I am alive and I will fight as long as I have strength.<hpage>The kingdom became more dangerous, but the chimney still seemed to offer safety. I recommend you stay here for a while.<page>Yes, no! The unpleasant feeling of distorted lines spoiled the pleasure of the adventure.<page>Isn't this the best time to write a journal?<page>The end of the world certainly scares many beings, and they will not be able to hide! So, go hunting and show beautiful Noo what you have learned!
secondary_translated_text: 폐하, 마담!그는 세상의 끔찍한 소음과 목걸이에 검은 선이 그를 그녀에게서 멀어지게 두려워!<hpage>나는 살아 있고, 힘이 있는 한 싸울 것이다.<hpage>왕국은 더 위험해졌지만, 굴뚝은 여전히 안전을 제공하는 것처럼 보였습니다.나는 당신이 잠시 여기에 머물 것을 추천합니다.<page>그래, 안돼!왜곡된 선의 불쾌한 느낌은 모험의 즐거움을 망쳤다.<page>저널을 쓰기에 가장 좋은 시기 아닌가?<page>세상 종말은 실로 많은 존재들을 두려워하며, 그들은 숨을 수 없을 것이다.그래서, 사냥에 가서 당신이 배운 아름다운 Noo 를 보여주세요!

original_en_text: Why spurn a little duel, sister? Surely it would put us in good stead for the trials ahead!<hpage>If we were to duel it would doubtless be illuminating. Unfortunately, I lack the time for such frivolity. Farewell, sirs.
original_zh_text: 干嘛拒绝呢，切磋下嘛！就当战前热身！<hpage>切磋的好处……对你更多。我没空陪你玩，告辞。
translated_text: Why give up on a little fight? This will help in future tests.<hpage>If you are going to fight it, it will be very exciting. Unfortunately, we do not have time to discuss such a topic. Goodbye, gentlemen.
secondary_translated_text: 왜 약간의 싸움을 포기하는가?이것은 미래의 테스트에 도움이 될 것입니다.<hpage>당신이 그것을 싸우고 싶다면, 그것은 매우 흥미 진진해질 것입니다.안타깝게도, 우리는 그런 주제에 대해 논의할 시간이 없다.안녕히 계세요, 신사님.

original_en_text: <hpage>Cowards. Here you hide, even as you cause your own land’s demise.
original_zh_text: <hpage>懦夫。你们亲手葬送自己的土地，却躲在此处。
translated_text: <hpage>Cowards, even if they are destroying their land, hide here.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>겁쟁이들은 자기 땅을 파괴하고 있더라도 여기 숨어 있다.

original_en_text: Ka, va! Your shell is ridden with those gruesome maggots. It was a foolish choice of yours to swim in their sickly pools.<hpage>This was by no means desired, Shakra. For now, I think it best you remain at limb’s length. <hpage>I shall not abide this infestation long. By Silk or by rest I shall soon see myself cleansed.
original_zh_text: 咔呀！你的壳上爬满了恶心的蛆虫。在那些毒水池子里游泳真是太蠢了。<hpage>我也不想这样，沙克拉。你最好离远点。<hpage>我不会让这些蛆虫待太久的，靠灵丝或休整自会清除。
translated_text: Hold on, wow! Its shell is full of terrible worms. Swimming in the pool is a stupid choice.<hpage>That 's not what I want, Shakira. Now it 's best to keep some distance.<hpage>I can't stand this aggression for long. Whether there will be a silk or rest, it will be cleared immediately.
secondary_translated_text: 잠깐만요, 와우!그것의 껍질은 끔찍한 벌레로 가득 차 있다.수영장에서 수영하는 것은 어리석은 선택입니다.<hpage>그건 내가 원하는 것이 아니야, 샤키라.지금은 좀 거리를 두는 게 좋을 것 같다.<hpage>나는 이 공격에 오래 견딜 수 없다.실크가 있든 쉬든 즉시 제거됩니다.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You seem to have lost your way upon the course. Surely it was only an error? You already seem recovered of your lapse.<page>You are eager to run again, yes, yes? Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 看来你迷路了，肯定是小失误！<page>调整好了？那就再比一次吧！
translated_text: That's a smart mistake! I feel like I 've lost myself on the way. Isn't it just a mistake? He seems to have recovered from his mistake.<page>You want to run again, right? Let's Go Together!
secondary_translated_text: 그건 현명한 실수야!나는 길을 잃어 버린 것 같다.그건 그냥 실수였지?그는 자신의 실수에서 회복한 것 같다.<page>다시 뛰고 싶어?같이 가자!

original_en_text: ...One can visit the past, but then memories become contradictory...<page>...When the call rings out again, will you let your previous actions cloud your vision?<page>...By claw, by voice... History always rises to meet us...
original_zh_text: ……即便往昔可以重访，但记忆终将悖逆……<page>……当唤声再起，你会让昔日的抉择蒙蔽双眼么？<page>……以爪为刃，以声为引……历史永远不会等候我们……
translated_text: ... People can look back, but their memories are contradictory.<page>... When the phone rings again, will you be deceived by your past actions?<page>... Through claws, through sound, history always rises up and welcomes us.
secondary_translated_text: ...사람들은 되돌아 볼 수 있지만, 그들의 기억은 모순된다.<page>...전화가 다시 울릴 때, 과거의 행동에 속았습니까?<page>...발톱을 통해, 소리를 통해, 역사는 항상 일어나 우리를 환영합니다.

original_en_text: Oooh, ma. Miss grown-up, you deny poor Nuu? So sour!<page>Think of all the delectable learnings can we dig out of the creatures living here!
original_zh_text: 哎呀，大姐姐拒绝努努？好狠心！<page>想想能从这些生物身上挖出多少美味的知识啊！
translated_text: Oh, mother! Do you reject the poor? Too much acid.<page>Think of some interesting things you can learn from the creatures that live here!
secondary_translated_text: 오, 어머니!당신은 가난한 사람을 거부합니까?너무 많은 산성.<page>여기에 사는 생물들로부터 배울 수 있는 몇 가지 흥미로운 것들을 생각해보십시오!

translated_text: Phase diagram of explosion

original_en_text: But wait! Before you depart. Your exceptional skill requires an equally fine reward!<page>This shining shard of ancient mask is yours! Take it. Cherish it. And know, you shall forever have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 等等，临走前再送个配得上你的宝贝！<page>这块远古面甲碎片归你了！谢谢你，希望你永远铭记这场较量！
translated_text: But wait! Great abilities need great rewards before they disappear.<page>The mask is yours. Accept it, you know. It worries me. I will always be grateful.
secondary_translated_text: 그러나 기다려!위대한 능력은 사라지기 전에 큰 보상이 필요하다.<page>마스크는 당신의 것입니다.그것을 받아 들여야 한다, 알다시피.그것은 나를 걱정하고, 나는 항상 감사할 것이다.

original_en_text: This is a fine shiny-shiny, ain’t it? Those dirty old raggedies like to carry these around, and we like to snitch ‘em away when we can! O-ho-ho!
original_zh_text: 亮晶晶的小玩意！那些破烂朝圣者喜欢带这个，就从他们身上顺的！哦嚯嚯！
translated_text: The old dirty garbage loves to wear them and wants to condemn them as much as possible! - Oh, oh!
secondary_translated_text: 오래된 더러운 쓰레기는 그들을 착용하는 것을 좋아하고 가능한 한 그들을 비난하고 싶어! - 오, 오!

original_en_text: Ooooh ma, you make Nuu so happy! Hunt down the creatures of this land, and record them in this scroll!
original_zh_text: 哇大姐姐你真好！猎杀这里的生物，把见闻记在本子上！
translated_text: Mother, you have made us happy. Watch how it happens on earth and write it down in this book.
secondary_translated_text: 어머니, 당신은 우리를 행복하게 해주셨습니다.지구에서 일어나는 일을 보고 이 책에 기록하라.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings Shakra, in these drifts consumed by crust and sand.<hpage>These caverns have returned to nature, but I see evidence of bold structures buried throughout.<page>The shells of their builders rest in a tower above. A grand tribe they seemed, and strong fighters I’m sure. Alas, they exist now only as hardened husks.<page>Lament, Child Wielding Needle! We lived too late to match their claws.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。这里已被沙岩吞没了。<hpage>洞穴虽然复归原貌，但岩层里似乎埋着宏伟建筑。<page>建造者的尸壳堆在上面的塔里呢。当年肯定是强盛部落，也有不少勇士。可惜都只剩下空壳了。<page>可惜啊，使针的小姑娘，我们生不逢时，无缘与他们较量。
translated_text: <hpage>In these swimmers, absorbed by the crust and sand, there is a beautiful salute to the Sacchiare.<hpage>The cave has returned to nature, but we were able to see evidence of bold structures hidden throughout the cave.<page>The architect 's shrine was on top of the tower. They look like a great tribe, and I think they are strong warriors. "Now it exists as a mere shell.<page>Poor needles, it 's too late for nails.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>지각과 모래에 흡수 된이 수영 선수들 사이에서 Sacchiare 에 대한 아름다운 경례가 있습니다.<hpage>동굴은 자연으로 돌아 왔지만, 우리는 동굴 전체에 숨겨진 대담한 구조물의 증거를 볼 수있었습니다.<page>건축가의 신사는 탑 꼭대기에 있었다.그들은 위대한 부족처럼 보이며, 나는 그들이 강한 전사라고 생각한다. "지금은 그저 껍질처럼 존재합니다.<page>불쌍한 바늘, 손톱에 너무 늦었다.

original_en_text: Don’t despair, pilgrim frieeeee-eeend,<br>Lift your sight and raise your voice!<br>Have no fear, pilgrim truuuuu-uuuuue,<br>Believing is a happy choice!<page>Hoy there! Aren’t these fields marvellous? And above us are the bountiful moors, where every pilgrim can fill their belly!<hpage>These hot fields are a wonder indeed, but hunters prowl the long grass. Playing your instrument will only alert them to your presence.<page>Well then, alert them I shall! For where many gather, great songs are sung!
original_zh_text: 莫沮丧啊朝圣友，<br>昂首放歌莫踌躇！<page>别畏惧啊同道虫，<br>心怀信念最幸福！<page>看这原野多壮美啊！上方沼地还能让每个朝圣者饱腹！<hpage>原野虽好，长草中却有猎手潜伏。奏乐只会暴露行踪。<page>暴露又何妨！聚在一块，正好一起高歌！
translated_text: Don't worry, my fellow Pilgrim.<br>Raise your eyes and raise your voice!<br>Do not be afraid, pilgrim Truuu @uu<br>I think this is a happy choice!<page>Good morning, huh? Is this place okay? Above us is a fertile desert, where pilgrims can fill their stomachs.<hpage>The warm fields are a real wonder, but the hunters wander among the long grass.Playing the instrument is just a reminder of its existence.<page>I'll remember you! A beautiful song is sung in a place where a large number of people are gathered!
secondary_translated_text: 걱정마, 나의 동료 순례자.<br>눈을 뜨고 목소리를 높여라!<br>두려워하지 마, 순례자 Truuu @ u<br>나는 이것이 행복한 선택이라고 생각한다!<page>좋은 아침, 응?이 곳은 괜찮아요?우리 위에는 비옥한 사막이 있는데, 그곳에서 순례자들이 배를 채울 수 있다.<hpage>따뜻한 들판은 진정한 경이로움이지만, 사냥꾼들은 긴 잔디 사이에서 방황하고 악기를 연주하는 것은 단지 그것의 존재를 상기시켜줍니다.<page>나는 당신을 기억할 것이다!많은 사람들이 모인 곳에서 아름다운 노래가 부른답니다!

original_en_text: <hpage>Some pilgrims have made an encampment in a safer place than this, high on the other side of the Citadel.<hpage>They would surely allow you to stay there, if you could resist causing them mischief.<page>An en-camp-ment, eh? Sounds like a jolly place for old Grindle! Mayhaps we’ll have a sniff around later.<page>That’s a good tip, that. And you’ve just done given it to us for free! O-hoho, head fulla muck you got!
original_zh_text: <hpage>圣堡另一边的高处，朝圣者们新建了安全营地。<hpage>你老实点的话，他们应该能留你。<page>朝圣者的营地？听着像个能偷光光的好地方！<page>这情报不赖，还是白送的！你个蠢脑袋！
translated_text: <hpage>Some pilgrims camped on the other side of the castle, which was safer than here.<hpage>If you can stay and play with them, they 'll keep you there.<page>A summer camp? It seems like a happy place for old Grindel! - Miss, see you later.<page>It 's a good memory. You just gave it away for free! I got shit in my head.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>일부 순례자들은 성 반대편에 캠핑을 했는데, 이곳보다 더 안전했습니다.<hpage>당신이 그들과 함께 머물고 놀 수 있다면, 그들은 당신을 거기에 유지할 것입니다.<page>여름 캠프가?오래된 Grindel 을위한 행복한 장소처럼 보입니다! - 아가씨, 나중에 봐요.<page>그것은 좋은 추억이다.당신은 그냥 무료로 그것을 주었다!머릿속에 똥이 들어있다.

original_en_text: Well well! Seems I won the last of your rosaries. Luck is granted to the faithful, it is sung, so I must be very faithful indeed.<page>If you happen on any more rosaries though, I’d be well happy to play you again.
original_zh_text: 哎呀！赢光你的念珠了。都说运气眷顾虔诚者，看来我够虔诚。<page>等你再带着念珠的时候，我很乐意跟你再玩几局。
translated_text: I have this! I have that! I received his last Rosary.Good luck for the believers and songs, so I really must be faithful. "<page>When we come back to Rosario, we would love to play with you again.
secondary_translated_text: 이건 내가 가지고 있어!내가 그걸 가지고 있어!나는 그의 마지막 묵주기도를 받았다. 신자들과 노래에 행운을 빌어, 그래서 나는 정말로 충실해야합니다. "<page>우리가 로사리오에 다시 올 때, 우리는 당신과 함께 다시 놀고 싶습니다.

translated_text: Methane marking pencil

original_en_text: <hpage>Already, I have cut down many of this lands inhabitants, but I agree, documenting those creatures is a worthwhile undertaking.<hpage>If time still permits, I shall do as you wish.<page>Ma! How wonderful for Nuu! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我的确已斩杀这片土地上的许多住民，但记录这些生物是值得的。<hpage>若时间允许，我会尽力帮你。<page>好呀！努努太高兴啦！去吧！狩猎吧，掠食吧，开始我们的研究吧！
translated_text: <hpage>I have killed many of the inhabitants of this land, but I agree that the recording of these beings is a worthy business.<hpage>If time allows, I will do your will.<page>М а м а! Nuri is great. Go ahead! Hunting, hunting and learning.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 이 땅의 많은 주민들을 죽였지만, 이 존재들을 기록하는 것이 가치 있는 사업이라는 것에 동의한다.<hpage>시간이 허락한다면, 나는 당신의 뜻을 행할 것이다.<page>엄마!누리는 훌륭합니다.어서 가!사냥, 사냥, 그리고 배움.

original_en_text: Hoho, free at last! Locked up in here much too long, we was. Nasty place to keep a poor little snitchbug like Grindle.<page>Hoy, you’re smellin’ fancy! You got some pockets under your cloak? Hidin’ away some goodies for us to pilfer?<hpage>Beware your greed, thief. You’d be dead before your claw reached my cloak.<page>O-hoho! Never mind then, bully. Plenty of tasties lying around for us down here. We smells ‘em!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！终于自由啦！这破牢房关了格林德尔大爷太久啦！<page>你身上有股阔气味儿！斗篷里藏啥好东西了？<hpage>管好你的爪子，小偷。碰到我斗篷前你就会没命。<page>哎哟！开个玩笑嘛！底下好东西够多了，犯不着冒险！
translated_text: Finally free! It 's a good place to raise a poor informant like Grindell.<page>Hey, that smells good! Do you have a pocket under your jacket? Hide good things to steal.<hpage>Be careful, greedy thief, before your nail touches my coat, you will die.<page>- Oh, oh! - - Well, Boolie. Lots of delicious things waiting for you. I could smell it!
secondary_translated_text: 드디어 무료!그린델 같은 형편없는 정보원을 키울 수 있는 좋은 곳이에요.<page>이봐, 그것은 좋은 냄새가 나!재킷 밑에 주머니가 있어요?훔치기 위해 좋은 것을 숨기다.<hpage>조심해, 탐욕스러운 도둑아, 네 손톱이 내 외투에 닿기 전에, 너는 죽을 것이다.<page>- 오, 오! - - 글쎄, 부리많은 맛있는 것들이 당신을 기다리고 있습니다.나는 그것을 냄새 맡을 수 있었다!

translated_text: Shell Map (English)

original_en_text: <hpage>Your master has been found, Shakra. Your task in these lands is finished. Will you now return to your tribe? <page>I shall not return, Hornet Wielding Needle... I cannot. To leave my tribe’s nest-plains, that journey has only one direction. <page>This has always been our way, our long leaving, for those few who survive till age seeks to claim their shell, and those fewer who choose to send them on.<page>But these lands, Pharloom... My nest-plains I once saw so grand, now they become small. A place for birth, and growing, but a place too narrow to live a bug’s life full.
original_zh_text: <hpage>既然你已经找到导师，任务完成，打算回部落吗？<page>回不去了……离开部落只有一条路可走。<page>这是我们传统，我们的远行。活够了的年长者自行出走，少数选择送行的亲属也不能再回。<page>从前觉得部落很大，但到了纺络，才知道部落有多小。那是我出生、成长的地方，但容不下虫活一辈子。
translated_text: <hpage>"Your teacher has been found, Shakra. His mission on Earth is complete. Do you want to return to your tribe?<page>I will not go back to the hive. I cannot, I will leave the nest of my tribe and go to the plains. "<page>So we did it, and we parted for a long time, because some people who were alive wanted to get the body back, and some decided to hand it over.<page>This people, Pharaoh. Once I saw the plain of my very large nest, but now it is getting smaller and smaller. This is the place where you were born and grew up, but too narrow to live the full life of an insect.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"당신의 선생님이 발견되었습니다, 샤크라.지구에서의 임무는 완성되었다.당신은 당신의 부족으로 돌아가고 싶습니까?<page>나는 벌집으로 돌아가지 않을 것이다.나는 할 수 없다. 나는 나의 부족의 둥지를 떠나 평원으로 갈 것이다. "<page>그래서 우리는 그것을했고, 우리는 오랫동안 헤어졌습니다. 왜냐하면 살아 있던 사람들이 시체를 되찾고 싶어했고, 어떤 사람들은 그것을 넘겨주기로 결정했기 때문입니다.<page>이 백성, 파라오.한때는 내 아주 큰 둥지의 평야를 보았지만 지금은 점점 작아지고 있습니다.이곳은 당신이 태어나고 자란 곳이지만 곤충의 완전한 삶을 살기에는 너무 좁습니다.

original_en_text: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... <page>Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? <hpage>It is a difficult thing to explain simply... Her strength was needed, what was left, to cut Pharloom free of its black thread threat. It was a savage act, no doubt, but the reason was just.<hpage>Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.<hpage>For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
original_zh_text: 这只巨型古蚁才刚死不久……但她的存在……<page>难道是她？是她在维持这里的生态？……但既然她死了，接下来会怎么样？<hpage>会枯萎，并消逝……而她是死在我针下。<page>你？为什么？为什么要杀掉这么关键的存在？<hpage>这说来话长……我需要她的力量来斩断黑灾诅咒。这虽然残忍，但有必要。<hpage>假以时日，这些洞穴或许能重生、繁盛……但需几代虫的努力。<hpage>这份重任，就要靠你这样的小虫播撒下第一颗种子了。
translated_text: The death seems recent, but here it is.<page>Is that you? Is that right? What force is holding this cave? If so, what is going to happen now?<hpage>They go away and go away, unfortunately, it was my needle that killed her.<page>Is that you, lady? Why not? Are you looking for something so important?<hpage>What remains is difficult to easily explain, requiring your strength to eliminate the threat of the Black Line Farms.There is no doubt that this is a barbaric act, but the reason is clear.<hpage>Over time, caves may see the opportunity to grow and thrive again, but regeneration itself is a daunting task.<hpage>If you want to succeed, you must rely on insects like yourself to plant the first seeds.
secondary_translated_text: 죽음은 최근인 것 같지만, 여기 있다.<page>너야?그렇죠?어떤 힘이 이 동굴을 붙잡고 있습니까?만약 그렇다면, 지금 무슨 일이 벌어질 것인가?<hpage>그들은 사라지고 사라지고, 불행히도, 내 바늘이 그녀를 죽였다.<page>아가씨, 당신입니까?왜 안 돼요?당신은 그렇게 중요한 것을 찾고 있습니까?<hpage>블랙 라인 농장의 위협을 제거하기 위해 당신의 힘을 필요로하는 것은 쉽게 설명하기 어려운 남아있다. 이것은 야만적인 행위라는 의심의 여지가 없지만 그 이유는 분명합니다.<hpage>시간이 지남에 따라 동굴은 다시 성장하고 번성 할 기회를 볼 수 있지만 재생 자체는 어려운 작업입니다.<hpage>당신이 성공하려면, 당신은 당신 같은 곤충에 의존하여 첫 씨앗을 심어야합니다.

original_en_text: <page=M>Hold it, Old One! That intruder writhing within your shell... <page=S>Our ritual ain’t gonna work while that cruel creature’s present. We’d be tugging at its memories as much as your own.<hpage>Then free me of the affliction. Surely you have the skill?<page=S>Not for this! Our power’s all of soul and that thing’s all physical. You’re gonna need more traditional tools of healing.<page=B>Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.<page=B>She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.
original_zh_text: <page=C>慢着！古老者，您壳里那扭动的异物……<page=S>有这东西在，仪式会同时拽出它的记忆。<hpage>那就替我除了它，你们不是擅长各种法术吗？<page=S>治不了！我们擅灵魂之术，这东西却是实体。您得去找传统医具。<page=B>去灰沼找被钟心镇放逐的小雅纳碧，听说她在那片湿地里苟活。<page=B>她有工具，也足够机灵，肯定能活到现在。
translated_text: <page=M>Waiting for the old one.The perpetrator hangs himself from his shell<page=S>When a violent creature appears, our rituals stop working. We will retrieve that memory, just as we will retrieve your memory.<hpage>Release me from my suffering. You need these skills, right? Really?<page=S>All strength comes from the soul, and all strength comes from the body.<page=B>Asylum seeking and seeking Balhardt As far as I know, she was driven out of the wet desert.<page=B>He has the tools to accomplish his mission and the cunning to survive in the present.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>낡은 사람을 기다리고 있다. 범인은 껍질에서 스스로 목을 매달았다.<page=S>폭력적인 생물이 나타나면 우리의 의식은 작동하지 않습니다.우리는 당신의 기억을 되찾는 것과 마찬가지로 그 기억을 되찾을 것입니다.<hpage>나의 고통에서 나를 해방시켜 주소서.이런 기술들이 필요해요, 그렇죠?진짜?<page=S>모든 힘은 영혼에서 나오고, 모든 힘은 몸에서 온다.<page=B>망명 신청을 하고 발하르트를 찾는 것 내가 아는 한, 그녀는 젖은 사막에서 쫓겨났다.<page=B>그는 자신의 임무를 완수할 수 있는 도구와 현재에서 생존할 수 있는 교활함을 가지고 있다.

original_en_text: When travelling in unfriendly lands, it is important to remember safe places to camp.<br><br>These pins will mark benches and other rest spots on your map.
original_zh_text: 在险地旅行要记好安全营地。<br><br>这些图钉能够标记长椅和休息点。
translated_text: When traveling through hostile countries, it is important to remember about safe camping.<br><br>These spines denote banks and other ranges on the map.
secondary_translated_text: 적대적인 국가를 여행 할 때, 안전한 캠핑에 대해 기억하는 것이 중요합니다.<br><br>이 가시가 지도의 은행 및 기타 범위를 나타냅니다.

original_en_text: Nuu takes time with her creatures, she must inspect closely. Thick arms, flakey hair, delicate eyes... Nuu will inspect it all!
original_zh_text: 努努研究可仔细了！粗胳膊、鳞片毛发、精致眼睛……全要检查！
translated_text: Well spends time with creatures, and it should be carefully studied.With thick hands, dirty hair, delicate eyes, No one controls everything.
secondary_translated_text: 잘 생물과 시간을 보내고, 그것은 신중하게 연구해야합니다. 두꺼운 손, 더러운 머리카락, 섬세한 눈, 아무도 모든 것을 통제하지 않습니다.

original_en_text: Maiden, strong, wreathed in red,<br>Shield her shell, bless her thread!<br>She fights for us until the end,<br>Please protect my dearest friee-end!
original_zh_text: 红绸披身的坚强战士啊，<br>为我们奋战至最终时刻！<br>护佑她的甲壳，祝福她的灵丝，<br>我们的辉光，我的宝贵挚友！
translated_text: The girl in the red crown.<br>Protect your shell and bless your line!<br>They fought until the end.<br>Please protect your friend.
secondary_translated_text: 붉은 왕관을 쓴 소녀.<br>당신의 껍질을 보호하고 당신의 라인을 축복!<br>그들은 끝까지 싸웠다.<br>친구를 보호해 주세요.

original_en_text: If chance allows, visit the tower above. It is an impressive sight, not overgrown by the crust upon these caverns, but rather formed full of the material itself. <page>If the old tribe of this place were able to guide its growth to such grand degree... then they possessed a power to rival even that Citadel.
original_zh_text: 有空的话去上面塔楼看看，挺壮观的。那可不是岩壳自然生长形成的，而是用整块材料塑造而成。<page>如果这里的古老部落能引导砂岩生长至这等规模……那他们拥有的力量不逊于圣堡。
translated_text: If you have the opportunity, you can also visit the tower.It is an impressive sight.The crust of these caves is not lush and filled with the matter itself.<page>If the ancient tribes here were able to continue their development to this point, their power would be comparable to a fortress.
secondary_translated_text: 기회가 있다면, 탑을 방문할 수도 있습니다. 그것은 인상적인 광경입니다. 이 동굴의 지각은 무성한 것이 아니며 물질 자체로 가득 차 있습니다.<page>만약 이곳의 고대 부족들이 이 지점까지 계속 발전할 수 있다면, 그들의 힘은 요새와 비교할 수 있을 것이다.

original_en_text: These strange, shuffling pilgrims... In the camp below they were docile enough, but up here they seem to have lost their senses. They cry out to the darkness and attack their fellow travellers.<page>Yakkanesh! Keep your weapon drawn and your bearings true! The way ahead is winding, and to lose one’s way invites only death.<page>I am a navigator amongst my tribe and have been making maps of these lands. I can trade them with you, and supplies, if you wish.
original_zh_text: 那些朝圣者……在下面还算安分，到这上面就发疯了。对着黑暗哭喊，还攻击路人。<page>雅卡内什！握紧你的武器，可别走神了！前面的路曲折危险，迷路就是死。<page>我是部落的测绘师，一直在画这里的地图。想要可以拿物资来换。
translated_text: These strange pilgrims pull, they are obedient in the field below, but here they seem to lose their minds. They shouted in the darkness and attacked their comrades.<page>He pulls out a gun and points it in the right direction. The road is twisted, and if you get lost, you'll just die.<page>I was a pilot of a tribe that mapped this land and if you want you can trade goods and merchandise.
secondary_translated_text: 이 이상한 순례자들이 당기고, 그들은 아래의 들판에서 순종하지만, 여기서는 정신을 잃는 것 같습니다.그들은 어둠 속에서 소리를 지르며 동료들을 공격했다.<page>그는 총을 꺼내 올바른 방향으로 가리켰다.길이 구불구불하다. 길을 잃으면 죽게 될 것이다.<page>나는 이 땅을 지도로 만든 부족의 조종사였는데, 원한다면 상품과 상품을 거래할 수 있다.

original_en_text: Ma, ma! Much hunting has you done, and so many sweet little creatures in our records!<page>Nuu is drooling from such excess of learnings! Please keep working, miss grown-up!
original_zh_text: 呀呀！砍了这么多可爱小生物！<page>知识多到流口水！大姐姐继续努力呀！
translated_text: Mother, Mother! You hunt a lot, and there are many beautiful creatures in our records!<page>Go ahead with your work, lady.
secondary_translated_text: 어머니, 어머니!당신은 많은 사냥을하고, 우리의 기록에 많은 아름다운 생물들이 있습니다!<page>숙녀님, 일을 계속 해 주세요.

original_en_text: In my land, that is the way warriors greet each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.
original_zh_text: 在我们部落，战士们都这么打招呼。虽然你看着像个刚破卵的娃娃，但架势、武器、动作都像个战士。
translated_text: The soldiers of my country greeted me like this. You are a newborn child, but you are also a soldier.
secondary_translated_text: 우리 나라의 군인들은 이렇게 나에게 인사했다.당신은 신생아이지만, 당신은 또한 군인입니다.

original_en_text: O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!<hpage>We meet again, little thief. Are you familiar with this place?<hpage>If we ally our efforts, our escape could be made that much easier.<page>Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! You can just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！锁住了吧？真可怜！<hpage>又见面了，小毛贼。你对这里很熟么？<hpage>我们联手的话，越狱容易得多。<page>哦嚯嚯！想得美，监狱哪有盟友！你撞墙玩去吧，我找宝贝去咯！
translated_text: - Oh, oh! They seem to be a bit stuck. What a shame!<hpage>See you, Mr. Speaker, do you know this place?<hpage>Together, they make it easier to escape.<page>What's it? Are you kidding with me? We have no allies in the prison. I went down to the wall and smelled it.
secondary_translated_text: - 오, 오!그들은 조금 얽힌 것 같다.얼마나 부끄러운 일인가!<hpage>안녕하세요, 의장님, 이곳을 아시나요?<hpage>함께, 그들은 탈출을 더 쉽게 만듭니다.<page>뭐예요?농담하는 거야?우리는 감옥에서 동맹국이 없다.나는 벽으로 내려가서 냄새를 맡았다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Safe journey, tall bug.<page>This is Pharloom, warrior. Safety is a myth.
original_zh_text: <hpage>祝你一路平安。<page>此地是纺络，战士。安全只是虚妄。
translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, a safe journey!<page>He is a pharaoh, a warrior. Security is a myth.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>좋은 아침, 안전한 여행!<page>그는 파라오이며 전사이다.보안은 신화이다.

translated_text: Kanika Pin (English)

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Seth. It is a welcome surprise to see you here amongst these festivities.<page>Hullo, hullo! Yes, my wandering was long, and I began to fear I would meet my end in those sticky swamps below.<page>How lucky I was to stumble upon the home of these friendly revellers!<page>They said I could be a flea here with them, so of course I agreed. Seems as good a place as any to call home, at least for a time.<page>Now I just need to grow a little fur and sprout some wings, eh? Ha ha!
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，赛斯。没想到在庆典能遇见你。<page>是啊！之前在下面粘糊沼泽差点没命了。<page>幸亏遇到这群办庆典的好心虫！<page>他们说我可以当个跳蚤住下，我当然同意！这地方看着很适合安家<page>现在就只差长点毛和翅膀了！哈哈！
translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, Seth. Nice to see you at our party.<page>Hey, hey, hey. Yes, I wandered for a long time, and I began to fear that I would die in the glossy swamp below.<page>I was so lucky to see this beautiful house!<page>They told me that I could make a chip here, so of course I took it. For everyone, this is the perfect place to go home, at least for a while.<page>You need wings and skins, right? Ha ha ha!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>안녕하세요, 세스우리 파티에서 만나서 반갑다.<page>이봐 이봐 이봐그래, 나는 오랫동안 방황했고, 나는 아래의 광택있는 습지에서 죽을까 봐 두려워하기 시작했다.<page>이 아름다운 집을 볼 수 있어서 정말 운이 좋았다!<page>그들은 나에게 내가 여기서 칩을 만들 수 있다고 말했다, 그래서 물론 나는 그것을 가져 갔다. 모두를 위해, 이것은 적어도 잠시 동안 집에 갈 수있는 완벽한 장소입니다.<page>날개와 껍질이 필요하죠?하하!

original_en_text: Swamps born in the Citadel’s shadow. There is evidence the waters here once ran clear.
original_zh_text: 圣堡阴影下的沼泽，这里的水曾经清澈过。
translated_text: The water was born in the shadow of the castle.There is evidence that the water was already clear.
secondary_translated_text: 그 물은 성의 그림자 속에서 탄생했다. 그 물은 이미 맑았다는 증거가 있다.

original_en_text: Tangled roads choked beneath bramble and root. The flora is often as deadly as the creatures who call this place home.
original_zh_text: 荆棘盘踞的险路。这里的植物和住民一样要命。
translated_text: The streets were covered with thorns and roots.These plants are usually just as deadly as the organisms in which they inhabit.
secondary_translated_text: 거리는 가시와 뿌리로 덮여 있었다. 이 식물은 대개 그들이 사는 유기체만큼이나 치명적입니다.

original_en_text: What say you, nimble bug? The test of endurance remains at your ready! Let us stride fast forth!
original_zh_text: 要比赛吗？耐力测试随时恭候！
translated_text: What are we talking about, speed errors? Be prepared to test your patience. "Let's go, let's go, let's go.
secondary_translated_text: 속도 오류는 무슨 소리야?당신의 인내심을 시험할 준비가 되어 있으세요. "가자, 가자, 가자. "

original_en_text: Zaza and I will fight through these cursed lands until every last one of the black-twisted fiends has been cut down!
original_zh_text: 扎扎和我会杀遍这些鬼地方，直到怪物一个不剩！
translated_text: Zaza and I will kill all the demons of the Black Twist in this cursed land!
secondary_translated_text: 자자와 나는 이 저주받은 땅에 있는 블랙 트위스트의 모든 악마들을 죽일거야!

original_en_text: <page=M>Hurry, Old One. The ritual can’t commence while you remain host to that writhing root.<page=B>Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.<page=B>She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.
original_zh_text: <page=C>快去吧，古老者。有那根须在你体内，仪式没法开始。<page=B>去灰沼找被钟心镇放逐的小雅纳碧。她有工具，也足够机灵，肯定能活到现在。
translated_text: <page=M>"Come here, old man, when you 're a master at twisting the roots, the ceremony doesn't begin.<page=B>Asylum seeking and seeking Balhardt As far as I know, she was driven out of the wet desert.<page=B>He has the tools to accomplish his mission and the cunning to survive in the present.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>"이리 와, 노인, 네가 뿌리를 뒤틀는 데 능숙할 때, 의식은 시작되지 않는다.<page=B>망명 신청을 하고 발하르트를 찾는 것 내가 아는 한, 그녀는 젖은 사막에서 쫓겨났다.<page=B>그는 자신의 임무를 완수할 수 있는 도구와 현재에서 생존할 수 있는 교활함을 가지고 있다.

original_en_text: The red-shells, hiding through the fields, stalking the boney beasts. They are part of it, somehow, the life that flourishes here.<page>Even haunted, they seem to lose less of themselves... What anchor allows them to retain such strength?
original_zh_text: 红壳怪潜伏猎杀骨兽，是这里生态的一部分。<page>被丝咒侵蚀，它们却还能基本保持神智……靠的是什么？
translated_text: A red shell hides in a field and chases a bony beast.For some reason, they are part of the life that thrives there.<page>Even if they become ghosts, they often do not lose sight of themselves, and what do they do? Who will keep them in this power?
secondary_translated_text: 붉은 껍질이 들판에 숨어 뼈가 많은 짐승을 쫓아다니며, 어떤 이유에서인지, 그들은 그곳에서 번성하는 생명의 일부입니다.<page>유령이 되더라도, 그들은 종종 자신을 잃지 않으며, 그들은 무엇을합니까?누가 그들을 이 권력에 붙잡을 것인가?

original_en_text: Oh, but of course I sing! I am Sherma, a pilgrim just like you. I hear the call of the great Citadel just like every other devout soul.
original_zh_text: 当然要唱！我是谢尔玛，和你一样的朝圣者。圣堡在召唤每个虔诚信徒，你我都听见了！
translated_text: And, of course, I sing! I am a shaman, a pilgrim, just like you. Like other cheerful souls, I have heard the call of the great castle.
secondary_translated_text: 그리고, 물론, 나는 노래한다!나는 샤먼, 순례자, 너처럼.다른 쾌활한 영혼들처럼, 나는 위대한 성의 부름을 들었다.

original_en_text: Hoy! Hoyyyy! You there! Get us out of here! Since when’s a little light thievery worth a lifelong sentence?
original_zh_text: 喂！喂喂！那边的！快放我们出去！偷点小东西至于关一辈子吗？
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Hey, hey, hey! I am here! Get out of here! When can theft be punishable by life imprisonment?
secondary_translated_text: 이봐 이봐 이봐이봐, 이봐!내가 여기 있어!여기서 나가!도둑질은 언제 종신형에 처할 수 있습니까?

original_en_text: Our great Citadel has lost its voice, and now the black threads rise up to tear its shell apart. I fear holy Pharloom is truly dying...<page>But I still have hope, red maiden! Though kingdoms may fall, life endures still, and we bugs can build our lands anew!<hpage>I share your hope, Sherma. Remember though that whatever is built next belongs not to the past, but to you.<hpage>Your instincts are strong. Let it be those that guide you, rather than any reverence toward a kingdom’s corpse.<page>Oho, you flatter me so! But it is my fellows who shall guide me, those whose voices sing out still, even in these ruined times...
original_zh_text: 我们伟大的圣堡已失却歌声，如今黑丝翻涌要撕裂它的躯壳。恐怕神圣的纺络真要灭亡了……<page>但我仍怀希望，红衣姑娘！王国可以倾覆，但生命将延续，我们虫子能重建家园！<hpage>我与你同怀希望，谢尔玛。但记住，新建之物不属于过去，而属于你们。<hpage>你的直觉很强。让它指引你和这些虫子，别再膜拜王国的残骸。<page>噢，您过誉了！但指引我的该是我的同胞们——那些在废墟中仍放声歌唱的同胞……
translated_text: Our great castle has lost its sound, and the black line is rising and breaking its shell.<page>The kingdom may perish, but life remains, and the insects can rebuild our planet.<hpage>I am just like you, Xaman. But what you create after that is not the past, it is yours.<hpage>Intuition is strong.Do not be afraid of the dead bodies of the kingdom of those who guide you in the right way.<page>You'll praise me! But my companions have led me, and their voices will sing in this time of destruction.
secondary_translated_text: 우리의 위대한 성은 소리를 잃었고, 검은 선이 상승하여 껍질을 깨뜨리고 있습니다.<page>왕국은 망할 수도 있지만 생명은 남아 있으며 곤충은 지구를 재건 할 수 있습니다.<hpage>나도 너랑 똑같아, 쉐이먼.그러나 그 후에 창조한 것은 과거가 아니라, 당신의 것이다.<hpage>본능은 강하다. 너를 바른 길로 인도하는 자들의 왕국에서 죽은 시체를 두려워하지 마라.<page>당신은 나를 칭찬할 것입니다!그러나 나의 동반자들이 나를 인도하였으니 그들의 목소리는 이 멸망의 때에 노래할 것이다.

original_en_text: Hahhh... well met, sister. The task of hunting down these black-twisted fiends is no small one, eh? Still, we must not rest! Not while the cries of the innocent echo from every corner of the kingdom!
original_zh_text: 哈……又见面了。清剿这些黑怪可不轻松，对吧？但只要王国还有哭喊声，我和扎扎就不能歇！
translated_text: Д а! Is it easy to kill the Devil? But you can't rest! When the cry of the innocent is heard in all corners of the kingdom!
secondary_translated_text: 그래!악마를 죽이는 것이 쉬운가?하지만 넌 휴식을 취할 수 없어!무고한 자들의 부르짖음이 왕국 곳곳에서 들릴 때!

original_en_text: Sign yourself as a snitch! And scoop up more rosaries from your bested foes. Just watch it when you’re snitchin’ that you don’t lose sum’a your own...
original_zh_text: 带上这个我们就是一伙的了。打赢了多赚，打输了赔本！
translated_text: Register as an Information Provider! Get more roses from your enemies. Be careful when you say you 're missing something.
secondary_translated_text: 정보 제공자로 등록하세요!적들로부터 더 많은 장미를 얻으십시오.당신이 무언가를 놓쳤다고 말할 때 조심해라.

original_en_text: What’s this? The spider arrives at last, here to stand acquiver at our startling Citadel.<hpage>Pale child, you return only to mock? Your lands have yet to prove my match. This sleeping Citadel shall be no different.<page>Spider, dear. Why must you remain so distressingly... optimistic? The power that waits above, you cannot conceive, her who would snuff that hope with barely a glance.<hpage>Fool child. You still think me blind to the form of your liege? Having come this far?<hpage>This land’s grandeur, the devotion of its bugs, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is in the thrall of a creature beyond bug, one of that higher caste.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my Silk and my shell, it shall find I’m quite attached to both.
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧这是谁？小蜘蛛终于到了，在伟大的圣堡面前瑟瑟发抖。<hpage>苍白之子，你只是来废话的么？纺络没有虫能阻挡我，圣堡也不例外。<page>亲爱的，你怎么还傻乐呢？上面那位吹口气就能灭了你那点希望。<hpage>傻孩子，真以为我现在还看不出你主子的真身吗？<hpage>这地方的辉煌、虫民的虔诚、还有他们的诅咒……线索太明显了。<hpage>这个王国被超脱虫类的存在掌控，属于更高阶的存在。<hpage>但无论它多想要我的灵丝和躯壳，我都不会给。
translated_text: What's it? Spider has finally become the buyer of our beautiful castle.<hpage>"A pale boy, right? Are you laughing again? "Your country has not yet proved that it is my enemy.The Sleeping Castle is no different.<page>"Spider, dear, why do you want to be so optimistic and optimistic? I don't think there is any power there. It can very quickly dispel that hope.<hpage>You foolish child, do you think I will not see your king? Is it so?<hpage>The beauty of the earth, the loyalty of the insects, and the curse that encompasses them.<hpage>His kingdom is united by beings beyond worms, one of the highest castes.<hpage>No matter how longing I may be for my silk and shell, I can see that I have a great attachment to both.
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요?스파이더는 마침내 우리의 아름다운 성의 구매자가되었습니다.<hpage>"하늘색 소년, 맞죠?너 또 웃는 거야? "네 나라가 아직 내 적이라는 것을 증명하지 못했고, 잠자는 성도 다르지 않다.<page>"거미야, 자기야, 왜 그렇게 낙관적이고 낙관적인가?나는 거기에 어떤 힘도 있다고 생각하지 않는다.그것은 그 희망을 매우 빨리 없애 버릴 수 있다.<hpage>이 멍청한 아이여, 내가 네 왕을 보지 못하리라 생각하느냐?그렇죠?<hpage>지구의 아름다움, 곤충의 충성심, 그리고 그들을 둘러싼 저주가.<hpage>그의 왕국은 가장 높은 카스트 중 하나 인 벌레를 초월한 존재들에 의해 연합되어 있습니다.<hpage>내가 얼마나 나의 실크와 껍질에 대한 갈망을 가질지라도, 나는 둘 다에 대한 강한 애착을 가지고 있음을 알 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Is hard work, learning so much from creatures, but for Nuu is very fulfilling. Now go and hunt, and prey, miss grown-up!
original_zh_text: 研究生物很辛苦，但努努超满足！快去打猎吧大姐姐！
translated_text: It was hard work, and I learned a lot about biology, but it was very helpful for Nová. - "Let's go hunting, sir."
secondary_translated_text: 힘든 일이었고 생물학에 대해 많은 것을 배웠지만 노바에게는 매우 도움이되었습니다. - " 사냥하러 가자. " "

original_en_text: Hoy there, fancy bug! How you farin’, now that the ‘ole world’s creakin’ and crackin’ around us? Desperately needin’ some supplies, I’ll wager! Heh heh!<hpage>You seem in good spirits, thief. Are you not disturbed by the great rending of the kingdom?<page>Heh, end of the world don’t bother ol’ Grindle none. We’ll just go find another one to plunder, won’t we?
original_zh_text: 哟！阔气虫来啦！外面世界要完蛋了，急需补给吧？哦嚯嚯！<hpage>你看着倒挺精神，不怕王国崩塌？<page>王国崩塌关我们屁事！大不了换个地方偷！
translated_text: What a lovely puppy! Currently, the "old world " is stretching around us. We need emergency supplies. !<hpage>The thief, you look great! Are you afraid of the collapse of your kingdom?<page>Hey, the end of the world. Don't worry, Grindel. Looking for a trophy?
secondary_translated_text: 정말 귀여운 강아지야!현재 ' 낡은 세계 ' 가 우리 주위에서 펼쳐지고 있다.우리는 비상 물품이 필요하다. !<hpage>도둑, 멋져 보이네!당신은 당신의 왕국이 무너질 것을 두려워합니까?<page>이봐, 세상의 끝이야.걱정마, 그린델.트로피를 찾고 계신가요?

original_en_text: <page=M>Our spells’re woven, our parts prepared. Whenever you’re ready, lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.<page=M>Best you don’t dawdle now. Pharloom’s time is short, and those hearts won’t go on beating forever.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们已经准备好施咒，您躺上祭坛便可开始。<page=M>劝您别再耽搁了，纺络时日无多，这些心也跳不了多久。
translated_text: <page=M>Our spells are intertwined, and our part is ready.When you are ready, sit down on stage and get started.<page=M>Farrow's time is very short, and his heart won't beat forever.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>우리의 주문은 얽혀 있고, 우리의 부분은 준비되어 있습니다. 준비가되면, 무대에 앉아 시작하십시오.<page=M>페로우의 시간은 짧고, 그의 심장은 영원히 뛰지 않을 것이다.

original_en_text: No more talk, warrior. Permit me this final moment of memorial.<hpage>As you wish, sir. I shall disturb you no longer.
original_zh_text: 别说了，战士。让我在这最后时刻安静怀念吧。<hpage>如你所愿，不再打扰。
translated_text: - Don't say it, soldier. Remember this last moment.<hpage>Whatever, sir. I will not bother you anymore.
secondary_translated_text: - 말하지마, 병사이 마지막 순간을 기억하십시오.<hpage>뭐든, 선생님.나는 더 이상 너를 귀찮게 하지 않을 것이다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Another time perhaps, sir. My own tasks cannot be easily ignored.<page>Then I shall continue to train in anticipation of that future moment!<page>Having met, it is inevitable. Fate calls us to compete!
original_zh_text: <hpage>下次吧，我有要事在身。<page>我会继续特训等着比赛那天！<page>命运注定我们要一决高下！
translated_text: <hpage>"Next time, sir, his work cannot be easily ignored.<page>We continue to travel!<page>Encounter is inevitable; Fate requires competition.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"다음에는, 선생님, 그의 작품은 쉽게 무시할 수 없습니다.<page>우리는 계속 여행합니다!<page>만남은 불가피하다; 운명은 경쟁을 요구한다.

original_en_text: Oh, welcome miss grown-up! Come to inspect the red-rocky creatures, like Nuu? We have found a very big one. Fresh, but not too fresh!<hpage>A pair of beasts attacked me here, burrowing through the stone with their spiral shells. I cut this one down, and the other fled.<page>Ooooh ma! Really? Nuu wishes that she had the pair! She could have studied much. Unlucky, to miss such a big feast of learnings!
original_zh_text: 噢！欢迎大姐姐！也来研究红石头吗？我发现个大家伙！还算新鲜！<hpage>两只带螺旋壳的怪物用石头攻击我。斩了一只，跑了一只。<page>哎呀！努努好想要一对！能学好多东西呢！真可惜！
translated_text: Welcome, ladies and gentlemen. Look at the red stone creatures like Nu.I found something great.Fresh, but not too fresh.<hpage>Two beasts attacked me here and drilled a hole in the stone with a spiral shell. One was cut off and the other hid.<page>Oh, Mother. - Really? I hope you have a pair! You have been able to learn so much. I miss such an academic event.
secondary_translated_text: 환영합니다 신사 숙녀 여러분. Nu 와 같은 붉은 돌 생물들을 보세요. 나는 멋진 것을 발견했습니다. 신선하지만 너무 신선하지는 않습니다.<hpage>두 마리의 짐승이 나를 공격하여 나선형 껍질로 돌에 구멍을 뚫었다.하나는 절단되었고 다른 하나는 숨었습니다.<page>오, 어머니. - 진짜?나는 당신이 한 켤레를 가지고 있기를 바랍니다!당신은 그렇게 많은 것을 배울 수 있었다.이런 학문적 행사가 그리웠다.

original_en_text: We must press on... There is so much more... for us to do...
original_zh_text: 必须继续……我们还有……很多事要做……
translated_text: If we do not move forward, others will.
secondary_translated_text: 우리가 앞으로 나아가지 않으면, 다른 사람들이 나아갈 것이다.

original_en_text: I see much wasted effort in these docks. There is too much flourish to the form of it all. The ways of others are strange indeed...
original_zh_text: 码头修得花里胡哨，净是浪费。外族人的路子真怪……
translated_text: There is a lot of prosperity in these forms, and we spend a lot of energy.
secondary_translated_text: 이러한 형태에는 많은 번영이 있으며, 우리는 많은 에너지를 소비합니다.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! We both know our previous run was only warm-up, yes? Only a tiny test to prepare for the real match, Hoi hoi!<page>Well that match is now! A new track worthy of your skill, and mine. No longer merely a test!<page>Meet the challenge and my speed full. Let us break through our limits and see what waits beyond!
original_zh_text: 上次只是热身对吧？真正的好戏现在开始！<page>新的挑战，新的赛道！配得上你我的实力！<page>接受我的全速挑战，一起冲刺突破极限吧！
translated_text: That's a smart mistake! The last race was a warm-up, was it? Preparing for a real game is a bit of a test, right? Really?<page>Go ahead, the game begins! The song deserves its talent. It is no longer just a test!<page>Take the challenge at full speed. Let's go abroad and see what awaits us!
secondary_translated_text: 그건 현명한 실수야!마지막 경주는 워밍업이었죠?실제 게임을 준비하는 것은 약간의 테스트입니다, 그렇죠?진짜?<page>어서 가자, 게임이 시작된다!그 노래는 그 재능에 합당하다.그것은 더 이상 단지 시험이 아닙니다!<page>전속으로 도전을 해보세요.해외로 가서 우리를 기다리고있는 것을 보자!

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>With these I often mark the locations of worthy foes.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>我常用它标强力敌人的位置。
translated_text: It can be used to mark important places and reminders on a map.<br><br>It is often used to evaluate the opponent.
secondary_translated_text: 지도에서 중요한 장소와 추억을 표시하는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.<br><br>그것은 종종 상대방을 평가하는 데 사용됩니다.

original_en_text: Hoi hoi! A nimble opponent appears. At last! At last!<hpage>I was intrigued by the challenge you issued on the bell settlement’s wishwall, sir, though having reached this place I wonder at your choice of location.<hpage>If you seek challengers you should choose somewhere less far afield. It is rare chance any bug would journey to a cavern so distant.<page>True, perhaps. Though once discovered, could there be a more perfect spot? This giant, boney body, so distant from Pharloom’s ails.<page>Here, freely, we can test our speed and our sleek shells. Here we may race!<page>You must be eager to step to the task, challenger? Fulfil my wish! Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！终于来个能跑的！终于啊！<hpage>先生，我对您在钟心镇祈愿墙下的战书很感兴趣。不过抵达此地后，倒对您选的位置有些疑惑。<hpage>若想找虫比试，不该待在如此偏远之地。<page>有道理，但最棒的赛道就在这！还远离纺络的破事。<page>这里能尽情展现速度与甲壳之美！来赛一场吧！<page>你也等不及了吧？快来满足我的愿望，一起测试极限！
translated_text: What's it? ! There is a flexible opponent. Infinitely!<hpage>I am very interested in your challenge to the wall of the wishes of a colonial colony.We arrived at this place, but would like to know where you chose.<hpage>If you are looking for a rival, choose a place that is not too far away. Few insects get to the caves that far.<page>This may be true, but when you understand it, what 's ideal? This huge bony corpse is far from the state farm.<page>Here you can freely test your speed and agility. Here you can compete.<page>Challenger? Do you want to do this? May my wish be fulfilled! Explore the boundaries together!
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요? !융통성 있는 상대가 있다. Infinity!<hpage>나는 식민지 식민지의 소원 벽에 대한 당신의 도전에 매우 관심이 있습니다. 우리는이 장소에 도착했지만, 당신이 선택한 곳을 알고 싶습니다.<hpage>경쟁자를 찾고 있다면, 너무 멀지 않은 곳을 선택하십시오.그렇게 멀리 떨어진 동굴까지 올라가는 곤충은 거의 없다.<page>이것은 사실일지도 모르지만, 당신이 그것을 이해한다면, 이상적인 것은 무엇입니까?이 거대한 뼈로 된 시체는 주 농장에서 멀리 떨어져 있습니다.<page>여기에서 당신은 자유롭게 당신의 속도와 민첩성을 테스트 할 수 있습니다.여기서 당신은 경쟁 할 수 있습니다.<page>챌린저?이거 하고 싶니?나의 소원이 이루어지기를 바랍니다!함께 경계를 탐구하라!

original_en_text: Uahhhhh... So close... Nuu could almost taste it.
translated_text: Yes, it is very close, it can be practically walked.
secondary_translated_text: 네, 매우 가깝고, 실제로 걸을 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Ho! Are you observing them too, hunter? The red-shells are plentiful here, stalking these vast grassy plains and the last of its bony beasts.<page>Compared to the caves below, this lush growth feels even greater. Have we crawled close to the source of their sustenance?<page>I must discover its secret! I will! By my father’s wish, and for hope that our dying lands might find means to endure.<hpage>Just be careful, young one. I urge you. Here you’ve reached the ants’ heart-domain.<hpage>There may be discoveries worth making, but a single mistake will see your shell’s sharp end.
original_zh_text: 嘿！你也在观察红壳怪吗？它们在这片原野上猎杀最后的骨兽。<page>这里的植物比下面的洞穴更茂盛，难道接近能量源了？<page>我必须找到源头！对！不止是为了父亲的遗愿，也是为了这片大地存续的希望！<hpage>要小心，小虫子。此处是蚁族的核心区域。<hpage>或许能有宝贵发现，但走错一步就会丢了性命。
translated_text: - Oh, oh, oh! Are you looking at the hunter? There are many red shellfish floating among the vast pastures and the last bony beast.<page>This lush growth feels better than the cave below. Are you near the food source?<page>We need to find out that secret! I'll do it! With the Father 's wishes and hopes, the earth we have led to death can find a way to survive.<hpage>Be careful, we advise. We have reached the heart of ants.<hpage>There may be some valuable discoveries, but mistakes can sharpen your shell.
secondary_translated_text: - 오 오, 오, 오!사냥꾼을 보고 계신가요?광대한 목초지와 마지막 뼈가 많은 짐승들 사이에는 붉은 조개들이 떠 있다.<page>이 무성한 성장은 아래의 동굴보다 기분이 좋습니다.당신은 음식의 근원 근처에 있습니까?<page>우리는 그 비밀을 밝혀야 한다!내가 할거야!아버지의 소원과 희망으로, 우리가 죽음으로 인도한 지구는 생존할 수 있는 방법을 찾을 수 있습니다.<hpage>조심하십시오, 우리는 조언합니다.우리는 개미의 심장에 도달했다.<hpage>몇 가지 가치있는 발견이있을 수 있지만 실수는 당신의 껍질을 날카롭게 할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Hoy! Did you see it, red maiden? The great gate heard my song and, in its infinite and ancient kindness, opened the way forward for us!<page>What luck for us to meet at this moment! We can set off on the great road together!<page>Or p’raps I’ll tarry here just a little longer. I want to sing a song of gratitude to this noble gate!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘快看！骨门听见歌声，为我们让路了！<page>能在这相遇多有缘呀！我们可以结伴踏上圣途！<page>不过我想再再待会儿，给这好骨门唱首感恩曲！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey, hey! Did you see that? The ancient red woman, the great gate, heard my song, opened the way for us with infinite mercy!<page>I am so lucky to have met you now! We are going to have a wonderful journey together!<page>Or I will be here a little longer. I sing a song of thanksgiving to this noble gate!
secondary_translated_text: 이봐, 이봐, 이봐!그거 봤어?고대 붉은 여인, 위대한 문, 내 노래를 듣고, 무한한 자비로 우리를 위해 길을 열어!<page>나는 지금 당신을 만나서 정말 운이 좋았습니다!우리는 함께 멋진 여행을 할 것입니다!<page>또는 나는 조금 더 여기에있을 것입니다.나는 이 고귀한 문에 감사의 노래를 부른다!

original_en_text: In these lands names are given freely, are they not? I am Shakra, Wielding Rings. If our hunts intertwine again, I will have new maps to trade.<page>Until then, farewell, Child Wielding Needle.
original_zh_text: 在这地方，名字都起的很随意，对吧？我是沙克拉，驭环者。要是能再碰上，会准备好新地图卖给你。<page>后会有期，使针的小姑娘。
translated_text: Names are free in our country, right? Really? You are Shakra, Voldingring. If the hunt develops again, you will receive a new map.<page>Say goodbye to the kids who have been using the needles.
secondary_translated_text: 우리 나라에서는 이름이 무료죠?진짜?당신은 샤크라, 볼딩링입니다.사냥이 다시 진행되면 새로운 지도를 받게 됩니다.<page>바늘을 사용하던 어린이들에게 작별 인사를 하세요.

original_en_text: This place is holy, yes... but I worry at the suffering of our fellow pilgrims. So many are hurt or exhausted!<hpage>Your doubts and worries will not heal them, little one.<hpage>If you would aid your fellows, you can start by dressing their wounds. The simple rags found around the settlement will do for bandages.<page>Oh, that’s an excellent idea, red maiden! Normally I’d think a song would suffice, but... yes, more direct action is certainly needed.<page>And the Citadel itself shall provide the materials! Praise be to this holiest of holy places!
original_zh_text: 这里虽然是圣地……可看着同袍受苦真难受！<hpage>光着急没用。<hpage>若想帮忙，可以先从包扎开始。找点破布当绷带吧。<page>好主意！我平常就知道唱歌……这次得动真格了！<page>材料圣堡里随便找！圣地就是灵验！
translated_text: It is sacred, yes, but we are worried about our fellow pilgrims. Many of them are injured and tired.<hpage>Your doubts and worries won't heal you, little man.<hpage>If you want to help your friends, start by healing the wound.A simple cloth around the knee is used as a condiment.<page>Normally, I think one song is enough, but that obviously requires more direct action.<page>The fortress offers its commands. Bless this holy place.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 신성한, 예, 하지만 우리는 우리의 동료 순례자들에 대해 걱정합니다.그들 중 많은 사람들이 부상을 입었고 피곤했습니다.<hpage>너의 의심과 걱정은 너를 치유하지 못할거야, 꼬마야.<hpage>친구를 돕고 싶다면 상처를 치유하는 것부터 시작하십시오. 무릎 주위에 간단한 천을 양념으로 사용합니다.<page>보통은 한 곡이면 충분하다고 생각하지만, 그건 분명 더 직접적인 행동이 필요하다.<page>요새는 명령어를 제공합니다.이 거룩한 곳을 축복해 주십시오.

original_en_text: Fear not, brothers and sisters! If we work hard and keep our faith, the Citadel will provide for us... I have no doubt!
original_zh_text: 兄弟姐妹别怕！只要我们勤勉且守住信念，圣堡不会亏待我们……肯定不会！
translated_text: Brothers and sisters, do not be afraid! If we work hard and keep the faith, the castle feeds us. There is no doubt about that!
secondary_translated_text: 형제자매 여러분, 두려워하지 마십시오!우리가 열심히 일하고 신앙을 지키면 성은 우리에게 먹이를 주십니다.그것에 대해 의심의 여지가 없다!

original_en_text: <page=M>The hearts you seek, we can share their locations as best we know.<page=M>Three will be needed to construct our spell and draw clear memory of the flower from your Silk.<page=S>Bring us the hearts, Old One. Make’em beat, fierce and final. See for yourself the forgotten strength of this land of bugs before we burn those memories in its saving.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们会把知道的古心位置尽数相告。<page=M>我们需要三颗心来施咒，从您的灵丝中抽出花影。<page=S>把心带来，古老者。通过它们的搏动，见证这片虫族土地被遗忘的伟力，再焚尽这些记忆换取救赎。
translated_text: <page=M>The heart you are looking for, we will do our best to share this place.<page=M>It takes three people to build our mantra and bring vivid memories of your silk flowers.<page=S>Dear friend, give me a heart.In the end, she failed.Before you save these memories, look at the strength of this forgotten land of insects.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>당신이 찾고있는 마음은, 우리는이 장소를 공유하기 위해 최선을 다할 것입니다.<page=M>우리의 만트라를 구축하고 당신의 실크 꽃에 대한 생생한 추억을 가져오기 위해 세 사람이 필요합니다.<page=S>사랑하는 친구, 나에게 마음을 줘. 결국 그녀는 실패했다. 이 기억들을 저장하기 전에, 곤충의 잊혀진 땅의 힘을 보라.

translated_text: The ring is marked.

original_en_text: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... <page>Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? <hpage>It is a difficult thing to explain simply... A test was needed, to ensure my strength before a greater challenge soon to come.<hpage>Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.<hpage>For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
original_zh_text: 这只年迈的巨蚁……她刚死没多久，可她却出现在这里……<page>那是她本人吗？难道真是她？支撑这些洞穴的力量究竟是什么？若真如此，如今会发生什么？<hpage>它们终将枯萎凋零……你也许会含泪明白，是我手中的针了结了她的生命。<page>这位姑娘，你？可为什么？为什么要摧残这般珍贵的东西？<hpage>这事难以三言两语解释……在更大的考验来临前，我必须通过试炼，证明自身的力量。<hpage>终有一日，这些洞穴或许能重新焕发生机，甚至繁盛昌荣。但那重生之路，漫长艰难，超越一生又一生。<hpage>而这份重任，便要靠你这样的小虫播撒下第一颗种子。
translated_text: This giant ant appears to have recently died, but here it is.<page>Is that you? Is that right? What force is holding this cave? If so, what is going to happen now?<hpage>They go away and go away, unfortunately, it was my needle that killed her.<page>Is that you, lady? Why not? Are you looking for something so important?<hpage>This is something that is difficult to explain easily. Faced with the enormous challenges that lie ahead, we need a test to prove our strength.<hpage>Over time, caves may see the opportunity to grow and thrive again, but regeneration itself is a daunting task.<hpage>If you want to succeed, you must rely on insects like yourself to plant the first seeds.
secondary_translated_text: 이 거대 개미는 최근에 죽은 것 같지만 여기 있습니다.<page>너야?그렇죠?어떤 힘이 이 동굴을 붙잡고 있습니까?만약 그렇다면, 지금 무슨 일이 벌어질 것인가?<hpage>그들은 사라지고 사라지고, 불행히도, 내 바늘이 그녀를 죽였다.<page>아가씨, 당신입니까?왜 안 돼요?당신은 그렇게 중요한 것을 찾고 있습니까?<hpage>이것은 쉽게 설명하기 어려운 것이다.앞에 놓여 있는 엄청난 도전에 직면하여 우리는 우리의 힘을 증명하기 위한 시험이 필요하다.<hpage>시간이 지남에 따라 동굴은 다시 성장하고 번성 할 기회를 볼 수 있지만 재생 자체는 어려운 작업입니다.<hpage>당신이 성공하려면, 당신은 당신 같은 곤충에 의존하여 첫 씨앗을 심어야합니다.

original_en_text: Burrowed paths of the red-shells. Their stores and shrines are frequent throughout. These tunnels must grant them swift passage about the fields below.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪的隧道网。到处是他们的仓库和冥想室，方便在野地快速移动。
translated_text: Shops and shrines in the caves of Red Shell Road are scattered everywhere.The tunnel can quickly pass through the fields below.
secondary_translated_text: 붉은 껍질길 동굴에는 상점과 신사가 곳곳에 흩어져 있으며, 터널은 아래의 들판을 빠르게 통과할 수 있다.

original_en_text: <hpage>If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.
original_zh_text: <hpage>要下潜并斩断诅咒，得先除掉体内这玩意。
translated_text: <hpage>If I am going to jump and cut this land off from the curse of the black line, then first I must find a way to drive out the invaders.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>만약 내가 뛰어넘어 이 땅을 검은 선의 저주로부터 차단하려 한다면, 먼저 침략자들을 쫓아내는 방법을 찾아야 한다.

original_en_text: So I am freed, despite no request of mine for aid.<hpage>And I do not ask gratitude. The key merely fit the lock. If you choose, stay in here and wait till your shell hardens to crust.<page>No. I shall depart shortly. With my way clear, my wish again propels me, though I tried to avoid it.<hpage>Then safe journey, tall bug. I’ll not pry further. Clearly you bear your own burden.
original_zh_text: 我未曾求救，倒也被放出来了。<hpage>不必道谢，钥匙碰巧能用罢了。若想留在这，请自便。<page>不，我这就走。前路已通，纵使逃避，他的遗愿仍会推着我前行。<hpage>那便祝你一路顺利。看得出你有重担在身，我无意深究。
translated_text: I was released without seeking help.<hpage>This key only opens the lock. If you want, stay here until your sink is locked.<page>My path is clear, and though I try to avoid it, my desire has brought me back.<hpage>Have a great trip, lovely insects! I don't research anymore. You carry the burden on yourself.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 도움을 요청하지 않고 석방되었다.<hpage>이 키는 자물쇠를 열기만 하면 됩니다.원하신다면 싱크대가 잠겨 있을 때까지 여기 있으세요.<page>나의 길은 분명하며, 비록 내가 그것을 피하려고 노력하지만, 나의 욕망은 나를 다시 데려왔다.<hpage>좋은 여행 되세요, 귀여운 곤충들!나는 더 이상 연구하지 않는다.너는 그 짐을 너 자신에게 짊어지고 있다.

original_en_text: Mm, mrm? Oh, hoy again!<page>I hadn’t meant to drop off like that. It’s hard to stay awake in such a cosy place, isn’t it?
original_zh_text: 唔嗯？哎呀又睡着了！<page>这地方太舒服了，让人犯困，你说是吧？
translated_text: What's it? Mr. Here they are back!<page>It 's hard to wake up in such a comfortable place, is it?
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요? Mr. Here they are back!<page>이렇게 편안한 곳에서 깨는 게 힘들죠?

original_en_text: Oh hear me pray, please hear me sing,<br>My path’s ahead, but here’s the thing,<br>I can’t squeeze past, o gate of bone,<br>So please wake up, and help...oh?
original_zh_text: 听我祈祷，听我歌唱，<br>前路虽近骨门却挡，<br>求您醒来助我闯荡……哦？
translated_text: Listen to my prayers, listen to my songs,<br>My way is before me, but He is.<br>You cannot enter through the door of the bones.<br>"Wake up and help me. - - Yeah?
secondary_translated_text: 내 기도를 들어, 내 노래를 들어,<br>내 길은 내 앞에 있지만, 그는 있다.<br>뼈의 문을 통해 들어갈 수 없습니다.<br>"일어나서 도와주세요. - 그래요?

original_en_text: <page=M>Up top of those caves lost to wind and sand rests a crusted old ruler, a once great warrior king.<page=M>In their prime, they and their order held half of Pharloom under hardened claw. Some bugs relished that strength. Most lived in fear of it.
original_zh_text: <page=M>在风沙侵蚀的洞窟顶端，藏着位甲壳斑驳的老暴君。<page=M>全盛时他与部族以铁爪统治半个纺络。有人仰慕其强权，更多则活在恐惧中。
translated_text: <page=M>At the top of the sand-covered cave stood an old time-weary ruler, once a great warrior-king.<page=M>At their peak, they and their commanders controlled half of the Faram with their claws.Insects prefer this kind of energy.Most people live in fear and fear.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>모래로 덮인 동굴의 꼭대기에 한때 위대한 전사 왕이었던 오래된 지친 통치자가 서 있었다.<page=M>그들의 절정에, 그들과 그들의 지휘관들은 그들의 발톱으로 파람의 절반을 통제했다. 곤충은이 에너지의 종류를 선호한다. 대부분의 사람들은 두려움과 공포 속에서 살고있다.

original_en_text: Oooh ma! Sweet surprise for Nuu! You are adult, yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt?<hpage>Certainly I am no child, young one.<page>Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.<page>Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!<page>Would you help Nuu? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?
original_zh_text: 哇哦大姐姐！努努好惊喜！你已经长大了对吧？完全体？能打猎了吧？<hpage>我显然不是个小孩子，小家伙。<page>太好啦！努努有个愿望！帮我去砍纺络的各种神奇虫子吧！<page>用你的刀砍！用长大的力气砍！用成熟的狂野之心砍！<page>帮帮努努好不好？收下这本册子，用打架心得写满它！
translated_text: Oh my mother! What a surprise for the United Nations. You're an adult, right? Really? Fully grown? Are you ready to hunt?<hpage>Of course, I am not a child.<page>Ideal! You must make a wish! For it, you will find a lot of wonderful insects in the beacon and cut them.<page>Cut him with a knife! Destroy them with your mature mind. Try your wild adult mind.<page>Would you like to help Nancy? Can you bring your scrolls to fill the page of your editing knowledge?
secondary_translated_text: 오 나의 어머니!유엔에 대한 놀라움은 정말 대단하다.넌 어른이잖아, 맞지?진짜?완전히 자란?사냥을 할 준비가 되셨습니까?<hpage>물론 나는 어린이가 아니다.<page>이상!당신은 소원을 만들어야 한다!그것을 위해, 당신은 등대에서 멋진 곤충을 많이 찾을 수 있으며 그들을 잘라.<page>칼로 그를 잘라!당신의 성숙한 정신으로 그들을 파괴하십시오.어른들의 정신을 시험해 보세요.<page>낸시를 도와줄래?당신은 당신의 편집 지식의 페이지를 채우기 위해 두루마리를 가져와 주시겠습니까?

original_en_text: Guurroooo! Scoundrel! Fiend! Who dares wake brave Garmond from his well needed kip?<hpage>I’ve no intent to disturb, sir bug. I am merely passing these towers and sought to better understand the lay of the place.<page>Hmmph! Knowing the battlefield? A warrior’s reason! Just look at you! Your stance and blade, almost alone they declare a fight.<page>As the bravest of knights, if direct challenge were offered, honour would see noble Garmond accept!<page>Fortunate that seems not your intent. In truth, I’m still sleeping off something of an altercation myself. Had our meeting called for a knightly duel, you’d not have had the luck to behold my finest form.
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！歹徒！谁敢打扰勇者加蒙德的美梦？<hpage>无意冒犯，只是路过这座塔想探探路。<page>哼！勘察战场？战士的借口！看你这架势就是来找架打的！<page>作为最勇猛的骑士，要决斗我奉陪！<page>算你走运，我还没睡醒。真要决斗你可打不过全盛期的我！
translated_text: Г у р у! Mal! Mal! The Devil! Who will awaken the brave Hamond from the sleep he desperately needs?<hpage>I won't interrupt you, Mr. Bug, I went through the tower to better understand the place.<page>Hoon-hoon! !¿Do you know the battlefield? But there are reasons for the soldiers. and look at yourself! His place and Blade are the only ones who declare war.<page>Like the bravest knight, if he challenged him directly, Lord Hammond would have agreed!<page>Anger is not your intention. In fact, I fell asleep from the discussion. If it were a fight for a knightly duel, you would not see the best in me.
secondary_translated_text: 구루!말야!말야!악마!누가 용감한 해몬드를 그가 절실히 필요로하는 잠에서 깨울 것인가?<hpage>방해하지 않겠습니다, 버그 씨, 저는 그 곳을 더 잘 이해하기 위해 탑을 통과했습니다.<page>쿤쿤! !¿전장을 아시나요?하지만 군인들에게는 이유가 있다.그리고 너 자신을 보라!그의 장소와 블레이드는 전쟁을 선포하는 유일한 사람입니다.<page>가장 용감한 기사처럼, 그가 직접 도전했다면, 해먼드 경은 동의했을 것입니다!<page>분노는 당신의 의도가 아니다.사실, 나는 그 토론에서 잠이 들었다.만약 그것이 기사의 결투를 위한 싸움이라면, 당신은 내 최고를 보지 못할 것이다.

original_en_text: Hoy then, what’s a fancy-prancy bug like you creepin’ into Grindle’s cosy little nook for?<page>Heard we had some nice stuff, did ya? O-hoho! All kinds of tasty goodies find their way here, that’s for sure.<hpage>I care little for how you procured your goods, thief. If you have something worth trading, I may part with my rosaries.<page>Well, we never say no to a fair swap, heh heh! Now take a look at what we’s got...
original_zh_text: 哦嚯！阔气虫，你溜进格林德尔的宝窝想干嘛？<page>是不是听说我这有好货？哦嚯嚯！那可不，宝贝们都是自己溜进来的！<hpage>我不在乎你的货怎么来的，如果有好东西，我拿念珠来换。<page>成交！不过我们可不做赔本买卖，嚯嚯！你先随便看看吧……
translated_text: Hey, what? What does a fantastic insect look like when you climb into a cozy corner of Grindel?<page>I hear you have a good one, right? Really? - Oh, oh! There 's a lot of good food here, that 's true.<hpage>Regardless of how you buy it, if there 's anything worth exchanging, I could throw out the rosary.<page>We will never say no to fair trade. Hey, hey, hey! Let 's see what we have now.
secondary_translated_text: 이봐, 뭐라고?그린델의 아늑한 구석으로 올라갈 때 환상적인 곤충은 어떻게 생겼습니까?<page>좋은 사람이 있다고 들었어요, 그렇죠?진짜? - 오, 오!여기 맛있는 음식이 많아요, 그건 사실입니다.<hpage>당신이 그것을 어떻게 구입하든, 교환 할 가치가있는 것이 있다면, 나는 그것을 던질 수 있습니다.<page>우리는 결코 공정무역에 ' 아니오 ' 라고 말하지 않을 것이다.이봐, 이봐!이제 우리가 가진 것을 보자.

original_en_text: Now I shall remain, and train. And know! Though I have no more rewards to give, you are welcome to grace my track, as many times as you wish.
original_zh_text: 我要继续训练了！不过记着，虽然没其他奖品了，但随时欢迎你来赛道上奔跑！
translated_text: I 'm going to put it into practice, I know! There 's nothing better than this, but we invite you to join us if you wish.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 그것을 실행할 것이다, 나는 알고있다!이것보다 더 좋은 것은 없지만, 우리는 당신이 원하는 경우에 우리와 함께 초대합니다.

original_en_text: The sharp-faced bugs of these drizzled caves love to swoop and play, don’t they? If only I could understand their beautiful language...
original_zh_text: 这些尖脸虫就爱在雨里扑腾。要是能听懂它们的语言多好……
translated_text: These acidic insects in foggy caves love to dive in and play, right? Really? I wish I could understand your beautiful words.
secondary_translated_text: 안개가 끼는 동굴에 있는 산성 곤충들은 다이빙을 즐기고 놀고 싶어, 그렇죠?진짜?나는 당신의 아름다운 말을 이해할 수 있었으면 좋겠다.

original_en_text: ...At the bottom of a well, you can only look up. The past is hidden from those who look forward...<page>...Those echoes may guide you still. Yes, that’s true. For the kind-hearted, a weapon can also be a friend...<page>...You’re so eager to follow in her footsteps. But what are you leaving for those who come next?
original_zh_text: ……身居井底唯见上方。沉湎过往者难窥前路……<page>……余音仍可指明方向。善者手中，利器亦可为友……<page>……你执着追随她的足迹。可曾为后来者留有余地？……
translated_text: ... Deep down in the well, you just look. The past is hidden from those who look into the future.<page>... These emotions move you. Yes, yes, yes. For a good man, a gun can be his friend.<page>... He really wants to follow in his footsteps.What do you want to leave the next person?
secondary_translated_text: ...우물 깊은 곳에서, 당신은 단지 보세요.과거는 미래를 바라보는 사람에게는 숨겨져 있다.<page>...이러한 감정은 당신을 움직입니다.그래, 그래, 그래.좋은 남자에게는 총이 친구가 될 수 있다.<page>...그는 정말 그의 발자취를 따르고 싶어. 다음 사람에게 무엇을 남기고 싶습니까?

translated_text: Map of Bilworth

original_en_text: Hoof... Always you impress... nimble bug...<page>As many times as you may, let us speed forth! Gladly will I strive to match your spritely grace.
original_zh_text: 呼……每次都被你惊艳……<page>想再比赛的话随时奉陪！我一定要追上你！
translated_text: Feeling. You always impress. These are very fast insects.<page>Take the time you can and hurry up. I want to be as good as you are.
secondary_translated_text: 느낌.당신은 항상 인상적이다.이것은 매우 빠른 곤충입니다.<page>할 수 있는 시간을 내서 서둘러.나는 너만큼 좋은 사람이 되고 싶다.

original_en_text: This poor traveller finds her resolve waning. When I first greeted her, her voice was so hoarse I scarcely heard it!<page>’Tis no cause for worry, though. My song will lift her from her torpor! Join your voice with mine, red maiden, and together we shall rouse our fellow pilgrim!
original_zh_text: 这位同袍意志消沉，初遇时她嗓音沙哑，几乎听不见！<page>莫慌！我的歌声能唤醒她！红衣姑娘一起唱，唤起这位同路人！
translated_text: The poor traveler noticed that his resolve was weakening.When I first greeted her, I could hardly hear her voice.<page>Don't worry, my music will save you from paralysis! Red Woman, together, you and I, we will awaken the pilgrims!
secondary_translated_text: 그 불쌍한 여행자는 그의 결심이 약해지는 것을 알아차렸다. 내가 처음 그녀에게 인사했을 때, 나는 그녀의 목소리를 거의 들을 수 없었다.<page>걱정마, 내 음악이 마비로부터 너를 구할 거야!붉은 여인, 너와 나 함께, 우리는 순례자들을 깨울 것이다!

original_en_text: In time, even these great steps will be swept away by the sands. Nothing is immovable.
original_zh_text: 再大的台阶也迟早被风沙埋了，没有什么是永恒的。
translated_text: In time, even this huge ladder will be dragged down by sand.
secondary_translated_text: 시간이 지나면, 이 거대한 사다리조차도 모래에 끌려 내려갈 것입니다.

original_en_text: Ooh ma ma! Look here, miss grown-up! Very fascinating creature here, all dead in bits now, but still good!<page>She takes the shape of the woods for her body, and her hair like bitter leaves! Clever, thinks Nuu!<hpage>This creature staked its territory here and attacked as I passed through.<hpage>You should not linger long. Her tribe remains hidden amongst the branches, disguised and waiting to strike.<page>Oooh! So the cutting-up was done by you? Nuu gives her warm thanks! Now Nuu can inspect this creature well, all its gooey insides and crunchy shell!
original_zh_text: 哇！大姐姐快看！这只死透的怪物超有趣！<page>身体像树干，头发像苦叶子！努努觉得它超聪明！<hpage>这生物占据此处，袭击路人。<hpage>别久留，它的同族还在树丛里埋伏呢。<page>哇！是你干掉的？太感谢啦！现在可以好好研究它的粘液和脆壳了！
translated_text: Oh, mother. Look, my gentleman and my lady. "The fascinating creatures here are dead, but they 're still okay!<page>Your body is like a forest, and your hair is like a bitter leaf.<hpage>This creature has established a territory here, and when it passes, it attacks.<hpage>His tribe hid among the branches of the trees, camouflaged themselves and awaited an attack.<page>Oh! Oh! Did you cut it? I sincerely thank you for that! The rays of the mantle allow us to study this creature well, including its sticky inner space and fragile shell.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 어머니.이봐요, 신사와 숙녀님. "이곳의 매혹적인 생물들은 죽었지만, 그들은 여전히 괜찮습니다!<page>너의 몸은 숲과 같고, 너의 머리카락은 쓴 잎과 같다.<hpage>이 생물은 여기 영토를 세우고 지나갈 때 공격합니다.<hpage>그의 부족은 나무의 나뭇가지들 사이에 숨어 위장하여 공격을 기다리고 있었다.<page>오! 오!오! 오!잘랐어요?나는 진심으로 그것에 대해 감사한다!맨틀의 광선은 우리가 끈적끈적한 내부 공간과 취약한 껍질을 포함하여 이 생물을 잘 연구할 수 있게 해준다.

original_en_text: Here they limply lay, the castaways and the disillusioned and the used-up.<page>It’s a sorry settlement you’ve summoned, miss bellringer, and a blasted bother for me. Not sure we have anything to offer ‘em... Not even hope.

I know what we must do... <page>The bugs below... who have imbibed the substance... and evolved... their bodies are full with Plasmified Blood...<page>You must use the Needle Phial and extract this precious nectar... only by scrutinising it... can we attain higher knowledge...
