We know what we need to do.<page>The following mistakes.I have taken this substance. and evolves.Your body is filled with blood consisting of plasma.<page>In order to extract this precious honey, it is necessary to use a purple needle.Please check carefully.Can you get more knowledge?
secondary_translated_text: 조수는 혈장의 기적에 대해 더 많이 배웠습니다.우리는 우리가 해야 할 일을 알고 있다.<page>다음의 실수. 나는 이 물질을 복용했다.당신의 몸은 혈장으로 구성된 혈액으로 가득 차 있습니다.<page>귀한 꿀을 추출하기 위해서는 보라색 바늘을 사용해야 합니다. 자세히 확인해 주시기 바랍니다. 더 많은 지식을 얻을 수 있습니까?

original_en_text: The bugs below who have imbibed the substance and evolved... their bodies are filled with Plasmified Blood...<page>You must use the Needle Phial and extract this precious nectar... only by scrutinising it... can we attain higher knowledge...
original_zh_text: 那些……吸收生质液进化的生物……体内有生质血……<page>用储液针管提取……分析后……我们就能获得高阶知识……
translated_text: Insects absorb and develop these substances. Their bodies are filled with blood formed from the plasma.<page>In order to extract this precious honey, it is necessary to use a purple needle.Please check carefully.Can you get more knowledge?
secondary_translated_text: 곤충은 이러한 물질을 흡수하고 발전시킵니다.그들의 몸은 혈장에서 형성된 혈액으로 가득 차 있습니다.<page>귀한 꿀을 추출하기 위해서는 보라색 바늘을 사용해야 합니다. 자세히 확인해 주시기 바랍니다. 더 많은 지식을 얻을 수 있습니까?

original_en_text: What fear arrests you...? This must be done... or we will never learn the deeper truth... Never become what is needed...
original_zh_text: 怕什么？……不这么做……永远不懂真相……永远无法进化……
translated_text: What fear stopped him? We must do this, otherwise you will not be able to grasp the profound truth, it will never be what you need.
secondary_translated_text: 어떤 두려움이 그를 막았을까?우리는 이것을 해야 한다. 그렇지 않으면 너는 깊은 진리를 파악할 수 없고, 그것이 네가 필요로 하는 것이 결코 되지 않을 것이다.

original_en_text: Ahhhh. Yes... Assistant. So loyal... Take the Needle Phial... find the plasmified bugs below...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract their Plasmified Blood.<page>Once we have it... we can peer deeper... learn more... enlighten ourselves fully...
original_zh_text: 啊……好助手……拿上储液针管……找到因生质液进化的生物……<page>蓄满力……扎入它们体内……提取生质血。<page>有了它……我们能更深入……学习……完全开悟……
translated_text: - ¡Oh, yeah! The assistant is very faithful. Hold the seat of the needle. Find the plasmatizing bacteria below.<page>I'm doing everything I can for Phil. Push deep. Collect plasma and blood.<page>Once you get it, you can look closer to find out more ... enough to encourage
secondary_translated_text: - 오, 그래!조수는 매우 충실하다.바늘의 좌석을 잡아라.아래에서 plasmatizing 박테리아를 찾으십시오.<page>나는 필을 위해 할 수 있는 모든 것을 하고 있다.깊게 밀다.혈장 및 혈액을 수집합니다.<page>일단 당신이 그것을 얻으면, 당신은 더 자세히 알아보기 위해 더 자세히 볼 수 있습니다 ...격려하기에 충분하다.

original_en_text: <hpage>The roaches outside, why are they kept in pens? They seem a dangerous creature to cage or tame.<page=S>Us moorbugs gotta eat, don’t we? They’re wild fast breeders, them Muckroaches. Hard shells and tough meat, if you can even crack ‘em open, but options ain’t plentiful so we ain’t choosy.<page=S>Ain’t so bad to eat, once you’re used to it. The guts is the best bit, but them’s a choice cut and we ain’t had it for ages now.<page=L>Har har, life is tough all right! Benj’n here’s wasting away before us, poor wretch!<page=L>Tugs at your emotions, eh missy? How ‘bout you put that poker to good use? Go poach some of them roaches and get us some tasty guts. There’d be fair trade waitin’ for you.
original_zh_text: <hpage>外头的蟑螂为何要圈养？此等凶兽关起来有什么好处？<page=S>我们这些沼地的虫子总得吃饭吧？淤秽蟑螂繁殖得贼快。虽然壳硬肉糙，破开都费劲，但我们也没得挑嘛。<page=S>吃惯了也倒还行。内脏最香，但这种精贵部位我们早八百年没尝过了。<page=L>哈！日子苦啊！瞧班金这体格，已经饿得瘦骨伶仃了！<page=L>是不是很可怜我们啊，小姐？要不用你那根烧火棍帮我们开开荤？去宰几只蟑螂，把内脏取来，我们会给你个公道价！
translated_text: <hpage>Why are the beetles locked in the fence when they 're there? They are like dangerous creatures that can neither be imprisoned nor tamed.<page=S>You should eat worms, right? Really? These are cheap with a hard shell and hard flesh, if you can open, there are several options, so there are no insistencies.<page=S>Once you get used to it, it tastes not so bad anymore. Jelly is the best part, but they are the choice, and we haven't eaten them in a long time.<page=L>Life is really difficult! Benjamin is losing weight before us, poor man!<page=L>Let your emotions come out, right? What? Why not play poker? " Discover the beetles for yourself and buy me tasty guts. Fair trade awaits you!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>딱정벌레들이 거기에 있을 때 왜 울타리에 갇혀 있습니까?그들은 감옥에 갇히거나 길들일 수 없는 위험한 생물과 같습니다.<page=S>벌레를 먹어야지, 그렇죠?진짜?이들은 단단한 껍질과 단단한 살이 저렴하며, 열 수 있다면 여러 가지 옵션이 있으므로 고집이 없습니다.<page=S>일단 익숙해지면 더 이상 맛이 나쁘지 않습니다.젤리는 가장 좋은 부분이지만, 그들은 선택입니다, 우리는 오랫동안 그들을 먹지 않았습니다.<page=L>인생은 정말 힘들어!벤자민이 우리 앞에서 살이 빠지고 있어요, 불쌍한 녀석아!<page=L>감정이 나오게 해줘, 그렇죠?뭐야?왜 포커를 하지 않나요? "너 자신을 위해 딱정벌레를 발견하고 나에게 맛있는 내장을 사.공정무역이 당신을 기다리고 있습니다!

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have brought a Queen’s Egg, at request of Bellhart’s couriers. It was a hazardous journey, but the creature inside has made it here alive.<page>Sssssss! How sss-ssublime! To think that my dear misss-stress would be the one to deliver the preciousss package! I had feared for the competence of those feeble couriersss...<hpage>It surprises me to know you correspond with them. I must wonder where else you go and who else you speak to after you scurry back up into the darkness...<page>Ssss. My whispersss-ss travel far, misstressss. You need not worry yourssself with my comingsss and goingss-ss. All I do... is in your sssss-service.<page>And now, pleasssse... give her to me... the little queen!
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我应钟心镇送货员之请，带来了一枚女王之卵。路途虽险，但卵内的生物尚且还活着。<page>咝——！何等殊荣！竟然由主人亲自护送这样宝贵的包裹！奴才我早就觉得这些送货员无能了……<hpage>你与他们有过联系？这倒是让我惊讶。不知道你遁入这片黑暗后，还与哪些虫往来过……<page>咝——奴才的低语声能传得很远，主人您无需担心我的行踪。奴才所为……皆为效忠于您。<page>现在，恳请您……将小女王……交给我！
translated_text: <hpage>At the request of the messenger Bell's Heart, I brought the Queen's Egg. It was a dangerous journey, but the creatures inside it keep it alive.<page>The Shia! SSS - Sublim! I think my dear stressed wife is the one who provides the precious package! I am concerned about the weakness of the post office.<hpage>I want to know where you 've been since you went back to the dark and who you 've been talking to.<page>"My whisper has come a long way, ma ' am. Don't worry about my coming in and going out. I will serve you what I have done.<page>Go, go, go!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>메신저 벨 하트의 요청에 따라 나는 여왕의 달걀을 가져왔다.그것은 위험한 여행이었지만 그 안에있는 생물들이 그것을 살아있게했습니다.<page>시아파 (Shia) SSS - Sublim!나는 나의 소중한 스트레스를받은 아내가 귀중한 패키지를 제공하는 사람이라고 생각합니다!나는 우체국의 약점을 걱정한다.<hpage>어둠으로 돌아간 후 어디 갔는지, 누구와 이야기 했는지 알고 싶어.<page>"내 속삭임은 아주 먼 길을 왔다, 부인.내 출입에 대해 걱정하지 마.내가 한 일을 네게 봉사하리라.<page>가, 가, 가!

original_en_text: <hpage>The beasts outside and their masters alike are all ensnared by this land’s silken affliction. You are lucky bugs to have not succumbed.<page=L>The Haunting? Oh, we’s got that all worked out. Benj’n and me are a right pair of philosophers when we bend our minds to it.<page=L>It’s faith that gets you. It’s all caused by being too devout!<page=S>Yeah! Or maybe not bein’ devout enough!<page=L>Or maybe it’s safest not to think about it at all. Har har!
original_zh_text: <hpage>外头那些虫兽与其饲主都遭受丝咒侵蚀。二位未被沾染，实属侥幸。<page=L>丝咒？早研究透啦！班金和我可是哲学大师！<page=L>信仰过头的才会中招！全是虔诚惹的祸！<page=S>对！但如果不够虔诚，兴许也会中招！<page=L>要我说，最安全的办法就是别去瞎琢磨！哈！
translated_text: <hpage>The outer beast and its masters are immersed in the silky torments of the earth. You are lucky that your mistakes do not go away.<page=L>The Ghost? When we are focused on this moment, Benjamin and I are good philosophers.<page=L>It 's the faith that attracts you. It 's all religious!<page=S>Ah, yeah! They're not religious.<page=L>Perhaps the safest thing you can do is not to think about it. Ha ha ha!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>바깥쪽의 짐승과 그 주인들은 지구의 실크의 고통에 빠져 있습니다.당신의 잘못이 사라지지 않는 것은 행운입니다.<page=L>유령은?우리가 이 순간에 집중할 때, 벤자민과 나는 훌륭한 철학자입니다.<page=L>당신을 끌어들이는 것은 신앙입니다.그것은 모두 종교적이다!<page=S>아, 그래!그들은 종교를 믿지 않는다.<page=L>아마도 당신이 할 수있는 가장 안전한 일은 그것에 대해 생각하지 않는 것입니다. 하하!

original_en_text: While you sss-stalk through the black-ravaged world, morsss-ssels will I grow. For the promiss-sse of what my misss-tress will become... I will toil, alwayssss...
original_zh_text: 只要主子您还在黑灾肆虐之地穿行，咝——奴才便会辛勤劳作，为主人进行培育。为主人脱胎换骨的承诺……咝——奴才至死方休！
translated_text: I grew up when you were going through a devastated black world and I was a little more mature. We will work forever. "
secondary_translated_text: 나는 당신이 황폐한 흑인을 통과하고있을 때 자랐고, 나는 조금 더 성숙했습니다.우리는 영원히 일할 것이다. "

original_en_text: <page=S>It’s said the moors used to grow a bounty of fresh food, way back befores that Citadel set us about catchin’ their fallin’ thread.<page=S>Sounds right lovely, eh missy? Always eatin’, never troubled by no grumblin’ belly?<page=L>Har har! Yer like a hatchling, Benj’n! So given to fancies! <page=L>Now breedin’ roaches is what keeps us from starvin’. Dangerous work, and not the finest diet, but we ain’t complainin’.<page=L>Specially as more and more of them keepers are succumbing to the strange sickness. Only means more meat for us. Har!
original_zh_text: <page=S>传说在圣堡逼我们捡拾掉落的丝线之前，沼地也曾盛产新鲜美食。<page=S>听着多美啊，小姐。一天到晚地吃，不用担心饿肚子。<page=L>哈！班金，你是刚破卵的吗？净做白日梦！<page=L>现在我们只能靠养蟑螂混口饭吃。这活危险，伙食差，但我们从不抱怨。<page=L>你看吧，越来越多的监管者都染上怪病。但往好处想，对我们来说，肉倒是更加管够了！哈！
translated_text: <page=S>It is said that the bites grew a lot of fresh food long before the castle gave them a clue.<page=S>Sounds good, eh? Isn't that so, lady? Do you eat all the time and you get nervous or angry?<page=L>Ha ha ha! You are like a bird, Benjamin. You will be charmed by fantasies.<page=L>Today, breeding beetles is free from hunger.The work is dangerous, and the food is not the best, but I do not complain.<page=L>In particular, more and more farmers are dying from this strange disease.This means more meat. "
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>물린 사람들은 성이 그들에게 단서를 주기 훨씬 전에 신선한 음식을 많이 키웠다고합니다.<page=S>잘 들리죠, 응?그렇죠, 아가씨?당신은 항상 먹고 긴장하거나 화가 나 있습니까?<page=L>하하!너는 새와 같구나, 벤자민.당신은 환상에 매료될 것이다.<page=L>오늘날, 사육 벌레는 굶주림이 없습니다. 작업은 위험하고 음식은 좋지 않습니다. 하지만 나는 불평하지 않습니다.<page=L>특히, 점점 더 많은 농부들이 이 이상한 질병으로 죽고 있습니다. 이것은 더 많은 고기를 의미합니다. "

original_en_text: <page=L>We’re all fine here, miss. Content, like. P’raps it were time you made your way, eh?<page=S>Yeah, be on your way! And, erm, thanks for yer help there.
original_zh_text: <page=L>我俩在这儿好得很，小姐。差不多该动身了吧？<page=S>对，赶紧走！另外，呃……多谢帮忙。
translated_text: <page=L>- All right, Miss. Content, that is, now you have to make your way.<page=S>All right, go ahead. Once again, thanks for yours.
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>- 알았어, 아가씨내용, 즉, 이제 당신은 당신의 길을 만들어야합니다.<page=S>좋아, 계속 해봐다시 한 번, 당신의 것에 대해 감사합니다.

translated_text: Buying the steel?

original_en_text: Sssss. Your hunger betrayssss-ss you, misstress. The morsel was not yet grown, but let it anger you not. I will grow you another... for I am your sss-ssslave.
original_zh_text: 咝——您看起来饥饿难耐了，主人。食物还未养成，请您息怒。奴才我继续努力……因为我永远是您的仆从。
translated_text: Your hunger has betrayed you. The pressure is too high. I am not yet grown, but do not be angry. I will make another one for you. I am your slave. "
secondary_translated_text: 너의 굶주림이 너를 배신했다.압력이 너무 높습니다.나는 아직 성숙하지 않았지만, 화내지 마라.당신을 위해 다른 하나를 만들 것입니다.나는 당신의 노예입니다. "

original_en_text: Ssss! You have come to claim me, and I am yourssss. I am your humble sss-ssslave!<hpage>I’ve no interest in mastery over you, sir. If my cutting down of those black masses aided you, it was merely by chance. Farewell.<page>Farewell...? No... the sss-strong claim the weak, and the weak must sss-ssserve! I am yoursss, my mistress, and you muss-sst protect me!<page>Sss-ssee what I have built here! Prepared, for the coming of my mistressss. My powerful missssss-tress!<page>While you are away hunting, I will grow you... ssss-something good. But the work takesss time. Return to me sssss-soon, and you may have what I grow...
original_zh_text: 咝——！您来收服奴才了！奴才是您的，卑微的仆从！<hpage>我无意当你的主人。若清除那些黑暗之物帮助了你，仅是机缘巧合。告辞。<page>告辞……？不行不行……咝——强者当纳弱者，弱者理应侍奉！奴才归您了，主人您必须庇护我！<page>快瞧奴才为您建的巢穴！专为恭迎您的到来！我强大的主人！<page>您外出狩猎时，奴才将为您培育……一些好东西。但奴才我需要一些时间。等您回来，就能得到我培育的成果……
translated_text: Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! You have asked me, and I am yours. I am a humble slave.<hpage>If my black file helped him, it was an accident. Goodbye, sir.<page>Farewell. Farewell? ... The strong are called the weak, and the weak are called SS-SS. I am yours, my love, protect me! "<page>"Look, look what I 've done! Prepare to meet your beloved, My Mighty Wife.<page>When you go hunting, I will help you to grow good ones. However, this work takes time. Return to Me immediately and you will receive what I have planted. "
secondary_translated_text: Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! - Shh! - Shh!당신은 나에게 요청했고, 나는 당신의 것입니다.나는 겸손한 노예이다.<hpage>내 검은 파일이 그에게 도움이 된다면 그건 사고였어.안녕히 계세요.<page>안녕히 가세요.작별 인사? ...강한 자는 약한 자라고 불리고 약한 자는 SS - SS 라고 불린다.나는 너의 사랑이야, 나를 보호해! "<page>"이봐, 내가 뭘 했는지 봐!당신의 사랑하는, 나의 강력한 아내를 만날 준비를 하십시오.<page>사냥하러 갈 때, 나는 좋은 것을 키우도록 도와줄 것이다.하지만 이 작업은 시간이 걸립니다.곧 내게로 돌아오라 그리하면 내가 심은 것을 너희가 받을 것이다. "

original_en_text: <page=S>Wh... why the delay? You keepin’ them guts for yourself? Here, Crull, she’s goin’ back on her promise!<page=L>Har. Promises is easily broken. But then, so’s a lot of other things. How ‘bout you reconsider yer greed there, missy?
original_zh_text: <page=S>啧……怎么磨磨蹭蹭的？你想私吞内脏？克鲁尔，她反悔啦！<page=L>哈，承诺不就是易碎。虽然其他东西也挺易碎的。小姐，要不重新掂量下你这贪心值不值当？
translated_text: <page=S>This is what... Why the delay? Do you have the courage to do that? And here you are, Krull, break your promise!<page=L>Hull 's promises are easy to break. There are many other things, right? Why don't you reconsider your greed?
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>이건...왜 지연되는가?당신은 그렇게 할 용기가 있습니까?그리고 여기 있어, 크릴, 약속을 깨라!<page=L>헐의 약속은 깨지기 쉽다.다른 많은 것들이 있습니다. 그렇죠?왜 당신의 탐욕을 재고하지 않습니까?

original_en_text: <page=S>Oi! You ain’t got the beads? Or you just not wantin’ to part with ‘em? <page=L>Hardly the time to be a miser, missy. You’re gonna be livin’ sick till you buy these spines from us.
original_zh_text: <page=S>喂！你是身上没念珠，还是舍不得花？<page=L>小姐，现在可不是抠门的时候！不买这些钢棘，你就只能继续病着了！
translated_text: <page=S>Hey, hey, hey, hey! Do you have any pearls? Do you want to part with them?<page=L>Now is not the time for the poor. You will be sick before you buy these spines from us.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>이봐, 이봐, 이봐!진주가 있습니까?당신은 그들과 헤어지고 싶습니까?<page=L>지금은 가난한 사람들을 위한 때가 아니다.이 가시들을 우리에게서 사기 전에 당신은 아플 것이다.

original_en_text: Ssss! You have come to claim me, and I am yourssss. I am your humble sss-ssslave!<hpage>I’ve no interest in mastery over you, sir. If my slaying of these creatures aided you, it was merely by chance. Farewell.<page>Farewell...? No... the sss-strong claim the weak, and the weak must sss-ssserve! I am yoursss, my mistress, and you muss-sst protect me!<page>Sss-ssee what I have built here! Prepared, for the coming of my mistressss. My powerful missssss-tress!<page>While you are away hunting, I will grow you... ssss-something good. But the work takesss time. Return to me sssss-soon, and you may have what I grow...
original_zh_text: 咝——！您来收服奴才了！奴才是您的，卑微的仆从！<hpage>我无意成为你的主人。若杀掉这些虫兽帮助了你，仅是机缘巧合。告辞。<page>告辞？不行不行……咝——强者接纳弱者，弱者应当侍奉！奴才归您，主人您必须保护我！<page>看奴才我建的巢穴！专为恭迎主人的到来！强大的主人！<page>您外出狩猎时，奴才将为您培育……一些好东西。但奴才我需要一些时间。等您回来，就能得到我培育的成果……
translated_text: Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! You have asked me, and I am yours. I am a humble slave.<hpage>If you help kill a creature, it's just an accident. Farewell, sir.<page>Farewell. Farewell? ... The strong are called the weak, and the weak are called SS-SS. I am yours, my love, protect me! "<page>"Look, look what I 've done! Prepare to meet your beloved, My Mighty Wife.<page>When you go hunting, I will help you to grow good ones. However, this work takes time. Return to Me immediately and you will receive what I have planted. "
secondary_translated_text: - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh!당신은 나에게 요청했고, 나는 당신의 것입니다.나는 겸손한 노예이다.<hpage>만약 당신이 생물을 죽이는 것을 돕다면, 그것은 단지 사고일 뿐이다.안녕히 계세요<page>안녕히 가세요.작별 인사? ...강한 자는 약한 자라고 불리고 약한 자는 SS - SS 라고 불린다.나는 너의 사랑이야, 나를 보호해! "<page>"이봐, 내가 뭘 했는지 봐!당신의 사랑하는, 나의 강력한 아내를 만날 준비를 하십시오.<page>사냥하러 갈 때, 나는 좋은 것을 키우도록 도와줄 것이다.하지만 이 작업은 시간이 걸립니다.곧 내게로 돌아오라 그리하면 내가 심은 것을 너희가 받을 것이다. "

original_en_text: A cage with a simple lock.
translated_text: A cell with a lock.

original_en_text: Sssss! I saw you. I sssss-saw what you did!
original_zh_text: 咝——！我看见了。奴才我看见您的手段了！
translated_text: The Shia! I look at you, I see what you have done.
secondary_translated_text: 시아파 (Shia)나는 당신을보고, 당신이 한 것을 봅니다.

translated_text: <hpage>I 'll talk to you again. They 're showing off their looks.

original_en_text: <hpage>Good bugs, I am here on request of the doctor Yarnaby. She requires spines forged of steel for a crucial operation.<page=L>Argh! Look at ‘er, Benj’n. She’s all sick like! Coiled up tight with somethin’ weird. I reckon that operation’s for her herself!<page=S>She’s a sad sight for sure Crull, but sick or not our scrap’s hard-found. If she’s wantin’, we’s gotta be gettin’ paid!<page=L>Ah! ‘Fraid the little one speaks true, missy. You might be ailin’, but we can’t be offerin’ charity. <page=L>We’re stockin’ the spines you need. You just gotta be ready to part with some beads!
original_zh_text: <hpage>二位，我受雅纳碧医生所托来到此处。她需要一些钢棘来完成一场重要的手术。<page=L>啊呀！班金快看，她病恹恹的！壳里缠着怪东西，手术是要给自己做的吧！<page=S>惨是惨，但咱的废料也是辛辛苦苦收集来的。想要就得掏钱！<page=L>唉！班金说得对，小姐。您虽然是病患，但我们不做慈善。<page=L>只要念珠够，钢棘有的是！
translated_text: <hpage>I came at the request of Dr. Anabi. The operation requires a steel column.<page=L>¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! "Look at Benjamin, he 's very sick! Strange things and wrap it tightly. The operation is for you.<page=S>Krul, it is of course a sad sight, but whether we are sick or not, it is difficult to find our waste.<page=L>¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! "What a child says is the truth.You may be sick, but you cannot be merciful.<page=L>We have the necessary backbone.You just need to be willing to give up a few pearls!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 아나비 박사의 요청에 따라 왔다.이 작업에는 강철 기둥이 필요합니다.<page=L>오, 그래!오, 네! "베냐민을 봐, 그는 매우 아프다!이상한 물건은 단단히 감싸라.수술은 당신을위한 것입니다.<page=S>크룰, 그것은 물론 슬픈 광경이지만, 우리가 아프든 아니든, 우리의 폐기물을 찾는 것은 어렵습니다.<page=L>오, 그래!오, 네! "어린이가 말하는 것은 진실이다. 너는 병이 있을지도 모르지만, 너는 자비가 없다. "<page=L>우리는 필요한 백본을 가지고 있습니다. 당신은 단지 몇 개의 진주를 기꺼이 포기해야합니다!

original_en_text: Strong you are, misstress! Sss-ssmall, but so so deadly. And your ssscent! Well-aged!
original_zh_text: 咝——您真强悍，主人！身形虽小，杀伐果决。还有这味道——古老的气息！
translated_text: - You're strong, lady. Hush: small but deadly. and his scene. I am old!
secondary_translated_text: - 당신은 강하군요, 아가씨. Hush : 작지만 치명적입니다.그리고 그의 장면.나 늙었어!

original_en_text: Leave it, bug. I accept my place.<hpage>Very well, prisoner.
original_zh_text: 别管我了，小虫子。我已认命。<hpage>悉听尊便。
translated_text: Forget it, Dad. I take mine.<hpage>- All right, prisoner.
secondary_translated_text: 잊어라, 아빠.나는 내 것을 가져간다.<hpage>- 알았어, 죄수야.

original_en_text: Sssss! Such sssss-sounds, plucked from the air and caught in your Silk! A marvel, my misss-stress...<hpage>It is a skill that any can learn. You could master this sound yourself, if you cared to.<page>No... a slave must grow morsels for his mistresssss. But the sssound... is so ssssss-soothing...
original_zh_text: 咝——！此等丝弦天籁，主人，这真是神迹……<hpage>这项技艺所有虫子皆可习得。你若愿意，也能精通。<page>不……仆从必须为主人培育食物。但这天籁之音……实在是令我感到抚慰……
translated_text: The Shia! The whistle sounds are taken from the air and imprinted in your silk! Pressure, gentlemen.<hpage>This is a skill that anyone can learn. You can check your voice if you need to.<page>The slave must grow something for his beloved. C: It is a kind of liberation.
secondary_translated_text: 시아파 (Shia)휘파람 소리는 공중에서 가져와 당신의 실크에 새겨져 있습니다!압력, 신사님.<hpage>이것은 누구나 배울 수 있는 기술이다.필요하다면 목소리를 확인할 수 있습니다.<page>노예는 자기 사랑하는 사람을 위해 무언가를 재배해야 한다. A: 그것은 일종의 해방이다.

original_en_text: It is done. Our nessst is larger, and the little queen beginssss her toil. <page>More morsss-ssels can I grow for you now! Are you pleasss-sed with me, my missstress-ss?<hpage>You are diligent at your work, and have raised no claw against me. If it remains so, I will have no reason to be displeased.<page>Ssss! Then my work will continue! For I am ever your devoted sss-ssslave!
original_zh_text: 大功告成。巢穴已扩建完毕，小女王已经开始她的劳作。<page>现在奴才我可以为您培育更多的食物了！您对我满意吗，我的主人？<hpage>你工作勤勉，也从未对我起过任何歹意。若能保持如此，我便没有不满的理由。<page>咝——！奴才一定继续勤恳工作！因为我永远是您忠诚的仆从！
translated_text: The Queen who decides our affairs is getting bigger and bigger, and even the little Queen is working hard.<page>You can grow more grass. - "Will you stay with me, Miss? "<hpage>Work hard and don't touch it, if it stays like that, I have no reason to be angry.<page>Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! My work will continue! I will be your faithful servant forever.
secondary_translated_text: 우리들의 일을 결정하는 여왕은 점점 커지고 있으며, 어린 여왕조차도 열심히 일하고 있습니다.<page>더 많은 풀을 자랄 수 있습니다. - "나랑 같이 있어 줄래, 아가씨? " "<hpage>열심히 일하고 만지지 마. 그렇게 계속되면 화를 낼 이유가 없어.<page>- Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh!나의 일은 계속될 것이다!나는 영원히 당신의 충실한 종이 될 것입니다.

original_en_text: Ssss! Mistress, is the morsss-sssel I grew worthy? You must conss-sume... conssss-sume and become sss-stronger.<page>Thissss is how I will sss-sserve my misstress-ss. While you hunt, I will prepare morsssels. Alwaysss, preparing them for my mighty misssss-tresss...<hpage>Continue this work if it pleases you sir, but do not call me your mistress, for I am not.<page>Sss... but you are... missstress. You are ssss-strong and I am weak.... a sss-sslave. Alwayss-sss, your ssss-slave...
original_zh_text: 咝——！主人，奴才培育的食物可还合您心意？请享用……变得更强大。<page>这就是奴才我的侍奉之道。您外出狩猎时，奴才准备食物。永远为主人效劳……<hpage>先生，若你乐于此道便请继续，但请不要称我为主人。我并非你的主人。<page>咝——可您就是……我的主人。您强大，我弱小……我永远是您的仆从……
translated_text: Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! This loving, son of a bitch who grew up with me, is it worth it? We must recognize it, to understand it and to be stronger.<page>This is the care of my beloved.When we hunt, we cook food.Get ready for your wife.<hpage>"Continue the work if you want. "Don't call me your lover.<page>Shh, you are... You are strong, I am weak, slave. Become your own slave SSS.
secondary_translated_text: - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh!나와 함께 자란 이 사랑스러운 개자식, 그만한 가치가 있을까?우리는 그것을 인식하고, 이해하고, 더 강해져야 한다.<page>이것은 내 사랑하는 사람의 보살핌이다. 사냥할 때, 우리는 음식을 요리한다. 네 아내를 위해 준비해라.<hpage>"원하시면 계속 작업을 진행하세요. "나를 연인이라고 부르지 마.<page>Shh, you 're...너는 강하고 나는 약하다, 노예야.자신의 노예 SSS 가 되십시오.

original_en_text: <page=S>That smell! S’overwhelming! I ain’t never seen so many roach guts at once!<page=L>Benj’n, me old mate, get a grip on yerself. These guts still need cuttin’, and cleanin’, and stewin’. You got a lotta work ahead of you.<page=S>Fine by me, Crull, if it means such a feast! We’ll be eatin’ like they do up in the Citadel soon enough!<page=L>And what about you, missy? You be joinin’ us for this exquisite meal?<hpage>I’m afraid not, sirs. I must keep moving, and I fear the taste of such a delicacy is wasted on me.<page=L>I was hopin’ as much. Two can sing, but three’s too many, eh? Har har!<page=L>Still, maybe this tool is enough for you to ‘member us by? A pointed weapon of me own makin’, from when I used to wrangle the Muckroaches meself. I bet you’ll get some good use from it.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这味儿！够冲！我这辈子没见过这么多蟑螂内脏！<page=L>班金老伙计，稳住！这些内脏还得切洗炖煮，你的活还多着呢。<page=S>包在我身上，克鲁尔！我们能吃上圣堡级别的宴席啦！<page=L>小姐您呢？要赏脸和我们共进大餐不？<hpage>恕不奉陪，我得继续前行了。而且此等美味给我享用，实属浪费。<page=L>正合我意！俩虫享用正好，仨就嫌多！哈！<page=L>但我希望这工具能让您记住我俩。这是当年我还在驯蟑螂时亲手制作的武器，希望您用得顺手。
translated_text: <page=S>This smell! Crashed! I've never seen so many beetle organs!<page=L>"Benjamin, my old man, check yourself.These internal organs must be cut, washed, and boiled.Much remains to be done.<page=S>If that means a party like that... I don't have any problems! I'll eat like a castle.<page=L>Miss, is this you? Why don't they eat well together?<hpage>Unfortunately, not everyone is afraid that this taste will be wasted.<page=L>I 'd love to sing with two people, but it 's too much for three people, right? Really? Ha ha ha!<page=L>But is this enough to "join us "? I have fought with bugs, so this is a weapon that I made myself. I am sure you will use it well.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>이 향기! Crash!딱정벌레의 장기가 이렇게 많은 것을 본적이 없어!<page=L>"내 노인 베냐민아, 너 자신을 확인해봐, 이 내기들은 잘라 씻고 끓여야 한다.<page=S>만약 그게 그런 파티를 의미한다면...난 아무런 문제가 없어!나는 성처럼 먹을거야.<page=L>아가씨, 이 분이신가요?그들은 왜 함께 잘 먹지 않는가?<hpage>불행히도, 모든 사람이이 맛이 낭비 될 것을 두려워하는 것은 아닙니다.<page=L>2 명으로 노래하고 싶지만 3 명으로 너무 많죠?진짜?하하!<page=L>하지만 ' 우리에 합류하기 ' 로 충분합니까?나는 벌레와 싸웠고, 그래서 이것은 내가 만든 무기입니다.나는 당신이 그것을 잘 사용할 것이라고 확신합니다.

original_en_text: Take. Ahhh, my reward. Give them.
original_zh_text: 我要拿走。啊……我的奖赏。给我。
translated_text: My reward. Give them.

original_en_text: With thissss... ssso caringly delivered by the misstresss... our nesssst can be expanded!
original_zh_text: 咝——这是……主人亲自护送过来的……我们的巢穴可以扩建了！
translated_text: Our needs can expand - be kind to the owner of this thing.
secondary_translated_text: 우리의 필요를 확장 할 수 있습니다 - 이 물건의 소유자에게 친절하십시오.

original_en_text: Leave me be. This kingdom’s collapse has come. Better I stay here to accept it.<page>To die within a cage... A fitting finale for this shell, and a well deserved fate for these cursed lands.<hpage>As you wish, prisoner.
original_zh_text: 让我安安静静待在这里吧。这个王国即将倾塌，我应当待在这里，坦然接受一切。<page>在囚笼中死去……也算是我这副甲壳注定的命数了，这片诅咒之地亦是如此。<hpage>如你所愿。
translated_text: Reassure me, the fall of the kingdom has come, it is better to stay here and accept it.<page>It was the end of a worthy fate for this shell and for the cursed earth.<hpage>Whatever you want, prisoners.
secondary_translated_text: "나에게 안심시켜라, 왕국이 무너졌으니, 여기 머물러서 그것을 받아들이는 것이 낫다.<page>그것은 이 껍질과 저주받은 지구에 대한 합당한 운명의 끝이었습니다.<hpage>원하는 대로, 죄수들아.

original_zh_text: 我能感知到你，藏起来的那位。
translated_text: I could hear you. They were hiding.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 너의 말을 들을 수 있었다.그들은 숨어 있었다.

original_en_text: <page=L>Another trade fairly conducted, har. Those spines are sharp, and they’s hardly begun to rust. Better be gettin’ back to your doc to get yerself sorted out, eh?
original_zh_text: <page=L>又一笔公道买卖，哈。这些钢棘锋利如初，基本还没开始生锈。快去找您那位医生治病去吧！
translated_text: <page=L>Another fair deal, isn't it? What? The thorns are sharp and strongly wrinkled. Should I go to the doctor and treat it? Really?
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>또 다른 공정한 거래죠?뭐야?가시들은 날카롭고 주름이 심하다.의사에게 가서 치료해야 합니까?진짜?

original_en_text: <page=L>We’re still waitin’ on them roach guts you promised us, missy. Patiently, but not too patiently, you get me?<page=S>You can find the Muckroaches all ‘round these roads. Cut one down and reach inside its shell to pull out the tasty guts! Mmmmm!
original_zh_text: <page=L>小姐，我俩还等着您许诺的蟑螂内脏呢。耐着性子等，但也不太耐烦了，懂我意思吗？<page=S>淤秽蟑螂到处都是，找一只来宰了，破开外壳，把内脏取来。唔——我都流口水了！
translated_text: <page=L>Wait for the internal organs of the patient, but don't be too patient.<page=S>There are beetles on the street.Cut one side and put your hand in the shell to remove the taste intestines!М м м.
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>환자의 내기를 기다리지만 너무 참을성 있게 하지 마라.<page=S>거리에 딱정벌레가 있어요. 한쪽을 잘라서 껍질에 손을 넣어서 맛의 장을 제거하세요!음, 음.

original_en_text: Give them. Take wrong. Ssssomeone, ssssave me.
translated_text: I got you wrong, please help me.
secondary_translated_text: 내가 당신을 잘못 이해했으니, 제발 도와주세요.

original_en_text: <hpage>I can sense you there, hidden in the darkness. Show yourself.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我能感知到你，隐匿于黑暗之中的那位。现身吧。
translated_text: <hpage>I can hear you hiding in the dark. They show off their looks.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>어둠 속에 숨어 있는 너의 목소리가 들린다.그들은 그들의 외모를 과시한다.

original_en_text: <page=L>Refuse us, do you, missy? No matter then. We’ll just get back to slowly starving, har har!
original_zh_text: <page=L>小姐，你真要拒绝我们吗？无妨！继续慢慢饿死呗，哈！哈！
translated_text: <page=L>Mr. Ulysses? We came back slowly and hungry.

original_en_text: <page=L>Ooh, someone’s carrying a delectable scent! Come to deliver us what you promised, missy?
original_zh_text: <page=L>噢，你身上有股好香的味道！小姐是来兑现承诺的吧？
translated_text: <page=L>Someone smells good. Did you come to fulfill your promise?
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>누군가 좋은 냄새를 맡는다.약속을 지키기 위해 왔습니까?

original_zh_text: 咝——食物……交出来。我要拿走。
translated_text: Moses, give it to me, take me.

original_en_text: <page=L>Thinkin’ serious about the spines, missy? Surely your good health’s worth more than a few beads!

original_en_text: I’m loath to spoil the surprise, but curiosity begs me to ask. Do you know why they pursued you? Those Citadel bugs?<hpage>I have seen their Citadel and its state, and I have strong suspicion...<hpage>They hunt me for my nature. For the Silk produced within my shell. Not for themselves but for the one atop it all. <page>Ahh ha! Truth. In Pharloom, yours is a rare skill, prized beyond measure, to channel one’s soul within a thread. Soul and Silk inseparably linked.<page>It is a skill almost lost from Pharloom. Those old Weavers shared it, but they’re long dead now.<hpage>The one atop this kingdom... They share my nature, or some part of it. I’ve seen their Silk at work, in vast scale.<hpage>It snares the shells of those upon the roads, and guides with false life the many hollowed husks left to lapse.<page>Hmm... You’ve looked far towards the truth of it. Closer even than I’d dare to dig. But then you’re clearly of the countenance to be coping with such heady stuff...<page>Now! It’s past time you were going! Your style and your Silk sure are fine, but stay too long and you’ll only be trouble for me!
original_zh_text: 我本来不想多嘴，但实在好奇，圣堡的虫为何追你？<hpage>见过如今的圣堡后，我怀疑……<hpage>它们觊觎我甲壳产出灵丝的能力，而且是为了顶上那位。<page>哈！肯定是这样！在纺络，以魂注丝是无价神技，让魂与丝成为一体。<page>这技艺近乎失传。曾经的织者倒是会，如今早死绝了。<hpage>王国之上那位……与我同源，曾见识过相似的灵丝。<hpage>用丝线缠缚朝圣者，操纵空壳作为傀儡<page>嗯……你眼力不错！圣堡啊……答案都在那条路上，慢慢攀吧姑娘。<page>好了，你该走了！虽你长得英姿飒爽，但身负灵丝，久留只会给我惹祸！
translated_text: I didn't want to spoil the surprise, but curiosity made me ask. Are you distracting them from the insects?<hpage>I saw their chastity and their condition, and I suspected that they were the same.<hpage>I have lost my head because of the silk, I have a face. Not for me, but for the one who is above.<page>Oh, oh, oh! In the Pharaoh of Truth, his skill is a rare and precious skill that carries the soul of man by a thread.<page>This is a skill that most crazy people have lost. The old tissue has split, but they are already dead. "<hpage>His nature is the same as mine, or part of it. I have seen work on a large scale of silk.<hpage>The road leads to a multitude of empty shells to close the shells of people, leaving behind a false life.<page>Ugh, uh, uh... We can see the truth in the distance. Closer than I have ever been. But of course, you have the ability to cope with such an exciting thing. "<page>Now! You have to leave! Their style and silk are really fantastic, but if you stay any longer, you will find it.

"<page>지금!떠나야 해!그들의 스타일과 실크는 정말 환상적이지만, 더 오래 머물면, 당신은 그것을 찾을 것입니다.

original_en_text: A smart choice. Get out there and gather those spine cores, and best you be quick about it.<page>As nice as it is to have the company, if you hang around too long, those Citadel bugs’ll turn their gaze on me as well.
original_zh_text: 明智的选择。那就快去收集棘刺吧，最好手脚麻利点。<page>虽说有身边个伴也挺好，但你在这待太久会连累我也遭到圣堡注目。
translated_text: That's a reasonable choice. Let's go out and collect the core of the column.<page>It 's good to have companions, but if I stay any longer, the insects will turn my eyes.
secondary_translated_text: 그건 합리적인 선택이야.우리 나가서 그 기둥의 핵심을 모자.<page>동반자가 있으면 좋지만, 내가 더 오래 머무르면 곤충들이 내 눈을 돌릴 것이다.

original_en_text: If you’re planning to ascend from these low fields, you’ll be needing some lift, and I’m just the bug to help.<page>Head for the caves beyond my home. The bugs within produce a spine with a marvellous core, flexible yet strong.<page>Cut their spines and collect the cores. Return to me, and I’ll soon have your old cloak transformed into something far more buoyant.
original_zh_text: 想从这低地往上去，得靠点助力，我正好能帮忙。<page>去我家附近的洞窟，里头的甲虫能产出一种奇妙棘刺，柔韧又结实。<page>收集棘刺交给我，保准把你的旧披风改造得轻巧如羽！
translated_text: If you need an elevator to climb this low field, it only helps the insects.<page>From my house to this cave.Insects in the interior develop a large vertebrae with a flexible and durable core.<page>Cut the spine and raise the core. Return home and quickly exchange the old coat for a lighter one.
secondary_translated_text: 이 낮은 들판을 오르기 위해 엘리베이터가 필요하면 곤충을 돕는 것뿐입니다.<page>내 집에서 이 동굴에 이르기까지. 내부의 곤충들은 유연하고 내구성있는 코어와 큰 척추를 개발합니다.<page>척추를 자르고 핵을 들어올립니다.집에 돌아와 빨리 낡은 외투를 가벼운 외투로 바꾸세요.

original_en_text: Pale beast... bringing ruin... we had sensed it... you writing harsh our final fate...<page>If power... you come seeking... mine is faded.... mortal... time taken...<hpage>I seek only to save these lands, great one, to break them free from this fatal sickness born of thread and void.<page>Kcha! If you may... beast... If you can...
original_zh_text: 苍白异兽……携灾而至……吾等早有预感……汝书写的，是斯卡尔的终章……<page>若力量……是汝所求……吾已衰微……凡躯……时日无多……<hpage>我只为拯救这片土地而来，蚁后，将众生从丝线与虚空带来的灾厄中解放。喀嚓！……若汝能……异兽……若汝可……
translated_text: The white beast will bring destruction. We feel the cruelty of his works, our ultimate fate.<page>If you have the power, come and take it, mine will disappear, normal people take time.<hpage>"Great man, I 'm just saving this earth from this deadly disease that was born of wire and void.<page>Stay with this! Animals, if possible.
secondary_translated_text: 하얀 짐승은 파괴를 가져올 것이다.우리는 그의 작품의 잔인함, 우리의 궁극적 인 운명을 느꼈습니다.<page>네가 힘이 있다면, 와서 가져가라, 내 힘이 사라질 것이고, 평범한 사람은 시간이 걸린다.<hpage>"위대한 사람아, 전선과 공허로 태어난 이 치명적인 질병으로부터 지구를 구하고 있는 거야. "<page>이것과 함께!가능하면 동물도

original_en_text: Well, then! I can tell by the rattling from within your cloak, your hunt was a success! If you’ll kindly pass over the cores, I can get to work.
original_zh_text: 嗯，我能听到你披风里的窸窣声，看来是满载而归！棘刺拿来，我马上开工。
translated_text: Then go! By the sound of the coat, you can tell that your hunt was successful! If I can get through the core then I can start working.
secondary_translated_text: 그럼 가자!외투의 소리로, 당신은 당신의 사냥이 성공했다는 것을 알 수 있습니다!만약 내가 핵심을 통과할 수 있다면, 나는 일을 시작할 수 있다.

original_en_text: Save them... if you can... pale beast...
original_zh_text: 拯救他们……若汝可……苍白异兽……
translated_text: Save them! "If it is possible. "Beast of Straw"
secondary_translated_text: 그들을 구하라! "가능하다면. Beast of Straw (짚의 짐승)

original_en_text: Ahhh... I am so tired. But to tarry long would be sacrilege...
original_zh_text: 唉……太累……但久留便是渎神……
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! I 'm tired, but I 'm ashamed to stay too long.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!나는 피곤하지만 너무 오래 머무는 것이 부끄럽다.

original_en_text: Very well, ssspiidderr. Keep your organsss, for now.
original_zh_text: 好吧，小蜘蛛……留着你的内脏，咝——暂时。
translated_text: Excellent job, IDR. Preserve the organs for a while.
secondary_translated_text: 좋은 일, IDR.장기를 잠시 동안 보존합니다.

original_en_text: <page>Oooh! Stray one. Do tell, how goes the journey?<hpage>I have ventured high, seen the Citadel and its state. That place is long lost... generations lost, a gilded tomb, drowned in Silk dregs.<hpage>For its minions, so compelled in my capture, I now see clearly the source of their unity, and their strange strength... They are husks bound tight by the one who waits at its crest...<page>Agh! Look at you! Seeing right through to the truth of it! Closer even than I’d dare to dig. But then you’re clearly of the countenance to be coping with such heady stuff...<page>Now! Best you be heading. You’re clearly planning to stir up some serious trouble. I don’t want to be close when it kicks off!
original_zh_text: <page>哟！浪游者。最近怎么样？<hpage>我攀到了高处，见到了如今的圣堡。宛如一座镀金坟冢，浸在腐朽丝渣里。<hpage>那些想抓我的喽啰，我也看清了。都是被顶端那位用丝线操控的傀儡……<page>嗬！这就看清了真相！比我更敢深究。看你这副神情，摆明了是要碰一碰这硬茬……<page>那就赶紧上路！既然你要惹大麻烦，我可不想被波及！
translated_text: <page>Oh! Oh! One of the vagabonds. Tell us about how your trip went.<hpage>I went up and saw the castle and how it was. This place has long since disappeared. A generation passed, and the golden grave was full of silk debris.<hpage>As for their people, I have been forced to capture too many people, in whom I could now clearly see the source of their unity and their strange strength; they are a shell tightly attached to those who wait on the top of the mountain.<page>¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! And look at yourself! Look through the truth! Closer than I 've ever been. But of course you have the ability to cope with such an exciting thing. "<page>Now! You 'd better leave, you 'll cause serious problems. I don't want to get too close to the beginning of the game.
secondary_translated_text: <page>오! 오!오! 오!방랑자 중 한 명.당신의 여행이 어떻게 진행되었는지 우리에게 말해주세요.<hpage>나는 올라가서 성과 그것이 어떻게 생겼는지 보았다.이곳은 오래 전에 사라졌다.한 세대가 지났는데 황금 무덤은 실크 잔해들로 가득 차 있었다.<hpage>그들의 백성에 관해서는, 나는 너무 많은 사람들을 포획하도록 강요 받았는데, 그들 속에서 나는 이제 그들의 단결과 그들의 이상한 힘의 근원을 분명히 볼 수 있었다; 그들은 산 꼭대기에서 기다리고있는 사람들에게 단단히 붙어있는 껍질이었다.<page>오, 그래!오, 네!그리고 너 자신을 봐!진실을 보아라!그 어느 때보다 더 가까이 왔어.그러나 물론 당신은 그런 흥미로운 일에 대처할 수있는 능력을 가지고 있습니다. "<page>지금!너는 떠나는 것이 좋을 것이다. 너는 심각한 문제를 일으킬 것이다.나는 경기의 시작에 너무 가까이 가고 싶지 않다.

original_en_text: That pouch of yours... With the scraps left here and a little work, I could add some pockets for you, let you carry more tools and shards while on the road. That’d be nice, wouldn’t it?
original_zh_text: 你这工具袋……我能加点布料，让它能多塞工具。这样路上也方便，对吧？
translated_text: The suitcases leave the trash here, and with a little work you can add bags to carry more tools and trash on the road. Is that not true?
secondary_translated_text: 가방은 쓰레기를 여기에 남겨두고 약간의 작업으로 더 많은 도구와 쓰레기를 도로에 운반 할 수있는 가방을 추가 할 수 있습니다.그게 사실이 아니야?

original_en_text: All those gooey bugssss, all so reluctant to share their organs. Sssooo much coaxing and gnawing, and prodding.<page>They should be proud! Their ssmall sssacrifice would become much sssustenance for my ferocious young.
original_zh_text: 那些黏糊糊的虫子，个个抠门不肯掏出内脏给我。咝——连哄带骗，又咬又戳，才肯给我。<page>他们该骄傲！咝——这点小牺牲能养大我那群凶猛的孩子。
translated_text: Not all worms share their organs. Many things, chewing and irritation.<page>You must be proud of them! Your little sacrifice will be a staple food for my proud descendants.
secondary_translated_text: 모든 벌레가 장기를 공유하는 것은 아닙니다.많은 것, 씹는 것과 자극.<page>당신은 그들을 자랑스러워해야합니다!너의 작은 희생은 나의 자랑스러운 후손들에게 주식이 될거야.

original_en_text: For your efforts, take these rosaries as payment. May they not lay too heavy upon your shell.
original_zh_text: 这是酬劳，但愿念珠不会压垮你的行囊。
translated_text: Accept this Rosary as a reward. Try not to put too much weight on your helmet.
secondary_translated_text: 이 로자리를 보상으로 받아라.헬멧에 너무 많은 무게를 넣지 않도록하십시오.

original_en_text: <hpage>I will not offer my own organs, hunter, though I may bring the meat of others slain.<page>Good ssspidderr! Ssskewered. Ssshredded. Ssseared! Bring it all. Much will be needed, enough to sate my brood to come.<hpage>Several of my tools can prepare the meats as you request. I have been fortunate to find so varied an arsenal within your lands.<page>My brood has not long till hatching, ssssspiddderrr. Do your duty ssswift, and you shall sssee reward for the sssslaughter.
original_zh_text: <hpage>猎手，我不会为你献上自己的内脏，但也许我能带给你其他猎物的血肉。<page>咝——！好啊，小蜘蛛！串烧、撕碎、炙烤！统统带来。我的孩子需要大量血肉才能饱足。<hpage>我带的工具能按你的要求处理血肉。你们这地界真像个武器库，各种装备种类齐全。<page>我的孩子就快孵化了，咝——小蜘蛛……动作快点，完成我的需求，必有重谢。
translated_text: <hpage>I'm not going to sacrifice my organs, Hunter, but I can bring more sacrifice flesh.<page>Spider. Hisse. Shhhhh, Shhhhh! You will bring all of this, and you will need many things for your children and grandchildren.<hpage>Tools for cooking meat are available on request. I was lucky to have found such a weapon in your country.<page>My child will soon be born, SSspidddderr. By fulfilling his duties, he will be rewarded by the law.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>내 장기를 희생하지 않을 거야 헌터, 하지만 더 많은 희생살을 가져올 수 있어<page>스파이더. Hisse. Shhhh, Shhhh!여러분은 이 모든 것을 가져오고, 자녀와 손자를 위해 많은 것이 필요할 것입니다.<hpage>고기를 요리하는 도구는 요청에 따라 제공됩니다.나는 당신 나라에서 그런 무기를 발견하게 되어 운이 좋았다.<page>내 아이는 곧 태어날 것이다, SSspidddderr.그의 의무를 완수함으로써, 그는 법에 의해 보상을 받을 것이다.

original_en_text: <hpage>I’ll have the spine cores for you shortly, madam.<page>Good, good! The caves just beyond here are full of the creatures, floating carelessly in the warm air.<page>I’m sure your big needle there can coax them into sharing their spines. Then it’s only a quick matter of cutting them open and grabbing the cores.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我稍候就带来棘刺，女士。<page>好！附近的洞窟里到处是那种浮空的蠢虫。<page>你的长针肯定能"劝"它们献出棘刺。
translated_text: <hpage>You 'll be ready for your spinal cord right away.<page>All is well, all is well.The distant caves are filled with creatures floating in the hot air.<page>You think that your big needle can convince you to share the spine, so quickly cut and capture the core.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>당신은 곧 척수를 위해 준비 될 것입니다.<page>모든 것이 괜찮아, 모든 것이 괜찮아. 먼 동굴은 뜨거운 공기에 떠있는 생물들로 가득 차있다.<page>당신은 당신의 큰 바늘이 척추를 공유하도록 설득 할 수 있다고 생각하므로 빨리 자르고 핵심을 잡습니다.

original_en_text: A holy burden to help maintain your poise. Whether striking others or being struck yourself, you’ll remain firmly in place.
original_zh_text: 这份神圣负赘能帮助你维持姿态，无论攻守都能稳如磐石。
translated_text: It is a sacred duty to keep calm, if you attack others or yourself, you are firmly in your place.
secondary_translated_text: 침착함을 유지하는 것은 신성한 의무이며, 당신이 다른 사람이나 자신을 공격한다면, 당신은 확고하게 당신의 위치에 있습니다.

original_en_text: Not interested in trade? I wonder, will your rosaries weigh you down during your ascent?
original_zh_text: 不做买卖？揣着念珠攀登不怕负担过重？
translated_text: Are you not interested in trading? - Is your roses heavy when you wake up?
secondary_translated_text: 당신은 거래에 관심이 없습니까? - 깨어났을 때 장미가 무겁나요?

original_en_text: Perfect! These should be more than enough. Wait there just a moment and we’ll soon have you soaring up and away from these lowlands.
original_zh_text: 完美！这些够用了。稍等片刻，保你能够腾空而起，远离这破地方。
translated_text: Ideal! That 's enough. Please wait a moment. I 'm going to get you out of this low ground right now.
secondary_translated_text: 이상!이 정도면 충분하다.잠시 기다려주세요.나는 지금 당장 너를 이 낮은 곳에서 끌어낼 것이다.

original_en_text: Rkraha. Uohk kha!<hpage>My apologies, sir. Though I can grasp the language of many bugs, your words are unfamiliar even to me.<page>Kha... kha mauak. Noku... gri?<hpage><hpage>These items you have collected. These are the wares of a warrior. Do you wish to trade?<page>Noku... noku!
original_zh_text: 尔克拉哈。乌奥赫克 喀！<hpage>抱歉，先生。虽然我略懂各族虫语，但你的语言我实在不熟。<page>喀……喀 玛阿克。诺库……格日？<hpage><hpage>你收集的这些东西……是战士的货。你想交易？<page>诺库……诺库！
translated_text: "Let 's go to Luke, Luke! Uohk kha!<hpage>I understand the language of many insects, but I don't know yours.<page>"Is that a beetle, Jerry Wilde?"<hpage><hpage>Items that you collect. It belongs to the warrior. Do you want to trade?<page>Wild, wild!
secondary_translated_text: "루크에게 가자, 루크! Uohk kha!<hpage>나는 많은 곤충의 언어를 이해하지만, 나는 당신의 언어를 모른다.<page>"저게 딱정벌레야, 제리 와일드? " "<hpage><hpage>당신이 수집한 물품은 전사의 소유입니다.거래하고 싶으세요?<page>야생, 야생!

original_en_text: Get a move on, stray one! We’re all suffering for your conflict... Maybe next time you act towards calmer conclusions, aye?
original_zh_text: 快去吧！大伙都在遭罪……下次闹腾的时候悠着点行不？
translated_text: Go on, Ranger. Maybe next time you'll come to a more sober conclusion.
secondary_translated_text: 어서 가, 레인저다음번엔 좀 더 신중한 결론에 도달할 수 있을지도 모른다.

original_en_text: These humble shards can form together into something grand, if you possess the vision to shape them.
original_zh_text: 这些碎片应该能拼凑成形，但要看你有无打磨的技巧。
translated_text: If you have a vision, these small pieces can come together and make something big.
secondary_translated_text: 비전이 있다면, 이 작은 조각들이 함께 모여 큰 것을 만들 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: After all that hunting, you won’t trust me with your spoils? You’re a funny one. They won’t do you any good just filling up your pockets!
original_zh_text: 大费周折取来棘刺，却信不过我？你可真逗。揣着这些刺有什么用！
translated_text: Are you afraid to return your prey after the hunt? You are an interesting person. They only fill your pockets and do not bring you profits!
secondary_translated_text: 사냥 후에 먹이를 돌려주는 것을 두려워합니까?당신은 흥미로운 사람입니다.그들은 단지 당신의 주머니를 채우고 당신에게 이익을 가져다주지 않습니다!

original_en_text: That’s a fancy pin you’re flaunting upon your cloak there. Here’s hoping you didn’t have to kill to claim it.<hpage>The emblem was given freely, Seamstress, as reward for a fierce duel won fair.<page>Given freely!? My, my. So my sister’s welcomed another to the order... Sounds like age might’ve softened even her stoic style.<page>Can’t say I think too fondly on the old ways... but some rituals, and some memories... those are still worth preserving.
original_zh_text: 披风上别着的针徽挺漂亮嘛，但愿不是从尸壳上抢来的。<hpage>这针徽是公平比斗赢来的，女士。<page>她自愿给的？！哎呀呀，竟然纳新成员入团……岁月到底是软了她古板心肠。<page>我不待见那些古训……但有些仪式，有些回忆……还是值得留存。
translated_text: It 's a good leather in a coat. I think it can be done without killing people.<hpage>The heroine receives a symbol of grace, as the reward for a fierce duel is fair.<page>Are you free? Maybe her age will soften her stoic style, but she 's not sure.<page>I can't say that I really like the old methods, but some rituals, some memories.
secondary_translated_text: 외투에 가죽이 잘 어울린다.나는 그것을 사람들을 죽이지 않고도 할 수 있다고 생각한다.<hpage>여주인공은 격렬한 결투에 대한 보상이 공정하기 때문에 은혜의 상징을 받습니다.<page>자유가 있니?아마도 그녀의 나이로 인해 그녀의 무성적인 스타일이 부드러워질지 모르지만, 그녀는 확신하지 못한다.<page>나는 오래된 방법을 정말로 좋아한다고 말할 수는 없지만, 일부 의식, 일부 추억.

original_zh_text: 尔克拉哈。滕克 乌奥肯。
translated_text: "Let 's go to Luke, Luke! Wookken.

original_en_text: Yes, that’s better. Sharing your devotion with me will surely bring you luck.
original_zh_text: 这就对了。分我一份虔信自会带来好运。
translated_text: Yes, that 's good. Sharing your devotion brings you luck.
secondary_translated_text: 네, 좋아요.당신의 열정을 공유하는 것은 당신에게 행운을 가져다줍니다.

original_en_text: Well, aren’t you a sight! No, don’t tell me! You’re as odd as they come.<page>Your poise! Your form! Are you hunted? Pursued? The Citadel would see a fine prize in you.<hpage>It is as you say, madam. Veiled bugs of the Citadel brought me to your land. I now seek for one who would answer why, and will ask with force as needed.<page>Ha! Fierce too! These are bleak times, but a powerful stray like you could certainly cause some change.<page>Well then! I’ve no love for that holy caste, and I do worry for this kingdom’s ailing state. If you’re seeking to settle a score, perhaps I can lend some aid?
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧这模样！让我猜猜，你不是这里的虫吧？<page>这仪态！这身姿！你正被追杀？被通缉？圣堡肯定很重视你。<hpage>如你所言，女士。覆面虫将我带来此地，我打算向圣堡讨个说法。<page>哈！还挺凶！现在外面乱得很，你这般强悍的浪客肯定能搅出点动静。<page>正好！我也讨厌那群圣徒，也忧心王国的灾祸。你要找他们算账的话，或许我能帮衬？

original_en_text: That beast! What wicked punishments are sent to test us! Why must we pilgrims, who have done no evil, be so tormented?<page>Tell me, where is it written? This law that says we must suffer every hardship just to earn the merest hope of happiness?<hpage>Wild lands like these are ruled by instinct, not laws. You must rely on your own strength and skill to survive.<page>I have neither! If what you say is true, I may as well crawl outside and let myself be devoured right now. Save myself some worry!<hpage>Do as you wish, but I think perhaps you underestimate yourself. To climb this far and survive here so long is a task beyond most of your fellow pilgrims.<page>Hmph. I’m no better than any of them. It’s only luck that has gotten me this far, and it’s on luck that I shall continue to rely.
original_zh_text: 那头凶兽！肯定是降罪试炼！我们朝圣者未行恶事，为何要遭此折磨？<page>告诉我，哪本法典写着必须历尽苦难才配期盼幸福？<hpage>荒野奉行本能，而非法典。想要生存，唯有靠自己的能耐。<page>自己的能耐？如果真是如此，不如出去喂了野兽，省得煎熬！<hpage>请便。但别低估了自己，能攀登至此，你已强过多数同袍。<page>哼，我与他们无异。全凭运气苟活，往后也指望运气。
translated_text: This beast! What terrible punishment! Why should a pilgrim, who has never done anything wrong, suffer so much?<page>Tell me where it is written: Does this law say that we must endure all our sufferings in order to have hope of happiness?<hpage>This wild nature is driven by instinct, not by law.To survive, you must rely on your strengths and abilities.<page>I've got both! If what you're saying is true, I'd better go out now and have a drink. Don't worry!<hpage>Soaring so far and surviving for a long time is a job that most pilgrims cannot do.<page>You and I are no better than one or the other. I came here by chance and I will trust her.

original_en_text: I’m loath to spoil the surprise, but curiosity begs me to ask. Do you know why they pursue you? Those Citadel bugs?<hpage>No certainty, but I’ve a strong suspicion...<hpage>They hunt me for my nature. For the Silk produced within my shell.<page>Ahh ha! Truth, no doubt! In Pharloom, yours is a rare skill, prized beyond measure, to channel one’s soul within a thread. Soul and Silk inseparably linked.<page>It is a skill almost lost from Pharloom. Those old Weavers shared it, but they’re long dead now.<hpage>There is another alive in this kingdom that shares my nature, or some part of it. I’ve seen Silk similar to my own. It snares the shells of those upon the roads.<hpage>I’ve seen it wrap them, possess them whole. There is will within that thread, one that seems to come from somewhere above us. The Citadel...<page>Hmmmm... Good, sharp sight you’ve got. That Citadel... All roads towards and all answers waiting, and a long climb up there m’dear.<page>Now! It’s time you get going! Your style and your Silk sure are fine, but stay too long and you’ll only be trouble for me!
original_zh_text: 我本来不想多嘴，但实在好奇，圣堡的虫为何追你？<hpage>不确定，但我怀疑……<hpage>它们觊觎我甲壳产出灵丝的能力。<page>哈！肯定是这样！在纺络，以魂注丝是无价神技，让魂与丝成为一体。<page>这技艺近乎失传。曾经的织者倒是会，如今早死绝了。<hpage>此地尚存一虫与我同源，曾见到它用相似灵丝缠缚朝圣者。<hpage>用丝线操纵空壳，且其中藏有源自高处的意志，定是圣堡……<page>嗯……你眼力不错！圣堡啊……答案都在那条路上，慢慢攀吧姑娘。<page>好了，你该走了！虽你长得英姿飒爽，但身负灵丝，久留只会给我惹祸！
translated_text: I didn't want to spoil the surprise, but curiosity made me ask, "Do you know why I 'm watching you? " The Insect Castle.<hpage>I don't know, but I strongly suspect.<hpage>They are chasing me for the silk made from my shell.<page>Oh, oh, oh! The fact, no doubt! In Pharloom, their abilities are rare and precious abilities that hold the human soul together.<page>This is a skill that most crazy people have lost. The old tissue has split, but they are already dead. "<hpage>There is another man who lives in this kingdom, of the same nature as me, or a part of it. I saw a snake that looked just like me. Pick up the shells of people in the street.<hpage>I saw how they were wrapped up and completely possessed. This thread has a will, and it seems that it is approaching us. The Castle<page>Oh ~! "His vision is alive. "All the streets of the castle are waiting, all the answers are waiting, dear, there is still a long way to go.<page>Now! You have to leave! Their style and silk are really fantastic, but if you stay any longer, you will find it.

I 'm lucky more than many others. What 's the difference between a happy and an unhappy person?<page>But for the rest of the time, will we reach an agreement? If you have a rosary, I will gladly take it.
secondary_translated_text: 등산은 고통스럽고, 경건한 사람조차도 그 한계에주의를 기울여야 한다.<hpage>나는 강력한 후크가 없는 총이 이렇게 멀리 갈 수 있다는 것에 놀랐다.<page>물론, 나는 여기에 있는 것이 행운이다.나는 다른 많은 사람들보다 더 운이 좋다.행복한 사람과 불행한 사람의 차이점은 무엇입니까?<page>하지만 남은 시간 동안, 우리는 합의에 도달할 수 있을까?만약 여러분이 묵주기도를 가지고 있다면, 저는 그것을 기꺼이 받아 드리겠습니다.

original_en_text: Hunter... stayss... Shining claw... still... Does themsss help... seek?<page>Usss need meatsss, much, too... Hunter... Usss wants many... Seared... Skewered... Shredded...<page>Usss’s wantss grow sssstrong... much... Be like siblingsss, sharp, hard.
original_zh_text: 咝——猎手……你还在这儿……闪亮的爪子……我需要……帮助……<page>咝——我需要血肉，很多血肉……猎手……我要很多……烤的……串的……撕碎的……<page>咝——我要变壮……要像其他兄弟姐妹那样……壳硬爪利……
translated_text: Hunter Stud "Shining Paw" is not available yet. You investigate?<page>We also need meat. The hunter wanted a lot. I burned, Kebab. They're broken.<page>The desire of Oz is getting stronger. Like brothers and sisters, strong and strong.
secondary_translated_text: Hunter Stud "Shining Paw" 는 아직 사용할 수 없습니다.조사해 봤어요?<page>고기도 필요해요.사냥꾼은 많은 것을 원했습니다.불타버렸어, 케밥.부러졌어<page>오즈의 욕망은 점점 커지고 있다.형제 자매처럼 강하고 강하다.

original_en_text: Well, aren’t you a sight! No, don’t tell me! You’re as odd as they come.<page>Your poise! Your form! Are you hunted? Pursued? The Citadel would see a fine prize in you.<hpage>It is as you say, madam. Veiled bugs brought me to your land. I seek them now, for answers.<page>Ha! Fierce too! These are bleak times, but a powerful stray like you could certainly cause some change.<page>Well then! I’ve no love for that holy caste, and I do worry for this kingdom’s ailing state. If you’re seeking to settle a score, perhaps I can lend some aid?
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧这模样！让我猜猜，你不是这里的虫吧？<page>这仪态！这身姿！你正被追杀？被通缉？圣堡肯定很重视你。<hpage>如你所言，女士。覆面虫将我带来此地，我正在寻找它们。<page>哈！还挺凶！现在外面乱得很，你这般强悍的浪客肯定能搅出点动静。<page>正好！我也讨厌那群圣徒，也忧心王国的灾祸。你要找他们算账的话，或许我能帮衬？
translated_text: You're not a vision. No, no! !¡No, no! !¡Don't tell me that! Strange as they are.<page>His actions! His form! Are you being persecuted? Following him? The castle treats you as a treasure.<hpage>As you say, ma 'am. The worm in the curtain led me to your country. I look for them, I look for answers.<page>Ooo! And by force! These times are holes, but such a powerful bodyguard as you, will certainly change the situation.<page>Everything is okay, everything is okay! All right, all right! All right! I do not like this sacred caste and am concerned about the terrible state of the kingdom. Can you help me if I need a score?
secondary_translated_text: 넌 비전이 아니야.안돼, 안돼! !¡안돼, 안돼! !¡나한테 그런 말 하지마!그들이 하는 것처럼 이상하다.<page>그의 행동들!그의 형태!당신은 박해를 받고 있습니까?그를 따라가나요?성은 당신을 보물처럼 취급합니다.<hpage>말씀하신대로, 부인.커튼 속의 벌레가 나를 당신 나라로 인도했다.나는 그들을 찾고, 답을 찾는다.<page>오오!그리고 강제로!요즘은 구멍이지만 당신처럼 강력한 보디가드는 확실히 상황을 바꿀 것입니다.<page>모든 게 괜찮아, 모든 게 괜찮아!좋아요, 좋아요!좋아요!나는 이 신성한 계급을 좋아하지 않으며, 왕국이 끔찍한 상태에 대해 걱정한다.점수가 필요하면 도와줄 수 있나요?

original_en_text: Hunter... Shining claw... Do not killsss... Mine is ssshell thin. Taste is poor...<page>Me’sss born not like siblingsss, themsss large and hard... All themsss did feasted and flew.<hpage>I see it clear, child. The tall mother’s meat has fed the brood fresh hatched.<hpage>It was a common fate that found her. Too common, perhaps...<page>Gone... the mother, her meatsss... and lifesss... for siblingss strong... not for usss so small... Neverss for usss...
original_zh_text: 猎手……闪亮的爪子……别杀我……咝……我的壳薄……肉柴……<page>我生来不像其他兄弟姐妹……咝——他们甲壳又大又硬……吃饱就飞走了。<hpage>看出来了，小不点。你母亲把自己的肉喂给了其他刚破卵的孩子。<hpage>她命该如此。或许……这就是她的宿命……<page>没了……母亲，她的血肉……和生命……养壮了兄弟姐妹……咝……没我的份……永远没有……
translated_text: Don't tell me you 've lost weight, it 's bad.<page>I was born as a brother or sister. They are big and tough. We all enjoyed the party and left.<hpage>I can see my child. The mother 's meat was donated to a chicken that had just hatched.<hpage>Finding it is our common destiny. Maybe it is too common.<page>I'm going out. Mother, the meat! Life will never be ours.
secondary_translated_text: 네가 살이 빠졌다고 말하지 마, 그건 나쁘다.<page>나는 형제 또는 자매로 태어났다.그들은 크고 튼튼하다.우리는 모두 파티를 즐기고 떠났다.<hpage>나는 내 아이를 볼 수 있다.어머니의 고기는 방금 부화한 닭에게 기증되었다.<hpage>그것을 찾는 것이 우리의 공동 운명이다.어쩌면 그것은 너무 일반적일지도 모른다.<page>나 나 나갈 거야.어머니, 고기!인생은 결코 우리의 것이 아니다.

original_en_text: Pale beast... bringing ruin... we had sensed it... you writing harsh our final fate...<page>If power... you come seeking... mine is faded.... mortal... time taken...<hpage>Great one, I come not to see you as you are, rather I would have you recall what you were, before the pale monarch, when once your heart beat bright and brave.<hpage>That beating heart I would take, though know my intent is worthy.<hpage>I seek it only to save these lands, to break them free from this fatal sickness born of thread and void.<page>Kcha! If you may... beast... If you can... Mine once was power... wild... proud...
original_zh_text: 苍白异兽……携灾而至……吾等早有预感……汝书写的，是斯卡尔的终章……<page>若力量……是汝所求……吾已衰微……凡躯……时日无多……<hpage>蚁后，我来此并非为了觐见，而是追忆您昔年的英姿。在苍白君主降临前，当您的英勇之心仍炽烈搏动之时。<hpage>我欲取得那份搏动之心，还请您相信我的初衷磊落。<hpage>只为拯救这片土地，斩断丝咒与虚空的腐毒。<page>喀嚓！……若汝能……异兽……若汝可……吾曾执掌……狂野……伟力……傲然……
translated_text: The white beast will bring destruction. We feel the cruelty of his works, our ultimate fate.<page>If you have the power, come and take it, mine will disappear, normal people take time.<hpage>I have not come to see what a man you are, a great man, but to remind you of what you were once when your heart was pale and brave before the pale monarch.<hpage>I want to remove this heartbeat, but I know my intentions are worth it.<hpage>To save this earth from the deadly disease of wire and vacuum, I endeavored.<page>Stay with this! If possible, animals. This was pride in nature.
secondary_translated_text: 하얀 짐승은 파괴를 가져올 것이다.우리는 그의 작품의 잔인함, 우리의 궁극적 인 운명을 느꼈습니다.<page>네가 힘이 있다면, 와서 가져가라, 내 힘이 사라질 것이고, 평범한 사람은 시간이 걸린다.<hpage>나는 당신이 어떤 사람인지, 위대한 사람인지 보러 온 것이 아니라, 당신의 마음이 창백하고 용감했던 황제 앞에서 당신이 어떤 사람이었는지 상기시키기 위해 온 것입니다.<hpage>나는 이 심박수를 제거하고 싶지만, 내 의도가 가치가 있다는 것을 알고 있습니다.<hpage>전선과 진공의 치명적인 질병으로부터 이 지구를 구하기 위해, 나는 노력했다.<page>이것과 함께!가능하면 동물.그것은 자연의 자존심이었다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your land’s fate has turned too dire, child. I cannot delay now to help you in your growth.<page>Sssss... So huntersss live... kill... only for selvesss... same as siblings...
original_zh_text: <hpage>你们的这片土地危在旦夕，小不点。时间紧迫，我没法帮你长壮实了。<page>咝……猎手为了生存……而杀戮……只顾自己……和离我而去兄弟姐妹没什么两样……
translated_text: <hpage>My son, the fate of your land is becoming dire.You can't wait any longer to help your growth.<page>The voice of Hits. Hunter was killed on the spot. Only self-portraits of brothers and sisters are allowed.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>내 아들아, 네 땅의 운명이 점점 더 끔찍해지고 있어, 너는 더 이상 기다릴 수 없어, 네 성장을 돕는다.<page>히트의 목소리.헌터는 현장에서 사망했습니다.형제자매의 초상화만 허용됩니다.

original_en_text: These fields are hot and harsh, a miserable place for we pilgrims, and just above are the dreary moors, a place once of abundance lost to falling silt and murky rain.<page>The lands in every direction punish us, but such is our test. Above it all, the Citadel shines, our destination and our reward...<page>I’ll make it there, you’ll see. I’ve easily earned my place in such a paradise.
original_zh_text: <page>再往上，是一片阴雨连绵的沼地，过去的丰饶都化作了泥泞。<page>凶险又容易迷失，是对朝圣者的试炼。而圣堡就在上方，既是终点亦是奖赏……<page>我肯定能抵达，等着瞧。入那乐园我当之无愧。
translated_text: These fields are hot and barren, and an unhappy place for pilgrims. Above was a monotonous desert, which had already lost its fertile soil due to rain from limestone and mud.<page>Every country punishes us, but this is our test. First of all, the castle shines on our destination and on our return.<page>I will be there, and you will see. It is easy to find a place in such a paradise.
secondary_translated_text: 이 들판은 더워서 황량하며, 순례자들에게는 불행한 장소이다.위쪽에는 석회암과 진흙으로 인한 비로 인해 이미 비옥한 토양을 잃은 단조로운 사막이 있었다.<page>모든 나라가 우리를 처벌하지만 이것은 우리의 시험입니다.우선, 성은 우리의 목적지와 우리의 귀환에 빛납니다.<page>나는 거기에 있을 것이고, 당신은 그것을 보게 될 것입니다.그런 낙원에서 장소를 찾는 것은 쉽습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Is this place your permanent home, sir, or do you only make camp?<page>We pilgrims have no home, there is only the path. We climb, and suffer, and are thusly judged.<page>I will linger here only a moment, for the sake of trade. Once I’ve gathered enough rosaries, I’ll be holy enough to ascend without fear.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生可是以此地为家，还是暂驻？<page>朝圣者居无定所，唯有攀登圣途。前路如何，谁能晓得。<page>我小憩片刻就会启程。等攒够念珠，自能无畏登顶。
translated_text: <hpage>Is it your eternal home? Or simply camping?<page>Pilgrims have no home, they have a road. We speak, we suffer, we judge.<page>When you take enough of the Rosary, you become holy enough to ascend without fear.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>그것은 당신의 영원한 고향입니까?아니면 그냥 캠핑을 하는 것일까?<page>순례자들은 집이 없고, 도로가 있다.우리는 말하고, 고통을 겪고, 판단한다.<page>여러분이 충분한 양의 로자리를 먹을 때, 여러분은 두려움 없이 상승할 수 있을 만큼 거룩하게 됩니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>On the far side of Pharloom, I chanced upon a bug starkly similar to yourself.<hpage>From her home, her dress, and her skill, I am guessing you share some relation?<page>Aye. Met my sister, you did, in order at least. Glad to hear she’s still among the living.<page>Last to hold true to the old ways of the pin, she was... I sure ain’t sharing many of those violent values no more.<page>I’ll warn you, stray one, my sister might seem all cheer and charm, but buried beneath there’s the soul of a killer.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我在纺络另一端遇见过与你极为相似的虫。<hpage>根据其居所、衣着和技艺，也许是你血亲？<page>是，那是我的姐妹。她还活着呢？也挺好。<page>她是最后恪守古训的针匠……我早就不玩那套杀戮把戏了。<page>提醒你，我那姐妹看着亲切，骨子里可是杀胚。
translated_text: <hpage>On the other side of the lighthouse I found a worm that looked like you.<hpage>Judging by your house, your clothes, your abilities, how do you think this has to do with it?<page>Yes, they have seen my sister, at least in good condition. I am glad to know she is alive.<page>You 're the last person who sticks to the old way of squeezing. I never share violent values anymore. "<page>I warn you, drifter, my sister may seem cheerful and seductive, but she has the soul of a murderer.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>등대 반대편에서 너처럼 보이는 벌레를 찾았어.<hpage>당신의 집, 옷, 능력으로 판단하면, 이것이 그것과 어떤 관련이 있다고 생각하십니까?<page>예, 그들은 적어도 좋은 상태에서 내 여동생을 보았습니다.나는 그녀가 살아 있다는 것을 알게 되어 기쁘다.<page>당신은 구식 압박을 고수하는 마지막 사람입니다.나는 더 이상 폭력적인 가치를 공유하지 않는다. "<page>내 여동생은 유쾌하고 유혹적인 것처럼 보일지 모르지만 그녀는 살인자의 영혼을 가지고 있습니다.

original_en_text: You would deny my brood their strength, ssspiidderr? A cruel creature you are. Surely your sssmall shell needs hardly so much?
original_zh_text: 你准备饿着我的孩子吗，小蜘蛛？咝——心肠够硬啊。不过，你这小身板能独吞这么多？
translated_text: Will our children be deprived of power? You're a cruel creature. Do you need SSsmall silk?
secondary_translated_text: 우리 자녀들은 권력을 박탈당할 것인가?넌 잔인한 생물이야. SSsmall 실크 필요하십니까?

original_en_text: I’ll string your rosaries tight, for a modest fee. It’s the safest way to keep them close.
original_zh_text: 分我一些念珠，我帮你把它们串牢。贴身保管最稳妥。
translated_text: I fully support your Rosary. It is the safest way to get them.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 당신의 로자리를 전적으로 지지한다.그것은 그들을 얻을 수있는 가장 안전한 방법입니다.

original_en_text: Uoohhh... Sister, my aching shell’s close to breaking. My voice weakens... I can hardly sing a word.<hpage>I fear the path ahead will be no easier for you, ma’am. If you can not abandon your pilgrimage, you should at least rest well before continuing.<page>Ahh... but impurities stalk our every step, sister. If we rest too long, they shall catch us. So... so it is sung...
original_zh_text: 啊……姐妹，我的甲壳快撑不住了……嗓子也哑……唱不动圣歌了……<hpage>前路只会更加凶险，女士。若不愿放弃朝圣，至少养足精神再走。<page>唉……可邪秽如影随形，歇久了必被追上……圣训……是这么唱的……
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! My sick body was about to explode. His voice was weakening and he could barely sing a word.<hpage>Unfortunately, the road ahead is not easy, if you cannot give up the pilgrimage, then it is at least worth taking a break.<page>¡Oh, yeah! Be with me every step of the way, sister! If you rest too long, you will be caught. So, I... I sang that.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!내 병든 몸이 폭발하려고 했다.그의 목소리가 약해지면서 그는 거의 노래를 부를 수 없었다.<hpage>불행히도, 앞으로의 길은 쉽지 않으며, 순례를 포기할 수 없다면 적어도 휴식을 취할 가치가 있습니다.<page>오, 그래!모든 걸음마다 나와 함께 해줘, 언니!너무 오래 쉬면 잡히게 될 것이다.그래서, 나...나는 그것을 노래했다.

original_en_text: That golden knight’s out there, sister, cutting down the lost, keeping us safe.<page>Reckon this place would’ve already been overrun if not for them’n their noble blades.
original_zh_text: 小姐，那位金甲骑士在外面斩杀着被诅咒者，保护我们的安全。<page>没有他那伟大的刺刃，这地方早就败落了。
translated_text: Sister, the Golden Knight is here to destroy the lost and protect us. "<page>If it wasn't for the flattery, this place would have been busy a long time ago.
secondary_translated_text: 누나, 황금 기사님은 잃어버린 자들을 파괴하고 우리를 보호하기 위해 여기 있습니다. "<page>아첨이 아니었다면, 이 곳은 오래전에 바빴을 것이다.

original_en_text: Take some beads for your effort, miss bellringer, and know this sad lot’ll be survivin’ a little longer thanks to you.
original_zh_text: 敲钟者小姐，拿些念珠当作辛苦费吧。多亏你，这些可怜虫又能多苟活几天了。
translated_text: Mrs. Bellinger, prepare the pearls for your efforts. "Thank you, this sad fate will last a little longer.
secondary_translated_text: 벨링저 부인, 당신의 노력에 대한 진주를 준비하십시오. "감사합니다, 이 슬픈 운명은 조금 더 오래 지속될 것입니다.

original_en_text: S’done! The parts are prepared. I’m headin’ up now to set the heavy thing.<page>Even with the trap laid, best be guessin’ her on top won’t go down so simple. She’ll sense what’s comin’.<page>That blade of yours is gonna have to do its work ‘fore this thing can snap.<hpage>I’d expected such, sir. And I am ready. Set your snare. I shall attend shortly.
original_zh_text: 搞定了！部件准备完毕。我这就上去布置。<page>就算陷阱就位，顶上那位也不会乖乖受死。她能预感到潜在的危机。<page>你得先用你的针刃削弱她，这玩意才能触发。<hpage>我早有预料，先生。我已准备就绪。布置陷阱吧，我随后就到。
translated_text: It's over! I 'm getting ready and I 'm gaining weight.<page>Even if the trap is set, it is better to assume that it will not fall easily.<page>Before it breaks, your blade should work.<hpage>I thought he was ready to set a trap for you. I will join soon.
secondary_translated_text: 끝났어요!나는 준비하고 있고 살이 찌고 있다.<page>덫이 설정되어 있더라도 쉽게 떨어지지 않을 것이라고 가정하는 것이 좋습니다.<page>그것이 깨지기 전에, 당신의 칼날은 작동해야한다.<hpage>나는 그가 당신을 위해 함정을 놓을 준비가 되어 있다고 생각했다.나는 곧 가입할 것이다.

original_en_text: Everything is falling apart, my dear one. Be sure to share your rosaries with me before it’s too late!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，这里的一切都在分崩离析。趁现在还来得及，把你的念珠分我一些吧！
translated_text: Please share your rosary with me before it 's too late!
secondary_translated_text: 너무 늦기 전에 나와 함께 당신의 묵주기도를 공유하십시오!

original_en_text: Lots of stories being sung about you, dear one. Gathering supplies, saving lost bugs... all sorts of good deeds!<page>Very clever to craft such a reputation for yourself. If you keep it up, you’ll fast become a legend among these simple sorts.<hpage>I’ve no interest in becoming one, madam. In my long life, I’ve known enough legends, watched them rise and fall and fade away, many times.<page>Is that so, dear? How humble you are! You should know though, this old pilgrim has her sight keenly trained on you! Nothing gets by old Jubilana!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，现在好多虫子都在传颂你的事迹呢。收集物资、拯救迷失的虫子……全是各种各样的善举！<page>你很聪明，给自己打造了这么好的名声。这样下去，你很快就会成为这些单纯的家伙们心中的传奇啦。<hpage>女士，我可没兴趣成为什么传奇。在漫长的一生中，我见识过足够多的传奇，无数次看着他们崛起、衰落、消逝。<page>这样啊？亲爱的，你可真谦逊！不过你要知道，我这个老朝圣者可一直密切关注着你呢！什么都逃不过老朱比拉娜的眼睛！
translated_text: You have a lot of stories.Gather supplies and rescue the lost insects.All good deeds!<page>If you continue to do this, you will soon become a legend of these simple characters.<hpage>- For my long life I have studied the legend well and have seen it rise and fall many times.<page>Isn't that true, honey? How humble that is! But rest assured that the eyes of this pilgrim are looking at you with ease.
secondary_translated_text: 당신은 많은 이야기를 가지고 있습니다. 공급을 수집하고 잃어버린 곤충을 구출. All 좋은 행동!<page>계속하면 곧이 간단한 캐릭터의 전설이 될 것입니다.<hpage>- 내 오랜 생애 동안 나는 전설을 잘 연구했고 여러 번 상승하고 떨어지는 것을 보았다.<page>그게 맞지 않아, 자기야?그것은 얼마나 겸손한 일입니까!그러나 이 순례자의 눈은 편안하게 당신을보고 있다는 것을 확신하십시오.

original_en_text: It was you, wasn’t it? Ringin’ that great clanging bell just now! Right when I’m tryin’ to get some sleep!
original_zh_text: 刚才敲钟的是你吧？叮呤咣啷的！我正要补觉呢！
translated_text: You are, really? There was a huge sound! When you are trying to sleep!
secondary_translated_text: 정말 그래요?큰 소음이 있었다!잠들려고 할 때!

original_en_text: Please don’t go too far, sister. Right here’s the only safety you’ll find within this whole cursed place.
original_zh_text: 小姐，千万别走远。在这片诅咒之地，这儿是唯一安全的地方。
translated_text: Please don't leave, this is the only safe place you'll find in this goddamn place.
secondary_translated_text: 제발 떠나지 마, 이 빌어먹을 곳에서 유일하게 안전한 곳이야.

original_en_text: There must be a few more goodies to gather up here, and I don’t need you lingering around in the meantime. Blessings, and farewell!
original_zh_text: 我这会儿可没法跟你一块回去，路上可能还有好东西等着我捡漏呢。愿你蒙福，再见！
translated_text: There is certainly something good to pick up here, and this time, there is no need to wander.Blessings and farewell!
secondary_translated_text: 이곳에는 꼭 좋은 물건이 있고, 이번에는 방황할 필요가 없다. 축복과 안녕!

original_en_text: Well, well! See here what your brash behaviour has wrought, bellringer!<page>Just as I predicted, this once-peaceful sanctuary is now crawling with all sorts. We’ve the beginnings of a shabby little settlement, all huddled around this old shrine!<hpage>These poor bugs, all are victims of the Citadel and its insidious attraction. This place draws them up, into its maw, only to consume them, utterly.<page>Aye, inside and out, s’nothing but a grand, gilded lie. Well, at least these few stragglers can enjoy a moment’s safety. Poor fools...
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧你干的好事，敲钟者！<page>跟我料想的一样，这座本来平静的钟殿现在挤满了各色杂碎！一帮可怜虫围着那旧钟搭了个窝！<hpage>这些可怜虫都是圣堡的牺牲品，被它的谎话骗来，最终将被吞噬殆尽。<page>哼哼，这里就是个外表光鲜的巨大骗局。不过至少这群蠢货能享受片刻安宁……
translated_text: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Look what your arrogance has done, Berlinger!<page>It 's no wonder that this once quiet sanctuary is now filled with people of all kinds.We 've built a small, strict colony that gathers everything around this ancient temple!<hpage>These poor insects have fallen victim to the castle and its subtle spell.This place will only attract them, put them in the stomach and completely absorb them.<page>Yes, inside it is just a big golden lie. At least those who are left behind will be able to enjoy a safe time. Poor fool! "
secondary_translated_text: 그래, 그래, 그래.너의 오만함이 무슨 짓을 했는지 봐, 베를링거!<page>한때 조용했던 이 성역은 이제 모든 종류의 사람들로 가득 차 있습니다. 우리는이 고대 사원 주위에 모든 것을 모으는 작고 엄격한 식민지를 만들었습니다!<hpage>이 불쌍한 곤충은 성과 그 미묘한 주문의 희생자가되었습니다. 이 장소는 단지 그들을 유치하고, 뱃속에 넣고 완전히 흡수 할 것입니다.<page>네, 그 안쪽은 그저 커다란 황금의 거짓말일 뿐입니다.적어도 뒤에 남겨진 사람들은 안전한 시간을 즐길 수 있을 것입니다.불쌍한 바보야! "

original_en_text: A precious order passed down by the holy conductors. Rare now to find these old texts, and rarer still to find a bug able to read ‘em.
original_zh_text: 神圣指挥官亲笔签发的珍稀敕令。如今，这种古卷已经很难找到了，而能读懂它们的虫子就更少见了。
translated_text: These ancient texts are hard to find, and even harder to find errors than to read them.
secondary_translated_text: 이러한 고대 본문들은 찾기가 어렵고, 읽기보다 오류를 찾는 것이 더 어렵습니다.

original_en_text: Ooh, what a turn-up! I’d feared t’was naught but meself left sane about these halls. Seems this old bug’s luck has not yet worn thin!<hpage>It was more than luck that saw me to you, madam. I promised the wish of bugs concerned for your safety.<hpage>I urge you to head their way now, beside the old bell, up and over.<hpage>A small settlement has formed there, and the bell, reawakened, seems to ward away the worst of the Citadel’s many dangers.<page>A settlement? In these long-haunted halls? Are you telling naughty little lies, dear one? Well, I suppose there’s not too much danger in going and seeing the truth for meself.
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！还以为这鬼地方只剩我没发疯呢！看来我这只老婆子运气还没用完！<hpage>我能找到你可不只是运气使然，女士，我是受其他虫子所托来确保你的安全。请尽快前往上方那座古钟，同那些虫子会合。<hpage>那古钟周围形成了一个小型庇护所，重鸣的钟声似乎能驱散圣堡的大部分危险。<page>庇护所？在这闹鬼的圣堡？亲爱的，你在编故事吧？不过亲眼去看看也无妨~
translated_text: Oh, that's incredible! I thought it was good, but I focused on this room. Obviously, the possibilities of this old mistake are not exhausted!<hpage>I have not had the opportunity to meet with him. I agree with the wishes of the Babs, who are concerned for their safety.<hpage>I suggest you go in his direction, pass the old bell and go up.<hpage>A small colony was formed here, and the bell-men were called again, and it seemed that they could protect the worst from the castle 's many dangers.<page>Reconciliation? In this old house. You're telling a bad lie? I don't think it's dangerous to look at the truth.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 정말 신기하다!나는 그것이 좋다고 생각했지만, 나는 이 방에 집중했다.분명히, 이 오래된 실수에 대한 가능성은 소진되지 않았습니다!<hpage>나는 그와 만날 기회가 없었다.나는 그들의 안전을 걱정하는 Babs 의 소원에 동의합니다.<hpage>나는 당신이 그의 방향으로 가서 오래된 종을 지나서 올라가는 것을 제안한다.<hpage>여기에 작은 식민지가 형성되었고, 벨맨들이 다시 호출되었고, 그들은 성의 많은 위험으로부터 최악의 것을 보호 할 수있는 것처럼 보였습니다.<page>화해?이 낡은 집에서나쁜 거짓말을 하고 있는 거야?나는 진실을 보는 것이 위험하다고 생각하지 않는다.

original_en_text: Be away then, dear one, and leave me to gather up my trinkets and baubles.<page>If this settlement of yours truly has bugs settled safe, I’ll be able to make some lucrative trades. Blessings and farewell!
original_zh_text: 快走吧，亲爱的。别耽误我收拾我的宝贝货物。<page>要是你那庇护所真能安生做生意，老婆子我定能大赚一笔！愿你蒙福，再见！
translated_text: "Come on, honey, let me get my little things.<page>If your agreement safely resolves the error, I can engage in a profitable business.
secondary_translated_text: "이봐, 자기야, 내 작은 물건들을 가져오게 해.<page>만약 당신측의 합의가 그 오류를 안전하게 해결한다면, 나는 수익성 있는 사업에 종사할 수 있다.

original_en_text: It’s feelin’ almost time, eh, bellringer? You and her who waits up there. That fated meeting won’t hold forever... Ready to make your play, to oust one ruler and claim her place?<hpage>I’ll not deny some part of me desires that outcome... Dominance, it seems, is baked deep in my blood, as too, no doubt, for the one up top.<hpage>And yet, another part resists... A part, over time, I find myself siding with more...<hpage>That part wishes not to claim a monarch’s mantle, rather it would see my freedom regained, and this kingdom’s bugs unshackled from their pale chains.<page>...Remarkable idea you’re speakin’ there, bellringer, a world cut free. Not a wish I’ve had much cause to hope on, serious like... but I ain’t so surprised to hear you speak it.<page>For all your helpin’, I been seein’ it clearer. You’ve still got the monarch in you, alright, and the glare of a Weaver, but the ambition... that’s wild different from both.<hpage>If you have already guessed to my desire, sir, and share some part of it, would you offer me aid in the conflict to come?<page>Aye... Maybe, yes. I can barely bear to tell it... But there’s an idea, one rare discussed, for fear of her up there sensin’ the score.<hpage>You have conceived a method, I take it? A way to see a monarch... removed? And me left free from claiming her station?<page>...We have, me and what remains of my family. S’a trap, of a sort, beyond the skill of this Citadel, one to go further than just her binding. You’d be just the hunter to set it, if you’re dare enough to try...
original_zh_text: 时机快到了吧，敲钟者？你和顶上那位迟早要碰面……准备好推翻旧主，自己上位了吗？<hpage>一定程度上，我不否认自己渴求这样的结果……我的统治欲深植血脉，和顶上那位一样。<hpage>但另一部分的我在抗拒……而这一部分正变得愈发强烈……<hpage>不想戴上王冠，只盼重获自由，让这王国的虫民挣脱苍白的枷锁。<page>一个解脱束缚的世界……真是难以想象。我虽然不敢奢望，但从你嘴里说出来倒不意外。<page>看你四处救援，我也明白了。你确有君王的血统和织者的锋芒，但野心……和两者都截然不同。<hpage>先生，既然你已了解我的想法，可否在即将到来的纷乱中助我一臂之力？<page>啊……或许可以吧。我有一计……但这是一招险棋，鲜少被提及，唯恐被顶上那位察觉。<hpage>也就是说……你有能让我弑君并自由脱身的方法？<page>我们……我那残存的家族确实有个计划。那是一种陷阱，一种超越圣堡的陷阱。而你恰好能成为安放这个陷阱的猎手——如果你胆子够大的话……
translated_text: I feel that time is approaching. You and I are waiting for you. Fate does not last forever, right? Are you ready to start a plan to overthrow the ruler and take his throne?<hpage>I can't deny that a part of me wants results. Dominance seems to be deeply ingrained in my blood, and I have no doubt about dominance at the top.<hpage>Others have resisted. "Over time, I have become more and more marginalized.<hpage>They do not want the garments of a monarch, but they want me to be set free, and the insects of the kingdoms to be set free from their pale chains.<page>... "How free you are, Bellinger, is a wonderful idea of a free world. I don't have many reasons to do it, but I really love it. I wouldn't be surprised if they told me.<page>Thank you for helping me, I understand. You still have a monarch 's temperament, well, a talent for weaving, but ambition.<hpage>If you could guess my desires and share some of them, would you help me in the impending conflict? "<page>Yes, maybe, yes. I don't have the courage to say it. But there are ideas that are rarely discussed because of the fear of hearing the score.<hpage>I think you have already figured out how to find monarch. Removal? Am I not going to replace it?<page>... It was a kind of trap, beyond the capabilities of this castle and far beyond its chains.If you have the courage to face the challenge, you are the hunter who sets it.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 시간이 다가오고 있다고 생각한다.너와 나는 너를 기다리고 있다.운명은 영원히 지속되는 것은 아니다, 그렇지?당신은 통치자를 전복하고 그의 왕좌를 차지하는 계획을 시작할 준비가되어 있습니까?<hpage>나는 내 일부가 결과를 원한다는 것을 부인할 수 없다.지배력은 내 피에 깊이 뿌리박혀있는 것 같으며, 나는 정상에서 지배하는 것에 대해 의심의 여지가 없습니다.<hpage>다른 사람들은 저항했습니다. "나는 시간이 지남에 따라 점점 더 소외되었다.<hpage>그들은 군주의 의복을 원하지 않지만, 내가 자유롭게 되고, 왕국들의 곤충들이 그들의 창백한 사슬에서 자유롭게 되기를 원합니다.<page>... "당신이 얼마나 자유롭습니까, 벨링저, 자유 세계에 대한 훌륭한 아이디어입니다.나는 그것을 할 이유가 별로 없지만, 나는 그것을 정말로 좋아한다. 그들이 나에게 말한다면 나는 놀라지 않을 것이다.<page>도와줘서 고마워, 이해해.당신은 여전히 군주의 기질을 가지고 있습니다. 글쎄, 직조에 재능이 있지만 야망이 있습니다.<hpage>내 욕망을 추측하고 그 중 일부를 공유 할 수 있다면, 임박한 갈등에서 나를 도울 수 있습니까? "<page>네, 아마도, 네.감히 말할 수 없는데, 보컬을 듣는 것이 두려워서 거의 논의되지 않는 아이디어들이 있다.<hpage>당신은 이미 군주를 찾는 방법을 알아냈다고 생각한다.제거?내가 그것을 대체하지 않을거야?<page>...그것은 일종의 함정이었다, 이 성의 능력을 넘어, 그 체인을 훨씬 넘어. 도전을 직면 할 용기가 있다면, 당신은 그것을 설정하는 사냥꾼입니다.

original_en_text: What’s that you got there, bellringer? Stole someone else’s soul for yourself?<hpage>You speak of the remnant I found in the muck-choked caves beside the Citadel? This is soul siphoned from a once powerful bug.<hpage>It’s only a thin mix now, but there is still some strength left. At peak, their talents must have been impressive.<page>Aye, they was that. I knew the bug, in ‘is prime, long time back. Braver’n most, and as little a fan of this Citadel as you yourself.<page>Went seekin’ alliance with those basic bugs of the swamps. Thought they’d both gain from the union... Scheming defiance, or some such stupidity!<page>Now he’s as dead as he was daft! Don’t go tryin’ ta make friends in Pharloom, bellringer. Nothin’ good comes of it.
original_zh_text: 敲钟者，你手里攥着什么？偷了谁的灵魂？<hpage>你是说我在圣堡旁边泥沼洞穴里找到的灵魂？这是从一只强大的甲虫身上剥离出来的。<hpage>虽然稀薄但尚存力量，全盛时期定非等闲之辈。<page>啊，没错！我认识那虫子，当年也算条好汉，而且跟你一样厌恶圣堡。<page>居然想联合沼泽平民搞叛乱！以为能互利共赢……真是蠢到家的反抗计划！<page>现在死得渣都不剩！所以说，在纺络交朋友准没好下场！
translated_text: What are you doing, ringing the bells? To steal the souls of others for your own sake?<hpage>Are you referring to the remains found in a mud cave near the castle? A soul derived from a powerful insect.<hpage>It 's a weak combination right now, but it still has some strength. His talent would be impressive at its height.<page>- ¡Oh, yeah! I think this mistake was a golden age long ago. The bravest man doesn't love a castle as much as you.<page>Alliances with these basic bacteria are found in wet areas, and each of us benefits from alliances.<page>Don't try to make friends in the beacon, Bel Linger. No good results.
secondary_translated_text: 뭐하는 거야, 종을 울리는 거야?자기 자신을 위해 남의 영혼을 훔치는 거야?<hpage>성 근처의 진흙 동굴에서 발견된 유해를 언급하신 건가요?강력한 곤충에서 유래된 영혼.<hpage>현재는 약한 조합이지만 여전히 강점이 있다.그의 재능은 최고조 때 인상적일 것이다.<page>- 오, 그래!나는 이 실수가 오래 전에 황금 시대였다고 생각한다.가장 용감한 사람은 너만큼 성을 사랑하지 않는다.<page>이러한 기본 박테리아와의 동맹은 습한 지역에서 발견되며, 우리 각자는 동맹으로부터 이익을 얻습니다.<page>비콘에서 친구를 사귀려고 하지마 벨 링거좋은 결과가 없다.

original_en_text: Hmph. Bellringer, you might think me a dullard, but I understand this place and have well-good senses.<page>Brought here, weren’t you? From beyond the border of our lands?<hpage>You are correct. The one who waits atop this Citadel... Through their hospitality, I arrived in this kingdom. I seek now to return that welcome in kind.<page>Hmph. Beastly words, them. Finely spoken, but beastly all the same.<page>I just pray you don’t bring any more unneeded pain down on the heads of these gormless little pilgrims...
original_zh_text: 哼，敲钟者，别当我是蠢货。我对这地方算是知根知底，而且我的预感往往很灵验。<page>你是从纺络境外被“请”来的吧？<hpage>没错。圣堡顶端那位邀请我来到这个王国……盛情难却，现在轮到我回礼了。<page>冠冕堂皇的野兽做派！话说得再漂亮，骨子里还是透出兽性！<page>只希望你别再牵连这些呆头呆脑的朝圣者……
translated_text: - Hey, Berlinger, you may think I'm an idiot, but I know this place and I have a good feeling.<page>You brought me here, didn't you? What? Outside the borders of our country?<hpage>You are right, people are waiting on the top of the castle. It is through His hospitality that I entered the Kingdom. You also welcome.<page>You speak like an animal. He spoke very well, but he was still a barbarian.<page>I pray that these senseless pilgrims will not suffer unnecessarily anymore.
secondary_translated_text: - 이봐, 버링거, 너는 내가 바보라고 생각할지도 모르지만, 나는 이곳을 알고 있고 나는 좋은 느낌을 가지고 있다.<page>날 여기 데려왔지?뭐야?우리 나라의 국경을 넘어?<hpage>네 말이 맞아, 사람들은 성 꼭대기에서 기다리고 있다.그분의 환대를 통해 저는 왕국에 들어왔습니다.너도 환영해.<page>너는 동물처럼 말을 한다.그는 말을 잘하지만 여전히 야만인이었다.<page>나는 이 무의미한 순례자들이 더 이상 불필요하게 고통을 겪지 않도록 기도한다.

original_en_text: Found it all, did ya, bellringer? Then join me and let’s get to preppin’! I’ll be askin’ both your Silk and your claws ‘fore the construction.
original_zh_text: 找齐了是吧？那就快来搭把手！我需要你的灵丝和利爪参与构建。
translated_text: You found everything, right? Really? - Bellinger? Let's start cooking with me! We asked for silk and nails before construction.
secondary_translated_text: 모든 것을 찾았죠?진짜? - 벨린저?저와 함께 요리 시작합시다!우리는 건설하기 전에 실크와 손톱을 요구했다.

original_en_text: The Citadel chose us, granted us a little more living. For what purpose though, who could say?
original_zh_text: 圣堡选择了我们，赏我们多活两天。谁知道是出于什么目的呢？
translated_text: The castle has chosen us and given us more life. Who can explain the purpose?
secondary_translated_text: 성은 우리를 선택했고 우리에게 더 많은 생명을 주었다.누가 그 목적을 설명할 수 있습니까?
