original_en_text: If’n your wantin’ that trap made, you’d best get to collectin’. I’ll point you toward what’s needed, best as I can.
original_zh_text: 如果决定要把那个陷阱造出来，就快去收集所需的部分。我会告诉你需要做什么。
translated_text: If you want this trap, you better take it. I will do my best to tell you what you want.
secondary_translated_text: 이 함정이 필요하다면, 가져가라. 내가 할 수 있는 최선을 다해 네가 원하는 것을 말해줄게.

original_en_text: Heard you did the savin’ for our dear merchant there? I’ve seen her about, sneaking and scrounging, even a’fore you was ringing that bell.<page>She’s a useful sort, but don’t let her age be foolin’, she’s still the sharpest mind for a deal.<page>Won’t be long till there’s nary a rosary about this shrine that ain’t found its way into her pockets.
original_zh_text: 听说你救了那个奸商？早在你敲钟之前，我就瞧见她在这儿鬼鬼祟祟扒拉破烂了。<page>别看她老，坑钱手段多着呢！<page>要不了多久，这附近的念珠全得进她腰包！
translated_text: I heard that you saved our dear businessman's money. Before he could knock on the door, he saw her begging.<page>He is a useful man, but do not make him a fool, even if he is old.<page>After a while, a rosary from the temple came to his pocket.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 네가 우리 귀한 사업가의 돈을 절약했다고 들었다.그가 문을 두드리기 전에 그는 그녀가 구걸하는 것을 보았다.<page>그는 유용한 사람이지만, 비록 그가 늙어도 그를 바보로 만들지 마라.<page>잠시 후, 성전에서 온 묵주기도 한 권이 그의 주머니에 들어왔다.

original_en_text: Bellringer... Re-thinkin’ on that trap, are ya? It’s a mad method, for sure, but you’d be just the hunter to set it, if’n you’re dare enough to try...
original_zh_text: 敲钟者……有重新考虑过陷阱的事吗？这想法虽然疯狂，但对你来说最合适不过了……如果你胆子够大的话。
translated_text: Who is ringing the bell? Are you trying to rethink your trap? Sure, it 's a crazy approach, but if you dare to try it, you 're just a crazy hunter installing it.
secondary_translated_text: 누가 종을 울리고 있습니까?당신은 당신의 함정을 다시 생각하려고 노력합니까?물론, 그것은 미친 접근법이지만, 감히 그것을 시도한다면, 당신은 그것을 설치하는 미친 사냥꾼입니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Grant me your aid, sir. If your trap provides a path to freedom, both for myself and your land’s bugs, I may indeed choose to trigger it.<hpage>What work do you require of me now to see your service made?<page>It’s my family’s strength you’ll need be seeking, bellringer, us three ol’ bugs still alive, spread ‘cross this kingdom, and one poor cousin dead and drained in swamps choked rotten.<page>Each has power. Raw, savage stuff! For you, they’ll give it, if for their fascination at the act, or the thrill of defiance... or because they have no choice at all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>请助我一臂之力，先生。若你的陷阱真能为这片土地的虫子和我带来自由，我愿成为那个安放它的猎手。<hpage>现在需要我做些什么？<page>去召集我家族的力量——三个苟活的老家伙，他们分散王国各处。还有个可怜的表弟，他死在了腐臭的沼泽。<page>我的家人每个都带着野蛮原始的力量！他们会把力量交给你——或是出于对你这种勇气的欣赏，或是享受反抗带来的的亢奋……抑或是别无选择。
translated_text: <hpage>If your trap would give me, and the worms of your land, a way to freedom, I would decide to provoke you.<hpage>What would you like to do to see your service?<page>In our kingdom there are still three "worms " alive and a poor cousin drowned in a swamp.<page>Everybody has power! You are a barbarian, a barbarian! For you, it 's because if they come in or experience rebellious emotions, they give you a choice or they have no choice.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>만약 당신의 덫이 나에게 그리고 당신 땅의 벌레들이 자유로 가는 길을 준다면, 나는 당신을 도발하기로 결정했을 것입니다.<hpage>당신의 서비스를 보려면 무엇을 하고 싶습니까?<page>우리 왕국에는 아직도 세 개의 "벌레" 가 살아 있고 가난한 사촌은 늪에서 익사했습니다.<page>모두가 힘을 가지고 있습니다!야만인 야만인 야만인!당신을 위해, 그것은 그들이 와서 또는 반항적인 감정을 경험하면, 그들은 당신에게 선택의 여지가 없거나 선택의 여지가 없기 때문입니다.

original_en_text: Real fine key this. No doubt it’ll open the way to somewhere special. Somewhere full of goodies, I’ll bet. Find the lock, and it’ll practically pay for itself!
original_zh_text: 上等货色！毫无疑问，它准能打开某个特殊地方的通路。我敢打赌，那地方肯定堆满了好东西。找到对应的锁，这钥匙就物超所值啦！
translated_text: This is a good key. It will take you to a special place. I think this place is full of good things. Once you find the castle, in fact, it can be used by yourself!
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 좋은 열쇠이다.그것은 당신을 특별한 장소로 데려 갈 것입니다.나는 이 장소가 좋은 것들이 가득하다고 생각한다.일단 당신이 성을 발견하면, 사실, 그것은 당신이 사용할 수 있습니다!

original_en_text: <hpage>Caretaker, I bring supplies from the town of bells below the Citadel.<page>And badly needed they are, miss bellringer. Ain’t much finding or foraging happening with this mob, what with them choir types all stalkin’ about the chambers beside.
original_zh_text: <hpage>看守者先生，我从圣堡下方的钟心镇带了补给。<page>啊！真是雪中送炭！圣咏团在附近晃悠，这帮怂包根本不敢出去觅食。
translated_text: <hpage>I brought supplies from the town of Bell, under Butler's Castle.<page>Mr. Bellinger 's crowd was in desperate need of them, but his choir floated in a neighboring room, and they were all in one place.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>버틀러의 성 아래 벨 마을에서 물품을 가져왔다.<page>벨린저 씨의 군중들은 그들을 절실히 필요로했지만, 그의 합창단은 이웃 방에서 떠 있었고, 그들은 모두 한 곳에 있었다.

original_en_text: Buried in the warren of bells, at Pharloom’s core, seek my sullen uncle. That one has power to spare.
original_zh_text: 去纺络的核心地带，在到处是钟的地方找我那阴沉的叔叔，他的力量多得没处使。
translated_text: A man gets extra powers when he searches for his dark uncle buried in a bell in the middle of a farm.
secondary_translated_text: 한 남자는 농장 한가운데의 종 속에 묻혀있는 그의 어두운 삼촌을 찾을 때 추가적인 힘을 얻습니다.

original_en_text: So you found this place too, sister? This Citadel’s grand promise has been strangled away by cursed thread, but at least the great bell here grants us some sanctuary.<page>We’re amongst the blessed few... granted just a little more living.
original_zh_text: 小姐，你也找到这个地方了啊？我们可真是走运。圣堡曾经的宏伟都因丝咒化为了泡影，但多亏了那座大钟，我们才能安全地待在这儿。<page>也许只是片刻安宁，但能多活一会儿……但在这病怏怏的鬼地方，多活片刻就是最好的福报了。
translated_text: Did you find this place, brother? The castle 's magnificent views are drowned in a thread of curse, but at least the huge clocks here give us shelter.<page>We are a minority, a small part of our lives.
secondary_translated_text: 이 곳을 찾았어, 형?성의 웅장한 전망은 저주로 가득 차 있지만, 적어도 여기의 거대한 시계는 우리에게 피난처를 제공합니다.<page>우리는 소수이며, 우리 삶의 작은 부분입니다.

original_en_text: Off you go now, dear one. If it’s my trinkets you covet, you can trade me your rosaries up at the shrine. Blessings and farewell!
original_zh_text: 你该走了，亲爱的。如果你想要我的这些宝贝，就来钟殿用念珠跟我换！愿你蒙福，再见！
translated_text: - "Dear, I can go now, if you want my little one, take your rosary to the sanctuary.
secondary_translated_text: - "여보, 이제 갈 수 있어요, 내 어린 아이를 원하시면, 당신의 묵주기도를 성소로 가져가세요.

original_en_text: Ooohh... If we’re no longer pilgrims... What are we?
original_zh_text: 噢……我们如果不再是朝圣者了……那会成为什么呢？
translated_text: What will we become if we stop being pilgrims? "
secondary_translated_text: 만일 우리가 순례자가 되지 않는다면 우리는 어떻게 될 것인가? "

original_en_text: Crafty types used to go all a’clamour for this metal. S’not much to look at, but I still remember its value.
original_zh_text: 当年被工匠们抢破头的金属材料。看着不起眼，但老婆子我记得它可金贵着呢。
translated_text: People admired metals. I don't see anything, but I remember its value.
secondary_translated_text: 사람들은 금속을 존경했다.나는 아무것도 보지 못하지만, 그것의 가치는 기억한다.

translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. I am here!

original_en_text: This shrine, awakened... it calls out to ‘em, you see. “It’s safe here. Come on over!” ringing in the ears of every lost pilgrim and grubby so-and-so unlucky enough to have made it to this blasted Citadel with their wits intact.<page>Well, what’s done is done, and what’s rung is rung. Just make sure you come back here soon, you lout! I ain’t dealing with all the fresh intake myself!<hpage>If time permits, sir bug, I shall visit again.
original_zh_text: 只要这钟殿醒着，那些迷途的朝圣者和肮脏的食腐者就会收到召唤。<page>就像在那些家伙耳边低语“这里安全，快来！”，然后他们就会屁颠屁颠地涌向这座被诅咒的城堡。<page>事已至此，你最好尽快回来帮忙！我可不想独自应付这些新来的蠢货！<hpage>先生，若有空闲，我会再来。
translated_text: This temple has awakened, it is calling you, Miren! The lost pilgrims and the polluted poor sounded in his ears, and his wisdom came to the original and abandoned castle. "<page>What you did, what you did, what you did, come back now, fool. You can't eat fresh produce alone.<hpage>If time permits, Mr. Bug, I'll be back.
secondary_translated_text: 이 성전이 깨어났고, 당신을 부르고 있습니다, 미린!잃어버린 순례자들과 오염된 가난한 사람들이 그의 귀에 들렸고, 그의 지혜는 원래 버려진 성에 이르렀습니다. "<page>네가 한 짓, 네가 한 짓, 네가 한 짓, 지금 돌아와, 바보야.신선한 농산물을 혼자 먹을 수는 없습니다.<hpage>시간이 허락되면, 미스터 버그, 나는 돌아올 것이다.

original_en_text: Guess I shouldn’t be surprised. It’s a fool act to try such a thing... Maybe even to think on it. Your kind ain’t designed to die.
original_zh_text: 果然还是有所顾虑吗？企图弑君本就是蠢行……或许连想都不该想。你们这一族的命数本就不包括死亡。
translated_text: I don't think it 's surprising. You might even think it would be silly to try it. People like you are not destined to die.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 그것이 놀라울 것이라고 생각하지 않는다.너는 심지어 그것을 시도하는 것이 어리석은 일이라고 생각할지도 모른다. 너 같은 사람은 죽을 운명은 아니다.

original_en_text: For the last part, I’ll also be needin’ that rune setter you’re carryin’. Clever old Weaver tool, that thing, and the perfect base on which to stretch our power.<page>Once you’ve collected for yourself the other critical parts, I’ll ask you pass it over as well.
original_zh_text: 最后还需要你身上那个陷阱设置器。精巧的织者工具，正好可以用来作为我们陷阱的基底。<page>等你集齐了其他部分，就把这玩意也交给我。
translated_text: In the last part, you will also have to "tune the runes you bring with you. " "An ancient and intellectual textile tool, and the perfect basis for expanding our power.<page>Once you have collected the other components that are important to you, I ask you to pass them on.
secondary_translated_text: 마지막 부분에서, 당신은 또한 "당신이 가지고있는 룬을 조정해야합니다." "고대하고 지적인 직물 도구이며, 우리의 힘을 확장하는 완벽한 기반입니다.<page>당신이 당신에게 중요한 다른 구성 요소를 수집 한 후에, 나는 당신이 그것을 전달하도록 요청합니다.

original_en_text: Find the husk of my cousin, claimed by the scorned bugs of the swamps. A careless fool to let himself be taken, and dead they might be, but some glimmer of his soul can still be sensed.
original_zh_text: 找到我表弟的躯壳，它被沼泽中满怀怨愤的虫子占据了。他粗心大意，才会被抓住并害死。但我仍能感受到他灵魂散发的的一丝微光。
translated_text: When I find my cousin 's shell, it will be occupied by the watchdog bugs of the wetland.They are careless, devoid of themselves, and they may be dead, but they can still feel the light in their soul.
secondary_translated_text: 내 사촌의 껍질을 발견하면 습지의 파견견 벌레가 점령 할 것입니다. 그들은 부주의하고 자기 자신을 결핍하고 죽을 수도 있지만 여전히 영혼의 빛을 느낄 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have the items requested. Craft me your trap that we may see these lands free.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，所需物品已集齐。请为我制作陷阱，还此地自由。
translated_text: <hpage>I need something, make me your trap, and let me show you this land at liberty.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 무언가가 필요해, 나를 너의 함정으로 만들고, 이 땅을 자유로 보여 줄게.

original_en_text: T’was a good deed you did up above, dear one, saving me from them screeching flocks. Not seen the like of it in a long, long time.<page>I’ve returned with all sorts of new goodies, too. Let’s see if anything I’ve scavenged will fit your fancy.
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，多亏你把我从那些可怕的家伙手上救了出来。我好久遭遇过那样的危险了。<page>我还带了各种各样新鲜的好东西回来。来看看我搜罗到的货物有没有合你心意的。
translated_text: You did good there, You rescued me from the weeping sheep, and I feared You not; I have not seen anything like it for a long time.<page>I 'm back with a new one. Let 's see if the one I chose suits your taste.
secondary_translated_text: 주께서 거기서 선을 행하시고 울고 있는 양에게서 나를 건져주셨으니 내가 주를 두려워하지 아니하였고 오랫동안 이와 같은 것을 보지 못하였나이다<page>나는 새로운 것을 가지고 돌아왔다.내가 선택한 것이 당신의 취향에 맞는지 보자.

original_en_text: Don’t think I ain’t see’in it, bellringer! A whole lotta helpin’ you’ve been up to, both here and down below!<page>S’a strange mantle you’re takin’ for yourself, seeing all them bugs saved and wishes promised.<hpage>You find it strange, sir? I’ve found some solace in the service, and the rewards received have proved a boon on my journey.<page>Aye! But it ain’t your place now, is it? I see well what you are, Weaver’n more! It’s below your station! You ain’t no common sort meant for carin’ on us low folk.<hpage>I could say the same for you, who still chooses to remain cowled. You continue to pose as only a simple pilgrim. Don’t you think it’s past time you ceased the performance?<page>Leave off, Old One! Permit a bug their small disguise! It’s been a pleasant thing to play simple. And I weren’t calling for change, even if you seem insistent on bringing it!<hpage>Change was unavoidable, sir, whether I arrived or not. The monarch stirs. Its threads stretch far. My presence only accelerates the inevitable.<page>So what’re you hopin’ for, eh? Planning to usurp, to perch above us all as queen? Build up our hopes only to string us all in your own beastly web? Such is the way of Weavers and gods both...
original_zh_text: 敲钟者！别当我没看见！你在这里和下层当活菩萨呢！<page>披着救世主的皮，到处行侠仗义，很别扭吧？<hpage>先生觉得我别扭？帮助其他虫子让我获得了某种慰藉。当然，获得的报酬也能助我前行。<page>呵！可这不是你该干的！我看得出来，你有织者血统！屈尊来操心我们这些贱民的死活，太掉价！<hpage>那你扮成普通朝圣者，不也是在演戏？是时候摘掉伪装了吧？<page>该死！就不能让我活个清净吗？安安静静的普通日子不好过吗？非得去寻求变革！<hpage>变革不可避免，无论我来与否。圣堡之主已然有所行动，其丝线已遍及全境。我的到来不过是加速了这过程。<page>所以你到底图什么？想夺权篡位，成为新的女皇？先点燃我们的希望，然后再把我们困入网中？你们织者和神灵都这副德行……
translated_text: I can't believe you've seen this before, Bell Linger. Even if you 're here, you 'll get a lot of help.<page>The cloak you wear is strange, and you will see that all the worms are saved, and your wishes will be fulfilled.<hpage>Do you think it is rare? I have found solace in my ministry and the rewards I have received from the gospel in my journey.<page>Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! But that 's not the case now, is it? Is that not true? "You know who you are, Will. I 'm not a normal person who criticizes the lower classes.<hpage>I can say the same thing, but I still wear a buffalo. You pretend to be a pilgrim. Don't you think I should stop playing?<page>Come on, old man. They disguise themselves as little insects.The simple act of playing is a pleasure.I am not asking for change, But I insist on it!<hpage>Change is inevitable, whether it comes or not. The monarch was excited. The line was far away. My presence hastened the inevitable.<page>What plan do you plan to seize our throne? to bind us all in the net of our beast? That 's how the gods and gods do it.
secondary_translated_text: 네가 이걸 본 적이 있다는 게 믿기지 않아, 벨 링저당신이 여기 있더라도, 당신은 많은 도움을 받을 것입니다.<page>네가 입는 망토는 이상한데, 너는 모든 벌레가 구원받고 너의 소원이 이루어지는 것을 보게 될 것이다.<hpage>당신은 그것이 드문 것이라고 생각합니까?나는 내 사역에서 위로를 발견했고, 내 여행에서 복음으로부터 받은 상을 찾았다.<page>아, 그래!아, 네!하지만 지금은 그렇지 않아, 그렇지?그게 사실이 아니야? "네가 누군지 알잖아, 윌.나는 하층층을 비판하는 평범한 사람이 아니다.<hpage>저도 같은 말을 할 수 있지만, 저는 여전히 버팔로를 입습니다.너는 순례자인 척 한다.너는 내가 게임을 그만둬야 한다고 생각하지 않니?<page>어서, 늙은이. 그들은 작은 곤충으로 변장한다. 단순한 놀이 행위는 즐거움이다. 나는 변화를 요구하지 않는다. 하지만 나는 그것을 고집한다!<hpage>변화가 일어나든 안 일어나든, 변화는 불가피하다.군주가 흥분했다.그 선은 멀리 떨어져 있었다.나의 존재는 불가피한 일을 서두르게 했다.<page>우리 왕좌를 빼앗기 위해 어떤 계획을 세웠습니까?우리를 모두 짐승의 그물에 묶어 놓으려 하는가?신들과 신들이 그렇게 하는 것이다.

original_en_text: You keep at all that helpin’, you’re gonna start inspiring it in others! Best you think serious about what effect you might be causin’, bellringer!<page>Too much hope could prove a dangerous thing, ‘specially for all these bugs starved so long of it.
original_zh_text: 敲钟者！你再这么当救世主，其他虫子都要学样了！你最好想清楚这样会引发什么后果！<page>让浑浑噩噩几辈子的虫子看到希望——这是非常危险的！
translated_text: By continuing to help, you will start to inspire others! Berlinger, you better think seriously about the impact you are having!<page>Too much hope becomes a dangerous thing, especially for all the insects that have wished it.
secondary_translated_text: 계속 도움을 주면 다른 사람들에게 영감을 줄 수 있습니다!베를린저, 당신이 가지고있는 영향에 대해 진지하게 생각하는 것이 좋을 것입니다!<page>너무 많은 희망은 위험한 것이되며, 특히 그것을 원하는 모든 곤충들에게는 더욱 그렇습니다.

original_en_text: Now, why don’t you hurry back to the shrine and let them all know what a good job you’ve done?<page>There might be a few more goodies to gather up on my way back, and I don’t need you lingering around in the meantime. Blessings and farewell!
original_zh_text: 现在，快回去替我报平安吧！<page>我这会儿可没法跟你一块回去，路上可能还有好东西等着我捡漏呢。愿你蒙福，再见！
translated_text: Now, why don't they run to the sanctuary and tell him how well they are? "<page>Maybe there will be some good things on the way back, and you won't have to walk for a while.
secondary_translated_text: 자, 왜 그들은 성역으로 달려가서 그들이 얼마나 잘 지고 있는지 그에게 말하지 않습니까? "<page>돌아오는 길에 좋은 일이 있을지도 몰라, 잠시 걸을 필요가 없을지도 몰라.

original_en_text: Simply forged, and simply styled. Designed to open all sorts of different locks, if they be basic enough.
original_zh_text: 锻造工艺粗糙，样式也朴素。但能打开各种不同的锁——只要锁芯别太复杂。
translated_text: Easy to forge, easy to form.If it is simple enough, then it is designed to open various locks.
secondary_translated_text: 쉽게 위조, 쉽게 형성. 충분히 간단하다면, 그것은 다양한 자물쇠를 열 수 있도록 설계되었습니다.

original_en_text: Sister, sister! Let me confide in you! As I ascended the Citadel’s chambers to reach this place, I swear I heard the laughter of a child!<page>Wasn’t much more than an echo, and I confess me fear’s been playing awful tricks on me... and yet that voice still keeps ringing in my head.<page>Surely though, no bug so young and lively could survive within those heartless halls?
original_zh_text: 小姐！你且听我说！在圣堡殿堂上来此地的路上，我分明听到了幼虫的嬉笑声！<page>肯定是回声作祟，要么就是我吓出幻觉了……但那笑声一直在我脑子里萦绕。<page>这鬼地方哪可能有活着的幼虫？你说对吧！
translated_text: Sisters! Sisters! I'll trust you! I swear that when I entered the castle and came to this place, I heard the laughter of a child.<page>Just echoing, I admit that fear plays a big part in me, but that voice is still in my head.<page>Of course, eh? Can such a young and active insect not survive in your cruel living room?
secondary_translated_text: 자매님들!자매님들!나는 당신을 믿을 것입니다!내가 성에 들어가서 이 곳에 왔을 때, 나는 아이의 웃음소리를 들었다고 맹세한다.<page>그냥 메아리, 나는 두려움이 내 안에 큰 역할을한다는 것을 인정하지만, 그 목소리는 여전히 내 머리 속에 있습니다.<page>물론이죠, 응?그러한 젊고 활동적인 곤충이 잔인한 거실에서 살아남지 못할 수 있습니까?

original_en_text: Sister, you seen ‘em out there? Our new champion, that golden knight stalking the Citadel’s crumbling halls?<page>Tall, righteous bug. Not much for conversing. Still! I’d be long dead if not for their appearance.<page>And I ain’t the only one. Others have spoken of the knight’s timely deeds and rare bravery.<page>We’re desperate for any protection we can get, and that gleaming champion’s been offering their aid almost as much as you yourself.
original_zh_text: 嘿，小姐，瞧见没？那位在圣堡摇摇欲坠的大厅里巡逻的金甲骑士！<page>高大正直，威风凛凛，不太爱说话。不过！要不是他，我早没命了！<page>不光是我！好多朝圣者都说曾被他及时搭救。<page>现在大伙就指望你和那位英雄护着咱了。
translated_text: Sister, did you see that? Our new champion, the golden knight who wanders among the ruins of the castle halls?<page>He is tall and doesn't talk much about justice. If it weren't for them, they would have been dead long ago.<page>Others speak of the knight 's timely actions and his rare bravery.<page>We desperately need any protection we can, and this glorious champion has given us as much support as you have.
secondary_translated_text: 언니, 이거 봤어?우리의 새로운 챔피언, 성 홀의 폐허를 돌아다니는 황금 기사?<page>그는 키가 크고 정의에 대해서는 별로 말하지 않는다.만약 그들이 아니었다면, 그들은 오래 전에 죽었을 것이다.<page>다른 사람들은 기사의 시기적절한 행동과 그의 드문 용기에 대해 이야기합니다.<page>우리는 우리가 할 수 있는 모든 보호가 절실히 필요하며, 이 영광스러운 챔피언은 당신들만큼 우리에게 많은 지원을 해 주었습니다.

original_en_text: If you’re going to keep skulkin’ around here while I work, you may as well buy something. Take a look dear one, don’t be shy!
original_zh_text: 如果你打算在我干活的时候一直偷偷摸摸地在这儿晃悠，那你还不如找我买点东西。来看看吧，亲爱的，别害羞！
translated_text: If you want to hide here while I work, you better buy yourself something, dear, look, don't be ashamed! "
secondary_translated_text: 내가 일하는 동안 여기에 숨고 싶다면, 너 자신에게 무언가를 사야 해, 자기야, 봐, 부끄러워하지마! "

original_en_text: And last, as the base, seek a weapon of Weavers past. Should still be one left, down there in their largest nest, a snare to set a rune’o searing Silk. Our own trap’ll be woven tight about it.
original_zh_text: 最后是陷阱的基底部分，去找到古织者的工具——陷阱设置器，它可以用来设下灼烧灵丝的符文。<page>应该还剩一个，就在织者最大的巢穴里。我们的陷阱将以它为核心进行制作。
translated_text: Finally, as a base, we are looking for weapons from the past Weaver.There must be another trap to deliver the burnt silk from the Rune to the larger nest.Traps rotate around them.
secondary_translated_text: 마지막으로, 기지로, 우리는 과거의 Weaver. Rune 에서 더 큰 둥지로 타 버린 실크를 전달하는 또 다른 함정이 있어야합니다. Traps 는 그들 주위를 회전합니다.

original_en_text: Admit it! You done it! You shifty li’l bell-runger!<hpage>You have chosen a curious place to rest, sir. Do you perhaps know something of this shrine and its companions in the lands below?<page>Oh, so you ask funny questions as well as cutting bells free, eh? You certainly ain’t a pilgrim, but you’re clearly not of the Choir either. No! I know exactly what you are...<page>A bell-ringing lout! A weirdo! Don’t you realise what you’ve done, waking that shrine back up?<page>That bell has rung out far and wide! The wretched and the lost will have heard its call. They’ll be making their way here now.<page>Well, what’s done is done, and what’s rung is rung. Just make sure you come back here soon, you lout! You can help me deal with all the dirty little pilgrims and desperate scavengers who turn up.
original_zh_text: 承认吧！就是你干的！你这莽撞的敲钟者！<hpage>先生，你选了个有趣的地方歇脚。莫非知晓这处钟殿与下方各处钟殿的关联？<page>哈！又会问怪问题又会乱敲钟，既非朝圣者也不像圣咏团……我算看明白了——<page>你就是个扰我清梦的怪胎！知道唤醒这座钟殿会引来什么吗？<page>迷途的朝圣者和食腐者都会循钟声而来！<page>事已至此，你最好尽快回来帮忙对付那些脏兮兮的家伙！
translated_text: We recognize it! You did that! You are the messenger of the Qur 'an.<hpage>They chose a strange place. Do you know this temple and its satellites on the floor below?<page>You have a few interesting questions and a free phone call.You are not a pilgrim, but you are not a member of the choir.No, no! I know perfectly well who you are.<page>Bell looks stupid, it's weird! Do you know what I did to rebuild the temple?<page>The bells are ringing in the distance. The lost and the lost are listening to His call.<page>What have you done, what have you done, what have you done, come back now, fool. You can help me with all the dirty pilgrims and desperate carnivores.
secondary_translated_text: 우리는 그것을 인식합니다!넌 그렇게 했어!당신은 꾸란의 선지자입니다.<hpage>그들은 이상한 장소를 선택했다.아래층에 있는 이 사원과 그 위성을 아시나요?<page>당신은 몇 가지 흥미로운 질문과 무료 전화 통화. 당신은 순례자가 아니지만, 당신은 합창단의 일원이 아닙니다. No, no!나는 당신이 누구인지 아주 잘 알고 있습니다.<page>벨은 멍청해 보이는데, 이상해!내가 성전을 재건하기 위해 무엇을 했는지 아는가?<page>멀리서 종소리가 울리고 있다.잃어버린 자들과 잃어버린 자들은 그분의 부르짖음을 듣고 있습니다.<page>무슨 짓을 한 거야, 무슨 짓을 한 거야, 지금 돌아와, 바보야.더러운 순례자들과 절박한 육식 동물들과 함께 나를 도울 수 있다.

original_en_text: Oi! What’s this? Suddenly havin’ second thoughts? For sure it’s a frightful thing to attempt, but you’ve already put in all the leg work!<page>She up top’ll already be sensin’ your goal, vague-like maybe, but there ain’t no worth to backin’ out now.
original_zh_text: 喂！这就反悔了？虽然这计划确实骇人，但你都已经走到这一步了！<page>顶上那位早就隐隐约约地感应到了你的企图，现在退缩太迟了！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey, hey! What is it? Sudden change in heart? Of course, it 's scary to try, but you put in all your physical effort!<page>She already feels that you were there, maybe like Maria, but now you shouldn't give up.
secondary_translated_text: 이봐, 이봐, 이봐!뭐야?갑자기 마음이 바뀌었나요?물론, 시도하는 것은 무섭지만, 당신은 모든 육체적 노력을 기울입니다!<page>그녀는 이미 당신이 마리아처럼 거기에 있었다고 느꼈지만 지금은 포기해서는 안된다.

original_en_text: Stretch a spool out nice and long with this fine-wrought tool. The perfect purchase if you’re planning to hoard a lot of Silk for yourself!
original_zh_text: 这件制作精良的工具能拓展你的灵丝轴容量。如果你打算为自己囤积大量灵丝，这件绝对是必买！
translated_text: Use this wonderful tool to develop a film.If you are thinking of buying a large amount of silk yourself, This is the perfect purchase!
secondary_translated_text: 이 훌륭한 도구를 사용하여 필름을 개발하십시오. 당신이 많은 양의 실크를 구입하는 것을 생각하고 있다면, 이것은 완벽한 구매입니다!

original_en_text: You keep at all that helpin’, you’re gonna start inspiring it in others! Best think serious about what effect you might be causin’, bellringer!<page>Too much hope could prove a dangerous thing, ‘specially for all these bugs starved so long of it.
original_zh_text: 你再这么当救世主，其他虫子都要学样了！最好想清楚这样会引发什么后果！<page>让浑浑噩噩几辈子的虫子看到希望，这是非常危险的！
translated_text: By continuing to help, you will start to inspire others! Berliner, seriously think about the impact you have!<page>Too much hope becomes a dangerous thing, especially for all the insects that have wished it.
secondary_translated_text: 계속 도움을 주면 다른 사람들에게 영감을 줄 수 있습니다!베를린, 당신이 가진 영향에 대해 진지하게 생각하십시오!<page>너무 많은 희망은 위험한 것이되며, 특히 그것을 원하는 모든 곤충들에게는 더욱 그렇습니다.

original_en_text: Ooohh... What new horror now besets us?<page>Is this fresh punishment for our sins, or yet another test to prove our faith?<hpage>It is neither, good bug. In this disaster you bear no blame.<hpage>Hold close to your companions, and I will work swift to see this madness stilled.
original_zh_text: 噢……现在又是什么新的灾祸降临到我们头上了？<page>这是对我们罪孽的报应，还是又一次考验我们信仰的试炼？<hpage>都不是。在这场灾厄中，你并无任何过错。<hpage>别离开你的同伴，我会尽快让这场狂乱平息下来。
translated_text: What fears does he cause us now?<page>A new punishment for our sins, or a test of faith?<hpage>They are both good mothers and are not responsible for this disaster.<hpage>Add your partner and I will end this madness as soon as possible.
secondary_translated_text: 그는 지금 우리에게 어떤 두려움을 야기하고 있습니까?<page>우리의 죄에 대한 새로운 형벌이 되나, 아니면 믿음의 시험이 되나?<hpage>둘 다 좋은 어머니이며, 이 재앙에 대한 책임이 없습니다.<hpage>당신의 파트너를 추가하면 가능한 한 빨리 이 광기를 끝낼 것입니다.

original_en_text: For the base, we’ll be needin’ a weapon of Weavers past. Search down low, aside the paths of bone, inside their largest nest. S’a snare device, one to set a rune’o searing Silk.
original_zh_text: 陷阱的基底部分需要用到一件古织者的工具——可以设下符文的陷阱设置器。往底层搜寻，就在满是骨头的道路旁，织者最大的巢穴里。
translated_text: We need weapons from the Weaver's past. In their largest nest they look down the path of bones. This is a trap that sets runes to burn silk.
secondary_translated_text: 우리는 웨이버의 과거로부터의 무기가 필요하다.가장 큰 둥지에서 그들은 뼈의 길을 내려다 본다.이것은 루니가 실크를 태우도록 설정하는 함정입니다.

original_en_text: I swear I heard it, sister... That laugh! It almost sounded like they were enjoying themself...
original_zh_text: 小姐，我真没幻听……那笑声……听着像是它们在嬉戏玩乐一样……
translated_text: "I swear I 've heard that, ma ' am, that smile! You seem to be having fun ...
secondary_translated_text: "나는 그것을 들었다, 부인, 그 미소!당신은 재미있게 놀고있는 것 같습니다 ...

original_en_text: Hold this while makin’ music and you’ll soon hear its function. Amplifies song, it does! Sends it out full and bright. Ideal if you’re ever planning on performing for a crowd.
original_zh_text: 演奏时握着这件宝贝，你就能很快体会到它的作用。它能放大乐声，让声音饱满又响亮。要是你打算登台表演，这东西再合适不过了
translated_text: If you hold it in your hand when you make music, you will immediately feel its function. I improved this song, really. Produces a full and bright sound. If you are planning a show for the crowd, this is the perfect option for you.
secondary_translated_text: 음악을 만들 때 손에 들고 있으면 바로 그 기능을 느낄 수 있습니다.이 곡은 정말 더 좋아졌어요.완전하고 밝은 사운드를 만듭니다.군중을 위해 쇼를 계획하고 있다면, 이것은 당신을위한 완벽한 선택입니다.

original_en_text: How about we get your loose beads all strung up safe? I’ll pinch a few for their braiding, but that’s surely worth it for the peace of mind.
original_zh_text: 我来帮你把零散的念珠穿起来，做成便携的链子怎么样？收点手工费不过分吧？图个心安嘛！
translated_text: What happens if you reliably collect all the free beads together? I 'm going to have a small T-shirt and a fabric, but for peace of mind, it 's really worth it.
secondary_translated_text: 모든 무료 구슬을 함께 안정적으로 수집하면 어떻게됩니까?나는 작은 티셔츠와 원단을 가지고 갈 것이지만, 마음의 평화를 위해, 그것은 정말 가치가있다.

original_en_text: Ooh, I’m glad I wriggled my way over here! What a bounty’s been laid out by our benefactors, those generous Conductors! Giants amongst bugs they are, all-seeing and kind!<page>It’s beautiful here, and goodies are everywhere. Only enough for one though, deary, so don’t be greedy! You know I got here first. Blessings, and farewell!
original_zh_text: 啊哈！幸亏我一路摸到这儿来了！咱们的恩主——慷慨的指挥家们，可真是留下了丰厚的赏赐啊！他们全视全知，又心地善良！<page>这儿可真美，到处都是好东西。不过嘛，亲爱的，这些东西只够我拿哦，所以别贪心！你该懂得先来后到。愿你蒙福，再见！
translated_text: What a great gift our donors, generous drivers, will give! They are giants among the insects, all-knowing and good.<page>It is very beautiful and there are good things everywhere. Enough to eat yourself! I came first. Blessings and farewell!
secondary_translated_text: 우리의 기증자, 관대한 운전자들이 주는 것은 참으로 훌륭한 선물입니다!그들은 곤충들 중 거인이며, 모든 것을 알고 있으며, 좋은 것입니다.<page>그것은 매우 아름답고 모든 곳에 좋은 것들이 있습니다.스스로 먹을 수 있을 만큼!내가 먼저 왔어.축복과 작별!

original_en_text: You stay close, sister. Them halls beside are crawling with haunted husks.<page>Wandering will only bring death, pointed and painful!
original_zh_text: 小姐，你跟紧点。旁边的那些大厅里到处都是被丝咒附身的躯壳。<page>四处乱走只会带来痛苦的死亡。
translated_text: Be careful, sister. The next room is full of ghostly shells.<page>Pilgrimage only brings death, aggravation and pain!
secondary_translated_text: 조심하세요, 누나.옆 방은 유령의 껍질로 가득 차 있다.<page>순례는 죽음과 악화와 고통을 가져다 줄 뿐이다!

original_en_text: Have you done it yet, bellringer? Wriggled deep? Discovered the depths of obsession that brought this place so low?<hpage>If you speak of this Citadel and its Silk, Caretaker, then yes, I now know the start of it. <hpage>In the ward down below, I saw it clear, the hollowed husks, and the many torturous implements... machines to instill a bug with thread, that would see their life extended.<page>Aye! That’s it, in part! But there’s more scale to it than all that. Just think of’em greedily shoving the Silk into their shells, the madness that overcame them, eternal life for mortal bugs! Then think on how long it’s all gone on...<hpage>...The children born of them, and all the pilgrims after... The Silk has seeded deep into this kingdom’s shells, generations deep...<hpage>No wonder Pharloom’s bugs proved such easy prey for that haunted thread. It had only to seek for itself to reach them.<page>Ho ho! Now you’re seein’ it, bellringer! These poor pilgrims, all born bound to the cruel system of our world, now stricken in its new cursed web.<page>You at least are free from it. And free to shake it all up... if’n that’s your choosing.
original_zh_text: 事情办成了吗，敲钟者？找出那些让圣堡堕落的疯狂执念没？<hpage>若是指圣堡的丝咒，是的，我已知晓其根源。<hpage>下层病房里尽是空壳，以及无数刑具般的器械……那些向甲壳灌注丝线延续生命的机器。<page>没错！但远不止如此！想想他们贪婪吞食灵丝的模样，凡虫妄图永生引发的癫狂！再想想这持续了多少世代……<hpage>……他们的子嗣，后来的朝圣者……灵丝早已深植于这个王国的甲壳内，代代相传……<hpage>难怪纺络的虫子会轻易沦为丝咒的猎物，那些邪丝只需稍加引诱就能侵蚀他们。<page>哈！现在你算看透了！这些可怜虫生来就被束缚在这个世界的残酷体制里，如今又陷进新的诅咒之网。<page>至少你是自由的，自由得足以颠覆这一切……若这是你的选择。
translated_text: Did you do that, Bellin? Are you deeply afraid? Have you ever discovered the depth of attachment that makes this place so low?<hpage>If you 're interested in this castle, silk and guards, yes. Now I know where it all started.<hpage>In the lower rooms, excavated shells and torture weapons were clearly visible.The machine uses flows to introduce errors and extend its service life.<page>Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! Part! ! The ladder was bigger than this.Think of digging a silk in the sink with greed and knocking in despair.Think of how long it will last.<hpage>... The children they bear, and the pilgrims who will follow them. Silk is already deeply ingrained in the shell of this kingdom and passed down from generation to generation.<hpage>It 's no wonder that pharaoh worms can be easily eaten by ghost kids.All you need to do is find yourself to reach them.<page>What's it? ! - "You know what, Bel Linger? Poor pilgrims born into the cruel system of our world are now caught in this new cursed net, and now they are in the same place.<page>At least we can get rid of it. If you want, you are free to change everything.
secondary_translated_text: 네가 그랬어, 벨린?당신은 깊은 두려움을 가지고 있습니까?이 곳을 이렇게 낮게 만드는 애착의 깊이를 발견한 적이 있습니까?<hpage>이 성, 실크, 경비원들에 관심이 있다면, 네.이제 나는 모든 것이 어디서 시작되었는지 알고있다.<hpage>아래쪽 방에서는 발굴된 껍질과 고문 무기가 뚜렷하게 볼 수 있었다. 기계는 흐름을 사용하여 오류를 도입하고 서비스 수명을 연장했다.<page>아, 그래!아, 네!쪼개! !사다리는 이것보다 더 컸다. 탐욕으로 싱크대에서 실크를 파고 절망으로 두드리는 것을 생각해. 얼마나 오래 지속될지 생각해.<hpage>...그들이 낳은 아이들, 그리고 그들을 따르는 순례자들.실크는 이미 이 왕국의 껍질에 깊이 뿌리박혀 세대로 전해지고 있다.<hpage>파라오 벌레가 유령 아이들에 의해 쉽게 먹을 수 있다는 것은 놀라운 일이 아닙니다. 당신이해야 할 일은 그들에게 도달하기 위해 자신을 찾는 것입니다.<page>뭐예요? ! - "뭐 알아, 벨 린저?우리 세계의 잔인한 체제에서 태어난 불쌍한 순례자들은 이제 이 새 저주받은 그물에 사로잡혀 있으며, 이제 그들은 같은 장소에 있습니다.<page>적어도 우리는 그것을 제거 할 수 있습니다. 당신이 원한다면, 당신은 모든 것을 자유롭게 바꿀 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Well, well, if it isn’t my very own shadow, the clever little red-cloak! You still following me around, trying to pinch away some of the goodies I sniff out?<hpage>You mistake my intent, ma’am, somewhat ungenerously. The pilgrims of the settlement below were worried by your long absence. It was on their behalf that I tracked you, again.<page>Is that so? What a worrying bunch of busybodies they are! I’m still able to fend for meself!<page>Hmph... and yet, perhaps ‘tis a warm thing that I remain in their thoughts so. I hadn’t expected that. And I can’t deny that you too have done me a good turn once more.<page>That awful flock almost had me, truth be told, and I still have to wonder at your intentions, dear one... but bless you, all the same!
original_zh_text: 啧啧，这不是小红斗篷嘛！还在惦记着老婆子我找到的的宝贝？<hpage>女士，你误会了。是庇护所的虫子们担心你的安危，我才再次前来找你。<page>是这样吗？瞎操心！老婆子我纵横圣堡的时候他们都还是虫卵呢！<page>不过……被惦记的感觉倒也不坏。这次算我又欠你一份情。<page>说实话，那群可怕的家伙差点就抓住我了，而你……不管怎样，还是要感谢你！
translated_text: Well, well, if it's not my shadow, red coat! Are you still chasing me and trying to kill a good one that smells like me?<hpage>You have misinterpreted my intentions and have not been generous. Pilgrims from nearby colonies are worried about his long absence. I will follow you again. "<page>Is that correct? This is a group of people who are really involved! I am feeding! "<page>Ugh, uh, uh... But staying in your thoughts this way can be something hot for me, and I 'm not sure what I 'm doing. Not that it 's going to happen. I can't deny that you have a favor. "<page>Honestly, this horrible sheep almost got to me, I still want to know your intentions, dear but blessed!
secondary_translated_text: 글쎄, 글쎄, 내 그림자가 아니라면, 붉은 코트!아직도 날 쫓아다니고 나 같은 냄새를 맡는 좋은 놈을 죽이려고 하는 거야?<hpage>당신은 나의 의도를 잘못 해석했고, 관대하지 않았다.인근 식민지에서 온 순례자들은 그의 오랜 부재에 대해 걱정하고 있다.나는 다시 너를 따라갈 것이다. "<page>그게 맞나?이것은 정말로 참여하는 사람들의 그룹입니다!나는 먹이를 먹고 있다! "<page>어, 어, 어..하지만 이런 식으로 당신의 생각 속에 머무르는 것은 나에게 뜨거운 것이 될 수 있으며, 나는 내가 무엇을하고 있는지 확실하지 않습니다.그런 일이 일어날 것이라는 것은 아니다.나는 네가 호의를 베풀었다는 것을 부인할 수 없다. "<page>솔직히, 이 끔찍한 양은 거의 나에게 도착했다, 나는 여전히 당신의 의도를 알고 싶어, 사랑하지만 축복!

original_en_text: Looking for goodies of your own, dear one? You’d do well to avoid the dark vaults near here. They say the keepers inside were jealous hoarders even before the silken curse came down.<hpage>You have more familiarity with the Citadel than most, madam. How long have you spent here, surviving amongst the haunted corridors?<page>Oh, long enough. S’not such a bad lot, all told. The memories of my pilgrimage have all faded now, but a life spent in the Citadel’s golden halls was all I ever wished for.<page>And lo and behold, my humble wish was granted! Certainly, the place might be a bit past its prime, but it’d be churlish of me to complain now, wouldn’t it?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，你也在找好东西吗？你最好避开这附近阴暗的书库。据说在丝咒降临之前，里面的管理员就已经是些抠门的守财奴了。<hpage>女士，你比大多数虫都更熟悉圣堡。这被诅咒的地方生存，肯定也不是件易事吧？你在这儿待了多久了？<page>唔，待了有够久了。总的来说，也不算太差。当初朝圣时的记忆如今已经模糊，但在这金色圣堡度过一生，这就是老婆子我的毕生所求。<page>你瞧啊，我这小小的愿望已经实现啦！当然，这地方或许已经过了鼎盛时期，但现在要是我还抱怨，那就太不识好歹了，不是吗？
translated_text: Are you looking for something good for you? It is said that even before the curse of the silk came, the guard inside was a jealous treasurer.<hpage>You know the castle better than most people. How long have you lived in this haunted house?<page>All the memories of the pilgrimage disappeared, but she wanted the life she had spent in the golden chambers of the castle.<page>Sure, this place may have gone through its heyday, but now complaining is immoral, right? Really?
secondary_translated_text: 당신을 위해 좋은 것을 찾고 있습니까?실크의 저주가 오기 전에도 내부의 경호원은 질투하는 재무관이었다고 한다.<hpage>당신은 대부분의 사람들보다 성을 잘 알고 있습니다.이 귀신의 집에서 얼마나 살았어요?<page>순례에 대한 모든 기억은 사라졌지만, 그녀는 성의 황금 방에서 보낸 삶을 원했습니다.<page>물론, 이곳은 전성기를 거쳤을지도 모르지만, 지금은 불평하는 것이 부도덕한 것이 맞죠?진짜?

original_en_text: Part of an ancient mask, or a fractured shard of someone’s visage? With the full thing, you’d be better able to protect your shell.
original_zh_text: 古老面甲的一部分？还是谁的面部残片？要是能凑齐整套，肯定能更好地保护你的甲壳。
translated_text: A piece of an old mask or a fragment of someone 's face is complete and can better protect the shell.
secondary_translated_text: 낡은 마스크 조각이나 누군가의 얼굴 조각이 완성되어 껍질을 더 잘 보호 할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: What a calamity has befallen our holy Citadel! I ain’t never seen anything like it in my long life.<page>Times like this, we must be sure to help each other. Dig deep, dear one, I’ll be needing a lot of rosaries to survive what’s comin’!
original_zh_text: 圣堡这次真是大难临头了！老婆子我活了这么久，这阵仗还是头回见！<page>这种时候，我们一定要相互帮助。帮帮忙，亲爱的，为了挺过即将到来的难关，我需要很多念珠！
translated_text: What a disaster has befallen the holy castle! I have never seen anything like this in my long life.<page>In times like these we must help each other.Dear friends, dive deep.We need a lot of retail to go through what should be!
secondary_translated_text: 거룩한 성에 얼마나 큰 재앙이 닥쳤는가!나는 내 오랜 생애에서 이런 것을 본 적이 없다.<page>이런 시대에 우리는 서로를 도와야 한다. 친애하는 친구들, 깊은 다이빙. 우리는 소매가 많이 필요한 것을 통과해야 한다!

original_en_text: All your work, and look! They keep arrivin’. It’s bugs aplenty up here now. Hapless, weak, but alive they are!<hpage>More scared than weak, they seem to me. It is heartening knowing these few have survived safe for your care.<page>That’s your work, bellringer! Not mine. Ringin’ and helpin’! Hope they recognise your efforts, ‘cause I ain’t providing much, and I ain’t one for fighting if that Choir and their pins ever come callin’.
original_zh_text: 全是你折腾的后果！现在这儿挤满虫子了！又蠢又弱，畏畏缩缩地苟活！<hpage>更像是吓坏了，才显得羸弱。还得多亏有你在这儿照顾他们。<page>喂！别跟我扯上关系！这都是你干的好事，敲钟者！我可不会帮忙打架——要是圣咏团找上门，你自己扛！
translated_text: Take a look at all the work! They keep coming. There are a lot of bugs now. They are weak and weak, but they are alive.<hpage>More fear than weak. I am glad that you survived under your care. "<page>It's your job, Bell Linger. She's not my assistant, not my assistant. I don't offer much, so I want you to acknowledge your efforts. Even if you're going to call the choir and their flags, I won't fight. "
secondary_translated_text: 모든 작업을 살펴보세요!그들은 계속 오고 있다.지금은 많은 버그가 있습니다.그들은 약하고 약하지만 살아있다.<hpage>약함보다는 두려움이 더 많다.당신이 당신의 보살핌 아래서 살아남게 되어 기쁩니다. "<page>네 일이야, 벨 링거그녀는 내 조수가 아니고, 내 조수가 아니다.나는 많은 것을 제공하지 않으므로, 당신의 노력에 대해 인정하기를 바랍니다.비록 당신이 합창단과 그들의 깃발을 부르더라도, 나는 싸우지 않을 것이다. "

original_en_text: Stop and share some of your rosaries before you go scurrying off again, dear one. I’m sure to have something that’s to your liking!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，先别走，用你的念珠跟我做点小生意再离开也不迟呀。我这儿有各式各样的好货，绝对物超所值！
translated_text: Dear friends, please stop and share the Rosary before you hurry again.
secondary_translated_text: 친애하는 여러분, 다시 서두르기 전에 멈추고 묵주기도를 나누십시오.

original_en_text: Half a spider’s spool. You’d just have to find its match. Them ol’ Weavers built some fine things alright. They’re all long dead, but their craftwork still gleams bright.
original_zh_text: 织者的半个灵丝轴，你只需要找到与之匹配的另一半。古织者的手艺真不赖，虫死了这么多年，其造物还锃光瓦亮。
translated_text: Paper made of half a spider. All you have to do is find the game. "Weaver " has done a lot of good things.They 've long gone, but their work still shines.
secondary_translated_text: 거미의 반으로 만든 종이.당신이해야 할 일은 게임을 찾는 것입니다. ' 직공 ' 은 많은 좋은 일을 해왔다. 그들은 오래 전에 떠났지만, 그들의 작품은 여전히 빛난다.

original_en_text: A gleaming find for you climbing types. With this in your claw, you’ll be able to stick to walls for as long as you like!
original_zh_text: 对于你们这些攀爬爱好者来说，这可是个不可多得的宝贝。握在爪子里就能无限黏附峭壁——想挂多久挂多久！
translated_text: Its beautiful opening is suitable for the type of climbing.If you have it in your feet, How long can you stick to the wall?
secondary_translated_text: 아름다운 개구부로 등반에 적합합니다. 발에 있으면 얼마나 오래 벽에 붙어있을 수 있습니까?

original_en_text: Down in the mosslands, still clinging to her failed chapel, my sister’ll part with her power, if asked kind enough.
original_zh_text: 去苔地找我那守着破教堂的姐姐，态度客气点，她或许会分给你力量。
translated_text: In a muddy field my sister is clinging to a failing church, and if someone asked me to be kind, I would renounce my authority.
secondary_translated_text: 누나는 진흙밭에서 실패하는 교회에 집착하고 있으며, 누군가가 나에게 친절하게 행동하라고 요청한다면, 나는 내 권위를 포기할 것입니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Grant me your aid, sir. If your trap provides a path to freedom, both for myself and your land’s bugs, I may indeed choose to trigger it.<hpage>What work do you require of me now to see your service made?<page>It’s my family’s strength you’ll need be seeking, bellringer, us three ol’ bugs still alive, spread ‘cross this kingdom, and that sad soul you’re already carryin’ there, the last of my poor cousin, dead and drained in those rotten swamps.<page>Each of my family has power, raw, savage stuff. For you, they’ll give it, if for their fascination at the act, or the thrill of defiance... or because they have no choice at all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>请助我一臂之力，先生。若你的陷阱真能为这片土地的虫子和我带来自由，我愿成为那个安放它的猎手。<hpage>现在需要我做些什么？<page>去召集我家族成员的力量——三个苟活的老家伙，他们分散王国各处。还有一个正是你已找到的这悲惨灵魂的主人，他是我可怜的表弟，死在了腐臭的沼泽。<page>我的家人每个都带着野蛮原始的力量！他们会把力量交给你——或是出于对你这种勇气的欣赏，或是享受反抗带来的的亢奋……抑或是别无选择。
translated_text: <hpage>If your trap would give me, and the worms of your land, a way to freedom, I would decide to provoke you.<hpage>What would you like to do to see your service?<page>I need to find strength in my family, in the man who rings the bell, in the three old worms who are still alive, and in the sad soul you carry there, in the poor last of me who died of a dry rotten disease.<page>There is something strong, primitive and barbaric in my family. For you, it is because if they come in or experience rebellious emotions, they give you a choice or they have no choice.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>만약 당신의 덫이 나에게 그리고 당신 땅의 벌레들이 자유로 가는 길을 준다면, 나는 당신을 도발하기로 결정했을 것입니다.<hpage>당신의 서비스를 보려면 무엇을 하고 싶습니까?<page>나는 내 가족, 종을 울리는 남자, 아직 살아 있는 세 늙은 벌레, 그리고 네가 운반하는 슬픈 영혼, 건조하고 썩은 질병으로 죽은 가난한 마지막 내에서 힘을 찾아야 한다.<page>우리 가족에는 강하고 원시적이며 야만적인 무언가가 있습니다.당신을 위해, 그것은 그들이 와서 또는 반항적인 감정을 경험하면, 그들은 당신에게 선택권을 주거나 선택권이 없기 때문입니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have opened the way above these halls, and bested the white knight that stood as guardian.<hpage>Child of the monarch, she claimed herself at the end, and her shell suggested it true, a being born purely from Silk woven tight. <hpage>That such a feat is possible... I have seen life woven from Silk before, but tiny, transient... Never like this...<page>Aye, bellringer! You’ve slain a marvel indeed... Well, flawed marvel, at least.<page>One to keep far from she was, least for us mortal sorts. Look of a child and a mind to match, but her’s been up wanderin’ this Citadel longer’n most. Even in its long silence, way ‘fore you came and roused its ire. <page>Might’a seen herself this place’s protector, keepin’ it clean and quiet as she did. Course quiet meant most crossin’ her path found a painful end from her pin.<page>I’d be sayin’ thanks for the slaying, but with all the other husks now awoken and enraged, a bug’s chances ain’t grown by much.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我已打通上层通路，击败了守卫的白骑士。<hpage>她自称君主子嗣，其甲壳构造显示此言非虚——纯粹由致密灵丝编织。<hpage>如此造物真是超乎寻常……灵丝编织的生命我倒也见过，但都渺小且残缺。和她相比，简直天差地别……<page>哈！敲钟者，看来你宰了个神迹一般的家伙……好吧，至少是个有瑕疵的神迹。<page>一直以来，对于我们来说，都是离她远点为妙。她长得孩童模样，心智也相仿，却已徘徊在圣堡多年——早在你到来并激怒她之前。<page>她自诩圣堡守护者，清扫所有“不洁者”。凡是靠近的都成了其针下亡魂。<page>本该谢谢你除掉她，但现在其他空壳都被唤醒并激怒了……咱们的处境可没变好。
translated_text: <hpage>I broke through these halls and defeated the white knight.<hpage>After all, she claims to be the daughter of the monarch, and her shell proves it, and she is a creature born exclusively of well-woven silk.<hpage>I 've seen life woven into silk, but it 's never been so small and short.<page>- Mr. Bell Linger, you have certainly killed a miracle, well, at least an imperfect miracle.<page>At least for us humans, we are far from that. She looks like a little girl, and the ideas agree, but she has been wandering around this castle for a long time. Even in this long silence before you provoke it.<page>Perhaps you consider yourself the custodian of this place, and you keep yourself clean and quiet as it is. The silence of the course meant that most of the people he met had a disastrous end.<page>I want to thank him for the killing, but all the other shells are awake and angry, so the chances of insects appearing are not much higher.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 이 홀을 뚫고 흰색 기사를 물리쳤다.<hpage>결국, 그녀는 군주의 딸이라고 주장하고, 그녀의 껍질은 그것을 증명하고, 그녀는 잘 짜여진 실크로 독점적으로 태어난 생물입니다.<hpage>나는 인생이 실크로 짜여지는 것을 본 적이 있지만, 그것은 결코 그렇게 작고 짧지 않았다.<page>- 벨 링저 씨, 당신은 기적을 죽였군요, 적어도 불완전한 기적을 죽였군요.<page>적어도 우리 인간에게는, 우리는 그것과는 거리가 멀습니다.그녀는 어린 소녀처럼 보이고, 아이디어는 동의하지만, 그녀는 오랫동안이 성을 돌아 다니고 있습니다.심지어 당신이 그것을 도발하기 전에이 긴 침묵에도.<page>아마도 당신은 자신을 이 장소의 수호자라고 생각하며, 깨끗하고 조용하게 유지합니다.그 과정의 침묵은 그가 만난 대부분의 사람들이 비참한 결말을 맺었다는 것을 의미했다.<page>나는 그를 죽인 것에 대해 감사하고 싶지만, 다른 모든 껍질은 깨어 있고 화가 났기 때문에 곤충이 나타날 확률은 크게 높지 않습니다.

original_en_text: Hello again, dear one. Looks like we both made it up here, safe as told. And what a shock to find you were speaking the truth about this place!<page>A settlement like this in the Citadel, nice and safe, cloistering so many bugs with minds intact! Never seen anything like it, nor even imagined such.<page>Makes trading away all of my nice bits and baubles much easier. After all, I want to take lots and lots of rosaries with me when my strength finally fails!
original_zh_text: 又见面啦，亲爱的。看来咱俩都如预想的那样平安到达这儿了。真没想到你说的这个地方居然是真的！<page>在这圣堡里有这么一处庇护所，既舒适又安全，还住着这么多心智健全的虫子！我从没见过这样的地方，连想都没想过会有。<page>在这儿做点小买卖可容易多啦！毕竟，等我老得不行的时候，我想带上好多好多念珠，风光下葬呢！
translated_text: See you soon, darling. Here we are reconciled and safe as we said. I am surprised that what you say about this place is true.<page>There is such an establishment in the castle, good and safe, far from the multitude of insects, and the heart remains untouched! I have never seen anything like this, I never imagined it.<page>All my beautiful gadgets make trading easy.When my strength is gone, I want to wear a lot of rosaries!
secondary_translated_text: 곧 보자, 자기야.여기서 우리는 우리가 말한 것처럼 화해되고 안전합니다.나는 당신이 이 장소에 대해 말한 것이 사실이라는 것에 놀랐습니다.<page>성에 좋은, 안전한, 곤충의 군중에서 멀리 그런 시설이 있으며, 마음은 손대지 않은 상태로 남아 있습니다!나는 이런 것을 본 적이 없고 상상도 못해봤어.<page>내 모든 아름다운 가제트는 거래를 쉽게 만든다. 내 힘이 사라졌을 때, 나는 많은 로저를 쓰고 싶다!

translated_text: Degree of failure
Trey Kampala
Trey Villari
Kenchan is
Montefanato
Download Cindy
Chitadela
Tres
The Trehientelli

original_en_text: Oho? You linger here still? Perhaps, like myself, you have been bewitched by the Plasmium’s beautiful glow?<page>Then join me, you must! A new assistant is needed. Together we shall unlock the secrets of this wondrous substance!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？你还没走呢？难道你也迷上生质液的蓝光了？<page>那就加入我吧！正好缺新助手，我们一起揭开这宝贝的秘密！
translated_text: What's it? - Huh? Are you going to hang out? Like me, you may be fascinated by the beautiful lights of the mountains.<page>¡Join Us! Please join us! We need a new assistant. Let's uncover the secrets of this wonderful substance together!
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요? - 네?같이 놀러 갈래?나처럼, 당신은 산의 아름다운 불빛에 매료 될 수 있습니다.<page>저희와 함께!저희와 함께 하시기 바랍니다!우리는 새 조수가 필요하다.함께 이 멋진 물질의 비밀을 밝혀보자!

original_en_text: There, you are replete with wonderful Plasmium once more! You can begin injecting it at once. Now, off with you!
original_zh_text: 拿好，神奇生质液又重新装满了！你又可以注射了，快出发吧！
translated_text: And again, you are full of great dishes! You can start the injection right away. Yes, yes, yes!
secondary_translated_text: 그리고 다시 한번, 당신은 훌륭한 접시로 가득 차 있습니다!당신은 즉시 주사를 시작할 수 있습니다.그래, 그래, 그래!

original_en_text: Assistant... You will help, yes? The buds have ripened... The Plasmium harvest can begin...
original_zh_text: 助手……你会帮忙的对吧？花苞熟了……该收集生质液了……
translated_text: "Assistant, will you help me? " "Really? The balls are already ripe. Plasma collection begins.
secondary_translated_text: "조수님, 저를 도와 주시겠습니까? " "정말요?공은 이미 익었다.플라즈마 수집이 시작되었습니다.

original_en_text: Leave your fear behind... Cast it off like an old shell. Give me what I need...
original_zh_text: 抛开恐惧……像蜕壳一样扔掉。把东西给我……
translated_text: Throw it away like an old shell, please give me what I need.
secondary_translated_text: 낡은 껍질처럼 버려라, 내가 필요로 하는 것을 줘.

original_en_text: Bring the Pure Plasmium. It must be tested... ingested.<page>Ready the Needle Phial to full charge... Strike deep the ripened buds. Return that precious liquid life to me... Assistant.
original_zh_text: 带纯净生质液来……必须测试……吸收……<page>把储液针管蓄满力……扎进成熟花苞……把生质液带回来……
translated_text: Obtain clean plasma. Needed evidence. Inhalation<page>Load the needle and be ready to press the mature button deeply.Leave me a precious fluid life, helper.
secondary_translated_text: 깨끗한 플라즈마를 얻으십시오.증거가 필요했습니다.흡입<page>바늘을 적재하고 성숙한 버튼을 깊이 누릴 준비가되어 있습니다. 소중한 유체 생활을 남겨주세요, 도우미.

original_en_text: Excellent! With two bugs at the task, the rate of discovery shall greatly increase!<page>Now! Before he up and vanished, my previous assistant seeded the warrens below with Plasmium buds.<page>The buds should be ripening as we speak, and the nectar within must be extracted before they reach maturity.<page>With the right tool in claw, collecting the nectar is an easy process. I’ll even lend you my own Needle Phial for the job.<page>Once you locate a bud, simply charge the Phial until readied, then release its needle into a bud’s core. Do it right, and it’ll suck out the nectar in one clean pop!<page>Return them to me when you’ve retrieved the necessary samples. With the right nectar, and the right testing, Plasmium can reveal even more of its wondrous properties!
original_zh_text: 太好了！效率翻倍！<page>我那前任助手在下面虫道种了生质液花苞。<page>现在应该快成熟了，得在成熟前提取生质液。<page>用储液针管采集，很简单的，我把我用的借给你。<page>找到花苞后蓄满力，把针头扎进核心，嗖的一下就能抽出来！<page>把带样本回来。有了它们做实验，生质液会更神奇！
translated_text: This is fantastic! If two errors occur during the mission, the speed of detection will increase dramatically.<page>Now! Before I could get up and disappear, my former assistant planted a parasitic microbe in the cabin below.<page>As we have already said, the button must be ripe, and the honey contained in it must be extracted before ripening.<page>Using the right nail tools, collecting honey is a simple process. I will lend you a vial needle for this job.<page>After the button is found, charge the Phial until it is ready and release the needle into the core of the button. If you do it correctly, it will look clean and will suck honey.<page>After collecting the necessary samples, please return them to me. With the right honey and proper testing, the plasma reveals even more amazing properties.
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 환상적이다!임무 중에 두 번의 오류가 발생하면 탐지 속도가 극적으로 높아집니다.<page>지금!내가 일어나서 사라지기 전에, 나의 전 조수가 아래의 오두막에 기생충 미생물을 심었다.<page>이미 말했듯이, 단추는 익어야하며, 그 안에 들어있는 꿀은 익기 전에 추출되어야합니다.<page>올바른 손톱 도구를 사용하면 꿀을 수집하는 것은 간단한 과정입니다.이 일을 위해 바늘을 빌려 줄께.<page>버튼을 찾은 후, 준비될 때까지 피알을 충전하고 버튼의 코어에 바늘을 놓습니다.제대로 하면 깨끗해 보이게 하고 꿀을 빨아먹을 것이다.<page>필요한 샘플을 수집한 후, 나에게 돌려주십시오. 적절한 꿀과 적절한 테스트를 통해 혈장은 더욱 놀라운 특성을 보여줍니다.

original_en_text: Assistant, that odour... aahhh... you have the Plasmified Blood...
original_zh_text: 助手……这气味……你拿到生质血了……
translated_text: There is a smell, but there is a plasma.

original_en_text: Keep using the Plasmium Phial, and enjoy all the wonderful effects it has on your body. Once your Plasmium reserve runs dry, visit me again.<page>I’ll charge a few rosaries for refills, but you can be confident that every bead goes towards our vital studies!
original_zh_text: 尽管用，好好感受生质液的神奇。用完再来找我。<page>如果要重新装满生质液，我得收点念珠当经费，都是为科研做贡献！
translated_text: Continue using Plasmium Phial and enjoy all the amazing effects it gives to your body.If you no longer have Plasmium, please contact me.<page>I am collecting a few accounts to complete, but you can rest assured that all accounts will be used for our important research!
secondary_translated_text: Plasmium Phial 을 계속 사용하고 그것이 당신의 몸에 주는 모든 놀라운 효과를 즐기십시오. 더 이상 Plasmium 을 가지고 있지 않으면 저에게 연락하십시오.<page>나는 완료하기 위해 몇 개의 계정을 수집하고 있지만, 모든 계정이 우리의 중요한 연구에 사용될 것이라고 확신 할 수 있습니다!

original_en_text: Do you fear the Plasmium, even now? Ahhh... Assistant... open your mind to the possibilities...
original_zh_text: 现在还怕生质液？啊……助手……敞开心扉接受可能……
translated_text: Are you scared of heights? Oh, yes! The assistant opened his mind and embraced this opportunity.
secondary_translated_text: 당신은 높이 겁이 나요?오, 네!그 조수는 마음을 열고 이 기회를 받아들였다.

original_en_text: Assistant... What we might become... together.
translated_text: Help us to become who we are, together.
secondary_translated_text: 함께 우리가 누구인지, 우리가 될 수 있도록 도와주십시오.

original_en_text: Ahhhh. Yes... Assistant. So loyal... Take the Needle Phial... find the buds below. They are ripe...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract that Pure Plasmium.<page>This shell shall become what you need it to be... Plasmium can cure all.
original_zh_text: 啊……对……助手……真忠诚……拿着储液针管……去下面找熟透的花苞……<page>蓄满力……扎透核心……提取纯净生质液……<page>这副躯壳将完成蜕变……生质液会治愈一切……
translated_text: - ¡Oh, yeah! The assistant is very faithful.Hold the seat of the needle.Find the button below.They are ripe.<page>I do my best for Phil. Push deep. Extraction of pure plasma.<page>It seems that this silk is just what you need. Plasma can cure everything.
secondary_translated_text: - 오, 그래!조수가 매우 충실하다. 바늘의 좌석을 잡아라. 아래의 단추를 찾아라. 그들은 익었다.<page>나는 필을 위해 최선을 다했다.깊게 밀다.순수한 혈장 추출.<page>이 실크는 당신이 필요로하는 것 같습니다.플라즈마는 모든 것을 치료할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Assistant! You’re still dallying about here? I’ve an eager need for pure Plasmium, fresh from the bud.<page>Just one fully charged stab of my Needle Phial straight into a ripe bud! You’ll suck the Plasmium right up!<page>Now, pop down into those worm warrens and extract it for me! What could possibly be more important?
original_zh_text: 助手！怎么还在这磨蹭？我要花苞里的新鲜生质液！<page>用储液针管扎成熟花苞，把生质液抽出来就行！<page>好了，快去虫道干活！还有什么比这更重要的？
translated_text: Assistant! Are you going to hang out? I want lots of clean plasma buttons.<page>All you need to do is fully load the needle and directly pierce the mature button. It absorbs the plasma.<page>¡Depve into the worm kingdom and extract it for me! And what's important?
secondary_translated_text: 조수님!같이 놀러 갈래?나는 깨끗한 플라즈마 버튼을 많이 원한다.<page>당신이해야 할 일은 바늘을 완전히로드하고 성숙한 버튼을 직접 뚫는 것입니다.그것은 플라즈마를 흡수합니다.<page>웜 왕국으로 들어가서 나를 위해 그것을 추출하십시오!그리고 중요한 건 뭐야?

original_en_text: <hpage>I am curious about the equipment you have here, and the blue liquid contained within. What study consumes you?<page>Ahh yes! So this miraculous substance intrigues you too! A wonder beyond wonders, miracle made material!<page>Plasmium! A naturally occurring elixir with no equal! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even defy death itself!<hpage>Plasmium, you call it? I have encountered its like before, or else a substance of remarkable similarity...<page>Highly unlikely! The grey and barren soil of the mainland could never produce something as singular as this, and that is undisputable fact!<page>Plasmium was discovered by my master at the farthest edge of Pharloom, hidden deep in salt-stricken waters. I brought it to these caves under her direction, to study how it flourishes in a foreign place.<page>Perhaps, like myself, you have been bewitched by the Plasmium’s beautiful glow? Would you assent then, to assisting me in my studies?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我对这些仪器和蓝色液体有点好奇，你在研究什么？<page>啊哈！你也对这神奇物质感兴趣！这是奇迹中的奇迹，实体化的魔法！<page>生质液！无与伦比的天然灵药！疗伤健体，说不定还能起死回生！<hpage>生质液？我好像见过类似的……<page>不可能！纺络那贫瘠的灰土地产不出这种宝贝，这是铁的事实！<page>最初是我的导师在王国边陲的咸水深处发现了它。我奉命带到这山洞研究异地培育。<page>难道你也迷上生质液的蓝光了？要不要当我的研究助手？
translated_text: <hpage>I'm interested in your device and the blue liquid it contains.What kind of research consumes energy?<page>¡Oh, yeah! Yes, yes, yes, this magical material will enchant you too! Wonders beyond the wonders, wonderful materials!<page>Plasma. Unprecedented natural wonders. It heals wounds and strengthens the shell. I can endure my death.<hpage>What is the name of the plateau? I 've seen something like this before, or something very similar.<page>Very Impossible! It is an undeniable fact that the gray and barren lands of the continent have never produced anything so strange!<page>The plasma was discovered hidden in the depths of the salt water near the tip of the Faroe Islands, and under his guidance he took it to a cave to study how it thrives in unknown places.<page>Maybe you, like me, are fascinated by the beautiful mountain lights. Will this help me learn?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 당신의 장치와 그 안에 들어있는 푸른 액체에 관심이 있습니다. 어떤 종류의 연구가 에너지를 소비합니까?<page>오, 그래!예, 예, 예, 이 마법의 재료도 당신을 매혹시킬 것입니다!기적을 넘어서는 경이로움, 훌륭한 재료!<page>Plasma.전례 없는 자연의 경이로움.그것은 상처를 치유하고 껍질을 강화합니다.나는 내 죽음을 견딜 수 있다.<hpage>이 고원의 이름은 무엇입니까?나는 이전에 이런 것을 보았거나, 매우 비슷한 것을 보았다.<page>매우 불가능하다.대륙의 회색과 황량한 땅은 결코 그렇게 이상한 것을 생산하지 않았다는 것은 부인할 수 없는 사실입니다!<page>플라즈마는 페로 제도의 끝 근처의 소금물 깊은 곳에 숨겨져 발견되었고, 그의 지도하에 그는 그것이 알려지지 않은 장소에서 어떻게 번성하는지 연구하기 위해 동굴로 가져갔습니다.<page>아마 당신도 나처럼 아름다운 산등에 매료되었을 것입니다.이것이 내가 배우는 데 도움이 될 것인가?

original_en_text: Plasmium is a marvel of nature! And a new assistant is sorely needed. Together, let us unlock its secrets!
original_zh_text: 生质液是自然奇迹！正好缺新助手，我们一起揭开它的秘密吧！
translated_text: The plateau is a wonder of nature.We need a new helper.Let's uncover this secret together!
secondary_translated_text: 고원은 자연의 경이로움이다. 우리는 새로운 조수가 필요하다. 함께 그 비밀을 밝혀보자!

original_en_text: Oho? A new face! Not here to bother, I hope? I’ve critical studies underway in these twisting tunnels and can afford no distractions!<page>You haven’t met Zango, my assistant, by chance? An indolent sort? Short, slovenly, rather unreliable-seeming?<hpage>In a dark cave below here, I encountered a shell not dissimilar from your own. I suspect your assistant may have met an unfortunate end.<page>Ah ha! That careless buffoon. No surprises then. That lump never shone with the talent for true discovery.<page>Now! To my work I must return! With my assistant so rudely dying on me, I’ve tasks enough for two bugs.<page>Unless you have further interest in my precious Plasmium, kindly leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？新面孔！不是来捣乱的吧？我在这些弯弯绕绕的洞里搞重大研究，可经不起分心！<page>有见过我助手赞戈吗？懒骨头一个，矮个子邋遢样，看着就不靠谱？<hpage>我在下方一黑暗洞窟里见到过和你挺像的尸壳，看来你的助手可能遭遇了不幸。<page>哈！那个冒失鬼。一点也不意外，废物本来就没科研天赋。<page>好了！我得赶紧开始研究了！现在死了助手，我得干双份活。<page>除非你对生质液感兴趣，否则别打扰我！
translated_text: What's it? - Huh? A new face! You don't want to bother me, do you? Really? I am doing critical research in this winding tunnel.<page>You never met your assistant, did you? Some kind of rest? Quick, short and unreliable.<hpage>In the dark cave below, I found something that was no different from its shell.<page>Oh, oh, oh! It is no wonder that the masses have never shown a talent for discoveries.<page>Now! I have to go back to work! My assistant died with no respect for me, so my job was able to cope with two mistakes.<page>If you are not interested in my precious plasminium, let me sleep in peace. "
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요? - 네?새로운 얼굴!너는 나를 귀찮게 하고 싶지 않아, 그렇지?진짜?나는 이 구불구불한 터널에서 비판적인 연구를 하고 있다.<page>조수를 만난 적 없지?어떤 종류의 휴식?빠르고 짧고 신뢰할 수 없습니다.<hpage>아래의 어두운 동굴에서, 나는 그것의 껍질과 다르지 않은 것을 발견했다.<page>오 오, 오, 오!대중이 발견에 대한 재능을 결코 보여주지 않았다는 것은 놀라운 일이 아닙니다.<page>지금!나는 일하러 돌아가야 해!나의 조수가 나를 존중하지 않고 죽었기 때문에 나의 직업은 두 가지 실수를 감당할 수있었습니다.<page>내 소중한 플라즈미늄에 관심이 없다면, 나를 평화롭게 잠들게 해줘. "

original_en_text: Oh? Those who hesitate learn nothing, you know! The wondrous bright glow of Plasmium makes all things clear!
original_zh_text: 哦？犹豫可学不到新知识！生质液的美丽蓝光会照亮一切！
translated_text: What's it? - - Yeah? Those who doubt will know nothing.The incredibly bright light from the plasma reveals everything!
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요? - - 그래요?의심하는 사람들은 아무것도 모른다. 플라즈마에서 나오는 믿을 수 없을 정도로 밝은 빛은 모든 것을 드러낸다!

translated_text: The Slurry Gland

original_en_text: <hpage>I have retrieved the Pure Plasmium, as requested. Know that, in your current state, I feel some reservation passing it to you.<hpage>This path your research takes... The final result may not be pleasant.<page>Pure Plasmium? No... Assistant... You must not doubt... It is precious. Perfect. It was needed... You have done well. As always...
original_zh_text: <hpage>你要的纯净生质液。但要交给这样状态的你，我有点犹豫。<hpage>你的研究方向……结局可能不太妙。<page>纯净生质液？不……助手……别怀疑……这是珍宝……完美……必须的……干得好……
translated_text: <hpage>I took the plate when I needed it. In your current situation, I have some concerns for you.<hpage>The school will continue to do this, and the end result may not be pleasant.<page>Is the plasma clean? No, no, we can't doubt that, "he said. Perfection is what I need. He, as always, did a great job.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>내가 필요했을 때 접시를 가져갔어. 너의 현재 상황에서, 나는 너에게 걱정이 있다.<hpage>학교는 계속 그렇게 할 것이고, 최종 결과는 유쾌하지 않을 수도 있습니다.<page>플라즈마는 깨끗한가?아니, 아니, 우리는 그것을 의심할 수 없다 " 고 말했다.완벽함은 내가 필요로 하는 것이다.언제나 그렇듯이, 그는 훌륭한 일을 했다.

original_en_text: These lands have taken the Plasmium well... the soil has drunk it deep, and the creatures bloom so beautifully... have you seen them?<hpage>The effect of your Plasmium on the beasts here is all too evident. Great change has been inflicted upon them.<hpage>There is an echo also of other infections I have witnessed. I wonder at the meaning of it all... or if I am perhaps imagining similarities where there are none.<page>Assistant, ahhh... you grow more inquisitive... We both seek deeper insight...<page>Could we... peer deeper inside somehow...? Let us think on it...
original_zh_text: 这片土地吸收了生质液……深入土壤，深入生物，花苞绽放……看见了吗？<hpage>你的生质液让野兽变异，影响太明显了。<hpage>这让我想起以前见过的其他感染，不知是巧合还是……<page>助手啊……你也变好奇了……想深入探索……<page>或许……我们该更进一步研究？……让我想想……
translated_text: The soil has been deeply saturated and you 've seen these creatures bloom so beautifully before.<hpage>The influence of your table on animals is quite obvious here.<hpage>There is a similarity to other infections that I have seen. I want to know what you mean. Perhaps you can imagine a place like no other.<page>You 're getting more and more curious, and we 're all looking for ideas.<page>Can you watch us? Let's think about that.
secondary_translated_text: 토양은 매우 포화되어 있으며, 이 생물들이 예전에 아름답게 꽃을 피는 것을 본 적이 있습니다.<hpage>동물에 대한 식탁의 영향은 여기에서 매우 분명합니다.<hpage>내가 본 다른 감염과 비슷한 점이 있습니다.나는 네가 무슨 뜻인지 알고 싶다.당신은 다른 곳과 같은 장소를 상상할 수 있습니다.<page>당신은 점점 더 호기심이 많고, 우리는 모두 아이디어를 찾고 있습니다.<page>우리 좀 봐도 돼요?한번 생각해 보도록 하겠습니다.

original_en_text: Ahhhh... Assistant... greed was ever your greatest failing. Do not guard your discoveries so jealously...
original_zh_text: 啊……助手……贪婪是你的弱点……别独占成果……
translated_text: O, o, o... The greed of the assistant was his greatest failure.Don't risk your results.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 오, 오...조수의 탐욕은 그의 가장 큰 실패였다. 당신의 결과를 위험에 빠뜨리지 마라.

original_en_text: For you... dear assistant... drink deep my liquid life...
original_zh_text: 喝吧……亲爱的助手……饮下我的生命精华……
translated_text: For you, I know. Dear helper. Drink the liquid of my life.
secondary_translated_text: 당신을 위해, 나는 안다.친애하는 Helper.내 인생의 액체를 마셔라.

original_en_text: Since you have proven yourself a capable assistant, take this delightful implement of my own invention, a Plasmium Phial.<page>With it, you can inject precious Plasmium straight into your body. Almost painlessly!<hpage>Your tool certainly looks sharp enough to pierce my shell, sir, but why should I want to do so?<page>Because filling your body with Plasmium is so beneficial! It protects you from harm! And it feels so exquisitely good!<page>My assistant and I have been injecting Plasmium into the local flora and fauna since we arrived. No ill effects have been observed, and so we can conclude that the process is utterly, completely safe.<page>Keep using the Plasmium Phial, and enjoy all the wonderful effects it has on your body. If you ever run out of Plasmium, visit me again.<page>I’ll charge a few rosaries for refills, but you can be confident that every bead goes towards our vital studies!
original_zh_text: 既然你够格当助手，送你个好东西——生质液瓶！<page>有了它，就能直接往甲壳里注射生质液，几乎不疼！<hpage>这工具确实足够扎穿我的外壳，但我为何要这么做？<page>因为注射生质液好处多多！不仅能防止受伤，而且感觉非常好！<page>我和助手给本地动植物都打过，没出现任何副作用，完全安全！<page>尽管用，好好感受生质液的神奇。用完再来找我。<page>如果要重新装满生质液，我得收点念珠当经费，都是为科研做贡献！
translated_text: You 've proven yourself to be a competent assistant, so bring along this fun tool that I invented, the Plasma Vial.<page>With its help, you can introduce your precious plastic directly into your body.<hpage>Your tools look sharp enough to break my shell, but are they? Why should he do that? "<page>Replenishing your body with plasma is so beneficial! He will protect you from evil.Feeling good!<page>Since we arrived, my assistant and I have seen the plasma injected into the local flora and fauna. Given that no side effects have been observed, it can be concluded that the process is absolutely safe.<page>Continue using Plasmium Phial and enjoy all the amazing effects it gives to your body.If you have gone plasma, please come back to me. "<page>I am collecting a few accounts to complete, but you can rest assured that all accounts will be used for our important research!
secondary_translated_text: 당신은 당신이 유능한 조수라는 것을 증명했습니다, 그래서 내가 발명 한이 재미있는 도구, 플라즈마 병을 가져와.<page>그것의 도움으로, 당신은 당신의 몸에 직접 당신의 귀중한 플라스틱을 도입 할 수 있습니다.<hpage>당신의 도구는 내 껍질을 깨뜨릴 정도로 날카로운 것처럼 보이지만, 그렇지?그는 왜 그렇게 해야 합니까? "<page>혈압으로 몸을 보충하는 것은 매우 유익합니다!그는 악으로부터 당신을 보호 할 것입니다. 좋은 느낌!<page>우리가 도착한 이후로, 조수와 나는 지역 동식물에 주입되는 플라즈마를 보았습니다.부작용이 관찰되지 않았다는 점을 감안할 때, 이 과정은 절대적으로 안전하다고 결론을 내릴 수 있습니다.<page>Plasmium Phial 을 계속 사용하고 몸에 주는 모든 놀라운 효과를 즐기십시오. 만약 당신이 플라즈마를 갔다면, 저에게 돌아 오십시오. "<page>나는 완료하기 위해 몇 개의 계정을 수집하고 있지만, 모든 계정이 우리의 중요한 연구에 사용될 것이라고 확신 할 수 있습니다!

original_en_text: Ahh, and exactly the required amount! A satisfactory effort, assistant!<page>With this pure Plasmium extract, I may finally come to understand this wondrous substance.
original_zh_text: 啊，分量刚好足够！干得不错！<page>有这纯净生质液，终于能破解奥秘了！
translated_text: This is the amount needed! - All right, assistant.<page>With the help of this pure plasma extract, I was finally able to understand this wonderful substance.
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 필요한 금액입니다! - 좋아요, 조수님.<page>이 순수한 혈장 추출물의 도움으로, 나는 마침내이 놀라운 물질을 이해할 수있었습니다.

original_en_text: Assistant... You will help, yes? The buds have ripened... The Plasmium harvest can begin...
original_zh_text: 助手……你会帮忙的对吧？花苞熟了……该收集生质液了……
translated_text: "Assistant, will you help me? " "Really? The balls are already ripe. Plasma collection begins.
secondary_translated_text: "조수님, 저를 도와 주시겠습니까? " "정말요?공은 이미 익었다.플라즈마 수집이 시작되었습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Take it, sir, though what insight it will grant you I cannot say.<page>Have faith, dear assistant... After all this I understand... the greatest knowledge comes only from faith... faith in Plasmium.<page>This blood you have collected... sparkles... I see it! A glorious form... a glorious future, shimmering back at us...
original_zh_text: <hpage>拿去吧，虽然不知能研究出什么。<page>要有信念，好助手……我现在明白了……真理源自信念……对生质液的信念……<page>你收集的血……在发光……我看见了！辉煌形态……辉煌未来……等着我们……
translated_text: <hpage>You don't know what it means to you, but accept it.<page>Dear friend, believe me, after all this I understand. The greatest knowledge comes only from belief in plasma.<page>The blood that he collected shone. I saw it! The form of glory. A bright future is shining upon us.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>당신은 그것이 당신에게 무엇을 의미하는지 모르지만, 그것을 받아 들여야합니다.<page>친애하는 친구여, 이 모든 것 후에 나는 이해합니다.가장 위대한 지식은 오직 플라즈마에 대한 믿음에서 나온다.<page>그가 모은 피가 빛났다.내가 봤어!영광의 형태.밝은 미래가 우리에게 비추고 있다.

original_en_text: You decline, Assistant? You cannot. The buds... The harvest. It must occur... For the source, and your saving...
original_zh_text: 你拒绝？花苞……必须收割……为了源头，也为了救你……
translated_text: Assistant, did you say "no "? You can't, man, we need a harvest. Your income and savings.
secondary_translated_text: 조수님, "아니오" 라고 하셨나요?할 수 없어, 우린 수확이 필요해귀하의 수입과 저축.

original_en_text: You would refuse?! There is much work to be done, and it is all so achingly slow when I have no aid!
original_zh_text: 你要拒绝？！这么多活要干，没助手进度太慢了！
translated_text: You will reject it! ! We have a lot to do, but when I don't help, everything goes slowly!
secondary_translated_text: 당신은 그것을 거절할 것입니다! !우리는 할 일이 많지만, 내가 도와주지 않으면 모든 것이 느리게 진행됩니다!

original_en_text: Ohhhhh... Assistant? Is that you?... You return at last, my friend?<hpage>Sir, you are in a disturbing state. This substance sprouts from within your shell. Time will see it consume you entirely. Would you seek aid?<page>No... No... Assistant... you are confused. A wonderful thing, we become. The Plasmium, our great research... We have progressed.<page>The research must continue. Soon... I shall become a source.
original_zh_text: 呃啊啊……助手？是你吗……终于回来了……<hpage>先生，你身体状态异常。某种物质在你壳内滋生，迟早会吞噬你。需要帮助吗？<page>不……不……助手……你错了。我们在进化……生质液……研究大突破……<page>研究必须继续……很快……我将成为源头……
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! The assistant? Is it you? Friends, are you finally home?<hpage>This substance is coming out of the crust. Time will show that it is completely depleted. Need help?<page>No, no, no. No. Plasma research is on the rise.<page>The investigation will continue as soon as ... I'll be the source.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!조수님?너야?여러분, 드디어 집에 도착하셨나요?<hpage>이 물질은 지각에서 나오고 있다.시간이 지나면 그것이 완전히 고갈되었다는 것을 보여줄 것이다.도움이 필요해요?<page>아니, 아니, 아니, 아니. 플라즈마 연구는 증가하고 있다.<page>조사는 곧 계속될 것이다 ...내가 원천이 될 거야.

original_en_text: Assistant! Have you come to refill your reserve of Plasmium?
original_zh_text: 助手！你是来补充生质液的？
translated_text: Assistant! Are you here to replenish your plasma reserves?
Restoration of plasma reserves.

original_en_text: Oho? A new face! Not here to bother, I hope? I’ve critical studies underway in these twisting tunnels and can afford no distractions!<page>You haven’t met Zango, my assistant, by chance? An indolent sort? Short, slovenly, rather unreliable-seeming?<hpage>I have not, sir. I am curious though, about the equipment you have here, and the blue liquid contained within. What study consumes you?<page>Ahh yes! So this miraculous substance intrigues you too! A wonder beyond wonders, miracle made material!<page>Plasmium! A naturally occurring elixir with no equal! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even defy death itself!<hpage>Plasmium, you call it? I have encountered its like before, or else a substance of remarkable similarity...<page>Highly unlikely! The grey and barren soil of the mainland could never produce something as singular as this, and that is indisputable fact.<page>Plasmium was first discovered by my master at the farthest edge of Pharloom, hidden deep in salt-stricken waters. I brought it to these caves under her direction, to study how it flourishes in a foreign place.<page>Now! To my work I must return! Unless you have further interest in my precious Plasmium, or chance upon my truant assistant, kindly leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？新面孔！不是来捣乱的吧？我在这些弯弯绕绕的洞里搞重大研究，可经不起分心！<page>有见过我助手赞戈吗？懒骨头一个，矮个子邋遢样，看着就不靠谱？<hpage>没见过。不过我对这些仪器和蓝色液体有点好奇，你在研究什么？<page>啊哈！你也对这神奇物质感兴趣！这是奇迹中的奇迹，实体化的魔法！<page>生质液！无与伦比的天然灵药！疗伤健体，说不定还能起死回生！<hpage>生质液？我好像见过类似的……<page>不可能！纺络那贫瘠的灰土地产不出这种宝贝，这是铁的事实！<page>最初是我的导师在王国边陲的咸水深处发现了它。我奉命带到这山洞研究异地培育。<page>好了！我要继续工作了！除非你对生质液感兴趣，或者碰见我那翘班助手，否则别打扰我！

I have to go back to work! If you are not interested in my precious plasma, or if you know my absent assistant, please let me sleep in peace! "
