original_en_text: <page=S>Miss courier! Pharloom’s bugs are wishing, waiting, sad and scared. The deliverings are needed, now more than more!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐！纺络的虫子们又怕又急，都等着物资呢！现在送货是十分要紧的事！
translated_text: <page=S>Delivery was lost! The falling insect is full of hope, expectation, sorrow and fear. Delivery is needed now, but that 's not all.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>배달이 잃어버렸습니다!떨어지는 곤충은 희망과 기대와 슬픔과 두려움으로 가득 차 있습니다.지금 배송이 필요하지만, 그게 전부는 아니다.

original_en_text: But what’s this?! I smell something on you right now! You have a relic for me!
original_zh_text: 慢着！你身上有味儿！揣着古董呢！
translated_text: What is this? I can hear you right now! You have an inheritance for me. "
secondary_translated_text: 이건 뭐야?나는 지금 당신의 말을 들을 수 있습니다! "너는 나에게 유산이 있다. "

original_en_text: Aha! The spines! Specimen, you have them! Then it is time, indeed! Bzzt! To free you of your wriggling torment, and show my genius clear!
original_zh_text: 啊哈！棘刺到手！病患，该手术了！滋滋！让你摆脱痛苦，见证本神医天才手段吧！
translated_text: Oh, oh, oh! Spina, we have a champion. It's time, really. - Х м м м! Let me free you from the torments of peristalsis and show you clearly my genius!
secondary_translated_text: 오 오, 오, 오!스피나, 우리는 챔피언이 있다.시간이 됐어, 진짜. - 엠엠엠엠!내가 너를 환동증의 고통에서 해방시키고 나의 천재성을 분명히 보여주게 해줘!

original_en_text: Oh my, what a state you’re in! You look like you’re one breath away from keeling over dead!<hpage>I will continue to live, madam, but I am indeed afflicted. A parasite has taken root within my shell... Perhaps you have something that could help me? A medicine?<page>Mmm, not so sure I stock anything like that. You should ask Pavo there. It’s his job to give directions and such, so he may have some useful advice.<page>In the meantime... shopping itself is a type of medicine, isn’t it? You should buy something now. Given your condition, this might be your last chance!
original_zh_text: 圣堡在上！你这模样看着像要咽气了似的！<hpage>还死不了，女士，但确实抱恙。甲壳遭受寄生……可有药能治？<page>唔，我这不卖药。去问帕沃吧，他管指路，或许有招。<page>话说回来……购物也算疗愈嘛！趁还能动快买点，过了这村没这店！
translated_text: What the hell are you? Looks like you are dying!<hpage>I will live, but I am not happy. Is the parasite already taking root in my shell? Can you help me in anything? What about the medicines?<page>I don't know if such a thing exists. Ask about the package. Your job is to give instructions and so on so that you can have useful advice.<page>At the same time,... Shopping is a drug in itself, right? Really? You need to buy something right now. Given the circumstances, this may be our last chance.
secondary_translated_text: 넌 도대체 뭐야?당신은 죽어가는 것처럼 보입니다!<hpage>나는 살 것이지만 행복하지 않다.기생충이 이미 내 껍질에 뿌리를 내리고 있습니까?뭐라도 도와줄 수 있나요?약은 어때요?<page>나는 그런 것이 존재하는지 모르겠다.패키지에 대해 물어보십시오.당신의 임무는 당신이 유용한 조언을 할 수 있도록 지시 등을 제공하는 것입니다.<page>동시에, ...쇼핑은 그 자체로 마약입니다, 그렇죠?진짜?당신은 지금 당장 무언가를 구입해야합니다.이런 상황을 감안할 때, 이것이 우리의 마지막 기회일지도 모른다.

original_en_text: <page=S>Ughhh! What-what is this? Your body is all twisting, creaking! Horrid fiend inside! <hpage>A parasite has lodged deep inside my shell. It has taken some strength of will to keep its thrashing at bay.<page=T>With a shell like such, you cannot be taking no deliverings! Infect the goods you would-would!<hpage>Very well, couriers. If I somehow manage to remove the parasite, I may return to offer aid.
original_zh_text: <page=S>呃！什、什么东西？您甲壳里在扭动！有怪物！<hpage>是寄生体，暂时压制住了。<page=T>这样可不能送货！会污、污染货物！<hpage>有道理，若我能除掉它，或许再来帮忙。
translated_text: <page=S>Ooo! What is it? Your body is spinning and grilling! There is a terrible demon.<hpage>The parasite is stuck in my shell, it needs the will to stop.<page=T>With such a shell, it is impossible to stop the delivery. Get infected with the product you want.<hpage>Good job for the courier.If you can get rid of the parasite, come back to help him.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>오오!뭐야?당신의 몸은 회전하고 구워지고 있습니다!끔찍한 악마가 있습니다.<hpage>기생충은 내 껍질에 갇혀있어 멈출 의지가 필요합니다.<page=T>그런 껍질으로, 배달을 멈추는 것은 불가능하다.당신이 원하는 제품으로 감염됩니다.<hpage>택배는 잘했어. 기생충을 제거할 수 있다면 다시 와서 도와줘.

original_en_text: What do you want, slave?<hpage>Slave? I am a traveller, stranger, not a slave.<page>Grnk. Exactly what a slave would say. Begone!
original_zh_text: 你来做什么，奴隶？<hpage>奴隶？我是旅者，不是奴隶。<page>哼，奴隶都这么说。滚！
translated_text: "What do you want, slave?<hpage>The slaves? I am a traveler, a stranger, not a slave.<page>Г е р н а! What do slaves say? Run!
secondary_translated_text: "무엇을 원하니, 노예야? "<hpage>노예들?나는 여행자이고, 낯선 사람이지, 노예가 아니다.<page>게르나!노예들은 뭐라고 말하나요?달아나!

original_en_text: <hpage>Soon, Pavo, I shall calm the chaos. Please guard these bugs safe till then.<page>Of course, dear resident! Of course! Know all our faith, and our wishes go with you.
original_zh_text: <hpage>帕沃，我会尽快平息混乱。在此之前，请守护好这些虫子。<page>放心吧，亲爱的居民！请带上我们全体的信念与祈愿前行吧。
translated_text: <hpage>Soon, Pabo, I will end the chaos. Protect your vulnerability before you do it.<page>Dear Residents! Yes, no! All our hopes and expectations are with you.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>조만간, 파보, 내가 혼돈을 끝낼거야.당신이 그것을하기 전에 당신의 취약점을 보호하십시오.<page>친애하는 주민들!그래, 안돼!우리의 모든 희망과 기대가 여러분과 함께 있습니다.

original_en_text: Loose rosaries will escape your pockets at the worst of times, and I’m a deft claw at stringing them tight! I can string you a whole necklace, safe and stylish.
original_zh_text: 危急时刻念珠易失，但我能将其编成项链！既牢靠又时髦！
translated_text: In the worst case, the rosary will slip into your pockets.But I am an experienced claw that can tie well! I can tie the whole collar. It's safe and elegant.
secondary_translated_text: 최악의 경우, 묵주기도는 당신의 주머니에 미끄러질 것입니다. 하지만 나는 잘 묶을 수있는 숙련 된 손톱입니다!나는 목걸이를 다 묶을 수 있다.그것은 안전하고 우아하다.

original_en_text: <hpage>I have taken your wish, Tipp. If I find your brother safe, I’ll be sure to send him back this way.<page>My many thanks, miss saving! You are brave-brave. Same as brother! My faith goes all with you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我接下了你的祈愿，若找到皮尔，会让他回这里。<page>多谢救星小姐！您和皮尔一样勇、勇敢！祝您好运！
translated_text: <hpage>When I find out that your brother is well, I will bring him back.<page>Thank you, Salvatore, you are as brave as my brother. "My faith is with you. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>네 형이 건강하다는 걸 알게 되면 다시 데려오겠다.<page>고맙습니다, 살바토르, 당신은 내 형제만큼 용감합니다. "내 믿음은 너희와 함께 있도다. "

original_en_text: Up there, in that Citadel, the fabled oil is waiting. Bestow it upon this fine pinmaster, and your blade shall sing louder yet.<hpage>I will find the oil, pinmaster. Keep your skills sharp.
original_zh_text: 圣堡藏着秘油。取来此油，你的针鸣将响彻纺络！<hpage>我会寻得此油，请针匠磨好利爪等候。
translated_text: Give it to this gentle instrumentalist, and his sword will sing louder.<hpage>Find the oil, Pinmaster. Keep your skills honed.
secondary_translated_text: 이 부드러운 악기 연주자에게 그것을 주면 그의 검이 더 크게 노래 할 것입니다.<hpage>기름을 찾아라, 핀마스터기술을 연마하십시오.

original_en_text: Now now! What’s all this? Infested are you, bzzt?<page>Do you even know who I am? Why, ‘tis the great Yarnaby, genius physician, unfairly outcast, who now towers before you!<hpage>I apologise for intruding upon your work, but if you are the skilled physician you claim, I ask your assistance.<hpage>A parasite has wormed its way inside of me. Its roots twist and pull inside my shell, draining my strength. If you possess the skills and tools, I would see it removed.<page>Bzzt! Well, well! So you’re a special, sickly specimen, are you?! That changes matters, yes. Turns them on their head!<page>Let me see. Hm. Not haunted, indeed. No Silk-sickness. But something strange has certainly clawed its way in!<page>These “roots” that torment you so... I’m not altogether familiar with them, but it matters not!<page>If there’s something nasty inside a shell that must come out, we use great Yarnaby’s Extricator! It’s your only hope, bzzt!<page>...Hmmm, but to crack your stiff shell we’ll first need some extra strength. The healing can be done, yes! But before that my mighty Extricator needs an upgrade!
original_zh_text: 哟哟！这是什么情况？被寄生了，滋滋？<page>知道我是谁吗？伟大的雅纳碧！遭庸才排挤的天才医师！<hpage>冒昧打扰，但若您真如自称般医术高明，还请相助。<hpage>有寄生体钻入了我的躯壳，在体内扎根生长，吸收气力。若您真有本事，请帮我去除。<page>滋滋！哎哟！特殊病例啊？！这就另当别论了！<page>让本神医瞧瞧。嗯……非邪咒非丝病。但确实有怪东西钻进去了！<page>折磨你的'根须’……虽然不常见，但无所谓！<page>只要是壳里有脏东西，就用本神医的剥离机！这是你的唯一希望，滋滋！<page>……但想撬开你这硬壳，得先升级机器！
translated_text: Go, now! What is it? Are you infected?<page>Do you know who I am? For the great Arab, the fine physician, was unjustly left, and now he is greater than you.<hpage>Sorry to interrupt, but if you are a qualified physician, I ask your help.<hpage>Parasites are invading our body. The root was twisted in my shell, draining my strength. "If you have these skills or tools, you 're going to be eliminated.<page>- Х м м м! Yeah, yeah, yeah. Really? This change is important, find it back!<page>In fact, there are no ghosts. Silk disease does not exist. Something strange is happening!<page>The roots were injured. I don't know the details, but everything is fine.<page>If you need to get rid of anything annoying inside the cabinet, you can use the Yarnabi extruder! That's my only hope, Shh!<page>... But in order to break your shell, you first need extra strength.Healing is possible, yes.But before that, the Powerful Supplier needs to be updated!
secondary_translated_text: 빨리 가!뭐야?당신은 감염되었습니까?<page>내가 누군지 알아?위대한 아랍인, 훌륭한 의사, 부당하게 남겨졌는데, 이제 그는 당신보다 더 크다.<hpage>방해해서 죄송하지만, 만약 당신이 자격을 갖춘 의사라면, 나는 당신의 도움을 요청합니다.<hpage>기생충이 우리 몸을 침략하고 있다.뿌리가 내 껍질 속에 비틀어 내 힘을 고갈시켰다. "만약 당신이 이러한 기술이나 도구를 가지고 있다면, 당신은 제거될 것이다.<page>- 엠엠엠엠!그래, 그래, 그래.진짜?이 변화는 중요한데, 다시 찾아라!<page>사실, 유령은 없다.실크병은 존재하지 않습니다.뭔가 이상한 일이 일어나고 있다!<page>뿌리가 다쳤다.자세한 내용은 모르겠지만 모든 것이 괜찮습니다.<page>캐비닛 내부에서 성가신 것들을 제거해야한다면 Yarnabi 압출기를 사용할 수 있습니다!그게 내 유일한 희망이야, Shh!<page>...하지만 껍질을 깨뜨리기 위해서는 먼저 추가적인 힘이 필요합니다. 치유는 가능합니다. 하지만 그 전에 강력한 공급자를 업데이트해야 합니다!

original_en_text: Travellers should always keep spare shards close by. We Bellharters were once praised for our fine claw-work. An art lost on most modern pilgrims... excepting yourself I’m sure.
original_zh_text: 旅者该随身带碎片。钟心镇的虫昔年以各种技艺闻名，如今朝圣者都不懂……你除外。
translated_text: Passengers should always carry spare parts with them. Berhartts admired their beautiful nails. Most modern pilgrims have lost their art and are convinced that they have nothing but themselves.
secondary_translated_text: 승객은 항상 예비 부품을 가지고 있어야 합니다.베르하르츠는 그들의 아름다운 손톱을 감탄했다.대부분의 현대의 순례자들은 그들의 예술을 잃었고 자신 외에는 아무것도 없다고 확신합니다.

original_en_text: What a persistent little worm you are. Amuse me then. Why did you cut those poor bugs from their comforting curse?<hpage>There was old power in the creature that guided the thread, and a talent of Silk, now taken, that shall prove useful to me.<hpage>That the town is freed and its service returned is a benefit too. I may ofttimes feel myself apart from these bugs, but even I recoil to see Silk strung in such sickening service.<page>Grnk. To free them was no favour. But the gathering of power... In that goal, we may understand each other some.
original_zh_text: 真是阴魂不散的虫子。行啊，陪我解个闷。为何要把那些可怜虫从舒坦的诅咒里拽出来？<hpage>操控丝咒的古兽有我要的力量，它的灵丝天赋现已归我。<hpage>顺带让镇子回复往常也算好事。我虽与这些虫子不同，但见到灵丝被这般滥用也觉得恶心。<page>哼……蠢材才会解救他们！不过夺取力量这点……咱们倒是臭味相投。
translated_text: You're a stubborn little bug. It made me laugh. "Why did you remove this poor worm from the curse of the peacemaker?<hpage>The beings that produced the silk have ancient power, and now the talent of the silk that took me away is helping me a lot.<hpage>I often feel disconnected from these insects, but it 's disgusting to see how silk does such an unpleasant service.<page>The borders! Liberation is not a favor, it is an accumulation of power, and then we can get to know each other a little. "
secondary_translated_text: 너는 고집이 많은 작은 벌레야.그것은 나를 웃게 만들었다. "왜 이 불쌍한 벌레를 평화주의 저주에서 제거하셨습니까?<hpage>실크를 생산한 존재들은 고대의 힘을 가지고 있었고, 이제 나를 데려간 실크의 재능은 나에게 많은 도움이 되었다.<hpage>나는 종종 이 곤충들과 연결이 끊어졌다고 느낍니다. 하지만 실크가 그러한 불쾌한 서비스를하는 것을 보는 것은 혐오스럽습니다.<page>국경을!해방은 호의가 아니라 권력의 축적이며, 그런 다음 우리는 서로를 조금 더 알 수 있습니다. "

original_en_text: Ahh... I smell something on you. Heavy with the past, you are. You have a relic for me, don’t you?
original_zh_text: 啊哈……闻着老灰味儿了。你肯定藏着好货！
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! I smell the weight of the past. You have a relic for me, right? Really?
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!나는 과거의 무게를 맡았다.나한테 유물이 있잖아, 그렇죠?진짜?

original_en_text: <hpage>Your skills are impressive. My needle sings from your care. But I must ask, can the blade be honed further?<page>You seek further sharpening? Further than Plinney does provide? Impertinence! But... Maybe? But... No...<hpage>You hesitate? Then it is possible? Are you incapable? Should I seek others within the kingdom?<page>Wait! Yes. Seek not others, but an oil, fabled and fine. With it the Citadel once brought gleaming edge and point to its pins.<page>Though the Citadel’s pinmasters are long past, some small store of that miraculous elixir may remain within its halls.<page>Were even a meagre drop pilfered, and gifted upon Plinney, your blade could shine brighter still...<page>Just know, dear friend, the veiled bugs would be oh so unkind to the thief who’d claim that fine prize for themself.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针匠手艺了得，此针经你打磨如获新生。但还能更锋利么？<page>还想更锋利？嫌普林尼手艺糙？真是无礼！不过……或许？但……不行……<hpage>犹豫？那就是可行？难道你办不到？我得另寻高匠？<page>慢着！不用找别家，但要找油。传说圣堡藏着秘油，昔年靠它磨出绝世神锋。<page>虽说圣堡针匠早已绝迹，但没准还囤着点。<page>偷来几滴给我，您这针刃还能更亮……<page>但丑话说前头，覆面虫对偷油贼可不客气。
translated_text: <hpage>My needles are singing about your care, but I have a question: Will the knife be sharper?<page>Are you looking for additional training? More than Palin can offer? It's not meaningful! More... Maybe, but... The number is<hpage>Do you doubt? Is it possible? Are you incompetent? Should we look for others in the Kingdom?<page>Wait for that! Thus, the castle once brought with it a shiny edge and a thorn pointing to it.<page>The castle master is a thing of the past, but there may be small shops in the castle that contain a magic panacea.<page>Even if we stole some from Pliny, your blade would be brighter. "<page>As we all know, these masked worms are very bad for thieves looking for cuts.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>내 바늘은 당신의 보살핌에 대해 노래하고 있지만, 나는 질문이 있습니다 : 칼이 더 날카로워질 것입니까?<page>추가 교육을 찾고 계신가요?페일린이 제공 할 수있는 것보다 더 많은?그건 의미가 없어!더 많은...어쩌면, 하지만...그 번호는<hpage>당신은 의심합니까?가능할까요?당신은 무능한가요?우리는 왕국에서 다른 사람들을 찾아야 합니까?<page>저거 기다려!더 이상 보지 말고, 전설적이고 정제 된 오일을 찾을 수 있습니다.그리하여 성은 한때 광택이 빛나는 가장자리와 가시로 그것을 가리키고 있었다.<page>성 주인은 과거의 일이지만 성에는 마법의 만병약을 포함하는 작은 상점이있을 수 있습니다.<page>플리니에게서 훔쳐도 네 칼이 더 밝을거야"<page>우리 모두가 알고 있듯이, 이 마스크 벌레는 절단을 찾는 도둑에게 매우 나쁘다.

original_en_text: You’ve a tool pouch on you? I can add a few pockets so you can carry more tools, and more shards to make’em. My sewing skills are quite renowned in these parts.
original_zh_text: 带着工具袋？我可以给你多缝几格，附近就数我的手艺最好了。
translated_text: Do you have a set? You can add a few pockets so you can carry more tools and details with you.My sewing skills here are well known.

original_en_text: <page=S>Miss saving! We are together, at last! My brother and myself, both returned to safety’s safe.<hpage>I am pleased you have found one another. If you are planning to venture out again, I would urge you reconsider for the sake of your shells.<page=S>We know it! Muchly-much! We cannot be leaving this home of bells. No more! Heres we will remain, for shells to survive. <page=T>But we instead did plan, together, clever! Yes-yes. Those pilgrims, them that pass, maybes they will help? For small reward as we have?<page=T>Even you, miss saving! Yes-yes! Saving is done. Our wishes now we ask. Now is time for miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐！我们兄弟终于团圆啦！<hpage>我很欣慰你们能重逢，但若再想外出送货，要小心。<page=S>知、知道啦！我们再也不离开钟心镇了。保命要紧。<page=T>但我们想了个妙、妙招！让路过的朝圣者帮忙送货，给点小报酬！<page=T>救星小姐也可以！您送完了货，换我们帮您实现愿望！<page=S>每单顺、顺利送达，客户都会给念珠！快看待送清单！
translated_text: <page=S>I lost my savings. We're finally together! My husband and I came back safely.<hpage>I am glad you found each other.If you are thinking of going out again, we recommend you to review your cover.<page=S>I know! There are many! I can't get out of the clock. nothing more! If the shell survives, we will stay.<page=T>Will pilgrims and passers-by help us for such a small prize as ours?<page=T>There was no rescue! Ah, yes! Ah, yes! The rescue was completed. Let's talk about our wishes. It's time to become a supplier!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>저축을 잃었다.우리는 마침내 함께했다!남편과 나는 무사히 돌아왔습니다.<hpage>나는 당신이 서로를 찾게되어 기쁩니다. 당신이 다시 외출을 생각하고 있다면, 우리는 당신이 당신의 표지를 검토하는 것을 추천합니다.<page=S>알겠어!많은 사람들이 있습니다!나는 시계를 벗어날 수 없다.더 이상 아무것도 없다!만약 껍질이 살아남으면, 우리는 머물 것이다.<page=T>순례자와 행인들이 우리처럼 작은 상을 위해 우리를 도울 것입니까?<page=T>구원은 없었다!아, 네!아, 네!구조 작업이 완료되었습니다.우리 소원을 얘기하자.이제 공급자가 될 때입니다!

original_en_text: Lost within that fortress above, the fabled oil of my profession... Such sharpness one could achieve...<page>But, oh! ‘Tis an awful thing. Too cruel, the many stabbing pins you’d face in its seeking.
original_zh_text: 圣堡里头藏着的针匠秘油……那锋利劲……<page>唉，但要寻得，这一路上有多险呐！多少针刺等着扎穿您的壳呢。
translated_text: Lost in the fortress above, my legendary oil profession. so high level.<page>Ma, o, o. It 's very brutal, and you encounter many knife wounds in the search.
secondary_translated_text: 위의 요새에서 잃어버린 나의 전설적인 석유 직업.이렇게 높은 수준.<page>엄마, 오, 오.그것은 매우 잔인하고, 당신은 수색 중에 많은 칼 상처를 만나.

original_en_text: We’ve made a good start on the painting, resident! Give us a little more time and your bell’ll be shining like new.
original_zh_text: 刷漆进度不错！再给点时间，保准焕然一新！
translated_text: My painting is getting off to a good start! After a while, your bells will shine like new.
secondary_translated_text: 나의 그림은 좋은 출발을 하고 있다!잠시 후, 당신의 종은 새것처럼 빛날 것입니다.

original_en_text: Hnff... So the slave comes seeking?<page>I’ve heard it. Wishing on a world cut free, yes? Along with my nephew up there. Sounds he’s sunk as simple as you.<hpage>Will you not provide your aid, bug? This trap he plans requires power, and I suspect you’re hoarding more than most.<page>Oh no. I’ll give it. Not in the hope you’ll succeed... Bah! In that, there’s slim chance. I give just to see that restless energy unleashed.<page>So much soul, found and formed. Generations of it, all going to waste. Better it’s given a chance to blaze.
original_zh_text: 嗤……奴隶来讨东西了？<page>听说了。想挣脱束缚，取得自由？还有我侄儿掺和？他跟你一样蠢。<hpage>不帮忙吗？他那陷阱缺少力量，而你囤了不少吧？<page>帮，当然帮。但不是指望你们成事……哈！八成没戏。就想看你们折腾。<page>囤了世代的灵魂全在浪费，不如放把火烧个痛快。

Your traps require strength, and I doubt you 're hoarding much more than most.<page>- No, no, I give it to you. I don't want you to succeed. There is a possibility of burning.
secondary_translated_text: 노예들이 그녀를 잡으러 왔습니까?<page>세상은 자유롭다는 말을 들어본 적 있나요?진짜?우리 손자들도 그곳에 있었다.그것은 당신이하는 것처럼 쉽게 들립니다.<hpage>"나 좀 도와줄래, 밥? "당신의 함정은 힘을 필요로하며, 나는 당신이 대부분의 사람들보다 더 많은 것을 저장하고 있는지 의심합니다.<page>- 아니, 아니, 내가 너에게 줄게.난 네가 성공하기를 원하지 않아.이 점에서 가능성은 작다. 걱정의 에너지가 풀리는 것을 보려면 지불하십시오.<page>많은 영혼들이 발견되고 훈련되었습니다.여러 세대의 노력은 헛되다.불타는 가능성도 있다.

translated_text: Closed luggage compartment.<br>- - - - - - - - - - Chama-o?

original_en_text: <hpage>Madam, my shell has been overcome by a foreign force. Plasmium, it has been called in your land.<hpage>Though the substance provides some regenerative aid, I feel my mind at dangerous risk of being overtaken.<page>Bzzt! Maybe overtaken is good? Better even? Why go thinking yours is a mind so precious?<page>The great Yarnaby treats the sick! Not those that benefit from their afflictions. Enjoy its advantage and leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: <hpage>女士，我的躯壳遭异物侵占，在您这似乎叫生质液。<hpage>此物虽然能疗伤，但我感到意识有被夺舍的风险。<page>滋滋！被占岂不是更好？你这脑子有啥金贵的？<page>本神医只医病患！不医因病得利的。享你的福去，别烦我！
translated_text: <hpage>My shell is dominated by an external force and is called the plasminium on the earth.<hpage>This substance provides some regenerative aid, but my brain feels there is a danger of over-exaggerating it.<page>- Х м м м! Transcendence can be a positive thing, or even better? Why are your ideas helpful?<page>The beautiful Yarnabi heals the sick! They are not the ones who benefit from suffering. Use it and rest!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>내 껍질은 외부의 힘에 의해 지배되고 지구에서 플라즈미늄이라고 불립니다.<hpage>이 물질은 약간의 재생 보조를 제공하지만, 내 뇌는 그것을 과장 할 위험이 있다고 느낍니다.<page>- 엠엠엠엠!초월성은 긍정적 인 것이 될 수 있습니까, 아니면 더 나은 것이 될 수 있습니까?왜 당신의 아이디어가 도움이되는가?<page>아름다운 야르나비는 병든 사람들을 치유합니다!그들은 고통으로부터 이익을 얻는 사람들이 아닙니다.그것을 사용하고 휴식을 취하십시오!

original_en_text: What? What now? What’s all that great racket? What is it?<hpage>Greetings, ma’am. If you are disturbed by the rending of these lands, I fear some blame is mine to bear.<page>Pah. I care not for the miseries and struggles of them outside! None of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛呢？这么闹腾？叮叮咣咣的搞什么？<hpage>女士，若您被外面的响动打扰，那我很抱歉。<page>嘁。外头虫子的死活关我屁事！他们没我这眼力见儿，不懂敬重历史！！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: What's it? What do we have to do now? What is this sound? What is it?<hpage>If you do not agree with the division of this land, then I will be responsible for it too. "<page>О о у! I don't care about your pain and suffering. They don't have my vision and respect for the past!<page>You are very capable here. Go, kidnapped. If you find something old and beautiful, don't forget to bring it. I bought it.
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요?지금 우리는 무엇을 해야 합니까?이 소리가 뭐야?뭐야?<hpage>만일 너희가 이 땅의 분할에 동의하지 않는다면, 나도 그 책임을 지게 될 것이다. "<page>오오오오!나는 너의 고통과 고통을 신경쓰지 않는다.그들은 나의 비전과 과거에 대한 존중을 가지고 있지 않다!<page>당신은 여기서 매우 능력이 있습니다.가자, 납치됐어.오래되고 예쁜 물건이 있으면 가져오기 잊지 마세요. 제가 샀어요.

original_en_text: <page=S>Keep safe, miss courier! You and your deliverings, fragile both can be!
original_zh_text: <page=S>保重啊救星小姐！您和货物都伤不得！
translated_text: <page=S>Be careful, guys. You and your baby are fragile.

original_en_text: <page=T>Do not wait, miss courier! You hold the deliverings, so nows you must away! A quick-quick bug, you must become yourself.
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐，别耽搁了！拿着货物赶紧动、动身吧！要快！
translated_text: <page=T>Don't wait, messenger. We have food, so let 's go. The mistake is that you should be yourself.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>기다리지 마, 메신저우리는 음식이 있으니, 가자.실수는 당신이 당신 자신이 되어야 한다는 것이다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Tipp, I have promised a wish to an old bug of the Citadel, ingredients for a dish to stir a gourmand’s stomach.<hpage>Do you hold in your belongings a Courier’s Rasher? It seems a key element.<page>Courier’s Rasher! Not me, miss savings! Smelly, fatty foods, good for most. Not good for my sensitive stomach!<page>You want-want my brother, Pill! Pill is big. Pill loves rashers! Can prepare them fresh for you, but first, Pill must be found, saved, safe-safe!
original_zh_text: <hpage>蒂普，我答应了圣堡老虫做道大菜，需要送货虫的熏肉。<hpage>你身上有存货吗？若有，我想讨要。<page>熏肉？我才不带！油腻腻的，我肠胃可受不了！<page>您应、应该找皮尔！他块头大，爱死熏肉了！但得先找到他，救、救回来！
translated_text: <hpage>Tip: I wished for the old castle cloves, a cooking ingredient that can scare the heart.<hpage>Do you have an urgent message about the product? This appears to be an important factor.<page>It's not me, lady savings! Smelly fatty food is good for most people. Not good for sensitive stomachs.<page>I want my brother, Peter, you love me! Fresh medicines can be prepared for you, but first you have to find them, store them, and be safe.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>팁: 나는 마음을 놀라게 할 수있는 요리 재료 인 오래된 성의 클로브를 원했습니다.<hpage>제품에 대한 긴급한 메시지가 있습니까?이것은 중요한 요소인 것 같다.<page>저축이 아니라 저축이잖아!냄새가 난 지방 음식은 대부분의 사람들에게 좋습니다.민감한 배에 적합하지 않습니다.<page>나는 내 동생, 피터, 네가 나를 사랑하기를 원한다!신선한 의약품을 준비할 수 있지만 먼저 찾아서 보관하고 안전하게 보관해야 합니다.

original_en_text: Bzzt! What now?! Not another bother for the great Yarnaby?<hpage>Madam, I have returned with the spines requested. Allow me to enter, that you may remove this parasite from my shell.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！又干嘛？！还来烦伟大的雅纳碧？<hpage>女士，棘刺已准备好，请开门为我去除寄生体。
translated_text: - Х м м м! What are we going to do from this moment? Does Big Abby have a problem?<hpage>I came back with the column that I need, please let me in so I can get this parasite out of my shell.
secondary_translated_text: - 엠엠엠엠!우리는 지금부터 무엇을 할 것인가?빅 애비에게 문제가 있습니까?<hpage>내가 필요한 기둥을 가지고 돌아 왔으니, 이 기생충을 내 껍질에서 꺼내게 해줘.

translated_text: Sharp sharp?

original_en_text: That blade! By claw! My finest work by far. Pharloom may ail, but across its morbid dim, your needle will shine bright.
original_zh_text: 瞧这针刃！利爪啊！我毕生的杰作！旅者，纵使纺络病入膏肓，您的针芒也将照亮死寂！
translated_text: ¡- Knife! Use your nails. This is the best job I 've ever done. Falling can cause pain, but in the darkness of sickness the needle shines.
secondary_translated_text: - 칼!손톱을 사용하십시오.이것은 내가 해본 최고의 직업이다.넘어지는 것은 통증을 유발할 수 있지만, 병의 어둠 속에서 바늘은 빛난다.

original_en_text: Care to refresh yourself in a steaming spa? Given your hard labours, I’m sure your shell would thank you for it.
original_zh_text: 想不想泡个蒸汽浴？劳累这么久，甲壳该舒坦下！
translated_text: Why not try relaxing in a thermal spring? With your efforts, your shell will appreciate it.
secondary_translated_text: 왜 온천에서 휴식을 취하지 않는가?당신의 노력으로, 당신의 껍질은 그것을 감사 할 것입니다.

original_en_text: Twine-strung globes filled with gleamflies. These’ll brighten up even the darkest bell.
original_zh_text: 充满荧虫的玻璃球串成的灯串，再黑的钟屋都能照亮！
translated_text: Around the world there is a lighthouse with two ropes.The darkest bells will ring.
secondary_translated_text: 세계 곳곳에 두 줄로 된 등대가 있다. 가장 어두운 종들이 울릴 것이다.

original_en_text: <page=S>Another egg. Another grossy eater queen. Delivery for the big-big creature beyond the roaches. Maybe this one travels safer than last?
original_zh_text: <page=S>又一枚噬丝蛆女王的卵，给蟑螂堆旁的大、大块头。这次会比上回安全些吗？
translated_text: <page=S>Another queen of evil transports goods to giant creatures that are not cheap.Is this trip safer than the previous one?
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>또 다른 악의 여왕은 값싼 거인 생물에게 상품을 수송합니다. 이 여행은 이전 여행보다 안전합니까?

original_en_text: Specimen, we must! There are secrets to uncover, bzzt! Progress can not be denied!
original_zh_text: 病患，我们必须搞清楚！有秘密就有揭秘，滋滋！进步是不可阻挡的！
translated_text: We need a Champion! You 've got a secret to reveal, BTW! The progress cannot be denied.
secondary_translated_text: 우리는 챔피언이 필요하다!당신은 공개 할 비밀이 있습니다, BTW!진전은 부정할 수 없다.

original_en_text: <page=T>With your shell all a’wriggle, you can’t be taking no deliverings! Infect the goods you would!<hpage>Very well, couriers. If I somehow manage to remove the parasite, I may return to offer aid.
original_zh_text: <page=T>甲壳里有东西在动，不能送货！会搞砸的！<hpage>嗯，若能解决寄生体，我会再来。
translated_text: <page=T>When the sink shakes, you can't take anything! contamination of goods.<hpage>Good job for the courier.If you can get rid of the parasite, come back to help him.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>싱크대가 흔들리면 아무 것도 가져갈 수 없다!상품의 오염.<hpage>택배는 잘했어. 기생충을 제거할 수 있다면 다시 와서 도와줘.

original_en_text: Bzzt! Bravo! A specimen who sees my brilliance!<page>The task for you is simple. Head over into that tangled mess of cages, on the roads above the moors.<page>Two bugs hide away there, Benjin and Crull. Simple types, woefully ignorant... yet they have been useful in procuring me materials.<page>It’s Steel Spines I need. A full bundle of them, forged hard and sharp. Tougher than I’ve ever had. Tough enough to crack stone! And to pierce your thick shell, bzzt!<hpage>Then prepare your machine for my return, madam. I shall soon return with the spines, for I am eager to see myself freed.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！上道！是个识货的病患！<page>任务很简单：去沼地上边的铁笼堆找班金和克鲁尔。<page>那俩蠢货有我要的钢棘——要硬过石头！利到能捅穿你厚壳！<hpage>那请女士准备好机器，我这就去取棘刺来。
translated_text: - Х м м м! It's fantastic! This is my talent champion!<page>Enter a messy cage on the desert road.<page>There are two hidden errors: essence and curl.Simple type, sad ignorance, but they are very useful for getting the material.<page>All I need is steel.The whole package is made hard and sharp.It's harder than what I've experienced.It's strong enough to break a stone.You often leave the shell, Hit!<hpage>Prepare the car until I come back, I want to be free, then I will soon come back with courage. "
secondary_translated_text: - 엠엠엠엠!환상적이에요!이것은 나의 재능의 챔피언이다.<page>사막 도로에 있는 지저분한 새장에 들어가다.<page>두 가지 숨겨진 오류가 있습니다 : 본질과 curl. Simple 유형, 슬픈 무지, 하지만 그들은 재료에 매우 유용합니다.<page>내가 필요한 건 강철뿐이야. 패키지 전체가 딱딱하고 날카롭게 만들어졌어. 내가 경험한 것보다 더 단단해. 돌을 깨뜨릴 정도로 강해. 너는 종종 껍질을 떠나, 히트!<hpage>내가 돌아올 때까지 차를 준비해라, 나는 자유로워지고 싶다, 그러면 곧 용기를 가지고 돌아올 것이다. "

translated_text: The table.

original_en_text: <hpage>I will find the oil, pinmaster. My needle has seen much use in this cruel kingdom, and I suspect many more battles are due. I will value your further skills upon my blade. <page>It is a dangerous wish you accept of this poor pinmaster. I welly hope this one’s professional desire does not cost you your life.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我会把油取来，针匠。往后旅途愈发凶险，这针刃还多有用处，你的手艺对我大有助益。<page>我这祈愿确实太过危险，希望您别为此送了命。
translated_text: <hpage>I will find oil, tasting, my needle plays an important role in this cruel kingdom, and I suspect there will be even more battles. " "<page>Accepting the wishes of this poor Lutheran player is a dangerous business for you. I hope that this man 's professional aspirations will not come at the expense of his life.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 기름, 맛, 내 바늘이이 잔인한 왕국에서 중요한 역할을 찾을 것이고, 나는 더 많은 전투가있을 것이라고 의심합니다. " "<page>이 불쌍한 루터교 선수의 소원을 받아들이는 것은 당신에게 위험한 사업이다.나는 이 남자의 직업적 열망이 그의 목숨을 희생시키지 않기를 바란다.

original_en_text: If you insist on surviving your infestation, seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out, high up into the moors, last I heard.
original_zh_text: 非要治这寄生物，就去找被钟心镇放逐的雅纳碧。听说她被赶到灰沼了。
translated_text: If you claim to have survived the invasion, look for Yunabi, who was banished by Berhart.
secondary_translated_text: 침략에서 살아남았다고 주장한다면, Berhart 에 의해 추방 된 Yunabi 를 찾으십시오.

original_en_text: I’ll waste no more words on a slave. Begone.
translated_text: Don't waste your time on slaves! We are left alone
secondary_translated_text: 노예들에게 시간을 낭비하지 마라!우리는 혼자 남겨졌다.

original_en_text: <page=T>More deliverings for those sad survivors in their cave below. <page=S>Deliver them quick-quick, miss courier! They will help much.
original_zh_text: <page=T>再给下面洞穴里那些可怜虫送趟货吧。<page=S>快点送去吧，救星小姐！能帮大忙呢！
translated_text: <page=T>Additional relief for the sad survivors in the cave below.<page=S>Delivery service, I'll deliver it. They offer a lot of help.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>아래 동굴에 있는 슬픈 생존자들을 위한 추가적인 안심.<page=S>배달 서비스, 제가 배달해 드리겠습니다. 그들은 많은 도움을 제공합니다.

original_en_text: That cry upon you, sister! Those are the sour sobs of a grey and twisted thing.<hpage>You speak of the bud? It is a mysterious thing indeed. In the dank swamps above the moor, I sought towards its plaintive wails, and found it resting there... Waiting, it almost seemed.<hpage>But you speak of its form, without sighting it upon me. Is it a thing familiar to you?... Have you heard these cries before?<page>Aye, yes! Not your own specimen, surely, but way back, other travellers did sometimes carry similar. Odd types they all were. Offerings they’d call the crying things, and towards the core of Shellwood they would trek.<page>Never I did see one again, not the buds nor the bugs that brought the gift...<page>If you’re planning to follow their path, I’ll wish on your safety, but ‘tis an ill omen to hear such sad sounds returned after so long.
original_zh_text: 旅者小姐，你身上那哭声！是灰色扭曲之物发出的哀鸣。<hpage>你是说那花苞？确实神秘。我在沼泽深处追寻它的哀鸣，发现它就躺在那里……仿佛在等待着什么。<hpage>可你未见过实物却知其形态，莫非你认得此物？……或是曾听过这哭声？<page>啊，没错！以前确实有旅者携带过类似之物，尽是些怪客。他们称这哭嚎之物为祭品，然后向着甲木林深处进发。<page>此后我再未见过那些花苞，也没再遇见过献祭之虫……<page>如果你要去寻找它们的踪迹，愿你平安。但这悲哭声重现，实属不祥之兆。
translated_text: My sister is crying! They were gray, deformed, but suspiciously acidic.<hpage>Are you on the bumper? It is a mysterious thing indeed.In the wetlands above the desert land I searched for sighs of pain and found him lying.I almost see him.<hpage>I gave him a form, but he didn't put it in. You know? Did you hear this scream?<page>Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! Of course, not his specimens, but other travelers of antiquity had similar specimens.They were all strange faces.They shouted "something" at what was crying, and marched towards the center of Sherwood.<page>I didn't see him anymore, I didn't see a bouquet of flowers, I didn't see an insect carrying a gift.<page>If you 're going to follow his path, pray for peace, but hearing a sad voice for so long is a warning sign.
secondary_translated_text: 내 여동생은 울고 있다!그들은 회색이었고, 변형되었지만, 의심스럽게도 산성이었다.<hpage>당신은 범퍼에 있습니까?그것은 정말로 신비한 일이다. 사막 위의 습지에서 나는 고통의 한숨을 찾다가 그가 누워 있는 것을 발견했다. 나는 거의 그를 보았다.<hpage>나는 그에게 양식을 주었지만, 그는 그것을 넣지 않았다.알죠?이 비명소리 들었어요?<page>아, 그래!아, 네!물론 그의 표본이 아니라, 다른 고대 여행자들이 비슷한 표본을 가지고 있었다. 그들은 모두 이상한 얼굴이었다. 그들은 울고있는 것에 대해 "무엇" 을 외치고 셔우드 중심으로 행진했다.<page>나는 그를 더 이상 보지 못했고, 꽃다발도 보지 못했고, 선물을 들고 있는 곤충도 보지 못했어.<page>만약 당신이 그의 길을 따르려고 한다면, 평화를 위해 기도하지만, 슬픈 목소리를 오랫동안 듣는 것은 경고 신호입니다.

original_en_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What’ve you got? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveller, one hoping you were not too badly affected by the cursed snare set upon this town.<page>Pah! What binds them outside means nothing to me. None of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛？要干嘛？你是谁？带了什么来？想要什么？<hpage>过路客而已，想看看你有没有被镇上的邪咒祸害。<page>嘁！外头虫子中招关我屁事！他们没我这眼力见儿，不懂敬重历史！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: What's it? What is it? What is it? Who are you? What's there? What do you want?<hpage>I 'm just a traveler, and I hope you won't be seriously affected by the curse traps set in this small village.<page>О о у! Everything that is closed means nothing to me, not my perception, not my respect for the past.<page>You are very capable here. Go, kidnapped. If you find something old and beautiful, don't forget to bring it. I bought it.
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요?뭐야?뭐야?넌 누구야?뭐야?뭘 원해요?<hpage>나는 단지 여행자일 뿐인데, 이 작은 마을에 놓인 저주 함정에 심각한 영향을 받지 않기를 바랍니다.<page>오오오오!닫힌 모든 것은 나에게 아무런 의미가 없으며, 나의 인식도 아니고, 과거에 대한 나의 존경도 아니다.<page>당신은 여기서 매우 능력이 있습니다.가자, 납치됐어.오래되고 예쁜 물건이 있으면 가져오기 잊지 마세요. 제가 샀어요.

original_en_text: And now! This pinmaster must work! Let the sharpening begin!
original_zh_text: 好了！针匠该干活了！纺络许久未见的锋芒该再现了！
translated_text: And now! The pinmaster is working. Start polishing!
secondary_translated_text: 그리고 지금!핀 마스터가 작동 중입니다.연마 시작!

original_en_text: Hff. The noise from above has returned, that pitiful clamour. The threads have been cut.<page>You... It was you who cut them. Do not deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I defeated the cruel creature above the town, and awoke the old bell stilled by Silk. Are you displeased?<page>Displeased! If I breathe, if I live, I am displeased. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, and a nuisance... begone.
original_zh_text: 嗤，上头又闹腾了，可怜虫们吵吵嚷嚷。丝线被斩断了。<page>你……就是你干的！别想抵赖！<hpage>何必抵赖？我斩了镇子上头的恶兽，敲醒了被灵丝封禁的古钟。你不满意？<page>满意？喘气的活虫哪有满意的！只有死虫才消停。<page>你是奴隶，是瘟神……滚。
translated_text: The noise from above returned. Very little noise. The children were cut off.<page>You are a... Cut it out, don't deny it.<hpage>Why did they deny this? I threw a cruel creature over the city and woke up the old crushed silk clock.<page>Not happy! If you are breathing and living, you are not happy.Only the dead are happy.<page>You are a slave, you are a prostitute. Go, go, go.
secondary_translated_text: 위로부터의 소음이 돌아왔다.아주 작은 소음.아이들은 끊어졌다.<page>넌...그것을 잘라내라, 부인하지 마라.<hpage>그들은 왜 이것을 부정했는가?나는 잔인한 생물을 도시 위에 던졌고, 낡은 깨진 실크 시계를 깨웠다.<page>행복하지 않다!숨을 쉬고 살아있다면 행복하지 않다. 죽은 사람만이 행복하다.<page>당신은 노예이고, 당신은 창녀입니다.가, 가, 가.

original_en_text: Resident! What a marvel you are, continuing to dare the wilds and darkness, and returning home to us unscathed.<hpage>I return with hope worth sharing, Pavo. I have seen a way to calm this chaos, one I now work swiftly towards.<hpage>The chance remains slim, but if this town can hold, and my efforts succeed, Pharloom may see a future yet.
original_zh_text: 居民！您真是奇迹般的存在，外面如此黑暗危险，不仅仍旧只身闯荡，还能安然无恙地回来。<hpage>我是带着值得分享的希望回来的，帕沃。我已找到平息混乱之法，正全力推进。<hpage>虽然希望渺茫，但只要你们能继续坚守，只要我的努力能成功，纺络或许仍有未来。
translated_text: It 's amazing that you defied the wildlife and the darkness and returned home illegally.<hpage>"I came back with hope to share, I found a way to quell this chaos, and I 'm working on it now.<hpage>I still don't have a chance, but if the city holds up and my efforts are successful, Faro can see the future.
secondary_translated_text: 야생 동물과 어둠을 무시하고 불법으로 집으로 돌아온 것은 놀라운 일입니다.<hpage>"나는 공유 할 희망을 가지고 돌아 왔고, 이 혼란을 진정시킬 방법을 찾았으며, 지금 그것에 대해 일하고 있습니다.<hpage>나는 아직 기회가 없지만, 도시가 버티고 나의 노력이 성공한다면, 파로는 미래를 볼 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: The Citadel crafted some marvellous machines, and this looks to be one of its finest! Apparently sent by some creepy slitherer hidden away up there, for sale only to you!
original_zh_text: 圣堡精工杰作！据说是上头阴森爬行的家伙带来的，这宝贝我只卖给你！
translated_text: The castle produces superb machines, and this one seems to be the best! Of course, there are crazy skateboarders hiding there, and it 's just for you!
secondary_translated_text: 성은 훌륭한 기계를 생산하고, 이것은 최고가 될 것 같습니다!물론, 미친 스케이트보더들이 숨어 있으며, 그것은 당신을위한 것입니다!

original_en_text: It’s my calling it is, to gather the relics of the past. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 我活着的念想就是收罗老古董！要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: My mission is to collect relics of the past.If you find something old and beautiful, don't forget to bring it here.I bought it.
secondary_translated_text: 제 임무는 과거의 유물을 수집하는 것입니다. 오래된 아름다운 것을 발견하면 여기에 가져 오는 것을 잊지 마십시오. 제가 구입했습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>I can not aid you, couriers. Not now. My own tasks are too pressing to consider taking on your deliveries. <hpage>With luck, some pilgrims may pass with sound mind and strength remaining. They may choose to promise your wishes.<page=T>Then we shall pray they come, miss saving! Our thanks go muchly with you, still.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我帮不了，有要事在身。<hpage>若有神志清醒的朝圣者路过，或许他们会帮忙。<page=T>那就祈祷他们快来！还是谢谢您！
translated_text: <hpage>I can't help you, I can't. My personal work is too urgent to make it delivery. "<hpage>If you are lucky, then there are pure and energetic pilgrims. Perhaps they agree with your will, but not.<page=T>Please come, I need help and I am always grateful for it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 당신을 도울 수 없습니다, 나는 할 수 없습니다.내 개인적인 일이 너무 급해서 배달을 할 수 없다. "<hpage>운이 좋다면 순수하고 활력있는 순례자가 있습니다.그들은 당신의 뜻에 동의할 수도 있지만 그렇지 않습니다.<page=T>제발 오세요, 도움이 필요해요, 항상 감사해요.

original_en_text: Hff. The noise from above has returned, that pitiful clamour. The threads have been cut.<page>You... It was you who cut them down. Do not deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I severed the thread and defeated the creature guiding the curse upon the town. Are you displeased?<page>Displeased! If I breathe, if I live, I am displeased. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, and a nuisance... begone.
original_zh_text: 嗤，上头又闹腾了，可怜虫们吵吵嚷嚷。丝线被斩断了。<page>你……就是你干的！别想抵赖！<hpage>何必抵赖？我斩了丝线，灭了给镇子下咒的怪物。你不满意？<page>满意？喘气的活虫哪有满意的！只有死虫才消停。<page>你是奴隶，是瘟神……滚。
translated_text: The noise from above returned. Very little noise. The children were cut off.<page>You are a... You cut them, don't cut them!<hpage>Why did they deny this? I cut the line and killed the creature that ruled the cursed city.<page>Not happy! If you are breathing and living, you are not happy.Only the dead are happy.<page>You are a slave, you are a prostitute. Go, go, go.
secondary_translated_text: 위로부터의 소음이 돌아왔다.아주 작은 소음.아이들은 끊어졌다.<page>넌...당신이 그것을 자르면, 그것을 자르지 마십시오!<hpage>그들은 왜 이것을 부정했는가?나는 저주받은 도시를 지배하는 생물들을 죽였어.<page>행복하지 않다!숨을 쉬고 살아있다면 행복하지 않다. 죽은 사람만이 행복하다.<page>당신은 노예이고, 당신은 창녀입니다.가, 가, 가.

original_en_text: <page=T>We’s heard the word! Many fleas together, settled high in Pharloom, calling out their wants of us!<page=T>Clever grubbers, fleas, but theys too need-need our deliverings. See them served, miss courier! Always goodly-good to gain the thanks of fleas.
original_zh_text: <page=T>听说跳蚤们在上面建了窝！找我们要货！<page=T>跳蚤们都很机、机灵，送货交朋友准没、没错！
translated_text: <page=T>I have heard that word! Many fleas have gathered on the heights of Fal, shouting demands to us!<page=T>These worms and fleas are smart, but they also need our help. "Please get in the car, it 's always good, good to be grateful for a flea.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>나는 그 단어를 들었다!많은 벼룩들이 팔의 고원에 모여 우리에게 요구를 외치고 있다!<page=T>이 벌레와 벼룩은 영리하지만, 그들은 또한 우리의 도움이 필요합니다. "차에 올라오세요, 항상 좋고 벼룩에 감사해요. "

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. I’d ask to trade, but your store seems a little bare.<page>Ahem! Well, yes. Our little town’s seen some dire times, and now my courier’s gone and got themself lost.<page>But don’t worry! I’ve a few small things, still! And if that courier ever makes it safely back, we’ll have plenty more treasures to haggle over.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。本想交易，但货架有点空。<page>咳！时局艰难，送货虫又跑丢了。<page>别急！还有点小玩意！等那小子平安归来，货品管够。
translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, trader. I would like to open my business, but the shop is a little empty.<page>Coughing up! Yes, our city has had a terrible time, and now there is no mail, and I am lost.<page>But don't worry! There is one little thing! If the messenger returns illegally, he will still have a lot of treasure in his possession.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>좋은 아침, 상인님.나는 사업을 시작하고 싶지만 가게가 조금 비어 있다.<page>기침이!그래, 우리 도시는 끔찍한 시간을 보냈고, 지금은 우편물이 없어서, 나는 길을 잃었다.<page>하지만 걱정하지 마세요!작은 것이 하나 있다!만일 사자가 불법으로 돌아온다면, 그는 여전히 많은 보물을 가지고 있을 것이다.

original_en_text: Bzzt! Leave me in peace! The great Yarnaby treats the sick! Not those that benefit from their afflictions. Enjoy its advantage and leave me in peace!<hpage>Very well, madam. I did not mean to waste your time.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！别烦我！本神医只医病患！享你的福去！<hpage>好吧，女士。无意浪费您的时间。
translated_text: - Х м м м! Please shut up! The beautiful Yarnabi heals the sick! They are not the ones who benefit from suffering. Use it and rest!<hpage>No, I don't want to waste your time.
secondary_translated_text: - 엠엠엠엠!제발 입 다물어!아름다운 야르나비는 병든 사람들을 치유합니다!그들은 고통으로부터 이익을 얻는 사람들이 아닙니다.그것을 사용하고 휴식을 취하십시오!<hpage>아니, 난 너의 시간을 낭비하고 싶지 않아.

original_en_text: Bonva! It is done, brave warrior. By my expert claw, your strange blade has received some fast-sharp shine. It shall cut cleaner than ever before.<hpage>Your efforts provide great aid, pinmaster. You have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 好了！完活啦勇士！经我利爪打磨，您这针刃寒光逼人，削铁如泥啊！<hpage>有劳了，针匠。感激不尽。
translated_text: Salvation, Salvation! It's over, good soldier! Thanks to my professional skill, his strange leaf quickly acquired a bright luster. It will be cleaner than ever before.<hpage>Your efforts have been very helpful, master. Thank you very much.
secondary_translated_text: 구원, 구원!끝났어, 좋은 군인!나의 전문적인 기술 덕분에 그의 이상한 잎은 빠르게 밝은 광택을 얻었다.그것은 그 어느 때보다도 깨끗해질 것이다.<hpage>선생님의 노력은 매우 도움이 되었습니다.정말 감사합니다.

original_en_text: <page=T>Miss courier! What horror here! The caves shake-shake, crying pain of hurt most savage.<page=T>And see all our poor friends below, newly found, crowded inside this home of bells, hearts fast for fear.<page=S>But what-what for you? You are here to help, yes-yes? The deliverings, they are needed now at most! When caves turn dark, the deliverings are essential, more than more.
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐！这儿太可怕了！洞窟震得像在惨叫！<page=T>钟居底下挤满了可怜的新朋友，全都吓坏了。<page=S>但您、您是来帮忙的对吧？现在最需要送货了！情况越危险，送货就越要紧！
translated_text: <page=T>Delivery was lost! How horrible that is! The caves trembled and cried out for the most barbaric wounds.<page=T>My heart was beating with fear when I saw my poor friends gathered in a house full of bells.<page=S>What Happened? You 're here to help me, right? Really? Give up, we need you! When it is dark in the cave, rescue becomes even more important.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>배달이 잃어버렸습니다!얼마나 끔찍한 일인가!동굴들은 떨며 가장 야만적인 상처에 대해 소리쳤다.<page=T>불쌍한 친구들이 종으로 가득 찬 집에 모여 있는 것을 보았을 때, 내 마음은 두려움으로 뛰었다.<page=S>무슨 일이 있었습니까?당신은 나를 돕기 위해 여기에 왔죠, 그렇죠?진짜?포기하세요, 우리는 당신이 필요합니다!동굴이 어두워지면 구조가 더욱 중요해진다.

original_en_text: <page=T>The deliverings! They are broken-broke! Gone and spilled!<page=T>Do not lose hearty-heart, miss courier! This is Pharloom! Danger, deadly. In times as these, is a rarer thing for goods to get to their goings.<page=S>Would you try-try again? For the bugs so much in need of their deliverings?
original_zh_text: <page=T>货毁、毁了！全丢了！<page=T>别灰、灰心！纺络现在处处凶、凶险，能送到才是稀罕事！<page=S>要再试一次吗？那么多虫等着货救、救命呢！
translated_text: <page=T>Delivery! They're broken! He's gone. Dramed.<page=T>Buy it, don't be disappointed! This is a flashlight.dangerous and deadly. Currently, the arrival of goods is rare.<page=S>Would you like to try it again? Mistakes that require salvation.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>배달!부러졌어요!그는 사라졌다.드라마를 다듬다.<page=T>구매하세요, 실망하지 마십시오!이것은 손전등입니다. 위험하고 치명적입니다.현재로서는 상품이 거의 도착하지 않습니다.<page=S>다시 한번 시도해 볼까요?구원이 필요한 실수.

original_en_text: Those bugs, cowering in their gleaming bells. Grnk. They claim a common calling, to serve the pilgrims as they make their path upwards.<page>Such a crucial role they award themselves, surely worthy of praise!<page>A sweet lie, of course. They, like their predecessors, are simply too weak and fearful to venture any farther. A settlement born from indolence.
original_zh_text: 那些缩在亮堂钟屋里的怂包，哼。自诩要侍奉攀登圣堡的朝圣者。<page>给自己戴高帽，真当是个人物！<page>甜美的谎言罢了。他们和前代一样，不过是没胆往上爬的懦夫。这镇子就是怠惰的产物。
translated_text: The insect crashed into the bell of the light. They claim to share a common mission: to serve pilgrims.<page>There is no doubt that you are playing an important role for yourself!<page>Of course, this is a sweet lie.Like their predecessors, they are no longer too weak to take risks.A decision born of laziness!
secondary_translated_text: 곤충이 빛의 종에 부딪쳤다.그들은 공통의 사명을 공유한다고 주장한다: 순례자들에게 봉사하는 것이다.<page>당신이 자신을 위해 중요한 역할을하고 있다는 것은 의심의 여지가 없습니다!<page>물론, 이것은 달콤한 거짓말입니다. 그들의 전임자들처럼, 그들은 더 이상 위험을 감수하기에는 너무 약하지 않습니다. 게으름에서 태어난 결정!

original_en_text: <hpage>He would have been wise to do so. If, on my travels, I happen upon the errant bug, I’ll make sure to send him your way.
original_zh_text: <hpage>他倒是聪明。要是在路上遇见那迷途虫，我会让他来寻你。<page>那就谢谢了！敢闯荒野帮助同类的虫可不多见。
translated_text: <hpage>If I make a mistake in my journey, I will surely bring it to you.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>내가 여행 중에 잘못을 저지르면, 반드시 너에게 그것을 가져갈 것이다.

original_en_text: By claw! Are you then our saviour in the shell? Standing so calm and cool on entrance to Plinney’s bellhome!<hpage>What clue, sir, tells of my part in your town’s liberation?<page>Why your blade, fierce warrior! Any fine pinmaster would detect the sign of deadly work upon that needle’s edge.<page>T’was a vile curse that struck here. No simple bug, nor basic pin could have granted our release. No!<page>That blade though, so expertly clutched in claw. That could welly have met the task. It was you who cut us free, yes?<hpage>I’ll grant you’ve sharp sight, pinmaster, and your saving is fortuitous. This blade that restored your town would now benefit from your service.<page>Welly, yes! I’ve a busy backlog of pins to tend, but your gracious heroism decrees that unique weapon receives my care this very moment! What’s say I take a look?
original_zh_text: 利爪啊！您就是我们的大救星？踏进普林尼的华美钟居还这般气定神闲！<hpage>先生怎么知道我插手了镇子的事？<page>看你的针刃啊勇士！但凡有点眼力的针匠都认得出这针尖染过血。<page>那邪咒凶恶得很，寻常虫和寻常针可破不了。但您这把利刃……<page>握爪稳当，做工精良！肯定是您救了我们，对不对？<hpage>眼力不错，针匠。你既然得救，这针刃也该由你照料了。<page>好嘞！虽然我手上活计不少，但英雄的面子最大，立马给您开小灶！这就让我看看针刃？
translated_text: Use your nails. Are you the savior of our shell? Standing at the entrance to Pliny 's bell tower, It 's very quiet!<hpage>What is my role in liberating your city?<page>Why do you have a sword? Any good needle can find a death mark on the tip of the needle.<page>It's a curse to be attacked. Simple bugs and basic pins can't get the version. No, no!<page>However, the knife was skillfully seized by his claws. Now this mission can be fully accomplished. And it frees us, right? Really?<hpage>I acknowledge, Master, that Your eyes are sharp, and that Your salvation is accidental. This lama, who has been restored to his village, will now avail himself of your services.<page>- "Yes, Willie, yes. I have a lot of thorns to deal with, but your elegant heroism has decided that I will now take charge of this unique weapon! Let's look at this.
secondary_translated_text: 손톱을 사용하십시오.당신은 우리 껍질의 구세주입니까?플리니의 종탑 입구에 서서, 그것은 매우 조용합니다!<hpage>당신의 도시를 해방시키는 데 내 역할은 무엇입니까?<page>너는 왜 검을 가지고 있니?좋은 바늘은 바늘 끝에서 죽음의 흔적을 찾을 수 있습니다.<page>공격을 받는 것은 저주입니다.간단한 버그와 기본 핀은 버전을 얻을 수 없습니다.안돼, 안돼!<page>그러나 칼은 그의 발톱에 능숙하게 잡혔다.이제 이 임무는 완전히 성취될 수 있다.그리고 그것은 우리를 자유롭게 해준다, 그렇지?진짜?<hpage>주님, 저는 당신의 눈이 날카롭고 당신의 구원이 우연한 것임을 인정합니다.그의 마을로 복원된 이 라마는 이제 당신들의 서비스를 이용할 것이다.<page>- "네, 윌리, 네.나는 처리해야 할 가시가 많이 있지만, 당신의 우아한 영웅주의는 이제 내가이 독특한 무기를 책임질 것이라고 결정했습니다!여기 한번 봅시다.

original_en_text: More, then! Bring me more relics of the past! Records, seals, idols! Let’s gather up the history of the world and hoard it all here, nice and safe!
original_zh_text: 继续！多找点老物件！典籍、印玺、神像！把全纺络的过往都放在这儿才安稳！
translated_text: And many more! Record, Seal, Idol! This is not a good idea. Collect the history of the world and stay here safe!
secondary_translated_text: 그리고 더 많은!레코드, 시얼, 아이돌!이것은 좋은 생각이 아니다.세계의 역사를 수집하고 안전하게 여기에 머물!

original_en_text: <page=S>Many deliverings still need making, miss courier! We is much needing your help, when you is ready for the giving of it-it!
original_zh_text: <page=S>还有好多货要送呢！等您有空了一定帮帮忙！
translated_text: <page=S>When you are ready to help, there is a lot to send miss messenger.We really need your help, and we will help you.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>당신이 도울 준비가 될 때, Miss messenger. We 정말 당신의 도움이 필요, 우리는 당신을 도울 것입니다.

original_en_text: Done, it is! Marvel of Pharloom! See how it gleams, your long, fine blade. Havast! That the pins of our land all once held such shine. So much we have lost...<hpage>This is fine service, pinmaster. It has been a long age since I have seen my needle such. I had not remembered the finesse of its forging.<page>Welly, ho! It is certain! Yours is a blade of finer make than most, one of few that could bear even more sharpening.<page>If ever upon your long road more oil is acquired, seek my service with haste! Who knows what form we could find deeper within your weapon’s sharpened steel!
original_zh_text: 成啦！纺络的奇迹！瞧这寒光，长刃如新。唉！想当年万针皆有如此锋芒，如今……<hpage>针匠果然手艺精湛。此针许久未曾焕发如此神采，几乎快忘了它的锻造之精良。<page>哎呀呀！没错！您这针刃底子绝佳，还能更锋利！<page>要是再得到秘油，就来找我！谁知这针还能磨砺出何等锋芒！
translated_text: It 's over, that 's all! The miracle of Fallem. Look at the brightness of her beautiful leaf. Havas! Once upon a time, the thorn of our earth shone. We have lost a lot.<hpage>Excellent service, Pinter. I have not seen such a needle in a long time. I do not remember his technique.<page>- John, it's safe. Its blade is thinner than most blades, and one of the few that can support sharper blades.<page>If you have more oil on the road, please contact my service as soon as possible! You don't know what shape you 'll find in the depths of the sharp steel of your weapon.
secondary_translated_text: 다 끝났어, 그게 다야! Fallem 의 기적그녀의 예쁜 잎의 밝음을 보세요.하바스!옛날에, 우리 지구의 가시들이 빛나고 있었다.우리는 많은 것을 잃었다.<hpage>좋은 서비스, Pinter.나는 오랫동안 그런 바늘을 보지 못했다.나는 그의 기술을 기억하지 못한다.<page>- 존, 안전해.그것의 블레이드는 대부분의 블레이드보다 얇으며, 더 날카로운 블레이드를 지원할 수 있는 몇 안되는 블레이드 중 하나입니다.<page>도로에 기름이 더 많은 경우, 가능한 한 빨리 내 서비스에 문의하십시오!당신은 당신의 무기의 날카로운 강철의 깊은 곳에서 어떤 모양을 찾을 수 있는지 모릅니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>For the moment, I can not aid you, couriers. My own tasks are too pressing.<page=T>Then we shall hope you see them soon achieved! If the deliverings are not made, Pharloom’s bugs will suffer muchly-much!
original_zh_text: <hpage>眼下实在帮不了，有要事在身。<page=T>希望您早日达成目标！要是货送不到，大伙可遭、遭殃咯！
translated_text: <hpage>The messenger will not help you. My job is urgent.<page=T>Reach your goals as quickly as possible.If it is not delivered, falling insects will cause a lot of damage.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>선지자는 당신을 돕지 않을 것입니다.나의 일은 급하다.<page=T>최대한 빨리 목표에 도달하십시오. 만약 그것이 배달되지 않으면 곤충이 떨어지는 많은 피해를 입힐 것입니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>It is fortune to see you returned, pinmaster. The roads between here and that deep woods’ grave crawl with violent foes. I had concerns for your safety.<page>Brave warrior, my hero! T’was indeed a fearful scramble home, but safe I now am! And a warmly pleasure to see you too, for the world has darkened indeed!<page>In such times, the task for a pinmaster is clear, to polish and sharpen and refine, suchly that the glimmer of your blade may pierce through the encroaching murk!
original_zh_text: <hpage>能见你平安归来真是万幸，针匠。从深林墓穴到此地的路上遍布凶险，我确实有些担心你的安危。<page>勇敢的战士，我的英雄！回家路上确实惊险万分，但我现在安全了！在这愈发黑暗的世道能遇见您真是令我欣慰！<page>在这危难时刻，针匠的职责再清晰不过——打磨、淬锋、精炼，让您的兵刃锋利到足以刺破这渐浓的黑暗！
translated_text: <hpage>Good to see you again, Pete. The road leading from there to the grave, deep in the woods, is full of cruel enemies. I am concerned for your safety.<page>Good soldier, my hero. I was afraid to go home, but now I am safe. Also nice to meet you, The world is getting dark!<page>In this era, the needle 's mission is clear: to polish, polish, and refine, while the blade 's light penetrates the eroding darkness.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>다시 만나서 반가워, 피트.그곳으로부터 무덤으로 이어지는 길은 숲 깊은 곳에 잔인한 적들로 가득 차 있다.나는 너의 안전에 대해 걱정된다.<page>좋은 군인, 나의 영웅.나는 집에 가는 것이 두려웠지만 지금은 안전했다.만나서 반갑습니다, 세상이 어두워지고 있습니다!<page>이 시대에 바늘의 임무는 분명합니다 : 연마, 연마 및 정제, 칼날의 빛은 침식 어둠을 뚫고 있습니다.

original_en_text: <page=S>We is got requested times a’many for this, a queeny egg of those eaters of Silk. Wish from big, sticky creature, near many roaches caged. Wants it muchly! <hpage>The creature, I have met them, a timid, fawning sort. Nonetheless, their tending of Silkeaters can be a benefit for me.<hpage>If a queen delivered could improve their harvest, I too would gain from the trade.<page=S>Miss courier, and big, sticky creature? Both are like to liking things so grossly-gross? We think yous are muchly strange...
original_zh_text: <page=S>接了个怪单！蟑螂笼子旁的黏糊大块头想、想要噬丝蛆女王的卵！<hpage>我见过那大块头，是个怂包。他们养蛆虽然恶心，但对我有利。<hpage>要是能提高他们的产量，倒也划算。<page=S>救星小姐和黏糊怪都好重口！真搞不懂……
translated_text: <page=S>I ate a lot of eggs from the Silk Queen 's dinner.Blessing the big glue creature next to the many beetles in the cage.I want it! "<hpage>I 've seen them before, and this creature was a cowardly, friendly human being. However, taking care of the silk is a good thing for me.<hpage>If the queen can increase the harvest, then I will also benefit from the trade.<page=S>Mr. Courier: Are there fat and sticky creatures? Do you like that bad? I think you are strange.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>실크 여왕의 저녁 식사에서 많은 계란을 먹었습니다. 케이지에있는 많은 딱정벌레 옆에있는 큰 접착제 생물에게 축복. 나는 그것을 원한다! "<hpage>나는 전에 그들을 보았고, 이 생물은 비겁하고 친절한 인간이었습니다.그러나, 실크를 돌보는 것은 나에게 좋은 일이다.<hpage>만약 여왕이 수확을 늘릴 수 있다면, 나도 무역에서 이익을 얻을 것이다.<page=S>뚱뚱하고 끈적끈적한 생물들이 있나요?당신은 그것을 나쁘게 좋아합니까?나는 네가 이상하다고 생각한다.

original_en_text: <page=T>Miss saving! We thought us safe, brothers together at last, but what horror even here! The caves shake-shake, crying pain of hurt most savage.<page=T>And see all our poor friends below, newly found, crowded inside this home of bells, hearts fast for fear.<page=S>But what-what for you? You are here to help, yes-yes? The deliverings, they are needed now at most! Alas, for our shells to survive we cannot now leave this home of bells. No more. Heres we must remain.<page=T>But we instead did plan, together, clever! Yes-yes. Those strong ones, like yourselfs, maybes they will help? For small reward as we have?<page=S>Our savings is done, and the caves turn dark. Now the deliveries are needed, desperate. Now is time for miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐！本以为我们兄弟团聚就安全了，谁知这里也遭了灾！洞窟震、震个不停，像在惨叫似的。<page=T>您看钟居底下这些可怜的新朋友，全都挤作一团，心都快吓跳出来了。<page=S>但您、您是来帮忙的对吧？现在最需要送货了！可我们这副样子……实在不敢离开钟居了。只能守在这儿。<page=T>不过我们想、想了个聪明主意！像您这样的强者，说不定愿意帮忙？酬劳虽然不多……<page=S>我们的积蓄都花光了，洞窟也危在旦夕。现在送货是救命的事！该您出马了，救星小姐！
translated_text: <page=T>I thought my brothers were safe and finally reunited, but here, too, it 's terrible! The caves trembled and cried out for the most barbaric wounds.<page=T>My heart was beating with fear when I saw my poor friends gathered in a house full of bells.<page=S>What Happened? You 're here to help me, right? Really? Give up, we need you! Unfortunately, for the survival of the shell to get out of the house from these hours is impossible. No more. I am here.<page=T>We planned it well together. Yeah, yeah. Can a strong man like you help me? For a small prize like ours?<page=S>My savings were gone, and the caves were dark.It was finally time to deliver!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>나는 내 형제들이 안전하고 마침내 재결합 할 것이라고 생각했지만, 여기도 끔찍합니다!동굴들은 떨며 가장 야만적인 상처에 대해 소리쳤다.<page=T>불쌍한 친구들이 종으로 가득 찬 집에 모여 있는 것을 보았을 때, 내 마음은 두려움으로 뛰었다.<page=S>무슨 일이 있었습니까?당신은 나를 돕기 위해 여기에 왔죠, 그렇죠?진짜?포기하세요, 우리는 당신이 필요합니다!불행히도, 껍질의 생존을 위해이 시간에서 집에서 벗어나는 것은 불가능합니다.더 이상 안 돼.내가 여기 있어<page=T>우리는 함께 그것을 잘 계획했다.네, 네.너 같은 강한 사람이 나를 도울 수 있을까?우리처럼 작은 상을 위해?<page=S>내 저축은 사라졌고, 동굴은 어두워졌다. 드디어 배달할 시간이었다!

original_en_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What’ve you got? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveller. May I ask, though, what work occupies you here?<page>What occupies me, you ask? The past! The voices of ages gone by, they speak to me through what is left behind.<page>Those outside, those dreary pilgrims and bell-adorned dullards... none of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛？要干嘛？你是谁？带了什么来？想要什么？<hpage>过路客而已，请问您在忙什么？<page>忙什么？忙着挖掘历史！这些老物件都会跟我诉说过往呢！<page>外头那些呆瓜朝圣者和钟里的蠢货……没一个懂行！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: What's it? What is it? What is it? Who are you? What's there? What do you want?<hpage>I'm just a traveler. I can ask you a question, but... What do you do here?<page>What do you ask me? Something from the past! Time has taught us all.<page>These people, boring pilgrims and idiots with bells, do not respect my vision, my past! "<page>You are very capable here. Go, kidnapped. If you find something old and beautiful, don't forget to bring it. I bought it.
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요?뭐야?뭐야?넌 누구야?뭐야?뭘 원해요?<hpage>나는 단지 여행자일 뿐이야.질문 하나 해도 되지만...여기서 뭐 하는 거야?<page>무슨 질문이야?과거로부터의 무언가!시간은 우리 모두에게 가르쳐 주었다.<page>이 사람들은 지루한 순례자들과 종을 가진 바보들이며, 나의 비전과 나의 과거를 존중하지 않는다! "<page>당신은 여기서 매우 능력이 있습니다.가자, 납치됐어.오래되고 예쁜 물건이 있으면 가져오기 잊지 마세요. 제가 샀어요.

original_en_text: Your continued help to Bellhart has not gone unnoticed, miss traveller.<page>In these terrible times, it’s rare enough to see any wish granted. Now to see such care come from a stranger! Why, that’s simply unheard of!<hpage>I have seen the scale of suffering wrought across Pharloom, Pavo. And I will admit, fulfilling these requests may do little to affect the cause... Even still, I have found it a rewarding task.<hpage>To aid another... The small warmth of it, I had almost forgotten.
original_zh_text: 您对钟心镇的援助有目共睹，小姐。<page>这世道，能实现祈愿已是奇迹，更何况还是出自外乡客！闻所未闻！<hpage>我也目睹纺络遍地疮痍。实现祈愿虽难以撼动其根源，但总能得到些许慰藉。<hpage>助虫为乐……这份悸动，我几乎忘却。
translated_text: "Passengers, your continued support for Berhardt will not be ignored.<page>In these difficult times, a wish is rarely granted. I have seen the horror of a stranger! Why not? Why not? This is unforgettable!<hpage>He chose the situation of Turkish farms. Fulfilling these requirements will have little impact on your career. Despite all this, I think it is a useful job.<hpage>It was a bit hot with my help, so I forgot.
secondary_translated_text: "여객 여러분, 베르하르트에 대한 여러분의 지속적인 지원은 무시되지 않을 것입니다.<page>이런 어려운 시기에 소원은 거의 이루어지지 않는다.나는 낯선 사람의 공포를 보았다!왜 안 돼요?왜 안 돼요?이것은 잊을 수 없는 일이다!<hpage>그는 터키 농장들의 상황을 선택했다.이러한 요구 사항을 충족시키는 것은 당신의 경력에 거의 영향을 미치지 않을 것입니다.이 모든 것에도 불구하고, 나는 그것이 유용한 직업이라고 생각한다.<hpage>내 도움으로 조금 더워서 잊었다.

original_en_text: It’s my calling it is, to gather the relics of the past. Look at my collection, if you fancy! Look, look!
original_zh_text: 我活着的念想就是收罗老古董！想看我的珍藏不？来！快看看！
translated_text: My mission is to collect relics of the past. If you like it, look at my collection. Look at me! Look at me!
secondary_translated_text: 나의 임무는 과거의 유물을 수집하는 것이다.좋아하신다면 제 컬렉션을 보세요.나를 봐!나를 봐!

original_en_text: <page=T>Goods for the camp at base, where pilgrims’ journey starts. We muchly hope this delivering goes well!
original_zh_text: <page=T>给骸底营地的货物，希望这趟一路顺利！
translated_text: <page=T>Charge from the base camp where the pilgrims began their journey.I want this delivery
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>순례자들이 여행을 시작한 기지 캠프에서 충전합니다. 이 배달을 원해요.

original_en_text: <page=S>You have the good-goods, miss courier! Now only the deliverings needs doing. Don’t wait here-here!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐，拿、拿了货物，快出发吧！
translated_text: <page=S>You have a good product! We just have to deliver it. Don't wait here! Here's!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>당신은 좋은 제품을 가지고 있습니다!우리는 그냥 배달해야 한다. 여기서 기다리지 마라!여기 있네요!

original_en_text: Off with you! Head over to that tangled mess of cages, in those roads above the moors.<page>Those two bugs, Benjin and Crull, can surely scrounge up what I need. A full bundle of hard, sharp spines!
original_zh_text: 赶紧去！找沼地上边铁笼堆的班金和克鲁尔，拿钢棘回来！
translated_text: RUN! Cells are laid on the roads over desert land.<page>Two mistakes of the director and Kurl will find what I need.Lots of hard and sharp peaks!
secondary_translated_text: 달아나!세포는 사막 땅 위의 도로에 놓여 있다.<page>감독과 Kurl 의 두 가지 실수는 내가 필요로하는 것을 찾을 것입니다. 많은 단단하고 날카로운 피크!

original_en_text: That blade! By claw! It is done. Sharper than this pinmaster would have believed achievable. Shining pale and clear.<page>Bonva! Stranger, you have granted my wish, and more. Your blade is accomplishment to match those of great pinmasters past.<page>Pharloom may ail, but throughout its morbid dim, your needle will shine bright.
original_zh_text: 瞧这针刃！利爪啊！完成了！这苍白皎洁的锋芒，简直超乎我这针匠想象。<page>太好了！您不止完成了我的祈愿，还助此针达成了不逊于古匠的成就！<page>纵使纺络病入膏肓，您的针芒也将照亮死寂！
translated_text: ¡- Knife! Use your nails. It 's more complicated than the craftsman thinks. White and clear.<page>Salva, Salva! I have conveyed my best wishes and will be glad to see you. Your sword is like the great harpists of ancient times.<page>The fall may hurt, but the needle will shine in pathological darkness.
secondary_translated_text: - 칼!손톱을 사용하십시오.장인이 생각하는 것보다 더 복잡하다.흰색과 맑은.<page>살바, 살바!나는 나의 가장 좋은 소원을 전했고 당신을 만나게 되어 기쁩니다.당신의 검은 고대 위대한 하프 연주자들과 같았습니다.<page>낙하는 상처를 줄 수 있지만, 병리학적 어둠 속에서 바늘이 빛날 것입니다.

original_en_text: What? You refuse to pass it on? What good do you think it’ll do you?!
original_zh_text: 干嘛？为什么不交？留着能下崽啊？！
translated_text: What's it? Rejecting the Inheritance? What do you think might be useful?
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요?상속을 거부하는가?어떤 것이 유용할 수 있다고 생각하십니까?

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay safe, Pavo. Keep these poor bugs close and their spirits from sorrow.<page>None shall leave these walls, dear resident, and all still are welcome. Any that can be saved.<page>Better we bugs be together, here at the end of it all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，帕沃。保护好这些可怜虫，别让他们陷入绝望。<page>没有虫会离开这里的，旅者小姐！这里永远欢迎任何幸存的虫。<page>末日将至，能聚在一起已值得庆幸。
translated_text: <hpage>Be careful, Paco.Try to the poor and save the soul from pain.<page>Dear citizens, no one will be able to get out of this wall. In any case, it can be saved.<page>When it 's over, it 's best to be together.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>조심해, 파코. 가난한 사람들을 위해 노력해, 영혼은 고통으로부터 구해줘.<page>친애하는 시민 여러분, 아무도 이 벽을 벗어날 수 없습니다.어쨌든, 그것은 저장될 수 있습니다.<page>끝나면 같이 있는 게 낫다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay alert on your journey home, pinmaster. If you encounter other bugs upon the road, I advise you avoid them as you are able.
original_zh_text: <hpage>回程多留神，针匠。路上遇虫尽量躲着点。
translated_text: <hpage>Be careful on the way back.If there are other mistakes along the way, it is best to avoid them as much as possible.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>돌아오는 길에 조심하세요. 도중에 다른 실수들이 있다면 가능한 한 피하는 것이 좋습니다.

original_en_text: Auugh! Bzzt! Again the world lashes out at me!<page>But the pain... it means nothing to Yarnaby!<page>Nothing can deter my great work! Not for long! I must not be stopped!
original_zh_text: 嗷！滋滋！这该死世道又针对我！<page>但痛苦……对雅纳碧而言没有意义！<page>什么都挡不住本神医的伟业！什么都不行！
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! - Х м м м! The world is attacking us again.<page>But the pain. Yanabi doesn't make sense.<page>Nothing will stop my great work. "Not so long! I can't stop this!
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!오, 네! - 엠엠엠엠!세상이 다시 우리를 공격하고 있다.<page>하지만 고통은야나비는 말이 안 된다.<page>아무것도 나의 위대한 일을 막을 수 없다. "그렇게 오래 걸리지 않아!난 이걸 막을 수 없어!

translated_text: Bell Paint (English)

original_en_text: <page=S>A new destination this-this! And desperate these supplies are asked.<page=T>Deliverings for them-them escaped from the crumbled camp beside the bone, those few still living.<page=T>Hurting and hungry, those few must be.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这、这是新目的地！这批物资要得急！<page=T>送给骸骨营地的幸存者，就剩那么几个了。<page=T>他们肯定又惊又饿。
translated_text: <page=S>This is a new direction! The materials are urgent.<page=T>They fled the ruined camp with the bones, and some were still alive.<page=T>They suffered from suffering and starvation.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>이것은 새로운 방향입니다!재료가 급하다.<page=T>그들은 뼈를 가지고 황폐한 캠프를 탈출했고, 일부는 아직 살아 있었다.<page=T>그들은 고통과 굶주림으로 고통받았다.

original_en_text: <page=T>It is yours, miss courier! Meats prepared fresh as fresh, in our special way.<page=T>Miss courier must know! Our rasher is delicious, strong, fatty food, but is not long to last. If not stored quick, it-it is flavour fast turns foul.<hpage>If the rasher is likely to spoil, then I shall make fast for the Citadel. I’ve no desire to see your efforts, or your scant supplies wasted.
original_zh_text: <page=T>给您备好啦！送货虫特制熏肉，仅此一家！<page=T>熏肉香浓肥美但不耐存！得赶紧送！<hpage>既然如此，我即刻动身。不枉你们辛苦。
translated_text: <page=T>Delivery is yours! The meat is prepared in a special way.<page=T>The messenger knows that Rachel 's cheese is very tasty, but it doesn't last long. If you don't store it right away, it will immediately have a bad taste.<hpage>If Rachel 's illness gets worse, I 'll go back to the castle, I don't want to waste her efforts or even some materials.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>배달은 당신의 것입니다!고기는 특별한 방식으로 준비되어 있습니다.<page=T>메신저는 레이첼의 치즈가 맛있다는 것을 알고 있었지만 오래 지속되지 않았습니다.즉시 보관하지 않으면 즉시 맛이 나지 않는다.<hpage>레이첼의 병이 심해지면 성으로 돌아갈 것이고, 그녀의 노력이나 재료를 낭비하고 싶지 않다.

original_en_text: Shellwood’s grown more dangerous in recent times, but I’m a lifelong catcher, right down to my core. Ain’t nothing that’ll change that.
original_zh_text: 甲木林近来愈发凶险，但我生来就是渔夫的命，避不开。
translated_text: In recent years Sherwoods have become more dangerous, but they are mostly lifelong recipients.
secondary_translated_text: 최근 몇 년 동안 Sherwoods 는 더 위험해졌지만 대부분 평생 수령자입니다.

original_en_text: I rarely sell objects as intriguing as this. Supposed to improve a bug’s natural ability to heal! Can’t say I’ve felt its effects myself, but then I keep more healthy than most.
original_zh_text: 这可是少见的好玩意！据说能提升自愈力。我身子一向健康，倒是没感受过。
translated_text: It is rare to sell something so attractive. It can improve the natural healing power of insects. I can not say that I feel the effects, but I am healthier than most people.
secondary_translated_text: 이렇게 매력적인 물건을 판매하는 것은 드물다.그것은 곤충의 자연적인 치유 능력을 향상시킬 수 있습니다.나는 그 효과를 느낄 수 있다고 말할 수는 없지만, 나는 대부분의 사람들보다 더 건강하다.

original_en_text: Yes... This fits my collection well. Look, then! Look at what I have!
original_zh_text: 真不错……这玩意配得上我的珍藏。瞧啊！这才叫宝贝！
translated_text: This is perfect for my collection, so take a look at it. What do I have! "
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 내 컬렉션에 완벽합니다. 한번 보세요. 내가 가지고있는 것이 무엇입니까? "

original_en_text: Ahh. ‘Tis your choice, warrior. If you’re choosing different in times ahead, Plinney shall be here to provide eager aid.
original_zh_text: 唉。随您，勇士。改主意了随时来找普林尼。
translated_text: If you choose a different option in the future, Pline is ready to help you with enthusiasm.
secondary_translated_text: 앞으로 다른 옵션을 선택하면 Pline 은 열정으로 당신을 도울 준비가되어 있습니다.

original_en_text: My sickly friend! Pavo can sense that you are ailing, but fret not! For in Bellhart, pilgrims may rest and recuperate until they are fit to travel once more!<hpage>Your hospitality is appreciated, Pavo, but I fear rest alone will not suffice for this illness. A parasite has taken root inside me, one I can not remove through strength alone.<hpage>Tell me, are there any you know who might help me? A healer, or a physician?<page>A physician? Well... we did once have one... A frightening fiend! Callous and crude in her practice. For the health of glorious Bellhart we voted, unanimously, to expel her!<page>I know not where she buzzed away to, and I prefer to keep it that way! But if you really must seek her out, you might start by speaking to the old hermit skulking beneath the Bellway.<page>Yes... that hermit seems mad, but he has a way of accumulating knowledge. He might be able to tell you where that wretched physician is lurking.
original_zh_text: 旅者小姐！帕沃察觉到您疾病缠身，但无需担心！您可以待在钟心镇疗养至康复！<hpage>心领了，但此症并非静养可以治愈，甲壳内寄生体难以驱除。<hpage>你可知道哪里能寻得医者？<page>医者？过去镇上曾有一虫……但手段可怕至极！因疗法过于粗暴遭全民驱逐！<page>如今行踪不明，但执意要寻找的话……可以问问在钟道下藏身的老隐士。<page>那老头虽然疯疯癫癫，但知道不少，或许能告知庸医的下落。
translated_text: A sick friend.Papua may feel sick, but don't worry.In Berhardt, pilgrims can rest and relax until they resume their journey.<hpage>Pabo, thank you for your hospitality, but loneliness will not cure your illness. Parasites have taken root in me, and I cannot eradicate them on my own.<hpage>Tell me, do you know someone who can help you? A therapist or a doctor?<page>Doctor? It's okay, it's okay. There's a terrible devil! His behavior was cold and rude. In the name of the health of the Honorable Berhardt, we unanimously expel him.<page>I don't know where it went, but I want it to stay that way. But if you really want to find her, you can talk to the hermit who is hiding under the bell.<page>That's right, sir. The recluse may seem crazy, but there are ways to accumulate knowledge. Can you tell me where the doctor is?
secondary_translated_text: 아픈 친구. 파푸아는 아플 수도 있지만 걱정하지 마십시오. 베르하르트에서는 순례자들이 여행을 재개할 때까지 휴식을 취하고 휴식을 취할 수 있습니다.<hpage>파보, 환대해 주셔서 감사합니다. 하지만 외로움은 당신의 병을 치료할 수 없습니다.기생충이 내 안에 뿌리를 내렸는데, 나는 혼자서 그들을 근절할 수 없다.<hpage>말해봐, 널 도와줄 사람을 알아?치료사 또는 의사?<page>닥터?괜찮아, 괜찮아.끔찍한 악마가 있어요!그의 행동은 차갑고 무례하다.베르하르트 경의 건강을 위해, 우리는 만장일치로 그를 추방한다.<page>어디로 갔는지 모르겠지만, 그냥 그대로 유지하길 바래요.그러나 당신이 정말로 그녀를 찾고 싶다면, 당신은 종 밑에 숨어있는 은둔자와 이야기 할 수 있습니다.<page>맞습니다, 선생님.은둔자는 미친 것처럼 보일지 모르지만 지식을 축적하는 방법이 있습니다.의사가 어디에 있는지 말해 줄 수 있니?

original_en_text: We are lucky to have you, miss traveller. In Bellhart you are always welcome, you and your big, sharp blade!
original_zh_text: 有您相助真是钟心镇之幸！这里随时欢迎您，以及您的针刃！
translated_text: We are blessed with you, Mr. Traveler. Berhart always greets you with his big sharp knife!
secondary_translated_text: 우리는 당신과 함께 축복받습니다, 여행자 씨.베르하트는 항상 그의 큰 날카로운 칼로 당신을 맞이합니다!

original_en_text: <hpage>What do you remember of your time caught upon the thread, Pavo?<page>Oh, ahh. It is difficult... Upsetting even to think. Strange, sad memories, not my own, and my own thoughts smothered amidst the tangle.<page>If one could choose to connect themself to something grander, that curse may seem a wonder. For myself, it now seems a horror.
original_zh_text: <hpage>帕沃，还记得被邪丝操控时的记忆么？<page>唉……回想起来有些痛苦……尽是陌生悲伤的回忆，自身的思绪仿佛被扼杀其中。<page>要是自愿投身于宏伟存在，这份诅咒或许是恩赐。但对于我……终究是梦魇。
translated_text: <hpage>"Do you remember when you had problems? "<page>Strange and sad memories that are not yours intertwine with your thoughts.<page>If a person had the opportunity to connect with something higher, the curse might seem like a miracle.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"그때 문제가 있었던 때를 기억하시나요? " "<page>당신의 것이 아닌 이상하고 슬픈 기억이 당신의 생각과 얽혀 있습니다.<page>사람이 더 높은 무언가와 연결할 기회가 있다면 저주는 기적처럼 보일 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Oh! Ohhhh! They shall join... Union upon your thread... A gift, for your waking. A world strung to serve...<hpage>Creature, your claws guide those cursed threads, but you are not their source. What role do you play in this vile affliction?
original_zh_text: 哦！哦哦哦！他们将归附……缠绕在您的丝线中……献予您的苏醒之礼，一个以侍奉之名编织的世界……<hpage>怪物，你虽然操纵邪丝却并非其源头。在这卑劣诅咒中你扮演什么角色？
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! They will unite together. Connect it in your line. It is a gift of awakening. Peace dedicated to service.<hpage>O living creature, your claws carry the cursed thread, but you are not the source of it, are you? What role did you play in this unfortunate ordeal?
secondary_translated_text: 오! 오!오! 오!오! 오!오! 오!그들은 함께 단결할 것이다.당신의 라인에 연결하십시오.그것은 깨어나는 선물이다.봉사에 전념하는 평화.<hpage>"살아있는 생물아, 네 발톱은 저주받은 실을 짊어지고 있지만, 너는 그것의 근원이 아니니? "이 불행한 시련에서 당신은 어떤 역할을 했습니까?

original_en_text: <page=T>But hold, miss courier! Before depart you mustly know, all deliverings are in needing of great-great care!<page=S>No bump! No shake! No taking funny transport! Only leg, claw, wing must be used to see them where they need be going.<page=S>Carry the deliverings safe-safe, miss courier! Cared for like your own shell.
original_zh_text: 等等！出发前得知道：所有货物必须轻拿轻放！<page>不准磕！不准晃！只能用腿脚翅膀运送！<page>要当成自己甲壳一样护着货！
translated_text: <page=T>"Wait a minute, giver. Before you leave, all generations pay close attention!<page=S>There are no clashes! Don't move! Stop joking! They use their feet, claws, and wings to decide where to go.<page=S>Safe delivery, safe delivery, lost delivery. Treat them like your sink.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>"잠깐만 기다려, 주자님.떠나기 전에, 모든 세대가 주의를 기울여라!<page=S>충돌은 없습니다!움직이지 마!농담을 그만!그들은 발, 발톱, 날개를 사용하여 어디로 갈지 결정합니다.<page=S>안전한 배송, 안전한 배송, 분실된 배송.그들을 당신의 싱크대처럼 취급하십시오.

original_en_text: <page=T>Those good-goods, all packed fresh for the clever fleas. Take thems up for us, miss courier. Maybe new friends you might be making with your service? Yes-yes?
original_zh_text: 给聪明跳蚤们的新鲜货。送去说不定能交新朋友？对、对吧？
translated_text: <page=T>These good products are a great package for smart chips. Take it, take it. You can make new friends through their services. Is that right?
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>이 좋은 제품은 스마트 칩을위한 훌륭한 패키지입니다.가져오세요, 가져오세요. 그들의 서비스를 통해 새로운 친구를 사귀실 수 있습니다.그렇죠?

original_en_text: Bzzt! Who’s bothering me now?! Leave the great Yarnaby in peace! Shoo shoo!
original_zh_text: 滋滋！谁在聒噪？！让伟大的雅纳碧静静！去去去！
translated_text: - Х м м м! How annoying it is now! May the great Anabi rest in peace! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh! Shh!
secondary_translated_text: - 엠엠엠엠!지금 얼마나 짜증나는가!위대한 아나비가 평화롭게 쉴 수 있기를! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh! - Shh!

original_en_text: <hpage>I am sick, madam, and badly in need of your service. I’ve become host to a vile infestation. It leeches my strength, and attempts to wrest control of my shell.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我身体抱恙，女士，需要您诊治。壳里寄生了恶心玩意，不仅吸我气力，还想夺舍躯体。
translated_text: <hpage>I am sick and need your help.I became the master of a heinous invasion.She sucked my strength and tried to control my shell.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 아프고 당신의 도움이 필요합니다. 나는 끔찍한 침략의 주인이되었습니다. 그녀는 내 힘을 빨아 내 껍질을 통제하려고했습니다.

original_en_text: Halfwits, the lot of them! Such grand achievement, wrought by Yarnaby! A bug healed full by my marvellous machine!<page>A few weaklings expire, and they all raise their claws. Is there no place for progress in their tiny minds?!
original_zh_text: 全是蠢材！这是雅纳碧创造的奇迹！被神机治愈的病患！<page>死几个弱虫就举爪抗议！他们的小脑仁就这么容不下进步？！
translated_text: Smart half, there are many of them. This is a great achievement, achieved by Yarnabi! This error has been completely corrected with my magic machine!<page>Many of the weak have died and raised their hands. Is there a way to improve your brain?
secondary_translated_text: 똑똑한 절반, 그들 중 많은.이것은 Yarnabi 가 달성 한 위대한 성과입니다!이 오류는 내 마법 기계로 완전히 수정되었습니다!<page>많은 약한 사람들이 죽고 손을 들었다.당신의 두뇌를 향상시킬 수있는 방법이 있습니까?

original_en_text: Bellhart’s lost much of its lustre, but we still offer some comfort to the pilgrims who climb this high.
original_zh_text: 钟心镇是风光不再了，但还能为登高的朝圣者提供些慰藉。
translated_text: Despite the fact that Berhardt has lost much of its grandeur, we still offer comfort to pilgrims who climb to such heights.
secondary_translated_text: 베르하르트가 그 웅장함의 상당 부분을 잃었음에도 불구하고, 우리는 여전히 그러한 높이로 올라가는 순례자들에게 편안함을 제공합니다.

original_en_text: <page>Dear resident! To see you return alive is such a glimmer of light, even as the dark descends upon us all.<hpage>All these pilgrims gathered here... I had not expected so many to survive. The destruction beyond these bells suggested worse.<page>Indeed! Things should be worse! Would be worse, but for your tall warrior friend, her of those shining rings, who so fortunately chose our town to camp.<page>That brave bug now acts alone to guard our town and those pilgrims who flee for it.<page>For her efforts, our shells have stayed safe, though how long she can remain at that task... I do not dare to consider.
original_zh_text: <page>旅者小姐！看到您平安归来，就像一道萤火驱散了钟心镇的黑暗。<hpage>想不到有如此多朝圣者幸存，镇外的景象可是惨烈得很。<page>情况确实本应更糟！但幸运的是有您这样的勇士驻守。<page>正是有您的保护，朝圣者们才能逃难至此。<page>有您在，镇子才能暂时安全，但不知这景象能维持多久……
translated_text: <page>Dear Residents! Seeing you come home alive is a ray of light, even when darkness falls upon us all.<hpage>I did not expect that so many people, all the pilgrims gathered here, would survive. The damage to the outside of these clocks testifies that it is even worse.<page>It's really so. The situation is deteriorating! If she didn't have a great warrior friend with a shining ring, she would be lucky to have chosen our camp in a small town.<page>This brave insect will now act on its own to protect our city and the pilgrims who flee here.<page>Thanks to his efforts, our shell is still safe, but how long it can last, I don't have the courage to think.
secondary_translated_text: <page>친애하는 주민들!당신이 살아 집에 돌아오는 것을 보는 것은 빛의 광선입니다, 어둠이 우리 모두를 덮을 때에도.<hpage>나는 이렇게 많은 사람들이 여기에 모인 모든 순례자들이 살아남을 줄은 몰랐다.이 시계의 외부의 손상은 그것이 더 나쁜 것을 증명한다.<page>정말 그렇군요.상황은 악화되고 있다!그녀가 반지를 가진 위대한 전사 친구가 없었다면 작은 마을에 있는 우리 캠프를 선택한 것이 행운이었을 것이다.<page>이 용감한 곤충은 이제 우리 도시와 이곳을 탈출하는 순례자들을 보호하기 위해 스스로 행동할 것입니다.<page>그의 노력 덕분에 우리의 껍질은 여전히 안전하지만, 얼마나 오래 지속될 수 있을지 나는 생각할 용기가 없다.

original_en_text: My brother, Pill, still out there. Help-help others he must be, taking good-goods all across. I’m is only hope he stay safe-safe, but gone long is Pill. Too long!<page>On the wishwall, I’m placed my wish-wish, that my brother returns to me, and these bells of safety’s safe.<hpage>I shall check the wall, Tipp. If your wish aligns with my journey, I may track him down.
original_zh_text: 我兄弟皮尔还在外面送、送货，他肯定还在帮、帮别的虫，但去太久了！<page>我在祈愿墙上许、许了愿：希望他平安归来，还有钟心镇也永远平安。<hpage>我会查看祈愿墙，蒂普。若是顺路，或许能找到他的踪迹。
translated_text: My brother, Peter, runs away. I wanted to make sure I was safe, but my medication went out. I haven't seen you in a long time!<page>On the wall of wishes I wrote a wish. I hope that my brother will come home and that this bell will be safe.<hpage>I 'm checking the wall, Tip. If your wishes match my journey, then I can find them.
secondary_translated_text: 내 동생 피터, 도망 간다.나는 내가 안전하다는 것을 확인하고 싶었지만, 내 약이 떨어졌다.오랫동안 못 봤어요!<page>소원 벽에 소원을 적었다.오빠가 집에 돌아오길 바래 이 종은 안전하게 되길 바래.<hpage>나는 벽을 확인하고 있어, 티프.당신의 소원이 나의 여행과 일치한다면, 나는 그들을 찾을 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. Given the hardships of the lands beyond these bells, your store seems in remarkable order. <page>Aye, well, we’ve had our tough times too! Of once bustling Bellhart, only a few residents now remain.<page>But things are turned around for old Frey! Ho, yes! The town at least feels briefly at peace, and my courier has returned with fresh goods to trade. <page>Whether pilgrim or traveller, mine is the finest store you’ll have the fortune to visit throughout our blighted lands.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。钟心镇外世道艰难，你这铺子倒打理得井井有条。<page>唉，我也吃过苦头的！往日热闹的钟心镇，如今只剩几口虫啦。<page>但老芙蕾时来运转！哈哈！镇子外总算消停会儿，送货虫也带新鲜货回来了。<page>不管是朝圣者还是旅者，走遍这破地儿也找不着比我家更棒的铺子！
translated_text: <hpage>Given the difficulty of the land behind these bells, it seems that his shop is in order.<page>We also had a hard time! Once a bustling city, Burhart today has only a small number of residents.<page>But the situation in Old Frey has been reversed! Oh! Ah, yes! The city calmed down, at least temporarily, and the mail flights returned with fresh produce.<page>Whether you are a pilgrim or a traveler, my shop is the best you can visit in our desert land.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>이 종들 뒤에 있는 땅이 어려워서 그의 가게는 질서 있는 것 같다.<page>우리는 또한 힘든 시간을 보냈습니다!한때는 번화한 도시였던 버하트는 오늘날 주민 수가 적습니다.<page>하지만 올드 프레이의 상황은 역전되었다!오! 오!아, 네!도시는 적어도 일시적으로 진정되었고, 우편 항공편들은 신선한 농산물을 가지고 돌아왔다.<page>당신이 순례자이든 여행자이든, 우리 가게는 당신이 우리의 사막 땅에서 방문 할 수있는 최고의 가게입니다.

translated_text: In a private spa
