original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, shopkeeper. Your shelves are looking better stocked. I see the courier made their way back to you safely.<page>Oh yes, the cheeky little so-and-so came by and dropped his cargo off at last.<page>Poor dear was so shaken by his misadventures, I almost didn’t have the heart to dock his earnings.<page>All’s well now, though! Take a look at the lovely new goods I have available!
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。货架充实不少，看来送货虫平安归来了。<page>可不，那小滑头终于把货带到了。<page>可怜虫吓得够呛，我都不忍扣他工钱。<page>现在齐活啦！瞧瞧这些新宝贝！
translated_text: <hpage>I greet you again, the master. The halves look great. The messenger has returned safely.<page>"Yes, a bad guy came in and threw things away.<page>The poor boy was astonished at his misfortune, and I did not have the courage to deduct his income.<page>But now I'm okay! Discover new products for yourself.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>다시 한번 인사드립니다, 주인님.반쪽이 멋져 보인다.사자는 무사히 돌아왔다.<page>"그래, 나쁜 놈이 들어와서 물건을 던져버렸어.<page>그 불쌍한 소년은 그의 불행에 놀랐고, 나는 그의 수입을 공제할 용기가 없었다.<page>하지만 이제 난 괜찮아!새로운 제품을 직접 찾아보세요.

original_en_text: Ohhhh! She is here! The rare birthling! Precious child of Wyrm and Weaver!<page>Spawn of those who dared to flee. She has found her way home... at last.<page>How fine her shell, and Silk, and claw... For you, mother... let me claim her all for you!
original_zh_text: 哦哦哦！她来了！稀世子嗣！沃姆与织者的结晶！<page>逃亡者的后代，终于归乡……<page>多么完美的甲壳、灵丝与利爪……母亲啊……让我将她献予您！
translated_text: Oh! Oh! He is here! It was an unusual birth. The children of Wim and Weaver.<page>The descendants of those who fled. He found his way home.<page>Your shell and nails are a little thinner than yours, Mom. Let me pull it all out!
secondary_translated_text: 오! 오!오! 오!그는 여기 있다!그것은 특이한 출생이었다. Wim 과 Weaver 의 아이들<page>도망친 사람들의 후손들.그는 집으로 가는 길을 찾았다.<page>네 껍질과 손톱이 너보다 조금 얇아졌어, 엄마.내가 이걸 다 꺼내게 해!

original_en_text: A fine purchase you’ve made! Allow us a moment and we’ll get it set up in your bellhome.
original_zh_text: 好买卖！稍等就给你装点进钟居。
translated_text: What a precious thing I bought! Please wait a minute. I'll put it in my suitcase.
secondary_translated_text: 내가 구입한 것은 얼마나 소중한 일인가!잠시 기다려주세요.가방에 넣을게요.

original_en_text: Ah! That relic you possess! A cylinder of the Citadel’s sacred vault! That there is a mighty find. You will give it, yes?<hpage>I will not, seeker. To extract what knowledge it holds, this cylinder requires a listening device, one you do not possess.<hpage>If it were passed, whatever secrets it contains would remain forever hidden from us both.<page>Pah... If it will not speak to me, I do not want it! Don’t trouble me until you have something worth my taking!
original_zh_text: 啊！你手里那东西！圣堡秘库的音筒！这可是大发现。交给我吧？<hpage>不行，要听取其中知识，需要特殊机械，而你没有。<hpage>现在交出来，是埋没了它。<page>嘁……哑巴筒子我也不稀罕！弄到真宝贝再来！
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! The inheritance he has.The sacred dome of the cylindrical castle! We have made a great discovery. You give it to me, really?<hpage>Yes, researcher You need a listening device to extract the knowledge contained in the cylinder, but you don't have one.<hpage>If he dies, the mystery he keeps will be hidden from us forever.<page>My father is ... If he doesn't talk to me, I don't want him. Don't worry until you have something worthwhile!
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!오, 네!그가 가진 유산. 원통형 성의 신성한 돔!우리는 큰 발견을 했다.나한테 준 거야, 정말?<hpage>네, 연구원, 실린더에 들어있는 지식을 추출하기 위해서는 청취 장치가 필요하지만, 당신은 그것을 가지고 있지 않습니다.<hpage>만약 그가 죽으면, 그가 간직한 신비는 우리에게 영원히 숨겨져 있을 것이다.<page>내 아버지는 ...만약 그가 나에게 말을 안하면, 나는 그를 원하지 않는다.가치있는 것을 가질 때까지 걱정하지 마십시오!

original_en_text: <page=T>The deliverings, all broken-broke? Would you try-try again, miss courier? Pharloom’s bugs are so much in need of your help!
original_zh_text: <page=T>货全毁、毁了？要再试一次吗？大伙可全指、指望您啦！
translated_text: <page=T>The delivery failed? "Miss Mister, please try again, the Insects in Farlomerate need your help!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>배송이 실패했나요? "미스, 다시 시도해 주세요, 파로메레이트의 곤충들은 당신의 도움이 필요합니다! "

original_en_text: Bonva, traveller! You have the oil! Will you allow me to work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: 旅者！你真的带秘油来了！可以让我用在你的针刃上？
translated_text: Hello, fellow traveler. There's oil! Will he be able to use his sword to perform miracles?
secondary_translated_text: 안녕하세요, 여행자 여러분.기름이 있어요!그는 기적을 행하기 위해 검을 사용할 수 있습니까?

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, weary pilgrim! Though glorious Bellhart may be past its finest shine, it still remains the last friendly stop before the Citadel. <page>It is the task of I, fair Pavo, to extend the warmest of welcome to those passing devout, such as your good self!<page>Now! I insist you enjoy our remaining hospitality, if only for a moment. We’ve wares to buy and services to enjoy!<page>Even in our reduced state, you’ll find ours as cosy a stop as can be offered in these ailing lands.
original_zh_text: 欢迎欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！钟心镇虽不复往昔，但仍是攀登圣堡前最后一处友善驿站。<page>我，帕沃，专为虔行旅者献上最热忱的欢迎——比如尊驾您！<page>希望您能好好感受圣途前最后的余温！这里有货可购，有乐可享！<page>即便衰微，钟心镇仍是这病土中最温馨的歇脚处！
translated_text: Welcome to the weary pilgrim! The glorious Berhardt may have lived in its heyday, but it is still the last stop before the castle.<page>"My duty, beautiful Pavo, is to honor the kindness of those who have died like you! "<page>Now! I want you to appreciate the rest of us. There are things that can be bought and things that can be enjoyed.<page>Even in our reduced state, we can provide a comfortable resting place in these diseased areas.
secondary_translated_text: 피곤한 순례자님께 환영합니다!영광스러운 베르하르트는 전성기에 살았을 수도 있지만, 여전히 성 앞에 마지막 정거장입니다.<page>"아름다운 파보여, 내 의무는 당신처럼 죽은 사람들의 친절을 존중하는 것입니다! "<page>지금!나는 당신이 우리 모두를 감사하게 해주길 바랍니다.구입할 수 있는 것과 즐길 수 있는 것들도 있다.<page>우리의 감소 된 상태에서도, 우리는이 병든 지역에서 편안한 휴식 장소를 제공 할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: My sickly friend! I can sense that you are ailing. Has the black curse struck even your sturdy shell?<hpage>This illness stems from a different source, Pavo. A parasite has taken root inside me, one I can not remove through strength alone.<hpage>Tell me, are there any you know who might help me? A healer, or a physician?<page>A physician? Well... we did once have one... A frightening fiend! Callous and crude in her practice. For the health of glorious Bellhart we voted, unanimously, to expel her!<page>I know not where she buzzed away to, but the world beyond the bells is full of danger. If you must seek her service, I expect she would not have travelled far...
original_zh_text: 哎朋友，你脸色不太好啊！帕沃一眼就瞧出来了。难道连你那坚硬的外壳，也被黑色的诅咒侵蚀了吗？<hpage>不，帕沃，这病根源另有其处，我体内寄生着异物，靠蛮力根本无法将它驱除。<hpage>你知道有谁能帮我摆脱异物吗？养疗师，医师都行？<page>有认识的医师吗？嗯……的确有过一个……不过是个恶魔！她行事冷酷，手段粗野。为了钟心镇的安宁，我们众口一辞，驱逐了她！<page>她嗡地飞走了，不知道去了哪儿。但钟声之外的世界，危机四伏。若你执意寻她的医术，我想她应该走得不远……
translated_text: Sick friend. I feel as if I am sick. Did the black curse hit your helmet?<hpage>Parasites have taken root in me, and I can not eradicate them on my own.<hpage>Tell me, do you know someone who can help you? A therapist or a doctor?<page>Doctor? All is well, all is well. Once upon a time there was a terrible demon. His behavior was cold and rude. In the name of the health of the Honorable Berhardt, we unanimously expel him.<page>I don't know where I 've been, but the world behind the bell is full of dangers. I don't think you 'll go too far if you have to ask for my services.
secondary_translated_text: 병든 친구.나는 마치 내가 아플 것 같은 느낌이다.검은 저주가 당신의 헬멧에 맞았습니까?<hpage>기생충이 내 안에 뿌리를 내렸는데, 나는 혼자서 그들을 근절할 수 없다.<hpage>말해봐, 널 도와줄 사람을 알아?치료사 또는 의사?<page>닥터?모든 것이 괜찮아, 모든 것이 괜찮아.옛날에 끔찍한 악마가 있었다.그의 행동은 차갑고 무례하다.베르하르트 경의 건강을 위해, 우리는 만장일치로 그를 추방한다.<page>내가 어디를 갔는지 모르겠지만, 종 뒤의 세상은 위험으로 가득 차 있다.내 서비스를 요청해야 한다면 네가 너무 멀리 갈 것 같지 않아.

original_en_text: Welly, nay? Certainly you make the safer choice. Better to keep one’s shell intact.
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！保命要紧，理解理解。
translated_text: - Is this Willie? What? Therefore, you can make a safer choice.It is better to leave the skin as is.
secondary_translated_text: - 이 사람이 윌리야?뭐야?따라서 더 안전한 선택을 할 수 있습니다. 피부를 그대로 두는 것이 좋습니다.

original_en_text: <page=T>Supplies for the rest-stop in the fields. We is used to like this delivering, when we was young and muchly brave.
original_zh_text: <page=T>远野驿站的补给，我们年轻时也经常送这里的货。
translated_text: <page=T>When we were young and brave, we were used to this method of delivery.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>우리가 젊고 용감했을 때, 우리는이 배달 방법에 익숙했습니다.

original_en_text: This town feel safe, just, but I’m is worries for others. Is Pharloom needing its good-goods?<page>Many bugs helped by us couriers, me and brother Pill. Special now when danger grows big-big.
original_zh_text: 镇子暂时安全，但我担心别处，其他虫不需要货、货物吗？<page>我们送货虫兄弟俩，我和皮尔，可帮过不少虫。尤其现在世道这么凶、凶险。
translated_text: This city is safe but I was worried about other cities. Need a good product?<page>My brother and I helped with many insects. This is something special now, as the danger is increasing.
secondary_translated_text: 이 도시는 안전하지만 나는 다른 도시에 대해 걱정했다.좋은 제품이 필요한가요?<page>내 동생과 나는 많은 곤충을 도왔다.위험성이 커지고 있기 때문에 이것은 지금 특별한 일이다.

original_en_text: I saw it! Took my wish off the board, you did! Heading out after my stray courier, then?<hpage>My own tasks see me travel far, shopkeeper. If, on my journey, I happen upon the errant bug, I’ll make sure to send them your way.<page>Then you’ll have my thanks and more! It’s a rare bug who’d brave the wilds to aid a fellow.
original_zh_text: 我看见了！你接了我的祈愿？要去找我那跑丢的送货虫？<hpage>我本就需要远行，店主。要是在路上遇见那迷途虫，我会让他来寻你。<page>那可多谢了！如今肯为同类闯进荒野的虫可太难找了！
translated_text: I saw it! You took my wish off the board and did it! Are you looking for a travel agent?<hpage>My mission has taken me far.If I find this error missing during the trip, I will definitely send it to you.<page>The courage to go out into the desert to help another person is a rare mistake.
secondary_translated_text: 내가 봤어!당신은 내 소원을 칠판에서 제거하고 그것을했다!여행사를 찾고 계신가요?<hpage>나의 임무는 나를 멀리 데려 갔다. 만약 내가 여행 중에 이 오류가 없어진 것을 발견하면, 나는 확실히 당신에게 보낼 것이다.<page>다른 사람을 돕기 위해 사막으로 나가는 용기는 드문 실수입니다.

original_en_text: For a spool bearing no Silk, it’s surprisingly heavy. Do you think perhaps it could be a gift left behind by the old creeping ones?
original_zh_text: 虽是空的灵丝轴，但却挺沉。莫非是古织者留下的？
translated_text: For a silk roll, its weight is impressive. Do you think it could be a gift from an old reptile?
secondary_translated_text: 실크롤의 무게는 인상적입니다.당신은 그것이 오래된 파충류로부터의 선물일 수 있다고 생각합니까?

original_en_text: If you really must find that wretched physician, speak to the old hermit lurking beneath Bellhart. He knows much more than he admits of the world...
original_zh_text: 如果您执意要寻找那庸医，可以问问镇子下方的老隐士。他肚子里藏的秘密可不少……
translated_text: If you really want to find the poor doctor, look for the hermit of the old man hiding under Berhart.
secondary_translated_text: 당신이 정말로 그 불쌍한 의사를 찾고 싶다면, 베르하트 밑에 숨어있는 노인의 은둔자를 찾아라.

original_en_text: Welly, done! What miracle to work again upon steel so fine. Few pins left in Pharloom could attain such a sheen!<page>You must tell me, traveller, wherever did you come upon so splendid a weapon?<hpage>The blade was a gift, given by a noble tribe of my homeland. They forged the strongest steel, though it was rarely seen beyond their hive.<hpage>That tribe has now long passed, and with them the secrets to their craft.<page>Ahhh. If they are gone, it’s a rarer piece than would be guessed! But what grand luck for this humble pinmaster to have worked with such a weapon!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！成啦！圣油配上如此精钢，真是奇迹。纺络还剩几根针能有此锋芒！<page>旅者，我得问问你，哪里得来如此神兵？<hpage>故土一贵族部落所赠，其族以锻钢之术闻名，但成品鲜少外流。<hpage>该族早已灭绝，其锻造秘技随之消逝。<page>唉呀！竟然还是件孤品！我这卑微针匠能照料此针，也是三生有幸！
translated_text: Willie, I did. It's a miracle that high quality steel can be reused. Some pine trees that remain in the fall can achieve this glow!<page>Traveler, tell me, where did you find such a good weapon?<hpage>This knife was a gift from the nobility of my country. They forged the strongest steel, but it was rarely seen outside the kindergarten.<hpage>The tribes have long disappeared, and the secrets of their craft have disappeared.<page>And if it were gone, it would be rarer than that! Nevertheless, this humble blacksmith was fortunate enough to use such a weapon.
secondary_translated_text: 윌리, 내가 그랬어고품질의 강철이 재사용될 수 있다는 것은 기적이다.가을에 남아있는 소나무는 이런 빛을 얻을 수 있습니다!<page>여행자여, 말해봐, 너는 어디서 이렇게 좋은 무기를 찾았니?<hpage>이 칼은 우리 나라의 귀족들이 선물한 것이다.그들은 가장 강한 강철을 단조했지만, 유치원 밖에서는 거의 보이지 않았습니다.<hpage>부족들은 오래 전에 사라졌고, 그들의 공예의 비밀도 사라졌다.<page>그리고 만약 그것이 사라졌다면, 그것은 그것보다 더 희귀했을 것입니다!그럼에도 불구하고, 이 겸손한 대장장은 그러한 무기를 사용할만큼 운이 좋았습니다.

translated_text: Register

original_en_text: <page=T>Good-goods for the pilgrims up high! Thems brave ones, settled up on that big-big Citadel.<page=S>These deliverings they will muchly need, miss courier. Carry them safe-safe, for us!
original_zh_text: <page=T>给高处朝圣者的货！敢待在圣、圣堡，都是勇士。<page=S>都是要紧物资，救星小姐务必平、平安送到！
translated_text: <page=T>Another good thing for pilgrims! They were brave people and settled in a large castle.<page=S>I need a shop. Be sure of your safety!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Pilgrims 에 대한 또 다른 좋은 것들!그들은 용감한 사람들이었고 큰 성에 정착했습니다.<page=S>나는 가게가 필요해.당신의 안전을 확인하십시오!

original_en_text: Bzz-zzt! You hesitate! But your fear of my Extricator is born from mere ignorance, and you can overcome it with effort. Take a moment. Reconsider!
original_zh_text: 滋——滋！犹豫什么！怕剥离机是你无知！给你点时间，再想想！
translated_text: - Х м м м! But your fear of my Deliverer comes from sheer ignorance and can be overcome by effort.
secondary_translated_text: - 엠엠엠엠!그러나 나의 구출자에 대한 너희의 두려움은 순수한 무지에서 비롯되며 노력으로 극복될 수 있다.

original_en_text: The great Yarnaby can rid you of those nasty “roots”, but to crack your stiff shell my mighty Extricator needs an upgrade!
original_zh_text: 本神医能治你体内的“根须”。但要撬开壳，得先升级剥离机！
translated_text: The great Yannabi can get rid of its boring "roots ", but in order to break its hard shell, it has to be a little bigger than a little bigger.
secondary_translated_text: 위대한 Yannabi 는 지루한 "뿌리" 를 제거 할 수 있지만 단단한 껍질을 깨기 위해서는 조금 더 큰 것보다는 조금 더 커야합니다.

original_en_text: Hello again! Fancy buying something special before your tasks whisk you away?
original_zh_text: 又来啦！出远门前不挑点特别的？
translated_text: We have met again! Do you want to buy something special before you leave the mission?
secondary_translated_text: 우리는 다시 만났다!미션을 떠나기 전에 특별한 것을 사고 싶으십니까?

original_en_text: <hpage>Couriers, I require a rasher of meat, for an old bug in the Citadel. Can you prepare it for me?<page=T>A bug up-up? Theys knows our finest food? If theys appreciate, we can prepare it most prompt! Miss courier has only to ask.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我需要熏肉送给圣堡老虫，能帮忙准备吗？<page=T>上头有虫识货？随时都能准备！救星小姐知会一声就行。
translated_text: <hpage>Envoys, we need a mountain of meat to deal with the old castle bugs. Can you prepare this for me?<page=T>Was there a mistake in the update? Do you know which food is best? If you like it, prepare it as soon as you can.The officer simply asked.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>사령관님, 오래된 성벌레를 다루기 위해 고기 산이 필요합니다.이걸 준비해 주시겠어요?<page=T>업데이트에 오류가 있었습니까?어떤 음식이 가장 좋은지 아세요?좋아하시면 빨리 준비하세요. 장교는 간단하게 물었습니다.

original_en_text: A sturdy desk is the heart of any bellhome! Use it to take stock of your situation or organise your artefacts.
original_zh_text: 一张结实桌子可是钟居的核心！理货记账必备。
translated_text: Powerful office - the heart of Bell House! Use it to assess your situation or to organize items.
secondary_translated_text: 강력한 사무실 - 벨 하우스 중심!상황을 평가하거나 항목을 구성하는 데 사용합니다.

original_en_text: These roots that torment you so... I’m not altogether familiar with them, but it matters not!<page>If there’s something inside a body that must come out, we use great Yarnaby’s Extricator! It’s your only hope, bzzt!
original_zh_text: 折磨你的“根须”……虽然不常见，但无所谓！<page>只要是壳里有脏东西，就用本神医的剥离机！这是你的唯一希望，滋滋！
translated_text: The roots were injured. I don't know the details, but everything is fine.<page>If you want to get rid of something in your body, use a great extractor from Yarnabi! That's my only hope, Shh!
secondary_translated_text: 뿌리가 다쳤다.자세한 내용은 모르겠지만 모든 것이 괜찮습니다.<page>몸에서 무언가를 제거하고 싶다면 Yarnabi 의 훌륭한 추출기를 사용하십시오!그게 내 유일한 희망이야, Shh!

original_en_text: You’d ask my aid, but won’t assist yourself? Then leave! Remain suffering, and stop being a bother to me, bzzt!
original_zh_text: 想求医却不帮忙？滚！继续遭罪去吧，别来烦我，滋滋！
translated_text: You want me to help you without helping you? And get out! Continue to suffer and don't bother me.
secondary_translated_text: 내가 너를 돕지 않고 너를 돕기를 원하니?그리고 나가라!계속 고통 받고 나를 귀찮게 하지 마라.

original_en_text: Fellow resident! The world quakes and crumbles, but while my shell stays safe, my shop stays open.
original_zh_text: 好邻居！世道混乱，但只要我这壳不碎，铺子照开！
translated_text: Fellow citizens! The world trembles and will collapse, but my shell is still safe, but my shop is still open.
secondary_translated_text: 친애하는 시민 여러분!세상은 떨고 무너질 것이지만, 내 껍질은 여전히 안전하지만, 내 가게는 여전히 열려 있습니다.

original_en_text: Welly, nay? You hold the precious oil for yourself? For what purpose do you deny a pinmaster their work? There is only I alive to work with such a wondrous substance!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！你怎么私藏圣油？不让针匠干活？整个纺络只剩我能用此圣物！
translated_text: - Is this Willie? What? Do you have any precious oil for you? Why did you quit the music teacher job? And it is only because we are alive that we can work with such wonderful materials.
secondary_translated_text: - 이 사람이 윌리야?뭐야?당신에게 소중한 기름이 있습니까?왜 음악교사직을 그만두셨어요?그리고 우리가 살아 있기 때문에 우리는 그러한 멋진 재료로 일할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Find that wretched physician fast, dear resident! I know not where she buzzed away to, but the world beyond the bells is full of danger.<page>If you must seek her service, I expect she would not have travelled far...
original_zh_text: 老乡啊，要找她得赶快了！她嗡地飞走了，不知道去了哪儿。但钟声之外的世界，危机四伏。<page>若你执意寻她的医术，我想她应该走得不远……
translated_text: Dear friends, go to a doctor. "I don't know where I 've been, but the world behind the bell is full of dangers.<page>I don't think you 'll go too far if you have to ask for their services.
secondary_translated_text: 사랑하는 여러분, 의사에게 가십시오. "나는 내가 어디에 있었는지 모르겠지만, 종 뒤에 있는 세상은 위험으로 가득 차 있다.<page>나는 당신이 그들의 서비스를 요청해야한다면 너무 멀리 갈 것이라고 생각하지 않는다.

original_en_text: What? What now? What’s all that great racket, what is it?<hpage>Greetings, ma’am. It is only I. If you are disturbed by the rending of these lands, I fear some blame is mine to bear.<page>Blame, is it? Pah. Those who come after us can apportion blame as they see fit.<page>For now, my collection is the only thing that matters! I must protect it!
original_zh_text: 干嘛呢？这么闹腾？叮叮咣咣的搞什么？<hpage>女士，是我。抱歉打扰到了您。<page>跟我有什么好说抱歉的，你在外头做的事自有后虫评判。<page>眼下我的珍藏最要紧！得保护好了！
translated_text: What's it? What do we have to do now? What is Loud Noise? What is it?<hpage>Good morning, ma 'am. I am alone. If you do not agree with the division of this land, then I will be responsible for it too. "<page>That's weird, isn't it? What? Ooh! Those who are watching us can share responsibility when it seems appropriate.<page>Today, our collections are important! We have to protect ourselves!
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요?지금 우리는 무엇을 해야 합니까? Loud Noise 란 무엇입니까?뭐야?<hpage>안녕하세요, 부인.나 혼자야.만일 너희가 이 땅의 분할에 동의하지 않는다면, 나도 그 책임을 지게 될 것이다. "<page>이상하군요, 그렇죠?뭐야?오, 오!우리를 지켜보고 있는 사람들은 적절할 때 책임을 나눌 수 있습니다.<page>오늘, 우리의 컬렉션이 중요합니다!우리는 우리 자신을 보호해야합니다!

original_en_text: <page=S>A delivery deadly, dangerous, fiercably cold, for old bug up there that does need it much-much! Serves us all he does, so we serve back.<page=T>And great test for you, miss courier! Most challenging-challenge this. The lacquer to bring is sloshy-slosh. A hard carry even for the best.<hpage>I have met this maker. His is a long service, worthy of respect. I will be glad to aid his efforts.
original_zh_text: <page=S>急单！但危险！把液状漆送给山上的老工匠。他造福大伙，我们得回报。<page=T>救星小姐，这可是巨、巨大挑战！液状漆晃荡难带，专业送货虫都犯、犯难。<hpage>我敬重这位匠师，乐意相助。
translated_text: <page=S>For a really necessary old insect, it is deadly and dangerous, delivered with cold! We will fight because everything he did was for us.<page=T>This is a great test for you, Supplier! This is the most difficult task.The paint you need is bad.Even the best of them is a complicated process.<hpage>I have already seen this manufacturer.His dedication is many years old and worthy of respect.I am happy to help you in your efforts.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>정말 필요한 오래된 곤충을 위해, 그것은 치명적이고 위험하며 추위와 함께 배달됩니다!우리가 싸워야 할 것은 그가 한 모든 것이 우리를 위해 있었기 때문이다.<page=T>이것은 당신에게 좋은 테스트입니다, 공급자!이것은 가장 어려운 작업입니다. 당신이 필요로하는 페인트는 나쁜 것입니다. 심지어 그들 중 가장 좋은 것은 복잡한 과정입니다.<hpage>나는 이미이 manufacturer. His 헌신은 오래되고 존경받을 가치가 있습니다. I 는 당신의 노력에 당신을 도울 수 기쁘게 생각합니다.

original_en_text: <page=S>Deliverings for the waystation in the fields at Pharloom’s edge, a small rest-stop, still serving.<page=S>This journey is maybe not so very hard for you, miss courier? We think you is perfect for this wish!
original_zh_text: <page=S>给远野驿站的货，那小站还在营业。<page=S>对您不算难吧？您是最合适的人选！
translated_text: <page=S>Book a transit station in the countryside on the outskirts of Farham. This is a small rest area that is always used.<page=S>Mr. Corrie. Was this trip difficult? I think you are right in this desire!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Farham 외곽 시골에 있는 교통 정류장을 예약하세요.이것은 항상 사용되는 작은 휴식 공간입니다.<page=S>코리 씨요이 여행은 힘들었나요?나는 당신이 그 욕망에 맞다고 생각합니다!

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, travellers all! Rest your weary shell and revive your flagging spirit!<page>Bellhart! Glorious, gleaming, and very very safe! Stay a while before you begin your final climb!
original_zh_text: 欢迎诸位旅者！请尽情舒展甲壳，养好精神！<page>这里是钟心镇！辉煌、璀璨，更重要的是十分安全！启程前不妨多留一会！
translated_text: Welcome to all the passengers! Allow your tired body to rest and refresh your lethargic mind!<page>¡Belheard.Light, bright and very safe! Stop by before the last trip!
secondary_translated_text: 모든 승객들을 환영합니다!피곤한 몸이 휴식을 취하고 피곤한 마음을 상쾌하게하십시오!<page>Belheard. Light, 밝고 매우 안전합니다!마지막 여행 전에 멈춰라!

original_en_text: Go and rest! Bzzt! Free yourself of your trifling ailment and leave me in peace! The great Yarnaby has no time for petty maladies!<hpage>Very well, madam. I did not mean to waste your time.
original_zh_text: 歇着去！滋滋！小病自己治，别烦我！本神医不接轻症！<hpage>好吧，女士。无意浪费您的时间。
translated_text: Make a break! - Х м м м! We are free from minor diseases and rest in peace! Oyagi doesn't have time to deal with a trivial disease!<hpage>No, I don't want to waste your time.
secondary_translated_text: 휴식을 취하라! - 엠엠엠엠!우리는 사소한 질병에서 자유롭고 평화롭게 쉴 수 있습니다!오야기는 사소한 병을 다룰 시간이 없다!<hpage>아니, 난 너의 시간을 낭비하고 싶지 않아.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. It seems you’ve recovered well from that silken affliction.<page>Ah! Well, I’m a clever bug. When that strange thread struck down from above, I shut up tight and huddled in my bellhome.<page>Might’ve been a problem for the others about here, but my store was flush with supplies, so no fear I’d go hungry.<hpage>Your preparedness served you well then, and it seems your store is still well-stocked.<page>Oh yes, even my supplier is back to work, so I have plenty of goods to show you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。看来你已从丝咒中恢复。<page>啊哈！我机灵着呢。那怪丝掉下来的时候，我立马缩进钟居紧闭门户。<page>其他虫或许遭了殃，但我存货充足，饿不着。<hpage>未雨绸缪是好事。而且……你这铺子货还挺全。<page>可不！连送货虫都平安回来了，新到的好货随你挑！
translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, trader. You seem to have recovered from the pain of the silk.<page>¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! When a strange wire fell from above, I closed my mouth and clinged to the guards' room.<page>This may be a problem for others, but my store has plenty of supplies, so I don't have to worry about starving to death.<hpage>Your preparation is very helpful and it seems that your store still has enough stock.<page>Oh yes, my supplier is back too, so I 'll show you lots of products!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>좋은 아침, 상인님.너는 실크의 고통에서 회복한 것 같다.<page>오, 그래!오, 네!이상한 전선이 위에서 떨어지자 나는 입을 다물고 경비원 방에 매달려 있었다.<page>이것은 다른 사람들에게는 문제가 될 수 있지만, 내 가게는 용품이 풍부하므로 굶어 죽을 걱정이 없습니다.<hpage>당신의 준비는 매우 유용하고 당신의 가게는 여전히 충분한 재고를 가지고있는 것 같습니다.<page>오 네, 제 공급 업체도 돌아 왔으니 많은 제품을 보여드리겠습니다!

original_en_text: Welly now! You have the oil, traveller! Allow me to bring about a shine bright as none before!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！你拿到油了，旅者！该让这柄针刃成为绝顶神兵了！
translated_text: Now, Willie. You have the oil, traveler. We will give you an unprecedented light!
secondary_translated_text: 이제, 윌리당신은 기름이 있습니다, 여행자.우리는 당신에게 전례없는 빛을 줄 것입니다!

translated_text: Donation of cultural property?

original_en_text: But, hold! There is something more about you... I’ve sliced the shells of countless filthy pilgrims! All those plain, greying innards! Yours are something else entirely!<page>It tickles at my mind, still! Bzzt! What is it of your shell that eludes even my perfect, precise perception?<page>Would you show me, specimen? Go on! Let the great Yarnaby peer at your deeper, darker secrets!<hpage>I’ve no desire to see my shell pried into further, healer. Your service has succeeded, and taken its toll in pain. I hope only that I never again need to seek your aid.
original_zh_text: 慢着！你壳里还有料……本神医剖过无数病壳！全是灰扑扑的！你的截然不同！<page>滋滋！到底是什么连本神医都看不透？<page>让我瞧瞧，病患！快！让本神医看看你藏着什么黑暗秘密！<hpage>我不想再被剖壳，医师。治疗虽然成功，但代价着实巨大。希望我们永远不用再见。
translated_text: But wait! I have cut the shells of countless filthy pilgrims! Ordinary gray visceral! Yours is completely different!<page>That always worries me! - Х м м м! Is there anything in your shell that you cannot perceive with absolute accuracy?<page>Can you show me a champion? Go forward! May the great Yanabi see his deepest and darkest secrets!<hpage>I no longer want to see an open shell, the therapist.His work was successful and paid a very high price.Hopefully I will no longer have to ask for your help.
secondary_translated_text: 그러나 기다려!나는 수많은 더러운 순례자들의 껍질을 잘랐다!평범한 회색 내관!당신의 것은 완전히 다르다!<page>그것은 항상 나를 걱정한다! - 엠엠엠엠!당신의 껍질 안에 당신이 절대적으로 정확하게 지각할 수 없는 어떤 것이 있습니까?<page>나에게 챔피언을 보여줄 수 있니?앞으로!위대한 야나비가 그의 가장 깊고 어두운 비밀을 알게 되기를 바랍니다!<hpage>나는 더 이상 열린 껍질을보고 싶지 않습니다, 치료사. 그의 작업은 성공적이었고 매우 높은 가격을 지불했다. 나는 더 이상 당신의 도움을 요청하지 않을 것입니다.

original_en_text: If ever upon your long road more oil is acquired, seek my service with haste! Who knows what form we could find deeper within your blade’s sharpened steel!
original_zh_text: 要是再得到秘油，就来找我！谁知这针还能磨砺出何等锋芒！
translated_text: If you have more oil on the road, please contact my service as soon as possible! You don't even know what shape you 'll find on the back of your sharp knife!
secondary_translated_text: 도로에 기름이 더 많은 경우, 가능한 한 빨리 내 서비스에 문의하십시오!당신은 당신의 날카로운 칼의 뒷면에 어떤 모양을 찾을 수 있는지조차 모른다!

original_en_text: Gahh! Who keeps making all that racket out there?! Such horrid shaking and screaming. The crucial work is being spoiled! Bzzzt!
original_zh_text: 哼！外面谁在吵吵？！震动和尖叫没完没了的！我的研究正值关键时刻呢！滋滋！
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! Who is making noise? These vibrations and terrible screams. Important work was destroyed. - Х м м м!
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!오, 네!누가 소음을 내는거야?이 진동과 끔찍한 비명소리.중요한 작업이 파괴되었다. - 엠엠엠엠!

original_en_text: The operation... a success! The simpletons hiding in that blasted bellvein would shudder into dust if they saw how much I achieve without them!<hpage>Madam... I shan’t lie, that was an ordeal such as I have rarely suffered...<hpage>And yet, the parasite does seem to have been... unbound somewhat. Whatever remnant still lingers in my shell feels calmed, enough for me to claim its power as my own.<hpage>Perhaps this is a fortunate result after all.<page>Of course. Of course! Great Yarnaby has healed you! Shout it through the caverns. Scream it from the great spinning towers!<page>Just make sure they hear you in the so-called ‘civilised’ settlements of this ignorant land!
original_zh_text: 手术……成功！钟脉那帮庸才见这场面得吓成渣！<hpage>女士……不瞒您说，这真是毕生难忘的体验……<hpage>但寄生物似乎……松开了。残存部分很平静，反而能为我所用。<hpage>或许能算因祸得福了。<page>当然！本神医治好了你！快去各大洞穴传颂，去纺塔顶上喊出来！<page>让那些自诩“文明”的无知村镇都听听！
translated_text: The operation was a success! If the fools hiding in the veins of the clock could see what I have done without them, they would tremble and turn to dust!<hpage>Sra. ... I don't want to lie, it 's a pain that I rarely feel.<hpage>It seems that there is a parasite there. Some of them are unlimited. What remained in the shell, I felt calm enough to claim that the power was mine.<hpage>In the end, it can be a successful outcome.<page>Obviously! Obviously! Yanni will heal you! Crying in the basement.Cries the great revolving tower!<page>Listen to your voice in the so-called "civilized " colonies of this ignorant land!
secondary_translated_text: 수술은 성공적이었다!시계의 정맥에 숨어있는 바보들이 그들 없이 내가 한 일을 볼 수 있다면, 그들은 떨고 먼지로 변할 것이다!<hpage>부인. ...거짓말하고 싶지 않아, 거의 느껴지지 않는 아픔이야.<hpage>그곳에는 기생충이 있는 것 같다.그들 중 일부는 무제한이다.껍질 속에 남아있는 것은, 나는 그 힘이 내 것이라고 주장하기에 충분히 평온하다고 느꼈다.<hpage>결국, 그것은 성공적인 결과가 될 수 있습니다.<page>당연히!당연히!얀니가 당신을 치유할 것이다!지하실에서 울어라, 위대한 회전탑이 울어라!<page>이 무지한 땅의 소위 "문명화 된" 식민지에서 당신의 목소리를 들어보십시오!

original_en_text: A mighty collection of the past, is it not? If only I could hoard all of history here with me!
original_zh_text: 这等珍藏，够气派吧？我恨不得把全纺络的历史都囤在这儿！
translated_text: It 's a collection of the past, right? " Really? I wish I could cover my story.
secondary_translated_text: 과거를 수집한 것 맞죠? "정말 "?나는 내 이야기를 덮을 수 있었으면 좋겠다.

original_en_text: Fellow resident, welcome home! The world may quake and crumble, and threaten its end, but while my shell stays safe my shop stays open.
original_zh_text: 欢迎回来，好邻居！世道混乱，但只要我这壳不碎，铺子照开！
translated_text: Residents, welcome to the home! The world may cause earthquakes and destruction, and threaten to end it, but as long as my shell is safe, my shop will remain open.
secondary_translated_text: 주민 여러분, 집에 오신 것을 환영합니다!세상은 지진과 파괴를 일으킬 수 있고, 그것을 끝낼 수 있지만, 내 껍질이 안전한 한, 내 가게는 열려 있을 것이다.

original_en_text: Yes... yes! Bzzt! Finally, a specimen worthy of my mighty Extricator! My beautiful, unfairly-maligned Extricator! Come this way, bzzt...
original_zh_text: 对……对！滋滋！终于有配得上我伟大的剥离机的病例！来这边，滋滋……
translated_text: That's right, sir. Ah yes! Ah, yes! - Х м м м! Finally, a worthy copy of my mighty Savior! My unjustly insulted extractor! This is the sound of the envelope.
secondary_translated_text: 맞습니다, 선생님.아 예!아, 네! - 엠엠엠엠!마지막으로, 나의 위대한 구세주의 가치있는 사본!나의 부당하게 모욕된 추출자!이것은 봉투의 소리입니다.

original_en_text: By claw! Who is this bold warrior, standing so calm and cool on entrance to Plinney’s bellhome!<hpage>Merely a traveller, sir, though one whose blade could benefit from your service.<page>Your blade! Of course, fierce warrior! Any fine pinmaster would detect the sign of deadly work upon that needle’s edge.<page>If your weapon sharpened would see our lands that much safer, then honour decrees it receives my care this very moment! What’s say I take a look?<hpage>
original_zh_text: 利爪啊！这位踏进普林尼的华美钟居还面不改色的勇士是谁！<hpage>过路客而已，不过针刃需要照料。<page>您的针刃！好说好说！是个针匠都看得出这针尖沾过多少条命。<page>如果磨利此针能保护镇子，自然应该优先照料！这就开始？
translated_text: Use your nails. Who is such a brave soldier who stands silently at the entrance to Pliny 's bell tower?<hpage>I'm just a traveler, but his sword can use your services. "<page>He has a knife. Warriors, of course. Any good needle can find a death mark on the tip of the needle.<page>If the sharpness of your weapons makes our land safer, then my honor is doomed to defend. "Let 's look at that.<hpage>
secondary_translated_text: 손톱을 사용하십시오.플리니의 종탑 입구에 조용히 서있는 용감한 군인은 누구입니까?<hpage>나는 단지 여행자일 뿐이지만 그의 검은 당신의 서비스를 사용할 수 있습니다. "<page>그는 칼을 가지고 있다.물론 전사들도 마찬가지다.좋은 바늘은 바늘 끝에서 죽음의 흔적을 찾을 수 있습니다.<page>만약 당신들의 날카로운 무기가 우리 나라를 더 안전하게 만들면, 내 명예는 방어해야 할 운명입니다. "그건 한번 봐.<hpage>

original_en_text: Come back with those spines, or not at all! The great Yarnaby’s time is precious, bzzt! I will not be distracted from my work!
original_zh_text: 带棘刺来再敲门！本神医时间金贵，滋滋！没空分心！
translated_text: Turn your back or nothing will happen! Yannabi's time is precious. I don't get distracted from work.
secondary_translated_text: 뒤돌아봐, 그렇지 않으면 아무 일도 일어나지 않을 거야! Yannabi 의 시간은 소중합니다.나는 일에서 산만하지 않는다.

original_en_text: Ahh... how welly romantic t’would’ve been, had the lost pilgrims struck me down beside her grave, to lie together forever as the world crumbles all ‘round...<page>But fortune has claimed otherwise! And perhaps ‘tis best for this humble pinmaster to continue his trade a little longer. These uncertain times will bring much new work, I should think!
original_zh_text: 啊……要是迷途朝圣者把我和她一块埋了，在崩塌世界里相拥长眠……该多浪漫……<page>但看来我命不该绝！或许纺络就是要我这卑微针匠多干几年。在这乱世，新活计可多着呢！
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! How romantic it would be if that lost pilgrim pushed me to the grave, and we slept together forever, until the world fell apart.<page>Perhaps this humble musician would have been better off working a little more. This era of uncertainty will bring a lot of new jobs!
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!잃어버린 순례자가 나를 무덤으로 밀어 넣고 세상이 무너질 때까지 영원히 함께 잤다면 얼마나 낭만적이었을까.<page>아마도 이 겸손한 뮤지션이 조금 더 일하는 것이 더 좋았을 것이다.이 불확실성의 시대는 많은 새로운 일자리를 가져올 것입니다!

original_en_text: What’s this... twitching inside of you? A slave within a slave! Given over your shell to grow something greater?<hpage>A parasite has made its home within me. It saps my energy, and I can not purge it with strength alone...<page>Grnk. Lie down and die then, for all I care. Allow that wriggling thing its chance at life.<page>Or else... hff. Go seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out, high up into the moors, last I heard.
original_zh_text: 你壳里……有东西在扭？奴隶套奴隶！养着个更大的玩意？<hpage>寄生体在我壳里扎了根，单凭气力无法驱散它……<page>哼。那就躺平等死，让那玩意替你活。<page>或者……嗤。去找被镇子放逐的雅纳碧，听说她被赶到灰沼了。
translated_text: What's it? Do you have extra seizures from the inside? A slave inside a slave, throwing a shell to grow something bigger?<hpage>A parasite has taken root in me, draining my energy, and I cannot get rid of it by force.<page>The borders! I 'm not afraid to lie down and die, give this thing a chance to live.<page>Or perhaps you... They are looking for those who were driven out by Berhart and Unabi. As far as I know, he was driven out of the desert.
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요?내부에서 추가적인 발작이 있습니까?노예 안에 있는 노예, 더 큰 것을 키우기 위해 껍질을 던지는 노예?<hpage>기생충이 내 안에 뿌리를 내리고, 내 에너지를 고갈시키고, 나는 힘으로 그것을 제거 할 수 없습니다.<page>국경을!나는 누워 죽는 것이 두렵지 않다. 이 물건에 살 기회를 줘.<page>또는 아마도 당신은...그들은 베르하트와 우나비에 의해 쫓겨난 사람들을 찾고 있다.내가 아는 한, 그는 사막에서 쫓겨났다.

original_en_text: More, then! Bring me more relics of the past! Records, seals, idols! Let’s gather up the history of the world and hoard it all here, nice and safe!<hpage>If I happen upon more curiosities of this kingdom’s past, I may visit again. Until that time, keep yourself safe.
original_zh_text: 继续！多找点老物件！典籍、印玺、神像！把全纺络的过往都放在这儿才安稳！<hpage>若找到这王国的遗物，我会再来。在此之前，请多保重。
translated_text: And many more! Record, Seal, Idol! This is not a good idea. Collect the history of the world and stay here safe!<hpage>If he was more interested in the past of this kingdom, he could return. Until then make sure you are safe.
secondary_translated_text: 그리고 더 많은!레코드, 시얼, 아이돌!이것은 좋은 생각이 아니다.세계의 역사를 수집하고 안전하게 여기에 머물!<hpage>만약 그가 이 왕국의 과거에 더 관심이 있다면, 그는 돌아올 수 있었다.그때까지 당신이 안전하다는 것을 확인하십시오.

original_en_text: <page=T>More for you, miss courier! Lacquer, filled fresh, for the maker on the mount. We have much, so don’t worry for our supply. <page=S>To climb the frozen peak, it is a journey most difficult! Our thanks go full with you that tries again!
original_zh_text: <page=T>拿好，救星小姐！满满漆水送给山上匠师。货物管够！尽管送！<page=S>攀爬冰峰危险得很！多谢您原意冒险！
translated_text: <page=T>"No more gifts, sir.The new submerged paint is ready for the mountains.There are plenty of them, so don't worry about offers.<page=S>The iceberg is the most difficult journey ever! Thank you for taking up the challenge again!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>"더 이상 선물은 없습니다, 선생님. 새 수중 페인트가 산에 준비되어 있습니다. 많이 있습니다. 그래서 제안에 대해 걱정하지 마십시오.<page=S>빙산은 지금까지 가장 힘든 여행입니다!다시 한번 도전해 주셔서 감사합니다!

original_en_text: <page=T>More meats for you, miss courier! Best you be delivering it swiftly quick! If left not stored, our rasher’s flavour fast turns foul.
original_zh_text: <page=T>熏肉准备好啦！救星小姐快快出发！放久了会变味！
translated_text: <page=T>Eat more meat, please. Please deliver it as soon as possible! If you do not store it, then the tear drink will quickly acquire a bad taste.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>고기를 좀 더 먹어 주세요.최대한 빨리 배송해 주세요!만약 당신이 그것을 저장하지 않는다면, 눈물 음료는 빠르게 나쁜 맛을 얻을 것입니다.

original_en_text: Shoo I say! Unless you’ve brought a worthy specimen, with something truly nasty inside them, bzzt! Otherwise, leave the great Yarnaby in peace!
original_zh_text: 说了走开！除非带够劲的病患来，壳里长真家伙的！不然别烦本神医！
translated_text: I'm going to lie! If you 're carrying a precious specimen that has something really annoying, Wow! If not, let the great Anabe rest.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 거짓말을 할거야!정말 짜증나는 무언가가있는 귀중한 표본을 가지고 있다면, 와우!그렇지 않으면, 위대한 아나베를 쉬게 해라.

original_en_text: Miss saving! Thanks again for you and your big-big blade! I’m is made it back, and grumpy grub-grub got her goods. She seemed happy, even!<page>I’m won’t be travelling out for a while-while methinks. Too many beasties! All about theys are. Even those pilgrims! All now going angry, a bit like old grub-grub.<hpage>This town remains safe for the moment, Tipp. You’re a smart bug to stay within its walls.
original_zh_text: 救星小姐！多亏了您，还有那柄长、长刀！我安全回来了，暴躁虫、虫婆婆也收到货啦！她可高兴呢！<page>我暂、暂时不出远门啦。外面全是发狂的野兽！连朝圣者都变凶了，跟虫婆婆一个德行。<hpage>眼下镇上还算安全，待在这里是明智选择。
translated_text: I lost my savings.Thank you again to you and your knife.When I came back, the rude Grub Grub took it.She looked happy too!<page>I don't think I 'll be traveling for a while.Lots of animals! They are all yours. Even pilgrims. Everything is serious, and it seems an old thing.<hpage>Tip: This city is always safe from intelligent worms, and you can cling to its walls.
secondary_translated_text: 저축을 잃어 버렸습니다. 다시 한번 당신과 당신의 칼에 감사드립니다. 내가 돌아 왔을 때, 무례한 Grub Grub 은 그것을 가져갔습니다. 그녀는 또한 행복해 보였습니다!<page>나는 잠시 동안 여행하지 않을 것 같다. 많은 동물!그들은 모두 당신의 것입니다.심지어 Pilgrims.모든 것이 심각하고 오래된 것 같습니다.<hpage>팁: 이 도시는 항상 지능형 벌레로부터 안전하며 벽에 붙어있을 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: You’ve a good, solid bell up there, though its surface is showing its age. Why not have us paint it fresh? A protective coat and a little flair!
original_zh_text: 你的钟屋结实但显旧。刷层护漆加点花纹如何？
translated_text: There were thin, durable watches, but the surface shows their age. Why not give him a refreshing drink? Space and Talent.
secondary_translated_text: 얇고 내구성이 뛰어난 시계가 있었지만, 표면은 그들의 나이를 보여준다.왜 그에게 상쾌한 음료를 주지 않는가?우주와 재능.

original_en_text: <hpage>You seem hard at work, good bug. Are you a hunter, of a sort?<page>Of a simple sort, aye. I’m a pondcatcher around these parts. The last remaining, in fact! <page>Us few Bellharters are badly needing for fresh food, so my lone shell’s carrying quite the responsibility.<page>At least Shellwood Pond’s still full of good meat, ‘specially if your aim with a longpin’s as good as mine.
original_zh_text: <hpage>你似乎很忙，也是个猎手？<page>勉强算吧，我是个渔夫。全镇最后一个渔夫！<page>钟心镇的虫个个饥肠辘辘，担子全压我的壳上。<page>好在甲木林池塘鱼肥，像我这样擅使长针的总能带点收获回来。
translated_text: <hpage>You seem to be working very hard, a good dog. Are you a hunter type?<page>Very easy, yes.I am a water hunter in these areas.Actually, the latter!<page>My body alone bore a great deal of responsibility, for our few Berhartts were in desperate need of fresh food.<page>At least there 's a lot of good meat in Sherwood Lake. Especially if your needles are as accurate as mine.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>당신은 매우 열심히 일하는 것 같고, 좋은 개입니다.당신은 사냥꾼 유형입니까?<page>아주 쉬운, yes. I 'm a water hunter in these areas. Actually, the latter!<page>우리 소수의 버하르츠는 신선한 음식이 절실히 필요했기 때문에 내 몸만으로는 많은 책임을 지고 있었다.<page>적어도 셔우드 호수에는 맛있는 고기가 많이 있습니다.특히 네 바늘이 내 바늘만큼 정확하다면 더욱 그렇다.

original_en_text: My part’s been given, slave. We’ve no more need to speak.<page>Go and spin your spider’s web. Allow our kingdom’s restless soul its chance to blaze.
original_zh_text: 东西给了，奴隶。不跟你废话了。<page>去织你的网吧。让这王国里躁动的灵魂烧个痛快。
translated_text: "My work is done, slave; I don't need to speak any more.<page>Dismantle the website.Give the troubled souls of our kingdom a chance to burn.
secondary_translated_text: "내 일은 끝났어, 노예야; 더 이상 말할 필요가 없어.<page>웹 사이트를 해체하십시오. 우리 왕국의 괴로워하는 영혼들에게 불타는 기회를 주세요.

original_en_text: <hpage>I have more oil, pinmaster. Its acquisition was no small task, but if it aids my blade, those challenges will be well rewarded.<page>Even more oil? What preposterous luck! That unseen gift, in quantity unheard, discovered by a single bug!<page>Would you pass the oil, traveller, and perhaps a few rosaries for the ongoing effort? Allow this pinmaster to again work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我又得到秘油了，针匠。取之不易，但为了磨砺针刃，冒点风险也是值当。<page>还有秘油？您这运气！这老些圣物竟都被同一只虫找到了。<page>那就把油给我吧，再赏几颗念珠当辛苦费如何？让我再施展一次针匠的绝活！
translated_text: <hpage>There 's more oil, Pinmaster, it 's been a hard job to get it, but if it helped my blade, the challenge went well.<page>Any more oil? What a ridiculous opportunity! The amount of invisible donations is not published. An error has been detected!<page>Passenger, can I get some oil? Is there a rosary that will help you to keep fighting? Do you want this musician to do a miracle on your sheet again?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>더 많은 기름이 있습니다, 핀마스터, 그것을 얻기 위해 힘든 일이었지만, 내 블레이드가 도움이된다면, 도전은 잘 진행되었습니다.<page>기름이 더 있나요?정말 우스꽝스러운 기회야!보이지 않는 기부금의 금액은 공개되지 않습니다.오류가 감지되었습니다!<page>승객님, 기름 좀 드릴까요?당신이 계속 싸울 수 있도록 도와줄 로자리가 있습니까?이 뮤지션이 당신의 시트에서 다시 기적을 일으키기를 원하십니까?

original_en_text: An exquisite item, containing a cherished memory. I have an excellent memory myself, but I’m sure you can make good use of it.
original_zh_text: 用来记录珍贵记忆的雅物。我记性好用不着，不过你应该用得上。
translated_text: Great work, full of precious memories. I have a good memory, but I think you can make the most of it.
secondary_translated_text: 좋은 작품, 소중한 추억으로 가득 차 있습니다.나는 기억력이 좋지만, 나는 당신이 그것을 최대한 활용할 수 있다고 생각한다.

original_en_text: Don’t act the fool, specimen! Bzzt! Share more of yourself, that I may gain greater understanding! Learning! What other hope is there to save our blighted, thankless world?! <hpage>I have declined, bug. Whatever you seek, you shall not find it either upon or within my shell.
original_zh_text: 别装傻，病患！滋滋！奉献自己，帮助本神医领悟！不然怎么拯救这不知感恩的世界！<hpage>我拒绝，你所求之物不在我身上。
translated_text: Don't pretend, give me an example. - Х м м м! Let 's share more information about ourselves and learn more! Let's Learn! What hope is there for saving our devastated and ungrateful world?<hpage>What you are looking for is not in my shell, nor in the shell.
secondary_translated_text: 척하지 말고, 예를 들어봐. - 엠엠엠엠!우리 자신에 대한 더 많은 정보를 공유하고 더 많은 것을 배우자! Let 's learn!우리의 황폐하고 감사하지 않는 세상을 구원할 희망은 무엇입니까?<hpage>네가 찾고 있는 것은 내 껍질에 없고, 껍질에 있는 것도 아니다.

original_en_text: <page>Miss traveller! Thanks to your valiant contributions, our little town’s starting to feel like its old self again. Homes have been hoisted, and the square shines!<hpage>I have seen the changes myself, Pavo. It is pleasing to hear my contributions have not been in vain. <page>Indeed! Your generosity is a guide for others! We’ve only one thing now sorely missing...<page>Bugs! What is a town without its residents? Age, scarcity, deadly thread... Bellhart is beset by endless ills. Now there’s just us remaining few as you’ve met.<page>In recognition of your noble efforts, and as one small step to solving the problem, I have decreed a grand gift should be given! A bellhome of your very own!<page>A place to reflect. A bed to lay in. It’s hanging up there at the top, beside our good pinmaster. <hpage>I have no plans to settle, Pavo, but for now my task in Pharloom remains, and while it does, a residence may prove useful.<page>Of course! Of course! Your fortitude inspires us all! And if trouble ever descends anew, it surely won’t hurt to have a resident warrior close at claw!
original_zh_text: <page>旅者小姐！感谢您的无私奉献，钟心镇逐渐重现旧貌！屋舍纷纷重立，广场熠熠生辉！<hpage>镇上变化我也看在眼里，得知奉献没有付诸东流，很是欣慰。<page>正是！您的慷慨堪称楷模！现在只剩……<page>居民！没有居民哪有镇子？衰老、贫瘠、邪丝……钟心镇灾厄不绝。如今只剩您见过的寥寥数虫。<page>因此，为感谢您的无私援助，我们决定赠予您一份礼物——专属钟居！<page>钟居既是静思之所，也是安眠之榻。您的钟居位置高悬上方，与针匠大师为邻。<hpage>我无意久留，但现在既在此处，有居所也是方便。<page>好说好说！您的坚毅激励镇上众虫！况且万一有新的灾祸，身旁有勇士相助总是好的！
translated_text: <page>A traveling woman! Thanks to his courageous service, our city begins to feel like it was before.The house was demolished and the square is illuminated!<hpage>I have seen this change. I am glad my contribution was not in vain.<page>It's really so. His generosity is a guide for others.There is only one thing we need right now.<page>The worms! What is a city without people? Age, rarity, deadly clues: Berhardt is tormented by endless evils.<page>In honour of your noble efforts and as a small step towards solving the problem, I order a gift! It has its own clock tower.<page>It is a place for reflection.A bed to lie on.Stay close to our leading router manufacturer.<hpage>Pavo, I have no plans to move, but my current mission on the farm is still there, but housing can be useful.<page>Obviously! Yes, no! If the problems are repeated, the garrison will not hurt the opponent, even if he approaches the nail.
secondary_translated_text: <page>여행하는 여인!그의 용감한 봉사 덕분에 우리 도시는 이전처럼 느껴지기 시작합니다. 집은 철거되었고 광장은 조명되었습니다!<hpage>나는 이 변화를 보았다.나는 나의 공헌이 헛되지 않았다는 것이 기쁘다.<page>정말 그렇군요.그의 관대함은 다른 사람들을 위한 가이드가 될 것이다. 지금 우리에게 필요한 것은 오직 하나뿐이다.<page>벌레!사람이 없는 도시는 어떤 것인가?나이, 희귀성, 치명적인 단서: 베르하르트는 끝없는 악에 시달리고 있다.<page>당신의 고귀한 노력에 경의를 표하고 문제를 해결하기위한 작은 단계로, 나는 선물을 주문합니다!그것은 자체 시계탑을 가지고 있습니다.<page>그것은 우리의 선도적 인 라우터 제조업체에 가까운 누워있는 침대입니다.<hpage>파보, 나는 이사 할 계획이 없지만, 농장에서 나의 현재 임무는 여전히 거기에 있지만, 주택은 유용 할 수 있습니다.<page>당연히!그래, 안돼!문제가 반복되면 주둔군은 상대방이 손톱에 접근해도 상대를 해치지 않습니다.

original_en_text: If you refuse to share your secrets, then distract me no more, specimen! Bzzt!<page>There is still much work ahead for the great Yarnaby! Much thought, much learning!<page>Though the ungrateful world shuns me, still, by my own claws shall it be saved!
original_zh_text: 不分享秘密就别烦我了，病患！滋滋！<page>本神医还有伟大事业！要继续想、继续学！<page>就算这不知感恩的世道唾弃我，我也要亲手拯救！
translated_text: If you refuse to reveal your secret, don't distract me, give an example. - Х м м м!<page>Yarnabi has a lot to do.Think more, learn more.<page>And though the ungrateful world flee from Me, I will rescue it from My hands.
secondary_translated_text: 만약 네가 비밀을 밝히기를 거부한다면, 나를 방해하지 말고, 예를 들어봐. - 엠엠엠엠!<page>야르나비 (Yarnabi) 는 할 일이 많고, 더 많이 생각하고, 더 많이 배울 수 있다.<page>감사하지 않는 세상이 내게서 도망하더라도, 내가 그것을 내 손에서 구해 낼 것이다.

original_en_text: Welly’o! What a fearful fright you’ve saved poor Plinney from! Such a delight, at longest last, to see that fine needle dance and sing!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！您可真是救了可怜的普林尼一命！终于又能瞧见亮闪闪的针刃起舞啦！
translated_text: Everything is okay, everything is okay! All right, all right! All right! It 's terrible to save the poor plane! I am so happy to see this needle sing and dance!
secondary_translated_text: 모든 게 괜찮아, 모든 게 괜찮아!좋아요, 좋아요!좋아요!불쌍한 비행기를 구하는 것은 끔찍하다!이 바늘이 노래하고 춤추는 것을 보는 것이 너무 행복합니다!

original_en_text: <hpage>Again, pinmaster, I must ask your skilled service. I bring another gland of oil.<page>Oil, so much! This bug is past surprise! It is time methinks, to see your blade’s work finished! To bring about a shine bright as none before!<page>Welly now! Why wait? Would you have me begin, traveller?
original_zh_text: <hpage>要再劳烦针匠了，新得一些秘油。<page>这么多圣油！我都不觉得惊讶了！不过是时候了，该让这柄针刃成为绝顶神兵了！<page>哎呀呀！还等什么！快开始吧？
translated_text: <hpage>Dear Sir, I am again asking for your services. I have another iron.<page>A lot of oil, this is a big mistake! It 's time to look at your mom! Unprecedented light.<page>Now, Willie, why are you waiting? Let's start, fellow traveler.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>친애하는 선생님, 저는 다시 한번 귀하의 서비스를 요청합니다.나는 또 다른 철을 가지고 있다.<page>기름이 너무 많아서 큰 실수입니다!네 엄마를 볼 시간이야!전례 없는 빛.<page>이제, 윌리, 왜 기다리고 있니?여행자 여러분, 시작합시다.

original_en_text: <hpage>These are deadly roads to wander, pinmaster, especially with the black soaked threads tearing the lands apart.<hpage>Your greatest chance for safety lies in Bellhart, with your fellows. You can protect one another, and perhaps in time rebuild.<page>Oh yes, of course! T’was not Plinney’s wish to abandon his dear bellfriends, but with the world now ending, I had to come and say one last farewell to my sweet Melatolla.<page>I should be returning though, quite rightly. Our town will be needing a pinmaster’s fine work now more than ever!
original_zh_text: <hpage>如今世道凶险，针匠，尤其黑灾使各处分崩离析。<hpage>最安生的去处还是钟心镇，和同胞互相照应，或许还能重建家园。<page>是啊是啊！普林尼本不想抛下镇子里的老友，但想到要完蛋了，总得和亲爱的梅拉托拉道个别。<page>不过该回去啦！镇上如今可比任何时候都缺针匠手艺！
translated_text: <hpage>Pismaste, they are the paths of deadly waves and, above all, the stain of the path of the black thread that tears the earth.<hpage>The best chance of saving them lies with Berhart and his comrades. We can protect each other and rebuild ourselves over time.<page>Pliny did not want to leave his dear friend, the waiter, but the world was coming to an end, and I had to say goodbye to my dear Merathra for the last time.<page>I 'm back, it 's true. More than ever, our city needs excellent Lutheran players!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Pismaste, 그들은 치명적인 파도의 경로이며, 무엇보다도 지구를 찢는 검은 실의 경로의 얼룩입니다.<hpage>그들을 구할 가장 좋은 기회는 버하트와 그의 동료들에게 달려 있다.우리는 서로를 보호하고 시간이 지남에 따라 스스로를 재건할 수 있습니다.<page>플리니는 그의 소중한 친구인 웨이터를 떠나고 싶지 않았지만, 세상이 끝나고 있었고, 나는 나의 사랑하는 메라트라에게 마지막 작별 인사를 해야 했다.<page>내가 돌아왔어, 그건 사실이야.그 어느 때보다도 우리 도시는 훌륭한 루터교 선수들이 필요하다!

original_en_text: Yes... yes. This is a mighty collection indeed!<page>So many relics safely piled up in here, nice and safe! I’ve done so well to gather it all up!<hpage>If your collection pleases you, some acknowledgement of my own contribution to its growth is not undue.<page>Pah! Is it gratitude you seek?<page>I will allow you to keep viewing my collection. That is gratitude enough for what little you’ve given me!
original_zh_text: 好……真好！这才是称得上是珍藏！<page>这么多遗物安安稳稳地堆在这儿！我得算是劳苦功高！<hpage>若您对这珍藏满意，也请念我几分功劳。<page>嘁！讨谢来了？<page>就你交的那点东西，准你多看几眼我的珍藏，就当是谢礼了！
translated_text: Yes, it 's true, it 's a powerful series!<page>Many cultural relics are preserved here, and it is safe! Good harvest. "<hpage>If your collection satisfies you, then I do not need to acknowledge my contribution to the development of my collection.<page>¡Oу!? Are you seeking gratitude?<page>Keep reading my collection. I am grateful for everything you have given me.
secondary_translated_text: 네, 맞습니다. 강력한 시리즈입니다!<page>많은 문화 유물이 이곳으로 보존되어 있으며, 안전합니다!좋은 수확. "<hpage>당신의 컬렉션이 당신을 만족시킨다면, 나는 내 컬렉션의 개발에 대한 나의 기여를 인정할 필요가 없습니다.<page>아우!?당신은 감사의 마음을 찾고 있습니까?<page>내 컬렉션을 계속 읽으세요.나는 당신이 내게 준 모든 것에 대해 감사한다.

original_en_text: <page=S>Once was common, this delivery, for the bugs in their camp beside the bone. Now even this is-is challenge.<page=T>Down there at base, where many pilgrims’ journey start. To ready for their climb, these deliverings will give much value.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这本是寻常单子，给骸底营地的虫。现在竟、竟然也成难题了。<page=T>那儿是朝圣者起点，货到能帮大忙。
translated_text: <page=S>This mode of transportation has already been common for field insects along with bones.<page=T>Many pilgrims start their journey here.For preparation for mountaineering, these shipments offer great value.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>이 수송 방식은 이미 뼈와 함께 들판 곤충에게 일반적이었습니다.<page=T>많은 순례자들이 이곳에서 여행을 시작합니다. 산악을 준비하기 위해, 이 선적은 큰 가치를 제공합니다.

original_en_text: Would you pass the oil, traveller, and perhaps a few rosaries for their ongoing effort? Allow this pinmaster to again work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: 那就把油给我吧，再赏几颗念珠当辛苦费如何？让我再施展一次针匠的绝活！
translated_text: Do you pray the Rosary to thank the oil, the travelers and their constant efforts? Do you want this musician to do a miracle on your sheet again?
secondary_translated_text: 기름, 여행자 및 그들의 지속적인 노력에 감사하기 위해 묵주기도를 드리고 있습니까?이 뮤지션이 당신의 시트에서 다시 기적을 일으키기를 원하십니까?

original_en_text: Found some fancy trophies on your travels? Then you’ll be needing these shelves to show them off!
original_zh_text: 旅途中搜罗了不少珍奇战利品？正好放上这架子显摆！
translated_text: Did you have any good trophies on your trip? It takes a regiment to show that.
secondary_translated_text: 여행 중에 좋은 트로피를 가지고 계셨나요?그것을 보여주기 위해서는 군대가 필요하다.

original_en_text: Just passing through these lands, are you, miss? I’d warn you not to stray far from Bellhart, but you’ve the look of one who can manage themself.
original_zh_text: 只是路过吗？劝你别离镇子太远，不过瞧你倒像是有本事的。
translated_text: Have you just traveled around the country? I wanted to warn you not to leave Berhardt, but you seem to be a man who manages to control himself.
secondary_translated_text: 방금 전국을 여행하셨나요?버하르트를 떠나지 말라고 경고하고 싶었지만, 당신은 스스로를 통제하는 사람처럼 보인다.

original_en_text: If you’re heading out across the pond, be wary of the other catchers. They’re all long lost to Pharloom’s Haunting.<page>Weak minds, the lotta them. Still, their longpins remain sharp enough.
original_zh_text: 如果要经过池塘，当心其他渔夫，全被邪咒侵染了。<page>大多是心智软弱的家伙，但使长针的手艺没丢。
translated_text: If you cross the pond, be careful with other fishermen. He was in "Ghosted Yoke. " "<page>They love each other, and their hearts are weak, but the long needle is still sharp enough.
secondary_translated_text: 연못을 건너면 다른 낚시꾼들과 조심하세요.그는 "고스트 요크" 에 있었다. " "<page>그들은 서로를 사랑하고, 그들의 마음은 약하지만 긴 바늘은 여전히 충분히 날카롭다.

original_en_text: Well, well! Welcome to you, our newest resident! I hope you’re finding your new home to your taste.<hpage>It is a finely forged bell, madam. I am fortunate to have a safe space to rest, even if my stay here may be short.<page>However long you’re with us, I’ve been holding onto some fine goods that’ll cosy up your home. This stuff ain’t for the riff-raff winding through, but a fellow Bellharter deserves the finest!
original_zh_text: 哟嗬！新住户！钟居可还满意？<hpage>铸造精良，女士。虽然是暂居，但能有一处安身之所实属幸事。<page>住多久随意，我留着些好货专供钟心镇自己人！过路粗客可配不上这档次！
translated_text: Yes, yes, yes, yes. Welcome to the new residents! We are looking forward to finding a new home that suits your taste.<hpage>We are fortunate to have a safe place to rest, but our stay here may be short.<page>No matter how long you stay, I 'll leave you some good things to make your home comfortable. The "heart " deserves better.
secondary_translated_text: 그래, 그래, 그래, 그래.새로운 주민들을 환영합니다!우리는 당신의 취향에 맞는 새로운 집을 찾기를 기대합니다.<hpage>우리는 휴식을 취할 수있는 안전한 장소를 가지고 운이 좋지만, 여기에 머무는 것은 짧을 수 있습니다.<page>당신이 얼마나 오래 머무르더라도, 나는 당신의 집을 편안하게 만들기 위해 좋은 것들을 남겨 둘 것입니다. ' 마음 ' 은 더 나은 자격이 있습니다.

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, weary pilgrim! Though glorious Bellhart may be past its finest shine, it still remains the last friendly stop before the Citadel. <page>It is the task of I, fair Pavo, to extend the warmest of welcome to those passing devout, such as your good self!<hpage>Your town seems returned to healthy form, good bug. I had some concern that, upon cutting you free, I’d find only husks.<page>Yes, well, many ahh... err... most of our residents did not fare so well... Still, it’s no good to dwell on dark things! We shall build, and grow, and welcome! As is any good bellbug’s task.
original_zh_text: 欢迎欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！钟心镇虽然不复往昔，但仍是攀登圣堡前最后一处友善驿站。<page>我，帕沃，专为虔行旅者献上最热忱的欢迎——比如尊驾您！<hpage>看来镇子已然恢复生机，原以为斩断丝咒后只能见空壳遍地。<page>呃……这个……许多居民确实没挺过来……但沉溺于哀伤没有意义！我等将重建、成长、迎接！此乃钟心镇虫民的天职。
translated_text: Welcome to the weary pilgrim! The glorious Berhardt may have lived in its heyday, but it is still the last stop before the castle.<page>"My duty, beautiful Pavo, is to honor the kindness of those who have died like you! "<hpage>His town seems to have returned to a healthy and good worm. I am a little worried. When I understand you, I will find only a shell.<page>Yeah, yeah, yeah. Most of the people are not able to. There is no use in clinging to the darkness! We grew up and got it. It is also a good work of hours.
secondary_translated_text: 피곤한 순례자님께 환영합니다!영광스러운 베르하르트는 전성기에 살았을 수도 있지만, 여전히 성 앞에 마지막 정거장입니다.<page>"아름다운 파보여, 내 의무는 당신처럼 죽은 사람들의 친절을 존중하는 것입니다! "<hpage>그의 마을은 건강하고 좋은 벌레로 돌아온 것 같다.나는 조금 걱정된다.내가 너를 이해할 때, 나는 단지 껍질을 찾을 것이다.<page>그래, 그래, 그래.대부분의 사람들은 할 수 없습니다.어둠에 집착하는 것은 아무 소용도 없다!우리는 성장했고 그것을 얻었습니다. 그것은 또한 좋은 시간 작업입니다.

original_en_text: You’ve met Frey, miss? She’s usually stocking useful items for travellers such as yourself.
original_zh_text: 见过芙蕾了么？她那常备着些旅者用得上的好货。
translated_text: Have you seen Freya? It usually stores useful things for travelers like you.
secondary_translated_text: 프레아 봤어요?일반적으로 당신 같은 여행자에게 유용한 물건을 저장합니다.

original_en_text: The perfect choice! Your bell’s about to be looking the finest in town. We’ll get the work started straight away.
original_zh_text: 选得好！你这钟屋就要变成全镇最好的一间了。立马开工！
translated_text: The perfect choice. Your bells will be the best in the city. We start working immediately.
secondary_translated_text: 완벽한 선택입니다.당신의 종은 도시에서 최고가 될 것입니다.우리는 즉시 작업을 시작합니다.

original_en_text: If you’re ever finding that bellhome a little bare, make sure to speak with Frey. She’s been known to gather all sorts of fancy furnishings.<page>That stock’s useless for a passing pilgrim, but for a new resident it’s just the stuff to turn a bell into home.
original_zh_text: 如果觉得钟居空荡，可找芙蕾购置家具。<page>那些家具对过客无用，但对新住民来说正好可以营造归家之感。
translated_text: If the clock tower is a bit bare, be sure to check out Frey.He has a large collection of furniture.<page>It was of little use to the pilgrims of the past, but it was only meant to bring home new residents.
secondary_translated_text: 시계탑이 조금 벌거벗은 경우, Frey. He 가구의 큰 컬렉션을 확인해야합니다.<page>그것은 과거의 순례자들에게 거의 도움이 되지 않았지만, 단지 새로운 주민들을 집으로 데려오기 위한 것이었다.

original_en_text: <page=S>Up-up, in the big Citadel, a new place we heard is now claimed safety-safe! Theys too needing our deliverings, we is sure!<page=T>That Citadel. We knows its truths! Not so nicely-nice as pilgrims tells! Even if brave bugs would settle, danger still is close!<page=S>They would need deliverings, for food, for healings, for protection. Please takes them, miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=S>听说上、上面的圣堡有新据点！肯定缺物资！<page=T>我们知道圣堡真相！根本没朝圣者说的那、那么好！就算有勇者定居也危险！需要食物药品护具——救星小姐去送吧！
translated_text: <page=S>At the Grand Castle we declare that the new place we have heard about is safe! We also need help!<page=T>Castillo, I know the truth. But the pilgrims are not safe. Even if the brave insects calm down, Danger is always near!<page=S>They need food, care and protection. Please, I will deliver it!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>그랜드 캐슬에서 우리는 우리가 들었던 새로운 장소가 안전하다고 선언합니다!우리 역시 도움이 필요하다!<page=T>카스틸로, 나는 진실을 알고 있다.그러나 순례자들은 안전하지 않습니다.용기있는 곤충들이 진정되더라도 위험은 항상 가까이 있습니다!<page=S>그들은 음식, 보살핌 및 보호가 필요합니다.제발, 내가 그것을 배달 할 것입니다!

original_en_text: Tarano! We shall work, now as never. What joy you grant this humble artisan, traveller. Let us seek that shine thought lost within these lands...
original_zh_text: 开工！这是毕生难求的机会。旅者，谢谢您让我这卑微匠人重拾失传荣光……
translated_text: Tarron! What joy have you brought to this humble craftsman and traveler? We are looking for the lost light in this earth.
secondary_translated_text: 타론!당신은 이 겸손한 장인이자 여행자에게 어떤 기쁨을 가져다 주는가?우리는 이 땅에서 잃어버린 빛을 찾고 있습니다.

original_en_text: <page>Welly, ho! That oil! You have it! That rare substance, hoarded close by the Citadel. Few are the pinmasters of our age that ever chanced to work its wonders.<page>Would you see it, traveller? The finest work of this fair pinmaster and your blade sharper still! Pass me the oil, and we can commence!
original_zh_text: <page>哎呀呀！那就是圣油！您竟然有！圣堡秘藏的圣物，当世针匠谁摸过这玩意！<page>旅者，可愿见证纺络针匠的绝活？把油给我，肯定不会让您失望！
translated_text: <page>- Willie, John, this is oil. I have that! This rare material is stored near the castle.Today very few people perform miracles.<page>Have you seen it, traveller? This is the best work of a good musician, and his knife is sharper.Give me the oil, and let's start.
secondary_translated_text: <page>- 윌리, 존, 이건 기름이야내가 그걸 가지고 있어!이 희귀한 재료는 성 근처에 보관되어 있습니다. 오늘날 기적을 행하는 사람은 거의 없습니다.<page>여행자님, 보셨나요?이것은 좋은 음악가의 최고의 작품이고, 그의 칼은 더 날카롭다. 기름을 줘서 시작하자.

translated_text: Shelf of souvenirs
The gift of sacred relics?

original_en_text: Welly, yay? Reconsider my offer? Your blade would gleam at my fine skill!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！改主意了？我这手艺保准让刃口锃亮！
translated_text: Was that William? Really? Have I reviewed my proposal? His sword will shine in my talents.
secondary_translated_text: 그 사람이 윌리엄이었나?진짜?제 제안서를 검토했나요?그의 칼은 내 재능에 빛날 것이다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Madam, I am sickly. Maggots of the fetid bogs beyond the moors writhe upon my shell. I would ask your aid in removing them.<page>Maggots! That’s all you bring the great Yarnaby?! My time is precious! Only for the seriously afflicted! The truly, hideously enfeebled. Bzzt!<page>Find a bench, or a bed, or a rock! It’s only rest you need. Settle yourself somewhere, and those maggots will soon wriggle themselves out of your shell.
original_zh_text: <hpage>女士，沼地的蛆虫在我壳上乱爬，请您帮忙清除。<page>蛆虫？！就为这破玩意烦本神医？！重症！我要治的是重症！惨不忍睹那种！滋滋！<page>找长椅、床铺、石头歇着去！睡一觉蛆虫自会掉光。
translated_text: <hpage>- Madam, I am sick. In the marshes outside the desert, the smell of oysters penetrated my shell. I will help you get rid of them.<page>This is a worm! Is that all I bring you? My time is precious! Only badly wounded. Real and terrible weakness. - Х м м м!<page>Look for benches, beds and stones! As soon as the worm settles somewhere, it will come out of the shell.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>- 아가씨, 저는 아팠어요.사막 밖의 습지에서 굴 냄새가 내 껍질을 뚫었다.나는 당신이 그들을 제거하는 것을 도울 것입니다.<page>이건 벌레야!내가 가져온 건 이것뿐이야?내 시간은 소중하다!심하게 다쳤을 뿐이다.진짜 그리고 끔찍한 약점. - 엠엠엠엠!<page>벤치, 침대, 돌을 찾으세요!벌레가 어딘가에 정착하자마자 껍질에서 나올 것입니다.

original_en_text: Welcome, fellow resident! Can I interest you in something special before you’re away again on your travels?
original_zh_text: 欢迎你，好邻居！出门前要不要买点特别的东西？
translated_text: Everyone is welcome! Before you travel again, Want to be interested in something special?
secondary_translated_text: 모두가 환영합니다!다시 여행하기 전에, 뭔가 특별한 것에 관심이 있으세요?

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. It seems you’ve recovered well from that silken affliction.<page>Ah! Well, I’m a clever bug. When that strange thread struck down from above, I shut up tight and huddled in my bellhome.<page>Might’ve been a problem for the others about here, but my store was flush with supplies, so no fear I’d go hungry.<hpage>Your preparedness served you well then. Although... your store now seems quite bare.<page>Ahem. Yes. I’ll admit, the wait was longer than I’d anticipated, and a bug has to eat...<page>I’ll have more to offer you once my courier turns up. No doubt he’s been avoiding Bellhart since the curse set its sights on us.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。看来你已从丝咒中恢复。<page>哈！我机灵着呢。那怪丝掉下来的时候，我立马缩进钟居紧闭门户。<page>其他虫或许遭了殃，但我存货充足，饿不着。<hpage>未雨绸缪是好事。不过……你这铺子如今空荡得很。<page>咳，是。实话说，这劫难拖得比预期久，虫总要吃饭嘛……<page>等我家送货虫回来就有新货了，那小子肯定绕着钟心镇躲灾呢。
translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, trader. You seem to have recovered from the pain of the silk.<page>¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! When a strange wire fell from above, I closed my mouth and clinged to the guards' room.<page>This may be a problem for others, but my store has plenty of supplies, so I don't have to worry about starving to death.<hpage>Your training will be very useful. At the same time, or... The shop seems empty.<page>And yet, yes, I admit that the waiting time turned out to be longer than expected, and I also had to eat insects.<page>When My messenger comes, I will give you even more. There is no doubt that he has been hiding in Berhart since the curse was cast on us.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>좋은 아침, 상인님.너는 실크의 고통에서 회복한 것 같다.<page>오, 그래!오, 네!이상한 전선이 위에서 떨어지자 나는 입을 다물고 경비원 방에 매달려 있었다.<page>이것은 다른 사람들에게는 문제가 될 수 있지만, 내 가게는 용품이 풍부하므로 굶어 죽을 걱정이 없습니다.<hpage>당신의 훈련은 매우 유용 할 것입니다.동시에, 또는...가게가 텅 비어있는 것 같다.<page>그러나 예, 기다리는 시간이 예상보다 더 길어지고 곤충을 먹어야한다는 것을 인정합니다.<page>내 사자가 올 때, 내가 너희에게 더 많은 것을 주리라.저주가 우리에게 던져진 이후로 그가 베르하트에 숨어 있었다는 것은 의심의 여지가 없다.

translated_text: Flash Flash

original_en_text: You bother me again? Begone, I said!<hpage>I ask only if you know what has happened to the bugs above us. They hang trapped in a vast snare of thread.<page>Hff. Hardly surprising. That there’s the final fate for all in Pharloom. Just come seeking a little sooner for them above.<page>Surely, oh surely, you don’t imagine your own end will be different? All that hunger, and fear, and pride, filling your fragile heart. You too are bound to end ensnared!<page>Grnk! Begone. In Pharloom, only a fool believes themselves free.
original_zh_text: 又来烦我？说了滚！<hpage>我只想问你可知上头虫子的遭遇？他们受困于邪丝之中。<page>嗤，迟早的事。纺络的众生终归此路，他们不过是早走一步。<page>难道……你觉得自己能逃过？饥渴、恐惧、傲慢塞满你那脆壳，你早晚也得落网！<page>哼！滚吧。在纺络，相信自己自由的都是蠢货。
translated_text: Are you bothering me again? - "Get out of here, " I said.<hpage>I asked the worm above if he knew what had happened and got into a big trap.<page>Jim was not surprised. The firm is the ultimate goal of every person. Come soon, please. "<page>Do you think your end will be different? Hunger, fear, and pride fill your weak heart.<page>In the Faroe Islands, it is believed that only fools are free.
secondary_translated_text: 또 나를 귀찮게 하는 거야? - "여기 나가라 " 고 나는 말했다.<hpage>나는 위의 벌레에게 무슨 일이 있었는지 알고 큰 함정에 빠졌는지 물었다.<page>짐은 놀라지 않았다.회사는 모든 사람의 궁극적 인 목표입니다.빨리 오세요, 제발"<page>당신은 당신의 결말이 다를 것이라고 생각합니까?굶주림과 두려움과 교만은 당신의 약한 마음을 채웁니다.<page>페로 제도에서는 바보들만이 자유롭다고 믿어지고 있다.

original_en_text: You want to cut them down? Hff. Yes, you look cruel enough.<page>Once the strings are cut, pain will return to them. They will remember fear and longing.<page>What a choice you make for them! Such power you grant yourself!
original_zh_text: 想斩断丝线？嗤，瞧你倒有几分机灵。<page>丝线一断，痛苦、恐惧、渴求都将复归。<page>你替他们选的好啊！好大的威风！
translated_text: Do you want to cut it? You look brutal.<page>After the rope has been cut, the pain returns to the rope. They remember their fears and desires.<page>You have made a great choice for them! I give myself that power.
secondary_translated_text: 잘라주시겠어요?넌 잔인해 보인다.<page>밧줄이 잘린 후에 통증이 밧줄로 돌아옵니다.그들은 그들의 두려움과 욕망을 기억합니다.<page>당신은 그들을 위해 좋은 선택을했습니다!나는 그 힘을 내 자신에게 준다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Pinmaster, I have acquired oil with which my needle may see further sharpening.<page>Bonva! What wonder? What wish? To steal a gift so fine. Few are the pinmasters of our age who ever worked with such a substance.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针匠，我取来磨针秘油了。<page>太好了！这等圣物，这年头还有哪个针匠能摸到这宝贝！
translated_text: <hpage>Pinmaster, there is oil to sharpen the needle.<page>Salvation, Salvation! What a miracle? What are you asking? I can't believe I got such a wonderful gift.Today very few people use this substance.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>핀마스터, 바늘을 날카롭게 할 기름이 있어요.<page>구원, 구원!무슨 기적이에요?뭐야?나는 내가 이렇게 멋진 선물을 받았다는 것을 믿을 수 없다. 오늘날 이 물질을 사용하는 사람은 거의 없다.

original_en_text: How grand! To face an opponent with a bit of energy.<page>You’re a skilled one, clear enough. I hope my training has granted some insight.
original_zh_text: 痛快！总算遇到像样的对手。<page>身手不错，我的指导对你有用吧？
translated_text: ¡How wonderful! Now he is facing a dynamic opponent.<page>You are a very competent and clear person. I hope that the training will be an incentive.
secondary_translated_text: 얼마나 멋진가!이제 그는 역동적인 상대와 마주하고 있다.<page>당신은 매우 유능하고 명확한 사람이에요.교육이 격려가 되길 바래요.

original_en_text: So rude! To raise a Pinstress from their deep meditation!<page>You carry on with that kind of brash behaviour and you’re likely to be stuck quick through!<hpage>I’m surprised to find a bug of sound mind alive in such an inhospitable place. You are a warrior learned in the blades of this land?<page>Aye! A Pinstress! Your needle there might fit you fair, strange as it is’n all, but it’s the pin that’s the glorious weapon of Pharloom.<page>Given I’m now awake, maybe you’d fancy a little training? Care to test the power of a Pinstress? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two.
original_zh_text: 无礼之徒！竟敢打断针姬的冥想！<page>再这样莽撞行事，小心被扎成筛子！<hpage>这种荒凉之地居然还有清醒的虫活着？你是学过本地兵器的战士？<page>没错！刺针才是纺络的荣耀武器——你那根怪模怪样的针虽然趁手，但终究不是正统。<page>既然醒了，要不要来练练手？想试试刺针的威力吗？说不定我这老师傅还能教你两招？
translated_text: The princess wakes up.<page>If you continue with such an arrogant attitude, you could find yourself in trouble very quickly.<hpage>I was surprised to find healthy insects living in such a deserted place. - Are you a soldier who has studied in this country?<page>Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! Your needles may be suitable for you, but it is strange, but it is the glorious weapon of the Pharaoh.<page>Now that I 'm awake, why not practice a bit? Check out the powers of the witch. Maybe this teacher can teach you something.
secondary_translated_text: 공주가 깨어나다.<page>그런 거만한 태도를 계속한다면, 당신은 매우 빨리 곤경에 처하게 될 수 있습니다.<hpage>나는 이렇게 황량한 곳에 사는 건강한 곤충을 발견한 것에 놀랐다. - 이 나라에서 공부한 군인이신가요?<page>아, 그래!아, 네!당신의 바늘은 당신에게 적합 할 수 있지만, 그것은 이상하지만, 그것은 파라오의 영광스러운 무기입니다.<page>이제 내가 깨어났으니, 좀 연습을 해볼까요?마녀의 힘을 확인해보세요.이 선생님이 당신에게 무언가를 가르쳐 줄 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: It’s a right long time since I’ve felt so vigorous. All those dulled pilgrims were useless for testing my talents.<hpage>Your blade proved an impressive challenge, Pinstress. I’ve travelled the length of this kingdom, yet the strength and skills hidden throughout continue to surprise me.<page>You bear your own strange strengths, needle bug. If only we’d met in less troubled times, just think of all we could have learned from one another!
original_zh_text: 好久没这么热血沸腾了！那些呆滞的朝圣者根本不配当陪练。<hpage>你的技艺令我惊叹。即便我走遍整个王国，仍为这里隐藏的实力感到惊讶。<page>你身上带着奇特的力量。要是我们生在太平年代，本可以互相学习！
translated_text: I haven't had that much energy in a long time - it 's not a test of my talent.<hpage>Princess Your Sword is a great challenge that I 've traveled around the kingdom, but I 'm still amazed by the hidden power and technology.<page>You have strange powers, needle worms.Think what we could know about each other if we knew each other less!
secondary_translated_text: 나는 오랫동안 그렇게 많은 에너지를 가지고 있지 않았다 - 그것은 내 재능을 시험하는 것이 아니다.<hpage>공주 당신의 검은 내가 왕국을 여행 한 위대한 도전이지만, 나는 여전히 숨겨진 힘과 기술에 놀랐다.<page>넌 이상한 힘을 가지고 있어, 바늘벌레. 우리가 서로를 덜 알고 있다면 우리가 서로에 대해 무엇을 알 수 있을지 생각해봐!

original_en_text: Bold choice, needle bug. Let’s get our shells a’shaking!
original_zh_text: 有胆识！让我们战个痛快！
translated_text: Good luck, Needleworm! Make a shell.
Training with pinstress

original_en_text: <hpage>These sands mark the edge of Pharloom’s territory. I was brought to this land through the caverns beyond.<hpage>Something at this kingdom’s height still hungers for me. Were I to flee now, I would again be pursued.<hpage>Until I find the source of that hunger, and slay it, I will not be free.
original_zh_text: <hpage>这片沙原是纺络的边界。我是穿过远处洞窟被带到此地的。<hpage>纺络的顶端仍有存在渴求着我。若此刻逃离，必将再次受到追捕。<hpage>唯有找到源头并将其斩杀，我才能获得自由。
translated_text: <hpage>The sand marks the boundaries of the territory of Faram. I came to this land through a distant cave.<hpage>In the midst of this reign, something greater awaits me. If I run now, I will be pursued again.<hpage>I cannot be free until I have found the root cause of hunger and eliminated it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>그 모래는 파람의 영토의 경계를 표시한다.나는 먼 동굴을 통해 이 땅에 왔다.<hpage>이 통치 중에 더 큰 것이 나를 기다리고 있다. 내가 지금 도망한다면, 나는 다시 쫓겨날 것이다.<hpage>나는 굶주림의 근본 원인을 발견하고 그것을 제거하기 전까지는 자유로울 수 없다.

original_en_text: Back again, needle bug? Surely you’ve more important places calling than these sandy steps?<hpage>I shan’t stay long, Pinstress. Your home and your skills offer a sense of safety rare about these lands.
original_zh_text: 还不走？没有更要紧的事要做吗？<hpage>我不会久留。不过有你这般身手，待在这里反而安全。
translated_text: "Are you back, Gort? " Is there anything more important than that ladder?<hpage>Your home and your skills will give you a sense of security that is rarely found in these countries.
secondary_translated_text: "돌아왔나, 고르트? " "이 계단보다 더 중요한 것이 있습니까? "<hpage>당신의 집과 당신의 기술은 당신에게 이러한 국가에서 거의 발견되지 않는 안전감을 줄 것입니다.

original_en_text: Find the vassal... pale It. Return them to us... Save us both from the Masters’ wrath.
original_zh_text: 找到仆从……苍白者。将其归还……平息主人怒火。
translated_text: Return to him, and deliver him from the wrath of his Lord. "
secondary_translated_text: 그에게로 돌아가서 그의 주님의 분노로부터 그를 구하라"

original_en_text: Needle bug! With those black quakes, Pharloom’s finale is fast arriving.<page>Raise your blade! Let’s see at least one of us end true to our nature!
original_zh_text: 看这黑色震动，纺络的终局将至了。<page>举针吧！至少让我们中的一个死得其所！
translated_text: With these black earthquakes, the end of the beacon is nearing.<page>Raise your knife! Let 's see if at least one person is faithful to our nature!
secondary_translated_text: 이 검은 지진으로, 비콘의 끝이 다가오고 있습니다.<page>칼을 들어올라!적어도 한 사람이 우리의 본성에 충실하는지 보자!

original_en_text: Ah ha! Needle bug! Who else would dare wake a Pinstress with such force?!<page>Saw my wish, I’m guessing? Here hopin’ to fulfill it?<hpage>I know what you are seeking, Pinstress... a death duel, an end from battle, not cavern’s collapse.<hpage>I can oblige... to a point... But a greater challenge still awaits me below.<page>Whatever else you’re about, you might be finding it futile now, needle bug. The black quakes... Pharloom’s finale arrives.<page>So let’s stop the yapping, aye! How’s ‘bout we begin? Let’s see at least one of us end true to our nature!
original_zh_text: 哈！是你！除了你谁敢这么粗暴地吵醒一名针姬！<page>看到我的祈愿了？想来帮我实现？<hpage>我知道你在渴求什么……一场死斗，你想战死而非被沙土掩埋。<hpage>我可以满足你……但下面还有更大的挑战在等着我。<page>不管你要做什么，可能都是徒劳。这黑色震动……纺络的终局将至。<page>少废话！开打吧！至少让我们中的一个死得其所！
translated_text: Oh, oh, oh! The Needworm! Who will awaken the princess with this power?<page>Do you see your desire? Do you want to stay here?<hpage>I know what I 'm looking for: a duel to the death, not the end of the battle, not the collapse of a cave.<hpage>I could say "yes. " "But in a sense, we face a bigger challenge.<page>Whatever you do, you may consider it a waste. It was a black earthquake. And this is the end of Pharaoh.<page>Let 's stop talking nonsense! What are we doing? Let 's see if at least one person is faithful to our nature!
secondary_translated_text: 오 오, 오, 오!원제 : The Needworm누가 공주를 이 힘으로 깨울 것인가?<page>당신의 욕망을 보셨나요?여기 머물고 싶니?<hpage>나는 내가 찾고있는 것을 알고 있습니다 : 전투의 끝이 아니라, 동굴의 붕괴가 아니라, 죽음의 결투.<hpage>나는 "예" 라고 말할 수 있었다. "하지만 어떤 의미에서는 더 큰 도전을 마주하고 있습니다.<page>당신이 무엇을 하든, 당신은 그것을 낭비로 간주 할 수 있습니다.그것은 검은 지진이었다.이것이 바로 파라오의 종말이다.<page>허튼소리 그만하자!우리 뭐하는 거야?적어도 한 사람이 우리의 본성에 충실하는지 보자!

original_en_text: Creature, higher... It has been sent... by Masters served... to retrieve Zi’s vassal lost?
original_zh_text: 上位者……主人派你来……回收失联仆从？
translated_text: Biology, up.Send him to the service.Return of the lost prince
secondary_translated_text: 생물학, 올라가서 그를 서비스로 보내. 잃어버린 왕자의 귀환

original_en_text: No. No. No... My saviour slain!<page>Why do you do this, cruel slasher? Why must I stay, and serve, so long, long, long?<hpage>That void must not be called, bug. Already it attacks these lands with enough force to end them. To summon it stronger will only hasten that fall.<hpage>For this moment at least, your shell is saved. It was only by wish of your steel companion, and fear of her Masters’ punishment, that I arrived in time.
original_zh_text: 不，不……我的眷属被毁了！<page>你为什么这么残忍？为什么要我永世为奴？<hpage>虚空不可被召唤。纺络已然深受其害，再度召唤只会使情况更糟。<hpage>若不是你的钢铁同伴祈愿，我又及时赶到，你必死无疑。
translated_text: No, no, no.<page>Killer, why are you doing this? Why are they needed for so long?<hpage>This bug is not called empty.They attack the earth with enough force to erase it.The mere assertion of its strength accelerates its fall.<hpage>This time, at least, the shell was preserved. By the will of my iron friend and the fear of punishment of my master, I arrived on time.
secondary_translated_text: 아니, 아니, 아니.<page>살인자, 왜 이러는거야?왜 그렇게 오래 필요한가?<hpage>이 벌레는 공허하지 않습니다. 그들은 지구를 지울 수있는 충분한 힘으로 공격합니다. 그것의 힘을 주장하는 것만으로도 그 쇠퇴를 가속화합니다.<hpage>이번에는 적어도 껍질이 보존되었다.나의 철의 친구의 의지와 나의 주인의 처벌에 대한 두려움으로, 나는 제 시간에 도착했다.

original_en_text: Gah! Bested fair, and yet you choose to stay the killing blow?<hpage>I can test you, Pinstress, and myself for what’s to come, but I will not cut you down.<hpage>Despite its quakes, Pharloom’s demise is not as certain as it seems. I shall act to change that fate.<hpage>If I succeed at my task, the land that remains will require the watch of strong bugs like you.<page>Well, ain’t you an inspiration! Makin’ me seem a right fool, here thinkin’ only on the end while you’re looking to a future fair...<page>Seems you’ve beaten me twice, needle bug, both my pin’s edge, and my heart’s resolve...
original_zh_text: 咳！你已经赢了，为什么还不动手？<hpage>我可以与你比试，但不会杀你……<hpage>纺络的命运尚有转机，我要改变它。<hpage>若我成功，幸存的世界需要你这样的强者守护。<page>你可真是乐观！显得我像个只想着末日的蠢货……<page>你赢了我两次，无论是武艺还是觉悟……
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! Oh, yes! Is it fair that you chose to stay with the fatal blow?<hpage>I can test you, Pence, and myself, but I will not forgive you.<hpage>Despite the earthquake, the death of the farm was not as certain as it may seem. I will take steps to change this fate.<hpage>If I succeed, then the rest of the Earth will have to be protected by powerful insects like you. "<page>Aren't you inspiring? You make me look like an idiot, and you think only of the last here, and you seek justice in the future ...<page>I feel like I was hit twice, the needle broke my needle and my determination.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!오, 네!당신이 치명적인 타격을 받아 머물기로 선택한 것이 공정합니까?<hpage>나는 당신과 펜스, 그리고 나 자신을 시험할 수 있지만, 당신을 용서하지 않을 것입니다.<hpage>지진에도 불구하고 농장의 죽음은 보이는 것만큼 확실하지 않았습니다.나는 이 운명을 바꾸기 위해 조치를 취할 것이다.<hpage>만약 내가 성공한다면, 나머지 지구는 당신 같은 강력한 곤충들에 의해 보호되어야 할 것입니다. "<page>당신은 영감을 주지 않나요?너는 나를 바보처럼 보이게 하고, 여기서 마지막을 생각하며, 미래에 정의를 추구한다.<page>나는 두 번 맞은 것 같았고, 바늘이 내 바늘과 결심을 깨뜨렸다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Not for your Masters, but by my own will I may aid you, Zi, as long as the path permits.<hpage>Of your vassal, I have met one before, a scurrilous, scheming sort, and well able to remain hidden.<hpage>If your own servant shares similar disposition, they may prove hard to retrieve. Where would you advise I begin my search?<page>Zi has sensed their movement... She knows their places of rest. For pale It... Zi shall mark their chart.<page>Seek the vassal... Retrieve them, or their corpse... either is appropriate... either will aid... to avoid the Masters’ wrath.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若是顺路，我会你一臂之力。但并非为了你主人，而是为了我自己。<hpage>至于那仆从，我曾遇过同类。卑劣狡诈，极善藏匿。<hpage>若你的仆从也是如此，搜寻将很困难。你觉得该从何处下手？<page>梓能感知其动向……知晓其方位……苍白者，梓会在地图标记。<page>找到仆从……无论死活……皆能平息怒火……
translated_text: <hpage>Not for your master's sake, but as far as the road permits, I can help you.<hpage>I saw one of his servants, dirty and conspiratorial, well hidden.<hpage>If your servant had similar tendencies, it can be difficult to recover.Where can I look for it?<page>He felt it, he rested.The children drew a map.<page>In search of a client.Buri them or their bodies - both are appropriate.Or you can help.To avoid the wrath of the master.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>네 주인을 위해서가 아니라, 도로가 허락하는 한, 내가 너를 도울 수 있어.<hpage>나는 그의 하인 중 한 명을 보았는데, 더럽고 음모를 꾸미고, 잘 숨겨져 있었다.<hpage>만일 당신의 종이 그와 비슷한 성향을 가지고 있다면, 회복하기가 어려울 수 있습니다.<page>그는 그것을 느꼈고, 그는 휴식을 취했다. 아이들은 지도를 그렸다.<page>고객. 그들을 묻거나 그들의 시체를 검색 - 둘 다 적절합니다. 또는 당신은 도울 수 있습니다. 마스터의 분노를 피하기 위해.

original_en_text: So rude! To raise a Pinstress from their deep meditation!<page>You carry on with that kind of brash behaviour and you’re likely to be stuck quick through!<hpage>I’m surprised to find any bug still alive in such an inhospitable place. You are a warrior learned in the blades of this land?<page>Aye! A Pinstress! Your needle there might fit you fair, but the pin that’s the glorious weapon of Pharloom, least it was... It’s sure starting to feel like Pharloom doesn’t have long left.<page>Well, given I’m now awake, and time’s suddenly short, maybe you’d fancy a little training? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two?
original_zh_text: 无礼之徒！竟敢打断针姬的冥想！<page>再这样莽撞行事，小心被扎成筛子！<hpage>这种荒凉之地居然还有活虫？你是学过本地兵器的战士？<page>没错！刺针曾是纺络的荣耀武器……虽然这王国恐怕撑不久了。<page>既然醒了又时日无多，要不要来练练手？让我这老师傅最后教你两招？
translated_text: The princess wakes up.<page>If you continue with such an arrogant attitude, you could find yourself in trouble very quickly.<hpage>I was surprised that the insects lived in such a deserted place. - Are you a soldier who has studied in this country?<page>Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! Poetic woman.Your thorn may be good for you, but the thorn is the pharaoh's glorious weapon.I don't think it's been a long time since the pharaoh left.<page>Well, I just woke up, and suddenly a while passed, so what? Why don't you practice for a while? Maybe your teacher will teach you how to do that.
secondary_translated_text: 공주가 깨어나다.<page>그런 거만한 태도를 계속한다면, 당신은 매우 빨리 곤경에 처하게 될 수 있습니다.<hpage>나는 곤충들이 이렇게 황량한 곳에 사는 것에 놀랐다. - 이 나라에서 공부한 군인이신가요?<page>아, 그래!아, 네!시인여자 너의 가시가 너에게 좋을지도 모르지만 가시는 파라오의 영광스러운 무기야 파라오가 떠난 지 오래 된 것 같아.<page>글쎄, 내가 방금 깨어났는데, 갑자기 시간이 지나갔어, 그래서?잠깐 연습을 해볼까요?어쩌면 선생님이 당신에게 그것을하는 방법을 가르쳐 줄 것입니다.

original_en_text: Off with you now, needle bug. I’ve respect for you and your sharp blade, but my hospitality shouldn’t be abused.
original_zh_text: 走吧！我敬重你和你的利刃，但别滥用我的善意。
translated_text: I respect you and your nails, but you should not abuse my hospitality.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 당신과 당신의 손톱을 존경하지만, 당신은 내 환대를 남용해서는 안된다.
