original_en_text: Dunno if you’ve heard it, needle bug, but supposedly there’s a gleaming secret hidden at this mountain’s core.<page>Meant to be a marvel, or so my sisters past once told, a giant cavern all of crystal.<hpage>I have visited the core, Pinstress. It was a remarkable site indeed. I only hope that it shall not soon be lost.<page>Course you’ve seen it! Master at the blade and at the seeking. You’ve proven yourself an imposing talent. <page>Well, given you seem done up here, maybe it’s time you get back to your all important business?
original_zh_text: 你听说过吗？山脉核心处藏着一份闪亮的秘密。<page>据前辈说是个水晶巨洞奇观。<hpage>我去过那，确实是奇观。希望它不会很快消失。<page>你果然去过！看来你找东西的本事和打架一样好。<page>既然这里的事忙完了，你该去忙正事了吧？
translated_text: I don't know if you 've heard of it before, but the needle worm in the heart of this mountain hides a bright secret.<page>At least that 's what my sisters said. "It must be a miracle, " he said," it 's a big cave, full of crystals.<hpage>I looked at the center. It is truly a wonderful place. I hope it will not be lost in the near future.<page>Of course you know! Master of swords and research. He has already demonstrated his talent.<page>Maybe it 's time to get back to the most important thing?
secondary_translated_text: 전에 들어 본 적이 있을지 모르겠지만, 이 산의 중심에 있는 바늘벌레는 밝은 비밀을 숨기고 있다.<page>적어도 내 여동생들은 그렇게 말했다.그는 "기적이야, " 라고 말했다, " 그것은 큰 동굴이고, 크리스탈이 가득 차 있다. "<hpage>나는 센터를 바라보았다.그것은 정말 멋진 장소입니다.가까운 장래에 그것이 사라지지 않기를 바랍니다.<page>물론 당신은 알고 있습니다!검과 연구의 마스터.그는 이미 재능을 보여주었다.<page>아마도 가장 중요한 일로 돌아갈 시간이었을까?

original_en_text: <page>But the seer knows nothing! Nothing of the pain. All small Sula’s to bear... To watch, watch these lands dying, slow, the bugs suffering, falling, while our shell sustains...<page>The steelhearts feel so little... but we forced to serve, we endure it all. We alone. Why?<hpage>...Others may know that pain, small bug... Or at least something similar.<page>So will you chain me again? Herd me by point of your blade, and knowingly return me to that pain?<hpage>...I will not. I will inform the child of steel of what has transpired here, but I cannot force any bug to return to a task so cruel.<page>Then, then... Sula is free? At least to run? By your mercy, bug, these legs must move, quick, quick and far, far!
original_zh_text: <page>但先知不懂痛苦！苏拉独自承受……看着大地衰亡……虫民受苦……<page>钢铁之心没有痛觉……而我们独自承受一切……为什么？<hpage>……会有其他虫了解这份痛的，小虫……或类似的苦楚。<page>你要再次禁锢我吗？用针刃逼我回到那里？<hpage>……我不会。我会告知钢铁之子真相，但不会强迫任何虫回去受苦。<page>那么……苏拉自由了？至少能逃亡？谢谢你的慈悲！我要快逃，越远越好！
translated_text: <page>The Prophet knows nothing without pain. "Every little wave has to withstand this ... Look at this land slowly drying up, the insects suffering and falling, and our shells surviving.<page>In Heart of Steel, it wasn't that important, but we were forced to serve and we endured it. "<hpage>... Others may feel pain, worms, or at least something like that.<page>Am I going back to jail? Did you pull me out with a knife and make me suffer?<hpage>... I won't tell my children what 's going on here, but I can't force the insects to perform such a cruel task.<page>Is the South free? Do I have to run at all? Poor worm, this foot must move, fast, far, far!
secondary_translated_text: <page>예언자는 고통 없이는 아무것도 모른다. "모든 작은 파도는 이것을 견뎌야 한다.이 땅이 서서히 건조되고 곤충들이 고통받고 쓰러지고 우리의 껍질이 살아남는 것을 보세요.<page>강철의 하트에서, 그것은 그렇게 중요하지 않았지만, 우리는 봉사해야했고, 우리는 그것을 견뎌 냈습니다. "<hpage>...다른 사람들은 통증이나 벌레 또는 적어도 그런 것을 느낄 수 있습니다.<page>내가 다시 감옥에 갈 거야?칼로 날 끌어내서 괴로워하게 했니?<hpage>...나는 내 아이들에게 여기서 무슨 일이 일어나고 있는지 말하지 않을 것이지만, 곤충에게 그런 잔인한 일을 강요 할 수는 없습니다.<page>남쪽은 자유롭다?내가 달릴 필요가 있어?불쌍한 벌레, 이 발은 움직여야 한다, 빨리, 멀리, 멀리!

original_en_text: Zi must watch, record... and wait... Always she is true to her function... Ore-bound... To duty.
original_zh_text: 梓必须观察、记录……等待……恪守职责。
translated_text: The violets are always visible or recorded. He is always loyal to his deposit, which is his duty.
secondary_translated_text: 바이올렛은 항상 볼 수 있거나 기록됩니다.그는 항상 예금에 충실하며, 그것이 그의 의무이다.

original_en_text: A mighty battle we had, my friend... Time now you get to your all important business. I’ll be wishing for your success.
original_zh_text: 真是场激战啊朋友……快去忙你的事吧。祝你成功。
translated_text: Ladies and gentlemen, we have had a fierce battle. It is time to start working on important things. I wish you all success.
secondary_translated_text: 신사 숙녀 여러분, 우리는 치열한 싸움을 벌였습니다.이제 중요한 일에 착수할 때입니다.여러분 모두에게 성공을 기원합니다.

original_en_text: ...Creature, higher... Its meeting. Zi’s awakening... It is not chance... It has been sent to Zi, yes? By Masters served?... To retrieve her vassal lost?
original_zh_text: ……上位者，相遇……梓苏醒……并非偶然……是主人派你来？……回收失联仆从？
translated_text: ... Advanced biology.Conference is already underway.The awakening of Violet.It's not accidental, it becomes purple, right? Really? The Master's Services? How can we get lost customers back?
secondary_translated_text: ...첨단 생물학. 회의가 이미 진행중입니다. 바이올렛의 각성. 우연이 아니죠, 보라색으로 변한 거죠?진짜?마스터의 서비스?어떻게 잃어버린 고객을 되찾을 수 있을까?

original_en_text: <hpage>Pinstress, why do you choose to live amidst these storm-swept caverns? Surely there are more hospitable places?<page>Somewhere gentler? Warmer? I’d only go soft! How else is one expected to maintain their wits?<hpage>Then this is not a place of hiding? That Citadel up top seems no friend to the free, or the strong who’d choose to remain apart.<page>...Aye. Well, yes. That too’s a reason, though one that shames me some.<page>Our grand Citadel learnt well from the training of Pinstresses past. Then it went and turned those teachings upon us!<page>Despite our superior skills, our numbers have always been few, and their strength overwhelmed.<page>Of my once revered order, only two of us remain, wormed away in Pharloom’s forgotten corners, and my pin-sibling, she’s lost herself to more peaceable pursuits.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针姬，为何要住在风暴肆虐的洞窟？没有更舒适的地方吗？<page>更舒适？更温暖？那样只会让我变迟钝！<hpage>难道是在躲避什么？圣堡似乎容不下自由的强者。<page>……确实有这个原因，说来惭愧。<page>从前圣堡向我们讨教技艺，学成后却反过来对付我们！<page>我们虽然技艺高超，但终究寡不敌众。<page>曾经备受尊崇的教团，如今只剩两个。我躲在这遗忘角落，另一位更是彻底放弃了战斗。
translated_text: <hpage>Princess, why did you choose to live in a cave devastated by a storm? Is there a more welcoming place?<page>Do you want to go to a quieter place? Warming? I am just weak! How can we maintain our wisdom?<hpage>Isn't that a place to hide? The castle above does not seem to be a friend to the free and the strong who have decided to part.<page>... Yes, yes, yes, that 's one of the reasons, there are many of us.<page>Our magnificent castle learned from the actress 's past trainings. And he imposes this lesson on us!<page>Our technology is superior, but our numbers are too small, and our strength is unbearable.<page>Under the orders I had already obeyed, we were left alone, stranded in a forgotten corner of Faram, and the brothers and sisters were lost in the more peaceful search.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>공주님, 왜 폭풍으로 황폐화된 동굴에서 살기로 하셨나요?더 환영받는 곳이 있나요?<page>좀 더 조용한 곳으로 가고 싶니?온난화?나는 단지 약하다!우리는 어떻게 지혜를 유지할 수 있습니까?<hpage>그곳은 숨길 곳이 아니니?위의 성은 떠나기로 결정한 자유롭고 강한 사람들에게는 친구가 아닌 것 같습니다.<page>...그래, 그래, 그래, 그건 이유 중 하나야. 우리 중 많은 사람들이 있어.<page>우리의 웅장한 성은 여배우의 과거의 훈련에서 배웠습니다.그리고 그는 우리에게 이 교훈을 부과한다!<page>우리의 기술은 우수하지만, 우리의 수는 너무 적고, 우리의 힘은 견딜 수 없다.<page>내가 이미 순종했던 명령에 따라 우리는 혼자 남아 있었고, 파람의 잊혀진 구석에 좌초되어 있었고, 형제 자매들은 더 평화로운 검색에서 길을 잃었습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>I cannot yet leave this land. Until I slay its source, this kingdom’s hunger for me will never abate.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我还不能离开。只要源头尚存，这国度对我的渴求不会消退。
translated_text: <hpage>If I do not kill the source of this kingdom, then the thirst for this kingdom for me will never be satisfied.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>만일 내가 이 왕국의 근원을 죽이지 않는다면, 이 왕국에 대한 나의 목마름은 결코 채워지지 않을 것이다.

original_en_text: Pale It... You would reject the role? Are you not tamed, bound, by Masters?... You would know... obedience is essential.<page>Recall, the fate of those who defy... Even you higher... Especially you higher...<page>...Compression... We have suffered it. We would never wish it upon another.
original_zh_text: 苍白者……你要违抗？你未被主宰驯服？……你该明白服从的重要性。<page>想想违抗者的下场……即便是上位者……尤其是上位者……<page>……压缩之苦……我们经历过……不愿它降临他者。
translated_text: Will you give up this role? Are you connected to the Master? As you know, listening is important.<page>Look at the fate of those who resist, even if you are old, especially if you are older.<page>... They were squeezed. Enough is enough. I don't want others to suffer the same.
secondary_translated_text: 이 역할을 포기할 것인가?당신은 마스터와 연결되나요?여러분도 알다시피, 듣는 것이 중요하다.<page>비록 나이가 많더라도 저항하는 사람들의 운명을 보라. 특히 나이가 많을 때는 더욱 그렇다.<page>...그들은 압축당했다.충분하다.나는 다른 사람들이 똑같은 고통을 겪기를 원하지 않는다.

original_en_text: Ahh, is your needle too shy to show its edge? What a shame.
original_zh_text: 呵，你的针不敢出鞘吗？真没劲。
translated_text: Are you ashamed to show your face? Unfortunately, he

original_en_text: Even my welcome has limits, needle bug.<page>I’ve become well accustomed to solitude, and it’s unnerving to play host to your strange strength overlong.
original_zh_text: 我的耐心有限。<page>独居惯了，你这种异常存在让我不安。
translated_text: Hospitality also has its limits.<page>I'm used to being alone, and I'm embarrassed to accept your strange power for so long.
secondary_translated_text: 환대에도 한계가 있다.<page>나는 혼자 있는 것에 익숙해졌어. 너의 이상한 힘을 이렇게 오랫동안 받아들이는 것이 부끄럽다.

original_en_text: Planning to hang about are you, needle bug?<page>Fancy a little training? Care to test the power of a Pinstress? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two?
original_zh_text: 暂时不打算走吗？<page>那要不要来场训练，试试刺针的威力？说不定我这老师傅还能教你两招？
translated_text: Do you want to play Needle Worms?<page>Do you want to go for training? Check out the powers of the witch. Perhaps your teacher will teach you how to do it.
secondary_translated_text: Needle Worms 을 (를) 플레이하시겠습니까?<page>너는 훈련하러 가고 싶어?마녀의 힘을 확인해보세요.어쩌면 선생님이 어떻게 할 수 있는지 가르쳐 줄 것입니다.

original_en_text: Having second thoughts on our bout, needle bug? Good! I’ll not hold back my blade, and I’ll expect the same from you.
original_zh_text: 回心转意了？很好！我不会手下留情，希望你也一样！
translated_text: Have you ever revised your date, worms? All right, all right! All right! I am not going to give up my sword, and I want you to.
secondary_translated_text: 날짜를 수정한 적 있어, 웜?좋아요, 좋아요!좋아요!나는 내 검을 포기하지 않을 것이고, 네가 포기하기를 바란다.

original_en_text: ...Bug... Higher... It has come seeking... Zi is found... She is awoken.<hpage>Greetings, child of steel. I have known your type, in past. From your presence, it is clear this land too has caught the long gaze of your Masters.<page>Masters... Yes... For them, Zi observes... obedient... always...<page>And you... a creature in half... Pale It... Bug It... old... stubborn... alone... You too are observed.
original_zh_text: ……虫……上位者……它来寻找……梓被发现了……她苏醒了。<hpage>钢铁之子，我见过你的同类。你的到来说明你的主人已将目光投向此地。<page>主人……是的……梓侍奉他们……永远服从……<page>而你……半身者……苍白者……虫身者……古老……固执……独行……你也被注视着。
translated_text: ... The insects are very tall. I went and found the boy. I woke up.<hpage>It is clear from its presence that this land also attracts the long-term interest of its owner.<page>Master, sir. That's right, sir. They've been watching him. To be obedient. I'm still...<page>And then you ... Half man and half animal. Pale. In the ancients I put a very stubborn and stubborn worm. You also observe.
secondary_translated_text: ...곤충들은 매우 키가 큽니다.나는 가서 그 소년을 찾았다.나는 깨어났다.<hpage>그 존재에서이 땅은 또한 소유자의 장기적인 관심을 끌고 있음을 분명히합니다.<page>마스터, 선생님.맞습니다, 선생님.그들은 그를 지켜보고 있었다.순종하다.난 아직도...<page>And then you ...반은 인간, 반은 동물.창백하다.고전에서 나는 매우 고집이 고집이 많은 벌레를 넣었다.당신도 관찰한다.

original_en_text: ...Creature, higher... Its meeting, Zi’s awakening... It is not chance... It has been sent, by Masters served?... To retrieve her vassal lost?<page>But no... pale It cannot.. First, a chart is needed. Pale It must acquire one. Only then can Zi provide the marks... Their vassal’s location sensed strong.
original_zh_text: ……上位者，相遇……梓苏醒……并非偶然……是主人派你来？……回收失联仆从？<page>不……苍白者……须先有地图……梓才能标记其方位……仆从感知强烈。
translated_text: ... Higher beings, meeting and awakening form is not accidental. Did God send you? How can we get lost customers back?<page>But no, it's so pale, I don't understand. First, you need a graphic. You should have a blue one and have one. Purple is the only method of marking. Your life makes people feel stronger.
secondary_translated_text: ...더 높은 존재, 만남과 각성 형태는 우연이 아닙니다.하나님이 당신을 보내셨나요?어떻게 잃어버린 고객을 되찾을 수 있을까?<page>하지만 아니, 너무 창백해서 이해가 안 돼.먼저, 당신은 그래픽이 필요합니다.파란색이 하나 있고 하나 있어야 한다.보라색은 유일한 표식 방법입니다.당신의 삶은 사람들을 더 강하게 느끼게합니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Zi, your vassal is gone, alive, fled beyond these lands.<hpage>I chose to allow their escape, even if your wish may not be granted.<page>The wish? No... pale It... Zi sensed clear your meeting... The rite... The vassal is tarnished. They have touched the dark. By the Masters, they will now be hunted... no matter the distance fled.<hpage>Perhaps, for your vassal, that is preferable? Waste here in servitude or flee free. They made their choice, and proclaimed it clear by their black action.<hpage>Their dark champion is slain, but luck or guile may yet see them survive.<page>Hope!.. Pale It... For a vassal who defies the Masters?... You give Zi a thought, complex...<page>The outcome is different... and Zi must now observe alone... but this may be the better way?<page>Zi shall accept the happening... shall pray the Masters still see her loyal... and Zi too will share the hope... that her vassal lives long unbound.
original_zh_text: <hpage>梓，你的仆从已叛逃出境。<hpage>我选择放他们走，即使这样会违背你的愿望。<page>愿望？不……苍白者……梓很清楚……仪式……仆从已玷污，触及黑暗……逃不过主人追猎。<hpage>或许他们觉得这样更好？与其在奴役中腐朽不如自由逃亡。<hpage>其黑暗眷属已除，但或许能凭机遇存活。<page>希望？……苍白者……给背叛主人的仆从？……这想法……令梓困惑……<page>结果不同……梓将独自观察……或许这是更好结局？<page>梓将接受现实……祈祷主人知晓梓忠诚……但梓也希望……她的仆从能自由活着。
translated_text: <hpage>Your servants fled this country alive.<hpage>Even if their wishes are not satisfied, I decide to run away from them.<page>Any desire? No, no, very pale. Ji Min clearly felt his meeting. The solemn vassals were already dirty. He was touching in the darkness. No matter how far you run, Master is chasing you.<hpage>Is it good for your client? Enjoy a free walk here. They made their choice and they demonstrated it in their black actions.<hpage>Their dark warriors have been killed, but luck or cunning may save them.<page>I hope that is so. ! It is hard to imagine a vassal who rebelled against his master.<page>The results have been different. Violet should be considered separately. But, is this the best way?<page>My son agreed to what had happened.The Lord of Prayer always sees His faithfulness.There is hope in the rose.His men did not stay long.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>당신의 종들은 이 나라를 살아 탈출했습니다.<hpage>그들의 소원이 충족되지 않더라도, 나는 그들을 떠나기로 결정한다.<page>어떤 소원?아니, 아니, 아주 창백해.지민은 분명히 그의 만남을 느꼈다.이미 정중한 부하들은 더러운 상태였다.그는 어둠 속에서 만지고 있었다.아무리 멀리 달려도 스승은 당신을 쫓아오고 있습니다.<hpage>그것은 당신의 고객을 위해 좋은가요?여기서 자유롭게 산책하세요.그들은 그들의 선택을 했고, 그들의 검은 행동으로 그것을 보여주었다.<hpage>그들의 어둠의 전사는 죽었지만, 행운이나 교활함이 그들을 구할 수 있습니다.<page>나는 그것이 그렇게 되기를 바라고있다. !그의 주인에게 반역한 부하를 상상하기는 어렵다.<page>그 결과는 다르다.바이올렛은 별도로 고려되어야합니다.하지만, 이게 가장 좋은 방법인가요?<page>내 아들은 일어난 일에 동의했다. 기도의 주님은 항상 그의 충실함을 본다. 장미에는 희망이 있다. 그의 부하들은 오래 머물지 않았다.

original_en_text: For your talents, needle bug, in blade and strength... and restraint, take this emblem of my order.<page>Hadn’t ever thought another’d be joining our slim ranks, but you’re as deserving a member as’s ever come before.
original_zh_text: 为你的武艺、觉悟……和克制，收下我们教团的徽章吧。<page>没想到还会有新成员加入，但你当之无愧。
translated_text: O needle worm, your talent is in sword and strength. Take my command sign.<page>"I didn't expect anyone to join our elite team, but you deserve more than ever to be a part of it. "
secondary_translated_text: 바늘벌레야, 네 재능은 칼과 힘에 있다.내 명령 표지판을 가져오다.<page>"나는 누구도 우리 엘리트 팀에 합류할 것으로 기대하지 않았지만, 당신은 그 어느 때보다도 그 팀의 일부가 될 자격이 있습니다. "

original_en_text: <hpage>I will not flee. I cannot abandon the kingdom to a collapse of my making.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不会逃走。不能任由下方王国因我而崩塌。
translated_text: <hpage>I had no intention of fleeing. I cannot give up my kingdom for the sake of my creation.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 도망갈 의도는 없었다.나는 나의 창조물을 위해 나의 왕국을 포기할 수 없다.

original_en_text: Creature, higher... return when a chart is acquired. A chart is needed, essential, to serve the Masters... to aid Zi.
original_zh_text: 上位者……取得地图再来……图是侍奉主人……协助梓的必要之物。
translated_text: Advanced biology. Take the letter and come back. In order to serve the Masters, a map is necessary and is essential. Help.
secondary_translated_text: Advanced Biology 입니다.편지를 가져와 돌아오라.마스터들에게 봉사하기 위해서는 지도가 필요하고 필수적이다.도와주세요.

original_en_text: Ahh... Shame. Surely battle’d be the better end, no?<page>If not by blade, we’ll just have to accept whatever conclusion this new quaking calamity flings upon our heads.
original_zh_text: 唉……真遗憾。战死本是更好的结局不是吗？<page>既然不能战死，我们就只能接受这黑暗带来的结局了。
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! This battle will have a better ending.<page>Without a leaf, we can only accept the conclusion that this new shocking catastrophe has befallen us.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!이 싸움은 더 좋은 결말을 맺을 것이다.<page>한 잎도 없이, 우리는 이 새로운 충격적인 재앙이 우리에게 닥쳤다는 결론을 받아들일 수밖에 없다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Cease your summoning, fool bug!<hpage>Though you may yearn for freedom, that saviour you hope to call will bring only death.
original_zh_text: <hpage>停止召唤，蠢虫！<hpage>即便你渴求自由，那救赎者也只会带来死亡。
translated_text: <hpage>Don't call me stupid anymore.<hpage>You may desire freedom, but the Savior you wish to call upon will bring only death.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>더 이상 나를 바보라고 부르지 마라.<hpage>여러분은 자유를 갈망할 수도 있지만, 여러분이 부르고 싶은 구주께서는 오직 죽음을 가져올 뿐입니다.

original_en_text: It’s a right long time since I’ve felt so vigorous. All those dulled pilgrims are useless for testing my talents.<hpage>Your blade proved an impressive challenge, Pinstress. The strength and skills hidden about this kingdom continue to surprise me.<page>You bear your own strange strengths, needle bug. More I think than you’d be willing to reveal to me.<page>What, I wonder, are you planning to turn all that power towards?
original_zh_text: 好久没这么热血沸腾了！那些呆滞的朝圣者根本不配当陪练。<hpage>你的技艺令我惊叹。这王国暗藏的实力总是出乎意料。<page>你身上带着奇特的力量，用针的。远不止你愿意展示的这些吧？<page>我很好奇，你打算用这力量做些什么？
translated_text: I haven't had that much energy for a long time, and all the boring pilgrims won't be able to experience my talent. "<hpage>The Princess of Your Sword is a great challenge, and you will continue to marvel at the hidden power and abilities of this kingdom.<page>You have strange powers, needle worms. I don't mean it.<page>Where are you transferring power?
secondary_translated_text: 나는 오랫동안 그렇게 많은 에너지를 가지고 있지 않았고, 모든 지루한 순례자들은 내 재능을 경험할 수 없을 것입니다. "<hpage>당신의 검의 공주는 위대한 도전이며, 당신은이 왕국에 숨겨진 힘과 능력에 계속 놀라게 될 것입니다.<page>너 이상한 힘이 있어, 바늘벌레야.난 그런 뜻이 아니야.<page>당신은 어디에서 전력을 옮기고 있습니까?

original_en_text: No. No. No... My champion slain!<page>Why do you do this, cruel slasher? Why must I stay, and serve, so long, long, long?<hpage>That void must not be called, bug. Not ever. None can control it, though many have tried. <hpage>Any strength you hoped it offered would fast be proven false.<hpage>Consider yourself fortunate I arrived in time. Your shell is saved, all by wish of your steel companion, and fear of her Masters’ punishment.
original_zh_text: 不，不……我的眷属被毁了！<page>你为何如此残忍？为何要我永世为奴？<hpage>虚空不可驾驭，故不可召唤，这是无数血泪换来的教训。<hpage>无论你指望能从它身上获取什么力量，你都会后悔。<hpage>你该庆幸我来得及时。若不是你的钢铁同伴祈愿，你必死无疑。
translated_text: They're not dead, our soldiers are dead.<page>Killer, why are you doing this? Why are they needed for so long?<hpage>This error is not called empty. Many have tried, but no one has been able to control them.<hpage>The power you want to give will soon be wrong.<hpage>I am glad that you arrived on time. His body was saved. This is the will of his iron companion and the fear of the punishment of his Lord.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 죽지 않았어, 우리 군인들은 죽었다.<page>살인자, 왜 이러는거야?왜 그렇게 오래 필요한가?<hpage>이 오류는 비어 있지 않습니다.많은 사람들이 시도했지만 아무도 그들을 통제 할 수 없었습니다.<hpage>당신이 주려고 하는 힘은 곧 잘못될 것이다.<hpage>제시간에 도착해서 기쁘다.그의 시체는 구원받았다.이것은 그의 철의 동반자의 뜻이며 그의 주님의 벌에 대한 두려움이라

original_en_text: <hpage>If I chose to head beyond, I would abandon Pharloom to a collapse of my making.<hpage>While I live, and still possess the strength to act, I will not allow that end to come to pass.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若我选择逃离，下方王国将因我而崩塌。<hpage>只要力气尚存，我绝不容许这样的结局。
translated_text: <hpage>If I had decided to transcend, I would have given up Falun and my career would have collapsed.<hpage>As long as I 'm alive and I can still play, I won't let that happen. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>만약 내가 초월하기로 결정했다면, 나는 파룬을 포기했을 것이고, 나의 경력은 무너졌을 것이다.<hpage>내가 살아 있고, 내가 여전히 플레이할 수 있는 한, 나는 그런 일이 일어나도록 내버려두지 않을 것이다. "

original_en_text: Dunno if you’ve heard it, needle bug, but supposedly there’s a gleaming secret hidden at this mountain’s core.<page>Meant to be a marvel, or so my sisters past once told, a giant cavern all of crystal.<page>If you’re hanging around these heights, and time’s allowing, maybe you’ll get to seeking it?<page>Course you’d first have to find the entrance, but you’ve certainly shown the skills to wriggle up in there, provided you’re so inclined.
original_zh_text: 你听说过吗？山脉核心处藏着一份闪亮的秘密。<page>据前辈说是个水晶巨洞奇观。<page>要是有时间不妨去找找？<page>当然得先找到入口，不过以你的身手肯定没问题。
translated_text: I don't know if you 've heard of it before, but the needle worm in the heart of this mountain hides a bright secret.<page>At least that 's what my sisters said. "It must be a miracle, " he said," it 's a big cave, full of crystals.<page>If you 've ever been at this altitude, if the weather allows, you can look for it.<page>Of course, you have to find your way first, but if you had to, you would undoubtedly test your tracking skills there.
secondary_translated_text: 전에 들어 본 적이 있을지 모르겠지만, 이 산의 중심에 있는 바늘벌레는 밝은 비밀을 숨기고 있다.<page>적어도 내 여동생들은 그렇게 말했다.그는 "기적이야, " 라고 말했다, " 그것은 큰 동굴이고, 크리스탈이 가득 차 있다. "<page>이 고도에 가본 적이 있다면, 날씨가 허락한다면 찾아볼 수 있다.<page>물론, 당신은 먼저 당신의 길을 찾아야하지만, 당신이해야한다면, 당신은 의심 할 여지없이 거기에서 당신의 추적 기술을 테스트 할 것입니다.

original_en_text: <page>A small gift for you, pale It... for the thought, complex... rock of the home spear... and of Zi’s birth. May it aid your further action in this land.
original_zh_text: <page>苍白者，赠礼……为感谢你给的希望……梓诞生故土的岩石……愿它助你在此地的行动。
translated_text: <page>A small gift masks you.Think about the complexity.Home, Lance Rock and the birth of his son, which helps us take extra steps in this country. "
secondary_translated_text: <page>작은 선물은 당신을 마스크합니다. 복잡성에 대해 생각해보십시오. 홈, 랜스 록과 그의 아들의 탄생은 우리가이 나라에서 추가 단계를 밟는 데 도움이됩니다. "

original_en_text: Off with you now, needle bug! A Pinstress of my substantial talent requires their deep meditation, especially after such a satisfying bout.<hpage>Goodbye, Pinstress. May your blade remain sharp.
original_zh_text: 走吧！针姬需要继续冥想——激烈战斗后更需要静修。<hpage>再会，愿你的锋芒永不褪色。
translated_text: - A talented singer like me needs deep meditation, especially after such a satisfactory start.<hpage>Farewell, Princess. Keep your knives aimed at.
secondary_translated_text: - 나 같은 재능있는 가수는 깊은 명상이 필요합니다. 특히 그런 만족스러운 시작 후에.<hpage>안녕, 공주님.칼을 겨냥해 두어라.

original_en_text: Ho, miss! How’s all this then? Lotta dials to be trackin’, but at least the controls seem in good order.<page>From here, I can guide your bell down, best as any bug.<page><hpage>Then you’ve no prior experience with this type of transport?<page>No one does, miss! Them’s who used to dive’re all long dead, or cursed ta half life. An’ there ain’t no bug left alive’s been brave or stupid enough to try... ‘til now, at least.<page>I’ll work it best’s I can. Can’t do much more, I’m afraid. At least the forgings of these docks were built to last. Now we’s only gotta pray they hold for you.<page>Here’s the key that’ll see you inside its metal belly. Pop in there once you’re feelin’ good and ready. In the meantime, I’ll get to seeing things set up here.
original_zh_text: 嚯，小姐！这玩意儿够复杂的！仪表盘多得数不过来，好在操控装置还算正常。<page>我能在这儿引导潜钟下潜，保准比任何虫子都靠谱。<page><hpage>这么说，你从没操作过这种器械？<page>谁都没这种经验，小姐！以前开潜钟的早死绝了，剩下的也半死不活。活着的虫里，就没有哪个又疯又蠢的敢用这玩意……直到现在。<page>我会尽力而为，但别的可不敢打包票。好在码头造的这家伙够结实，现在只能祈祷它下潜后不会出什么故障。<page>这是这个大铁肚子的钥匙。等你准备好了就钻进去。我这就去把装置整备妥当。
translated_text: Oh my lady! Then, What Happened? The rotanob continues, but at least the team seems to be fine.<page>From there I can lower your bells, better than any worm.<page><hpage>Did you use this car?<page>- No one does that, ma 'am. Those who dive into the water are dead or cursed half-alive. The worm was not alive and challenged him, bold and stupid. At least so far,<page>At least the construction of these ports is sustainable. All I can do is pray that they will support you.<page>This is the key to penetrating the metallic stomach. When you feel good and ready, do it. And until I see all this here.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 내 아가씨!그럼 무슨 일이 있었나?로타노브는 계속되고 있지만 적어도 팀은 괜찮은 것 같다.<page>거기에서 나는 당신의 종을 낮출 수 있습니다, 어떤 벌레보다 더 나은.<page><hpage>이 차를 사용하셨습니까?<page>- 아무도 그렇게 하지 않아요, 부인.물에 빠진 사람들은 죽거나 반살아 저주받는다.벌레는 살아있지 않았고, 대담하고 멍청한 그에게 도전했다.적어도 지금까지는,<page>적어도 이 항구 건설은 지속가능하다.내가 할 수 있는 것은 그들이 당신을 지원하기를 기도하는 것뿐입니다.<page>이것이 금속속속을 뚫는 열쇠이다.기분이 좋아서 준비되면 해봐. 그리고 내가 여기 있는 모든 것을 볼 때까지.

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, I have acquired a power that will enable me to end this black madness. Soon I will act to stop the quakes and save this land.<page>Excellent, pointy bug. Your drive, and your vigour, both have proven surprisingly large for one so small.<page>Know we have heard from Ballow, who told of his repair efforts upon the diving bell below. By now, that task is likely completed.<page>If you are hoping to put his work to the test, then we shall wish again on your survival. And if our own service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我已获取终结这场黑灾所需的力量。终结动荡、拯救这片地区就在此一举。<page>啧，好家伙！小尖头虫，没想到你个头不大，魄力和干劲倒是真不小。<page>听巴洛说，他底下那口老破钟修得差不多了。这会儿多半已经完工。<page>想试试那家伙的成果？那咱还得再一次祝你好运。要是咱这熔炉里的功夫能帮上忙，甭客气，照旧伺候着！
translated_text: <hpage>Thanks to my daughter 's training, I have gained the strength to put an end to this black madness. I will take immediate action to stop the earthquake and save Earth.<page>For such a small man I found that their energy and energy is surprisingly large.<page>Upon learning that he had received a letter from Barlow, he described the work on repairing the underwater clock as follows: "At this point the task may have been accomplished.<page>If you want to experience your work, I hope you will experience it again.If our exclusive services meet your basic needs, we will continue to provide them.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>내 딸의 훈련 덕분에 나는 이 검은 광기를 끝낼 수 있는 힘을 얻었다.나는 지진을 막고 지구를 구하기 위해 즉시 조치를 취할 것이다.<page>그런 작은 사람에게는 그들의 에너지와 에너지가 놀랍도록 크다는 것을 발견했습니다.<page>바로우로부터 편지를 받았다는 것을 알게 된 그는 수중 시계를 수리하는 일을 다음과 같이 설명했습니다. "이 시점에서 작업은 완료되었을 것입니다.<page>당신이 당신의 일을 경험하고 싶다면, 나는 당신이 그것을 다시 경험하기를 바랍니다. 우리의 독점적인 서비스가 당신의 기본적인 요구를 충족한다면, 우리는 그들을 계속 제공 할 것입니다.

original_en_text: Erm, you may notice your prize there is a little light, my lady...<page>Awful truth is, you’ve cleaned us out. We’ve not a single measly rosary left between us. Turns out we were just no match for you!<hpage>It was a game fairly played, sir, though I’ve no wish to see you destitute. Would you like to make another kind of wager, perhaps?
original_zh_text: 呃，您可能会觉得这次的奖品有点寒酸，女士……<page>实话说，您把我们家底都赢光了。半颗念珠都不剩！我们根本不是您对手！<hpage>先生，游戏确实公平公正，但我也不想见你倾家荡产。要不要换个赌注？
translated_text: You may have already noticed that their price is a little shiny.<page>The terrible truth is that you have deprived us. There is no Rosary between us. We are not your enemies! "<hpage>It 's a fair game, but I don't want him to go bankrupt. Why not make a bet?
secondary_translated_text: 아마 당신은 이미 그들의 가격이 약간 빛나는 것을 알아 차렸을 것입니다.<page>무서운 진실은 당신이 우리를 박탈했다는 것입니다.우리 사이에는 로자리가 없습니다.우리는 너의 적이 아니다! "<hpage>공정한 게임이지만, 나는 그가 파산하는 것을 원하지 않는다.왜 내기를 하지 않나요?

original_en_text: Grfff... So it’s gotten that bad, aye? I guess... If that’s how it is, I’ll be your bug.<page>Meet me below, at the diving bell. We’ll see if I can get you ready for the drop.
original_zh_text: <page>嘶……已经糟到这地步了？行吧……如果真是这样，那我帮你。<page>去潜钟底下碰头，我看能不能给你整备好。
translated_text: And then it got worse, right? Really? I think it's... If so, then this is your BAP.<page>Check out the clock below. We will help you prepare your plane.
secondary_translated_text: 그리고 나서 더 나빠졌죠, 그렇죠?진짜?내 생각엔...만약 그렇다면, 이것은 당신의 BAP 입니다.<page>아래의 시계를 보세요.우리는 당신이 비행기를 준비하는 데 도움이 될 것입니다.

original_en_text: Holler when you’re ready, miss. The upgrades are done. That bell’s as ready as it’ll ever be.
original_zh_text: 准备好了就喊我一声，小姐。升级已经完成，这只潜钟现在状态绝佳。
translated_text: When you're ready, scream. The update is complete. Bell was ready.
secondary_translated_text: 준비되면 비명을 지르세요.업데이트가 완료되었습니다.벨은 준비되어 있었다.

original_en_text: Ahhh... Can you feel it yet? All your troubles dripping away...
original_zh_text: 啊哈……感觉到了吗？烦心事都在随着汗液滴落……
translated_text: ¡Oh, yeah! Did you hear this? All your problems will disappear.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 그래!이거 들었어?당신의 모든 문제는 사라질 것입니다.

original_en_text: The deposits around here, those long-burning rocks. They’re useful to the Citadel, in whatever their shadowy business, but useless if you require tools of us!<page>We need finer material. Rare metal. Pharloom would provide a bounty to the able explorer. Find us some, and we’ll build your violent aids.
original_zh_text: 储备在附近的长效燃烧石？圣堡那帮虫子拿去搞些见不得虫的勾当倒合适，对我们来说屁用没有！<page>去找些更好、更稀有的金属！只要你有本事，纺络遍地都是是宝贝。找着了，我们就有办法给你造那些家伙什。
translated_text: The surrounding sediments are stones that have been burned long ago. They are useful in the castle, even in your secret business, but not if you need our tools!<page>A beacon of rare metals offers a reward to competent researchers.Find something for us and help violence. "
secondary_translated_text: 주변 퇴적물은 오래 전에 타버린 돌이다.그들은 당신의 비밀 사업에도 성에서 유용하지만, 우리의 도구가 필요한 경우에는 그렇지 않습니다!<page>희금속의 비콘은 유능한 연구자에게 보상을 제공합니다. 우리를 위해 무언가를 찾아 폭력에 도움을줍니다. "

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Our lady has missed her mark, and so thusly ends our challenge!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！这位女士脱靶了，挑战结束！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Hey, hey, hey! We missed the goal, so the challenge is over!
secondary_translated_text: 이봐 이봐 이봐이봐, 이봐!우리는 목표를 놓쳤고, 도전은 끝났다!

translated_text: ... The ISS is... Forever and ever. research. He's sybil.

original_en_text: My lady, I pray you reconsider! T’would be an honour to see those strong limbs of yours in action, truly!
original_zh_text: 女士，再考虑考虑吧！要是能见识到您矫健的风姿，定会是我们的荣幸！
translated_text: We are praying for a review! It 's a great honor to see your strong participants!
secondary_translated_text: 우리는 리뷰를 위해 기도합니다!여러분들의 강력한 참가자들을 만나게 되어 영광입니다!

original_en_text: A respectable enough effort, truly. You didn’t earn enough rosaries to make a profit off us, but that should only spur you on to try again!
original_zh_text: 表现非常不错！虽然赚的念珠还不够回本，或许正好能激励您再试一次！
translated_text: You haven't earned enough retail to take advantage of us yet, but it will make you challenge yourself again!
secondary_translated_text: 당신은 아직 우리를 이용하기에 충분한 소매를 벌지 못했지만, 그것은 당신이 다시 도전하게 할 것입니다!

original_en_text: An old diving bell. Its door is shut tight by an ornate clamp.
original_zh_text: 一具古旧的潜钟，钟门被一只华丽的夹钳紧紧锁闭。
translated_text: Lovely old clock! The door closes with a beautiful clip.
secondary_translated_text: 귀여운 오래된 시계문은 아름다운 클립으로 닫힙니다.

original_en_text: The diving bell’ll be ready again soon, miss. Once this new shield-shell is fitted, it’ll surely withstand the drop!.. Surely!
original_zh_text: 潜钟很快就能再用，小姐。新护壳装好后绝对能扛住下坠！绝对！
translated_text: The clock will be ready soon, ma 'am. When you install the new shield, you can withstand the fall. Yes, no!
secondary_translated_text: 시계가 곧 준비될 것입니다, 부인.새 방패를 설치하면 낙하를 견딜 수 있습니다.그래, 안돼!

translated_text: ... the way. Arnold AP Communications.Uh, uh, uh... Epar. Olly... from the ISS.
secondary_translated_text: ... The Way.아놀드 AP 통신.에파르.올리... ISS 에서.

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Hey, hey, hey! It's time to play! When you see the target, take a straight nail and hit it!
secondary_translated_text: 이봐 이봐 이봐이봐, 이봐!이제 놀아볼 시간입니다!목표물을 본다면, 똑바로 못을 잡고 그것을 쳐라!

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I require a moment. Please unlock the bell for me.<page>Aye. Can do, miss. Hail me again when you’re ready to travel.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我还需要点时间。麻烦打开钟门。<page>没问题，小姐。等您准备妥当了，再喊我一声就行。
translated_text: <hpage>I need some time. Please ring the bell. "<page>- You can, lady. When you are ready to travel, be happy.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>시간이 좀 필요해.벨을 울려주세요. "<page>- 할 수 있습니다, 아가씨.여행할 준비가 되면 행복해지세요.

original_en_text: Here to sweat away your sorrows, miss? The steam does wonders for a mind set sullen, or a shell gone stiff.<hpage>I’ve found these lowlands hot enough already, and mine is a shell more resilient than most.<hpage>To challenge that further seems a unique sort of madness.<page>Aye, well, this is Pharloom, miss! Madness is catching. I’d say this here’s the smallest form of it.
original_zh_text: 有烦心事吗，小姐？来蒸桑拿吧，蒸汽对郁结的心绪或僵硬的甲壳有奇效。<hpage>我倒觉得这里已经够热了，何况我这副甲壳比多数虫子都硬实。<hpage>热上加热，怕不是疯得别致。<page>哎，这儿可是纺络，小姐！疯病是会传染的。要我说，在这蒸桑拿算最轻的症状了。
translated_text: Are you here for the sweat? Steam is great for depressed people and hard shells.<hpage>I have found these plains quite warm, and my sink is more elastic than most places.<hpage>To argue further seems crazy.<page>- It is light, lady. Madness attracts people to it. It is the smallest form.
secondary_translated_text: 땀을 흘리기 위해 온 거야?증기는 우울한 사람들과 단단한 껍질에 적합합니다.<hpage>나는 이 평야들이 상당히 따뜻하다는 것을 발견했고, 나의 싱크대는 대부분의 장소들보다 더 탄력적이었다.<hpage>더 많은 논쟁은 미친 것처럼 보입니다.<page>- "가벼워요, 아가씨.광기는 사람들을 끌어들이고, 그것은 가장 작은 형태입니다.

original_en_text: What an honour it was to play with you, my lady! I hope you’ll think of us whenever you feel those rosaries rattling around in your pockets.
original_zh_text: 与您同乐实乃荣幸！希望您摸着兜里的念珠时能想起我们。
translated_text: It's nice to play with you! Every time you feel the pain of the Rosary in your pocket, think of us.
secondary_translated_text: 당신과 놀 수 있어서 너무 좋아요!주머니에 있는 묵주기도의 고통을 느낄 때마다 우리를 생각하십시오.

translated_text: Cancel the shipment?

original_en_text: There is no choice! Not for us. We cannot leave, not ever. We are a Forge Daughter, fixed to this forge and its service. Ours is a duty lifetime bound.
original_zh_text: 没得选！从来就没得选。咱是熔炉之女，生来就和这熔炉缔结了契约。使命在身，至死方休。
translated_text: We have no choice, and we do not deserve it. We educate our daughters and dedicate ourselves to this blacksmith and his services. Our responsibility is for life.
secondary_translated_text: 우리는 선택의 여지가 없으며, 그럴 자격이 없습니다. 우리는 딸들을 교육하고 이 대장장과 그의 봉사에 헌신합니다.우리의 책임은 삶에 대한 것입니다.

original_en_text: If you’re planning passage below, Ballow’s the one to assist you. We must remain by the forge, always.
original_zh_text: 若想下潜，去找巴洛帮忙。咱得永远守着熔炉。
translated_text: If you 're at the bottom, Burlow is the one to help you.
secondary_translated_text: 만약 당신이 바닥에 있다면, 버로우가 당신을 도울 것입니다.

original_en_text: Oh! Pointy bug, why do you bother us at our work? The world cracks and quakes to some grave new calamity, surely you should seek somewhere safer?<hpage>As far as I might flee, I suspect no such place exists, and in any case, I would not see this land’s bugs abandoned to their end.<hpage>What of you? Why do you choose to remain so diligent at your task, given the fell state of your lands?
original_zh_text: 哟！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰咱干活？外面又闹起什么灾祸，搞得地动山摇，你该找个安全地儿躲躲才对啊？<hpage>恐怕无论逃到哪里，都无处可避。更何况，我不愿抛下此地生灵，让它们无力地面对终结来临。<hpage>你们呢？既然明白此地危在旦夕，为何还要死守这熔炉？
translated_text: Oh! Oh! "It 's a bug, isn't it? Why are you interfering with our work? The world is falling apart, earthquakes are occurring, new great disasters are occurring.<hpage>As far as I can escape, I doubt that such a place does not exist, and yet I will not see the insects of this earth being abandoned to the end.<hpage>How do you do that? Why did you work so hard when your country was in decline?
secondary_translated_text: 오! 오!오! 오! "그건 벌레야, 그렇지?왜 우리 일에 간섭하는 거야?세상은 무너지고 지진이 발생하고 새로운 큰 재난이 발생하고 있습니다.<hpage>내가 탈출할 수 있는 한, 나는 그런 곳이 존재하지 않는 것을 의심하지만, 그럼에도 불구하고 나는 이 땅의 곤충들이 끝까지 버려지는 것을 보지 못할 것이다.<hpage>당신은 어떻게 그것을 할 수 있습니까?당신 나라가 쇠퇴하고 있을 때 왜 그렇게 열심히 일하셨습니까?

original_en_text: Oh! Small pointy bug, why do you bother us at our work?<hpage>The sound of your craft called me to investigate. What is your duty here? Are you a smith of some kind?
original_zh_text: 嘿！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰我们干活？<hpage>你们的锻打声引我前来。你们在这儿做些什么？可是铁匠？
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Small, sharp insects: Why do they interfere with our work?<hpage>The noise of his ship made me investigate.What is your mission here? Is this Smith?
secondary_translated_text: 오! 오!오! 오!작고 날카로운 곤충 : 왜 그들은 우리의 일을 방해합니까?<hpage>그의 배의 소음이 나를 조사하게 했다. 여기서 당신의 임무는 무엇입니까?이 사람이 스미스야?

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!<page>If you can strike the target fifteen times, the prize is yours!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！<page>击中靶子十五次，奖品就是您的！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Hey, hey, hey! It's time to play! When you see the target, take a straight nail and hit it!<page>If you have reached your goal 15 times, the prize is yours!
secondary_translated_text: 이봐 이봐 이봐이봐, 이봐!이제 놀아볼 시간입니다!목표물을 본다면, 똑바로 못을 잡고 그것을 쳐라!<page>목표에 15 번 도달하면 상은 당신의 것입니다!

original_en_text: A smith? Hardly so crude! We are Forge Daughter! How can a pointy bug not tell?<page>Ours is the ancient line and honoured role. These docks and lands around are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you are as talented as you suggest, would you lend me your aid? I’ve lacked for my usual tools, and I suspect you could craft fine replacements.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then we’ll construct them. But! You’ll provide the materials, and compensation for our time.
original_zh_text: 铁匠？太掉价了！我们可是熔炉之女！你竟然不认识我们？我们祖传的手艺让整个深坞都沾光！<hpage>若你们的技艺真如你所夸耀那样好，可否帮我个忙？我的一些工具没有了，我想你们应该能打造合用的替代品。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>有些可能是你没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那咱就造出来给你看。但材料你得自备，工钱也得结清。
translated_text: How about Smith? It 's not so red. We are children of creation. Why can't we see insects?<page>Our path is an ancient path and a document of honor.These ports and the lands that surround them, fortunately have our experience.<hpage>If you 're as talented as you say, will you help me? I lack a universal tool, and you can't make a good replacement.<page>Latvians and traps? I know my boyfriend.<hpage>Is this a rarity in our country? Some of them create serious problems for the process.<page>Hoon-hoon! ! I do it, but! ! You provide us with equipment and compensation for our time.
secondary_translated_text: 스미스는 어때?그렇게 빨강은 아니야.우리는 창조의 자녀들이다.왜 곤충을 볼 수 없나요?<page>우리의 길은 고대 경로이며 명예의 문서입니다. 이 항구와 그 주변의 땅은 다행히도 우리의 경험을 가지고 있습니다.<hpage>네가 말한 대로 재능이 있다면, 나를 도와줄래?나는 보편적 인 도구가 부족하고, 당신은 좋은 대체를 만들 수 없습니다.<page>라트비아와 함정?내 남자친구를 알아.<hpage>우리나라에서는 이런 일이 드문 일인가요?그들 중 일부는 과정에 심각한 문제를 만듭니다.<page>쿤쿤! !나는 그것을하지만! !당신은 우리에게 장비와 우리의 시간에 대한 보상을 제공합니다.

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!<page>If you can strike the target twenty-five times, the prize is yours!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！<page>击中靶子二十五次，奖品就是您的！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Hey, hey, hey! It's time to play! When you see the target, take a straight nail and hit it!<page>If you reach your goal 25 times, the prize is yours!
secondary_translated_text: 이봐 이봐 이봐이봐, 이봐!이제 놀아볼 시간입니다!목표물을 본다면, 똑바로 못을 잡고 그것을 쳐라!<page>목표에 25 번 도달하면 상은 당신의 것입니다!

original_en_text: Well, perhaps that’s enough games for now, eh?<page>We’ll need to come up with a much trickier challenge to best you, my lady!
original_zh_text: 好吧，我想就先玩到这里为止？<page>我们得琢磨个更刁钻的挑战才能赢过您，女士！
translated_text: That 's enough for the game right now, isn't it? What?<page>We must face an even more difficult task to defeat you, my lady! "
secondary_translated_text: 지금 이 게임은 충분하죠, 그렇죠?뭐야?<page>우리는 당신을 물리 치기 위해 더욱 어려운 과제에 직면해야 합니다, 부인! "

original_en_text: This world may not have long, but we shall face its end still delivering our duty.
original_zh_text: 这世界或许时日无多，但咱就算直面末日也要把活干完。
translated_text: Peace may not last long, but we will take responsibility and we will take responsibility with it.
secondary_translated_text: 평화는 오래 지속되지 않을 수도 있지만, 우리는 책임을 지고, 우리는 그것과 함께 책임을 지게 될 것입니다.

original_en_text: To maintain one’s tools is a constant task. These shards should be kept close when you travel, that you can repair and replenish as the need arises.
original_zh_text: 保养工具需要持之以恒。旅程中应当随身携带这些碎片，以便随时进行修理和补充。
translated_text: Equipment maintenance is a constant task. Keep it nearby during the trip so that repairs and deliveries can be made when needed.
secondary_translated_text: 장비의 유지보수는 지속적인 작업입니다.필요한 경우 수리 및 배달을 할 수 있도록 여행 중에 근처에 보관하십시오.

original_en_text: Pop inside the diving bell once you’re feelin’ good and ready. In the meantime, I’ll get to seeing things set up here.
original_zh_text: 这是这个大铁肚子的钥匙。等你准备好了就钻进去。我这就去把装置整备妥当。
translated_text: When you feel good and ready, you jump right to the dive bell.
secondary_translated_text: 기분이 좋아서 준비되면 다이빙 벨으로 바로 뛰어 들 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: A vicious stabbing trap? We can build it. Just know, it disturbs us, these devious implements you conceive to kill.
original_zh_text: 带尖刃的陷阱是吧？能造。但你得知道，我们可不喜欢鼓捣这些阴险的杀戮工具。
translated_text: A bad injury? Know that you will annoy us with this stealth tool that you want to kill.
secondary_translated_text: 나쁜 부상?당신이 죽이고 싶은이 스텔스 도구로 우리를 짜증나게 할 것이라는 것을 알고 있습니다.

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Welcome, my lady, so glad you found us here! I can see you’re blessed with strong limbs and keen sight.<page>Fond of frolics are you? Keen to test your aim? We’d be right honoured to play a little game with you. A little test of skill we’ve set up.<hpage>I’ve no need to test my skills, sir, nor do I have time for frivolities.<page>Oh, but we’d make it worth your while! A prize awaits you, if you can meet our challenge!<hpage>If you offer a prize, that changes matters. I can meet any challenge if the reward is sufficient. What are the rules of your game?<page>Exceedingly simple, my lady! I’ll provide the pins for throwing, and my associate will provide a target. Hit the target fifteen times and you’ll earn yourself a worthy prize!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！欢迎大驾光临！真高兴您找到这儿！一看您就是肢强目锐的虫。<page>喜欢玩游戏吗？要不要来试试准头？我们设计了个小游戏，可以考验您的技巧。<hpage>先生，我无需试炼技艺，更无空闲嬉闹。<page>别呀！奖品丰厚着呢！只要完成挑战，奖品就是您的！<hpage>既然有奖品，倒可以尝试。只要奖励足够丰厚，任何挑战都能接受。游戏规则是什么？<page>简单至极！我将为您提供掷针，我的伙计会提供靶子。击中靶子十五次，奖品就归您了！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Hey, hey, hey! Welcome, I 'm glad you found us! You have strong arms and legs and bright eyesight.<page>Do you like playing? Do you want to check your goals? It is a great honor to play with you. We will conduct a competence test.<hpage>I don't have to test my skills, I don't have time to study my intelligence.<page>But we deserve it. If you accept the challenge, the prize awaits you!<hpage>If you win a prize, then everything changes.If there is a prize, then it does not matter what the challenge.What are the rules of their game?<page>It's very simple, ma 'am! I provide the launcher and my colleague provides the target. Shoot at the target 15 times and you will receive a valuable prize!
secondary_translated_text: 이봐 이봐 이봐이봐, 이봐!환영합니다, 나는 당신이 우리를 찾게되어 기쁩니다!당신은 팔과 다리가 강하고 시력이 밝습니다.<page>당신은 놀이를 좋아합니까?당신의 목표를 확인하고 싶으십니까?당신과 함께 놀 수 있어서 큰 영광입니다.우리는 역량 테스트를 실시할 것이다.<hpage>나는 내 능력을 시험할 필요가 없고, 내 지능을 공부할 시간이 없다.<page>하지만 우리는 그것을 받을 자격이 있습니다. 당신이 도전을 받아들이면, 상이 당신을 기다리고 있습니다!<hpage>상을 이기면 모든 것이 변한다. 상이 있다면 도전은 중요하지 않다. 그들의 게임의 규칙은 무엇입니까?<page>아주 간단해요, 아가씨!나는 발사기를 제공하고 동료는 타겟을 제공한다.목표물을 15 번 쏘면 귀중한 상을 받게됩니다!

original_en_text: A heavy door chained with a simple padlock.
original_zh_text: 一扇厚重的门扉，挂着一只简易挂锁。
translated_text: The heavy doors are closed with simple locks.
secondary_translated_text: 무거운 문은 간단한 자물쇠로 닫혀 있다.

original_en_text: <hpage>This bell could carry me below, but it will first require a key, and an operator to aid its descent.<hpage>I cannot complete this task alone. Someone upon these docks will have to assist me.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此钟可载我下沉，但需要钥匙开启，还需要操作员协助下潜。<hpage>我自己难以达成此事，需要得到码头上某位清醒者的帮助。
translated_text: <hpage>These watches may make me fall, but first the key and operator will help me take them off.<hpage>I can't do it alone. "The people of the port will help us.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>이 시계는 내가 넘어질 수도 있지만, 먼저 열쇠와 운영자가 내가 그것들을 벗는 것을 도울 것이다.<hpage>나 혼자서는 할 수 없어. "항의 사람들이 우리를 도울 것입니다.

original_en_text: Oi! What’s with all these tremors? This smelt still need shovelling, and the shakes’re only making it harder.
original_zh_text: 啊喂！这震天动地的，到底是怎么回事？晃荡个没完，还让不让干活了？
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey, hey! Why are they trembling so hard? Also, pumpkins need a shovel, and when they are mixed, the taste becomes more difficult.
secondary_translated_text: 이봐, 이봐, 이봐!그들은 왜 그렇게 심하게 떨고 있습니까?또한, 호박은 삽이 필요하며, 혼합하면 맛이 더 어려워집니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Though tied by charge, would you provide me your service, Forge Daughter? I have need of tools that your skills could likely provide.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then we’ll construct them. But! You’ll provide the materials, and compensation for our time.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，你们虽有使命在身，但可否为我打造些工具？你们的手艺应该能胜任。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>差不多，有些可能是你们没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那咱就造出来给你看。但材料你得自备，工钱也得结清。
translated_text: <hpage>The cost is limited, but are you offering a service to cheat your daughter? You need tools that will give you your skills.<page>Latvians and traps? I know my boyfriend.<hpage>Is this a rarity in our country? Some of them create serious problems for the process.<page>Hoon-hoon! ! I do it, but! ! You provide us with equipment and compensation for our time.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>비용은 제한적이지만 딸을 속이기 위해 서비스를 제공합니까?당신은 당신의 기술을 줄 수있는 도구가 필요합니다.<page>라트비아와 함정?내 남자친구를 알아.<hpage>우리나라에서는 이런 일이 드문 일인가요?그들 중 일부는 과정에 심각한 문제를 만듭니다.<page>쿤쿤! !나는 그것을하지만! !당신은 우리에게 장비와 우리의 시간에 대한 보상을 제공합니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I need to return above. Please ready the bell for me.<page>Aye, miss. Sit on the bench, and let’s get you hauled up.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我需要返回地面。请准备上浮。<page>好嘞，小姐。坐稳扶牢，这就把你拽上来。
translated_text: <hpage>I have to come back, please set the bell.<page>Yes, ma 'am. We will sit on the bench and help them.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>다시 와야 해요. 종을 틀어주세요.<page>네, 부인.우리는 벤치에 앉아 그들을 도울 것입니다.

original_en_text: Quite a lot of targets struck, and quite a lot of rosaries earned! Our lady never fails to impress us!
original_zh_text: 击中了非常多目标，念珠赚得盆满钵满！女士，您总能让我们大开眼界！
translated_text: He scored a lot of goals and won a lot of roses! Women have always suffered.
secondary_translated_text: 그는 많은 골을 넣고 많은 장미를 얻었다!여자들은 항상 고통을 겪었다.

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Have to stop you there. That’s three times now you’ve missed your mark! I’m afraid that makes you the loser of our little game, with all due respect.<page>Fret not though, for we never tire of playing! Step over here, and we can start another game.
original_zh_text: 哎哎！得叫停啦。您已脱靶三次！恕我直言，这局算您输。<page>没关系，我们的游戏永远欢迎您！请移步这边来，我们再开一局。
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Hey, hey, hey, hey! You have to stop, you have lost three times! Sorry, but I'm afraid we're losing our little game.<page>But don't worry, you will never be bored! Once you arrive you can start a new game.
secondary_translated_text: 이봐 이봐 이봐이봐, 이봐, 이봐!그만둬야지, 넌 세 번이나 졌어!미안하지만, 우리가 우리의 작은 게임을 잃을 것 같아.<page>하지만 걱정하지 마세요, 당신은 결코 지루하지 않을 것입니다!일단 도착하면 새로운 게임을 시작할 수 있습니다.

translated_text: Cancel the price increase?

original_en_text: This trinket is our own invention. It wards against the deadly lava and heat around these docks. The workers used to request them of us. Now they’ve lost the mind to care.
original_zh_text: 这宝贝可是我们的独家发明，可以用来抵御深坞致命的熔岩与高温。往日工虫们争相求购，如今它们却连心智都已涣散。
translated_text: This decor is an invention. They withstood the deadly lava and heat around these shores. The staff asked me about it several times. They lost interest.
secondary_translated_text: 이 장식은 발명품이다.그들은 이 해안 주변의 치명적인 용암과 열을 견뎌냈다.직원들은 여러 번 그것에 대해 나에게 물었다.그들은 관심을 잃었다.

original_en_text: Farewell, then. If you require our craft, this forge is always hot.
original_zh_text: 慢走不送，需要造东西的话随时过来。
translated_text: See you soon, bye. If our process is necessary, this stove is always hot.
secondary_translated_text: 곧 봐요, 안녕.우리의 과정이 필요하다면, 이 난로는 항상 뜨겁다.

original_en_text: The new shell-shield’s all bolted on tight, miss. If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you where you’re goin’.
original_zh_text: 我把新护壳加固得很严实，小姐。如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。
translated_text: New shells and shields are locked, and if you go down again, wash your head and scream.
secondary_translated_text: 새로운 껍질과 방패가 잠겨 있고, 다시 내려가면 머리를 씻고 비명을 지르십시오.

original_en_text: <hpage>The behaviour of your fellow workers, I’ve seen similar... agitation upon the roads. These docks are not alone in the strangeness of their occupants.<page>’Tis odd behaviour to be sure, but not for Ballow and us to know. Ours is busy work, and we keep to ourselves.<page>Whatever the goings on of the world outside, no bother to us, as long as our craft can continue.
original_zh_text: <hpage>你同僚的这般行径，我在路上也见过类似的……狂躁。这码头的住民并非孤例。<page>这种行为确实奇怪，但我们和巴洛可懒得深究。我们只管埋头干活，少管闲事。<page>外头天塌地陷都与我们无关，只要这门锻造手艺能传下去就行。
translated_text: <hpage>I saw similar behavior in his colleagues. Shock on the street. It is not only the port that the locals do not know.<page>It was really strange behaviour, but Berlow and I didn't know that. "We 're so busy that we don't care.<page>Whatever happens there, as long as our ship continues, we will not interfere with it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 그의 동료들에서도 비슷한 행동을 보았다.거리에서 충격.현지인들이 모르는 건 항구뿐만이 아니다.<page>정말 이상한 행동이었지만, 버로우와 나는 그것을 몰랐다. "우리는 너무 바빠서 신경쓰지 않는다."<page>무슨 일이 일어나든, 우리 배가 계속되는 한, 우리는 그것을 방해하지 않을 것입니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>How did you come to serve these docks, Forge Daughter?<page>Sent from our Forgehome we were, at request of those holy bugs above.<hpage>The Citadel dwellers? The veiled bugs? They ordered you here?<page>Yes! An age ago that. Such is duty! We Forge Daughters live to hone the craft, and aid the line.<page>By the Citadel’s patronage, and our long duty upon these docks, our Forgehome would swell in holy esteem.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，你们为何来此码头效力？<page>是上头那些圣虫召我们来的，我们在熔炉乡收到了调令。<hpage>圣堡的住民？那些覆面虫？是他们下令调遣你们来这儿的？<page>正是！都是陈年旧事了。职责所在嘛！我们熔炉之女活着就为磨砺手艺，延续传承。<page>靠着圣堡的庇佑和在这些码头长年累月的苦工，熔炉乡的名望自会愈发神圣。
translated_text: <hpage>How did you get to the port?<page>At the request of the aforementioned sacred insect, we were expelled from the house of Vogel.<hpage>The inhabitants of your castle? Hidden errors? Were you ordered to come here?<page>Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! We built our daughter 's life, perfected her craft and helped her build a production line.<page>With the protection of the castle and the years of responsibility of these ports our blacksmiths have a sacred veneration.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>어떻게 항구에 도착했니?<page>앞서 언급한 신성한 곤충의 요청에 따라 우리는 Vogel 의 집에서 추방되었습니다.<hpage>당신의 성의 주민들?숨겨진 실수?여기 오라는 명령이 있었니?<page>아, 그래!아, 네!우리는 딸의 삶을 건설하고, 그녀의 기술을 완성하고, 그녀가 생산 라인을 구축하도록 도왔습니다.<page>성의 보호와 이 항구들의 수년간의 책임으로 우리의 대장들은 신성한 존경을 가지고 있습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>I’d expected this workshop too would contain only combative types, but you seem composed, Forge Daughter.<page>You’ve met the workers? They’re all wound up! They still work at their tasks, in a simple way, but they’re useless for conversation. It’s only ourselves and young Ballow with any sense left.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我原以为这工坊里全是些好斗之徒，但你们倒是沉着清醒，熔炉之女。<page>见过那些工虫没？个个跟上了发条似的！它们没日没夜机械式地干活，但早就不会聊天了。如今只剩咱和那边的巴洛还保留着些清醒。
translated_text: <hpage>I thought this workshop was only for aggressive people, but it was quiet and helped me raise my daughter.<page>Have you seen the workers? They are all so nervous! They always finish homework easily, but it doesn't help the conversation. Just me and the young Barlow for some reason.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 이 워크샵이 공격적인 사람들을위한 것이라고 생각했지만, 그것은 조용하고 내 딸을 키우는 데 도움이되었습니다.<page>노동자들을 봤어요?그들은 모두 너무 긴장하고 있습니다!그들은 항상 숙제를 쉽게 끝내지만 대화에 도움이되지 않습니다.나랑 젊은 바로우만, 어떤 이유에서.

original_en_text: Miss! Errr... Ullo... I see you’ve survived... somehow... Thought that last plunge must’a been your end.<hpage>It was not. I survived the fall, and managed a treacherous return.<hpage>For the diving bell’s failure, the risks were clear to me. The fault lies not with you.<page>Aye! As you say! This bell’s old. And time has a way of breaking things even as fine forged as this.<page>And see below, for its failure I’ve been workin’ hard at improving the design! Your last journey ended up being a valuable test... ahem.<hpage>Good. That return path is long closed to me, and your bell is now needed again.<page>Again? We’ll if you’re game enough to try a second time... A shell-shield’s been fitted, and the bell’s like new. Better’n new!<page>If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you goin’.
original_zh_text: 小姐！呃……那个……你居然还活着……真行啊……我以为那趟下潜准要了你的命。<hpage>还好，坠落时侥幸生还，又爬过险路回来。<hpage>潜钟故障本在意料之中，错不在你。<page>没错！你说得对！这钟老掉牙了。再好的锻造也经不起岁月折腾。<page>你瞧，因为这次事故，我已经在改进设计了！权当这回是一次有价值的测试……咳。<hpage>很好。从湖底回来的路已经行不通了，若我再次下潜仍需用到此钟。<page>还来？你要真有胆量再试……护壳已经装好了。现在这只潜钟跟全新的一样！不，比新的还强！<page>如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。
translated_text: - Oh, missy! ! Ugh, uh, uh... How did he know he survived? The last jump was his end.<hpage>I survived the fall and returned to adventure.<hpage>I understand the failure of my underwater watches. No responsibility.<page>Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! As you say! "Time will find a way to break what has been so carefully made.<page>Please see below When I failed, I tried to improve the design! The last trip was a worthwhile experience.<hpage>All right, all right, now that my road has been closed for a long time, I need your bell again.<page>Again? If you have a second challenge, we will do it.After installing the cover the bell becomes new.Best update!<page>If you go down again, bend your head and shout. If you do, I will take you on the road.
secondary_translated_text: - 아, 미시! !어, 어, 어..그가 살아남았다는 것을 어떻게 알았을까?마지막 점프는 그의 끝이었다.<hpage>나는 추락을 살아남아 모험으로 돌아왔다.<hpage>나는 내 수중 시계의 실패를 이해한다.책임은 없다.<page>아, 그래!아, 네!당신이 말한대로! "시간은 신중하게 만들어진 것을 깨뜨릴 방법을 찾을 것입니다.<page>아래를 보시기 바랍니다. 실패했을 때, 디자인을 개선하려고 노력했습니다!마지막 여행은 가치있는 경험이었다.<hpage>알았어, 알았어, 이제 내 길은 오랫동안 폐쇄되었으니, 나는 다시 너의 종을 필요로 한다.<page>다시?당신이 두 번째 도전이 있다면, 우리는 그것을 할 것입니다. 덮개를 설치한 후 벨은 새로운. 최상의 업데이트가됩니다!<page>다시 내려가면 고개를 숙이고 소리 지르세요.만약 네가 그렇게 한다면, 내가 너를 길에서 데려다 줄 것이다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I am ready. Please prepare the bell for departure.<page>S’time to take the plunge, aye, miss? Just sit on the bench, and I’ll see you strapped in tight.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我已就绪。请准备下潜。<page>好嘞，小姐，跳水时间到了。在椅子上坐稳，我来给你捆严实咯。
translated_text: <hpage>I am ready to go, ready to ring the bell.<page>It 's time to take the risk, right? What? He is seen only sitting on a bench and tightly tied.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 갈 준비가 되어 있고, 벨을 울릴 준비가 되어 있다.<page>이제 위험을 감수해야 할 때죠?뭐야?그는 단지 벤치에 앉아 단단히 묶여 있는 것으로 보인다.

original_en_text: An old mechanism with a keyhole.
original_zh_text: 一个带钥匙孔的老旧机关。
translated_text: Old equipment with a closing hole.

original_en_text: It’s done, miss! I’ve fitted the shell-shield. Bell’s like new. Better’n new even!<page>If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you goin’.<hpage>Your work is appreciated, sir. Know that, with luck, the threat from below might soon be quelled, and your lands shall rest calm.<page>Well... Good! I’m only really wishin’ to return to the forge, and my regular duties... A little purpose, routine...<page>Frankly, miss, all this action’s more’n a bit overwhelming for bugs like me. I’ll be glad when it’s all over... Providing we survive, of course.
original_zh_text: 搞定啦小姐！护壳装好了。现在这只潜钟跟全新的一样！不，比新的还强！<page>如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。<hpage>辛苦你了。若是运气好，下面的威胁很快便会平息，此地也能重回安宁。<page>那敢情好！我只盼着早日回熔炉干回老本行……有点奔头，按部就班……<page>说真的，小姐，这种大场面对我这种小虫子来说太刺激了。等这一切都结束后，我们……当然，前提是我们能活下来。
translated_text: It's over, miss! I was wearing a shield. The new bell is also new. Better, new.<page>If you go down again, bend your head and shout. If you do, I will take you on the road.<hpage>If you are lucky, the threat below may soon be lifted and your land may be at peace.<page>All right, all right. All right, all right. I really want to go back to the blacksmith and do my daily work. Little routine, little routine.<page>Honestly, ladies, all these actions are a bit excessive for a worm like me. Survival, of course, is a prerequisite.
secondary_translated_text: 끝났습니다, 아가씨!나는 방패를 쓰고 있었다.새 종소리도 새롭다.더 나은, 새로운.<page>다시 내려가면 고개를 숙이고 소리 지르세요.만약 네가 그렇게 한다면, 내가 너를 길에서 데려다 줄 것이다.<hpage>운이 좋다면, 아래의 위협이 곧 제거 될 수 있으며 당신의 땅은 평화로울 수 있습니다.<page>좋아, 좋아.좋아, 좋아.나는 정말로 대장공으로 돌아가서 나의 일상적인 일을 하고 싶다.작은 일상, 작은 일상.<page>솔직히 말해서, 숙녀 여러분, 이 모든 행동은 나 같은 벌레에게는 약간 과잉입니다. 생존은 물론 전제 조건입니다.

original_en_text: Miss! Errr... Ullo... I see you’ve survived... somehow... Thought that drop must’a been your end.<hpage>It was not. I survived the fall, and managed a treacherous return.<hpage>For the diving bell’s failure, the risks were clear to me. The fault lies not with you.<page>Aye! As you say! This bell’s old. And time has a way of breaking things even as fine forged as this.<page>And you can see here, for its failure I’d already been workin’ at improving the design! Ended up being a useful test... ahem.<hpage>Good. That return path is now closed to me, and your bell may still be needed if I choose to descend again.<page>Again? Well, if you’re game enough to try a second time...Once this new shield-shell is fitted, it’ll surely withstand the drop!.. Surely!
original_zh_text: 小姐！呃……那个……你居然还活着……真行啊……我以为那趟下潜准要了你的命。<hpage>还好，坠落时侥幸生还，又爬过险路回来。<hpage>潜钟故障本在意料之中，错不在你。<page>没错！你说得对！这钟老掉牙了。再好的锻造也经不起岁月折腾。<page>你瞧，因为这次事故，我已经在改进设计了！权当这回是一次有价值的测试……咳。<hpage>很好。从湖底回来的路已经行不通了，若我再次下潜仍需用到此钟。<page>还来？你要真有胆量再试……等新护壳装好，保准能扛住下坠！绝对没问题！
translated_text: - Oh, missy! ! Ugh, uh, uh... "You survived. "Somehow, I thought one drop was the end.<hpage>I survived the fall and returned to adventure.<hpage>I understand the failure of my underwater watches. No responsibility.<page>Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! As you say! "Time will find a way to break what has been so carefully made.<page>As you can see, the project has failed, so we are working on improving it! This will be a useful test.Cough.<hpage>All is well, all is well, the return is closed. Even if you decide to go down again, you may still need a bell.<page>Again? If you want to try it again, this new protective cover, once installed, will absolutely resist falling! Yes, no!
secondary_translated_text: - 아, 미시! !어, 어, 어.. "너는 살아남았다. "어느 쪽이든, 나는 한 방울이 끝이라고 생각했다.<hpage>나는 추락을 살아남아 모험으로 돌아왔다.<hpage>나는 내 수중 시계의 실패를 이해한다.책임은 없다.<page>아, 그래!아, 네!당신이 말한대로! "시간은 신중하게 만들어진 것을 깨뜨릴 방법을 찾을 것입니다.<page>보시다시피, 프로젝트가 실패했기 때문에 우리는 그것을 개선하기 위해 노력하고 있습니다!이것은 유용한 테스트가 될 것입니다. 기침.<hpage>모든 것이 괜찮아, 모든 것이 괜찮아, 반환은 닫혔다.당신이 다시 내려가기로 결정하더라도, 당신은 여전히 벨이 필요할 수 있습니다.<page>다시?다시 시도하고 싶다면, 일단 설치되면이 새로운 보호 커버는 절대적으로 떨어지는 것을 저항합니다!그래, 안돼!

original_en_text: A smith? Hardly so crude! We are Forge Daughter! How can a pointy bug not tell?<page>Ours is the ancient line and honoured role. These docks and lands around are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you are as talented as you suggest, would you lend me your aid? I’ve lacked for my usual tools, and I suspect you could craft fine replacements.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then soon, yes! I may accept. But not now! Now there is much work to be done, and we cannot afford to be bothered so.
original_zh_text: 铁匠？太掉价了！我们可是熔炉之女！你竟然不认识我们？我们祖传的手艺让整个深坞都沾光！<hpage>若你们的技艺真如你所夸耀那样好，可否帮我个忙？我的一些工具没有了，我想你们应该能打造合用的替代品。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>有些可能是你没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那行，你过阵子再来！咱会造出来给你看！这会儿活儿太多，咱忙不过来！
translated_text: How about Smith? It 's not so red. We are children of creation. Why can't we see insects?<page>Our path is an ancient path and a document of honor.These ports and the lands that surround them, fortunately have our experience.<hpage>If you 're as talented as you say, will you help me? I lack a universal tool, and you can't make a good replacement.<page>Latvians and traps? I know my boyfriend.<hpage>Is this a rarity in our country? Some of them create serious problems for the process.<page>Hoon-hoon! ! Immediately yes! I am accepted, but not now. There 's a lot to do, and I can't worry about it.
secondary_translated_text: 스미스는 어때?그렇게 빨강은 아니야.우리는 창조의 자녀들이다.왜 곤충을 볼 수 없나요?<page>우리의 길은 고대 경로이며 명예의 문서입니다. 이 항구와 그 주변의 땅은 다행히도 우리의 경험을 가지고 있습니다.<hpage>네가 말한 대로 재능이 있다면, 나를 도와줄래?나는 보편적 인 도구가 부족하고, 당신은 좋은 대체를 만들 수 없습니다.<page>라트비아와 함정?내 남자친구를 알아.<hpage>우리나라에서는 이런 일이 드문 일인가요?그들 중 일부는 과정에 심각한 문제를 만듭니다.<page>쿤쿤! !즉시 Yes!나는 인정받았지만 지금은 아니다.할 일이 많아서 걱정할 수 없다.

original_en_text: Oh! Small pointy bug, why do you bother this Forge Daughter at their work?<hpage>These black quakes that wrack your lands, I am seeking to see them quelled at their source, below the lakes of flame.<page>You would wish to descend so deep?... It is true these docks possess the means. Alas, we ourselves cannot help. Whether Pharoom’s health or fall, our charge ties us to this forge, always.<page>Ballow there’s the bug to ask, and if our fate is as dire as your action suggests, we are sure he is only needing of some quick convincing.
original_zh_text: 嘿！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰我们熔炉之女干活？<hpage><hpage>如今黑灾震动大地，我想深入熔岩湖之底，将其从源头平息。<page> 小尖头虫，你想潜那么深？……码头那边倒是有法子能办到。<page>唉，可惜咱帮不上忙。不管纺络是死是活，咱都得守着这熔炉。<page> 去找码头那边的巴洛吧。若局势真如你所说那般危急，你随便吓唬两句他就会服软。
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Little worm, why do you interfere with this blacksmith's work?<hpage>These black earthquakes have devastated your land, and I want to see them disappear from the source under the lake of fire.<page>Do you want to dive deep? These ports have a solution, but we can't do it alone. Regardless of whether a healthy or dead company, our responsibility will always be in this mold.<page>I am convinced that Barlow has questions and that he needs to be quickly convinced if our fate is as terrible as his behavior suggests.
secondary_translated_text: 오! 오!오! 오!작은 벌레야, 너는 왜 이 대장사의 일을 방해하느냐?<hpage>이 검은 지진들이 너희 땅을 황폐화시켰으니, 나는 그들이 불못 아래의 근원으로부터 사라지는 것을 보고 싶다.<page>깊이 다이빙하고 싶으세요?이 항구들은 해결책을 가지고 있지만, 우리 혼자서는 그것을 할 수 없습니다.건강한 회사가든 죽은 회사가든, 우리의 책임은 항상 이 모형에 있을 것입니다.<page>나는 바로우가 의문을 가지고 있으며, 그의 행동이 암시하는 것처럼 우리의 운명이 끔찍하다면 그는 빨리 확신 할 필요가 있다고 확신합니다.

original_en_text: Return later, pointy bug! Now there is much work to be done, and we cannot afford to be bothered so.
original_zh_text: 过阵子再来，小尖头虫！眼下正忙着呢，少添乱！
translated_text: We 'll be back later, bab. There 's so much to do and I can't worry about it.
secondary_translated_text: 우리는 나중에 돌아올거야, 베이비.할 일이 너무 많아서 걱정할 수 없다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, I have acquired a power that will enable me to end this black madness. Soon I will act to stop the quakes and save this land.<page>Excellent, pointy bug. Your drive, and your vigour, both have proven surprisingly large for one so small.<page>We shall remain here, still. If our service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我已获得终结黑灾的力量。很快便将行动，平息震动，拯救此地。<page>干得好，小尖头虫。你这小身板里的劲头倒是大得出奇。<page>咱还会守在这儿。若咱这手艺能助你成事，尽管开口便是。
translated_text: <hpage>Thanks to my daughter 's training, I have gained the strength to put an end to this black madness. I will take immediate action to stop the earthquake and save Earth.<page>For such a small man I found that their energy and energy is surprisingly large.<page>If our services can help you with important tasks, we will be happy to continue to provide them.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>내 딸의 훈련 덕분에 나는 이 검은 광기를 끝낼 수 있는 힘을 얻었다.나는 지진을 막고 지구를 구하기 위해 즉시 조치를 취할 것이다.<page>그런 작은 사람에게는 그들의 에너지와 에너지가 놀랍도록 크다는 것을 발견했습니다.<page>당사의 서비스가 중요한 작업을 수행하는 데 도움이 될 수 있다면, 당사는 기꺼이 계속 제공 할 것입니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay safe, Forge Daughter. If I require your aid, I shall return.<page>Our wishes go with you, pointy bug. Calm the raging of our world, that our task can continue.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，熔炉之女。若是需要帮助，我自会再来。<page>祝你好运，小尖头虫。平息这外头的狂乱，咱才能继续安心干活。
translated_text: <hpage>If I really need your help in raising my daughter, I will come back.<page>My best wishes to you, Sharp Bug.Only by stopping the destruction of the world can our mission be continued.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>내가 정말로 딸을 키우는 데 도움이 필요하다면, 나는 돌아올 것입니다.<page>샤프 버그님께 진심으로 기원합니다. 세계의 파괴를 막아야만 우리의 임무가 계속될 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>These controls are complex. If I’m to descend within the bell below, I will first require an operator.<hpage>Someone upon these docks will have to assist me.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此操控装置颇为复杂。若想要乘潜钟下潜，需要有操作员协助。<hpage>需要得到码头上某位清醒者的帮助。
translated_text: <hpage>If you need to go under the bell, first you need an operator.<hpage>The Port Authority will help.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>만약 당신이 벨 밑으로 가야 한다면, 먼저 당신은 운영자가 필요합니다.<hpage>항구 당국이 도움을 줄 것이다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I wish to depart. Please ready the bell for travel.<page>Sure thing, miss. Sit on the bench, and I’ll send you down.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我可以出发了。请整备好潜钟。<page>好嘞，小姐。在椅子上坐稳，我这就送您下潜。
translated_text: <hpage>I want to go, please prepare the bell for the trip.<page>Sure, miss. Sit down on the bench and I'll drop you off.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>가고 싶은데, 여행용 종을 준비해 주세요.<page>물론이죠, 아가씨.벤치에 앉으세요. 제가 내려 드릴게요.

original_en_text: Interested in our little game, my lady?<page>If you can hit the target fifteen times you’ll earn yourself a worthy prize!
original_zh_text: 对我们的小游戏感兴趣吗，女士？<page>击中靶子十五次，奖品就归您了！
translated_text: Interested in our little game?<page>If you have reached the goal 15 times, big prizes!
secondary_translated_text: 우리의 작은 게임에 관심이 있으세요?<page>목표에 15 번 도달하면 큰 상!

original_en_text: Oh! Pointy bug, you return? Our world cracks and cries from some grave new calamity.<page>Nevertheless, we must remain, fixed to this forge and its service. Ours is a duty lifetime bound.
original_zh_text: <page>嘿！小尖头虫，你回来了？外面又闹起什么灾祸，搞得哭天抢地的。<page>不过无所谓，咱还得守着熔炉干活。使命在身，至死方休。
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Spikebug: Are you back? Our world is ruined and weeping in the face of a new serious catastrophe.<page>But we must continue to support this plant and its services. Our responsibility is for life
secondary_translated_text: 오! 오!오! 오! Spikebug: 돌아왔어요?우리의 세계는 파괴되고 있으며 새로운 심각한 재앙에 직면하여 울고 있습니다.<page>그러나 우리는 이 공장과 그 서비스를 계속 지원해야 한다.우리의 책임은 생명에 대한 것이다.

original_en_text: If you need something, talk to the boss. I’m busy.
original_zh_text: 有事找老板说去。我正忙着呢。
translated_text: If you need anything, consult your boss. I am busy.
secondary_translated_text: 필요한 것이 있다면 상사에게 문의하십시오.나는 바쁘다.

original_en_text: A control panel with various levers and gauges.
original_zh_text: 布满操纵杆与仪表的控制台。
translated_text: Control panel with multiple levers and tools.
secondary_translated_text: 여러 개의 레버와 도구가 있는 제어판.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have need to head below the lakes of flame.<hpage>There is a diving bell at the base of this structure that seemed fit for the task. I require it opened, and an operator to send it deep.<hpage>As one of few upon these docks with mind still sound, that role must fall to you.<page>Can’t you see I’m busy, miss? Ain’t got time for naught else while the shovelling needs doing.<hpage>Choose to aid me, or all your efforts will soon be wasted. This kingdom crumbles. Its collapse is inevitable. If you wish for your work, and your life to continue, you must help me, now.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我需要潜入熔岩湖之下。<hpage>此建筑底部有座潜钟可用。我需要把它打开，并有个操作员送我下沉。<hpage>如今码头清醒者寥寥无几，此事只能由你来办。<page>没看我正忙吗，小姐？眼下铲矿石的活还干不完呢。<hpage>这王国正在崩塌，覆灭无可避免。你不帮我，就等着一切辛劳付诸东流。若你还想活命，还想每天有活干，就立刻帮我。
translated_text: <hpage>I want to go to the Lake of Fire.<hpage>At the bottom of the design there is an underwater clock that seems to be suitable for work. Ask the operator to open it, sending deep.<hpage>Being one of the few people who are still thinking of us in these ports, the letter should fall on you.<page>Can't you see I 'm busy? When you dig the ground, you have no time for anything else.<hpage>If you do not help me, your efforts will soon be in vain.The kingdom is falling apart.This collapse is inevitable.If you want to continue your work and your life, you must help me now.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 불의 호수에 가고 싶다.<hpage>디자인 하단에는 작업에 적합한 것처럼 보이는 수중 시계가 있습니다.운영자에게 열고 깊게 보내달라고 부탁합니다.<hpage>이 항구에서 아직도 우리를 생각하고있는 몇 안되는 사람들 중 하나로서, 편지는 당신에게 떨어질 것입니다.<page>내가 바쁘다는 걸 못 보나?당신이 땅을 파면, 당신은 다른 어떤 것도 할 시간이 없습니다.<hpage>만일 너희가 나를 돕지 않는다면, 너희의 노력은 곧 헛되이 될 것이다. 왕국이 무너지고 있다. 이 붕괴는 불가피하다. 너희의 일과 생활을 계속하려면, 너희는 지금 나를 도와야 한다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have need to head below the lakes of flame. Can you aid me in this task?<hpage><page>Hmmm... Well if you head down below to the very base of the docks, there’s an old diving bell built for just what you’re askin’. <page>Thing is, you can ride it, but it takes an operator stood dockside to send it. I might be capable, but I ain’t got time for naught else while the shovelling still needs doing.<hpage>Choose to aid me, sir, or all your efforts will soon be wasted. This kingdom crumbles. If you wish for your work, and your life to continue, you must help me, now.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，先生，我需要潜入熔岩湖之下。能否请你助我一臂之力？<hpage><page>唔……如果您是往深坞最底层去，那边倒是有口老潜钟专门干这活的。<page>可这玩意儿需要有另一只虫在地面操作才能下水。我虽然会弄，但眼下铲矿石的活儿堆成山，实在没闲工夫管别的啊。<hpage>这王国正在崩塌。你不帮我，就等着一切辛劳付诸东流。若你还想活命，还想每天有活干，就立刻帮我。
translated_text: <hpage>I want to go to Lake of Fire. Do you want to help me with this work?<hpage><page>Ugh, uh, uh... Well, when you get down to the bottom of the pier, there is an old diving bell made specifically for what you want.<page>The problem is that it can be mounted, but it needs an operator standing by the dock to send it.I can do it, but I don't have time to do anything else that I have to do.<hpage>Please help me, otherwise your efforts will be wasted. If you want to continue your work and your life, you must help me now.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 불의 호수에 가고 싶다.이 일을 도와줄래?<hpage><page>어, 어, 어..글쎄요, 부두 바닥에 내려가면, 당신이 원하는 것을 위해 특별히 만들어진 오래된 다이빙 벨이 있습니다.<page>문제는 장착할 수 있지만 부두에 서 있는 운영자가 보내야 한다는 것이다. 할 수 있지만, 내가 해야 할 다른 일은 할 시간이 없다.<hpage>제발 도와주세요, 그렇지 않으면 당신의 노력은 헛되이 될 것입니다.당신이 당신의 일과 삶을 계속하고 싶다면, 당신은 지금 나를 도와야합니다.

translated_text: Starting a challenge?

original_en_text: Oi! Who’sat? Whoever’s down there, if you’re feelin’ mad enough to try and travel, best meet me up at the controls, and we can chat.
original_zh_text: 喂！谁在那儿？不管你是谁，如果想要下潜，最好来操控台找我聊聊。
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey, hey! Who is sitting? Whoever you are, if you 're angry and want to travel, it 's better to wait for me at the console and let me talk.
secondary_translated_text: 이봐, 이봐, 이봐!누가 앉아있나요?당신이 누구든, 화가 나서 여행하고 싶다면 콘솔에서 나를 기다리고 내가 이야기 할 수있게하는 것이 낫습니다.

original_en_text: Well. Well. Still alive! You have proved yourself made of the hardiest stuff, pointy bug.<page>Ballow did tell, shamefully, of complications with your diving bell, and of your absence upon its retrieval.<page>He had feared you lost to the flame, but we ourself had slight guessed otherwise.<hpage>To return from below proved as difficult a climb as ever I have faced, and yet, in time near, I will need to descend again.<page>Then twice mad you are, bug! Or brave beyond measure. We shall wish on your continued survival, even if you seem intent on ending it.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！瞧瞧这是谁还生龙活虎的！小尖头虫，你可真是命硬。<page>巴洛支支吾吾地交代了潜钟的意外——打捞起来后，你已经不见了。<page>他以为你被火焰吞噬了，但咱倒隐约觉得不然。<hpage>从底下爬回来确实是个不小的挑战，但很快我又得再下去一趟了。<page>哈！？你这虫子，不是疯到顶了就是勇到没边了！尽管你像在自寻死路，咱还是祝你多活些时日。
translated_text: All right, all right, all right, he 's alive. You 've shown you can do the most difficult things, Dot Bug.<page>Barlow has apologized for the complexity of his diving bell and for his absence to get it.<page>He 's afraid you 'll get lost in the flames, but let 's guess a bit.<hpage>Getting back from the bottom has been the most difficult climb in history, but in the near future we will have to go down again.<page>You're crazy, Bob! Also very brave. Even if you try to end this, I want you alive.
secondary_translated_text: 알았어, 알았어, 알았어, 그는 살아있다.넌 네가 가장 어려운 일을 할 수 있다는 것을 보여줬어, Dot Bug.<page>Barlow 는 다이빙 벨의 복잡성과 그것을 얻기 위해 부재 한 것에 대해 사과했습니다.<page>그는 당신이 불길에 빠질까 봐 두려웠지만, 조금 추측해 보겠습니다.<hpage>바닥에서 돌아오는 것은 역사상 가장 어려운 등반이었지만, 가까운 장래에 우리는 다시 내려야 할 것입니다.<page>넌 미쳤어, 밥!또한 매우 용감하다.이 일을 끝내려고 노력하더라도, 난 네가 살아 있기를 바란다.

original_en_text: The frolics haven’t ended, my lady! If you’d like to really test yourself, we should play again!<page>Hit the target twenty-five times and you’ll earn yourself a beautiful necklace of rosaries! What say you?
original_zh_text: 游戏还没完全结束，女士！想真正挑战自己一把吗？再来一局如何？<page>击中靶子二十五次，这条精美的念珠项链就是您的！意下如何？
translated_text: The game isn't over yet, ma ' am. If you really want to prove yourself, play it.<page>After hitting the target 25 times, you will get a beautiful Rosary Necklace! What have I said?
secondary_translated_text: 게임 아직 끝나지 않았습니다, 부인.당신이 정말로 자신을 증명하고 싶다면, 그것을 재생하십시오.<page>목표물을 25 번 때리면 아름다운 로자리 목걸이를 얻을 수 있습니다!내가 뭐라고 했지?

original_en_text: <hpage>Keep well, Forge Daughter. I shall return if I require your aid.<page>Yes! Or no. Either is fine by us, as long as the craft continues.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，熔炉之女。若是需要帮助，我自会再来。<page>行！不来也行。只要手艺没断，咱都没意见。
translated_text: <hpage>Raising my daughter. If I need your help, I will come back.<page>Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! As long as that process continues, we will do well.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>내 딸을 키우다.당신의 도움이 필요하면, 나는 돌아올 것이다.<page>아, 그래!아, 네!그 과정이 계속되는 한, 우리는 잘할 것이다.

original_en_text: Hesitate not, my lady! Take aim and throw true!
original_zh_text: 别犹豫，女士！瞄准了就狠狠地扎过去！
translated_text: Don't doubt it, sir. Set a goal and run it.

original_en_text: If you add the implements from this set to your own, the quality of your crafting will increase. You will produce finer, sharper, and deadlier tools... if that is your wish.
original_zh_text: 若将此套器具与你的工具结合，你的制作水准将更上一层楼。你将打造出更精、更利、更致命的器械……只要你想。
translated_text: By adding this tool set to your tools, you will improve the quality of your production.It produces thinner, sharper and deadly tools.If that 's what you want.
secondary_translated_text: 이 도구 세트를 도구에 추가하면 생산의 품질을 향상시킬 수 있습니다. 더 얇고 날카롭고 치명적인 도구가 만들어집니다.

original_en_text: Planning to lay a carpet of spikes? These would surely slow your prey. We’d never have considered using such common tools for combat.
original_zh_text: 用布满尖刺的毯子让敌人减速？如此普通的工具还能在战斗中应用，我们可从没想到过。
translated_text: Are you going to hit your nails? This will reduce the prison term. I never thought I would fight with such a common tool.
secondary_translated_text: 네 손톱을 부러뜨릴 거야?이것은 징역형을 줄일 것이다.이렇게 일반적인 도구로 싸울 줄은 몰랐다.

original_en_text: Ola, ola, ola! Perhaps I neglected to tell you not to cross past those markers? It’s a law of the game, and we all abide by laws here, don’t we?<page>Your actions have disqualified you, my lady, but we harbour no ill will! Step over here and we can begin a new round at once!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！我可能忘了告诉您别越过那个标记？游戏规矩总得遵守，对吧？<page>您犯规出局，但我们之间绝不会因此产生芥蒂！请移步这边来，我们马上新开一局。
translated_text: Oh, oh, oh! Maybe I forgot to tell them not to go beyond the mark. These are the rules of the game, and we will follow those rules.<page>Your actions will disqualify you, but I will not offend you. Once you get here, you can start a new round right away!
secondary_translated_text: 오 오, 오, 오!아마도 나는 그들에게 표지판을 넘지 말라고 말하는 것을 잊었을 것이다.이것은 게임의 규칙이며 우리는 그 규칙을 따를 것입니다.<page>너의 행동은 너의 자격을 잃을 것이지만, 나는 너를 불쾌하게 하지 않을 것이다.일단 당신이 여기에 도착하면, 당신은 즉시 새로운 라운드를 시작할 수 있습니다!

original_en_text: Ola, ola! That’s it then. Our lady has struck the target fifteen times! A beautiful victory!<page>Hopefully you enjoyed yourself! A little levity is a balm in these troubled times, don’t you think?<hpage>I’d have thought such games best saved for times of peace, but perhaps there is truth in what you say.<hpage>And now that I have bested your challenge, you will produce the prize I have earned?<page>Oh... o-of course! I see you have a tool pouch of your own there. Full to bursting with baubles and trinkets, no doubt!<page>I’ll fit another pocket onto it, so you can carry even more tools and shards with you. A fair prize, wouldn’t you say?
original_zh_text: 哎哎！成了！这位女士成功击中靶子十五次，完美胜出！<page>玩得开心吧？在这病怏怏的世道里找点乐子也算是良药，您说是不是？<hpage>我原以为这类游戏该留在太平年月，但或许你说的也有道理。<hpage>现在我已完成挑战，是否该兑现奖品了？<page>当……当然！我看您自带工具袋，里面准是塞满了各种零碎小玩意！<page>我给您的工具袋上加个新口袋，能多装点工具。这奖品公道吧？
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Hey, hey, hey! Here, our women have achieved their goal 15 times! What a wonderful victory!<page>We hope you have fun! In these difficult times, even a little lightness can be comforting, right? Really?<hpage>I think such games are better to save for normal time, but you 're probably telling the truth.<hpage>Now that I have won your challenge, will you accept the prize that I have won?<page>¡Oh, yeah! Yes, no! They have their own team. Lots of small and trivial things!<page>You can put another pocket on top to carry more tools and trash. Don't you think that 's a fair price?
secondary_translated_text: 이봐 이봐 이봐이봐, 이봐!여기, 우리 여성들은 15 번이나 목표를 달성했습니다!얼마나 놀라운 승리인가!<page>우리는 당신이 재미있게되기를 바랍니다!이런 어려운 시기에 약간의 가벼운 것조차도 위로가 될 수 있습니다, 그렇죠?진짜?<hpage>나는 그런 게임이 정상적인 시간을 절약하는 것이 낫다고 생각하지만, 당신은 아마 진실을 말하고 있습니다.<hpage>이제 내가 당신의 도전을 이겼으니, 당신은 내가 이긴 상을 받아 들일 수 있습니까?<page>오, 그래!그래, 안돼!그들은 그들만의 팀을 가지고 있다.많은 작은, 사소한 것들!<page>더 많은 도구와 쓰레기를 운반하기 위해 위쪽에 다른 주머니를 넣을 수 있습니다.너는 그것이 공정한 가격이라고 생각하지 않니?

original_en_text: Ola, ola! We’ve devised a final challenge for you, my lady, if you’re interested.<page>Hit the target as many times as you can without missing. The more targets you hit, the more rosaries you’ll win from us! Care to try?
original_zh_text: 哎哎！我们给您准备了终极挑战，女士！<page>连续击中靶子次数越多，赢取的念珠越多！敢试试吗？
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Hey, hey, hey, hey! If you 're interested, here 's one last challenge.<page>Don't miss as many goals as you can.The more goals you achieve, the more retail you will win! Do you want to experiment?
secondary_translated_text: 이봐 이봐 이봐이봐, 이봐, 이봐!만약 당신이 관심이 있다면, 여기 마지막 도전이 있습니다.<page>가능한 한 많은 목표를 놓치지 마십시오. 더 많은 목표를 달성 할수록 더 많은 소매가 승리 할 것입니다!당신은 실험을 하고 싶습니까?

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, within an old Weaver nest I discovered a weapon. Though much damaged by age, I believe your skills could see it restored.<page>Ho. An impressive tool that, and a fine challenge. We can reforge the weapon, if the price fits.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我在一处古老织巢中发现了这件武器。虽年代久远损毁严重，但以你们的手艺应该能修复。<page>嚯，好东西！这活儿够意思，只要报酬合适，咱就帮你重铸。
translated_text: <hpage>Daughter of a blacksmith, I found a gun in a nest of old cloth. Aging can do a lot of damage, but I think your abilities can be restored.<page>This is an impressive tool and a big challenge.If the price is good, you can rebuild your weapon.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>대장사의 딸아, 나는 낡은 천의 둥지에서 총을 발견했다.노화는 많은 피해를 줄 수 있지만, 나는 당신의 능력을 회복할 수 있다고 생각한다.<page>이것은 인상적인 도구와 큰 도전입니다. 가격이 좋은 경우, 당신은 당신의 무기를 재건할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: A fair exchange made, pointy bug. Now our work calls. Return again if you find need of our trade and talent.
original_zh_text: 交易愉快，小尖头虫。眼下我们的活儿还多着呢，有需要再来。
translated_text: Fair exchange is a big mistake.Now our work is called.When you satisfy our business and human resources needs, please come back.
secondary_translated_text: 공정한 교환은 큰 실수입니다. 지금 우리의 작업이 호출됩니다. 당신이 우리의 비즈니스 및 인적 자원 요구를 충족하면, 다시 오십시오.

original_en_text: We hope Ballow serves you well, pointy bug. In our long time serving these docks, he’s the finest assistant we’ve found.
original_zh_text: 希望巴洛能帮上忙，小尖头虫。在码头干了这么多年，他是咱见过最得力的助手。
translated_text: I hope Ballow is working for you, Spike Bug. He has been the best assistant for all his years of service in these ports.
secondary_translated_text: 발로우가 당신을 위해 일하기를 바랍니다, 스파이크 버그.그는 이 항구에서 수년간 봉사한 최고의 조수였다.

translated_text: « Increased?

original_en_text: Well. Well. Still about, pointy bug!
