You have proved yourself made of the hardiest stuff.<page>Ballow did tell, shamefully, of complications with your diving bell, and of your absence upon its first retrieval.<page>He had feared you lost to the flame, but we ourself had slight guessed otherwise.<hpage>To return from below proved as difficult a climb as ever I have faced, and yet I now need to descend again.<page>Then twice mad you are, bug! Or brave beyond measure.<page>Know we have heard from Ballow, who told of his repair efforts upon the diving bell below. By now that task is likely completed.<page>If you are hoping to put his work to the test, then we shall wish again on your survival. And if our own service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！瞧瞧这是谁还生龙活虎的！小尖头虫，你可真是命硬。<page>巴洛支支吾吾地交代了潜钟的意外——打捞起来后，你已经不见了。<page>他以为你已经葬身火海了，但咱倒隐约觉得不然。<hpage>从底下爬回来确实是个不小的挑战，但很快我又得再下去一趟了。<page>哈！？你这虫子，不是疯到顶了就是勇到没边了！<page>听巴洛说，他底下那口老破钟修得差不多了。这会儿多半已经完工。<page>想试试那家伙的成果？那咱还得再一次祝你好运。要是咱这熔炉里的功夫能帮上忙，甭客气，照旧伺候着！
translated_text: Everything is good, everything is good, everything is good, and here it is, a huge mistake! You 've proven that you 've done the hardest things.<page>Barlow spoke brazenly about the complexity of the dive bell and its absence when he first recovered.<page>He 's afraid you 'll get lost in the flames, but let 's guess a bit.<hpage>Getting back from the bottom was a difficult climb I had never experienced before, but I had to go down again.<page>You're crazy, Bob! Also very brave.<page>Upon learning that he had received a letter from Barlow, he described the work of repairing the underwater clock as follows:<page>If you want to experience your work, I hope you will experience it again.If our exclusive services meet your basic needs, we will continue to provide them.

translated_text: The purity of His will. His intentions are clear. You are the curse of the innocent silk.<page>"You have failed, guard. "<hpage>Is the gold medal a failure? They wanted to test me, and they did. Our expectations from true guardians do not diminish.<hpage>The problem is solved and you will not have to die. Let 's get up and unite as friends.
secondary_translated_text: 그분의 뜻의 순수함.그의 의도는 분명하다.너는 무고한 실크의 저주야.<page>"실패했구나, 경비원. "<hpage>금메달은 실패인가?그들은 나를 시험하고 싶어했고, 그렇게 했다.진정한 수호자들에 대한 우리의 기대는 줄어들지 않습니다.<hpage>문제는 해결되었고 당신은 죽을 필요가 없습니다.우리 일어나서 친구로 합시다.

original_en_text: Seek out a Pickled Muckmaggot, the sacred treat revered and reviled for its intensity. It was a specialty of the chef Lugoli, long ago banished for culinary sacrilege.<page>Rumours sing that the great chef retreated to their home-caves in the dank midlands below...
original_zh_text: 找一份腌淤秽蛆。那是被放逐的卢戈利大厨的招牌菜。<page>听说那混蛋躲到中部地区的潮湿洞穴了……
translated_text: Look for the kimchi worm, a sacred delight that is revered and condemned for its power.This is the masterpiece of chef Lugolish, who was imprisoned for bad cooking.<page>It is said that the great cook retreated to the humid central cave of his native city.
secondary_translated_text: 김치 벌레를 찾아라, 그 힘으로 존경받고 비난받는 신성한 기쁨. 이것은 나쁜 요리로 감옥에 갇힌 요리사 룰고리쉬의 걸작이다.<page>위대한 요리사가 고향의 습한 중앙 동굴로 퇴각했다고 한다.

original_en_text: <hpage>With this I have fulfilled my promise, sir. The ingredients have all been delivered. I trust now the meal can be made, and the oil awarded for my efforts?<page>You’ll have your oil, whelp! Firstly learn some patience! The dish must be prepared perfectly, enough to rouse my master and see them sated. <page>Now! Permit me to work my skill, and you’ll stand to see a meal of scent and taste that would dazzle Pharloom in her prime!
original_zh_text: <hpage>现在食材已备齐，该给我油了吧？<page>你这小虫急什么！得先把菜做得完美才能唤醒主人。<page>在这好好看着！见证这飘香万里的盛宴是怎么诞生的！
translated_text: <hpage>I have kept my promise. All the food has been delivered. I know how to cook. Does the oil pay for my efforts?<page>"You will have butter, my son. This dish must be well prepared enough to wake my guest and see him full. "<page>Now! Let me show you my skills. Discover for yourself the food that enchanted Faroom in its heyday!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 약속을 지켰다.모든 식료품이 배달되었습니다.나는 요리를 잘 안다.기름은 내 노력에 대가되는가?<page>"너는 버터를 먹을 거야, 내 아들아.이 요리는 내 손님을 깨우고 배가 가득한 것을 볼 수있을만큼 잘 준비되어야합니다. "<page>지금!내 기술을 보여드릴게요.전성기에 Faroom 을 매혹시킨 음식을 스스로 발견하십시오!

original_en_text: Hrm? Oh, ‘tis merely the livid red bug. I was expecting some word from those above to explain the meaning of all this rumbling and shaking.<page>They fail in their holy duties! My master must be shielded from such inconveniences, else their digestion be disrupted.<hpage>There are worse fates than indigestion, sir. You are fortunate to be unharmed.<page>Fortune has nothing to do with it. I am simply of a hardier breed than the insipid young servants of these recent, wretched times!
original_zh_text: 嗯？是你这红衣虫啊，我还以为上面有虫来解释地震是怎么回事呢。<page>上面那帮渎职的家伙！惊扰主人的消化谁担待得起！<hpage>比起消化不良，你该庆幸自己没有受伤。<page>跟运气可没什么关系，我这把老骨头比现在那些软脚虾仆从硬朗多了！
translated_text: What's it? What is it? I wish the person above had said something to explain the meaning of all this roar and shivering.<page>My teachers must avoid these inconveniences, and I will not let them go. "<hpage>I 'm glad I didn't get hurt because I have a much worse digestive disorder.<page>I'm just a race stronger than a boring young servant of the last miserable times!
secondary_translated_text: 뭐예요?뭐야?나는 위의 사람이 이 모든 포효와 떨림의 의미를 설명하는 무언가를 말했으면 좋겠다.<page>나의 스승들은 이러한 불편함을 피해야 하며, 나는 그들을 놓치지 않을 것이다. "<hpage>나는 내가 다치지 않아서 기쁘다. 왜냐하면 나는 소화장애가 훨씬 더 심하기 때문이다.<page>나는 지난 비참한 시대의 지루한 젊은 하인보다 강한 종족일 뿐이다!

original_en_text: Rkkt! I know she has it. Keeps it. Carried coveted in her cloth. This one searched for it. Give it! Give it to us!
original_zh_text: 咔！我知道她藏着。揣在披风里。本管理员找了好久。交出来！立刻交出来！
translated_text: RCCT. He did it, he said. He always hid under his clothes. I saw it, Come on! Come here.
secondary_translated_text: RCCT 입니다.그는 그것을 했다, 그는 말했다.그는 항상 옷 속에 숨었다.나는 그것을 보았다, 빨리!이리 오세요.

original_en_text: Divine music... The soul of Pharloom eternal laid bare... That our cursed age could still receive such blessing...<page>So, Weaver-spawn, our melody is yours now, held in mind to carry beyond our walls. Was the learning worth its thieving? <hpage>It was, Vaultkeeper. And know to me your service continues. Keep the cylinder safe, along with any others I may bring.
original_zh_text: 神圣旋律……纺络永恒之魂的具现……这黑暗时代竟能重现荣光……<page>织者坏种，圣歌归你了，带出圣堡吧。这番追寻值得吗？<hpage>值得，而你将继续为我效命。保管好音筒，包括我以后带回来的。
translated_text: In this sense, the pharaoh's soul has been exposed. In this accursed time we can still receive such blessings.<page>So, descendants of Weaver, our melody is now yours. Don't forget to remove it from the walls.<hpage>Yes, the Ministry of Finance. Please let us know that your service will continue. Make sure that the cylinder and the other cylinder you are carrying are safe.
secondary_translated_text: 이때 파라오의 영혼이 드러났다.이 저주받은 시대에 우리는 여전히 그러한 축복을 받을 수 있습니다.<page>그래서, 웨이버의 후손들이여, 우리의 멜로디는 이제 당신들의 것이다.벽에서 그것을 제거하는 것을 잊지 마십시오.<hpage>네, 재무부.귀하의 서비스가 계속될 것임을 알려주시기 바랍니다.휴대하는 실린더와 다른 실린더가 안전한지 확인하십시오.

original_en_text: ...Dear... grim... Dark it seems now... et these word... become your guide...<page>Hear our voice... Let it... your own! Give... of yourself... for great Pharloom, for... first-children who bequeath it to us... for our salva... sure to come!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的……朝圣者……黑暗笼罩时……谨记这些箴言……<page>倾听吾声……化为己念！为纺络献身……为赐予我们一切的初代子嗣……为即将到来的……救赎！
translated_text: ... Dear ... Now you can make it black. Know your guide.<page>Listen to me and leave your own. Let our first son Salva save the great Pharaoh. "Come here, please.
secondary_translated_text: ...친애하는 ...이제 당신은 그것을 검은색으로 만들 수 있습니다.당신의 가이드를 알아라.<page>내 말을 듣고 네 말을 내버려 두어라.우리의 첫 아들 살바가 위대한 파라오를 구하게 하라. "여기 오세요, 제발.

original_en_text: For a sweet simmer, find me some Vintage Nectar. A rare brew, treasured by bugs with a keen scent for excellence.<page>There’s slim chance such an old yield might still exist. Alas! Its depth of flavour is a necessity for the holy dish!
original_zh_text: 甜味得用陈年蜜露，嗅觉敏锐的老饕才懂欣赏。<page>这陈酿怕是失传了……唉！可圣宴缺不得这醇香！
translated_text: If you want a sweet straw, find honey in the back.Rare beer, cherished by delicate insects and in search of perfection.<page>It is unlikely that this ancient return still exists. Oh! Its depth of taste is indispensable for sacred cuisine!
secondary_translated_text: 달콤한 빨대를 원한다면 뒷부분에서 꿀을 찾아라. 섬세한 곤충들이 소중히 여기는 희귀한 맥주이며 완벽함을 찾는다.<page>이 고대 복귀가 아직도 존재할 가능성은 거의 없다.오! 오!그 맛의 깊이는 신성한 요리에 필수적입니다!

original_en_text: Hark! ...ilgrim! You... climb... our eternal embrace... who stand stru... the threshold... our stark Citadel of stone... kno... true service may now commence.<page>Forget... your weary shell. Forgo... urge to still... arloom commands... give... greatest gift! Join our chor... Raise... shell... voice... and sing!
original_zh_text: 哈！……朝圣者！……你已攀至……永恒怀抱……立于圣堡石阶……须知……真正侍奉现在开始。<page>忘却……疲惫躯壳……摒弃……休憩之欲……纺络……命你……献上……最珍贵礼物！加入合唱……抬起躯壳……放声高歌！
translated_text: Listen to Me! Wicked! You are a... Rise up to the eternal embrace. Who stood up? In the stone castle, the actual service begins.<page>I forgot... We give up, and the momentum continues. Arloom's command has provided... The best gift! Join the choir.Improvements in the neck.The voice is... Drink it!
secondary_translated_text: 내 말 들어봐!사악한 놈!넌...영원한 포옹으로 올라가라.누가 일어섰는가?돌 성에서, 실제 서비스가 시작됩니다.<page>잊어 버렸어...우리는 포기하고, 추진력은 계속된다. Arloom 의 명령은 ...가장 좋은 선물!합창단에 합류해요. 목이 개선되었습니다. 목소리는...마셔!

original_en_text: For the core of the meal, find that marvellous meat... The rasher of a courier, those spritely bugs who once arrived at the toll of every second bell.<page>I saw many a courier gorge upon this fatty snack. Where are they all? Have they abandoned their holy toil?
original_zh_text: 主菜要送货虫的熏肉，那群按点报时的家伙最爱吃。<page>往日时常能在这看见他们，如今连个虫影都没了！
translated_text: At the center of the food are animated insects, which come every time the bell rings, finding tasty meat, trash.<page>I saw many postmen eat fat snacks. Where are they all? Have you given up on your sacred efforts?
secondary_translated_text: 음식의 중심에는 벨이 울릴 때마다 맛있는 고기, 쓰레기를 찾는 애니메이션 곤충이 있습니다.<page>많은 우체부들이 뚱뚱한 간식을 먹는 것을 보았다.다 어디 있어요?당신은 당신의 신성한 노력을 포기했습니까?

original_en_text: The master has a mighty endurance, yet all of this rumbling and breaking makes me fearful for their safety.<page>Fear not. I will stay by their side until my old shell crumbles away.
original_zh_text: 虽说主人铜肠铁胃，但这动静也太吓人了。<page>不过不用怕，我就算拼了命也会保护主人！
translated_text: The owners have strong resistance, but the noise and cracks make them worry about their safety.<page>Don't worry, I'll be with them until my old shell breaks.
secondary_translated_text: 주인들은 저항력이 강하지만 소음과 균열로 인해 안전에 대해 걱정하게됩니다.<page>걱정마, 나는 내 낡은 껍질이 깨질 때까지 그들과 함께 있을거야.

original_en_text: Eggy, eggy, hee hee! I’ll eat a lot, grow big and fat. Then I’ll lay a lot of eggies!<page>They bring me plenty of food, so they must want plenty of eggies.<page>And plenty they shall have, if they’re nice to me! Hee hee!
original_zh_text: 蛋蛋，生蛋蛋！吃饱饱，长胖胖，就能下好多蛋蛋！<page>他们给我这么多吃的，肯定想要好多蛋蛋！<page>只要对我好，要多少有多少！嘻嘻！
translated_text: Eggs, eggs, eggs. In most cases, I am fat and fat. I will try to add a lot of eggs.<page>I wanted eggs because they brought me a lot of food.<page>If you were kind to us, there would be a lot of them. !
secondary_translated_text: 달걀, 달걀, 달걀.대부분의 경우, 나는 뚱뚱하고 뚱뚱하다.나는 계란을 많이 넣으려고 노력할 것이다.<page>나는 달걀을 원했는데, 그들은 나에게 많은 음식을 가져다주었기 때문이다.<page>당신이 우리에게 친절하다면, 그들 중 많은 사람들이있을 것입니다. !

original_en_text: <hpage>I had thought I was answering your summons as a friend, or at least an ally, but now that we stand together in this place I can sense your intent.<hpage>You mean to raise your blades against me. Am I your enemy, then?<page>D-defence of the sacred Citadel, and the voices that fill it-t-t, is the eternal duty of the sentinels.<page>Termination, is the n-n-necessary fate of all those enthralled by the whispering Silk.<hpage>You believe me haunted, a slave to the pale threads? I think you are more perceptive than that. My Silk is my own, as is my will.<page>Unsure, is this sentinel. B-both haunted and innocent, you seem. With regret, this sentinel must t-t-test the strength of your will.
original_zh_text: <hpage>原以为响应的是友军召唤，但此刻感知到你的意图。<hpage>你要兵刃相向？视我为敌？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护其中圣、圣音……哨卫永恒之职。<page>清、清除所有被魂丝蛊惑者……是必要使命。<hpage>你认为我被苍白丝线操控？恐怕你错了，我的灵丝与意志皆属于我。<page>判、判断存疑。你似被侵蚀又似清白。遗憾……哨卫必须测、测试你的意志。
translated_text: <hpage>I thought I had answered his call as a friend, or at least as an ally, but now that I am here, I can sense his intentions.<hpage>They want to attack me with a knife, am I your enemy?<page>The eternal duty of the guardian is to protect the sacred castle and satisfy the sound that is there.<page>The end is the inevitable fate of all those who are enchanted by silk whispers.<hpage>Do you think I'm a ghost? Slaves of White Silk? I think you are smarter than that. My silk is mine, and it is my will.<page>I don't know, he's a bodyguard. He looks amazing and innocent. Unfortunately, this bodyguard has to put his willpower to the test.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 친구로, 또는 적어도 동맹국으로 그의 부름에 응답했다고 생각했지만, 이제 내가 여기에 있기 때문에, 나는 그의 의도를 느낄 수 있습니다.<hpage>그들은 칼로 날 공격하려고 하는데, 내가 너의 적이야?<page>수호자의 영원한 임무는 성을 보호하고 그곳에 있는 소리를 만족시키는 것입니다.<page>끝은 실크 속삭임에 매료 된 모든 사람들의 피할 수없는 운명입니다.<hpage>내가 유령이라고 생각하니?화이트 실크의 노예들?나는 네가 그것보다 똑똑하다고 생각한다.내 실크는 내 것이고, 그것은 나의 뜻이다.<page>난 몰라, 그는 경호원이야.그는 놀랍고 무죄해 보인다.불행히도, 이 경호원은 자신의 의지를 시험해야 한다.

original_en_text: An ornate lock mechanism with a keyhole at its centre.
translated_text: Beautiful closing mechanism with a closing hole in the center.
secondary_translated_text: 중앙에 닫기 구멍이 있는 아름다운 닫기 메커니즘.

original_en_text: The nectar! To think, such an aged extract still exists! What an exquisite tragedy that I cannot taste it myself. My master must have every drop!
original_zh_text: 陈年蜜露！没想到真的还存在，这等陈酿我都没福品尝，全都得给主人留着！
translated_text: Mana! Mana! Mana, Mana! Mana, Mana! Imagine that something so ancient could exist. It's a beautiful tragedy, and I can't enjoy my own. My master will take every drop.
secondary_translated_text: 마나!마나!마나, 마나!마나, 마나!그렇게 오래된 것이 존재할 수 있다고 상상해보세요.그것은 아름다운 비극이고, 나는 나만의 비극을 즐길 수 없다.나의 주인은 모든 방울을 취할 것이다.

original_en_text: Yes! Yes! She gives... It is ours! <hpage>I have passed the relic, Vaultkeeper. Now uphold your promise and aid me with your insight.<page>Fool! Demanding of a Vaultkeeper. Hers is impudence enough to bring death... If she did not carry the scent of Weaver-spawn.<hpage>So you know something of my ancestry, learned bug. If it gains me favour here, then I’ll expect your service in full.<page>Bleg! Dead! Dead, your vicious kind are meant to be. Better methinks to stay as such... <page>Gkkkt. But this one was taught. It shall fold its claws. It shall pass its knowledge, as much as is gleaned.<page>Only to a first child must a Vaultkeeper defer.
original_zh_text: 好！好！她交出了……归我们了！<hpage>遗物给你了，管理员。该兑现承诺了。<page>蠢货！竟敢命令本管理员。这般傲慢本该处死……若不是你带着织者的味道。<hpage>看来你知晓我的血脉，学者虫。若此地以我血脉为尊，我要求你为我效劳。<page>哼！早该灭绝的坏种……还是死干净为好……<page>咳，但本虫受过训诫。它会收起利爪，会分享知识，尽其所能。<page>唯有初代子嗣，能让本管理员低头。
translated_text: Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! Ah, yes! Ah, yes! You gave it to me, it is ours!<hpage>Now, keep your promise and help me with your vision.<page>Damn it, bitch. His swelling was enough to bring death, if it did not bring the smell of tissue eggs.<hpage>We know what mistakes our ancestors made.If you find here my preference, I can't wait for your full service.<page>П р е з о в! He is dead! His villain comrade is sentenced to death. I think it is better to preserve this state.<page>Gkkt. That's what they taught us. Fill it with nails. Spread the accumulated knowledge as much as possible.<page>The Treasurer is subordinate only to the first son.
secondary_translated_text: 아, 그래!아, 네!아, 네!아, 네!네가 나에게 준, 그건 우리의 거야!<hpage>이제, 당신의 약속을 지키고 당신의 비전을 위해 저를 도와주십시오.<page>빌어먹을, 이 창녀.그의 부종은 조직 계란의 냄새를 가져오지 않았다면 죽음을 초래하기에 충분했습니다.<hpage>우리는 우리의 선조들이 저지른 실수를 알고 있습니다. 당신이 여기에서 나의 선호를 발견한다면, 나는 당신의 완전한 서비스를 기다릴 수 없습니다.<page>프레즈오브!그는 죽었어!그의 악당 동료는 사형을 선고받았다.나는 이 상태를 유지하는 것이 낫다고 생각한다.<page>GKKT.그게 그들이 우리에게 가르쳐 준거야.손톱으로 채워주세요.축적된 지식을 최대한 널리 퍼뜨린다.<page>재무관은 첫아들에게만 종속되어 있다.

original_en_text: Oh drab and trembling squib, you who timidly step upon the Great Stage, fate has seen you chosen!<page>Cast away your fear and join me as my partner. Pharloom’s flame may flicker, but together we shall spark it ablaze!<page>Let us enliven this Citadel lost to silence! Let us rouse the soul of this once great land!
original_zh_text: 怯懦的可怜虫啊，既踏上伟大舞台，便是命运所选！<page>抛却恐惧，与我共演！重燃纺络将熄的火焰！<page>唤醒沉寂的圣堡！唤醒这片土地的魂魄！
translated_text: O monotonous and trembling trousers, the cowards of the great scene, fate has seen the chosen!<page>Let go of your fears and be my friend.The fire may burn, let's burn together!<page>Let 's recreate the quiet castle! Let us awaken the spirit of this great people.
secondary_translated_text: 오, 단조롭고 떨리는 바지, 위대한 장면의 겁쟁이, 운명은 선택받은 사람을 보았다!<page>너의 두려움을 버리고 나의 친구가 되라 불은 타오를지도 몰라 함께 타자!<page>조용한 성을 재창조하자!이 위대한 민족의 정신을 깨우자.

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I am seeking a melody held by your vaults, part of a set to open a path above. Tell me what you know of it.<page>The Weaver-thing would claim our sacred melody?! How grim the age we survive to see... Vile sacrilege for it to pass to an outsider...<page>Only our pontiff, lived long and low within our vault, they held the melody, jealously, covetously... A learning for the highest Vaultkeeper, and them alone.<page>A truth they were told to have found... There in the dark. Something within the melody, or the words. Something to set them silent... <hpage>I am not afraid of what I’ll hear, Vaultkeeper. If your pontiff and their melody wait below, I shall find them both.
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我在寻找书库的旋律，用于开启上层通路。把你知道的告诉我。<page>织者竟想染指圣歌？！……何等黑暗的时代……异乡客妄图窃取圣律……<page>唯有深居书库之底的主教知晓……最高机密，独享的学识……<page>据说他们在地底发现了什么……旋律或歌词中的真相……令其沉默的真相……<hpage>我不惧真相，管理员。若你的主教在底下等着，我会找到他们。
translated_text: <hpage>Treasurer, I am looking for a melody to download to your tape as part of the open path from above. "<page>Is there anything that takes away your sacred melody? How hard it was to live, what a contemptible shame it would be to hand it over to strangers!<page>Only the father, who lived a long and humble life in our graves, understood the melody with malice and greed.<page>They say that they have learned the truth. Something in the melody, or words in the darkness. Something that helps you to calm down.<hpage>I 'm not afraid of what I 'll hear, baby.If your daddy and your melody are waiting for you below, I 'll find them. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>재무장관님, 저는 위에서 열린 경로의 일환으로 테이프에 다운로드할 멜로디를 찾고 있습니다. "<page>당신의 신성한 멜로디를 빼앗는 어떤 것이 있습니까?사는 것이 얼마나 힘들었는가, 낯선 사람에게 그것을 넘겨주는 것은 얼마나 경멸스러운 수치였는가!<page>오직 우리의 무덤에서 길고 겸손한 삶을 살았던 아버지만이 악의와 탐욕으로 멜로디를 이해했습니다.<page>그들은 진실을 알게 되었다고 말한다.멜로디 속의 무언가가, 어둠 속의 단어들당신을 진정시키는 데 도움이 되는 것.<hpage>내가 듣는 것이 두렵지 않아, 아가야. 너의 아빠와 너의 멜로디가 아래에서 너를 기다리고 있다면, 나는 그들을 찾을 것이다. "

original_en_text: Yes! A fair gift, Weaver-spawn. This Vaultkeeper shall glean what knowledge a great mind can.
original_zh_text: 好！公平交易，织者坏种。本管理员将用智慧解析其中奥义。
translated_text: Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! This is a great gift from Weaver. Professionals collect knowledge that allows them to master great ideas.
secondary_translated_text: 아, 그래!아, 네!이것은 Weaver 의 훌륭한 선물입니다.전문가는 훌륭한 아이디어를 마스터 할 수있는 지식을 수집합니다.

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall guide.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等引领。
translated_text: Even when it is over, the music continues.<page>Because of a false eternity we lead.
secondary_translated_text: 끝나고도 음악은 계속된다.<page>우리가 이끌고 있는 거짓의 영원 때문이다.

original_en_text: Grkkt. What has she brought it? More treasures waiting on a Keeper’s insight, yes? The sacred cylinders of our holy Citadel? Pass them. Give them. Now! She must!
original_zh_text: 咔！她带了什么？更多需要解读的圣物？圣堡的圣咏音筒？快交出来！必须立刻交出来！
translated_text: GROUGH: What did you bring with you? There are many treasures that await the intuition of the keeper. The Sacred Castle Vault.Give them more than they did. Now! " Must! "
secondary_translated_text: GROUGH: 당신은 무엇을 가지고 왔습니까?관리자의 직감을 기다리는 많은 보물이 있습니다.신성한 성의 금고, 그들이 했던 것보다 더 많은 것을 그들에게 주시오.지금! ' 꼭! "

translated_text: <hpage>"I 'm here, Goldman.

original_en_text: Eternal, is the Citadel. Et-t-ternal, is the devotion of the sentinels.<page>While its shell is f-f-functional, this sentinel will hold true to its duty.
original_zh_text: 圣堡永存，哨、哨卫的忠诚也永存。<page>只要机能尚存……职责不怠。
translated_text: The castle is eternal. Eternal loyalty is the loyalty of the guards.<page>Despite a fully functional helmet, the Sentinel faithfully performs its mission.
secondary_translated_text: 성은 영원합니다.영원한 충성심은 경비원의 충성심이다.<page>완전한 기능의 헬멧에도 불구하고, 센티넬은 충실하게 임무를 수행합니다.

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, you rare chosen who hath ascended to this final threshold, listen to our wish, deliver it, that you may rise above and see your pilgrimage end.
original_zh_text: 永恒纺络的朝圣者啊，荣登终阶的稀世天选。聆听我等祈愿，实现我等祈愿。方可升华，得见朝圣终焉。
translated_text: His rare choice, the eternal pilgrim of the signature, came to this last entrance, heard our vows, fulfilled it, and allowed him to go beyond and see the end of his pilgrimage.
secondary_translated_text: 그의 희귀한 선택, 서명 영원한 순례자는이 마지막 입구에 와서 우리의 서약을 듣고 그것을 성취하고 그 너머로 가서 그의 순례의 끝을 볼 수있게했습니다.

original_en_text: Interloper! On you, our pontiff’s sacred melody! You have found it, hold it, and now you dally, lost like a mite in our shelves!<page>Return to the listening room below! The sacred cylinder can be played, and the melody of our vaults heard at last in this damned age stretched long.
original_zh_text: 入侵者！你已经找到主教圣歌，却还在此游荡！<page>回下层聆听室去！圣音筒可以演奏了，圣歌终将在此黑暗时代重现！
translated_text: The Invasion. You are the holy melody of our Father! You have found it, and you have it, but now you are wandering through our regiments, you are lost like a tick!<page>Please return to the listening room below! We touch the sacred pillar, and in this accursed hour we finally hear the melody of our treasures.
secondary_translated_text: 침략이다.여러분은 우리 아버지의 거룩한 멜로디입니다!당신은 그것을 발견했고, 당신은 그것을 가지고 있지만, 지금 당신은 우리 연대를 방황하고 있습니다, 당신은 진드기처럼 길을 잃었습니다!<page>아래의 청취실로 돌아가주세요!우리는 신성한 기둥을 만지고, 이 저주받은 시간에 우리는 마침내 우리의 보물의 멜로디를 듣습니다.

original_en_text: Taste, smell, texture... It is done! A meal to rival Pharloom’s finest.<page>Mighty master, how long you have waited to set your jaw upon so perfect a dish! Join us, and dine!
original_zh_text: 色、香、味……俱全！纺络的绝世盛宴！<page>我的主人，让您久等了！快醒醒，开饭啦！
translated_text: The taste, smell and consistency are full. This food is comparable to the best food in the farm.<page>Master, how long have you waited to eat such a tasty dish? Dinner together!
secondary_translated_text: 맛과 냄새와 일관성이 가득합니다.이 음식은 농장에서 가장 맛있는 음식과 비교할 수 있습니다.<page>사부님, 얼마나 기다렸어요 이렇게 맛있는 요리를 먹으러 오셨나요?함께 저녁을 먹어요!

original_en_text: Yummy, yummy... oh! Are you here to serve me?<hpage>I am merely a visitor here, little one. Have you made this place your home, then?<page>My home? Oh yes! Lovely and warm. The big ones, they bring me food whenever I’m hungry. And I’m hungry now!
original_zh_text: 饿饿……咦？你是来喂我的吗？<hpage>我只是路过，小家伙。你把这当作巢穴了？<page>巢穴？对呀！又暖又舒服。大个子们总给我带吃的！现在就好饿！
translated_text: Delicious, delicious. Oh! Oh! Are you here to serve me?<hpage>I'm just a visitor, a little man. Do you think this is your home?<page>My own house? Oh yeah! It is very beautiful and warm. He gave me food when I was hungry. I was hungry!
secondary_translated_text: 맛있어, 맛있어.오! 오!오! 오!나를 섬기러 온 거야?<hpage>나는 단지 방문자일 뿐이야, 작은 사람일 뿐이야, 너는 여기가 너의 집이라고 생각하니?<page>내 집? Oh yeah!그것은 매우 아름답고 따뜻하다.그는 내가 배가 고팠을 때 나에게 음식을 주었다.배가 고팠어요!

original_en_text: <hpage>I have more pressing tasks, sir. Perhaps your master should content themself with a humbler meal?<page>Blasphemy! My master shall have the holy indulgence they deserve, even if I must douse my shell in oil and climb onto a dish myself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我有要事在身，让你主人先将就吃点吧？<page>放肆！就算把我榨成油膏摆上桌，也要让主人享用圣宴！
translated_text: <hpage>We have a more immediate task. "Do you want your guests to get simple meals?<page>Even if I had to dip my shells in oil and go up to the plate, my hosts deserve the divine forgiveness they deserve.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>우리는 더 즉각적인 과제를 가지고 있다. "손님들이 간편한 식사를 하고 싶으십니까? "<page>비록 내가 기름에 내 껍질을 담그고 접시에 올라가야 할지라도, 나의 호스트는 그들이 마땅히 받아야 할 신성한 용서를받을 자격이 있습니다.

original_en_text: To season a meal such as this... only a Crustnut will do. Once, scores of them could be gathered, high atop those coral crusted caves beyond the Grand Gate.<page>Surely some must still grow within that sand-ravaged land?
original_zh_text: 调味……一定得用硬壳果。珊瑚川里以前满地都是，现在就算只剩沙堆，应该也能刨到几颗。
translated_text: The taste of these dishes.Only nuts are produced with shells.Once dozens of birds gathered on the top of a cave covered with corals.<page>Will they grow on sandy soil?
secondary_translated_text: 이 요리의 맛. 견과류만 껍질로 만들어집니다. 한때 산호로 덮인 동굴 꼭대기에 수십 마리의 새가 모였습니다.<page>그들은 모래 토양에서 자랄 것인가?

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall teach.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等教化。
translated_text: Even when it is over, the music continues.<page>For the eternal disciples, we teach.
secondary_translated_text: 끝나고도 음악은 계속된다.<page>영원한 제자들을 위해, 우리는 가르친다.

original_en_text: We would hear the voice of the Keepers, within their grand vaults.<page>They who guard our history, our prayers and our secrets, across the ages.
original_zh_text: 我等欲闻典藏司铎之音，回荡宏伟书库。<page>他们守护历史、祷文与秘辛，跨越无尽纪元。
translated_text: You will hear the voice of the Guardian in your beautiful breasts.<page>They contain our history, our prayers, and our eternal secrets.
secondary_translated_text: 당신은 당신의 아름다운 가슴에서 수호자의 목소리를 들을 것입니다.<page>그것들은 우리의 역사, 우리의 기도, 그리고 우리의 영원한 비밀을 담고 있다.

original_en_text: Pickled Muckmaggot! So that banished chef’s recipes outlived them after all!<hpage>Not so, sir. I claimed the maggot from the chef themself. Their brutish work continued, even with their shell claimed by cursed thread.<page>Incredible! A bug so devout, they could cook with mind expunged. This Citadel was far too hasty to expel such brilliance.
original_zh_text: 腌淤秽蛆！卢戈利的秘方居然没失传！<hpage>我从他本人手里抢的，那家伙变丝傀了还在做菜。<page>厉害！没脑子还能掌勺，圣堡当初就不该赶他走！
translated_text: Kimchi Worms: Why Refugee Chef 's Recipes Last Longer Than These<hpage>This is not true. I removed worms from the kitchen. Their barbaric work continues even when the sinks are covered with cursed threads.<page>It's incredible! With such a godly insect they can cook without thinking about anything.The fortress was too hasty to pursue such fame.
secondary_translated_text: 김치 벌레 : 난민 요리사의 요리법이 이것보다 오래 지속되는 이유<hpage>이것은 사실이 아니다.부엌에서 벌레를 제거했다.그들의 야만적인 작업은 싱크대가 저주받은 실로 덮여 있을 때에도 계속된다.<page>정말 대단해요!이렇게 경건한 곤충으로 그들은 아무 생각도 없이 요리를 할 수 있다. 요새는 너무 성급하게 그런 명성을 추구했다.

original_en_text: <hpage>I could track down any ingredient you desire, for a price. The oil you keep here may be of some use to me.<hpage>Promise it as reward, and your master shall have his meal.<page>Hrmph! Such a squalid bargain ill befits a holy servant... but so be it. Fetch me the ingredients and you shall have that pale condiment for yourself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不能白白替你跑腿，拿这瓶油当酬劳吧。<hpage>答应的话，你的主人说不定能如愿吃上大餐。<page>哼！卑劣的交易……罢了，找回食材，苍白油就归你！
translated_text: <hpage>Depending on the price you can find your favorite ingredients.The butter you have may be useful for me.<hpage>As a reward, the owner gives the prize to the owner.<page>Hoon-hoon! ! Such a dirty shell is not suitable for a samurai, but that's it. You can skip the ingredients and eat a soft temper!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>가격에 따라 당신이 좋아하는 재료를 찾을 수 있습니다. 버터는 나에게 유용 할 수 있습니다.<hpage>보너스로, 주인은 주인에게 상을 준다.<page>쿤쿤! !이런 더러운 껍질은 사무라이에게 적합하지 않지만, 그냥 재료는 생략하고 부드러운 분위기를 먹을 수 있습니다!

original_en_text: What an awful clattering! Would you kindly conduct yourself a little more carefully?<page>And why are you adorned in such an awful, livid red? By my oath, those above must make a sport of sending me the most wretched servants they can find!<hpage>I am no servant, sir, rather a guest of sorts, invited by the Citadel. Tell me, is this vial of oil on display your own?<page>Nothing here is my own, you impertinent young mite! This sacred hall, and all the food contained within, belong to my most exalted master.<page>The Great Gourmand! The finest connoisseur who has ever lived, the one whose tastes transcend the ages!<page>None are left now who venerate them as they deserve, save for the loyal, lonely bug who stands before you.<page>That oil is merely a small savoury to whet their appetite for the grand meal to come. A spectacular, Pharloom spanning dish that I have been planning for an age.<page>But alas, those above seem to have forsaken my poor master! And I have grown so old. Now I can never hope to gather the necessary ingredients. Blast their indolence!
original_zh_text: 叮叮咣咣吵死了！能安静点吗？<page>还有你为什么穿这身鲜红刺眼的装扮？上面那些混蛋专派些歪瓜裂枣来侍奉我！<hpage>我可不是仆从，算是圣堡的客人。这瓶油是你的藏品？<page>当然不是我的，你这没耐心的小虫！这里一切都属于我尊贵的主人——大胃王！<page>那是空前绝后的美食家！品味超越时代的存在！<page>如今只剩我忠心耿耿侍奉主人，其他虫早忘了本分。<page>那点油不过是开胃小菜，我筹备的可是横跨纺络的盛宴！<page>可恨上面那帮懒鬼断了供给，我这把老骨头哪凑得齐食材！
translated_text: What a beautiful song from the CM! Will it be cautious? "<page>Why do you wear such a bad dress? I swear the people up there will give me the happiest servants they can find!<hpage>I'm not the ruler, but a guest of the castle. The bottles of oil on the exhibition are yours?<page>It 's not me, little strong tick! "This sacred room and all the food contained in it belong to my greatest master.<page>Super gourmet. A taste of timelessness.<page>No one has the respect they deserve, except the devoted, lonely insects standing before them.<page>The butter has a slightly salty taste that can stimulate the appetite for the next meal.I have been cooking a great dish from the Faroe Islands for a long time.<page>But, oh, the people up there seem to have left my poor teacher behind. I'm getting old. I don't collect the necessary ingredients. Fuck the lace!
secondary_translated_text: CM 의 아름다운 노래!신중하게 할 것인가? "<page>너는 왜 이렇게 나쁜 옷을 입었니?저 위에 있는 사람들은 그들이 찾을 수 있는 가장 행복한 하인을 내게 줄 것이라고 맹세합니다!<hpage>나는 통치자가 아니라 성의 손님이다.전시회에 있는 기름병은 당신의 것입니까?<page>나 아니야, 작은 강진 진드기! "이 거룩한 방과 그 안에 들어 있는 모든 음식은 나의 가장 위대한 주인에게 속해 있다.<page>슈퍼 미식가.시간 없는 맛을 맛본다.<page>그들 앞에 서있는 헌신적이고 외로운 곤충 외에는 아무도 그들이받을 자격이있는 존경심을 얻지 못합니다.<page>버터는 약간 짠맛이 있어 다음 식사 식욕을 자극할 수 있다. 나는 오랫동안 페로 제도에서 맛있는 요리를 요리해 왔다.<page>하지만, 오, 저기 있는 사람들은 내 불쌍한 선생을 뒤에 두고 떠났어.나 나이가 들어서.나는 필요한 재료를 수집하지 않는다.젠장, 레이스!

original_en_text: Horrid she! What fool dares strike a holy Vaultkeeper! It has knowledge! Insight! As much as any could possibly retain in our fallen age.<page>Would she cast it all aside just to create more death? If so, she is Weaver to the core!
original_zh_text: 疯婆子！竟敢袭击本管理员！本管理员可是掌握着末世最全的学识！<page>你要为了杀戮抛弃这些知识？果真是纯血织者！
translated_text: She's awful! Attacking a security guard is stupid. I have knowledge! Checking! Save as much as possible during this period of reduction.<page>Can he give up everything and cause more deaths? If so, then it is the perfect fabric!
secondary_translated_text: 그녀는 끔찍하다!경비원을 공격하는 것은 어리석은 일이다.나는 지식을 가지고 있다!확인 중입니다!이 기간 동안 가능한 한 많은 돈을 절약하십시오.<page>그는 모든 것을 포기하고 더 많은 죽음을 일으킬 수 있습니까?만약 그렇다면, 그것은 완벽한 직물입니다!

original_en_text: So be it, impudent louse! Deny our kingdom’s agony. Refuse its touch upon your fickle shell!<page>Carve your hapless path. Stalk, and strike, and fight, but know your foe is fate herself, and she has risen raging!
original_zh_text: 那就这样吧，狂妄的虱子！拒绝感受王国的苦痛。让你善变的甲壳隔绝这一切！<page>走你的死路吧。即便你能潜伏、突袭、战斗，但记住你的敌人是命运本身——而她已怒火滔天！
translated_text: Face without shame.Do not touch your capricious shell, which denies the suffering of my kingdom!<page>Hunt, fight, fight, but your enemy is fate itself. And he rises in anger!
secondary_translated_text: 부끄러움 없이 얼굴하라. 내 왕국이 고통을 부인하는 너의 변덕스러운 껍질을 건드리지 마라!<page>사냥하고, 싸우고, 싸우고, 당신의 적은 운명 자체입니다.그리고 그는 분노로 일어납니다!

original_en_text: Pain! Pain! Do you hear her cries, cursed spider-spawn!? Pharloom suffers for our pathetic, mortal ignorance! We fail it and it falls! <page>Knowledge is needed. More and more! It must be hoarded, sought! Strength to understand, to calm and quell.<hpage>It is action now that needs taking, Vaultkeeper, by myself and those left alive who would aid me.<hpage>Seek solutions in your texts and psalms as you may, but they alone will not be enough to heal a pain so great.
original_zh_text: 痛苦！痛苦！听见她的哀嚎了吗，该死的蜘蛛坏种！？纺络正因我们可悲的愚昧受苦！我们辜负了它，它要灭亡了！<page>需要知识。无穷无尽的知识！必须囤积，必须追寻！需要力量去理解，去安抚，去镇压。<hpage>现在需要的是行动，管理员。由我，以及其他愿意相助的生者来执行。<hpage>你尽管在经卷圣歌中寻求解法，但光靠这些不足以治愈如此深重的伤痛。
translated_text: It hurts! That hurts! You heard him cry, you goddamn spider egg! Pharaoh was a man who was a man, and he was a man who was a man.<page>Knowledge is needed, more and more! Preservation and search! Understanding, calm, the power of calm.<hpage>The Guardian is an action that needs to be taken now to help me and those who are alive.<hpage>Do your best to find a solution in the Bible and in the Psalms, but that alone will not heal great suffering.
secondary_translated_text: 아플 거야!아팠다!그가 우는 걸 들었잖아, 이 망할 거미알아!파라오는 한 사람이었고, 한 사람이었다.<page>지식은 점점 더 필요하다!보존 및 검색!이해, 침착, 침착의 힘.<hpage>가디언은 나와 살아있는 사람들을 돕기 위해 지금 취해야 할 행동입니다.<hpage>성서와 시편에서 해결책을 찾으려고 최선을 다하십시오. 하지만 그것만으로는 큰 고통을 치유하지 못할 것입니다.

original_en_text: Yessss! See them all! Its collection gleams complete. Such sacred understanding, stored safe.<page>You have performed your part, Weaver-spawn... The agreement is concluded. Knowledge and rosaries, all were passed fair. No more between us.<page>Leave this Keeper to its treasures and their insights. It has given its service. Now this Keeper wants its time alone!
original_zh_text: 好极了！看啊！藏品终于完整了。如此神圣的智慧，安然封存。<page>你完成了约定，织者坏种……交易结束。知识与念珠，两清。你我两不相欠。<page>让本管理员独享珍宝与真知吧。职责已尽。现在我只想独处！
translated_text: Ah, yeah! Everyone, look at him! The show was wonderful. This sacred understanding remains true.<page>You have fulfilled your duty, or your descendants.We have reached an agreement.Knowledge and Rosary communicate well.There is nothing between us.<page>Leave this guard to your treasure and intuition. They are already offering their services. Now this person wants some time to himself!
secondary_translated_text: 아, 그래!여러분, 그를 보세요!그 쇼는 훌륭했다.이 신성한 이해는 여전히 진실입니다.<page>당신은 당신의 의무를 완수했거나, 당신의 후손. 우리는 합의에 도달했습니다. 지식과 로자리는 잘 소통합니다. 우리 사이에는 아무 것도 없습니다.<page>이 경호원은 당신의 보물과 직감에 맡기십시오.그들은 이미 그들의 서비스를 제공하고 있다.이제 이 사람은 자기만의 시간을 갖고 싶어!

original_en_text: <hpage>Show me your collection, Vaultkeeper.<page>Grkt, Weaver-spawn! She is a bother! Nuisance! Bring more gifts. The collection still has gaps!
original_zh_text: <hpage>展示你的收藏，管理员。<page>咔！烦人的坏种！拿更多贡品来！本管理员的收藏还有空缺！
translated_text: <hpage>- Show me your collection, Mr. Chairman.<page>Come on, Viver! You're in trouble! It's so wonderful! Give me other gifts. The collection has some flaws.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>- 회장님, 컬렉션을 보여주세요.<page>어서, 비버!넌 곤경에 처해 있어!정말 멋지다!다른 선물을 주세요.이 컬렉션에는 몇 가지 결함이 있다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Gilded one, what remained of the Citadel has been torn apart by the black threads. Still you keep to your duty?<page>While voices still fill the g-g-great chambers... the sacred task of the sentinels continues.<page>To defend... To p-p-protect.
original_zh_text: <hpage>金甲虫，圣堡残骸已被黑丝撕裂。还不放弃职责么？<page>只要圣、圣殿……仍存余音，哨卫之职……不止。<page>守、守卫……守护。
translated_text: <hpage>The remnants of the golden fortress have broken the black lines. Can you fulfill your obligations?<page>The voice is always Mr. G, I can't do that. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -<page>Protection for protection.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>황금 요새의 잔재들은 검은 선을 깼다.당신은 당신의 의무를 다할 수 있습니까?<page>목소리는 항상 Mr. G, 나는 그것을 할 수 없다. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -<page>보호를 위한 보호.

original_en_text: You dally, still? If you wish to earn your reward, you should be hunting down those ingredients! Or do you need directions from a serving-bug with some experience?
original_zh_text: 还磨蹭什么？想要报酬就赶紧的！还是说要本大厨给你指点指点方向？
translated_text: Are you whisper? If you want to win, look for these products! Do you need expert advice on mistakes in your work?
secondary_translated_text: 너 속삭이는 거야?이 제품을 구입하고 싶다면, 이 제품을 구입하십시오!업무 실수에 대한 전문적인 조언이 필요하십니까?

original_en_text: The Weaver-spawn, she has found it! Our pontiff’s sacred cylinder, stolen from the dark below...<page>Never! States our law. Never must our melody pass to a bug not Keeper! But you, fool Weaver, would shatter those tenants with reckless ease.<hpage>Your pontiff is gone, Vaultkeeper. Your fellows have fallen to husk or thread. What laws once bound these vaults died with them.<page>Ackk! Fine, cursed she. Claim the sacred song, and pain to you if we both are damned forever for it!
original_zh_text: 织者坏种，她得手了！她夺走主教的圣音筒……<page>休想！律法规定，圣歌绝不可外传！但你这坏种竟然轻易践踏戒律。<hpage>你的主教死了，管理员。同僚都化作空壳或丝偶，昔日的律法也随他们入土了。<page>咳！随你便，诅咒你。带走圣歌吧，愿我们永堕地狱！
translated_text: "Wider, we found him. " - The Pope 's Ark was stolen in the dark.<page>No way! The law explains: Our melodies do not reach worms or guards! But your silly attic will easily crush the tenant.<hpage>Your partner fell into a shell or rope. The laws governing these resources also disappeared.<page>Everything is okay, everything is okay! Sing this holy song. If you were cursed forever, you would suffer.
secondary_translated_text: "더 넓어, 우리는 그를 찾았다.교황의 방주는 어둠 속에서 도난당했다.<page>어쩔 수 없어!법은 설명합니다 : 우리의 멜로디는 벌레나 경비원에게 도달하지 않습니다!하지만 당신의 멍청한 다락방은 세입자를 쉽게 분쇄할 것이다.<hpage>당신의 파트너는 껍질이나 밧줄에 떨어졌습니다.이러한 자원을 관리하는 법도 사라졌다.<page>모든 게 괜찮아, 모든 게 괜찮아!이 거룩한 노래를 부르세요.만일 당신이 영원히 저주받았다면, 당신은 고통을 겪게 될 것이다.

original_en_text: <hpage>I return, bug, and ask to hear your melody again, that I may lock it clear in my mind.<page>Very well, good pilgrim. For one so fiercely devout as yourself, gladly will I give this gift.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我回来了，请你再演奏一遍旋律，我要记牢。<page>好，虔信者。为了你这般赤诚，我很乐意演奏。
translated_text: <hpage>I 'm back, Bug, I want you to listen to my music again so I can close it clear in my head.<page>It was a good pilgrimage. For someone like you, I give you this gift.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>내가 돌아왔어, 버그, 내 음악을 다시 듣고 싶어, 그래서 내 머릿속에서 그것을 명확하게 닫을 수 있습니다.<page>그것은 좋은 순례였다.너 같은 사람을 위해, 나는 너에게 이 선물을 주었어.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your master seems satisfied, sir. It is time you gave what was promised.<page>Yes. Yes! It has been done! Made and served. A dish to match my master’s refined desires.<page>The pale trifle is yours. Take it and leave! My master needs time to reflect, and I must ponder on flavours anew!
original_zh_text: <hpage>你的主人看来很满意，该兑现承诺了吧？<page>对，对！主人吃得很满意！<page>苍白油是你的了，拿走吧！主人还要好好回味，我也要构思新菜式了！
translated_text: <hpage>The owner seems satisfied with this. It 's time to keep our promises.<page>Ah, yeah! Ah, yes! It's over! The dishes are ready to meet the requests of the guests.<page>The little white thing is yours. Take it with you! Teachers need time to think.You need to reconsider your preferences!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>주인은 이것에 만족해 보인다.이제 우리의 약속을 지킬 때입니다.<page>아, 그래!아, 네!끝났어요!요리는 손님의 요구에 맞게 준비되어 있습니다.<page>작은 흰색은 당신의 것입니다.그것을 가지고 가세요!교사들은 생각할 시간이 필요하다. 너는 너의 선호를 재고해야 한다!

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I bring the psalm cylinder recovered from the dark chambers below here. I would learn its melody.<page>Kak! Then pass it, filthy Weaver-spawn! A cylinder so sacred should not remain a moment longer in your grubby claws!
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我带来了下层密室的圣咏音筒，要学习其中旋律。<page>咔！交出来，肮脏的织者坏种！此等圣物岂能在你脏爪中多留一秒！
translated_text: <hpage>I picked up the anthem pipe I had found in the dark room under the treasury to learn its melody.<page>Stay with this! Such a sacred cylinder will no longer fit in your dirty nails!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 금고 아래의 어두운 방에서 찾은 국가 파이프를 집어 들고 그 멜로디를 배웠다.<page>이것과 함께!그런 거룩한 원통은 더 이상 당신의 더러운 손톱에 맞지 않을 것입니다!

original_en_text: Hold them, will she? Covet them? Can she not part with such a small prize?<page>Remain blind fool she. This Keeper’s understanding stays with itself.
original_zh_text: 她想私藏？如此贪婪？连这点小礼都吝啬？<page>她就继续当瞎子吧。本管理员的智慧自会保留。
translated_text: Would you take me? Do you want this? Don't want that price?<page>Even if you continue to blindly cheat on her, your parents ' perception will not change.
secondary_translated_text: 날 데려다 줄래?이걸 원해?그 가격을 원하지 않나요?<page>당신이 계속 맹목적으로 그녀에게 속임수를 쓰더라도, 부모님의 인식은 변하지 않을 것입니다.

original_en_text: Weaver-thing! Does she hope to spy upon our treasured records?<page>Within our vast store, always more there is to know, the old methods of prayer, to this land, to its rulers, and to the strength at its heart.
original_zh_text: 织者坏种！她想窥探我们的珍贵典籍？<page>在我们的浩瀚典藏中，有古老祷文，有统治之术，还有……核心力量的秘辛。
translated_text: Does Geneva want to steal our valuable documents?<page>Amidst our vast shops and ancient forms of prayer, there is always something to learn about the earth, its rulers and central forces.
secondary_translated_text: 제네바가 우리의 귀중한 문서를 훔치려고 하는가?<page>우리의 광대한 상점과 고대 형태의 기도 속에서, 지구와 그 통치자 및 중심 세력에 대해 배울 것이 항상 있습니다.

original_en_text: She carries a precious cylinder! She must give it! Share it! Claw to claw!<page>Pass it! And this Vaultkeeper shall grant their wisdom. Just a small taste! A trickle! A glimmer! Of our Citadel’s sacred understandings.
original_zh_text: 她带着圣咏音筒！必须交出来！分享！交出来！<page>递过来！本管理员便赐予智慧。只需浅尝！一滴！一缕！圣堡的至高真知！
translated_text: I have a lovely bottle, you should have done it! Let 's share this! PAW in PAW.<page>Go through this! The Treasury gives wisdom. Beep! One of the lights! The sacred understanding of the castle.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 아름다운 병을 가지고있다, 당신은 그것을해야했다!이걸 공유해 보자! PAW 에서 PAW<page>이걸 통해!보물은 지혜를 준다.비프!빛 중 하나!성에 대한 신성한 이해.

original_en_text: Woken, is this sentinel. F-f-f-functional, is its shell.<page>Still devoted, is this s-s-sentinel, and awaiting your commandment.<hpage>You speak, gilded one? I’ve no command for you, but my curiosity is piqued.<hpage>You call yourself a sentinel. What is it you are charged with protecting?<page>Defence of the sacred C-c-citadel, and the voices that fill it-t-t, is our eternal duty.<hpage>I had assumed as much. Yet look around you, gilded one. During your slumber, the Citadel has fallen, and its voices lay silent. This place is dead, or very nearly.<hpage>Some would argue that standing guard over a kingdom’s corpse is a foolish task, empty of meaning. I wonder then, will you still hold true to your charge?
original_zh_text: 苏、苏醒，本哨卫。功、功能正常。<page>忠、忠诚依旧，静候指令。<hpage>金甲虫，你会说话？我无意下令，但很好奇。<hpage>你自称哨卫，是在守护何物？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护其中圣、圣音，是哨卫的永恒之职。<hpage>意料之中。但环顾四周吧，圣堡已然倾颓，圣音皆已沉寂。此地已是坟冢。<hpage>守卫已死的王国已没有意义，你依然要恪守职责么？
translated_text: The security guard woke me up. The F-f - f function is its shell.<page>This guard is faithful, waiting for your orders.<hpage>Did you say O? I didn't get any orders, but my curiosity grew.<hpage>They 're called guards, what should they protect?<page>It is our eternal duty to preserve the sacred castle of C-C and the sounds that fill it.<hpage>I think so too, but look around. The castle is crumbling while you sleep, and you hear no noise. This place is dead or almost dead.<hpage>Some believe that the protection of the body of the kingdom is useless and pointless.
secondary_translated_text: 경비원이 나를 깨웠다. F - f - f 함수는 그것의 쉘입니다.<page>이 경비원은 충성스럽고 당신의 명령을 기다리고 있습니다.<hpage>O 라고 하셨나요?나는 어떤 명령도 받지 못했지만 호기심이 커졌다.<hpage>그들은 경비원이라고 불리는데, 무엇을 보호해야 하는가?<page>C - C 의 신성한 성과 그 성을 채우는 소리를 보존하는 것은 우리의 영원한 의무입니다.<hpage>저도 그렇게 생각하지만 주변을 둘러보세요.성이 무너지고 있는 동안 잠을 자는 동안, 당신은 소음이 들리지 않는다.이 곳은 죽거나 거의 죽었습니다.<hpage>어떤 사람들은 왕국의 몸을 보호하는 것이 쓸모없고 무의미하다고 생각합니다.

original_en_text: One must not wander idle between these sacred shelves! This is a holy place. Reverence! It is demanded.<page>If the fool she wishes to view this Keeper’s collection, head to the listening room below.
original_zh_text: 休要在圣架间闲逛！此处是圣地，需心怀敬畏！<page>想看本管理员的收藏？去下层聆听室。
translated_text: You cannot walk among these sacred regiments. This is a sacred place, please respect me. This is necessary.<page>For idiots who want to see The Guardian 's collection, head to the auditorium below.
secondary_translated_text: 여러분은 이 신성한 연단들 사이를 걸어갈 수 없습니다.이곳은 신성한 곳이니 나를 존중해 주세요. 이것은 필수입니다.<page>가디언의 컬렉션을보고 싶어하는 바보들은 아래의 강당으로 가십시오.

original_en_text: <hpage>My choice is made. I cannot leave. I must descend again, and see Pharloom freed.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我意已决，不能就这样离开。必须重返地底，解放纺络。
translated_text: <hpage>I could no longer walk and fell down again to see Faro released.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 더 이상 걸을 수 없었고, 파로가 풀려나는 것을 보기 위해 다시 쓰러졌습니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>The signs of battle here are clear, gilded one. Is it your charge then to hunt the haunted, even if they be of the Citadel’s ruling castes?<page>Defence of the sacred Cit-t-tadel, and the voices that fill it, is the eternal d-duty of the sentinels.<page>Termination, is the n-n-necessary fate of all those enthralled by the whispering Silk.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此地战斗痕迹明显，金甲虫。你的职责包括猎杀圣堡贵族中的被蛊惑者？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护圣音……哨卫永恒之职。<page>清除受魂、魂丝蛊惑……...是必要使命。
translated_text: <hpage>The traces of the battle are clear and golden.Even if you belong to the castle's ruling caste, do you know? Is it your job to hunt for ghosts?<page>The Guardian 's eternal duty is to protect the holy city of Tadel and satisfy its noise.<page>The end is the inevitable fate of all those who are enchanted by silk whispers.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>전투의 흔적은 맑고 황금빛이다. 성의 지배 계급에 속하더라도, 당신은 그것을 알고 있습니까?유령을 사냥하는 것이 당신의 직업입니까?<page>가디언의 영원한 임무는 신성한 도시 타델을 보호하고 그 소음을 만족시키는 것입니다.<page>끝은 실크 속삭임에 매료 된 모든 사람들의 피할 수없는 운명입니다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Out there lie the endless wastes... If I cross them now, Pharloom shall fall to a black fate of my making.<hpage>My choice is made. I will not abandon its bugs to that grim end. I must descend again, and cut them free.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若现在越过那片荒原，纺络将因我堕入黑暗……<hpage>我意已决，不能抛下纺络的虫民。必须折返，斩断丝缚。
translated_text: <hpage>If we cross them now, Falun will fall into the dark fate that I have created.<hpage>My choice is made. I will not give up on the mistakes that led to this cruel end. I must save them again, and I must do it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>만약 우리가 지금 그들을 통과한다면, 파룬은 내가 창조한 어두운 운명에 빠질 것이다.<hpage>내 선택은 이루어졌다.나는 이 잔인한 결말을 초래한 잘못을 포기하지 않을 것이다.나는 그들을 다시 구해야 한다, 그리고 나는 그것을 해야 한다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Keep safe, Vaultkeeper. I may expect your service in future, and I’d not have you pass before that task is complete.<page>Gyak... No fool this Keeper. It has lived long, watched its fellows wither, but it shall not die, not yet, not while knowledge needs be sought.<page>This pact is made, Weaver-spawn, insight for us, both she and it.<page>This holy Citadel, in glory and fall, there are holes in its history, even to a Keeper’s knowledge, even to the vaults.<page>Seek the cylinders, she must, those objects of intricate insight. Bring more for this Keeper and only this Keeper, for in this Citadel none are left possessed of such sound, sharp mind as it.
original_zh_text: <hpage>好好活着，管理员。你还有用，别早早死去。<page>咔……本管理员不傻。活了很久，目睹同僚凋零。但只要尚有知识未明，就不会死。<page>契约成立，织者坏种。你我今后各取所需。<page>荣耀与衰落并存的圣堡，藏着连浩瀚书库都未记载的空白。<page>去找音筒吧，那些智慧的结晶。只献给本管理员，因圣堡再无这般敏锐之脑。
translated_text: <hpage>Pay attention to the guards, you can wait for your next mission, but we will not let you pass until the mission is completed.<page>He has lived a long time and has seen his companions disappear, but when it comes to seeking knowledge, he does not die.<page>For Weaver 's descendants, it 's an agreement - for us, for her, and for Insight.<page>Glory or decline, the history of this sacred castle has holes, and, as far as its keepers know, its times also have holes.<page>Bring more of this Keeper, more than one Keeper, for no one in this castle has such a loud voice and such a sharp heart.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>경비원에게주의를 기울이십시오, 당신은 다음 임무를 기다릴 수 있지만, 우리는 임무를 완료 할 때까지 당신을 통과하지 않을 것입니다.<page>그는 오랜 세월을 살았고, 그의 동료들이 사라지는 것을 보았지만, 지식을 추구할 때 그는 죽지 않는다.<page>위버의 후손들을 위해, 그것은 우리, 그녀, 그리고 인사이트를 위한 계약입니다.<page>영광이든 쇠퇴이든, 이 신성한 성의 역사는 구멍이 있으며, 그 경비원들이 아는 한, 그 시대도 구멍이 있습니다.<page>이 수호자, 한 명 이상의 수호자를 더 가져오라, 이 성에는 그처럼 큰 목소리와 예리한 마음이 있는 사람이 없기 때문이다.

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, regale us with our Threefold song, that you may rise above and worship before our kingdom’s divine heart.
original_zh_text: 永恒纺络的朝圣者啊，献上三重圣歌，方可升华，觐见王国圣心。
translated_text: O eternal pilgrim of heaven, sustain us with our threefold singing to go beyond and worship the Sacred Heart of our Kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: 하늘의 영원한 순례자여, 우리의 세 가지 노래로 우리를 지탱하여 우리 왕국의 성심을 넘어 나아가 경배하게 하소서.

original_en_text: Still you tarry here, bug who calls herself a guest? If your idle claws need work, put them to service for our exalted Great Gourmand!<page>I must remain by my master, so you will need to leave the Citadel and gather the ingredients for their meal in my stead!
original_zh_text: 还杵在这呢？既然你闲着也是闲着，就帮我伟大的主人搜集食材吧！<page>我得守着主人，去圣堡外收集食材的任务就交给你了！
translated_text: Are you still here, the self-proclaimed insect guest? If your nails need work, let them work for our precious friend.<page>I have to live with my master, so you have to come out of the castle for me and collect your ingredients. "
secondary_translated_text: 너 아직도 여기 있냐, 자기 자칭 곤충 손님이냐?당신의 손톱이 작업이 필요하다면, 우리의 소중한 친구를 위해 일하게하십시오.<page>나는 내 주인과 함께 살아야 하니 너는 나를 위해 성 밖으로 나와 너의 재료들을 수집해야 한다. "

original_en_text: A rusted statue of a pilgrim.
original_zh_text: 一尊朝圣者的锈蚀雕像。
translated_text: Statue of a wrinkled pilgrim.

original_en_text: <hpage>To learn the melody upon this cylinder will require a working listening device. This one here has long ceased to function.<hpage>That last keeper still sane, in the vaults above... Their chambers hold just such a machine. I need only return.
original_zh_text: <hpage>播放音筒需要完好的设备，这台已经坏了。<hpage>之前在上层遇到的清醒管理员……他们的密室就有这种机器。我得回去一趟。
translated_text: <hpage>In order to learn the melodies in this column, you will need a working listening device. This has not worked for a long time.<hpage>The last guard was always sensible, and in the upper room in his room there was a machine of this kind.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>이 칼럼의 멜로디를 배우려면 작동하는 청취 장치가 필요합니다.이것은 오랫동안 효과가 없었다.<hpage>마지막 경비원은 항상 현명한 사람이었고, 그의 방의 위층 방에는 이런 종류의 기계가 있었다.

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I recovered a psalm cylinder in the dark chambers below here. I believe it contains the melody unique to these vaults. I would have you play it for me now.<page>Kakrt! She has visited the pontiff’s depths and stolen the sacred song! Where is your respect, Weaver-spawn?! Our venerable dead deserve better than to have their chambers transgressed by your filthy foraging!<hpage>In this moment, Vaultkeeper, I’ve slim patience for your impudence. Either prepare the cylinder and stay silent, or ready yourself to learn regret.
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我在下层密室找到了圣咏音筒。里面应存有此书库的专属旋律，我要你立即为我演奏。<page>咔！你擅闯主教密室窃取圣歌！织者坏种毫无敬畏！先贤安息之地岂能容你玷污！<hpage>管理员，我的耐心有限。要么闭嘴准备播放音筒，要么准备明白什么叫后悔。
translated_text: <hpage>I believe that these treasures contain a unique melody that the treasurer, the pipe of hymns, found in the dark chamber below.<page>Cary! He visited the depths of the pope and stole the anthem! Tatsuki, where's your respect? Our honorary deaths deserve better treatment than having your dirty gastronomic in the hallway! "<hpage>And now, Treasurer, I have no patience with your wickedness. Prepare to keep your mouth shut with a ready-made bottle of gasoline, or learn to repent.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 이 보물들이 보물관, 찬송가의 파이프가 아래 어두운 방에서 발견한 독특한 멜로디를 담고 있다고 믿는다.<page>캐리!그는 교황의 깊은 곳을 방문하고 국가를 훔쳤습니다!다츠키, 존경심이 어디 있어?우리의 명예로운 죽음은 복도에서 당신의 더러운 미식 요리보다 더 나은 대우를받을 자격이 있습니다! "<hpage>이제, 재무관, 나는 당신의 악에 참을성이 없습니다.준비된 가솔린 병으로 입을 다물거나 회개하는 법을 배우십시오.

original_en_text: Eggy, eggy! I want to lay a lot of pretty eggies! So tell the big ones, bring me more food!
original_zh_text: 蛋蛋！我要下漂亮蛋蛋！叫大个子们多送吃的来！
translated_text: Eggs, eggs, eggs. I want to lay many eggs, ask me to bring you more food. "
secondary_translated_text: 달걀, 달걀, 달걀.나는 많은 계란을 낳고 싶다. 너에게 음식을 좀 더 가져오라고 한다. "

original_en_text: <hpage>Your chambers are surely grand, sir bug, but it is plain to see you are no sovereign here.<page>Is our state so bare, pilgrim?... “By the will of the Conductors,” we once boomed, and this Citadel shook at our decree.<page>But the words... How hollow they echoed. The mantle of rule, claimed greedily from Pharloom’s fading first children, those bitter Weavers... it was yoke, not crown.<page>Now, in our Citadel’s silence, we share their truth. Only one monarch’s claws ever clutched this kingdom, though we raised our voices to cry otherwise.<page>Would you see her, pilgrim? Up there at our Citadel’s crown? Reach those heights we’d hoped to hide and bow before this land’s true ruler.<hpage>In time near, sir bug, I shall indeed climb to meet your monarch...
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生的居所虽大，却不像是贵族风格。<page>看着如此寒酸吗？当年我们高喊着"遵指挥家之命"，整座圣堡都为之震颤。<page>但激昂的呼喊现在也只剩空洞的回响。从垂死织者手中夺来的权柄，实际上却是枷锁。<page>如今在圣堡的寂静中，我们才真正明白……坐在王座上的从来只有那位。<page>想觐见她吗？登上圣堡之巅，向真王跪拜吧。<hpage>很快我就会登顶的，先生……
translated_text: <hpage>Mr. Bug, your room is indeed wonderful, but of course you are not a monarch here.<page>Pilgrim, is this earth so bare? At the command of the commander, we will strike once, and the castle will shake at our command. "<page>The first fallen son of Pharaoh, a wrestler weaver, was deprived of the mantle of domination by greed. This is not a crown, but chains.<page>And now, in the silence of the castle, we share his truth.Despite our screams, only the royal Gryphins can conquer the kingdom.<page>You want to see it, Peregrine? We are reaching heights that we want to hide and bow to the true leaders of this country.<hpage>- Soon, Mr. Bag, I will surely meet with your monarch. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>미스터 버그, 당신의 방은 정말 훌륭하지만, 물론 당신은 여기에 군주가 아닙니다.<page>' 이 땅이 이렇게 벌거벗은 것일까? '사령관의 명령에 따라, 우리는 한 번 공격할 것이고, 우리의 명령에 따라 성은 흔들릴 것이다. "<page>파라오의 첫 번째 타락한 아들인 레슬링을 하는 직공은 탐욕으로 지배의 망토를 박탈당하였다.이것은 왕관이 아니라 쇠사슬이다.<page>그리고 이제 성의 침묵 속에서 우리는 그의 진실을 공유합니다. 우리의 비명에도 불구하고 왕실 그리핀만이 왕국을 정복 할 수 있습니다.<page>보길 원해, 페레그린?우리는 이 나라의 진정한 지도자들에게 숨기고 절하고 싶은 높이까지 도달하고 있다.<hpage>- 조만간, 백씨, 나는 확실히 당신의 군주를 만날 것이다. "

original_en_text: Cleansed, is this place. Eternal, is the d-d-duty of the sentinels.
original_zh_text: 净、净化完成。哨卫之职……永存。
translated_text: Cleaning is the place. Eternity is the duty of the Keeper.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I bring ingredients for the dish.<page>At last! My master is withering away from hunger! Let us see what gifts you bring.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我带食材来了。<page>终于！主人快饿扁了，快呈上来！
translated_text: <hpage>I have found the ingredients for this dish.<page>Definitely! Your masters are hungry. Look at the gifts you have.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>나는 이 요리의 재료들을 찾았다.<page>확실히!너희 주인들은 배고프다.당신이 가지고있는 선물을 보라.

original_en_text: <hpage>Will you tell me of those who guard this structure? They are servants of the Citadel, are they not?<page>Servants...? They too are penitents. In a past age, that caste committed their own sacrilege against the Citadel.<page>A sin long forgotten, but so grave that their offspring and the offspring of their offspring carry the guilt with them still. To serve here is their only hope of absolution.
original_zh_text: <hpage>可以说说这里的守卫么，他们是圣堡仆从？<page>仆从？不，都是赎罪者。祖辈犯下亵渎圣堡的重罪。<page>虽被遗忘，但其后代仍然在此服役，这是唯一的赎罪之道。
translated_text: <hpage>Who is guarding the building? They are the servants of the castle, really?<page>« Services? ? In the past, this castle has committed atrocities against the castle.<page>It is a long forgotten sin, but it is so serious that future generations can still bear it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>누가 건물을 지키고 있습니까?그들은 성의 하인, 정말?<page>"서비스? ?과거에는 이 성이 성에 대한 잔학 행위를 저질렀습니다.<page>그것은 오랫동안 잊혀진 죄였지만, 미래 세대가 여전히 그것을 견딜 수 있을 정도로 심각한 죄입니다.

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, regale us with our Threefold song, that you may rise above and worship before our kingdom’s divine heart.
original_zh_text: 永恒纺络的朝圣者啊，献上三重圣歌，方可升华，觐见王国圣心。
translated_text: O eternal pilgrim of heaven, sustain us with our threefold singing to go beyond and worship the Sacred Heart of our Kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: 하늘의 영원한 순례자여, 우리의 세 가지 노래로 우리를 지탱하여 우리 왕국의 성심을 넘어 나아가 경배하게 하소서.

original_en_text: <hpage>If this place was holy once, no evidence remains. Even as a prison, it has been neglected.<hpage>If you wish, I can free you. You can descend through the caverns below until you find a settlement.<page>You... are asking me to leave this place? Wh-what a strange, fearful thought! Such a sin would never... no.<page>By the grace of the Citadel, I am here as a penitent. Here, I can hide from the shame of my sins until they are withered away by time.<page>Leave this place...? Please! Strike me down dead before you speak such blasphemy again!
original_zh_text: <hpage>若这里曾是圣地，如今也面目全非，连监狱都称不上。<hpage>想走的话，我可以放你下去，直到找到聚居地。<page>离……离开？多么可怕的想法！这等罪孽万万不可……<page>承蒙圣堡慈悲，我在此忏悔。直到时光洗刷罪孽。<page>求你了！再说这种渎神之言就杀了我吧！
translated_text: <hpage>Despite the fact that this place was sacred, there is no evidence of this. They treat them as prisoners.<hpage>If you want, I will let you go. You can walk through the caves until you find a settlement.<page>You are a... You want to leave this place? What a strange and terrible thought! Such a crime would never have occurred. The number is<page>Thanks to the grace of the castle, I have come here as a confessor. Here I can hide the shame of my sins until they dry up with time. "<page>Get out of this place ... Before I say such blasphemous things, please kill me. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>이 장소는 신성한 곳이었지만, 그 증거는 없다.그들은 그들을 포로로 취급한다.<hpage>네가 원한다면, 내가 너를 보내줄게.당신은 정착촌을 찾을 때까지 동굴을 걸을 수 있습니다.<page>넌...이 곳을 떠나고 싶니?얼마나 이상하고 끔찍한 생각인가!그런 범죄는 결코 일어나지 않았을 것이다.그 번호는<page>성의 은혜 덕분에, 나는 고백자로 여기 왔다.시간이 지남에 따라 말릴 때까지 내 죄의 부끄러움을 숨길 수 있습니다. "<page>이 장소에서 벗어나라 ... "내가 이런 모독한 말을 하기 전에, 제발 나를 죽여라. "

original_en_text: The mantle of conductor weighs heavy. Had I known the cost before its bearing, would I have accepted the duty?
original_zh_text: 指挥之职重若千钧。如果早知这份代价，我还会接过这担子吗？
translated_text: The driver 's court is very heavy. If you knew that before it happened, would you take responsibility?
secondary_translated_text: 운전자 코트는 매우 무겁다.만약 당신이 그 일이 일어나기 전에 그것을 알았다면, 당신은 책임을 질 것입니까?

original_en_text: S... song, is it? You have brought song? You are of the Citadel, then? How... how many of you?<hpage>I am alone, sir. You needn’t fear, I am no servant of the Citadel. Are you a prisoner of theirs?<page>P... prisoner? I understand you not. There is no prison here.<page>This is a holy place of forgiveness. Please, speak with reverence.
original_zh_text: 歌……歌声？你带了歌？是圣堡的？来了……来了多少？<hpage>就我一个。别怕，我不是圣堡的走狗。你是他们的囚犯吗？<page>囚……囚犯？听不懂。<page>这儿是赎罪圣地，请怀着敬畏之心说话。
translated_text: And it is... It 's a song, right? Really? Did you bring a song? Are you from the castle? Because it is... How many of them?<hpage>I'm alone. "Don't worry, I 'm not a prisoner. "<page>П. I'm not sure, but a prisoner. And the prisoner? I don't understand. There are no prisons.<page>This is a sanctuary of forgiveness. Please speak carefully.
secondary_translated_text: 그리고 그건...노래야, 맞지?진짜?노래 가져왔어요?당신은 성에서 왔습니까?왜냐하면 그건...몇 명이나 되나?<hpage>나 혼자야. "걱정마, 나는 죄수가 아니야. "<page>P.잘 모르겠지만, 죄수였어.죄수는?이해가 안 되네요.감옥은 없다.<page>이것은 용서의 성소입니다.조심스럽게 말씀해 주세요.

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall build.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等筑造。
translated_text: Even when it is over, the music continues.<page>We build for eternity.
secondary_translated_text: 끝나고도 음악은 계속된다.<page>우리는 영원을 위해 건설합니다.

original_en_text: We would hear the song of the Architects, at the core of our Citadel.<page>They who sustain our realm, its walls, its floors and its voice, even as others fall silent.
original_zh_text: 我等欲闻建筑匠团之歌，响彻圣堡核心。<page>他们维系疆域、高墙、楼宇与圣音，纵使万籁俱寂。
translated_text: In the center of the castle, you can hear the architect 's song.<page>They guard our kingdom, its walls, its floors, and its sound.
secondary_translated_text: 성의 중심에서 건축가의 노래를 들을 수 있습니다.<page>그들은 우리 왕국과 그 성벽과 그 바닥과 그 소리를 지키고 있다.

original_en_text: A Crustnut! Stale and dull, you’ll be thinking, yes? But ground to finest powder, that’s when its tart taste blooms!
original_zh_text: 硬壳果！你是不是觉得又干又不新鲜？得磨成粉才有酸香味！
translated_text: Locally! ! You think it 's old and boring. When you move it to the best powder, Its taste will blossom!
secondary_translated_text: 지역적으로! !너는 그것이 오래되고 지루하다고 생각한다.당신이 그것을 최고의 파우더로 옮길 때, 그것의 맛이 꽃을 피울 것입니다!

original_en_text: <hpage>If I’m to learn the melody upon this cylinder, I’ll first need to find a working device to play it. This one here has long ceased to function.<hpage>The vaults above would surely hold another such device. I must search thoroughly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>要解读音筒旋律，先得找到能用的设备。这台早就坏了。<hpage>上层书库肯定还有，我得仔细寻找。
translated_text: <hpage>In order to learn the melody of this cylinder, you must first find equipment to play it.<hpage>In the upper box there must be another device. It needs to be studied in depth.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>이 실린더의 멜로디를 배우려면 먼저 그것을 연주 할 장비를 찾아야합니다.<hpage>상단 상자에는 다른 장치가 있어야합니다.그것은 심층적으로 연구되어야 한다.

original_en_text: You! Mite or mourner! Fell fated chosen left till last!<page>Relent! Submit! The fatal blow was struck. Fair Pharloom wails its end.<page>We woe befallen few remained, let us join here, at last, and show our fires fierce.<page>Together to share our kingdom’s pain, feel it scorch our shells, and know clear its suffering, its sorrow!
original_zh_text: 你！蝼蚁或悼亡者！最后的倒霉蛋！<page>认命吧！致命一击已出，纺络在哀嚎！<page>让我们这些余孽在此共赴末路！<page>共品王国的灼痛，让烈焰焚尽甲壳！
translated_text: This is you! The worm is always the one who cries. Fate has chosen the left side to the end.<page>Tolerance! Rendez-vous: A deadly blow is approaching. Fair Farum in the final<page>Our misfortune has fallen on those who remained, and we have finally gathered here and shown the intensity of our flame.<page>To share the pain of our kingdom, to feel our burning shells, and to understand your pain and pain.
secondary_translated_text: 너야!벌레는 항상 울고 있는 사람이다.운명은 끝까지 좌측을 선택했다.<page>Tolerance! ' 대전 ' : 치명적인 타격이 다가오고 있다. Fair Farum 결승전<page>우리의 불행은 남아있는 사람들에게 떨어졌고, 우리는 마침내 여기에 모여 우리의 불꽃의 강도를 보여주었습니다.<page>우리 왕국의 고통을 공유하고, 우리의 불타는 껍질을 느끼고, 당신의 고통과 고통을 이해합니다.

original_en_text: Our song upon a silken thread.... Such beautiful sound, so long absent from our halls.<page>Keep safe our melody, good pilgrim. You shall likely be the last to receive it.
original_zh_text: 丝弦上的旋律啊……殿堂久违的天籁。<page>请妥善保存我们的旋律，你怕是最后一位听到此曲的了。
translated_text: The song is silk.There is nothing beautiful in this room.<page>Continue our tune, good pilgrim. You may be the last one to receive it.
secondary_translated_text: 노래는 실크입니다. 이 방에는 아름다운 것이 없습니다.<page>계속 우리의 조율을, 좋은 순례자.당신은 그것을받는 마지막 사람이 될 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: We would hear the melody of the Conductors, high in their gleaming towers.<page>They bearing the heaviest mantle, who would guide our land ever on to greatness.
original_zh_text: 我等欲闻执政指挥之旋律，萦绕辉光尖塔。<page>他们肩负千钧权柄，引领王国永续辉煌。
translated_text: From the tower of light you can hear the master 's melody.<page>They will bear the heaviest mantle on their shoulders and will bring our land to greatness.
secondary_translated_text: 빛의 탑에서 당신은 마스터의 멜로디를 들을 수 있습니다.<page>그들은 그들의 어깨에 가장 무거운 망토를 짊어지고 우리의 땅을 위대하게 만들 것입니다.

original_en_text: A visitor? Now this is rare.<page>I must apologise for not rising to greet you. After an age spent sickly, I find myself unable to lift from this bedchamber.<page>I hope, good pilgrim, our Citadel has shown you the courtesy deserved of a bug devout.<hpage>I’ve borne its hospitality well enough, aged one...<page>Ahhh... My sympathies, pilgrim... We have fallen so far. And now, sadly, if you’ve come seeking aid or understanding, I fear I too shall disappoint. <page>Whatever you would ask, I have only my melody left to offer. It is a simple thing, the smallest of gifts, but perhaps more special now, for it has been rarely heard in these quietened times.
original_zh_text: 有访客？这倒是稀奇。<page>恕我不能起身相迎，卧于病榻多年，这把老骨头动不了啦。<page>朝圣者能到这里不容易，希望圣堡对你这虔信者有以礼相待。<hpage>已经领教过它的待客之道了，老人家……<page>唉……抱歉，圣堡已堕落至此。如果你想求助，怕是要让你失望了。<page>我能赠予你的只剩这首曲子。虽然微薄，但在这孤寂的时代也算珍品。
translated_text: Visitors? This is rarely done today.<page>Sorry I didn't get up and greet you. After an incurable illness, I couldn't leave this room.<page>Dear pilgrim, I hope that our castle will show the courtesy of the pious insects.<hpage>When he was a year old, he was very pleased with his hospitality.<page>¡Oh, yeah! My condolences to you, pilgrim. I have fallen so far. Now, unfortunately, if you turn to me for help or understanding, I too will be disappointed.<page>No matter what you 're looking for, I 'll just give you my tune. It 's a simple thing, the smallest gift, but probably more special now. I 've never heard it in a quiet hour.
secondary_translated_text: 방문객?이것은 오늘날 거의 이루어지지 않습니다.<page>일어나서 인사하지 못해서 미안해.나는 불치병으로 이 방을 떠날 수 없었다.<page>친애하는 순례자여, 우리 성이 경건한 곤충들의 예의를 보이기를 바랍니다.<hpage>그가 한 살이었을 때, 그는 그의 환대에 대해 매우 만족했다.<page>오, 그래!당신에게 조의를 표합니다, Pilgrim.나는 지금까지 쓰러졌다.지금, 불행히도, 당신이 도움을 요청하거나 이해를 요청한다면, 나도 실망할 것입니다.<page>당신이 무엇을 찾고 있든, 나는 단지 당신에게 나의 곡을 줄 것입니다.아주 간단한 것, 가장 작은 선물, 하지만 아마 지금 더 특별합니다.나는 조용한 시간에 그것을 들어본 적이 없다.

original_en_text: If the weight of your sins bear down upon you, you may remain here with me in penitence, sister.
original_zh_text: 若你自觉罪孽深重，可留下与我一同忏悔。
translated_text: If your sins have come upon you, repent with me. "
secondary_translated_text: 만일 너희의 죄가 너희에게 닥쳤다면 나와 함께 회개하라. "

original_en_text: Ah.... your s-song. So long I’ve sat in silence. Tell me... are all songs played now as exquisite as this? Or has time made my hearing unrefined?<hpage>This art is new to me, and my skill is limited, but your appreciation is not unwelcome.<page>Ahh. The beauty of it. It is almost painful to my weary senses. Perhaps though, this pain is merely part of my penitence. <page>Play on, will you? I would join your tune. Just forgive me if my voice has become brutish.
original_zh_text: 啊……你的歌。沉寂太久，现在所有曲子都这般动听吗？还是我耳朵钝了？<hpage>我技艺粗浅，承蒙你不嫌弃。<page>这美感……刺痛我麻木的感官。或许这正是赎罪的一部分。<page>继续演奏，可以么？我想试着应和，尽管嗓音已经嘶哑。
translated_text: It 's your song that I sat in silence with for so long. Tell me how good this song is right now. Time makes our hearing imperfect?<hpage>This art is new to me, and my skills are limited, but your assessment is not welcome.<page>- ¡Oh, yeah! Magnificent.In my feeling of fatigue there is almost pain.This pain may be part of repentance.<page>Just keep playing, right? Agreed? I will add your songs. If my voice was disrespectful, I apologize.
secondary_translated_text: 오랫동안 묵묵히 앉아 있던 너의 노래야.지금 이 노래가 얼마나 좋은지 말해줘.시간이 우리의 청력을 불완전하게 만드는가?<hpage>이 예술은 나에게 새로운 것이고, 나의 능력은 제한적이지만, 당신의 평가는 환영받지 않습니다.<page>- 오, 그래!멋지다. 피곤한 내 느낌에는 거의 고통이 있다. 이 고통은 회개의 일부일지도 모른다.<page>그냥 계속 놀아줘, 맞지?동의했나?나는 너의 노래를 추가할 것이다.내 목소리가 무례한 경우, 사과드립니다.

original_en_text: You refuse to play our sacred melody! Why pause, Weaver-thing? Do you cower at the truths it may illuminate? Surely you are not the lesser sort that bows to fear?<hpage>When the moment calls, Vaultkeeper, I shall listen. For now, your task remains to keep the cylinder safe. And know, you shall answer to my blade if you fail.
original_zh_text: 你拒绝演奏圣歌！在害怕吗，织者？畏惧被照亮的真相？原来你也是怯懦之辈？<hpage>时机到了自然会听。现在你的任务是保管好音筒，若出了纰漏，我的针刃可不认虫。
translated_text: Refuse to perform the sacred melody! "Why did you stop, Virgo? Are you worried about what this might reveal? Aren't you a little man who gives in to fear?<hpage>CSC, please listen. Now your task is to protect the gas bottle. If you can't do it, you will be responsible for my sword. "
secondary_translated_text: 신성한 멜로디를 연주하는 것을 거부하십시오! "왜 멈췄어, 버그?이것이 무엇을 드러낼 수 있을지 걱정하십니까?너는 두려움에 굴복하는 작은 사람이 아니니?<hpage>CSC, 제발 들어주세요.이제 당신의 임무는 가스병을 보호하는 것입니다.만약 네가 그것을 할 수 없다면, 너는 내 검을 책임져야 한다. "

translated_text: Blessings on this poem.

original_en_text: For our base, we require the gelatinous Mossberry Stew. Its concoction is a druidic art, a jealously guarded secret of the moss-painted caverns deep below us.
original_zh_text: 基底需要苔莓浓汤。配方是沼地德鲁伊的不传之秘。
translated_text: For our base, we need foam straw of ice cream. Their mixing is the art of the Druze, a secret kept in the caves deep beneath us.
secondary_translated_text: 우리 기지를 위해, 우리는 아이스크림의 거품 짚이 필요하다.그들의 혼합은 드루즈인들의 예술이며, 우리 밑 깊은 동굴에 숨겨진 비밀입니다.

original_en_text: Sweet fruit that grows in moist environments. Its seeds are toxic to most creatures.
original_zh_text: 生长在潮湿环境中的甜味浆果，种子对大多数生物有毒。
translated_text: It is a sweet fruit that grows in a moist environment.The seeds are toxic to most organisms.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 습한 환경에서 자라는 달콤한 과일입니다. 씨앗은 대부분의 유기체에 독성이 있습니다.

original_en_text: Report of the Memorium and its maintenance.<br><br>“Containment fails. Memory lost. Excise outer. Maintain inner.<br>Shellwood stasis sustained - Remember.<br>Marrowlands stasis critical - Remember.<br>Verdanian environment exceeded - Destined to forget.”
original_zh_text: 忆廊维缮报告。<br><br>“封存溃败。记忆遗失。切除外区。维持内区。<br>甲木林封存稳定——须铭记。<br>髓骨地封存危急——须铭记。<br>翠庭生态失控——注定遗忘。”
translated_text: Monument and its contents<br><br>"Stop failure.Loss of memory.Remove outside.Remains inside the house.<br>The stagnation of the shell and trees continues.<br>Serious arrest of the bone marrow - remember.<br>In addition to the impressive atmosphere - doomed to forget. "
secondary_translated_text: 기념물과 그 내용들<br><br>"정지 실패. 기억 상실. 외부에서 제거. 집 안에 남아있다."<br>껍질과 나무의 침체 상태는 계속되고 있다.<br>골수의 심각한 체포 - 기억하십시오.<br>인상적인 분위기를 제외하고 - 잊을 운명입니다. "

original_zh_text: 由旧钟改造的虫巢。安装后，腐囊虫幼体会偶尔栖息其中，留下甲壳碎片与念珠。<br><br>腐囊钟巢可安装在钟居外部。

original_zh_text: 基础工具袋，可收纳工具、陷阱与制作材料。

original_en_text: Filthy rag, marked with the scrawl of an Underworker.<br><br>“So much suffering. Are we truly chosen, or have we sinned unknowing, and now are punished for it?”
original_zh_text: 污损的破布，一名劳累的圣堡工人在上面留下了哀叹。<br><br>“如此痛苦。我们真是被选中的么，还是因不知名的罪过而遭此惩罚？”
translated_text: The dirty cloth had a worker 's signature.<br><br>"It hurts so much, doesn't it? Were you truly chosen? Or do you commit a crime without knowing it, and you are punished? "
secondary_translated_text: 더러운 천에는 노동자의 서명이 있다.<br><br>"너무 아파, 그렇지?당신은 정말로 선택되었습니까?아니면 너희가 알지 못하고 범죄를 저지르고 벌을 받느냐? "

original_zh_text: 失传的织者技艺。在敌人身上缝上撕裂符文。

original_en_text: Large, gelatinous drifter. Chases away threats by hurling its bulk around.
original_zh_text: 巨大的凝胶状漂浮生物。利用自己身体冲撞，驱赶威胁。
translated_text: This is a gel-like drift that reduces threats by increasing the size of the threat.
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 위협의 크기를 증가시켜 위협을 줄이는 젤과 같은 드리프트입니다.

translated_text: Elders of Choir

original_en_text: Aggressive fly of Pharloom’s lowlands. Rams prey with its hardbone mask.
original_zh_text: 纺络低地区域的暴脾气飞蝇，善于使用骨质头甲冲撞猎物。
translated_text: Moha in the plains of Falaim. Wear a mask for hunting.
secondary_translated_text: 팔라임 평야에 있는 모하.사냥을 위해 마스크를 착용하십시오.

original_en_text: Blade maiden of a once renown warrior sect, survived long beyond the rest of her order.
original_zh_text: 纺络曾出现过一个赫赫有名的勇士宗派，而这位女针客就是其最后的幸存者。
translated_text: The infamous samurai Lady Blade has survived longer than any other cult.
secondary_translated_text: 악명 높은 사무라이 레이디 블레이드 (Lady Blade) 는 다른 어떤 컬트보다 오래 살아남았습니다.

translated_text: The Servant Egam

original_en_text: Blindingly fast, winged warrior able to launch pointed pinions from its forelimbs.
original_zh_text: 能从前肢发射尖刺的极速飞翼勇士。
translated_text: The Winged Warrior can shoot with projections of sharp feathers with the forearm at incredible speed.
secondary_translated_text: 날개 전사는 앞팔로 날카로운 깃털의 투영으로 믿을 수 없는 속도로 발사할 수 있다.

translated_text: Judge, Judge
The final judge.
Bailey as the Guardian

original_en_text: Leaping hunter of a bygone age. The swiftest of their sect, deftly skilled with spinning foreblades.
original_zh_text: 善用旋转刀刃的传奇猎手，曾以速度称霸整个派系。
translated_text: The most experienced in your camp skillfully turned their swords forward.
secondary_translated_text: 당신의 캠프에서 가장 경험이 많은 사람들은 능숙하게 그들의 검을 앞으로 돌렸다.

original_en_text: They seek to slay their only chance at survival. Alas, any words would fall useless. I have only my blade to offer response.
original_zh_text: 它们想要斩断族群最后的生机。我任何的言语劝解皆为徒劳，唯有利刃能终结这愚行。
translated_text: They're looking for their only chance to survive.Oh, nothing's going to work.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 생존할 수 있는 유일한 기회를 찾고 있다. 오, 아무 것도 효과가 없을 거야.

translated_text: The Widow The Widow

original_en_text: They call out to warn their fellows at the smallest sense of threat. A successful hunt here means staying silent and hidden right up until the decisive strike.
original_zh_text: 稍有威胁迹象便会向同伴鸣叫示警。在此地成功捕猎的秘诀，在于无声潜行直至发动致命一击前的最后一刻。
translated_text: When you feel the slightest sense of threat, send a warning to your partner. Successful hunting here means hiding in silence before the decisive blow.
secondary_translated_text: 조금이라도 위협감을 느낄 때 파트너에게 경고를 보내십시오.여기서 성공적인 사냥은 결정적인 타격이 닥치기 전에 침묵 속에 숨는 것을 의미한다.

translated_text: We are seeking a Savior.

original_en_text: Though the Weavers have long passed from Pharloom, this servant still performs its function.
original_zh_text: 纺络的织者虽已绝迹，这位仆从仍恪守古老的职责。
translated_text: The Pharaoh left the cloth behind, but the servants did their duty.
secondary_translated_text: 파라오가 천을 남겼지만, 하인들은 그들의 의무를 다했다.

original_en_text: Hard-shelled bug with a climber’s pin. Their pin, once aid, has become a weapon, though the bug is unrefined in its use.
original_zh_text: 身负硬壳的朝圣者，将攀爬用的长针作为武器，尽管使用手法粗陋。
translated_text: Lizard insect with a spiky needle.Once your pin was an aid, and now it is a weapon, but its misuse is not perfect.
secondary_translated_text: 가시한 바늘이있는 도마뱀 곤충. 한때 당신의 핀은 도움이었지만 지금은 무기이지만 오용은 완벽하지 않습니다.

original_en_text: Huge ant hunter tasked to protect the stores and passages of its tribe.
original_zh_text: 守护部族仓库及通道的重甲巨蚁。
translated_text: The mission of a giant ant hunter is to protect the tribe 's shops and corridors.
secondary_translated_text: 거대 개미 사냥꾼의 임무는 부족의 상점과 복도를 보호하는 것입니다.

original_en_text: Staunch and skilled bladebug of a once flourishing land lost to time.
original_zh_text: 失落王朝的精锐刀虫，双刃技法堪称艺术。
translated_text: In this once-prosperous country, strong and experienced bakers have disappeared in time.
secondary_translated_text: 한때 번영했던 이 나라에서 강하고 경험이 많은 제빵사들은 시간이 지남에 따라 사라졌습니다.

original_en_text: Aged pilgrim, overgrown with lichen and moss.
original_zh_text: 浑身覆满地衣苔藓的老迈信徒，会从胃囊喷射苔藓团块攻击。
translated_text: The elderly pilgrims were covered with lichens and moss.
secondary_translated_text: 노인 순례자들은 이끼와 이끼로 뒤덮여 있었다.

original_en_text: There is no finesse in its use of Silk. It consumes its slim supply only to amplify its force.
original_zh_text: 它对灵丝的运用毫无精妙可言，只是消耗那本就稀少的灵丝储备来增强自身的力量。
translated_text: No silk technology is used.Eat a small amount of food to increase your potency.
secondary_translated_text: 실크 기술을 사용하지 않습니다. 소량의 음식을 먹어 당신의 파워를 증가.

original_en_text: Steel horned floater, able to defend itself and its companions.
original_zh_text: 长有螺旋犄角的浮空甲虫，能够有效保卫自身与同伴。
translated_text: The steel cabin protects itself and its satellites.

original_en_text: Tormented will of countless husks made manifest in a pit of Silk dregs.
original_zh_text: 灵丝残渣深坑中凝聚无数空壳的怨念集合体。
translated_text: Countless shells of anxious wills have appeared in the ruins.
secondary_translated_text: 수많은 불안한 의지의 껍질이 폐허에 나타났다.

original_en_text: That they ever hoped to keep their domain clean... What futility.
original_zh_text: 妄图维持这片土地的洁净……何等徒劳。
translated_text: It 's a waste of time to keep this territory clean.
secondary_translated_text: 이 영토를 깨끗하게 유지하는 것은 시간낭비이다.

translated_text: Directed by Fared Diver

original_en_text: I would very much like to feel their soft fur, if only they weren’t so hostile.
original_zh_text: 要不是它们现在对谁都充满敌意，我真想摸摸这身柔软的绒毛。
translated_text: If you 're not hostile, you really want to feel soft.
secondary_translated_text: 당신이 적대적이지 않다면, 당신은 정말로 부드럽게 느끼고 싶어합니다.

original_en_text: This kingdom appears more advanced in metalwork than my own ever was, in great part due to the natural heat source at its base. Working in such an environment is an impressive feat.
original_zh_text: 此地的冶金技术远超我的故国，全因地下天然热源的优势。能在如此高温环境中劳作生存，实为壮举。
translated_text: This realm of nature seems to be more advanced than mine in metallurgy, but this is mostly due to the heat source in its bottom.
secondary_translated_text: 이 자연의 영역은 금속학에서 광산보다 더 진보 된 것으로 보이지만, 이것은 주로 바닥에있는 열원 때문입니다.

original_en_text: Aerial worker lost to Pharloom’s Haunting. Bears a pouch full with flintstone which they will fling at intruders.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的空中劳工，随身携带一个装满燧石的袋子，投掷燧石攻击入侵者。
translated_text: The passengers died because of the suffering of Phalem.The bear has a bag filled with small stones, and he throws it at the attacker.
secondary_translated_text: 승객들은 팔렘의 고통 때문에 죽었습니다. 곰은 작은 돌이 가득한 자루를 가지고 있었고, 그는 공격자에게 던졌습니다.

original_en_text: Haughty thespian convinced that only dazzling performance can raise Pharloom from the throes of death.
original_zh_text: 坚信华丽演出能拯救纺络的傲慢演员。
translated_text: The great actor believed that only spectacular comedy would save Faro from the agony of death.
secondary_translated_text: 위대한 배우는 극적인 코미디만이 파로를 죽음의 고통에서 구할 수 있다고 믿었습니다.

translated_text: The Scavenger
The Gliding,
Tour of Klovis
The Fourth Chorus
secondary_translated_text: 네 번째 합창단 The Fourth Chorus

original_en_text: Hard-shelled insect common upon the surface of Shellwood Pond. Once a staple food for passing pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 甲木林池沼的硬壳水栖虫，曾是朝圣者途中的主要食物。
translated_text: An ordinary hard-skinned insect that is found on the surface of a shell-shaped pond.It was a staple food for pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: 껍질 모양의 연못 표면에서 발견되는 평범한 단단한 피부 곤충으로, 순례자들의 주식이었다.

original_en_text: Old knight consumed by black thread.
translated_text: The old gentleman was absorbed in the black line.

original_en_text: I would not have guessed so large and marvelous a flea existed. I am pleased it saw sense before I had to strike a killing blow.
original_zh_text: 我未曾料想竟存在如此巨大的跳蚤。幸好它在最后关头恢复理智，免于我下杀手。
translated_text: No flea would be so big that it would be glad to see the truth before it struck a fatal blow.
secondary_translated_text: 어떤 벼룩도 치명적인 타격을 입기 전에 진실을 보고 기뻐할 정도로 크지 않을 것입니다.

original_en_text: A terrifying achievement of Pharloom, to build a construct so large and yet so nimble.
original_zh_text: 竟能建造出如此庞大却又灵巧非凡的构造，实乃纺络工造技艺巅峰之作。
translated_text: For Faro, the construction of such a large and flexible building was a great achievement.
secondary_translated_text: Faro 에게는 이렇게 크고 유연한 건물을 건설하는 것이 큰 업적이었습니다.

translated_text: Baggerman Group
The Lord Master.
Д е с т ь м е!

original_en_text: Their rough, ridged shell grips tight to any surface. Even walls and roofs become pathways for these nimble bugs.
original_zh_text: 粗糙的带棱甲壳可攀附任何表面。峭壁和洞顶对它们来说都是畅通无阻的道路。
translated_text: Its thick, swollen shell tightly attaches to any surface.Walls and ceilings can also be a step for these cunning insects.
secondary_translated_text: 두껍고 붓는 껍질은 어떤 표면에나 단단히 붙어 있습니다. 벽과 천장도 이 교활한 곤충을 위한 발걸음이 될 수 있습니다.

translated_text: Protection equipment
The Lost Romanian

original_en_text: Nature distorted... This bug was born tiny and mild. The Citadel deformed it in futile hope it may sustain.
original_zh_text: 自然天性惨遭扭曲..……此虫原本小巧温顺，却被圣堡强行改造。它的改造者竟然妄想它能承受这种畸变……
translated_text: These bacteria are small and friendly in nature.The castle has perverted it and hoped in vain that it will continue.
secondary_translated_text: 이 박테리아는 작고 자연적으로 친화적입니다. 성은 그것을 왜곡하고 그것이 계속되기를 헛되이 희망했습니다.

translated_text: Skeleton scooter

original_en_text: They would make effective hunting companions, though even without the Haunting I suspect their loyalty would always remain to their clan.
original_zh_text: 它们是优秀的狩猎伙伴。就算没有丝咒作祟，我相信它们也会永远忠于自己的部族。
translated_text: They will be effective hunters, but even without ghosts, their loyalty to the tribe is unlikely to last forever.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 효과적인 사냥꾼이 될 것이지만, 유령이 없더라도 부족에 대한 그들의 충성심은 영원히 지속되지 않을 것입니다.

translated_text: horses.

original_en_text: Shell plated worm that lives beneath pools of shifting sand.
original_zh_text: 潜伏流沙之底的板甲蠕虫，突袭吞噬猎物。
translated_text: A worm that lives in a lake of soft sand.
The big rabbit
