original_en_text: Large male Driznit, ferocious and territorial. Fires its heavy coral mask at intruders.
original_zh_text: 领地意识强烈的雄性掷面虫，投掷其沉重的珊瑚面甲御敌。
translated_text: The large female Desnit is ferocious and has a sharp silhouette.Shoot with heavy coral masks for invaders.
secondary_translated_text: 큰 암컷 Desnit 은 사나운 날카로운 실루엣을 가지고 있습니다. 침략자를위한 무거운 산호 마스크로 촬영.

original_en_text: With its wranglers long dead, the Moorwing stalked the towers of Greymoor, feasting on passing pilgrims and tenders alike.
original_zh_text: 自从其驯兽师死后，荒沼翼主常年盘踞在灰沼的众多高塔，猎食过往的朝圣者和居民。
translated_text: When the guard was dead, the wings of the swamp ran over the towers of Gremor, feeding the pilgrims and knights passing by.
secondary_translated_text: 경비원이 죽었을 때, 습지의 날개들이 그레모르의 탑 위로 뛰어들어 지나가는 순례자들과 기사들에게 먹이를 주었다.

original_en_text: Hiding its tongue amongst fronds so similar... There is impressive style to this one’s trickery.
original_zh_text: 将捕食舌伪装在相似钟乳石间的策略，展现惊人的欺诈美学。
translated_text: Keep your tongue covered on this sheet. This man 's style is impressive.
secondary_translated_text: 이 시트에 혀를 덮어 두어라.이 남자의 스타일은 매우 인상적이다.

original_en_text: Scissor-wielding bug charged to cut and spool fallen dregs of Silk for return to the Citadel above.
original_zh_text: 挥舞剪刀处理灵丝碎屑的工匠虫，处理好的灵丝会被送回圣堡。
translated_text: The insect, shaking the fabric, cuts the fallen piece of silk, removes it and returns it to the upper lock.
secondary_translated_text: 곤충은 천을 흔들면서 떨어지는 실크 조각을 자르고 그것을 제거하여 윗 자물쇠로 돌려줍니다.

translated_text: CogWork is taking off

original_en_text: What seems at first a purely defensive mechanism may also be necessary to rid this creature of excess heat.
original_zh_text: 看似防御的行为，实为排出过量热量的必要生理机制。
translated_text: An external clean protective mechanism may also be required to remove this excess biological heat.
secondary_translated_text: 외부 깨끗한 보호 메커니즘은 또한 이러한 초과 생물학적 열을 제거하기 위해 필요할 수 있습니다.

translated_text: Slag Shell (English)

original_en_text: For his stern stewardship his legions seemed utterly loyal. For less combative bugs his would have been a hard rule.
original_zh_text: 其铁腕统治赢得了军团的绝对忠诚，但对非战斗种群来说则是暴政。
translated_text: Due to his strict administration, his legion seemed completely loyal. Its rules were strict for the least aggressive bacteria.
secondary_translated_text: 그의 엄격한 관리 때문에, 그의 군대는 완전히 충성스러운 것처럼 보였습니다.그것의 규칙은 가장 공격적이지 않은 박테리아에 대해 엄격했습니다.

translated_text: The Craig cluster

original_en_text: Remains of a Citadel bug possessed by Silk dregs. The husk will lash out wildly with the many sharp pins caught inside its thread.
original_zh_text: 被灵丝残渣控制的圣堡残躯，用丝线中缠绕的尖针发动无序攻击。
translated_text: The remnants of the castle worm possessing the remnants of the bullet's silk will burn violently, and many sharp needles will run in its line.
secondary_translated_text: 총알의 실크의 잔재를 소유한 성벌레의 잔재가 격렬하게 타오르고 많은 날카로운 바늘이 그 줄로 달려갈 것입니다.

original_en_text: Altered servant of the Citadel’s Whiteward, responsible for the cremation of husks and the recycling of Silk from their shells.
original_zh_text: 白愈厅改造仆从，负责火化躯壳并回收灵丝。
translated_text: Servants at Whitewood Castle burned the shells and recycled the silk.
secondary_translated_text: 화이트우드 성 (Whitewood Castle) 의 하인들은 껍질을 태우고 실크를 재활용했습니다.

original_en_text: Short elder crawbug eagerly serving in their court.
original_zh_text: 热衷审判的矮小腐囊虫长老。
translated_text: The elderly crab served the court diligently.
The Sterling

original_en_text: Theirs is the perfect shell for their duty, a wall of a warrior and an adept fighter. If I hope to claim their treasures, I must bring my best.
original_zh_text: 它们拥有攻防兼备的重型甲壳，能完美适配其守卫的差事。想要取得它们看守的宝物，必须做好全力以赴战斗的准备。
translated_text: Their shields are the perfect shell to carry out their duties, as well as a high wall for soldiers and experienced soldiers.If I want to get your treasure, I must do everything I can. " "
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 방패는 그들의 임무를 수행하는 완벽한 껍질이며, 군인과 숙련 된 군인들을위한 높은 벽입니다. 내가 당신의 보물을 얻으려면, 내가 할 수있는 모든 것을해야합니다. " "

translated_text: Water of water
The golden corals

original_en_text: Their bells would once have rung with hope and mirth, lifting the spirits of any climbing companions. Sadly, those instruments have turned purely to combative use.
original_zh_text: 这些钟曾为众多朝圣者奏响希望与欢乐的乐章。而今却成了投向清醒者的凶器——仿佛要砸碎最后一丝未被腐蚀的理智。
translated_text: Its bells were already full of hope and joy, and lifted the spirits of climbers.Unfortunately, these instruments are used exclusively in combat.
secondary_translated_text: 그 종들은 이미 희망과 기쁨으로 가득 차 있었고, 등반객들의 정신을 높였다. 불행하게도, 이 악기는 전투에서만 사용된다.

translated_text: Quality of vacuum
Drifting Forest
Memoria
La Vallaga

original_en_text: The way they skate along the water’s surface is so elegant. Surely it is a skill that can be learned? When time permits, I should attempt the task.
original_zh_text: 如此优雅的水面滑行技艺，或许可以通过练习掌握？待战事稍歇，我定要试试这 "凌波微步"。
translated_text: The way I slid on the water was very funny. It 's a skill you can learn, right? Really? If time permits, I would like to do this.
secondary_translated_text: 내가 물 위에서 미끄러지는 방식은 아주 재미있었다.그것은 당신이 배울 수있는 기술입니다, 그렇죠?진짜?시간이 허락한다면, 나는 이것을 하고 싶다.

original_en_text: A creature long familiar to me. I suspect that no matter how far I travel, if I descend deep enough they will always be there.
original_zh_text: 这种生物于我而言早已熟悉。无论我跋涉多远，只要深入足够的地底，它们必会如影随形。
translated_text: It doesn't matter how far you go, if you dig deep, I think they 'll be there forever.
secondary_translated_text: 아무리 멀리 가도 깊게 파면 영원히 있을 것 같아.

original_en_text: When defeated, it splits into many smaller forms. Yet another remarkable creature of this land before the monarch.
original_zh_text: 击败后分裂为多个小型个体。圣堡崛起前，纺络土地上又一奇异而非凡的生灵。
translated_text: When he is defeated, he disintegrates into many smaller forms.Before the monarch, this land was another unusual creature.
secondary_translated_text: 그가 패배했을 때, 그는 많은 작은 형태로 분해됩니다. 군주 이전, 이 땅은 또 다른 특이한 생물이었습니다.

translated_text: Pilgrim's Bell with Wings
secondary_translated_text: Pilgrim 's Bell with Wings (날개 달린 순례자의 종)

original_en_text: Winged insect with a flaky shell that perfectly mimics its environment.
original_zh_text: 拥有一副古怪甲壳的飞虫，能完美拟态周围环境。
translated_text: These are insects whose shell perfectly mimics the environment.
secondary_translated_text: 이 곤충들은 껍질이 환경을 완벽하게 모방하는 곤충들이다.

translated_text: and tick

original_en_text: Unnaturally overgrown Mossgrub, bred within the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 圣堡忆廊培育的变异苔原蠕虫。
translated_text: The monument of the castle is covered with unnatural foam.
secondary_translated_text: 성의 기념물은 부자연스러운 거품으로 덮여 있다.

original_en_text: While these bothersome bugs are left free to forage, no loose rosary or trinket is safe.
original_zh_text: 只要这些可恶的虫子尚存，任何散落的念珠与宝物皆不得安宁。
translated_text: These annoying insects can freely eat their food, but they are safe without free roses and ornaments.
secondary_translated_text: 이 성가신 곤충은 자유롭게 음식을 먹을 수 있지만 무료 장미와 장식품 없이는 안전합니다.

original_en_text: Younger form of a Muckroach. Attacks prey by leaping from the water and snapping with its flexible jaws.
original_zh_text: 淤泥蟑螂的近亲变种，形态更类似于蛆虫。
translated_text: It jumps out of the water and attacks its prey, bending its jaws with flexible jaws.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 물에서 뛰어 나와 먹이를 공격하며 턱을 구부리고 유연한 턱으로 구부립니다.

original_en_text: Elite former hunter acting as the final line of defence before their mother.
original_zh_text: 精锐的猎手，曾作为最后防线守卫它们的母亲。
translated_text: The former elite hunter is the last line of defense against his mother.
secondary_translated_text: 전직 엘리트 사냥꾼은 그의 어머니에 대한 마지막 방어선입니다.

original_en_text: All are haunted here, the jailers and the jailed. Do they realise they will never leave this place? Or how long they have stayed already?
original_zh_text: 此处的狱卒与囚徒皆被丝咒侵蚀。它们可曾意识到自己将永远无法逃离此地？是否知道已经在这地方困了多久？
translated_text: All the prisoners and the guards have turned into ghosts. Do you know that you will never leave this place? How long you been here?
secondary_translated_text: 모든 수감자들과 경비원들이 유령으로 변했다.넌 이 곳을 절대 떠나지 않을 거 알아?얼마나 오랫동안 여기 있었니?

translated_text: Mininhos

original_en_text: Such feeble creatures could only survive thanks to the rarity of predators in these super-heated caverns.
original_zh_text: 唯有在这缺乏天敌的高温洞穴中，如此脆弱的生物方能幸存。
translated_text: This fragile creature is able to survive, because in these caves at very high temperatures there are very few predators.
secondary_translated_text: 이 취약한 생물은 매우 높은 온도에서이 동굴에서 포식자가 매우 적기 때문에 생존 할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Fully grown mollusc able to unleash a gushing torrent of burning fluid from its back.
original_zh_text: 成年软体生物，能从背部喷射灼热流体洪流
translated_text: Mature mussels can spit hot liquid from their backs.
secondary_translated_text: 성숙한 홍합은 등에서 뜨거운 액체를 뱉을 수 있다.

original_en_text: By this swooping menace, a simple bug could be easily overcome. More dangerous still, they rarely attack alone.
original_zh_text: 对于其单个个体，尚可周旋，但它们鲜少单独行动。成群俯冲时，普通虫类极易被瞬间击溃。
translated_text: With such a threat of immersion, simple mistakes can be easily overcome.Even more dangerous is that they rarely attack themselves.
secondary_translated_text: 이러한 몰입의 위협으로, 간단한 실수는 쉽게 극복 할 수 있습니다. 더 위험한 것은 그들이 자신을 거의 공격하지 않는다는 것입니다.

original_en_text: A common enough bug, though not to be underestimated. The acuteness of their other senses more than makes up for their lack of vision.
original_zh_text: 一种相当常见的虫子，但不可小觑——它们其他感官的敏锐完全弥补了视觉的缺陷。
translated_text: This is a very common mistake, but it should not be underestimated.Acuteness of other senses is enough to compensate for the lack of vision.
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 매우 일반적인 실수이지만 과소평가되어서는 안됩니다. 다른 감각의 예리함은 시력 부족을 보상하기에 충분합니다.

original_en_text: Darting predator that clings fast to roofs and outcrops, often summoned to aid its larger companions.
original_zh_text: 擅长攀附在岩顶或峭壁的飞镖猎手，常被其大型同伴叫来支援。
translated_text: Fast predators, firmly attached to roofs and overhangs, are often called to the aid of their larger companions.
secondary_translated_text: 지붕과 돌출판에 단단히 붙어있는 빠른 포식자들은 종종 더 큰 동반자의 도움을 요청받습니다.

original_en_text: Is it the Haunting that drove them to cackling madness, or was their unending toil the cause even before that?
original_zh_text: 究竟是丝咒导致了疯癫，还是在无尽苦役中早已精神失常？答案已无从考据。
translated_text: Are ghosts driving them crazy or is this the reason for their endless efforts?
secondary_translated_text: 유령이 그들을 미치게 만드는 것입니까, 아니면 이것이 그들의 끝없는 노력의 이유입니까?

original_en_text: Short, nimble bug who uses barbed bolas to keep beasts corralled and caged.
original_zh_text: 矮小敏捷的饲育者，擅于使用带刺流星索圈养腐汁蟑螂。
translated_text: A small, cunning insect that uses short beaks to encase wild animals in cages.
secondary_translated_text: 짧은 부리를 사용하여 야생 동물을 우리에 가두는 작고 교활한 곤충.

translated_text: The Grunsack.

original_en_text: Despite their youth, they are impressive opponents. It seems likely their tribe were trained for combat from birth.
original_zh_text: 虽然年轻却训练有素，显然它们从出生开始就被部族作为战士培养。
translated_text: He is a very strong opponent despite his youth. Apparently, his tribe has been trained in combat since his birth.
secondary_translated_text: 그는 젊음에도 불구하고 매우 강한 상대였다.분명히, 그의 부족은 그가 태어났을 때부터 전투 훈련을 받았습니다.

translated_text: Beagle, Beagle!

original_en_text: Disciple of the Whispering Vaults, tasked to navigate its dim recesses to retrieve old scrolls.
original_zh_text: 低语书库的信徒，负责在幽暗的书库中搜寻古籍。
translated_text: The Baron whispered to the treasury that his mission was to search for ancient scrolls in the depths of darkness.
secondary_translated_text: 남작은 그의 임무가 어둠의 깊은 곳에서 고대 두루마리를 찾는 것이라고 재무부에 속삭였다.

original_en_text: This one’s strength was much enhanced by stolen soul. They are not the first who tried to hoard it, or to mould it towards such violent ends.
original_zh_text: 靠着窃取灵魂强化自己的力量，他并非第一个妄图驾驭此力的施暴者。
translated_text: The strength of this man has greatly increased by his stolen soul.They are not the first to try to accumulate them or push them to such violent goals.
secondary_translated_text: 이 남자의 힘은 도난당한 영혼으로 인해 크게 증가했습니다. 그들은 그들을 축적하거나 그러한 폭력적인 목표에 밀어 넣으려고 시도하는 첫 번째가 아닙니다.

original_en_text: With all the refuse collapsing throughout their domain, the worker’s stiff shell would be essential if they held any hope to survive.
original_zh_text: 在废墟持续崩塌的领域，硬化甲壳成为他们最后的生存保障。
translated_text: As all the rubbish in the area is crumbling, the workers ' sinks are vital to their hope of survival.
secondary_translated_text: 그 지역의 모든 쓰레기가 무너지고 있기 때문에 노동자들의 싱크대들은 생존에 대한 그들의 희망에 매우 중요하다.

original_en_text: Civilisation encroaches from this kingdom’s crown, but the lowlands are still ruled by great beasts. Its roar stirs something deep within me, some primal instinct.
original_zh_text: 文明从王冠之地蔓延开来，但低地区域仍是野兽的疆域。它的咆哮唤醒了我血脉深处的某种原始悸动。
translated_text: Civilization has invaded the crown of the kingdom, but the lowly still rule the animals. And this rum evoked something in me, a primitive instinct.
secondary_translated_text: 문명은 왕국의 왕관을 침략했지만, 낮은 사람들은 여전히 동물들을 지배한다.그리고 이 럼은 내 안에 어떤 원시적인 본능을 불러일으켰습니다.

original_en_text: The poor creature has lived a life too calm and coddled. It would not fare well in the world beyond its walls.
original_zh_text: 这可怜虫一生过于安逸，若离开高墙庇护必难存活。
translated_text: The poor creature lived a very peaceful and comfortable life. He does not work outside the walls.
secondary_translated_text: 그 불쌍한 생물은 매우 평화롭고 편안한 삶을 살았다.그는 벽 밖에서 일하지 않는다.

original_en_text: Lithe, winged scouts frequently paired with their heavier brethren.
original_zh_text: 与重装部队配合作战的敏捷翼兵。
translated_text: Light reconnaissance aircraft are usually combined with heavily armed reconnaissance aircraft.
secondary_translated_text: 경량 정찰기는 일반적으로 중무장 정찰기와 결합된다.

translated_text: Funerals

original_en_text: Their throwing weapon is well-suited to the wide caverns they inhabit. These sly little bugs must have a keen claw for crafting.
original_zh_text: 其长索武器的高效性在栖居的宽阔洞窟中总能发挥到极致，这般狡诈的小虫竟也有颗巧匠之心。
translated_text: Their weapons are perfect for the huge caves in which they live.These small cunning insects need sharp claws to make them.
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 무기는 그들이 살고있는 거대한 동굴에 완벽합니다. 이 작은 교활한 곤충은 그것을 만들기 위해 날카로운 발톱이 필요합니다.

original_en_text: Toughened Kai capable of extending sharp spikes from within its shellsack.
original_zh_text: 甲囊中可弹出尖刺的硬化凯虫。
translated_text: Kay Strong managed to insert a sharp tip from his pocket into his helmet.
secondary_translated_text: 케이 스트롱은 주머니에서 날카로운 팁을 헬멧에 넣을 수 있었다.

original_en_text: An impressive act of mimicry. To match so closely with its land, their clover caves must have sustained through generations uncounted.
original_zh_text: 与环境的契合程度，印证了千万年演化的精妙。
translated_text: In order to match Earth, their clover caves must have existed for many generations.
secondary_translated_text: 지구와 일치하기 위해, 그들의 클로버 동굴은 여러 세대에 걸쳐 존재했을 것입니다.

original_en_text: This bug is soft and clumsy, but to its fortune its home caves seem relatively free of effective predators. I wonder why that is.
original_zh_text: 这种虫子柔弱笨拙，所幸其栖息洞穴缺乏高效捕食者。此地的生态平衡奥秘值得探究。
translated_text: This insect is sweet and stupid, but fortunately it doesn't have an effective predator in its native caves.
secondary_translated_text: 이 곤충은 달콤하고 멍청하지만 다행히도 본래 동굴에는 효과적인 포식자가 없습니다.

original_en_text: Towering iron automaton, driven by rotor and cog.
original_zh_text: 由齿轮驱动的巨型铁质自动机。
translated_text: Automatic high-speed railway vehicles driven by wheels and rotating gears.
secondary_translated_text: 바퀴와 회전 기어에 의해 구동되는 자동 고속 철도 차량.

original_en_text: Small bug that crafts a shell of sharpened coral. Spins its shell at rapid speed to cut through crust and bone.
original_zh_text: 用锋利珊瑚作为外壳的小型生物，旋转切割无往不利。
translated_text: Small insects can be made from the shells of sharp corals.Turn the shell to cut the skin and bones.
secondary_translated_text: 작은 곤충은 날카로운 산호의 껍질으로 만들어질 수 있다. 껍질을 뒤집어 껍질과 뼈를 잘라낸다.

original_en_text: Plump, plentiful drifter of a coral past.
original_zh_text: 昔日围绕珊瑚塔群居的漂浮生物。
translated_text: Once upon a time, there were great coral reefs and lots of drift.
secondary_translated_text: 옛날에, 거대한 산호초와 많은 표류가 있었습니다.

translated_text: Carcasses and Reptiles.

original_en_text: Far tougher for being matched inside their encrusted domain. They must have lived their whole lives within their tower, to command it so.
original_zh_text: 外壳比内部要坚硬太多。终生固守一地的生存方式，造就了独特的战斗形态。
translated_text: To do this, he had to live in the tower all his life.
secondary_translated_text: 그러기 위해 그는 평생 타워에서 살아야 했다.

translated_text: Directed by: Reed, Reed

original_en_text: Tall bug charged to pile Silk dregs in preparation for respooling. Their sharp rake now doubles equally well as a stabbing weapon.
original_zh_text: 负责灵丝残渣回收的高个虫子，尖利的耙子现已成为它的武器。
translated_text: Large insects accumulate silk waste, preparing for processing.His sharp hands can be used as a knife.
secondary_translated_text: 큰 곤충은 실크 폐기물을 축적하여 가공을 준비합니다. 그의 날카로운 손은 칼로 사용할 수 있습니다.

translated_text: TRABLOCOIO
People of Loisa
The men who were tortured by Troville

original_en_text: Few creatures of that Silk stricken place would find nourishment enough to grow so large.
original_zh_text: 丝咒之地鲜有生物能获取足够养分长至此等体型。
translated_text: In areas where the silk is flooded, few organisms find enough nutrients to grow to this size.
secondary_translated_text: 실크가 침수된 지역에서는, 이 크기로 성장할 수 있는 충분한 영양분을 찾는 유기체는 거의 없습니다.

original_en_text: Anguished spectre of lingering thread. Despite its ephemeral nature, strong strikes can dispel the Wraith for a time.
original_zh_text: 游荡的丝线怨魂，重击可将其暂时驱散。
translated_text: Ghosts are short-lived by nature, but can be temporarily expelled with a strong blow.
secondary_translated_text: 유령은 본성적으로 수명이 짧지만, 강한 타격으로 일시적으로 쫓겨날 수 있다.

original_en_text: A tragic fate for a once honourable bug. Those void soaked threads... Their physical might is nothing compared to the corruption they wreak upon a soul.
original_zh_text: 昔日荣光骑士的悲剧命运。这些沾染虚空的丝线，对灵魂的腐化远胜肉体摧残。
translated_text: Their physical strength is absolutely nothing compared to the corrosion of their souls, the wires embedded in the void.
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 육체적 힘은 그들의 영혼의 부식, 공허에 묻혀있는 전선과 비교하면 절대적으로 아무것도 아닙니다.

translated_text: Results of the survey
The sisters split up.

original_en_text: The coldshard, even when destroyed it remembers its former shape. A remarkable material, and perhaps even more astonishing there seems life contained within it.
original_zh_text: 冰晶被毁后仍存有对其原形的记忆，这等材料特性已属非凡，更神奇的是其中似乎竟蕴含着生命？
translated_text: Even if a piece of ice breaks down, it recalls its previous form.This is an unusual material, and perhaps even more surprisingly, it seems to contain life.
secondary_translated_text: 얼음 조각이 부서질지라도, 그것은 이전의 형태를 회상합니다. 이것은 특이한 재료이며, 아마도 더 놀라운 것은 생명이 들어있는 것처럼 보입니다.

original_en_text: The talent and intelligence of this construct goes far beyond others I have witnessed. They seem less built as a tool to serve than an attempt at life itself.
original_zh_text: 其智力远超我所见过的其他造物。它们似乎并非单纯作为工具而被打造，而更像是在追求生命的自我意识。
translated_text: The talent and intelligence of this structure far surpasses any structure I have seen. They seem to be more temptations of life than instruments of service.
secondary_translated_text: 이 구조의 재능과 지능은 내가 본 어떤 구조를 훨씬 능가한다.그들은 봉사의 도구보다 삶의 유혹이 더 많은 것 같다.

original_en_text: In entering their domain, I freed these bugs to infest the greater vaults. They are a nuisance, and I have only myself to blame.
original_zh_text: 我闯入了这些虫子的领地，并释放了它们。如今它们已蔓延到了各个书库，这都是我一手造成的麻烦。
translated_text: After penetrating their territory, I infected these insects in a larger breast, which I found a bit confusing.
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 영토를 침투 한 후, 나는 좀 혼란스럽다는 것을 발견 한 더 큰 가슴에이 곤충을 감염 시켰습니다.

original_en_text: Winged mite-beast, bred large to catch workers who once tried to flee their tasks.
original_zh_text: 精心培育出的巨型螨兽，用于追捕逃役工虫。
translated_text: Animals breeding in large numbers to catch workers trying to evade their duties.
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 의무를 회피하려는 노동자들을 잡기 위해 많은 수의 동물들이 번식한다.

translated_text: The choir gear

original_en_text: The way it darts in and out of the ground has an almost playful quality to it. An amusing and effective way to ambush prey.
original_zh_text: 从地面突然窜出的攻击方式，兼具实用性与趣味性。
translated_text: The way in and out of the basement is fun.It is an exciting and effective way to observe your mines.
secondary_translated_text: 지하에 들어가서 나오는 방법은 재미있다. 그것은 광산을 관찰하는 흥미롭고 효과적인 방법입니다.

original_en_text: Floral foe with a core shaped to mimic a mask. The core can be thrust forth to bludgeon unwary bugs.
original_zh_text: 花芯长得像恐怖面甲的阴险植物，会突然向外猛戳，重击那些缺乏警惕的虫子。
translated_text: The flower core mimics the shape of the mask.Your heart can be pushed against any careless mistake.
secondary_translated_text: 마스크의 모양을 모방하는 꽃 코어. 당신의 마음은 부주의한 실수에 대해 밀어 넣을 수 있습니다.

translated_text: The Roach Server

original_en_text: The servitor has been heavily damaged by time and the elements. Its actions have grown erratic. It seems no longer able to discern friend from foe.
original_zh_text: 岁月的侵蚀使这位仆从行为失常，似乎已经变得敌我不分。
translated_text: Their behavior becomes unstable, and there is no longer a distinction between enemy and ally.
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 행동은 불안정해졌고, 더 이상 적과 동맹국 사이에는 구별이 없습니다.

original_en_text: A unique mask and impressive form. Now just another near forgotten specimen of this land before the monarch.
original_zh_text: 拥有独特的体型和面甲，本应成为传奇生物，如今却处于被遗忘的边缘。
translated_text: Now he is just another largely forgotten champion of this homegrown country.
secondary_translated_text: 이제 그는 이 자국에서 크게 잊혀진 또 다른 챔피언에 불과하다.

original_en_text: These bugs work mainly as finders and foragers for the warriors of their tribe. Combat has not long been their nature.
original_zh_text: 主要负责探索和采集，本非战斗种族，最近才开始具有攻击性。
translated_text: These insects served primarily as hunters of tribal soldiers and food gatherers.
secondary_translated_text: 이 곤충들은 주로 부족 군인들의 사냥꾼과 먹이를 채집하는 역할을했습니다.

original_en_text: Pharloom shall quickly learn the curse of this substance. What benefits it provides can be swiftly outweighed.
original_zh_text: 纺络很快就会领教这种物质所带来的诅咒。它所赋予的好处，很快就会被更沉重的代价所掩盖。
translated_text: Soon the culprit realizes the curse of this substance.The benefits they offer will soon be paid off.
secondary_translated_text: 곧 범인은 이 물질의 저주를 깨닫는다. 그들이 제공하는 혜택은 곧 갚을 것이다.

translated_text: Scar the Scouts (English)
П о к о в а н а б и н

original_en_text: Puppet servant of the Citadel, suspended on strings of Silk. An early form of automaton, requiring extensive Silk to maintain its service.
original_zh_text: 由灵丝悬吊操控的傀儡，圣堡的仆从。一种早期形态的自动构造，需要大量的灵丝来维持其运作。
translated_text: A castle servant 's puppet hanging in silk.The first machines required a large amount of silk for maintenance.
secondary_translated_text: 성 하인의 인형이 실크로 걸려 있다. 최초의 기계는 유지 보수를 위해 많은 양의 실크를 필요로 했다.

original_en_text: Eternal defender of Shellwood Shrine. His pin and cymbal show many marks of their use.
original_zh_text: 甲木林圣所的永恒守卫者，佩针与钹尽显沧桑。
translated_text: The Eternal Keeper of the Shrine of Sherwood There are many uses for pines and cymbals.
secondary_translated_text: 셔우드 신사의 영원한 수호자 소나무와 cymbals 는 여러 가지 용도로 사용됩니다.

original_en_text: It is no wonder these constructs were cast. No mortal bug would last long inside that scorching place. Even my shell struggles to withstand its heat.
original_zh_text: 这些造物被投入使用是有原因的——没有凡虫能在那片炽热之地撑太久，就连我的甲壳也难以抵御那里的高温。
translated_text: It is not surprising that the building is still under construction.In such a warm climate, insects cannot survive very long.Even the skin can not withstand the heat.
secondary_translated_text: 건물이 아직 공사 중인 것은 놀라운 일이 아닙니다. 이렇게 따뜻한 기후에서는 곤충이 오래 살 수 없습니다. 피부조차도 열을 견딜 수 없습니다.

original_en_text: Fabled first Cloverstag of Verdania’s wilds. Commands the grass and leaves to aid its attack.
original_zh_text: 翠庭荒野传说中的苜鹿始祖，能号令草木协同作战。
translated_text: The oldest legends relate to the dizzying deserts of Clophost. I beg the grass and leaves to help in the attack.
secondary_translated_text: 가장 오래된 전설들은 현기증하는 클로포스트 사막과 관련이 있다.나는 풀과 잎이 공격에 도움을 줄 것을 간청한다.

original_en_text: Disciple of the Choir, charged to maintain its perfect order, by sharp pin if necessary.
original_zh_text: 维护咏者团秩序的迅捷信徒，必要时以利针执法。
translated_text: The horn buttons are responsible for maintaining perfect order, and if necessary, sharp razors can be used.
secondary_translated_text: 뿔 버튼은 완벽한 질서를 유지하는 책임이 있으며, 필요한 경우 날카로운 면도기를 사용할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: When they do not hinder my path, I find their simple motion rather pleasant.
original_zh_text: 当它未阻挡前路时，笨拙的蠕动反而显得几分憨态可掬。
translated_text: When I walk, I enjoy the simple movements.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 걷는 동안 간단한 움직임을 즐긴다.

original_en_text: Holds an extensive supply of searing acid in a layered sack within its shell. The acid rains from its mouth upon any creature it sees as food.
original_zh_text: 它胃囊里的酸液储量足以蚀穿圣堡城墙，所幸那对退化的小眼睛总让攻击准头欠佳。
translated_text: Laminated bags in the shell contain a large amount of thermic acid.The acid rain in your mouth falls on all the creatures that you consider food.
secondary_translated_text: 껍질 안의 적층 봉투에는 많은 양의 열산이 들어 있습니다. 입 안의 산성비가 당신이 음식이라고 생각하는 모든 생물에게 떨어집니다.

original_en_text: Heavy, hard-shelled worker, forever repairing the Citadel’s crumbling Underworks.
original_zh_text: 永不停歇修缮圣堡工厂的重甲劳工。
translated_text: Heavy and industrial workers repair the permanently destroyed underground works of the castle.
secondary_translated_text: 무거운 산업 노동자들은 성의 영구적으로 파괴된 지하 공사를 수리합니다.

original_en_text: It has no means to defend itself. Its only hope for survival is to be mistaken for a plant.
original_zh_text: 生存的唯一希望，便是被误认作植物。除此之外，它们没有任何防御手段。
translated_text: He cannot defend himself, and his only hope of survival is to exchange for a plant.
secondary_translated_text: 그는 자신을 방어할 수 없고, 생존의 유일한 희망은 식물을 교환하는 것이다.

original_en_text: This one has allied themself with me, either as thanks for their saving or respect for one judged as equal. Whichever the reason, their fellowship is welcome.
original_zh_text: 这一只现在成了我的盟友，不知道是报救命之恩，还是单纯觉得我实力强大，但多个帮手总是好的。
translated_text: This person will join me in gratitude for his or her salvation or in respect for those who are considered equals.
secondary_translated_text: 이 사람은 자신의 구원에 대해 감사하거나 동등한 것으로 간주되는 사람들을 존중하기 위해 나와 함께 할 것입니다.

original_en_text: Bugs like these crossed the caves to bring me to Pharloom. I cut down many before my capture. Then I had thought them minded and cunning. Now I can see the singular will that haunts them all.
original_zh_text: 正是这类虫子穿越洞穴将我带至纺络。被俘前我斩杀了许多，当时认为它们具备独立心智与狡诈。如今我明白是同一意志在支配它们全体。
translated_text: This type of worm carried me through a cave into the rain and did it long before I was caught. They think they are fast and smart. Now I see one will that amazes them all.
secondary_translated_text: 이 종류의 벌레는 나를 동굴을 통해 비로 옮겼고, 내가 잡히기 오래 전에 그렇게했습니다.그들은 자신들이 빠르고 똑똑하다고 생각한다.이제 나는 그들 모두를 놀라게 하는 한 가지 의지를 보았다.

translated_text: Kakerion

original_en_text: Its sticky spit would no doubt make a useful crafting material if moulded fresh. Unfortunately, I cannot stop to experiment.
original_zh_text: 它们喷射的粘稠物质经过及时塑形，一定可以作为优质的制造材料。可惜我无暇采集实验。
translated_text: If it is formed recently, coarse saliva will undoubtedly be a useful material for the process. Unfortunately, we cannot stop this experience.
secondary_translated_text: 최근에 형성되면, 거친 침은 의심 할 여지없이이 과정에 유용한 재료가 될 것입니다.불행히도, 우리는 이러한 경험을 막을 수 없습니다.

original_en_text: The smell from these jailers overwhelms my senses. I strongly doubt they have ever thought to bathe.
original_zh_text: 这些狱卒的恶臭令我窒息。我怀疑它们从未有过沐浴的概念。
translated_text: The smell of the guards broke my senses. I doubt you want to swim.
secondary_translated_text: 경비원의 냄새가 내 감각을 깨뜨렸다.나는 네가 수영하고 싶다는 것을 의심한다.

original_en_text: A creature at its most basic. This one is no threat to me, or any other.
original_zh_text: 作为最基础的生命形态，它对我或任何生物都不构成威胁。
translated_text: It was one of the most basic organs. It was not a threat to me or anyone.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 가장 기본적인 기관 중 하나였다.그것은 나나 누구에게도 위협이 되지 않았다.

original_en_text: Aged former pilgrim. Uses their wings to position above threats and crush them under their large shell.
original_zh_text: 年迈的前朝圣者，利用飞行优势从上方压制目标。
translated_text: With their wings, they place them above the threat and crush them under a large shell.
secondary_translated_text: 날개로, 그들은 위협 위에 그들을 배치하고 큰 껍질 아래에 그들을 분쇄합니다.

translated_text: Sprint on Thorn
In Lowwood
The circle was

original_en_text: A bug once frail, pushed by twisted thread beyond its mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 灵丝撑开了它脆弱的甲壳，强行将这副残躯突破凡虫的限制。
translated_text: Fragile insects are pushed to their limits with the help of twisted threads.
secondary_translated_text: 연약한 곤충들은 비틀린 실의 도움으로 그들의 한계까지 밀어 넣습니다.

original_en_text: The threat of its exploding rear is an effective deterrent to predators, but the slightest jolt or fall can cause its premature end.
original_zh_text: 尾部爆炸威胁能威慑捕食者，但轻微碰撞就会导致其提前自毁。
translated_text: The threat of tail blasts is an effective deterrent to predators, but even minor collisions or falls can end soon.
secondary_translated_text: 꼬리 폭발의 위협은 포식자를 효과적으로 억제하지만 작은 충돌이나 낙하조차도 곧 끝날 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: To live only a single, bright moment... What would one feel? Is it glorious, or only despair? Or could it be both, mixed equal?
original_zh_text: 生命仅有瞬息的璀璨——它们会感到辉煌还是绝望？抑或是二者交织？
translated_text: Live in a bright moment. How do you feel? Is this glory or despair? Can we combine the two?
secondary_translated_text: 밝은 순간에 살아라.기분이 어때요?이것이 영광인가, 아니면 절망인가?이 두 가지를 결합할 수 있을까요?

original_en_text: Though their mind is largely lost their skill with a chain has not been forgotten. Does the Haunting eternally bind a bug to the task it had in life?
original_zh_text: 锁链破空之声依旧精准狠厉——丝咒是否将生前的执念化作了死后的永恒苦役？
translated_text: Their minds were almost lost, but their ability to use chains was not forgotten.Can Trubble ever connect this mistake to his life 's work?
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 정신은 거의 사라졌지만, 체인을 사용하는 능력은 잊혀지지 않았습니다. 트러블은이 실수를 평생의 일과 연결할 수 있습니까?

original_en_text: Angered, adult Beastfly with a weighty body and a thickened hardshell mask.
original_zh_text: 暴怒的成年兽蝇，身形沉重，戴着厚重面甲。
translated_text: The evil adult animal rose into the sky and put on a huge thick mask.
secondary_translated_text: 악령의 성인이 하늘로 올라가서 거대한 두꺼운 가면을 착용했다.

original_en_text: Young, bony bug that can curl its body to form a ball.
original_zh_text: 能蜷缩成球形的小型骨虫。
translated_text: Young bony insects can round their bodies and form spheres.
secondary_translated_text: 어린 뼈벌레는 몸을 둥글게 하고 구형을 형성할 수 있다.

translated_text: The Father of Fire
secondary_translated_text: 불의 아버지 The Father of Fire

translated_text: The Toads

original_en_text: So close to a perfect furred form... If only they’d been able to breed out the spines.
original_zh_text: 近乎完美的毛茸形态，唯有背刺未去除。改造自然的尝试总是难以尽善尽美。
translated_text: It is close to the perfect skin shape.If only we could grow thorns.
secondary_translated_text: 완벽한 피부 모양에 가깝습니다. 가시가 자랄 수 있다면 말입니다.

original_en_text: Bulky worm of the deepest depths. Lives in tight crevices and uses its weighty body to batter.
original_zh_text: 栖息狭窄裂隙的厚重蠕虫，以沉重身躯撞击敌人。
translated_text: Look at the largest. They live in narrow spaces and face heavy bodies.
secondary_translated_text: 가장 큰 것을 보라.그들은 좁은 공간에서 살고 무거운 몸과 마주합니다.

original_en_text: Crazed fanatic able to guide Pharloom’s haunted Silk by music played upon it.
original_zh_text: 癫狂的信徒，通过演奏音乐操控纺络的诅咒灵丝。
translated_text: Fans can play music to control the hawk 's silk ghost.
secondary_translated_text: 팬들은 음악을 연주하여 매의 실크 유령을 조종할 수 있다.

translated_text: Valtem
the cragry

original_en_text: There is old anguish bound upon these threads, the result of countless cruel procedures.
original_zh_text: 这些丝线承载着古老痛楚，源自无数残酷改造手术。
translated_text: These clues relate to ancient sufferings, the result of countless cruel procedures.
secondary_translated_text: 이 단서들은 수많은 잔인한 절차의 결과인 고대 고통과 관련이 있습니다.

original_en_text: Rare, enormous Skull Scuttler. The Marrow’s largest predator, and the most feared for its ferocious temperament.
original_zh_text: 罕见的巨型头骨潜行者，髓骨洞窟的顶级掠食者，以凶暴性情令凡虫闻风丧胆。
translated_text: The largest predator of the bone marrow is also the most dangerous due to its fierce nature.
secondary_translated_text: 골수의 가장 큰 포식자는 또한 그것의 사나운 성격으로 인해 가장 위험한 것입니다.

original_en_text: Full-grown former pilgrim serving the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 侍奉圣堡的前朝圣者，体型发生过异变。
translated_text: An old pilgrim who grew up in the castle

original_en_text: Lord and justice of Pharloom’s craws. Delivers death to condemned bugs with his steel-plated beak.
original_zh_text: 执掌腐囊虫庭生杀大权的审判者，用其镀钢长喙对有罪的虫子执行死刑。
translated_text: Pharaoh, the Lord of greed and justice, with the help of a steel beak, he killed the guilty insect.
secondary_translated_text: 탐욕과 정의의 주인 파라오는 강철 부리의 도움으로 죄 많은 곤충을 죽였다.

translated_text: I had an empty beard.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 텅 빈 수염을 가지고 있었다.

translated_text: Flyers of flame
secondary_translated_text: 플라이어스 오브 플라임 Flyers of Flame

original_en_text: Rarely seen beetle that spends most of its life nestled deep in bone and rock. The Flintgems on its shell excrete an explosive powder.
original_zh_text: 深藏岩骨深处的稀有甲虫，甲壳嵌满燧晶并分泌爆炸性体液。
translated_text: The rare beetle spends most of its life deep in bones and stones.The precious stones in the casing of the Kremlin release explosive powder.
secondary_translated_text: 이 희귀한 딱정벌레는 뼈와 돌 깊은 곳에서 삶의 대부분을 보내며, 크렘린의 껍질 안에 있는 보석들은 폭발적인 가루를 방출한다.

original_en_text: Disgusting both in manner and stench. I feel no remorse to see them felled.
original_zh_text: 它们浑身散发着腐殖质恶臭，甲壳缝隙间还粘着陈年血痂。每当那对复眼在牢狱阴影中亮起，连最凶悍的囚徒都会瑟缩墙角。
translated_text: The smell and form are disgusting.When I see defeat, I don't regret it.
secondary_translated_text: 냄새와 형태는 역겨워서 패배를 보면 후회하지 않는다.

translated_text: Pilgrim with Wings
secondary_translated_text: 날개를 가진 순례자 Pilgrim with Wings

original_en_text: Pharloom proves often the effectiveness of bells as weapons. Never before had I considered them as such.
original_zh_text: 纺络总在提醒我——钟亦可为兵器。只是从前，我从未想过这些圣器会被如此亵用。
translated_text: Farrow has repeatedly demonstrated the effectiveness of the bell as a weapon. I never thought of it that way.
secondary_translated_text: Farrow 는 무기로서의 종의 효과를 반복적으로 보여주었습니다.그런 식으로 생각해 본 적이 없다.

translated_text: Mother of Spiders

original_en_text: Enormous tubular beast uniquely suited to living close to the void below.
original_zh_text: 适应虚空环境的管状巨兽。
translated_text: This huge tubular beast is suitable for life near the cavity below.
secondary_translated_text: 이 거대한 튜브 모양의 짐승은 아래의 동굴 근처의 생명체에 적합합니다.

translated_text: The Jury of Tarao

original_en_text: Old pilgrim carrying a heavy iron bell staff.
original_zh_text: 手持沉重铁制钟杖的年长领队，丝咒抹去了它昔日的权威。
translated_text: The old pilgrim had a heavy iron stick.
secondary_translated_text: 그 늙은 순례자는 무거운 철 막대기를 가지고 있었다.

translated_text: about pilots.
Flint's Air Force

original_en_text: If left to grow, these young bugs will fight for dominance until only one remains.
original_zh_text: 我曾目睹三只幼体将巢穴化作修罗场，最终胜者甲壳上插满兄弟的尖刺。这种养蛊式的成长，正是圣堡工厂默许的筛选机制。
translated_text: When young insects are allowed to grow, they compete for dominance until only one of them remains.
secondary_translated_text: 어린 곤충이 자라도록 허용되면, 그들은 하나만 남아있을 때까지 지배를 위해 경쟁합니다.

original_en_text: Living Silk commanding a dead shell... An affront to nature, and one all too common across Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 活灵丝操纵死躯壳……违背自然的造物，在纺络却司空见惯。
translated_text: The live thread commanding the dead shell is an insult to nature and is also common in the Farem region.
secondary_translated_text: 죽은 껍질을 지휘하는 살아있는 실은 자연에 대한 모욕이며 Farem 지역에서도 흔합니다.

translated_text: Red and Red Cocktails
The shadow loader
Cups for suction
The World Depression

original_en_text: Coiled nest of charged worms. Assaults intruders with bolts of crackling electricity.
original_zh_text: 带电蠕虫团，释放霹雳闪电攻击入侵者。
translated_text: Winding nest, made of loaded worms. Attack on the attackers with explosive lightning.
secondary_translated_text: 구불구불한 둥지, 짐을 싣고 있는 벌레로 만들어졌다.폭발적인 번개로 공격자를 공격하다.

original_en_text: High caste bug, responsible for delivering sermons and leading prayer for those beyond the walls of the Whispering Vaults.
original_zh_text: 为低语书库墙外信众布道的高阶虫子。
translated_text: The worm of the upper caste is responsible for preaching and guiding the prayer of those outside the walls of whispering.
secondary_translated_text: 상위 계급의 벌레는 속삭임의 벽 밖에있는 사람들의 기도를 설교하고 인도하는 책임이 있습니다.

translated_text: Surgeons.

original_en_text: Did he recognise my part played in this land’s void-strung state? If so, perhaps his judgment was not unfair. To these bugs I have brought much destruction.
original_zh_text: 若他知晓我与此地虚空缠结的关联，其裁决或许称得上公正——因我确实为腐囊虫族带来了毁灭。
translated_text: Do you know what role I have played in this empty land? If so, then your judgment is wrong. I have done a lot of harm to these bugs.
secondary_translated_text: 내가 이 빈 땅에서 어떤 역할을 했는지 아십니까?만약 그렇다면, 당신의 판단은 잘못된 것입니다.나는 이 벌레들에게 많은 해를 끼쳤다.

original_en_text: That incendiary material they carry is a natural wonder, with many potential applications. What a waste to carelessly throw it at me whenever I pass by.
original_zh_text: 其携带的燃烧材料堪称自然奇迹，具有多种潜在用途。每当路过就被随意投掷袭击，这等浪费行径实在令我扼腕。
translated_text: The hot materials they carry are a natural wonder with plenty of possibilities.Every time this happens, there is no point in accidentally throwing me in.
secondary_translated_text: 그들이 운반하는 뜨거운 재료는 많은 가능성이있는 자연의 경이로움입니다. 이런 일이 일어날 때마다 우연히 나를 던져 넣는 것은 의미가 없습니다.

translated_text: Food from cocoa

original_en_text: Not a frontline force, but in my assault upon their tower all emerge to see me stilled.
original_zh_text: 虽非主力部队，但当我进攻其高塔时，它们倾巢而出进行阻截，阵势不容小觑。
translated_text: Not the troops on the front, but when I attacked their towers, they all showed up, and I watched as I calmed down.
secondary_translated_text: 전선에 있는 군대는 아니지만, 내가 그들의 탑을 공격했을 때, 그들은 모두 나타났고, 나는 내가 진정되는 것을 지켜보았다.

translated_text: The Princess, Princess
The craft
Sig. Wisp

original_en_text: A cowardly sort. They will try to remain at range to throw their sharp weapons. Best to rush them down and cut quick.
original_zh_text: 怯战而擅长投掷攻击。最佳策略是快速近身解决。
translated_text: This is a kind of cowardice.They try to stay within range and throw sharp weapons.It would be better to cut it quickly.
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 일종의 비겁함이다. 그들은 사거리에 머물러 있고 날카로운 무기를 던지기 위해 노력한다. 빨리 잘라내는 것이 낫다.

original_en_text: Wide-masked aerial attacker trained to act as support for its grounded companions while remaining at range.
original_zh_text: 佩戴宽幅面甲的远程支援型飞行攻击者。
translated_text: The masked pilots were trained to maintain their autonomy by supporting their comrades on the ground.
secondary_translated_text: 마스크를 쓴 조종사들은 지상의 동료들을 지원함으로써 자율성을 유지하도록 훈련을 받았다.

original_en_text: Most likely this one’s true charge was to root out and condemn those not seen as sufficiently fervent.
original_zh_text: 表面传播教义，实为铲除异端的思想刽子手。
translated_text: Perhaps this man 's true duty is to root out and condemn those who seem to be inert.
secondary_translated_text: 아마도 이 사람의 진정한 의무는 무활하게 보이는 사람들을 근절하고 정죄하는 것일 것이다.

translated_text: Kay Kay.

original_en_text: Old catcher over Shellwood Pond, bearing a longpin and stricken by the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 甲木林池塘的老迈捕手，手持长针，遭受丝咒之苦。
translated_text: The old receiver was attacked by a ghost over Sherwood Pond, and he had a long needle in his hand.
secondary_translated_text: 셔우드 연못 (Sherwood Pond) 에서 유령에 의해 공격받은 늙은 수신자는 손에 긴 바늘을 가지고있었습니다.

translated_text: The Abandoned Guru
Stillkin's Trap.
Pendragon

original_en_text: Grizzled older roach tender weighted with a lasso of heavy chain.
original_zh_text: 心智迷失的老练饲育者，挥舞沉重锁链维持虫群秩序。
translated_text: The old hairy beetle was dressed in a heavy chain rope.
secondary_translated_text: 그 털이 많은 노벌레는 무거운 체인 밧줄을 입고 있었다.

original_en_text: These ones somehow learnt to call and guide the scorching Wisps that share their thicket. Whether through dominance or reverence is unclear.
original_zh_text: 这些家伙不知何故掌握了操控火灵之术。他们能随心所欲地召唤并指挥它们。
translated_text: These creatures have learned to summon and lead the elves that live in the jungle.
secondary_translated_text: 이 생물들은 정글에 사는 엘프들을 소환하고 인도하는 법을 배웠습니다.

original_en_text: He carelessly seeded these caves with that cursed substance... His final fate seems fair reward for those efforts, yet I feel some sympathy. It is an alluring power.
original_zh_text: 他肆意播撒那种禁忌物质……最终结局可谓咎由自取，但我仍有些许同情。凡虫对力量的追寻时常令我感到唏嘘。
translated_text: His final fate seems a fair reward for these efforts, but I still feel sympathy for him.
secondary_translated_text: 그의 마지막 운명은 이러한 노력에 대한 공정한 보상처럼 보이지만, 나는 여전히 그를 동정한다.

original_zh_text: 被珊瑚包裹的软壳生物。
translated_text: The spoiler is a soft shell wrapped in coral.

original_en_text: To pair with another is a base instinct, and one that brings some bugs great joy. I once sought similar union, but of my own mates none could match my lifespan.
original_zh_text: 与其他虫子结为伴侣是一种本能，是欢愉的来源。可惜我曾寻觅的伴侣都难敌岁月的变迁。
translated_text: Mating with other people is a basic instinct, and it can even give some insects great pleasure.I have been looking for such a union before, but I do not have a partner in my life that I could match.
secondary_translated_text: 다른 사람들과 짝짓기하는 것은 기본적인 본능이며, 심지어 곤충에게 큰 즐거움을 줄 수 있습니다. 나는 이전에 그러한 연합을 찾고 있었지만, 나는 내 인생에서 내가 일치 할 수있는 파트너가 없습니다.

original_en_text: Song queen of the Skarr and their most talented warrior.
original_zh_text: 斯卡尔一族的歌后，并且是族史上最具天赋的战士。
translated_text: The Skelin singers and their most talented fighters.
secondary_translated_text: Skelin 가수들과 그들의 가장 재능있는 전투기들.

translated_text: In the case of coral

original_en_text: For one to love another so similar to themselves, is that selfless or vain?
original_zh_text: 爱慕镜像般的另一个自己，究竟是无私还是极致的虚荣？
translated_text: Altruism or vanity to love someone who is like you?
secondary_translated_text: 이타주의 또는 당신과 같은 누군가를 사랑하는 허영심?

original_en_text: A crude construct of my father’s fallen domain. Only a fool believes that void can be fashioned to do their bidding.
original_zh_text: 我父亲陨落国度的粗劣造物。只有愚者才会相信虚空可被驾驭。
translated_text: The structure of my father 's fallen kingdom. He believes that only fools can create a vacuum under his command.
secondary_translated_text: 내 아버지의 타락한 왕국의 구조.그는 오직 바보들만이 그의 명령 아래의 진공을 만들 수 있다고 믿는다.

translated_text: Mine is a tar.
In the Barnake
Gaia
Shadillad (English)
The first without

original_en_text: Short-horned bug born with underdeveloped wings.
original_zh_text: 翅膀发育不全的短角虫。
translated_text: The short-horned insect by its nature has incomplete wings.
secondary_translated_text: 짧은 뿔 곤충은 본성적으로 불완전한 날개를 가지고 있습니다.

translated_text: С к а с к а р с г а д

original_en_text: Common bug wielding a set of old bells. The bug will fling the bells at anyone it deems still free.
original_zh_text: 挥舞旧钟的普通信徒，向未被丝咒侵蚀者投掷旧钟。
translated_text: An ordinary insect that rings an ancient bell.This mistake will be a warning to those who still think they are free.
secondary_translated_text: 고대의 종을 울리는 평범한 곤충. 이 실수는 여전히 자신이 자유롭다고 생각하는 사람들에게 경고가 될 것입니다.

original_en_text: Born with many tools I would once have desired for myself. Fortunately, I have trained hard around those limits.
original_zh_text: 天生具备我曾渴求的利器。所幸我通过苦练突破了自身局限。
translated_text: I was born with the tools that I needed. Fortunately, I worked within those limits.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 내가 필요로 하는 도구를 가지고 태어났다.다행히도, 나는 그 한계 안에서 일했다.

original_en_text: More bother than the bug themself are the countless traps they have already laid throughout their caves.
original_zh_text: 其洞穴内遍布的陷阱比这虫子本身更令我头疼。
translated_text: More disturbing than the insects themselves are the numerous traps that are placed in caves.
secondary_translated_text: 곤충 자체보다 더 혼란스러운 것은 동굴에 놓인 수많은 함정입니다.

translated_text: polinized
The Fringe Watchers (United States)

original_en_text: The lethality of these bugs is unexpected. Their bodies were never built for combat. The Haunting has altered their nature dramatically.
original_zh_text: 这些本非为战斗设计的虫子竟有致命的战力，看来丝咒显著地改变了其本质。
translated_text: The mortality of the bacteria was unexpected, and their bodies were never created to fight.
secondary_translated_text: 박테리아의 사망률은 예상치 못했고, 그들의 몸은 싸우기 위해 만들어지지 않았습니다.

translated_text: The Little Confessor.

original_en_text: Docile bug whose wings mimic the grasses of the Far Fields. A common snack for larger predators.
original_zh_text: 温顺的飞虫，翅膀模拟原野草叶的模样。比它们大的生物基本都能把它们当作小零食来吃。
translated_text: A docile insect with wings that mimics grass in the field.They are prey for large predators.
secondary_translated_text: 들판의 풀을 모방하는 날개를 가진 온순한 곤충. 그들은 큰 포식자의 먹이를 먹는다.

original_en_text: Exhausted bug, grown sickly from the smog of the Underworks. The worker’s twistpins, once tools of repair, now serve as spun projectiles.
original_zh_text: 被工业废气侵蚀的抱病劳工，将维修旋针改造为投掷武器。
translated_text: A helpless insect got sick from smoke in the basement.The worker 's torsion needle, once a maintenance tool, now acts as a rotating sphere.
secondary_translated_text: 지하실의 연기로 무력한 곤충이 병에 걸렸다. 한때 유지보수 도구였던 작업자의 비틀기 바늘이 이제 회전하는 구형으로 작용한다.

original_en_text: Humbled prisoner serving their sentence for sin committed within the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 服刑中的卑微囚犯，曾在圣堡中犯下罪过。
translated_text: This humble prisoner was serving a sentence for a crime committed in his castle.
secondary_translated_text: 이 겸손한 죄수는 자신의 성에서 저지른 범죄에 대한 형을 복역하고 있었다.

original_en_text: Ancient heart of Shellwood, connected to all its living things.
original_zh_text: 维系甲木林万物联结的远古之心。
translated_text: The spirit of Sherwood is connected with all living beings.
secondary_translated_text: 셔우드의 정신은 모든 생물과 연결되어 있습니다.

original_en_text: Guide and ofttimes leader within the Citadel’s Choir.
original_zh_text: 圣堡咏者团的向导与常任领袖。
translated_text: He was the director and executive director of the Château Choir.
secondary_translated_text: 그는 Château Choir 의 감독 겸 전무 이사였습니다.

original_en_text: Poor of sight but possessing a keen sense of smell, it uses its bulk to charge at foreign scents. Remaining fierce so far into old age is an admirable trait.
original_zh_text: 虽视力极差却嗅觉敏锐，凭借庞大身躯冲撞陌生气味源。暮年仍保有此等凶性，着实值得敬佩。
translated_text: Their eyesight is weak, but their smell is very sensitive, and they use their volume to absorb strange body odors.
secondary_translated_text: 시력은 약하지만 냄새는 매우 민감하며 체적을 사용하여 이상한 체취를 흡수합니다.

original_en_text: Crawling insect with a sizzling bile sack in its abdomen.
original_zh_text: 腹部携带沸腾胆汁囊的爬行虫。
translated_text: Caterpillar insects, cysthaphylae, suffocating stomach.
Launching of a rescue boat
secondary_translated_text: 구조선 발사 (Launching of a rescue boat)

original_en_text: If given a chance, this one will steal Silk from any significant source, including my own shell.
original_zh_text: 一旦有机会，它会从任何来源窃取灵丝——包括我的甲壳。
translated_text: If he 's lucky, this man stole the silk from a key source, including my shell.
secondary_translated_text: 만약 그가 운이 좋다면, 이 남자는 내 껍질을 포함한 중요한 출처에서 실크를 훔쳤을 것이다.

original_en_text: Mindless sack filled with Plasmium. When broken the Plasmium can be consumed for its temporary benefits to health.
original_zh_text: 装满再生液体的活体炸弹。满载生质液的无智囊虫，打破后，可使用其生质液获得暂时性的生命值。
translated_text: A human without a brain, full of plasma.When the plasma is broken down, it can be eaten as it has temporary health benefits.
secondary_translated_text: 뇌가 없는 인간으로 혈장이 가득 차 있다. 혈장이 분해되면 일시적인 건강상의 이점이 있기 때문에 먹을 수 있다.

original_en_text: More effective an opponent than would be guessed. The precarity of its winding domain can make even its simple assault a challenge.
original_zh_text: 在错综复杂的齿轮迷宫中，这些机械的每一次俯冲都如同死神挥镰。
translated_text: The enemy is much more effective than you can imagine.The instability of the wound magnetic field is very difficult even for a simple attack.
secondary_translated_text: 적은 상상할 수 있는 것보다 훨씬 더 효과적이다. 상처의 자기장의 불안정성은 간단한 공격에도 매우 어렵다.

translated_text: Shelfly (English)

original_en_text: Elder Conchfly crowned with a huge coral horn. Once partnered with a mate, they will rarely be seen alone.
original_zh_text: 头戴珊瑚巨角的古老螺类，与伴侣终生形影不离。
translated_text: An ancient shell with a huge coral horn on its head.When you work with a partner, you rarely feel alone.
secondary_translated_text: 머리에 거대한 산호 뿔이있는 고대 껍질. 파트너와 함께 일할 때 외로움을 느끼지 않습니다.

translated_text: Leo Caracor

original_en_text: Drained yet dedicated labourer, wielding a coarse steel brush.
original_zh_text: 手持劣质钢刷的劳工，尽管身体已被苦役榨干，但仍孜孜不倦。
translated_text: He was a hard worker who used a thick steel brush.
secondary_translated_text: 그는 두꺼운 강철 붓을 쓰는 근면한 노동자였다.

original_en_text: Fierce, strong and disciplined... yet these qualities do not protect them from the Haunting. Is such a fate inevitable in these lands?
original_zh_text: 勇猛强壮，且遵守纪律……连这样的战士都无法逃脱丝咒的侵蚀，难道纺络所有生物终将堕入此劫？
translated_text: Strong, strong, and disciplined, however, these qualities do not protect them from trouble.
secondary_translated_text: 강하고 강하며 규율이 있지만, 이러한 자질이 그들을 문제로부터 보호하지는 않습니다.

original_en_text: A form well suited for combat, lithe and fast. No surprise it seems to rank so high amongst its cult.
original_zh_text: 纤瘦迅捷的体态完美适配战斗，难怪能在教团中身居高位。
translated_text: Ideal for combat, lightweight forms and high speed.No wonder they occupy high positions in the cult.
secondary_translated_text: 전투에 이상적인, 가벼운 형태와 빠른 속도. 그들이 컬트에서 높은 위치를 차지하는 것은 놀랄 일이 아닙니다.

translated_text: The thunder was

original_en_text: Winged ant hunter that strikes from the air with its bone lance.
original_zh_text: 使用骨制长矛的飞蚁猎手，擅长从空中发起突刺。
translated_text: A winged fighter attacks Ali from the air with a cannon.
secondary_translated_text: 날개가 달린 전투기가 대포로 공중에서 알리를 공격한다.

translated_text: The Sand Queen.

original_en_text: In my home caves, when once this substance was allowed to flourish, I saw similar aberrations. This is wonder tainted strong with revulsion.
original_zh_text: 在我故土的洞穴中，当这种物质开始蔓延时，我也目睹过类似的畸变。这是一种掺杂着强烈厌恶的“奇迹”。
translated_text: In my cave, when the material was allowed to flourish, a similar distortion was observed.
secondary_translated_text: 내 동굴에서, 물질이 번성하도록 허용되었을 때, 비슷한 왜곡이 관찰되었습니다.

original_en_text: Furred bug beneath a heavy bell. It has grown too large to burrow, but in maturing has developed small wings.
original_zh_text: 毛茸茸的甲虫背负着沉重钟壳，胖得钻不进地洞，倒是长出了一对小翅膀。
translated_text: They are too large to enter a cave, but when they are mature, they have developed small wings.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 너무 커서 동굴에 들어가지 못하지만, 성숙하면 작은 날개를 개발합니다.

original_en_text: Aerial bug of the Citadel, unarmed but for its short horn.
original_zh_text: 圣堡的飞行虫，仅凭短角作为武器。
translated_text: Flying insects have no hands, but they have short horns.
secondary_translated_text: 날아다니는 곤충은 손은 없지만 짧은 뿔을 가지고 있다.

original_en_text: Adult Mossmir with a fully developed stinger and hardened hide.
original_zh_text: 成年苔翼虫，具备完全发育的毒刺与坚硬的外壳。
translated_text: Mature mosses have a hard skin.
secondary_translated_text: 성숙한 이끼는 단단한 피부를 가지고 있다.

original_en_text: Motherhood is an instinct that can push creatures beyond what seems their natural limits. It turns even weaker beasts like these into formidable foes.
original_zh_text: 为母则刚的本能，总能使弱小的生物展现出骇人的攻击性。
translated_text: Motherhood is an instinct that pushes the body to seemingly natural limits. It has turned a weak animal into a powerful enemy.
secondary_translated_text: 모성은 신체를 겉보기에는 자연스러운 한계까지 밀어 넣는 본능입니다.그것은 약한 동물을 강력한 적으로 바꾸었다.

original_en_text: The remains of an aged bug were housed at the pyre’s heart. The structure suggested they wished for immolation. If so, I have seen their wish granted.
original_zh_text: 一只年迈虫子的遗骸安放在火葬堆的中心。从构造上看，它们似乎希望通过自焚来进行献祭。若真如此，我想这一愿望已经实现。
translated_text: The remains of the old insect were in the middle of a pile of wood. He wanted to burn. If so, then I see that your wishes are coming true.
secondary_translated_text: 나무 더미 한가운데에 그 오래된 곤충의 잔해가 있었다.그는 불타고 싶어했다.만약 그렇다면, 당신의 소원이 이루어지고 있다는 것을 알 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Skilled ant hunter bearing blade and armour fashioned from bone.
original_zh_text: 装备骨制武器及护甲的蚁族精锐。
translated_text: An experienced ant hunter with a knife and bone armor.
secondary_translated_text: 칼과 뼈 갑옷을 가진 숙련된 개미 사냥꾼.

translated_text: Montflowers.

original_en_text: To survive while storing so much searing fluid within... Before I would have believed it impossible, but Pharloom is home to many marvels.
original_zh_text: 体内存储巨量高温液体仍能存活……原以为不可能，但纺络本就充满奇迹。
translated_text: Survive by accumulating a large amount of hot fluid in the body.Once considered impossible, the colonial home has become the birthplace of many wonders.
secondary_translated_text: 체내에 많은 양의 뜨거운 액체를 축적하여 생존하십시오. 한때 불가능하다고 생각되었던 식민지 식민지 집은 많은 경이로움의 발상지가되었습니다.

original_en_text: Choir commander of the High Halls, able to summon and command cogflies at a flick of their baton.
original_zh_text: 高庭咏者团统帅，挥动指挥棒即可召唤机枢蝇群。
translated_text: The leader of the choir in the upper hall can command by causing a ball of light.
secondary_translated_text: 위 홀에 있는 합창단의 리더는 빛의 공을 일으켜 지휘할 수 있다.

translated_text: Wings of the skull
"The Pilgrim Hopper"
Pilgrimage of the elderly
Pilgrimage of the Hulk
secondary_translated_text: 헐크의 순례 Pilgrimage of the Hulk

original_en_text: Masked coral drifter, grown larger than its more numerous companions.
original_zh_text: 古老的漂浮生物，体型远超同类。
translated_text: The coral masked drift is higher than many of its satellites.
secondary_translated_text: 산호가 마스크된 표류는 그것의 많은 위성보다 높습니다.

original_en_text: Many-legged insect fanatically obsessed with flame.
translated_text: Insects are attracted to the fire.
about pilots.
The Last Ship.
Fusion Excavator

original_en_text: Curiosity saw me answer their summons, but I shall not allow them to stall me long. I must work fast to fix my grand mistake.
original_zh_text: 好奇心驱使我响应他们的召唤，但我不会在此浪费时间——我需要尽快修正我酿成的大错。
translated_text: Interestingly, I answered their phone, but I can't let them wait for me too long. I have to work as fast as possible to correct my big mistakes.
secondary_translated_text: 흥미롭게도, 나는 그들의 전화를 받았지만, 나는 그들이 나를 너무 오래 기다리게 할 수 없습니다.나는 나의 큰 잘못을 바로잡기 위해 가능한 한 빨리 일해야 한다.

translated_text: Peristaltics
The Lantern player

original_en_text: A revolting creature. My shell itches at their presence. In the pens where their numbers grow vast, I am forever on edge.
original_zh_text: 肮脏恶心的生物。光是它们的存在就让我甲壳发痒。在蟑群泛滥的养殖场中，我会时刻保持警惕。
translated_text: He is a bad creature. Inside the fence, where his numbers increased, he was always nervous.
secondary_translated_text: 그는 나쁜 피조물이다.그의 숫자가 늘어나는 울타리 안에서는 그는 항상 긴장했다.

translated_text: Ketcha - o.

original_en_text: Dancing around this simple creature as it charges back and forth is the sort of game I delighted in as a child. Alas, I now have more pressing matters to attend to.
original_zh_text: 我小时候就爱逗这种笨虫，在它身边闪转腾挪，看它来回乱撞可有意思了。唉，但我现在有更紧迫的事情要处理。
translated_text: When this simple creature was running, dancing around it was my favorite childhood game. "
secondary_translated_text: 이 단순한 생물이 달릴 때, 그 주위를 춤추는 것은 내가 가장 좋아하는 어린 시절 게임이었습니다. "

original_en_text: Theirs seems a sad, grueling task, serving their lifetime for a Citadel unseen.
original_zh_text: 它们的工作实属可悲的苦役，为那见不到的圣堡永世效劳。
translated_text: They looked like a sad and complicated profession, serving as an invisible castle.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 슬프고 복잡한 직업처럼 보였고, 보이지 않는 성으로 봉사했습니다.

original_en_text: Airborne relative of the grounded Skull Scuttler, found only in the Marrow’s deepest, hottest caves.
original_zh_text: 头骨潜行者的飞虫近亲，髓骨洞窟深处灼热的洞穴独有。
translated_text: It is a close aerial relative of the blocked scattered scale, and is found only in deeper, warmer cavities of the bone marrow.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 막힌 산산 스케일의 가까운 공중 친척이며, 골수의 더 깊고 따뜻한 동굴에서만 발견됩니다.

original_en_text: Theirs would be a high risk life, followed by a short, searing end.
original_zh_text: 这是份高危职业，它们的结局注定短暂而炽烈。
translated_text: Their lives will be at stake, with a short, fiery ending.
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 삶은 위험에 처해 있고, 짧고 불타는 결말이 있을 것이다.

original_en_text: Placid native of Verdania. Its hide closely mimics the flora of its territory.
original_zh_text: 温顺的翠庭原生生物，其皮毛完美拟态栖息地的植被。
translated_text: Placid was born in Vidaniya.The skins imitate local plants.
secondary_translated_text: Placid 는 Vidaniya 에서 태어났습니다. 가죽은 지역 식물을 모방합니다.

original_en_text: They remorselessly eliminate any pilgrim or passerby deemed impure to their sight. The countless husks, strewn on paths beside them, tell of their conclusive decisions.
original_zh_text: 他们无情地消灭任何在他们眼中被视为不洁的朝圣者或过路者。堆积在路径旁的遗骸，无声控诉着所谓"净化"的残酷。
translated_text: They do not hesitate to exclude pilgrims and dirty passers-by. Many bullets were scattered along the nearby road, announcing his decision.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 순례자와 더러운 행인을 배제하는 것을 주저하지 않습니다.많은 총알이 인근 도로에 흩어져 그의 결정을 알렸다.

translated_text: Reducing the pipe

original_en_text: Weak, afraid, and aware of the imminent end. I understand their desperation, but my death will not prevent the coming fall.
original_zh_text: 弱小、恐惧，知道终局将至。我懂得它们的绝望，可我的死并不能阻止即将到来的灾祸。
translated_text: Their despair is understandable, but my death will not stop next autumn.
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 절망은 이해할 수 있지만 내 죽음은 내년 가을에 멈추지 않을 것입니다.

original_en_text: An inspired use of steam. I must remember its construction when designing future tools.
original_zh_text: 高温蒸汽在管腔内压缩爆鸣的声响，像极了垂死者的嘶吼。这种将杀戮伪装成清洁工程的设计，着实令人胆寒。
translated_text: It encourages the use of a pair.When designing a tool for the future, it is necessary to take into account its structure.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 쌍의 사용을 장려합니다. 미래를위한 도구를 설계 할 때, 그 구조를 고려해야합니다.

original_en_text: They know well their domain, lurking in wait in its byways and bogs, always ready to pounce.
original_zh_text: 它们深谙领地内的每处沼泽暗道，时刻准备伏击。
translated_text: They knew their territory well, and were waiting in the streets and on the swamps, preparing for an attack.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 자기들의 영토를 잘 알고 있었고, 거리와 습지에서 기다리고 있었고, 공격을 준비하고 있었다.

original_en_text: Husk of an alchemist’s assistant granted false life by Plasmium.
original_zh_text: 被生质液赋予虚假生命的炼金术士助手的躯壳。
translated_text: In the shell of the alchemist's assistant received false life from plasma.
secondary_translated_text: 연금술사의 조수 껍질에서 플라즈마에서 가짜 생명을 받았습니다.

original_en_text: The false mask alone is frightening enough to scare away smaller pests.
original_zh_text: 光凭这个惊悚的造型就能劝退不少胆小鬼。
translated_text: The mask itself can prevent small parasites.
secondary_translated_text: 마스크 자체는 작은 기생충을 막을 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: In its natural state it would avoid potential predators, but Pharloom’s Haunting now compels it to aggression. Fortunately, its jaws are ill-suited for combat.
original_zh_text: 本性畏避掠食者，然而纺络的丝咒迫使其凶性毕露。幸好它们的颚钳钝拙，不善搏杀。
translated_text: In its natural state, it avoids potential predators, but becomes more aggressive in the troubles of the Faroum.
secondary_translated_text: 자연 상태에서, 그것은 잠재적 인 포식자를 피하지만 Faroum 의 문제에서 더 공격적이됩니다.

translated_text: Dèsnargo

original_en_text: Returned to their home caves, this chef continued to devise delicacies too repulsive for any bug still sane.
original_zh_text: 回到故土的洞穴后，这位厨师依旧沉迷于研制那些令任何尚存理智的虫子都难以接受的料理。
translated_text: Returning to their original caves, the bakers continue to cook dishes that taste unpleasant enough for the insects to keep noticing them.
secondary_translated_text: 원래의 동굴로 돌아간 빵집들은 곤충들이 계속 알아차릴 만큼 불쾌한 맛을 주는 요리를 계속 요리합니다.

translated_text: The dancing clover

original_en_text: Hardened warrior lord of a bygone age, able to command the coral crust to his bidding.
original_zh_text: 能号令珊瑚甲壳的远古战主。
translated_text: Once upon a time, powerful military commanders could carry out their orders and command a coral reef.
secondary_translated_text: 옛날에, 강력한 군사 사령관들은 그들의 명령을 수행하고 산호초를 지휘 할 수있었습니다.

original_en_text: There seem no ranks in their domain, yet this one has risen above the rest. A station likely gained through intimidation and thuggery.
original_zh_text: 该领域本无等级制度，此虫却凭威胁与暴力手段上位。
translated_text: It seems that they have no rating in their field, but that rating is superior to the rest.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 그들의 분야에서 평가가 없는 것 같지만, 그 평가는 다른 사람들보다 우수하다.

original_en_text: Manic fencer who delights in battle.
translated_text: A passionate warrior who loves to fight.

original_en_text: Sightless burrower that reacts violently to the slightest sound.
original_zh_text: 失去视力却听觉敏锐的穴居虫类，最细微的声响也会引起它们激烈的反应。
translated_text: Blind cavemen react strongly to the slightest noise.
secondary_translated_text: 눈먼 동굴사람들은 가장 작은 소음에 강하게 반응한다.

original_en_text: Monarch of Pharloom, and the primal source of Silk.
original_zh_text: 纺络的君主，灵丝的源头。
translated_text: The birthplace of Pharaoh Shelka

original_en_text: These bugs have been driven out of their vault’s recesses by Pharloom’s black collapse. They are a nuisance, and I have only myself to blame.
original_zh_text: 由于纺络的崩塌，这些虫子被驱赶出书库的深处。这都是我一手造成的麻烦。
translated_text: The black rubble of the farm drove the worms out of the depths of the chest. This is a problem, and I blame myself for it.
secondary_translated_text: 농장의 검은 잔해가 가슴 깊은 곳에서 벌레를 쫓아냈다.이것은 문제이고, 나는 그것을 스스로 탓한다.

translated_text: The Gammond&Zaev was
From Mosmeyer

original_en_text: Flying bone mite that lives near magma. Roasts its prey by spitting scorching tar.
original_zh_text: 栖息在熔岩区的飞行螨虫，喷射高温焦油灼烧猎物。
translated_text: A flying bone tick that lives near the magma.They spit hot resin and burn their prey.
secondary_translated_text: 마그마 근처에 사는 날아다니는 뼈 진드기. 그들은 뜨거운 수지를 뱉고 먹이를 태워버립니다.

original_en_text: Plentiful pest with a sharp proboscis and a belly full of bile.
original_zh_text: 体内充满胆汁的群居蝠虫，死亡时剧烈爆炸。
translated_text: A large number of parasites, a sharp nose and a full stomach of bile.
secondary_translated_text: 많은 기생충, 날카로운 코와 담즙이 가득한 배.

original_en_text: Small arachnid found in many crevices and caves throughout Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 纺络的岩缝和洞穴里常见的小型蜘蛛。
translated_text: Small spiders were found in many cracks and caves in Faro.
secondary_translated_text: 작은 거미들은 파로의 많은 골짜기와 동굴에서 발견되었다.

original_en_text: Large worm mutated heavily by Plasmium. The creature has become fused to the roof of its cave, no longer able to move freely.
original_zh_text: 受生质液感染而变异的大型蠕虫。这只生物已与所处洞穴的洞顶融合，失去了自由移动的能力。
translated_text: Parasites can vary from one parasite to another.The creature melted at the top of the cave and could no longer move freely.
secondary_translated_text: 기생충은 한 기생충에서 다른 기생충에 따라 달라질 수 있습니다. 그 생물은 동굴 꼭대기에서 녹아 더 이상 자유롭게 움직일 수 없습니다.

original_en_text: Its training resembles my own, favouring fast strikes and rapid movement. Once a hunter, perhaps?
original_zh_text: 战斗风格与我的技巧相似，崇尚速攻战术。或许它们曾经也是猎手？
translated_text: It 's like my training, and I like shooting fast and moving fast.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 나의 훈련과 같다. 나는 빨리 쏘고 빨리 움직이는 것을 좋아한다.

original_en_text: What exceptional senses it possesses. It detects me with ease, even when not a single sound is made.
original_zh_text: 感知极为敏锐，哪怕分毫响动都能惊动它。
translated_text: What a wonderful feeling that would be. Even if there is no sound, you can easily spot me.
secondary_translated_text: 얼마나 멋진 느낌이 될지.소리도 없어도 나를 쉽게 발견할 수 있다.

original_en_text: Young masked worm that delights in ambushing intruders within its tunnels.
original_zh_text: 热衷隧道伏击的面甲蠕虫幼体。
translated_text: The young masked worm loves to plant villains in the tunnel.
secondary_translated_text: 젊은 가면을 쓴 벌레는 터널에 악당을 심는 것을 좋아합니다.

original_en_text: Small automaton built to work, without complaint, in the scorching heat of the Underworks’ Cauldron.
original_zh_text: 为圣堡工厂内大熔釜的酷热环境打造的小型自动机。勤勤恳恳，任劳任怨。
translated_text: A small automated machine is designed to work without complaints, even at high temperatures of the working refrigerator.
secondary_translated_text: 작은 자동 기계는 작동 냉장고의 고온에서도 불만없이 작동하도록 설계되었습니다.

original_en_text: Elder overseers of the Deep Docks, responsible for the oversight and punishment of lesser workers.
original_zh_text: 深坞地区的监工，负责监管与惩戒低级别工人。
translated_text: The chief manager of Shenzhen Central Terminal is responsible for supervising and punishing low-level workers.
secondary_translated_text: 심천 중앙 터미널의 수석 관리자는 낮은 수준의 근로자를 감독하고 처벌합니다.

original_en_text: Drifting creature with a wide coral mask and hard proboscis to stab its prey.
original_zh_text: 戴着宽大珊瑚面甲的漂流生物，使用坚硬的长喙攻击自投罗网的猎物。
translated_text: The plankton uses a large coral mask and a long hard nose to bite its prey.
secondary_translated_text: 플랑크톤은 큰 산호 마스크와 긴 단단한 코를 사용하여 먹이를 물습니다.

translated_text: Caracas is.
Gonzalez / Race

original_en_text: The feeder’s curled pin looks designed to keep ravenous roaches at bay, and the tender from turning into the meal.
original_zh_text: 那柄弯钩长针的设计堪称精妙— 既能防止饥渴的蟑螂反将饲主当作美餐，又可随时给不听话的 "宠物" 放血。
translated_text: The coated needles of the beetle seem to stop the greedy beetles and prevent them from turning into food.
secondary_translated_text: 딱정벌레의 코팅된 바늘은 탐욕스러운 딱정벌레를 막고 먹이로 변하는 것을 막는 것 같습니다.

translated_text: Plasma of Tsang

original_en_text: A creature born of a bug’s desperate hope for strength. Few possess the skill to call the void, and of those that can, none possess the means to tame it.
original_zh_text: 某只虫子在绝望中极度渴求力量，诞生出了此造物。能召唤虚空的虫子已寥寥无几，而在它们之中，更无虫子能真正驯服虚空。
translated_text: Few people have the power to cause emptiness, and none of those who have the power have the power to tame emptiness.
secondary_translated_text: 공허함을 유발할 힘을 가진 사람은 거의 없으며, 권력을 가진 사람은 공허함을 길들일 힘을 가진 사람은 아무도 없다.

original_en_text: Dark-furred bug protecting itself with a spiked coral nut.
original_zh_text: 以带刺珊瑚坚果自卫的深色绒毛甲虫。
translated_text: The black-haired insect protects itself with the fruits of a short coral.
secondary_translated_text: 검은 털의 곤충은 짧은 산호의 열매로 자신을 보호합니다.

original_en_text: Thick-plated scuttler that prefers high places.
original_zh_text: 偏好占据制高点的厚甲虫，从口中倾泻灼热酸雨。
translated_text: The Scots love to be big.
Seth, the Guardian of the Temple
secondary_translated_text: 성전의 수호자 세트 Seth, the Guardian of the Temple

original_en_text: Drained worker on the verge of collapse. Consumed by the Haunting, they continue to work far beyond their mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的濒死劳工，超越生理极限持续劳作。
translated_text: The helpless workers are on the brink of collapse.They are furious at this confusion and continue their activities beyond their limits.
secondary_translated_text: 무력한 노동자들은 붕괴 위기에 처해 있다. 그들은 이 혼란에 분노하고 그들의 한계를 넘어 활동을 계속한다.

original_en_text: Cunning bug that hunts with darts fashioned from stake and bile.
original_zh_text: 用尖桩与胆汁制作毒镖的狡诈虫子。
translated_text: The hidden insect hunts with an arrow made of claws and bile.
secondary_translated_text: 숨겨진 곤충은 발톱과 담즙으로 만든 화살을 가지고 사냥을 한다.

original_en_text: The void that will claim all things... In the barbed forms it chooses its nature can be seen clear.
original_zh_text: 吞噬万物的虚空本质，于此狰狞形态显露无遗。
translated_text: Their nature is manifested in the form of the thorns that they have chosen.
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 본성은 그들이 선택한 가시 모양으로 나타납니다.

original_en_text: Cogwork construct forged primarily for the Core’s protection. Bears a shield and poke-pin, and possesses a lethal understanding of their use.
original_zh_text: 持盾佩枪的核心守卫机械，具备战术应变能力。
translated_text: The structure of the equipment was built primarily to protect the core. He has a shield and a needle, and he understands his deadly purpose.
secondary_translated_text: 이 장비의 구조는 주로 핵을 보호하기 위해 만들어졌습니다.그는 방패와 바늘을 가지고 있으며, 그의 치명적인 목적을 이해합니다.

translated_text: Articles from the New Diary
The stolen fresco.
Nilus

original_en_text: Small bony bug that favours dark tunnels. Can expand its spiked carapace to ward against attacking predators.
original_zh_text: 喜欢待在阴暗隧道的硬壳虫，遇到危险时会突然炸开背刺。
translated_text: A small bony worm that loves tunnels. Its sharp shell can be expanded to avoid predatory attacks.
secondary_translated_text: 터널을 사랑하는 작은 뼈벌레.그것의 날카로운 껍질은 포식 공격을 피하기 위해 확장 될 수 있습니다.

translated_text: The rhinoceros horn.

original_en_text: Their sharp cleaning implement is as filthy as the rest of the place. They only layer grime on grime.
original_zh_text: 他们的清洁工具与周遭同样污秽，这样打扫只会越来越脏。
translated_text: Their sharp tools for cleaning are as dirty as any other place.They simply lay lay layers of soil on the surface of the soil.
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 날카로운 청소 도구는 다른 곳처럼 더럽습니다. 그들은 단지 토양 표면에 흙을 층층으로 눕니다.

original_en_text: High standing insect of the Choir, bearing a bow. This elite Reed has been trained and fed beyond its smaller fellows.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团中地位崇高的虫子，持弓而立。比起普通的簧片战士，这位精英成员受过更严格的训练，也享有更丰盛的供养。
translated_text: Insect was on top of a kite with a bow in hand.In addition to their little companions, this elite team will train and educate them.
secondary_translated_text: 곤충은 손에 활을 들고 연의 꼭대기에 있었다. 그들의 작은 동반자 외에도, 이 엘리트 팀은 그들을 훈련하고 교육 할 것입니다.

original_en_text: It lies low to the ground, perhaps out of reverence for its task, but can spring up suddenly to attack. Its shear makes for a deadly weapon with surprising reach.
original_zh_text: 那柄形似剪枝钳的武器，既能精准剥离甲壳中的灵丝脉络，也能在瞬间绞碎试图逃逸的灵魂残片。
translated_text: He probably lies on the ground out of respect for his mission, but can suddenly appear and attack.His tissues are a deadly weapon with amazing range.
secondary_translated_text: 그는 아마도 자신의 임무에 대한 존중으로 땅에 누워 있지만 갑자기 나타나 공격 할 수 있습니다. 그의 조직은 놀라운 범위의 치명적인 무기입니다.

original_en_text: Small automaton with a shielded shell, intended to carry loads of dangerous flintflame.
original_zh_text: 配备防护甲壳的小型自动机，负责运输危险的燧焰。
translated_text: A small automatic device with a protective housing for transporting dangerous flames.
secondary_translated_text: 위험한 화염을 운반하기 위해 보호 하우징이 장착된 작은 자동 장치.

original_en_text: They too seek the spectre at the Haunting’s heart, though I fear that foe would pose a challenge beyond their mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 他们同样在寻找那丝咒之源的幽魂——只是我担心，我们共同的敌人是超越凡虫极限的存在，恐怕不是他们所能应对的。
translated_text: They are still searching for ghosts in the heart of the ghost, but they fear that this enemy will bring a challenge beyond their borders.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 여전히 유령의 마음 속에 있는 유령을 찾고 있지만, 이 적들이 그들의 국경을 넘어 도전을 가져올 것을 두려워한다.

original_en_text: Defeat {0} more to complete the hunter’s notes.
original_zh_text: 再击败{0}只以解锁猎手的笔记。
translated_text: He was defeated.{0}Additional content that supplements the hunter's notes.
secondary_translated_text: 그는 패배했다.{0}사냥꾼의 메모를 보완하는 추가 콘텐츠.

translated_text: Mrs. Memories.

original_en_text: Nesting creature that fuses its face with sharpened coral.
original_zh_text: 将面部与珊瑚融为一体的巢居生物。
translated_text: The nested creature mixes faces with sharp corals.
secondary_translated_text: 둥지를 짓는 생물은 얼굴과 날카로운 산호를 섞는다.

original_en_text: The moss looks to grow even inside their stomach, which the pilgrim spits at foes in compressed gobs. A foul form of offence.
original_zh_text: 苔藓甚至在其胃囊内滋长，被压缩成团的腐殖质带着刺鼻腥气——这恐怕是纺络最肮脏的远程武器。
translated_text: Moss seemed to grow in the stomach, and pilgrims spat on their enemies to create a compressed mucus.
secondary_translated_text: 이끼가 위에서 자라는 것 같았고, 순례자들은 압축 된 점액을 만들기 위해 적에게 침을 뱉었습니다.

original_en_text: Rare automaton intended to perform the ringing of bells and cymbals in the depths of the Core.
original_zh_text: 专为敲击钟钹设计的稀有自动机。
translated_text: An unusual machine that rings bells and cymbals deep within the core.

original_en_text: Disciple of the Choir, elevated above other pilgrims, and forced to cowl their face forever more.
original_zh_text: 蒙面的高阶信徒，地位远超普通朝圣者。
translated_text: The horned clown has always humbled himself more than any other pilgrim.
secondary_translated_text: 뿔이 달린 광대는 다른 순례자들보다 항상 자신을 더 겸손하게 했다.

original_en_text: Pharloom’s structures seem almost built for them. The endless corners and cracks, so perfect for mites to burrow and nest.
original_zh_text: 纺络的建筑结构仿佛为其量身打造，这里有无尽的角落和缝隙供螨虫打洞筑巢。
translated_text: It seems that Faro 's buildings were built primarily for them. The infinite corners and cracks are perfect for tick nests.
secondary_translated_text: 파로의 건물들은 주로 그들을 위해 지어졌던 것 같습니다.끝없는 모서리와 균열은 진드기 둥지에 완벽합니다.

original_en_text: Flighted creature formed from coldshard. If shattered it will quickly reform.
original_zh_text: 由冰晶碎片构成的飞行生物，破碎后可以迅速重组。
translated_text: The flying creatures are made of cold rubbish.If it is destroyed, it is immediately reformed.
secondary_translated_text: 비행생물은 차가운 쓰레기로 만들어져 파괴되면 바로 개조된다.

original_en_text: In every land, creatures find new and surprising ways to disguise themselves. One must be wary always.
original_zh_text: 不论在哪一片土地上，万物皆有巧妙的伪装法门，行走此间当时刻保持警觉。
translated_text: In every country creatures will find new and amazing ways of camouflage.A man should always be on the lookout.
secondary_translated_text: 모든 나라에서 생물은 위장 새롭고 놀라운 방법을 찾을 것입니다. 남자는 항상 경계해야합니다.

original_en_text: Aggressive winged bug of the lowlands. When angered, it rapidly whips its bladed tail as a weapon.
original_zh_text: 低地区域的暴躁飞虫，一生气就把带刃的尾巴甩成风车。
translated_text: Aggressiveness of insects in low-lying areas When they get angry, they quickly use their blades and tails as weapons.
secondary_translated_text: 낮은 지대에서의 곤충의 공격성 화를 낼 때, 그들은 빨리 칼날과 꼬리를 무기로 사용합니다.

original_en_text: Young ant hunter wielding sickles carved from teeth. Will often call for aid if danger comes close.
original_zh_text: 使用兽牙镰刀的年轻蚁族猎手，遇险时会呼叫支援。
translated_text: A young ant hunter tricked with a toothpick.They often turn to help when danger approaches.
secondary_translated_text: 젊은 개미 사냥꾼이 이쑤시개로 속였다. 그들은 위험이 다가오면 종종 도움을 청했다.

original_en_text: Overgrown elder, able to spawn burning bubbles from within its coral-cased shell.
original_zh_text: 与珊瑚融合的长老巨虫，能从甲壳内喷发炽热气泡。
translated_text: When they are invaded, blackberries create a burning bubble inside the coral shell.
secondary_translated_text: 그들이 침략되면, 블랙베리는 산호 껍질 내부에서 불타는 거품을 만듭니다.

translated_text: The minister announced

original_en_text: Imposing old insect nesting in the heights of Shellwood. Her command of twig and branch ensured no pilgrim ever survived within her territory.
original_zh_text: 盘踞甲木林高处的碎裂者女王，掌控树丛枝干屠尽领地内所有朝圣者。
translated_text: An ancient insect nest in the heights of Sherwood The control of his detachment ensured that there were no pilgrims on his territory.
secondary_translated_text: 셔우드의 고원에 있는 고대 곤충 둥지 그의 부대의 통제는 그의 영토에 순례자가 없다는 것을 보장했습니다.

original_en_text: This bug’s fusion with the crust-growth... It seems intentional, though I imagine the union is far from comfortable.
original_zh_text: 这种融合看似自主选择，但其过程必定充满痛苦。
translated_text: The merging of worms and the growth of the bark. It seems that this is intentional, but I do not think that the union is happy.
secondary_translated_text: 벌레의 합병과 껍질의 성장.이것은 의도적 인 것 같지만, 나는 노조가 행복하다고 생각하지 않는다.

original_en_text: Born and built only to work until time stiffens its limbs. Perhaps it is mercy this construct knows nothing of the freedom it lacks.
original_zh_text: 生来只是为了劳作，直到岁月令它四肢僵硬。也许它对自己所缺失的自由一无所知，这反倒是一种仁慈。
translated_text: They are born and made to work until time harden their hands and feet. Perhaps the structure does not know that the freedoms it does not possess are merciful.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 태어나서 시간이 그들의 손과 발을 단단하게 할 때까지 일하도록 만들어집니다.아마도 그 구조는 자신이 소유하지 않는 자유가 자비롭다는 것을 알지 못할 것이다.

translated_text: The mosso
Sra. Crawl!

original_en_text: Warrior cartographer of a tribe from Pharloom’s edge. Her skills in battle could challenge the kingdom’s best.
original_zh_text: 纺络边陲部落的勇士制图师，其战力在纺络可谓数一数二。
translated_text: He was a cartographer warrior from a frontier farming tribe, and his fighting skills were enough to challenge the top of the kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: 그는 국경 농장 부족에서 온 지도 제작자 전사였으며, 그의 전투 기술은 왕국의 꼭대기에 도전하기에 충분했습니다.

translated_text: CogWork Crawler (in Spanish)

original_en_text: Once one of Pharloom’s favoured bugs, and yet their domain and their shells would have been the first to fall to the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 曾经纺络的荣光加身者，却成为首批丝咒受害者。
translated_text: Once again, the beloved insect Farer, his fields and shells fell first into the hands of the ghosts.
secondary_translated_text: 다시 한번, 사랑하는 곤충 Farer, 그의 밭과 껍질은 유령의 손에 먼저 떨어졌습니다.

original_en_text: Hidden amongst their tower’s matching crust, these smaller bugs would have survived and thrived.
original_zh_text: 这些小虫子依靠伪装得以繁衍生息。
translated_text: These small insects can hide, survive, and reproduce in the corresponding tower bark.
secondary_translated_text: 이 작은 곤충들은 해당 타워의 껍질에 숨어 있고, 생존하며, 번식할 수 있다.

original_en_text: This one lived long and fed much. The wood will be much safer for their slaying.
original_zh_text: 她存活久远且吞噬无数，诛杀她将使丛林安全倍增。
translated_text: A man lives a lot and eats a lot. It was safer to kill in the forest.
secondary_translated_text: 사람은 많이 살고 많이 먹습니다.숲에서 죽이는 것이 더 안전했습니다.

translated_text: They screamed.

original_en_text: They once teemed around their tower, in numbers immense. It is a rare chance to witness such a bountiful display of life.
original_zh_text: 其数量曾经可谓铺天盖地。目睹此等生命奇观的机会已越发稀少。
translated_text: They were gathered around the tower. It is a precious opportunity to leave a rich life.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 탑 주위에 모였다.풍성한 삶을 떠날 수 있는 소중한 기회다.

translated_text: Cocktails in Caracas.

original_en_text: Burrower that nests in the Bellvein and seeks out hard bells to protects its soft body.
original_zh_text: 在钟脉内部打洞栖息的毛球状虫类，专门找硬钟壳当作盔甲。
translated_text: Neanderthals built nests in dolphins, looking for hard bells to protect their soft bodies.
secondary_translated_text: 네안데르탈인들은 그들의 부드러운 몸을 보호하기 위해 단단한 종을 찾아 돌고래에 둥지를 만들었다.

original_en_text: It is easy to be caught off-guard by the ricocheting trajectory of its flung mask, especially in tight corners.
original_zh_text: 投掷面甲的反弹轨迹难以预判。在狭窄空间尤其需要提防其袭击。
translated_text: Especially in a close-up, people easily miss the trajectory of the mask he played.
secondary_translated_text: 특히 클로즈업에서는 그가 연기한 마스크의 궤적을 쉽게 놓칠 수 있다.

original_en_text: Time allowed their shell to grow thick, all the better for battering their targets.
original_zh_text: 岁月让它们的甲壳变得厚重，能更轻易地猛击目标。
translated_text: Time thickens their shells and attacks the best targets.
secondary_translated_text: 시간이 그들의 껍질을 두껍게하고 최고의 목표물을 공격합니다.

translated_text: The Autonomous Cock
Dr. Catch.

original_en_text: Arachnid that nestles within dark holes in cavern roofs. Pounces on prey from far above.
original_zh_text: 隐藏在洞顶暗处的蜘蛛，擅长从高处一跃而下，偷袭猎物。
translated_text: The spider lives in a black hole at the top of the cave. He jumped over the prey in the distance.
secondary_translated_text: 거미는 동굴 꼭대기에 있는 블랙홀에 살고 있다.그는 멀리 있는 먹이를 뛰어넘었다.

translated_text: the Kindle

original_en_text: A monster in the classic form of tales from youth. Its slaying was done as much by my fierce travelling companion as by myself.
original_zh_text: 童谣所述的经典魔物形态。此次诛杀多靠了我那勇猛的旅伴。
translated_text: A typical monster of youth, he was killed by me and my horrible companion. "
secondary_translated_text: 전형적인 젊은이의 괴물, 그는 나와 나의 끔찍한 동반자에 의해 살해되었다. "

translated_text: My mother is Matt.

original_en_text: Passively waits for prey to blunder into its path. A technique that should not necessarily be derided. Whatever is effective is best.
original_zh_text: 静静等待猎物误入其攻击范围。看似消极的捕猎方式，往往能收获意外成效。
translated_text: Passively wait when mining accidentally gets in his way. Technologies should not be mocked. Those that are most efficient are the best.
secondary_translated_text: 수동적으로 광산이 우연히 그의 길에 들어 올 때 기다리십시오.기술은 비웃어서는 안 된다.가장 효율적인 사람들은 최고다.

original_en_text: My unique shell can resist the darker deformations of this substance, but even I have limits...
original_zh_text: 我的甲壳虽能抵抗此物质带来的畸变，但承受力终有极限。
translated_text: My particular outer layer is able to withstand the dark deformation of this material, but I also have limits.
secondary_translated_text: 내 특정 외부 층은이 재료의 어두운 변형에 저항 할 수 있지만, 나는 또한 한계가 있습니다.

original_en_text: Screeching scavenger dyed black in mourning at their land’s collapse.
original_zh_text: 大地倾覆之际，绝望哀叫的黑色食腐虫。
translated_text: The screaming mourners were painted black when the ground collapsed.
secondary_translated_text: 비명을 지르는 애도자들은 바닥이 무너졌을 때 검은 색으로 칠되었다.

translated_text: Model of Air Wing

original_en_text: Amazingly, the creature carries the void’s black liquid in its stomach, violently spraying it forth if threatened.
original_zh_text: 神奇的是，它竟能将虚空黑液储于胃中，受威胁时剧烈喷吐攻击。
translated_text: Surprisingly, the stomach of this creature is filled with a black liquid that spits fiercely when threatened.
secondary_translated_text: 놀랍게도, 이 생물의 위에는 검은 액체로 가득 차 있으며 위협을 받을 때 격렬하게 침을 뱉습니다.

original_en_text: A critical member of the larger flock. Without them present the Kai would be fast driven to extinction by larger predators.
original_zh_text: 它们是族群存续的关键——当凯旋转尖角筑起防御阵时，连髓骨洞窟的暴君都要暂避锋芒。
translated_text: Without them, Kai would be quickly exterminated by bigger predators.
secondary_translated_text: 그들이 없었다면 카이는 더 큰 포식자에 의해 빠르게 멸종 될 것입니다.

original_en_text: Strong bug replete with rosaries. If angered they will whip their strings in a ceaseless onslaught.
