original_zh_text: 缠满念珠的强壮虫子，发怒时会挥舞珠串猛攻。
translated_text: Powerful worm, full of Rosary.If you are irritated, continue the operation.
secondary_translated_text: 강력한 벌레, 로저리가 가득합니다. 만약 당신이 짜증이 났다면, 작업을 계속하십시오.

original_en_text: To subsist on the sickly water in this fetid environment it spits out the most toxic elements. Over generations, this former survival technique has turned into an effective hunting tool.
original_zh_text: 过滤毒液的生存机制经代际演化，成为高效的狩猎手段。
translated_text: To survive in the sewage in this bad environment, peel out the most toxic elements.After many generations of efforts, this survival technique has become an effective hunting tool.
secondary_translated_text: 이 열악한 환경에서 하수에서 살아남기 위해 가장 독성 요소를 제거하십시오. 여러 세대의 노력 끝에, 이 생존 기술은 효과적인 사냥 도구가되었습니다.

translated_text: Lack of grass?
Seeds of giant pomegranate
Horn leaflets

original_en_text: Far more hostile than their younger companions but seemingly less likely to roam far from their nest.
original_zh_text: 看似凶暴，实为恋巢的保守派。
translated_text: They are more hostile than their younger companions, but are less likely to leave the nest.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 젊은 동반자보다 더 적대적이지만 둥지를 떠날 가능성이 적습니다.

translated_text: The Horn of the Choir.
secondary_translated_text: 합창단의 뿔 The Horn of the Choir

original_en_text: Depressed thespian, consumed by the melancholy of a collapsing world.
original_zh_text: 被世界的崩解压垮的消沉演员。
translated_text: The depressed actor was shrouded in the darkness of the collapse of the world.
secondary_translated_text: 우울한 배우는 세상의 붕괴의 어둠 속에 뒤덮여 있었다.

original_en_text: Once exulted chef, exiled from the Citadel for repeated culinary crimes.
original_zh_text: 曾经备受赞誉的大厨，却因屡次触犯烹饪禁忌而被逐出圣堡。
translated_text: The gay chef was banished from the castle for a series of culinary crimes.
secondary_translated_text: 그 게이 요리사는 일련의 요리 범죄로 성에서 추방되었다.

original_en_text: Feeble servant of the Underworks with a long twistpin and hard shell.
original_zh_text: 手持长柄旋针的虚弱硬甲劳工。
translated_text: A weak servant Underwork, dressed in lace and hard cover.
secondary_translated_text: 레이스 옷과 단단한 덮개를 입고 약한 하인 Underwork.

original_en_text: Starved servant of the Slab, bearing a hooked longpin.
original_zh_text: 饥肠辘辘的罪石牢狱仆从，手持钩形长针。
translated_text: The hungry stone servant had a long needle for knitting in his hand.
secondary_translated_text: 배고픈 돌 하인은 손에 긴 바늘을 가지고 있었다.

translated_text: Leaves of the Lania
secondary_translated_text: 라니아의 잎 Leaves of the Lania

original_en_text: Spherical, winged automaton housing many sharp spikes.
original_zh_text: 装载尖刺的球型飞行自动机，防御功能存疑。
translated_text: A machine gun with spherical wings, with a lot of sharp thorns inside.
secondary_translated_text: 날개가 구형이고 내부에는 날카로운 가시가 많이 들어 있는 기관총.

original_en_text: Their plump, round shape makes them well-suited for target practice. Difficult to resist testing my aim on them...
original_zh_text: 圆滚滚的身材十分适合用作靶子，不拿来练手都可惜……
translated_text: The thick and rounded shape is perfect for shooting practice. "It is hard to resist the test of my goals.
secondary_translated_text: 두껍고 둥근 모양으로 촬영 연습에 완벽합니다. "내 목표에 대한 시험에 저항하기는 어렵다.

original_en_text: Elder Drapefly grown big from age and consumption. Its heavy body allows it to hit much harder than its younger companions.
original_zh_text: 年迈体硕的帷虫，沉重的身躯赋予其强劲的冲击力。
translated_text: The old belly grows with age and consumption.His heavy body can hit harder than his younger companion.
secondary_translated_text: 늙은 배는 나이와 소비에 따라 커지고, 무거운 몸은 젊은 친구보다 더 강하게 타격할 수 있다.

translated_text: vidaniel.

original_en_text: Final arbiter of the Blasted Steps, tasked to ensure only the sinless ever step beyond the Grand Gate.
original_zh_text: 蚀阶的最终裁决者，确保唯有无罪者能跨越巨扉圣门。
translated_text: The ultimate intermediary of the explosive phase is tasked with making sure that only innocent people can pass through the door.
secondary_translated_text: 폭발적인 단계의 궁극적 인 중개인은 무고한 사람들만이 문을 통과 할 수 있도록하는 임무를 맡깁니다.

original_en_text: This one chose to embrace the doom to come. I shall not share such easy surrender.
original_zh_text: 他选择臣服于灾难的降临，我绝不会效仿这种懦弱行径。
translated_text: He decided to accept the fate that was to come. I do not give up so easily.
secondary_translated_text: 그는 앞으로 닥칠 운명을 받아들이기로 결심했다.난 그렇게 쉽게 포기하지 않아.

translated_text: People who eat watches

original_en_text: Gentle glider of Mount Fay. Its downy wings and cowl allow it to resist even the most cutting cold.
original_zh_text: 费耶山的温顺滑翔者，其绒翼可抵御极寒。
translated_text: Soft glider on Mount Fei. Their soft wings and belts can withstand the coldest cold.
secondary_translated_text: 비산에서 소프트글라이더.그들의 부드러운 날개와 벨트는 가장 추운 추위를 견딜 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Heavy, hard-shelled charger relying on weight and strength.
translated_text: Heavy rigid loaders, which depend on weight and strength.
secondary_translated_text: 무게와 강도에 따라 무거운 강성 로더.

original_en_text: This one’s husk held a masterful talent, to weave Silk into blazing runes. Throughout my life, I have seen runes woven for many tasks. Was she the first to hone such skills?
original_zh_text: 其躯壳曾掌握将灵丝编织为燃烧符文的绝技。纵观我毕生所见的各类符文，她或是这项技艺的开山鼻祖？
translated_text: In the shell of this man was the talent to weave silk in chains of fire.In my life I have seen runes weave for many tasks.Are you the first person who learned this skill?
secondary_translated_text: 이 사람의 껍질에는 불사슬로 실크를 짜는 재능이 있었다. 내 인생에서 많은 일을 위해 룬이 짜는 것을 본 적이 있다. 이 기술을 배운 사람이 처음입니까?

translated_text: What is a Phantom?

original_en_text: This one disturbs me... There is something in its simplicity. Do I almost feel fear?
original_zh_text: 这东西令我感到不安……其纯粹性中蕴含某种诡异的特质。我竟然感到一丝恐惧？
translated_text: It worries me. There is something in this simplicity. I am almost afraid?
secondary_translated_text: 걱정이 되네요. 이런 단순함에는 뭔가 있어요.내가 거의 무서워?

translated_text: Applause from the chorus
I am disappointed with the jury.

original_en_text: Myth made real in memory. The creature seemed completely at one with the flora around it. Did it ever truly exist as I have seen it?
original_zh_text: 传说中的生物在忆境中成为了现实，与周遭植物浑然一体。我所见到的一切，真的曾经存在过吗？
translated_text: Myth is truth in memory.This organism seems to be fully integrated with the surrounding plants.Do they exist as you see?
secondary_translated_text: 신화는 기억 속에 진실이다. 이 유기체는 주변 식물과 완전히 통합되어 있는 것 같다. 당신이 보는 것처럼 그들은 존재하는가?

original_en_text: Simple. Graceful. Another fine bug lost forever from these lands.
original_zh_text: 简约而优雅。又一个永远从这片土地消失的美丽物种。
translated_text: Another remarkable insect has disappeared forever from this earth.
secondary_translated_text: 또 다른 놀라운 곤충이 이 땅에서 영원히 사라졌다.

translated_text: Skeletal Tyrant

original_en_text: His desire to see Pharloom saved may have been well intentioned, but he seemed quite happy for others to die upon the stage in pursuit of his goal.
original_zh_text: 他拯救纺络的愿望或许出于善意，但为实现目标似乎乐于目睹他人在舞台上殒命。
translated_text: He may have wished the farm to be saved in good faith, but he was glad that other people died on the spot to further his cause.
secondary_translated_text: 그는 농장을 살리기를 선의로 바랐을지도 모르지만, 그의 대의를 진전시키기 위해 다른 사람들이 현장에서 죽게 된 것을 기뻐했습니다.

translated_text: gavid

original_en_text: Brave worker carrying unstable flintflame and wearing a heavy bell to protect against potential ignition.
original_zh_text: 运输燧焰的工虫。燧焰性质不稳定，所以它们需要佩戴重型防爆钟罩。
translated_text: Courageous workers carry unstable flammable materials and wear heavy bells to avoid potential ignition.
secondary_translated_text: 용기 있는 노동자들은 불안정한 가연성 물질을 운반하고 잠재적인 화상을 피하기 위해 무거운 종을 착용합니다.

original_en_text: Its bright gems could be used to make beautiful, but short-lived jewellery. An amusing idea for a gift... or a trap.
original_zh_text: 每次甲壳碰撞都会迸发火星，这使得它们的巢穴成了行走的火药库。
translated_text: Its shiny gemstones can be used to create beautiful but short-lived jewelry.
secondary_translated_text: 광택있는 보석은 아름답지만 짧은 수명을 가진 보석을 만드는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Small burrowing ant, servant to the larger Skarr.
original_zh_text: 为大型斯卡尔蚁服务的小个子掘地工。
translated_text: A small cave ant and a big skeletal servant.

original_en_text: Heavy, hairy jailer responsible for capturing sinners and punishing prisoners.
original_zh_text: 厚重的多毛蝇虫，负责抓捕罪犯和惩戒囚犯。
translated_text: A heavy and soft guard who catches criminals and punishes prisoners.
secondary_translated_text: 범죄자를 붙잡고 죄수를 처벌하는 무겁고 부드러운 경비원.

original_en_text: Small fluttering creature capable of defending itself with its small stinger.
original_zh_text: 小型飞虫，使用自身毒刺进行攻击。
translated_text: This tiny flying creature can protect itself with a tiny needle.
secondary_translated_text: 이 작은 비행 생물은 작은 바늘으로 자신을 보호 할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Agile bug of Pharloom, its higher functions have been lost to the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒夺去神智的敏捷朝圣者，仅存扑跃攻击的本能。
translated_text: Lacking the lighthouse 's flexibility, its advanced functions were confused and lost.
secondary_translated_text: 등대의 유연성이 부족하여 고급 기능이 혼란스럽고 손실되었습니다.

translated_text: Pigment washing from Cogwork

original_en_text: Old warrior guarding the border of their domain, stiffened by time and awoken by song.
original_zh_text: 守卫疆界的沧桑老将，因古老歌谣而苏醒。
translated_text: Veterans guarding the border, temperate weather, woke up singing.
secondary_translated_text: 국경을 지키는 참전 용사들은 온화한 날씨에 노래를 부르며 깨어났다.

original_en_text: More dangerous in the moment of its explosive and corrosive death than it ever was in life.
original_zh_text: 其死亡瞬间的腐蚀性爆炸远比生前更具威胁。
translated_text: The moment of explosive and corrosive death is more dangerous than any other moment in life.
secondary_translated_text: 폭발적이고 부식적인 죽음의 순간은 인생의 다른 어떤 순간보다 더 위험합니다.

original_en_text: The core member of a powerful order, trained fearless and faithful. Theirs was a kingdom of warriors, one built upon their blades.
original_zh_text: 作为精锐战团的骨干成员，经受了严酷的训练，无畏且忠诚。它们建立的刀锋王朝，正是尚武精神的巅峰体现。
translated_text: The leading members of the mighty cult are well trained, brave and faithful. Their kingdom is a kingdom of warriors built on their bones, and they are the most powerful.
secondary_translated_text: 강력한 컬트의 선도적 인 구성원들은 잘 훈련되고 용감하며 충실합니다.그들의 왕국은 그들의 뼈에 세워진 전사의 왕국이며, 그들은 가장 강력합니다.

translated_text: Director of Finance.
The Great Lead

original_en_text: If the woody hide is shattered, the bug will still bravely, foolishly try to attack.
original_zh_text: 它们至死都坚信那截空心木茎是神赐的圣枪——可悲的勇气，或是可敬的愚忠？
translated_text: Even if the cow cracks the tree, the worm will try to attack it boldly and foolishly.
secondary_translated_text: 소가 나무를 찢어 버리더라도 벌레는 대담하고 어리석은 방법으로 그것을 공격하려고합니다.

original_en_text: Young acolyte raised in the darkest vaults, destined to ascend to the rank of Scrollreader.
original_zh_text: 低语书库培育的诵经者接班人。
translated_text: Growing up in the darkest treasures, the young disciples are destined to be promoted to the rank of scroll readers.
secondary_translated_text: 가장 어두운 보물 속에서 자란 젊은 제자들은 두루마리 독자의 계급으로 승진될 운명입니다.

translated_text: nufarmo

original_en_text: Learned disciple of the Choir charged to maintain the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 受命维护圣堡忆廊的博学咏者团信徒。
translated_text: The wise pupil of the choir was responsible for the preservation of the castle monument.
secondary_translated_text: 합창단의 현명한 학생은 성의 기념물을 보존하는 일을 담당했다.

original_en_text: Heart of the Haunting, long lulled to slumber and desperate to wake. The higher being’s threads stretched throughout Pharloom, snaring its bugs and driving them to madness and discord.
original_zh_text: 丝咒的核心，长久沉眠却渴求苏醒。她的丝线遍布纺络，诱使这片土地上的虫子陷入疯狂。
translated_text: The heart is a ghost, a long sleep, a desire to wake up.The children of the higher life entered the rain, detained the insects and led them into madness and quarrels.
secondary_translated_text: 마음은 유령, 긴 잠, 깨어나고 싶은 욕망입니다. 더 높은 삶의 아이들은 비에 들어가 곤충을 억류하고 그들을 광기와 싸움으로 이끌었습니다.

original_en_text: Vigorous old knight and their noble companion, working together to see their lands cut free from haunted madness.
original_zh_text: 精力充沛的老骑士与他忠诚的同伴。他们并肩作战，誓要将自己的家园从丝咒的疯狂中解救出来。
translated_text: An energetic old knight and his noble comrades work together to free the earth from a ghostly madness.
secondary_translated_text: 활기찬 늙은 기사와 그의 고귀한 동료들은 유령의 광기로부터 지구를 해방시키기 위해 함께 일합니다.

original_en_text: Winged insect that feeds upon moss and lichen in the caves above Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 栖息于骸底镇上方洞窟的飞虫，以苔藓地衣为食。
translated_text: A winged insect that feeds on moss and licks in caves above the base of bones.
secondary_translated_text: 이끼를 먹고 뼈 밑 위의 동굴을 씹는 날개가 있는 곤충.

original_zh_text: 监工兄弟 西格尼斯&格隆
translated_text: Brothers of the Sign.&The Importance of Gron
The Carmelite Singer

original_en_text: Mournful creature tasked alone to expel the Citadel’s choking refuse. Their talent with a longpin is unmatched.
original_zh_text: 独自清理圣堡秽物的哀伤生物，长针技艺登峰造极。
translated_text: A brave creature takes on the task of driving the impressive trash out of the castle alone.His talent for a long fighter has no equal.
secondary_translated_text: 용감한 생물은 인상적인 쓰레기를 혼자서 성 밖으로 몰아내는 임무를 맡습니다. 긴 전투기로서의 그의 재능은 비교할 수 없습니다.

original_en_text: They ceaselessly churn through rock and bone without ever seeming to rest. Do they have a destination? Or are they compelled to dig forever deeper?
original_zh_text: 它们似乎永远不知疲倦地向下挖掘。究竟是有目的地前进，还是被迫永无止境地穿行？
translated_text: They were constantly moving between stones and bones, and it seemed that they never rested. Will we always be hiding?
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 끊임없이 돌과 뼈 사이에서 움직이고 있었고, 결코 쉬지 않는 것처럼 보였다.우리는 항상 숨어있을 것인가?

original_en_text: Obese offshoot of Muckroaches, born of the Citadel’s exhaust smog. The winged roach’s sagging stomach is filled with sizzling bile.
original_zh_text: 圣堡废气催生的肥胖蟑螂变种，鼓胀的腹部储存着沸腾胆汁。
translated_text: Thick branches of beetles were born from the exhaust gases of the castle.The weakened stomach of the beetle was filled with hyssop and bile.
secondary_translated_text: 두꺼운 나뭇가지가 성의 배기가스에서 나게 된 딱정벌레는 쇠약해진 뱃속에 히소프와 담즙으로 가득 차 있었다.

translated_text: Malomês

original_en_text: Ancient Weaver condemned for a transgression lost to time.
original_zh_text: 远古时期因某项重罪被囚禁的古老织者。
translated_text: Ancient weavers were accused of sins lost in time.
secondary_translated_text: 고대의 직공들은 시간 속에서 잃어버린 죄로 비난받았다.

original_en_text: A fine shot with its sharp mask. Its aggression has no ill effect on its aim.
original_zh_text: 面甲投掷精准异常，暴戾的性情并未损耗其分毫准度。
translated_text: Beautiful pictures, beautiful masks. Their aggressiveness does not affect their goals.
secondary_translated_text: 아름다운 사진, 아름다운 마스크.그들의 공격성은 그들의 목표에 영향을 주지 않는다.

translated_text: Pressure on the day

original_en_text: Seeming soft, but hiding a sharp surprise. Any larger predator attempting a bite would learn a pointed and painful lesson.
original_zh_text: 看似柔软实则暗藏杀机，掠食者的撕咬只会换来锥心之痛。
translated_text: This may seem soothing, but it hides a sharp surprise.The large predators that are trying to bite have learned a hard and painful lesson.
secondary_translated_text: 이 물리는 것이 진정해 보일지 모르지만, 그것은 예리한 놀라움을 숨기고 있습니다. 물으려고하는 큰 포식자들은 어렵고 고통스러운 교훈을 배웠습니다.

original_en_text: Not a bug but a projection of another’s will cast in smog and Silk.
original_zh_text: 烟雾与灵丝交织的意志投影，并非实体生物。
translated_text: Not an insect, but another man will be thrown into the smoke and silk.
secondary_translated_text: 곤충이 아니라 다른 사람이 연기와 실크 속에 던져질 것이다.

translated_text: in swampsquit

original_en_text: Broken construct built by Weavers past, able to fire a focused beam of silklight to carve halls and chambers through ice and bone.
original_zh_text: 破损的古织者装置，能聚集并发射灵丝光束凿穿冰体和骸骨，通常用来开凿厅室。
translated_text: The Weaver buildings, when destroyed, could radiate the concentrated atmosphere of Marseille through halls and chambers carved out of ice and bones.
secondary_translated_text: Weaver 건물은 파괴되면 얼음과 뼈로 조각 된 홀과 챔버를 통해 마르세유의 집중 된 분위기를 방사 할 수있었습니다.

translated_text: The Deep Diving (The Deep Diving)

original_en_text: Short-lived sprite born of flickering flame.
original_zh_text: 闪烁火焰孕育出的精灵，其生命往往转瞬即逝。
translated_text: An ephemeral soul, born of a bright flame.

original_en_text: Slow drifting bug with a heavy top shell. The bug reacts little to threats, even those that could claim its life.
original_zh_text: 顶覆厚重甲壳的漂浮虫，行动迟缓，对致命威胁也都反应微弱。
translated_text: The upper shell of the floating insect is heavy.This vulnerability reacts very little to threats, even those that cost them their lives.
secondary_translated_text: 떠다니는 곤충의 껍질은 무겁다. 이 취약성은 위협에 거의 반응하지 않으며, 심지어 목숨을 앗아가는 위협에도 반응하지 않습니다.

original_en_text: Bell-clad bug responsible for mining the deeper, treacherous depths below their docks.
original_zh_text: 负责开采深坞下方危险矿区的虫子，身覆钟甲。
translated_text: The clock-clappers are responsible for mining at deeper and more dangerous depths under the pier.
secondary_translated_text: 시계를 깎는 사람들은 부두 아래의 더 깊고 더 위험한 깊은 곳에서 채굴을 담당합니다.

original_en_text: Toothy growth that lives on cave roofs. Wraps wayward bugs with its long tongue and drags them up to be consumed.
original_zh_text: 栖身洞顶的齿舌生物，用拟态长舌诱捕猎物。
translated_text: On the roof of the cave is located a tooth plant. Its long tongue wrapped the evil insect and made it eat it.
secondary_translated_text: 동굴의 지붕에는 이빨 식물이 있습니다.그 긴 혀는 악의 곤충을 감싸 먹게 했다.

original_en_text: Fine winged flyer that survives in flocks.
translated_text: A team of Irish pilots

original_en_text: Long dormant centipede, awoken and enraged by Pharloom’s crumbling collapse.
original_zh_text: 长期蛰伏的远古蜈蚣，因纺络的崩塌而苏醒、暴怒。
translated_text: After a long sleep, Mukad wakes up in a rage because of the collapse of Pharaoh.
secondary_translated_text: 긴 잠에서 무카드는 파라오가 쓰러진 것에 대해 분노로 깨어납니다.

translated_text: Sagra

original_en_text: Erratic, flying pest that nests in rags and curtains.
original_zh_text: 寄居在破布和帷幔中的飞虫，居无定所。
translated_text: An unstable and volatile parasite that builds a nest in tissues and tents.
secondary_translated_text: 조직과 텐트에 둥지를 짓는 불안정하고 휘발성 기생충입니다.

translated_text: Zeus was.

original_en_text: Once a hunter purely for food, now they hunt unthinking and unending.
original_zh_text: 曾是只为果腹而捕猎的猎手，如今却在丝咒驱使下沦为永不停歇的屠夫。
translated_text: In the past, they hunted only for food, and now they hunted ruthlessly without thinking.
secondary_translated_text: 과거에는 먹이를 위해서만 사냥을 했지만 지금은 생각도 없이 무자비하게 사냥을 했다.

original_en_text: So light they can rest atop still water’s surface. An elegant bug indeed.
original_zh_text: 轻盈得能栖于静水表面，确为优雅之虫。
translated_text: This means that they can live in calm waters with enough light. And this is a serious mistake.
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 그들이 충분한 빛이있는 평온한 물에서 살 수 있다는 것을 의미합니다.그리고 이것은 심각한 실수입니다.

translated_text: The Lakers of Steel
secondary_translated_text: 레이커스 오브 스틸 The Lakers of Steel

original_en_text: Its form is absurd... Surely it should not be able to hold itself in the air? The noxious gases in its stomach must provide its levity.
original_zh_text: 如此畸形的躯体竟能悬空？想必是腹中毒气提供了浮力。
translated_text: This form is ridiculous. can we really be in the air? The poisonous gas in the stomach was supposed to provide relief.
secondary_translated_text: 이 형태는 우스꽝스럽다.정말 공중에 있을 수 있을까?위 안에 있는 독성 가스는 안도감을 줄 것으로 예상되었다.

original_en_text: Once roused, the bug will crash its steely shell into walls, floors and foes.
original_zh_text: 被惊动后，会以钢甲撞击墙壁、地面与敌人。
translated_text: When they wake up, the worm crushes the walls, floor and enemies to destroy the steel shell.
secondary_translated_text: 그들이 깨어났을 때, 벌레는 강철 껍질을 파괴하기 위해 벽, 바닥 및 적을 분쇄합니다.

translated_text: The Old Iron Man
secondary_translated_text: 올드 아이언맨 The Old Iron Man

original_en_text: Elder crawbug serving in a sacred ceremony.
original_zh_text: 参与神圣仪式的腐囊虫长老。
translated_text: The old crab served in the sacred ceremony.
secondary_translated_text: 그 늙은 게는 신성한 의식에 봉사했다.

translated_text: Statement by the Special Envoy
Gourmet Pilgrims.

original_en_text: Agile bug, and one of few hardy pilgrims to have reached the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 成功抵达圣堡的敏捷朝圣者。
translated_text: This cunning insect is also one of the few persevering pilgrims who have arrived at the castle.
secondary_translated_text: 이 교활한 곤충은 또한 성에 도착한 몇 안되는 끈기있는 순례자 중 하나입니다.

original_en_text: Their use of a pin shows hard training. Their use of Silk, unfurled from a spool held close, shows skill far beyond standard bugs.
original_zh_text: 其刺针技法明显是经过严格训练，近身灵丝轴的操控技艺更是远超普通虫子。
translated_text: Using a silk rolled from a nearby reel, he demonstrated his skills that go far beyond the standard worm.
secondary_translated_text: 근처의 릴에서 굴린 실크를 사용하여, 그는 표준 벌레를 훨씬 뛰어넘는 기술을 보여주었습니다.

original_en_text: Gilded guardian of the Blasted Steps, bearing a cymbal and mallet.
original_zh_text: 镇守蚀阶的金甲守卫，用钹和木槌处决"不洁者"。
translated_text: It has a golden guard, explosive steps, a hammer and a hammer.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 황금 경비원, 폭발적인 계단, 망치와 망치를 가지고 있습니다.

original_en_text: A rare, calmer bug of Bilewater, survives its hazardous surroundings by hiding as a plant.
original_zh_text: 腐汁泽罕见的温顺虫子，在危险的环境中拟态植物，得以生存。
translated_text: Rare, soft bile bacteria survive in dangerous environments hidden in plants.
secondary_translated_text: 희귀하고 부드러운 담즙 박테리아는 식물 속에 숨겨진 위험한 환경에서 살아남습니다.

original_en_text: Bug forged of iron, rotor and cog. The automaton works tirelessly to maintain the Core that houses it.
original_zh_text: 由齿轮与转子构成的铁质自动机，不知疲倦维护着机枢核心。
translated_text: Loss of wrought iron, rotating disc and cogs.The automaton works tirelessly to support the core that will house it.
secondary_translated_text: 단철, 회전 디스크 및 톱니를 잃어 버립니다. 자동기는 그것을 수용 할 핵심을 지탱하기 위해 끊임없이 일합니다.

original_en_text: Starved pack bug with an insatiable appetite. Despite their tough hide and pungent meat, roaches breed rapidly so are sometimes farmed for food.
original_zh_text: 贪婪的群居害虫，甲壳坚硬，虫肉腥臭，却因繁殖力超强被圈养作为为食物来源。
translated_text: A hungry symbiotic can not satisfy the appetite.Despite the fact that the skin of beetles is hard, and the flesh is spicy, they multiply at a rapid rate and sometimes breed for food.
secondary_translated_text: 배고픈 공생체는 식욕을 만족시킬 수 없습니다. 딱정벌레의 피부가 단단하고 살이 매운 사실에도 불구하고, 그들은 빠른 속도로 번식하고 때로는 먹이를 위해 번식합니다.

translated_text: newspaper news.
The Shadow Observer.

original_en_text: They cling fast to the shells of other bugs, destroying any hope for concentration or comfort.
original_zh_text: 它们紧附其他虫子的外壳，彻底摧毁宿主的专注力与安宁。
translated_text: They attach themselves to the shells of other insects, destroying hopes of concentration and comfort.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 다른 곤충의 껍질에 붙어 집중력과 편안함의 희망을 파괴합니다.

original_en_text: Pointed, darting insect that builds a hardy hive from Shellwood’s dried bark.
original_zh_text: 以甲木林干树皮筑巢的尖刺飞虫。
translated_text: Sharp spraying insects use the dry bark of the wood to build sturdy nests.
secondary_translated_text: 날카로운 뿌리 곤충은 나무의 건조한 껍질을 사용하여 튼튼한 둥지를 만듭니다.

original_en_text: Full-sized mite of the Citadel cloaked in an old curtain.
original_zh_text: 披挂破旧幕帘的圣堡巨型螨虫。
translated_text: The castle 's old tents were wrapped in ticks in life size.
secondary_translated_text: 성의 낡은 텐트는 실물 크기의 진드기로 싸여 있다.

translated_text: The Moong:
Cytoplasm is the

original_en_text: A snapping surprise on first encounter, though one easily avoided once aware.
original_zh_text: 初次遭遇的惊险过后，便再难构成威胁。
translated_text: There are surprises when you first encounter them, but once you 've written them down, they 're easy to avoid.
secondary_translated_text: 처음 만났을 때 놀라움이 있지만, 일단 적어 놓으면 쉽게 피할 수 있습니다.

translated_text: Hydrogen phosphate.
scullyd,

original_en_text: His tracks and traps... It should have been obvious from the start, this old hunter sought to draw me in. But what reason drove him to test himself so brutally? That answer I suspect I shall never know.
original_zh_text: 早该察觉他的踪迹与陷阱……但这老猎手对自己进行如此残酷试炼的原因，看来是无从得知了。
translated_text: From the beginning it was clear that the old hunter was trying to seduce me, but what was it? What was he trying to do so badly? Never respond.
secondary_translated_text: 처음부터 늙은 사냥꾼이 나를 유혹하려고한다는 것이 분명했지만, 그것은 무엇입니까?그는 무엇을 그렇게 나쁘게 하려고 했습니까?절대 대답하지 마라.

original_en_text: Brutish cook responsible for dicing Muckroach meat into edible portions.
original_zh_text: 粗鲁的厨子，负责将淤秽蟑螂肉切分成便于食用的分量。
translated_text: A barbarian cook cuts the meat of a beetle to eat.
secondary_translated_text: 야만적인 요리사가 딱정벌레의 고기를 잘라 먹는다.

original_en_text: Flighted automaton, responsible for repairing and extending the Core.
original_zh_text: 负责维修扩建核心的飞行自动机，简单攻击暗藏杀机。
translated_text: A flying machine with the task of repairing and expanding the core.
secondary_translated_text: 핵을 수리하고 확장하는 임무가있는 비행 기계.

original_en_text: Giant roller of the lowlands. Its ridged hide will crush smaller creatures beneath it.
original_zh_text: 在低地区域横冲直撞的巨型生物，带棱甲的躯体能轻易碾碎小型生物。
translated_text: A wide range of low places.His rib-shaped skin can crush tiny creatures below.
secondary_translated_text: 넓은 범위의 낮은 곳. 그의 갈비 모양의 피부는 아래의 작은 생물들을 분쇄 할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: Shell of a small bug possessed by Silk dregs. The husk will stretch its Silk to form a crude, crushing wheel.
original_zh_text: 被灵丝残渣附身的小型甲虫躯壳，伸展灵丝形成粗糙碾压轮。
translated_text: The bodies of small insects are attached to the body in the form of silk debris.The body expands the silk, forming broken wheels.
secondary_translated_text: 작은 곤충의 몸은 실크 조각으로 몸에 붙어 있으며, 실크 조각이 팽창하여 깨진 바퀴를 형성합니다.

original_en_text: Rag-winged adult crawbug bearing a scavenged pin.
original_zh_text: 翅膀破烂的腐囊成虫，使用捡来刺针作为武器。
translated_text: Adult crab with thick wings and predatory nipples.
secondary_translated_text: 두꺼운 날개와 포식적인 젖꼭지를 가진 성게.

translated_text: The sarcasm is

original_en_text: I have not yet seen the bell this automaton is designed to ring, nor do I ever wish to hear it. Such a clamour would no doubt be unpleasant to experience.
original_zh_text: 它们机械臂摆动的节奏暗合圣咏旋律，若真让这些击钹者齐聚奏响终章，恐怕整个机枢核心都会在共振中崩塌。
translated_text: I 've never seen this robot design ring a bell, and I don't want to hear it.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 이 로봇 디자인이 벨을 울리는 것을 본 적이 없고, 그것을 듣고 싶지 않다.

translated_text: from Palestine.

original_en_text: If allowed the opportunity, these creatures will grow into a form larger and more oppressive.
original_zh_text: 此刻脆弱，却是未来灾祸的种子。放任其成长将成为巨大威胁。
translated_text: If given a chance, these creatures will evolve into larger and more repressive forms.
secondary_translated_text: 기회가 주어지면, 이 생물들은 더 크고 억압적인 형태로 진화할 것입니다.

original_en_text: He offered fair warning and challenge, a duel in the purest sense. I admire his honour, and his skill.
original_zh_text: 他向我发起了正式的挑战，那是一场最纯粹的决斗。我敬佩他的荣誉感，也钦佩他的技艺。
translated_text: It was both a warning and a challenge, it was a struggle in the strict sense of the word.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 경고이자 도전이었으며, 엄밀히 말하면 투쟁이었습니다.

original_en_text: Insect formed to imitate a branch, born with sharp, retractable horns atop its head.
original_zh_text: 头部配备可收缩尖角的拟态树枝虫。
translated_text: Insects mimic branches and have sharp, telescopic horns on the head.
secondary_translated_text: 곤충은 나뭇가지를 모방하고 머리에 날카롭고 뿔이 있습니다.

original_en_text: Small, soft bug that uses the hard skulls of the Marrow for protection and disguise.
original_zh_text: 小型软体虫，利用髓骨洞窟内硬质头骨作为自己的护甲和伪装。
translated_text: A small soft worm that uses a hard skull of bone marrow to protect it and mummify it.
secondary_translated_text: 뼈의 단단한 두개골을 사용하여 그것을 보호하고 미라로 만드는 작은 부드러운 벌레.

original_en_text: When roosting, it would look convincingly plant-like. In flight, its bulbous body quickly ruins the ruse.
original_zh_text: 停栖时，双翼能完美伪装成远野的草叶。但这小聪明总在飞行时露出破绽——它膨大的腹部让伪装功亏一篑。
translated_text: If you look at it, it looks as attractive as a plant. During the flight, its spherical body quickly destroyed technology.
secondary_translated_text: 그것을 보면, 그것은 식물처럼 매력적으로 보인다.비행 중에, 그것의 구형 몸체는 빠르게 기술을 파괴했습니다.

translated_text: Яго! I'm not sure.
Battery Model

original_en_text: Cloth-covered crawler with sharpened forelimbs. Lives and breeds in dark places.
original_zh_text: 栖息暗处的爬虫，身覆布料，前肢锐利。
translated_text: Reptiles are covered with fabric, and the front legs are pointed. Lives and reproduces in the nuclei.
secondary_translated_text: 파충류는 천으로 덮여 있고 앞다리는 뿔이 있다.핵에서 살고 번식합니다.

translated_text: Wing Wing Wing

original_en_text: The cost of so much grandeur... Did I peer closely enough into the foundations of my own kingdom?
original_zh_text: 辉煌背后的代价……我是否也曾如此审视过自己王国的根基？
translated_text: Have I seen the foundations of the kingdom?

original_en_text: Stout adult crawbug bearing several short pins.
original_zh_text: 手持短刺的矮胖腐囊成虫。
translated_text: An adult crab with short needles.
The value of

original_en_text: Greed will always see some bugs swell above their kin.
original_zh_text: 贪婪终会导致膨胀，这是所有生物共通的教训。
translated_text: Greedy people always see the mistakes that are spread to their fellow men.
secondary_translated_text: 탐욕스러운 사람들은 항상 동료들에게 퍼지는 실수를 본다.

original_en_text: This graceful ruler once possessed skill to rival my own. At her youthful peak, her voice united all Skarr in her service.
original_zh_text: 这位优雅的统治者曾拥有与我匹敌的武艺。在她巅峰时期，其歌喉能让所有斯卡尔蚁族臣服效命。
translated_text: Such a leader already possessed competence comparable to mine. In the height of her youth, her voice sums up the whole scale.
secondary_translated_text: 그런 지도자는 이미 나와 비교할 수 있는 능력을 가지고 있었다.그녀의 젊음의 절정에 그녀의 목소리는 전체 규모를 요약합니다.

original_en_text: False fly with a rune etched shell. A tortured mix of soul and void is caged within.
original_zh_text: 外壳刻有符文的飞虫形装置，内部囚禁着灵魂与虚空的痛苦混合物。
translated_text: On the shell of the fake fly there is a runic letter.A mixture of pain and emptiness of the soul is locked in a cage.
secondary_translated_text: 가짜 파리의 껍질에는 루니 글자가 들어있다. 영혼의 고통과 공허함이 섞여있는 새장에 갇혀있다.

original_en_text: Suction creature surviving on the thick slime that coats its caves.
original_zh_text: 依赖洞壁浓稠粘液维生的吸附生物。
translated_text: The body of the aspirant is based on mucus that covers the cave.
secondary_translated_text: 추구하고자 하는 사람의 몸은 동굴을 덮는 점액에 기반을 두고 있다.

original_en_text: Tall roach tender charged to feed Muckroaches on a lean diet of maggot gruel.
original_zh_text: 负责用蛆虫糊喂养腐汁蟑螂的高瘦饲育者。
translated_text: Large beetles require red meat from worm broth.
secondary_translated_text: 큰 딱정벌레는 벌레 육수에서 붉은 고기를 필요로합니다.

original_en_text: Tiny, soft creature that armours itself using the hard, hollow growths of Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 用甲木林硬质空茎武装自身的脆弱飞虫。
translated_text: Small soft creatures use hard plants as a shell to protect themselves.
secondary_translated_text: 작은 부드러운 생물들은 단단한 식물을 껍질으로 사용하여 자신을 보호합니다.

original_en_text: Taken by Pharloom’s Haunting, the bug is now capable of little more than prayer and aggression.
original_zh_text: 丝咒侵蚀了它们的理智，如今这些虫子只剩祷告与攻击的本能。
translated_text: In Falham's Haunted, insects can only pray and attack.
secondary_translated_text: Falham 's Haunted 에서 곤충들은 기도와 공격만 할 수 있습니다.

translated_text: Groville and the Pilgrim

original_en_text: Oversized bug, briefly consumed by anger after its long time caged.
original_zh_text: 长期囚禁后暴怒的巨型跳蚤。
translated_text: The sounding insect was briefly consumed by rabies after being kept in a cage for a long time.
secondary_translated_text: 울리는 곤충은 오랫동안 새장에 갇혀있어서 잠시 광견병에 걸렸습니다.

original_en_text: From the outset, theirs was a hopeless task. Those wild lands could never be replicated within a space so artificial.
original_zh_text: 从最初这就是徒劳之举——自然的荒野绝无可能在虫子造出的空间刻意复现。
translated_text: From the beginning, his task was hopeless.He would never be reproduced in such an artificial space.
secondary_translated_text: 처음부터 그의 임무는 절망적이었다. 그는 결코 인공 공간에서 재현되지 않을 것이다.

original_zh_text: 低地地区的游荡者，绒毛下暗藏钢刺并具备远程发射能力。
translated_text: Low quality spinal drifters

original_en_text: Wriggling young grub that lives in darkness.
translated_text: Young puppies crawling in the darkness
secondary_translated_text: 어둠 속에서 기어 다니는 어린 강아지들

original_en_text: Their procedures with Silk may have prolonged life within the Citadel, but they unknowingly gifted many minds to the monarch.
original_zh_text: 他们的灵丝手术虽维系了圣堡的生命，却无意中将所有心智献予了君主。
translated_text: Silk may have prolonged the life of the castle, but he unwittingly passed on many ideas to the monarch.
secondary_translated_text: 실크는 성의 수명을 연장시켰을지도 모르지만, 그는 무의식적으로 군주에게 많은 아이디어를 전달했습니다.

original_en_text: Floral foe that reacts instinctively to movement nearby. Spits pellets of crackling pollen that burst on impact.
original_zh_text: 对周围动静极其敏感的植物，能够喷射噼啪作响的花粉弹。
translated_text: The opponents instinctively react to closing moves. They emit pollen balls and explode in shock.
secondary_translated_text: 상대방은 본능적으로 마감 움직임에 반응합니다.그들은 꽃가루 공을 방출하고 충격으로 폭발합니다.

translated_text: Confession.
Fatidôn
Belinzie (English)
The second Sentinel

original_en_text: In contests of speed against strength, I have seen the swift more often triumphant, a lesson I have taken to my own heart.
original_zh_text: 见证这以快制胜的案例，更坚定了我对敏捷的追求。
translated_text: For me, it 's a lesson when Swift wins more in the race for speed and power.
secondary_translated_text: 나에게는 스피드와 파워를 위한 경주에서 스위프트가 더 많은 승리를 거두는 것이 교훈이었다.

translated_text: Loft on the lowest level.
The Pound Catcher
Let's share them.

original_en_text: Pilgrim endowed with large wings, carrying a brace of iron bells.
original_zh_text: 配备一对铁钟的飞行朝圣者。
translated_text: The pilgrims had large wings and iron clocks.
secondary_translated_text: 그 순례자들은 큰 날개와 철 시계를 가지고 있었다.

translated_text: Lance and skeleton

original_en_text: In my youth, I envied all bugs with wings. I even fancied I might grow a pair... I have since learned better. Accept the limitations of one’s body... and augment with tools as needed.
original_zh_text: 年少时，我曾一度羡慕生来便有翅膀的虫族，甚至曾幻想自己也能长出一对来……如今我已明白，接受身体上的限制，并学会用工具弥补缺陷才是正途。
translated_text: When I was little, I envied insects.I thought about creating a pair.Since then I have learned better.Accept the limitations of your body.Add tools if you need them.
secondary_translated_text: 내가 어렸을 때, 나는 곤충을 부러워했다. 나는 한 쌍을 만드는 것을 생각했다. 그 이후로 나는 더 잘 배웠다. 당신의 몸의 한계를 받아들이십시오. 필요하다면 도구를 추가하십시오.

original_en_text: Devious ambusher that poses as a fossil.
original_zh_text: 伪装成化石的狡诈伏击者。
translated_text: They say that clowns are fossils.
The ghost.

original_en_text: This bug bears a spool of Silk, which they flail to attack. Though somewhat crude, theirs is a technique much reminiscent of Weavers. I wonder who taught them such a use?
original_zh_text: 这只虫子携带着一轴灵丝，并挥舞它进行攻击。动作虽略显粗糙，但竟带着几分织者的神韵。不知是谁教会了它这样使用灵丝？
translated_text: An insect holds a silk roll and swings around it. It's a little tricky, but the technique reminds me of a frame. Who taught me how to use it?
secondary_translated_text: 곤충이 실크 롤을 들고 주위를 흔들고 있습니다. 약간 까다롭지만, 기법은 프레임처럼 생각납니다.누가 그것을 사용하는 법을 가르쳐 주나요?

original_en_text: Her presence would once have maintained the wood’s fragile order, allowing the safe passage of bugs across its branches.
original_zh_text: 昔日的她维持领域内脆弱的平衡，护佑虫子们安然通行其枝干。
translated_text: Their presence supported the fragile order of the forest, allowing insects to pass safely through the branches.
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 존재는 숲의 취약한 질서를 지원하여 곤충이 가지들을 안전하게 통과 할 수있게했습니다.

translated_text: There are many pilgrims.

original_en_text: Though generally passive, their sharp masks can cause injury if carelessly blundered into.
original_zh_text: 虽性情温顺，但若冒失冲撞其锋利面甲仍会受伤。
translated_text: They are usually passive, but can cause damage if they get into a sharp mask.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 일반적으로 수동적이지만 날카로운 마스크에 들어가면 손상을 일으킬 수 있습니다.

translated_text: The Flying Termites.

original_en_text: I like her. For her willingness to teach and her spirit still strong, despite a long age spent solitary... she has my respect.
original_zh_text: 我欣赏她——甘于传授技艺，孤寂长年也未磨灭斗志，值得尊敬。
translated_text: She has lived alone for a long time, but she loves to teach, and her spirit is strong, which worries me.
secondary_translated_text: 그녀는 오랫동안 혼자 살았지만 가르치는 것을 좋아하고 정신이 강해서 걱정됩니다.

translated_text: Damage to the ship

original_en_text: They held long at their vigil, far beyond the age of their brethren, yet still when roused they swung their blade with remarkable ease.
original_zh_text: 他们戍边的年岁就能远超同辈寿命，苏醒时仍能挥动利刃，动作流畅自如。
translated_text: They were much older than their brother 's age, but when they woke up, they were still slightly measuring with their fingers.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 형보다 나이가 많았지만, 깨어났을 때 손가락으로 살짝 측정하고 있었다.

original_en_text: Long-horned beast of Pharloom’s lowlands. Relies on its horn both to impale and to wrench the ground beneath it, flinging dangerous debris.
original_zh_text: 纺络低地的长角巨兽，依赖长角穿刺敌人并掘起地面制造危险碎片云。
translated_text: The Long Horn of Lowland Fanham: Found his horns, he drilled into the ground and dumped dangerous debris.
secondary_translated_text: Lowland Fanham 의 긴 뿔: 그의 뿔을 발견하고, 그는 땅에 구멍을 뚫고 위험한 잔해를 버렸습니다.

original_en_text: Could their actions be called skill? I see only a crude mangling of meat. Yet I wonder, before the Haunting snared their minds was it any different?
original_zh_text: 这般行径怎能称为厨艺？我只见到对血肉的粗暴摧残。它在丝咒侵蚀前，或许不会像现在这样粗鄙行事？
translated_text: Do you think that your actions are skills? Still, they don't know if everything has changed before the ghosts take control.
secondary_translated_text: 당신은 당신의 행동이 기술이라고 생각합니까?그러나 유령들이 통제권을 잡기 전에 모든 것이 바뀌었다는 것을 그들은 모른다.

original_en_text: Darting warrior with sharpened forelimbs and heightened senses.
original_zh_text: 前肢尖利且感官强化的迅捷战士。
translated_text: The archer has a sharp forearm and a keen sense.

original_en_text: Mighty percussive disciple of the Choir, wielding a mallet and a Silk spool to wrap and enhance their attacks.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团的打击乐信徒，挥舞槌棒，并利用灵丝轴强化它们的攻击。
translated_text: Adherents of the mighty attacking chorus use hammers and silk rollers to strengthen their attacks.
secondary_translated_text: 강력한 공격 합창단의 추종자들은 망치와 실크롤러를 사용하여 공격을 강화합니다.

original_en_text: Dual princes of old Verdania, beloved by their subjects for their grace and for the ballet of death they delivered upon outsiders.
original_zh_text: 昔日翠庭王国的双生王子，以恩典治国，深受子民爱戴。对于不怀好意的外来者，他们会为其献上一支死亡芭蕾。
translated_text: The double prince of ancient Verdania was loved by his subjects for his literacy and the ballet of death, which he represented as unknown.
secondary_translated_text: 고대 베르다니아의 이중 왕자는 그의 문맹과 죽음의 발레 때문에 그의 신하들로부터 사랑을 받았으며, 그는 알려지지 않은 것으로 나타났습니다.

original_en_text: Huge and soft, a fantastic combination ruined by their haunted aggression.
original_zh_text: 明明是个蓬松的大毛球，可惜被丝咒搞得见谁都想撞两下。
translated_text: Huge and soft, it 's a great combination, but it 's spoiled by phantom aggression.
secondary_translated_text: 거대하고 부드러운, 그것은 좋은 조합이지만, 그것은 유령의 공격성으로 망쳐졌다.

translated_text: The Bonnet Funnel

original_en_text: On uneven terrain their union of flight and range can prove a challenge even for me.
original_zh_text: 崎岖地形中，其飞行阵列的配合连我也需谨慎应对。
translated_text: The combination of flying over rugged terrain and being autonomous was also a challenge for me.
secondary_translated_text: 거친 지형을 비행하는 것과 자율주행의 조합은 나에게도 도전이었습니다.

original_en_text: They toiled incessantly for the Citadel, their shells bent and greyed, and now the kingdom’s curse means not even death can relieve them.
original_zh_text: 他们为圣堡鞠躬尽瘁直至甲壳弯折灰败，如今连死亡都无法终结这诅咒。
translated_text: They work hard for the castle, their shells bend and turn gray, and the curse of the kingdom means that even death can't get rid of them.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 성을 위해 열심히 일했고, 껍질이 구부러지고 회색으로 변했고, 왕국의 저주는 죽음조차도 그들을 제거 할 수 없다는 것을 의미했습니다.

original_en_text: Destroying the hives will limit their presence in the wood. Useful to me now, as I pass along the branches. Dangerous in time for the wood’s order. Even a small disruption can tip a fragile balance.
original_zh_text: 摧毁蜂巢会限制它们在林中的活动。对我而言，这在穿行丛林时十分有用。但从长远来看，即便是微小的干扰，也可能打破丛林脆弱的生态平衡。
translated_text: Destruction of bees limits their presence in the woods.When I walk on a branch, it works for me.Dangerous times for orders on a tree.Even the smallest damage can disrupt the fragile balance.
secondary_translated_text: 벌의 파괴는 숲에서 그들의 존재를 제한합니다. 나뭇가지를 걸을 때, 그것은 나를 위해 작동합니다. 나무에 주문을 위해 위험한 시간. 심지어 작은 손상은 취약한 균형을 방해 할 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: It has no true mind, and yet fights effectively, adjusting its strategy to my movements. Where exactly are its thoughts written?
original_zh_text: 当它用盾牌格挡我的织针突刺，同时以刁钻角度刺出长枪时，我仿佛在与某个沉睡在齿轮中的古老剑客对决。
translated_text: I really don't know, but the battle is effective, adapting my strategy according to my moves.
secondary_translated_text: 정말 잘 모르겠지만 전투는 효과적이어서 내 움직임에 따라 전략을 조정합니다.

original_en_text: A bug born entirely of thread. Much Silk would have been needed to see her sustained. A fragile form of life, but life nonetheless.
original_zh_text: 完全由灵丝编织而成的虫子。维持这种丝造生命需耗费海量的灵丝资源，虽形态脆弱却真实鲜活。
translated_text: It needs a lot of silk to move around, it is a fragile organism, but it is life.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 움직이기 위해 많은 실크를 필요로하며, 그것은 취약한 유기체이지만, 그것은 생명입니다.

translated_text: Welcome from you.

original_en_text: Individually they offer little challenge, but their numbers are surely vast, and most remain hidden.
original_zh_text: 单只不足为惧，但其庞大族群多潜藏暗处，如同阴影永难根除。
translated_text: Personally, they face very few problems, but their number is certainly many, and the majority of them are still hidden.
secondary_translated_text: 개인적으로, 그들은 매우 적은 문제에 직면하지만, 그들의 수는 확실히 많으며, 그들 중 대부분은 여전히 숨겨져 있습니다.

original_en_text: A lucky bug to be able to grow old. Pharloom’s roads take most much earlier.
original_zh_text: 能在纺络活到这样的年纪堪称奇迹，只可惜这份长寿化作了更持久的折磨。
translated_text: A lucky worm that can grow old. Ferram's path was moving fast.
secondary_translated_text: 늙을 수 있는 행운의 벌레.페람의 길은 빠르게 움직이고 있었다.

original_en_text: Huge flighted creature formed from coldshard.
original_zh_text: 由冰晶碎片构成的巨型飞行生物。
translated_text: A giant flying creature made from cold rubbish.
secondary_translated_text: 차가운 쓰레기로 만든 거대 비행 생물.

original_en_text: She has lived a mere fraction of my lifetime and yet her rings prove a ferocious match. As gifted a warrior as I have ever encountered, and one I am fortunate to call a friend.
original_zh_text: 她的年岁不过我生命的一小段，但她的战环却展现出凶狠的实力。她是我所遇过最出色的战士之一，很庆幸能和她成为朋友。
translated_text: I have lived only a small part of my life, but her ring was perfect.The most talented soldier I have ever met is a soldier who has earned the honor of calling me a friend.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 내 인생의 작은 부분만을 살았지만 그녀의 반지는 완벽했다. 내가 만난 가장 재능있는 군인은 나를 친구라고 부르는 영광을 얻은 군인이었다.

original_en_text: Sheer bulk makes for an effective weapon, but requires much sustenance. This creature would have spent most of its time eating. An acceptable life for some.
original_zh_text: 庞大的身躯是它们致命的武器，但也需要大量营养来维持。这种生物绝大多数时间都在进食，倒也活得纯粹。
translated_text: Clean displacement is an effective weapon, but it requires a lot of support.This creature feeds on itself most of the time.For some it is an acceptable life.
secondary_translated_text: 깨끗한 변위는 효과적인 무기이지만 많은 지원이 필요합니다. 이 생물은 대부분의 시간 자체를 먹습니다. 일부에게는 수용 가능한 삶입니다.

original_en_text: These ones grow large, yet I have never observed them eating, or sleeping. They seem such simple bugs... but I suspect they are not truly our cousins.
original_zh_text: 体型虽庞大，却从未见其进食或休眠。看似普通的虫子……实则与我们并非同类。
translated_text: He has grown up, but I have never seen him eat or sleep. It 's so simple, I think they are real cousins.
secondary_translated_text: 그는 자랐지만, 나는 그가 먹거나 자는 것을 본 적이 없다.너무 간단해요, 저는 그들이 진짜 사촌인 것 같아요.

original_en_text: Huge, hardbone bug that lives within and travels through the veins of old bells across Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 居住在古钟里并穿梭于纺络广阔钟脉里的骨甲大块头。
translated_text: A huge hard worm inhabits the veins of ancient autumn clocks and passes through the autumn.
secondary_translated_text: 거대한 단단한 벌레가 고대 가을 시계의 혈관에 살고 가을을 통과합니다.

original_en_text: Winged devout of the Citadel, carrying a brace of gilded bells.
original_zh_text: 圣堡的带翼信徒，背负一对镀金巨钟作战。
translated_text: She proudly flew around the castle, carrying a golden bell on her back.
secondary_translated_text: 그녀는 황금종을 등에 메고 자랑스럽게 성 주위를 날아갔다.

original_en_text: This one would make a perfect pet, but for the freezing temperatures it requires for comfort.
original_zh_text: 本可成为完美的宠物，但其生存需依赖刺骨的低温。
translated_text: This will make an excellent animal, but it should be comfortable due to the cold.
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 훌륭한 동물을 만들 것이지만 추위 때문에 편안해야합니다.

original_en_text: These creatures look to have been bred deliberately in watery pens. If they are food to be, their scent suggests they must taste vile.
original_zh_text: 刻意养殖的水栖变种，若作食用，其恶臭已昭示其滋味堪忧。
translated_text: If it is the food of the future, then the smell suggests that it is difficult to eat.
secondary_translated_text: 만약 그것이 미래의 음식이라면, 냄새는 먹기가 어렵다는 것을 암시합니다.

original_en_text: Their skill once saw them chosen, and I can plainly see why. They would have lived and trained only for this duty.
original_zh_text: 它们的高超技艺我已亲身体会，必然是终生磨练只为履行职责。
translated_text: I know very well why their skills were chosen; they live and train only for that responsibility.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 그들의 기술이 왜 선택되었는지 잘 알고 있다; 그들은 그 책임을 위해 살고 훈련한다.

original_en_text: For this bug to have survived Pharloom’s climb it must have teamed with stouter companions. I cannot imagine it succeeding alone.
original_zh_text: 单凭自身的力量，这虫子绝无可能攀越纺络的天堑，成功进入圣堡。想必曾与更强壮的伙伴互为倚仗。
translated_text: This insect had to survive when he climbed the farm, and he had to cooperate with his more powerful companion.
secondary_translated_text: 이 곤충은 농장에 올라갈 때 살아남아야했고, 그는 더 강력한 동반자와 협력해야했습니다.

original_en_text: Did this one grow large thanks to the Citadel’s excess, or was its formidable size the reason it ever survived to reach this place?
original_zh_text: 这家伙的巨大体型是因圣堡的恩赐而异变，还是正因其巨大体型才得以存活至此？
translated_text: Did the size of the castle increase with the number of castles, or did its grandeur remain and come here?
secondary_translated_text: 성의 크기가 성의 수에 따라 증가했습니까, 아니면 그 장엄함이 남아서 여기에 왔습니까?

original_en_text: Though surely fierce, the skull it bears looks taken from an even larger beast. If not for the bones as proof, I would scarcely believe bugs could grow to such scale.
original_zh_text: 它头顶的骷髅战盔竟取自更庞大的生物——若非有骸骨为证，我简直难以相信世间存在如此巨虫。
translated_text: Its skull was undoubtedly ferocious, but it seems that it was removed by a larger animal.Without evidence of bones it is difficult to believe that this worm could have reached such sizes.
secondary_translated_text: 그 두개골은 의심할 여지없이 사나운 것이었지만, 더 큰 동물에 의해 제거된 것으로 보인다. 뼈의 증거가 없다면, 이 벌레가 그러한 크기에 도달했을 수 있다는 것을 믿기 어렵다.

translated_text: by farid
The Sniper of the Silk
secondary_translated_text: 실크의 저격수 The Sniper of the Silk

translated_text: The Dental Model.

original_en_text: Two cogwork bugs, and yet the soul seemed singular? A sad, yet masterful imitation of life, imbued inside shells of iron.
original_zh_text: 两只自动机虫却共享单一灵魂？这是栖身于铁壳内的生命仿品，展现出精湛的制造技艺，却难掩其悲哀的命运。
translated_text: You have two gears, but the soul looks like one. It was a sad but exquisite imitation of life filled with an iron shell.
secondary_translated_text: 당신은 두 개의 기어를 가지고 있지만 영혼은 하나처럼 보입니다.그것은 슬프지만 섬세한 삶의 모방이었다. 철의 껍질으로 가득 차 있었다.

translated_text: Plasmidis.

original_en_text: Heavy insect that lives near large bodies of water. Its weighty body is best avoided.
original_zh_text: 栖息大型水域附近的笨重昆虫，遇到最好绕道而行。
translated_text: Insects that live near large bodies of water.It is necessary to avoid heavy bodies.
secondary_translated_text: 큰 물체 근처에 사는 곤충. 무거운 물체를 피해야 한다.

translated_text: Kilik said:

original_en_text: Drifting bug disguised as a flower. Disperses crackling clouds of pollen if threatened.
original_zh_text: 伪装成花朵的漂浮生物，遇到威胁时会释放噼啪作响的花粉云自卫。
translated_text: Floating worms disguised as flowers.When they are in danger, they disperse clouds of pollen.
secondary_translated_text: 꽃으로 위장해 떠다니는 벌레는 위험에 처했을 때 꽃가루 구름을 퍼뜨린다.

original_en_text: Dense knot of husks bound tight by void soaked Silk.
original_zh_text: 由虚空浸染的灵丝捆缚的躯壳，密集成团。
translated_text: The nodes of the retained shell were tightly bound with silk, wet in the sky.
secondary_translated_text: 보존된 껍질의 매듭들은 실크로 단단히 묶여 있었고, 하늘에 젖었다.

translated_text: Cog the Worker (The Worker)
Drag wheels (English)

original_en_text: A smart hunter learns to wait long in ambush, always ready to strike the first blow.
original_zh_text: 优秀的猎手都懂得：耐心蹲点，一击必杀。
translated_text: A clever hunter learns to wait in ambushes for a long time and is ready to strike his first blow at any moment.
secondary_translated_text: 영리한 사냥꾼은 오랫동안 매복을 기다리는 법을 배우고 언제든지 첫 번째 타격을 할 준비가되어 있습니다.

original_en_text: Grazing creature with sharp senses that nimbly retreats from danger.
original_zh_text: 感官敏锐的食草生物，遇到危险会灵活撤退。
translated_text: Sensory herbivores are able to flexibly retreat from danger.
secondary_translated_text: 지각식초식동물은 위험으로부터 유연하게 물러날 수 있다.

original_en_text: Tiny, timid creatures that huddle in flocks and flee at the first hint of danger.
original_zh_text: 胆小的小型群居生物，一旦察觉到危险便四散奔逃。
translated_text: Small shy creatures gather together to escape when they are in danger.
secondary_translated_text: 작은 수줍은 생물들은 위험에 처했을 때 탈출하기 위해 함께 모인다.

original_en_text: Lost in the madness of the Haunting, they still commanded the endless excavation of their caves.
original_zh_text: 即便深陷丝咒癫狂，仍持续号令无休止的矿洞挖掘。
translated_text: They get lost in a ghostly madness and continue to dig the cave endlessly.
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 유령 같은 광기에 빠져 길을 잃고 끝없이 동굴을 파고 있습니다.

translated_text: Directed by Jury Crow.

original_en_text: They rarely relax, always alert for potential danger, even deep in their own territory. To defeat them my focus must match their own.
original_zh_text: 就算在其领地深处，他们仍保持高度警戒。要想击败他们，我的专注力必须达到与其相当的水平。
translated_text: They are also seldom relaxed and always alert to potential dangers in their territory.To defeat them, I must unite my attention with them. "
secondary_translated_text: 그들은 또한 긴장을 풀지 않으며, 영토에서 발생할 수 있는 위험을 항상 경계합니다. 그들을 물리 치기 위해, 나는 그들과 함께 주의를 기울여야 합니다. "

original_en_text: Steam shooting automaton, forged to clean the Cogwork Core and keep it free of infestation.
original_zh_text: 喷射蒸汽清洁机枢核心的自动机。
translated_text: Forged steam jet engines to clean and protect the Cogwork core from intrusion.
secondary_translated_text: 증기 제트 엔진을 조조하여 코그워크 코어를 청소하고 침입으로부터 보호했습니다.

translated_text: Bell Beast (English)

original_en_text: Sticky young fly, born and grown in service to the Slab.
original_zh_text: 自幼服务于罪石牢狱的黏腻幼蝇。
translated_text: The young sticky flies were born and bred to serve as warehouses.
secondary_translated_text: 어린 끈적끈적한 파리는 창고로 쓰기 위해 태어나서 번식했다.

translated_text: Friday the Pendels
Bees in Madeira
Advice from Whistleblowers

original_en_text: This mindless bug seems to sense only through its tendrils, yet despite that simplicity it still poses a serious threat.
original_zh_text: 虽只能凭借触须感知外界，这种虫子仍可以构成极大的威胁。
translated_text: Despite its simplicity, this brainless insect seems to be noticeable only by its curly beard, but it is a serious threat.
secondary_translated_text: 단순함에도 불구하고, 이 뇌없는 곤충은 곱슬머리 수염으로만 눈에 띄는 것처럼 보이지만 심각한 위협입니다.

translated_text: Acid
← The Savage Skeleton

original_en_text: Basic bug of Pharloom, laid low upon the ground.
translated_text: Insects with fallen base live on the ground.
secondary_translated_text: 바닥이 떨어지는 곤충은 땅에 살고 있습니다.

original_en_text: I am fond of simple, effective traps such as this bug’s extendable spikes. An unwary predator would be skewered clean through.
original_zh_text: 我很欣赏它这一招，简单有效。莽撞的捕食者肯定会被它的背刺一击穿透。
translated_text: I love simple and effective traps such as this fake expanding dots.
secondary_translated_text: 나는이 가짜 확장 점과 같은 간단하고 효과적인 함정을 좋아합니다.

original_en_text: Short pilgrim that uses their long horn to launch upon threats.
original_zh_text: 用长角将自己弹射向敌人的矮小朝圣者。
translated_text: The little pilgrim threatened with a long horn.

original_en_text: Thick-set bug consumed by haunted thread. Uses their solid frame to crush others.
original_zh_text: 被诅咒之丝缠裹的壮硕老者，用沉重甲壳碾压敌人。
translated_text: Thick mounting bugs consumed by horn cables.Destroy others with your strong body.
secondary_translated_text: 두꺼운 마운팅 벌레가 뿔 케이블에 의해 소비됩니다. 당신의 강한 몸으로 다른 사람들을 파괴하십시오.

original_en_text: Fur covered crawler with a series of sharp spikes along its back.
translated_text: This furry reptile has sharp spines on its back.
secondary_translated_text: 이 털이 많은 파충류는 등에 날카로운 가시가 있다.

original_en_text: Burrowing worm that uses its many blunted teeth to dig through even the hardest bone.
original_zh_text: 拥有密集钝齿的穴居虫类，极其坚硬的骨质层也能被它们钻透。
translated_text: The head worm has many blunt teeth that can penetrate even the hardest bones.
secondary_translated_text: 이 머리 벌레는 가장 단단한 뼈까지 뚫을 수 있는 많은 둔한 이빨을 가지고 있다.

original_en_text: With this one vanquished, I hope to have sped the end for that jail and its distasteful order.
original_zh_text: 击败她或将加速那座监狱与其恶心秩序的终结。
translated_text: With this defeat, I hope to hasten the end of the prison and its abominable order.
secondary_translated_text: 이 패배로, 나는 감옥과 그 가증한 질서의 종말을 서둘러 주기를 바란다.

original_en_text: Gelatinous coral drifter of simple mind and placid demeanour.
original_zh_text: 思维简单的凝胶状珊瑚生物，性情温和。
translated_text: Gum Coral has a simple and calm expression of opinion.
secondary_translated_text: Gum Coral 은 간단하고 평온한 의견을 표현합니다.

original_en_text: Totem and god, built and worshipped by the Burning Bugs.
original_zh_text: 焚身信徒建造并敬奉的图腾神像。
translated_text: It is built and worshipped by totems and gods, as well as burnt worms.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 토템과 신들, 그리고 불타는 벌레에 의해 건설되고 숭배됩니다.

translated_text: Village of Driznica (Driznita)

original_en_text: Skittish scrambler of the Far Fields. Its antennae resemble stalks of grass to aid in camouflage.
original_zh_text: 远野地区极易受惊的爬虫，触须能够伪装成草茎。
translated_text: In the distance there was a hidden breakdown. tentacles resemble grass stalks, helping to camouflage.
secondary_translated_text: 멀리서 숨겨진 고장이 있었다.촉수는 잔디 줄기를 닮아서 위장하는 데 도움이 됩니다.

original_en_text: Infant fly, freshly hatched. At this age the soft, blind fly is little more than a bother.
original_zh_text: 刚破卵的盲眼软体幼蝇，不过是些烦扰的小东西。
translated_text: A young fly has just grown up. At this age, soft and blind flies are just boring.
secondary_translated_text: 어린 파리가 이제 막 자랐다.이 나이에는 부드럽고 눈이 멀어지는 파리는 지루합니다.

translated_text: tombo

original_en_text: Tall creature with sharp senses. Defends its herd with powerful legs and a sharp-tipped mask.
original_zh_text: 感官敏锐的生物，以尖角面甲与强健后肢守护族群。
translated_text: She is a very sexy creature.Protect the cattle with strong legs and sharp masks.
secondary_translated_text: 그녀는 강한 다리와 날카로운 마스크로 소를 보호하는 매우 섹시한 생물입니다.

translated_text: The bad Kalani.

original_en_text: Cruel physician of Whiteward, responsible for operations and modifications on the Citadel’s bugs.
original_zh_text: 白愈厅的残酷医者，负责对圣堡甲虫实施手术与改造。
translated_text: Whitold, a cruel doctor, was responsible for the operation and modification of the worm.
secondary_translated_text: 잔인한 의사인 휘톨드는 벌레를 수술하고 수정하는 일을 담당했습니다.

original_en_text: The huge Judge likely stood through countless generations, never defeated, never wavering in their charge.
original_zh_text: 这庞然裁决者已矗立无数世代，未尝败绩，坚守职责从未动摇。
translated_text: This great judge, perhaps for countless generations, has never been defeated, and has never wavered in his office.
secondary_translated_text: 이 위대한 판사는 아마도 수많은 세대에 걸쳐 패배한 적이 없으며, 그의 직무에서 흔들리지 않았습니다.

original_en_text: These bugs look to have spent every waking moment at their work. Grim, endless labour in service of the unseen Citadel above.
original_zh_text: 这些虫子似乎将全部生命投入劳作。为自己从未见过的圣堡执行着阴郁无边的苦役。
translated_text: I work tirelessly and endlessly to serve the lock that is invisible from above.
secondary_translated_text: 나는 위에서 보이지 않는 자물쇠를 섬기기 위해 지칠지 않고 끝없이 일합니다.

translated_text: timilones
Wait, wait.
Persseus

original_en_text: Despite the Haunting of its shell, it has not been overcome with aggression. Its desire to flee remains too strong.
original_zh_text: 即使甲壳被丝咒侵蚀，其强烈的逃生本能依然压制住了被赋予的攻击性。
translated_text: Despite its imposing shell, it was not conquered by the invasion.
secondary_translated_text: 그 웅장한 껍질에도 불구하고, 침략으로 정복되지 않았다.

original_en_text: Coral hulk with a dense shell, bred to immense size by the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 被圣堡忆廊催生至庞然体型的珊瑚厚甲虫。
translated_text: The remains of the shell-covered coral have been raised in huge corals in the castle monument.
secondary_translated_text: 껍질로 덮인 산호의 잔해는 성 기념비의 거대한 산호로 기어졌습니다.

translated_text: The Calanido,
The next Skull Tracker
Pilgrim's Bell

original_en_text: Sturdy bug lost to the Haunting. Rolls at threats with no care for its own discomfort.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的健壮虫子。滚动碾压构成威胁的一切，无视自身痛楚。
translated_text: Strong bugs are lost by ghost bugs. Faced with a threat, do not worry about discomfort.
secondary_translated_text: 강한 벌레는 유령 벌레에 의해 사라집니다.위협에 직면했을 때, 불편 함에 대해 걱정하지 마십시오.

original_en_text: Tiny empty creature, barely a bug. Swallows its prey whole and sucks their nutrients until nothing remains.
original_zh_text: 微型的虚无生物，几乎算不上是虫子。吞噬猎物至渣滓都不剩。
translated_text: This is a small creature - not a worm. They absorb the prey whole and absorb nutrients until there is nothing left.
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 작은 생물입니다 - 벌레가 아닙니다.그들은 먹이를 완전히 흡수하고 아무것도 남지 않을 때까지 영양소를 흡수합니다.

translated_text: Poorly educated employees

original_en_text: Quite a beautiful creature. In my own kingdom’s court, it would have been highly favoured as an ornamental pet.
original_zh_text: 如此美丽的生物。若在我故国的宫廷，定会成为贵族追捧的装饰性宠物。
translated_text: In the gardens of my kingdom, they will be very popular as decorative animals.
secondary_translated_text: 내 왕국 정원에서 그들은 장식용 동물로 매우 인기가 있을 것이다.

original_en_text: There is surprising strength hidden in their thin, elegant limbs. It would be a pleasure to ride upon it...
original_zh_text: 优雅纤细的后肢中蕴含强大的力量，若能驯服必是绝佳坐骑。
translated_text: Their slim, smooth limbs and legs have incredible strength. I enjoyed riding.
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 날씬하고 매끄러운 팔다리와 다리는 놀라운 힘을 가지고 있습니다.나는 타는 것을 즐겼다.

original_en_text: Whatever admiration I had for its fleecy down is spoilt by its disturbing mask... and its steely spines.
original_zh_text: 蓬松绒毛的吸引力被其阴森气质与钢刺彻底破坏。
translated_text: My admiration for her feathers was destroyed by her strange mask and steel spine.
secondary_translated_text: 그녀의 이상한 마스크와 강철 척추로 그녀의 깃털에 대한 나의 감탄은 파괴되었다.

translated_text: The bugs are burning

original_en_text: Cymbal bearing worker of the Deep Docks. Pans the hauls of smokerock to find traces of more precious minerals.
original_zh_text: 深坞持钹工人，筛选烟岩中的珍贵矿物残渣。
translated_text: A symbolic ship of deep berth shakes up a collection of smoking rocks in search of traces of more valuable minerals.
secondary_translated_text: 깊은 정박에 있는 상징적인 배가 더 귀중한 미네랄의 흔적을 찾기 위해 연연하는 암석들의 모음을 흔들고 있다.

original_en_text: Sticky mollusc that defends itself by spraying burning fluid from growths on its back.
original_zh_text: 通过背部凸起喷射燃烧体液的防御型软体生物。
translated_text: Viscous mollusks protect themselves by flushing hot liquid from their backs.
secondary_translated_text: 점성 연체류는 등에서 뜨거운 액체를 씻어내서 스스로를 보호한다.

original_en_text: This one is pretty, but not as soft as first it seems. The plant it mimics is flaked and coarse, and the bug’s coat shares similar texture.
original_zh_text: 看似柔美实则粗粝，与其拟态植物的质感完全一致。
translated_text: It is good, but not as sweet as it seems at first. Plants are thick, and the skin of insects has a similar texture.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 좋지만 처음에는 보이는 것만큼 달콤하지는 않습니다.식물은 두껍고 곤충의 껍질은 비슷한 질감을 가지고 있습니다.

original_en_text: Low level worker lost to Pharloom’s Haunting. Instinct keeps them at their task, though in much simpler fashion than before.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的低级劳工，仍凭本能重复着旧日工作。
translated_text: The worker died of discomfort Faroe. Instinctively they perform the task, although much easier than before.
secondary_translated_text: 그 노동자는 불편 함으로 사망했습니다.본능적으로 그들은 이전보다 훨씬 쉽지만 작업을 수행합니다.

original_en_text: Something in their assault reminds me of my own skill, though their talents are born purely of instinct. My technique is formed from hard training.
original_zh_text: 攻击套路和我有几分相像。不过他们靠的是祖传本能，我则是勤学苦练。
translated_text: His attack reminded me of my skills, but his talent was purely instinctive.
secondary_translated_text: 그의 공격은 나의 기술을 떠올리게 했지만, 그의 재능은 순전히 본능적이었다.

original_en_text: Certain tools and skills can pierce its defences. I should adjust my strategy as needed.
original_zh_text: 正面硬撼绝非明智之举——只有特定的工具和技艺能撕开它的防御。
translated_text: Some tools and abilities can be used to break through the defenses. The strategy should be adjusted as necessary.
secondary_translated_text: 몇 가지 도구와 능력은 방어를 뚫는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.전략은 필요에 따라 조정되어야 한다.

translated_text: Grandmother Shelly.
Rugs for the Chef

original_en_text: Bug charged to catch dregs of Silk that fall from the Citadel. Will attack with its staff if provoked.
original_zh_text: 专职收集圣堡掉落灵丝碎屑的劳工，受干扰时会挥杖攻击。
translated_text: The agitator was responsible for collecting the silk remnants that had fallen from the castle.When they were angry, they attacked with a stick.
secondary_translated_text: 성에서 떨어지는 실크 잔류물을 모으는 일을 맡은 선동자는 화가 나서 막대기로 공격했다.

original_en_text: Similar bugs would gnaw away at unguarded food supplies in my homeland. As a child, I would hunt them, eager to make use of myself and test my skills.
original_zh_text: 我的故土也有类似的飞虫，它们会啃食未加看守的食物补给。年少时我经常猎杀它们，既为守护食物也为试炼技艺。
translated_text: These insects can destroy food supplies without protection.When I was a child, I wanted to chase them, live for myself, test my skills.
secondary_translated_text: 이 곤충은 보호없이 식량 공급을 파괴 할 수 있습니다. 어렸을 때, 나는 그들을 쫓고, 나 자신을 위해 살고, 내 기술을 테스트하고 싶었습니다.

original_en_text: Automaton built in the shape of a scuttling bug. Its back contains retractable pins, intended to cut song cylinders free of any obstruction.
original_zh_text: 仿造爬虫外形的自动机，背部探针可切除阻塞音筒的障碍物。
translated_text: The robot has the shape of a flying insect. The back is equipped with a push-out spike, which is designed to cut a curved pipe without obstacles.
secondary_translated_text: 이 로봇은 날아다니는 곤충의 모양을 가지고 있다.뒷면에는 장애물 없이 곡선 파이프를 절단할 수 있도록 설계된 푸시아웃 스파이크가 장착되어 있습니다.

translated_text: The Gantz opens

original_en_text: Uses their steel-bristled pin to scrub the soot from vents and pipes.
original_zh_text: 以钢鬃尖刺清理管道煤灰的劳工。
translated_text: Use a steel screw to clean the dust in the vents and pipes.
secondary_translated_text: 강철 나사를 사용하여 통풍구와 파이프의 먼지를 청소합니다.

original_en_text: Huge, yet stealthy Skarr. An expert trapper and master of the undergrowth.
original_zh_text: 精通丛林陷阱的斯卡尔猎手，身形庞大却又善于潜行。
translated_text: Huge, but hidden skeleton. Trap experts, masters of the jungle.
secondary_translated_text: 거대하지만 숨겨진 해골.함정 전문가, 정글의 마스터.

original_en_text: Lashing fragments of pure darkness, shaped into sharpened tentacles.
original_zh_text: 由纯粹黑暗凝聚而成的尖锐触手。
translated_text: Attack the sharp pieces of pure darkness to form the tentacles.
secondary_translated_text: 순수한 어둠의 날카로운 조각을 공격하여 촉수를 형성합니다.

translated_text: The Farm
Dancing Gear

original_en_text: Soft bug beneath a huge, horned skull. Charges at intruders to protect its territory and its smaller companions.
original_zh_text: 顶着怪兽头骨的软体虫，为保护地盘和自身柔软的内部，常对入侵者进行无差别冲锋。
translated_text: Under the skull is a large soft worm with long horns. The invaders have to protect their territory and their small comrades.
secondary_translated_text: 두개골 아래에는 긴 뿔이 있는 크고 부드러운 벌레가 있다.침략자들은 그들의 영토와 그들의 작은 동지들을 보호해야 한다.

original_en_text: Common winged bug of the lowlands. Generally docile, but will attack if threats come close.
original_zh_text: 低地区域常见的温顺飞虫，不过被惹急了也会攻击来犯者。
translated_text: The winged insect is usually found in low-lying areas.They are usually quiet, but when a threat approaches, they attack.
secondary_translated_text: 날개 달린 곤충은 보통 낮은 지대에서 발견된다. 그들은 보통 조용하지만 위협이 다가오면 공격한다.

original_en_text: Foul creatures birthed into servitude. Their plight elicits no sympathy from me.
original_zh_text: 这些可悲的生物从蛹中钻出的瞬间，就被烙上了终生奴役的印记——但它们啃噬死囚腐肉时发出的欢快嗡鸣，实在让人难以怜悯。
translated_text: An unclean creature was born a slave. His situation does not arouse my sympathy.
secondary_translated_text: 불결한 피조물은 노예로 태어났다.그의 상황은 나의 동정심을 불러일으키지 않는다.

original_en_text: The Haunting has stolen some important part of these bugs, yet still they attempt their former task. Until, that is, they sense my presence...
original_zh_text: 它们机械地重复着筛矿动作，直到感应到活物气息——那一刻，铜钹便化作呼啸的断头刃。
translated_text: Haunted stole a significant portion of these bugs, but checked out previous missions to feel my presence.
secondary_translated_text: Haunted 는 이러한 버그 중 상당 부분을 훔쳤지만 이전 임무를 확인하여 내 존재를 느꼈습니다.

translated_text: Dispersion.
Yuma, my Lord.

original_en_text: Mutated young worm infected with Plasmium. The new form displays potent regenerative skill.
original_zh_text: 受生质液感染而变异的蠕虫幼体。其新形态展现出强大的再生能力。
translated_text: Mutant larvae infected with malaria parasite. Development of new regenerative possibilities.
secondary_translated_text: 말라리아 기생충에 감염된 돌연변이 유충.새로운 재생 가능성의 개발.

translated_text: Jericho's mother

original_en_text: Its core is filled with fine mechanisms, but that alone should not produce such a convincing mimic of life. Silk must also be used to animate this artifice, though exactly how I am not sure.
original_zh_text: 当灵丝顺着齿轮缝隙游走时，这台机器竟发出类似心跳的震颤——圣堡匠人究竟将多少生命奥秘编织进了这些钢铁躯壳？
translated_text: Its core is full of intricate mechanisms, but that in itself does not make the life simulator so attractive.We need to use the silk to activate the technology, but not how to use it.
secondary_translated_text: 그것의 핵심은 복잡한 메커니즘으로 가득 차 있지만, 그 자체로 생명 시뮬레이터를 그렇게 매력적으로 만들지 않습니다. 우리는 기술을 활성화하기 위해 실크를 사용해야하지만, 그것을 사용하는 방법은 아닙니다.

original_en_text: Its shell gives it the advantage of surprise, but also forces it into a slender, brittle shape that cannot withstand a heavy attack.
original_zh_text: 拟态外壳带来突袭优势，但纤细脆弱的体型难以承受重击。
translated_text: Its shell gives it unexpected advantages, but at the same time gives it an elongated and fragile shape that cannot withstand intense attacks.
secondary_translated_text: 그것의 껍질은 예상치 못한 이점을 주지만, 동시에 강렬한 공격을 견딜 수 없는 길고 연약한 모양을 준다.

original_en_text: Predatory plant with a powerful jaw shaped to resemble a lily pad.
original_zh_text: 伪装成睡莲的捕食性植物，拥有强有力的颚部。
translated_text: A predatory plant with a hard and lily-like jaw.
The Smoke Curtain
The coilmeiga

original_en_text: Airborne pest, less common than its grounded siblings. Attacks with sharp fangs if agitated.
original_zh_text: 其陆行同类的飞行变种，较为稀少。受到刺激时会使用利齿攻击。
translated_text: Airborne pests are less common than similar pests in the soil.When they wake up, they attack with sharp teeth.
secondary_translated_text: 공기중의 해충은 토양에 있는 유사한 해충보다 덜 흔하다. 그들이 깨어났을 때, 그들은 날카로운 이빨로 공격한다.

original_en_text: The souls of so many bugs, obsessed with Silk, consumed by it. Their pain shall forever remain in that pit. Even I do not possess strength enough to cleanse it.
original_zh_text: 无数沉溺灵丝终被吞噬的灵魂，其苦痛将永远禁锢在这坑里。纵使是我也无力净化。
translated_text: The souls of many insects will be possessed by the silk, consumed by it, and their sufferings will remain in its pit forever.
secondary_translated_text: 많은 곤충들의 영혼은 실크에 의해 소유되고, 실크에 의해 소비되며, 그들의 고통은 영원히 그 구덩이에 남아있을 것입니다.

original_en_text: Silk-spun child possessed by the void.
original_zh_text: 被虚空侵蚀的灵丝造物。
translated_text: The rotor is empty,

original_en_text: Shell-plated worm found only in the deepest depths. Seems to survive despite consuming no food or liquid.
original_zh_text: 仅存于最深处的甲壳蠕虫，无需进食或饮水仍能存活。
translated_text: The cancerous worms can only be seen in the deepest parts of the body, and he did not eat any food or liquids, but apparently survived.
secondary_translated_text: 암 벌레는 신체의 가장 깊은 부분에서만 볼 수 있으며, 그는 음식이나 액체를 먹지 않았지만 분명히 살아남았습니다.

translated_text: Al-Kholistan
Scroll to readers

original_en_text: Trap setting bug carrying a pouch of sharpened long-stakes.
original_zh_text: 携带尖锐长木桩布置陷阱的虫子。
translated_text: The worm that set the trap was carrying a long, sharp sack.
secondary_translated_text: 덫을 놓은 벌레는 길고 날카로운 자루를 가지고 있었다.

translated_text: Directed by: Doran Rod

original_en_text: Aged female mite, grown larger and stronger than most of its kin.
original_zh_text: 年迈的雌性螨虫，体型力量都远超同类。
translated_text: Older females are larger and stronger than other species.
secondary_translated_text: 나이가 많은 암컷은 다른 종보다 더 크고 강합니다.

original_en_text: Mass of old masks swollen and animated by writhing void.
original_zh_text: 由纠缠的虚空驱动而膨胀、复活的一团古老面甲。
translated_text: Many old masks are caused by cracks that creep and inflate.
secondary_translated_text: 많은 오래된 마스크는 기어오르고 팽창하는 균열로 인해 발생합니다.

original_en_text: Pernicious looter found all over Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 在纺络全境四处劫掠的卑劣盗虫。
translated_text: The lighthouse is filled with flights.

original_en_text: Small bug, shackled and cowled for sin committed within the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 戴着镣铐，被蒙住头部的圣堡罪徒。
translated_text: Bagha was handcuffed and forced to wear a turban for the crimes committed in the castle.
secondary_translated_text: Bagha 는 성에서 저지른 범죄에 대해 수갑을 채우고 터번을 착용하도록 강요 받았습니다.

original_en_text: Flighty insect that lives beside still waters.
original_zh_text: 栖息静水边的敏感飞虫。
translated_text: A lightweight insect that lives near calm waters.
secondary_translated_text: 평온한 물 근처에서 사는 가벼운 곤충.

original_en_text: Its form is certainly based on bugs found outside the Citadel. In my own craftwork, I too often look to nature for inspiration.
original_zh_text: 那对仿生复眼能精准识别音筒纹路，探针起舞时溅起的火花，竟在钢壁上刻出类似灵丝符文的痕迹。
translated_text: Its shape is naturally based on insects found outside the castle.In my work I often draw nature.
secondary_translated_text: 그것의 모양은 자연적으로 성 밖에서 발견되는 곤충을 기반으로합니다. 내 작품에서 나는 종종 자연을 그립니다.

translated_text: К р а м е т

original_en_text: Birth equipped this one well. In its assault it becomes its own projectile.
original_zh_text: 它们生来就是活体投掷物——将整个身躯化作飞矛，用长角贯穿目标。
translated_text: Birth arms this person. In attack he becomes a projection of himself.
secondary_translated_text: 이 사람의 팔을 태어났다.공격으로 그는 자신의 투영이 된다.

original_en_text: Their heavier bells armour them well against my strikes, but against that oppressive heat... can they help at all?
original_zh_text: 它们厚重的钟甲可以抵挡我的针刃，但在酷热环境中恐怕难有作为。
translated_text: Their heavy bells protect them from My blows, but they also protect them from the heat and steam.
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 무거운 종들은 나의 타격으로부터 그들을 보호하지만, 또한 더위와 증기로부터 그들을 보호한다.

original_en_text: A rare built bug within these ailing lands. Most pilgrims’ shells seem small by comparison. What nourishment did they discover to grow so large?
original_zh_text: 在纺络这片病恹恹的土地上，这般体型的虫子实属罕见。与它们相比，其他朝圣者的外壳简直孱弱如卵。它们究竟吞食了什么，才能膨胀至此等体型？
translated_text: These are unusual insects in the land of diseases.On the other hand, the shells of most pilgrims look small.What nutrients are important?
secondary_translated_text: 이것은 질병의 땅에서 특이한 곤충입니다. 반면에 대부분의 순례자의 껍질은 작아 보입니다. 어떤 영양소가 중요한가요?

original_en_text: With a softer shell than most, they would have relied on their athleticism to survive.
original_zh_text: 甲壳柔软脆弱，全靠昔日矫健的身手生存。
translated_text: Their shells are softer than most people 's, so they only survive on their athletic skills.
secondary_translated_text: 그들의 껍질은 대부분의 사람들보다 부드럽기 때문에 운동 능력으로만 생존합니다.

translated_text: The Beetle Hunters

original_en_text: Common crawler that lives beneath sand.
translated_text: It is a reptile that lives in the sand.
The Finch Beetle
The shelf
Animals that fly

original_en_text: Silk and shells corrupted. That void seeks now to claim this land whole. These poor shells are only the beginning.
original_zh_text: 灵丝与甲壳皆遭腐蚀，虚空正逐步蚕食这地界，这些可怜的甲壳不过是开端。
translated_text: The silk and bark were corrosive. Now they are trying to conquer this land. These poor shells are just the beginning.
secondary_translated_text: 실크와 껍질은 부식성이 있다.이제 그들은 이 땅을 정복하려고 노력한다.이 불쌍한 껍질은 단지 시작일 뿐이다.

original_en_text: Screeching scavenger that roosts high in caverns and preys on passing pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 盘踞洞顶的食腐飞虫，惯用群体战术袭击朝圣者。
translated_text: Screaming hunters inhabit the caves and take advantage of the passing pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: 비명을 지르는 사냥꾼들이 동굴에 살고 지나가는 순례자들을 이용한다.

original_en_text: Insect formed to imitate a branch, capable of remaining perfectly still for long periods, but unexpectedly swift when roused.
original_zh_text: 能长期静止拟态成树枝，受惊时发动闪电突袭。
translated_text: Insects, which mimic tree branches, remain completely motionless for a long period of time, but they can wake up surprisingly quickly.
secondary_translated_text: 나무의 나뭇가지를 모방하는 곤충은 오랜 시간 동안 완전히 움직이지 않고 있지만 놀랍게도 빠르게 깨어날 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: This larger form carries so much weight it can barely move from its place.
original_zh_text: 庞大身躯使其几乎无法离开原位。
translated_text: This large form is so heavy that it can barely be removed from yours.
secondary_translated_text: 이 큰 형태는 너무 무거워서 당신의 형태에서 거의 제거 할 수 없습니다.

translated_text: With Skrill

original_en_text: Small construct built by Weavers past, brought to life through Silk runes threaded within.
original_zh_text: 远古织者铸造的小型装置，通过灵丝符文赋予生命。
translated_text: The small structures of the Weaver past are brought to life by silk corridors that lead inside.
secondary_translated_text: Weaver 의 과거의 작은 구조물은 내부로 이어지는 실크 복도에 의해 살아납니다.

original_en_text: The less these gruesome bugs breed, the better.
original_zh_text: 这种烦扰的虫子繁殖得越少越好。
translated_text: The less these terrible insects multiply, the better.
secondary_translated_text: 이 끔찍한 곤충들이 덜 번식할수록 더 좋다.

original_en_text: Gilded servant of the Whispering Vaults, born to read and recall the near endless scrolls of prayer.
original_zh_text: 低语书库的金袍仆从，专司诵读那些浩繁无尽的经文。
translated_text: The whispers of the golden servants in the hall were born to read and remember the scrolls of the infinite prayer.
secondary_translated_text: 홀에 있는 황금 하인들의 속삭임은 무한한 기도의 두루마리를 읽고 기억하기 위해 태어났다.

translated_text: The Squaredbird (Squaredbird)

original_en_text: I cannot decipher its function to the greater Core. Is it built for defence? If so, its passivity seems far from optimal.
original_zh_text: 这些悬浮铁球会在入侵者靠近时突然爆开尖刺，但过于迟缓的反应速度，让它们更像布满锈迹的装饰品。
translated_text: ¿Impossible to decipher the greatest impact on nuclear defense has been made? If so, then this passivity is far from perfect.
secondary_translated_text: 핵 방어에 가장 큰 영향을 해독하는 것이 불가능합니까?만약 그렇다면, 이 수동성은 완벽하지 않다.

original_en_text: If not for the spikes, I would think it an appealing bug.
original_zh_text: 若没有尖刺，我会觉得它笨拙可爱。
translated_text: If it 's not for Pinpoint, I think it 's an attractive mistake.
secondary_translated_text: 핀포인트에 대한 것이 아니라면 매력적인 실수라고 생각합니다.

original_en_text: Hovering pest with a hollowed proboscis able to spit gobs of sizzling bile.
original_zh_text: 通过中空口器喷射胆汁的悬浮虫。
translated_text: Parasites that colonize the hollow trunk can spit bile.
secondary_translated_text: 중공 줄기에 식민지화하는 기생충은 담즙을 뱉을 수 있습니다.

original_en_text: This surface dweller is free of Silk. Its nature remains its own. The monarch’s influence must only have stretched below it.
original_zh_text: 这地表生物未被丝咒侵蚀，看来圣堡君主的控制尚未延伸至此。
translated_text: Such inhabitants of the surface have no silk.The essence remains yours.The influence of the monarch was less than this.
secondary_translated_text: 그런 표면 주민들은 실크가 없다. 본질은 네 몫이다. 군주의 영향력은 이것보다 적었다.

original_en_text: Did they ever truly understand those inscrutable scrolls? Or is it all merely pretence, an endless act to maintain their order’s station within the Citadel?
original_zh_text: 他们是否真的理解那些晦涩的经文？还是说，这一切不过是伪装，一场无休止的表演，只为维持他们在城堡中的地位？
translated_text: Do you really know the mystery? Or should it be an endless spectacle to maintain order and status of the castle?
secondary_translated_text: 당신은 정말로 그 미스터리를 알고 있습니까?아니면 성의 질서와 지위를 유지하기 위해 끝없는 광경이어야합니까?

translated_text: The Coral House, Coral House

original_en_text: Its assault... like a young bug’s toy turned deadly. Could I, in time, fashion a spinning tool to match?
original_zh_text: 其攻击如同将孩童的玩具变成致命武器，或许我能制作类似原理的纺织工具？
translated_text: It 's like a little toy insect that becomes deadly. Is it possible to make a rotary tool in time?
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 마치 작은 장난감 곤충이 치명적으로 변하는 것과 같다.시간 내에 회전 도구를 만들 수 있습니까?

original_en_text: Though grey with age, their frayed form suggested a being strung from Silk, one who welcomed a decisive end in combat over a slow decline.
original_zh_text: 苍老的躯壳布满灵丝束痕。比起缓慢凋零，它更渴求战死的终局。
translated_text: His appearance, torn by aging, is a man of silk who faces the decisive end of a battle that is slowly fading away.
secondary_translated_text: 노화로 찢어진 그의 외모는 천천히 사라지고 있는 전투의 결정적인 끝에 직면한 실크의 남자이다.

translated_text: The big puff.

original_en_text: Infant form of the more formidable Craggler.
original_zh_text: 酸蚀巨螯的幼年形态，通过同类相残争夺成长机会。
translated_text: The most powerful form of the son of Krugler
secondary_translated_text: 크루글러의 아들 중 가장 강력한 형태

original_en_text: Either its size has made it fearless or the Haunting has removed its sense of self-preservation.
original_zh_text: 要么是巨大的体型给了它勇气，要么是丝咒把它怕死的本性麻痹了。
translated_text: Either your size scares you, or the attachment removes the sense of self-preservation.
secondary_translated_text: 당신의 크기가 당신을 두렵게 하거나, 애착은 자기 보존의 감각을 제거합니다.

original_en_text: Barely a bug, and possessing only basic thought, yet instinct alone proved enough to turn it deadly.
original_zh_text: 几乎算不上虫子，只有最基本的思维。然而，其攻击的本能已足够致命。
translated_text: It was not a mistake, it was a fundamental idea, but I found that one instinct can be deadly.
secondary_translated_text: 그것은 실수가 아니라 근본적인 생각이었지만, 나는 하나의 본능이 치명적일 수 있다는 것을 발견했다.

translated_text: Gears of Spine [English]

original_en_text: Bursts forth at movement sensed close, and will consume any object or bug careless enough to fall into its maw.
original_zh_text: 当流沙开始诡谲涌动时，你只剩半次心跳的时间逃离那张深渊巨口。
translated_text: When it hears movement in the vicinity, it explodes, accidentally eats objects or insects and falls into the stomach.
secondary_translated_text: 근처에서 움직이는 소리를 들으면 폭발하고 우연히 물체나 곤충을 먹고 위 속으로 떨어집니다.

original_en_text: Pointed scurrier posing as plant life.
original_zh_text: 伪装成植物的带刺疾行者。
translated_text: Spiders mimic plants.

original_en_text: Verminous pest, common throughout the dark corners of Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 灰沼阴暗角落滋生的害虫。
translated_text: Parasites are often found in the dark corners of Gremor.
secondary_translated_text: 기생충은 그리모르의 어두운 구석에서 흔히 발견된다.

original_en_text: Its fur is thick and silky. Sadly, lost to its Haunting, I shall never safely be able to touch it.
original_zh_text: 厚实丝绒般的皮毛令人神往，可惜其受丝咒侵蚀，再难安全抚触。
translated_text: The skin is thick and silky. Unfortunately, I can't touch it, so it 's never safe.
secondary_translated_text: 피부가 두껍고 부드럽다.불행히도, 나는 그것을 만질 수 없기 때문에 결코 안전하지 않습니다.

translated_text: Original title: The Hawk Hooker
My favorite wing

original_en_text: Her body seemed a Weaver’s, but her mask had been forcibly removed, and her own Silk was bound useless by heavy pins lodged through her spine.
original_zh_text: 她身形似织者，但面甲被强行剥离，脊背打入的重钉也使其灵丝失效。
translated_text: His body looked like a frame, but the mask was forcibly removed, and his silk was tied with a heavy thorn inserted into the spine.
secondary_translated_text: 그의 몸은 프레임처럼 보이지만, 마스크는 강제로 제거되었고, 그의 실크는 무거운 가시로 묶여 척추에 삽입되었습니다.

original_en_text: Fierce and fast, and defending their lands even from birth. These are children to be proud of.
original_zh_text: 凶猛迅捷，自出生起就守卫故土，是值得骄傲的后裔。
translated_text: She is tenacious and fast, and has been protecting her homeland since birth.
secondary_translated_text: 그녀는 끈기있고 빠르며 태어날 때부터 조국을 지키고 있다.

original_en_text: Like fabric somehow sprung to life. Its pelt is perfectly matched to the rags it infests.
original_zh_text: 外色颜色与寄居的布料完美融合，就像被赋予生命的织物。
translated_text: But they somehow multiply.The skin adapts perfectly to the infected tissue.
secondary_translated_text: 그러나 그들은 어떻게든 번식합니다. 피부는 감염된 조직에 완벽하게 적응합니다.

original_en_text: Its wings are quite small compared to its bulk. Perhaps it uses the warm air of these fiery lands to help stay airborne. Clever, if so.
original_zh_text: 翅膀小身体胖，估计是利用这片炽热地带的热气流飞起来的——还挺聪明。
translated_text: Compared to its size, its wings are very small.It might be wise to use the hot air from the hot earth to stay in the air if it is.
secondary_translated_text: 그 크기에 비하면 날개가 매우 작아서 뜨거운 지구에서 온난 공기를 이용해 공중에 머물러 있는 것이 현명할 것이다.

original_en_text: Gold ranked disciple of the Choir and direct servant to the Citadel’s Conductors.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团的高阶信徒，圣堡指挥家的直系仆从。
translated_text: The golden pupil of the choir, the immediate servant of the castle commander
secondary_translated_text: 성 사령관의 직속 하인 성합창단의 황금 제자.

original_en_text: The large bell seems to signify them as once leader of a climbing troupe, though the Haunting has erased that former authority.
original_zh_text: 那柄铭刻朝圣路线的钟杖曾是领袖象征，如今却成了敲碎追随者颅骨的凶器。
translated_text: The huge bells seem to indicate that they were once the leaders of a group of climbers, but their obsession erased their former authority.
secondary_translated_text: 거대한 종들은 그들이 한때 등반가 집단의 지도자였음을 나타내는 것 같지만, 그들의 집착은 이전의 권위를 지워 버렸습니다.
